dynac.F

1  BLOCK DATA
2  implicit real(8) (a-h,o-z)
3  COMMON /consta/ vl, pi, xmat, rpel, qst
4  common/gaus13/h(13),t(13)
5  common/gaus17/h1(17),t1(17)
6  common/radia/trt,rmoy,xintf,crae
7  data crae,xintf /2.81793910e-13,.86967/
8  DATA vl,xmat,rpel,qst/2.99792458e10,938.27231,28.17938e-14,1./
9  DATA h /.040484004,.092121499,.138873510,.178145981,
10  1 .207816048,.226283180,.232551553,.226283180,
11  2 .207816048,.178145981,.138873510,.092121499,
12  3 .040484004/
13  DATA t /-.984183055,-.917598399,-.801578091,
14  1 -.642349339,-.448492751,-.230458316,0.,
15  2 .230458316,.448492751,.642349339,.801578091,
16  3 .917598399,.984183055/
17  DATA h1 /-.990575473,-.950675522,-.880239154,
18  1 -.781514004,-.657671159,-.512690537,
19  2 -.351231763,-.178484181, 0.,
20  3 .178484181, .351231763,.512690537,
21  4 .657671159, .781514004,.880239154,
22  5 .950675522, .990575473/
23  DATA t1 /.024148303,.055459529,.085036148,
24  1 .111883847,.135136368,.154045761,
25  2 .168004102,.176562705,.179446470,
26  3 .176562705,.168004102,.154045761,
27  4 .135136368,.111883847,.085036148,
28  5 .055459529,.024148303/
29  common/randu/ck(15),kmax
30 ! randu(j):contains the Chebitcheff coefficients Ck in table 20.
31 ! kmax is the total number of these coefficients(from 1)
32  data (ck(j),j=1,7)/.98933556,-.68838689,.28191718,
33  * -.66389307e-01,.87406854e-02,-.59534602e-03,
34  * .16300617e-04/
35 !xx data (ck(j),j=1,10)/.99927015,-.78398394,.44577741,
36 !xx * -.18252873,.51928922e-01,-.99821428e-02,
37 !xx * .1259644e-02,-.99460265e-04,.44427251e-05,
38 !xx * -.85528336e-07/
39 !xx data (ck(j),j=1,12)/.99989097,-.79469098,.48376369,
40 !xx * -.23183581,.85333907e-01,-.23354050e-01,
41 !xx * .46284273e-02,-.64840101e-03,.62211306e-04,
42 !xx * -.38752189e-05,.14087289e-06,-.22650639e-08/
43  data kmax/7/
44  END
45 
60  PROGRAM dynac
61  implicit real(8) (a-h,o-z)
62  parameter(ncards=64,iptsz=100002,maxcell1=3000)
63  common/itvole/itvol,imamin
64  COMMON /consta/ vl, pi, xmat, rpel, qst
65  common/const/pi2,sqpi,pwtpi,sqpi2,sq2pi
66 ! pi2=pi*pi, sqpi=(pi/2)**3/2 , pwtpi=(2*pi)**3/2 ,sqpi2=sqrt(pi/2.)
67  common/fene/wdisp,wphas,wx,wy,rlim,ifw
68  common/dyn/tref,vref
69  common/dyni/vrefi,trefi,fhinit,acpt
70  logical acpt
71  common/ttfc/tk,t1k,t2k,sk,s1k,s2k,fh
72  common/azlist/icont,iprin
73  common/carac/cara(10)
74  common/compt/nrres,nrtre,nrbunc,nrdbun
75  common/compt1/ndtl,ncavmc,ncavnm
76  common/sc3/beamc,scdist,sce10,cplm,ect,apl,ichaes,iscsp
77  common/faisc/f(10,iptsz),imax,ngood
78  common/tapes/in,ifile,meta
79  common/shif/dtiph,shift
80  common/tilt/tipha,tix,tiy,shifw,shifp
81  COMMON /bloc21/ be, apb(2), layl, layx, rabt
82  real(8) LAYL, LAYX
83  common/poro/irot1,irot2
84  LOGICAL IROT1,IROT2
85  common/etchas/fractx,fracty,fractl
86  common/davcom/dav1(maxcell1,40),davtot,iitem(maxcell1),idav
87  common/davprt/shortl
88  common/shortl/davprt
89  common/etcha1/ichas(iptsz),chexmin(10),chexmax(10),chasit
90  common/etcha3/ichxyz(iptsz)
91  common/dcspa/iesp
92  common/tstnt/intgct

96  common/rfield/ifield
97  common/posc/xpsc

100  common/qskew/qtwist,iqrand,itwist,iaqu
101  common/femt/iemgrw,iemqesg
102 ! common/mode/eflvl,rflvl
103  common/aerp/vphase,vfield,ierpf
104  common/blvl/bflvl
105  common/rec/irec
106  common/histo/centre(6)
107  common/grparm/glim(4,2),glim1(4,2),glim2(4,2),patitl,
108  * ngraphs(100),idwdp,igrprm,ngrafs

110  LOGICAL CHASIT,SHIFT,ITVOL,IMAMIN
111  LOGICAL ICHAES,IESP,ifield,ialin,itwist,iemgrw
112  character cara*80,cmnt*80,text*80,patitl*80

119  logical ichsp

121  common/alin/xl,yl,xpl,ypl
122  common/trcmp/pchoixa
123  common/pltprf/sprfx(3000),sprfy(3000),sprfl(3000),sprfw(3000),
124  x sprfp(3000),sprng(3000),prlab(3000),iprf
125  CHARACTER*(8) PRLAB
126  common/mcs/imcs,ncstat,cstat(20)
127  common/secdr/iseor
128  LOGICAL ISEOR
129  common/rayshy/iraysh
130  common/trfq/icour,ncell
131  common/newref/dephas,dewref,iref,irefw
132  common/tofev/ttvols
133  common/conti/irfqp
134  logical irfqp
135  common/rf1ptq/tvolt,avolt,fph,mlc,nceltot
136  common/strip/atm,qs,atms,ths,qop,sqst(6),anp,nqst
137  common/grot/rzot,izrot
138  common/rfqwdst/rfqwfil,rfqirec,rfqiflg,iwcl(20),nrwc,iflgr
139 ! allow plotting the beam after sector nsprint ******
140  common/isector/nsector,nsprint
141  common/mingw/mg
142  common/xposi/xpost(10),xlce(2),xpax(2),iscx(2)
143  common/fcont/ifcont
144  common/paths/dpath
145  character*(256) dpath
146  logical ifcont,mg,ffound,fromrfq
147 !********************************************
148 ! reservation for TRACE3D related stuff
149  common/trace3d/trace3h(100),trace3t(maxcell1),tif,kt3h,kt3t,fid
150  common/t3dfld/fldctr(15),zend(15),t3d
151  logical T3D,xiset
152  character trace3h*128,trace3t*128,tif*128,tifa*128,tifb*128
153 !********************************************
154  common/dmp/dmpdat(14)
155  common/frmacc/fracc
156  common/elq/inisk
157  INTEGER inisk,rfqiflg,rfqirec
158  logical izrot,fracc
159  LOGICAL IRAYSH,cfound
160  DATA kle/'GEBEAM','INPUT','RDBEAM','ETAC','DRIFT',
161  * 'QUADRUPO','SEXTUPO','QUADSXT','SOLENO','SOQUAD',
162  * 'BMAGNET','CAVMC','CAVSC','FIELD','HARM',
163  * 'BUNCHER','RFQCL','NEWF','NREF','SCDYNAC',
164  * 'SCDYNEL','SCPOS','TILT','TILZ','CHANGREF',
165  * 'TOF','REJECT','ZROT','ALINER','ACCEPT',
166  * 'EMIT','EMITGR','COMMENT','WRBEAM','ENVEL',
167  * 'CHASE','RWFIELD','RANDALI','TWQA','EMIPRT',
168  * 'MMODE','RFQPTQ','STRIPPER','STEER','ZONES',
169  * 'PROFGR','SECORD','RASYN','FDRIFT','FSOLE',
170  * 'EGUN','COMPRES','STOP','REFCOG','FPART',
171  * 'QUAELEC','QUAFK','CAVNUM','EDFLEC','EMITL',
172  * 'RFKICK','FIRORD','DCBEAM','T3D'/
173  integer narg,i
174  character txt*128,myarg(10)*128,infiln*128
175  character myfile*256,ofeldf*256,ofelds*256,inarg*256
176  character plane*10,shortl*80,wfile*80,rfqwfil*80
177 ! character(LEN=*) status
178 ! if mg=.true., use MINGW on windows, which has a different result for
179 ! ctime function than standard gfortran
180 ! default is mg=.false. This can be set by giving mingw as argument on
181 ! the command line
182  mg=.false.
183 ! get arguments from the command line
184 ! format for dynac:
185 ! dynac file1 [-h]
186 ! where: -file1 is the input file, describing the beamline
187 ! -h print help info
188  narg=0
189  DO
190  call get_command_argument(narg, inarg, len, istat)
191 ! call GETARG(narg,inarg)
192  larg=len_trim(inarg)
193  if(larg.eq.0) exit
194 ! write(6,*) narg,larg,inarg(1:larg),len,istat
195  narg=narg+1
196  myarg(narg)=trim(inarg)
197  ENDDO
198 ! INPUT ARGUMENTS:
199 ! *******************************************************************
200  ffound=.false.
201  dpath=''
202  myfile=''
203  do i=2,narg
204  txt=myarg(i)
205  if(txt(1:1).ne.'-') then
206 ! the input argument is the name of the input file
207  write(6,2917)myarg(i)
208 2917 format('Input file in DYNAC: ',a)
209  infiln=myarg(i)
210 ! 7 or 'in' is the unit corresponding to the dynac input file
211 ! describing the accelerator or transport line
212  open(7,file=myarg(i),status='unknown')
213  ffound=.true.
214  else
215  if(myarg(i).eq.'-mingw') then
216 ! if mg=.true., use MINGW on windows, which has a different result
217 ! for ctime function than standard gfortran
218  mg=.true.
219  write(6,*) 'Using MINGW gfortran format on MSWindows'
220  endif
221  if(txt(1:2).eq.'-p') then
222 ! path of where data files needed by dynac are stored follows this option
223 ! path=.true.
224  lpath=len_trim(txt)
225  dpath=txt(3:lpath)
226 ! write(6,3317) dpath
227 !3317 format('Input file path: ',A)
228  endif
229  if(myarg(i).eq.'-h') then
230 ! print out of help message, starting with DYNAC version
231  WRITE(6,3101)
232  write(6,*) 'Command format:'
233  write(6,*) 'dynacv6_0 [-h] [-mingw] [-p] [file1]'
234  write(6,*) 'where file1 is the input file, describing ',
235  * 'the beamline'
236  write(6,*) 'Optional arguments:'
237  write(6,*) '-h will list the argument options (this ',
238  * 'list)'
239  write(6,*) '-mingw will enable MINGW gfortran format',
240  * ' on MSWindows'
241  write(6,*) '-p can be used to specify the datafile path',
242  * '. There should be no '
243  write(6,*) ' space between -p and the path. This ',
244  * 'option is used by the'
245  write(6,*) ' DYNAC GUI.'
246  stop
247  endif
248  endif
249  enddo
250  if(.not.ffound) then
251  write(6,*) 'Error: Input file name required'
252  write(6,*) 'Type'
253  write(6,*) 'dynacv6_0 -h'
254  write(6,*) 'for syntax'
255  stop
256  endif
257 ! *******************************************************************
258 ! OUTPUT FILES:
259 !
260 ! 'dynac.long' : print extensive computations information
261 !
262 ! 'dynac.short' : print essentials of beam dynamics information
263 !
264 ! 'dynac.print' : printout of the envelope and the emittance of the
265 ! beam in the directions x, y and z at each position
266 ! of the optical and accelerating elements, as well as
267 ! the number of good particles
268 !
269 ! 'dynac.dmp' : printout of cavity cell related data:
270 ! cell number,synchronous phase (deg),relativistic
271 ! beta (output), output energy (MeV),
272 ! hor. emittance (mm.mrad, normalized),
273 ! ver. emittance (mm.mrad, normalized),
274 ! longitudinal emittance (ns.kev)
275 !
276 ! 'beam_core.dst': print the coordinates of the particles kept by
277 ! CHASE
278 !
279 ! 'beam_remove.dst': print the coordinates of the particles
280 ! removed by CHASE
281 !
282 ! 'dynac_in_pr.dst': print of the coordinates of the particles at the
283 ! input of the machine
284 !
285 ! 'emit.plot' : datafile used for the plots
286 !
287 ! *************************************************************************************************
288  lpath=len_trim(dpath)
289 !
290  myfile='dynac.long'
291  lfile=len_trim(myfile)
292  myfile(lpath+1:lpath+lfile)=myfile(1:lfile)
293  myfile(1:lpath)=dpath(1:lpath)
294  myfile=trim(myfile)
295  open(16,file=myfile,status='unknown')
296  myfile='dynac.short'
297  lfile=len_trim(myfile)
298  myfile(lpath+1:lpath+lfile)=myfile(1:lfile)
299  myfile(1:lpath)=dpath(1:lpath)
300  myfile=trim(myfile)
301  open(12,file=myfile,status='unknown')
302  myfile='dynac.print'
303  lfile=len_trim(myfile)
304  myfile(lpath+1:lpath+lfile)=myfile(1:lfile)
305  myfile(1:lpath)=dpath(1:lpath)
306  myfile=trim(myfile)
307  open(71,file=myfile,status='unknown')
308  myfile='dynac.dmp'
309  lfile=len_trim(myfile)
310  myfile(lpath+1:lpath+lfile)=myfile(1:lfile)
311  myfile(1:lpath)=dpath(1:lpath)
312  myfile=trim(myfile)
313  open(50,file=myfile,status='unknown')
314  myfile='beam_core.dst'
315  lfile=len_trim(myfile)
316  myfile(lpath+1:lpath+lfile)=myfile(1:lfile)
317  myfile(1:lpath)=dpath(1:lpath)
318  myfile=trim(myfile)
319  open(61,file=myfile,status='unknown')
320  myfile='beam_remove.dst'
321  lfile=len_trim(myfile)
322  myfile(lpath+1:lpath+lfile)=myfile(1:lfile)
323  myfile(1:lpath)=dpath(1:lpath)
324  myfile=trim(myfile)
325  open(60,file=myfile,status='unknown')
326  myfile='dynac_in_pr.dst'
327  lfile=len_trim(myfile)
328  myfile(lpath+1:lpath+lfile)=myfile(1:lfile)
329  myfile(1:lpath)=dpath(1:lpath)
330  myfile=trim(myfile)
331  open(11,file=myfile,status='unknown')
332  myfile='emit.plot'
333  lfile=len_trim(myfile)
334  myfile(lpath+1:lpath+lfile)=myfile(1:lfile)
335  myfile(1:lpath)=dpath(1:lpath)
336  myfile=trim(myfile)
337  open(66,file=myfile,status='unknown')
338  myfile='lost_particles.data'
339  lfile=len_trim(myfile)
340  myfile(lpath+1:lpath+lfile)=myfile(1:lfile)
341  myfile(1:lpath)=dpath(1:lpath)
342  myfile=trim(myfile)
343  open(49,file=myfile,status='unknown')
344  write(49,*) '# Element numb. pos. prt. inp.prt. X',
345  * ' Xp Y Yp ',
346  * ' PHASE W Q loss'
347  write(49,*) '# (m) num. number ',
348  * '(cm) (mrad) (cm) (mrad)',
349  * ' (deg) (MeV) reason'
350 ! ****************************************************************************************************
351 !*******files deactivated in the code
352 !
353 ! 'emlg.data': print at each position of space charge computation:
354 ! the length(m), the longitudinal emittance growth (ns.keV),
355 ! the kinetic energy (MeV), the number of good particles
356 !
357 ! 'emtr.data': print at each position of space charge computation:
358 ! the length(m), the hor. and ver. normalized emittances (mm.mrad)
359 !
360 ! 'chemlg.data': as 'emlg.data' but with CHASE
361 !
362 ! 'chemtr.data': as 'emtr.data' but with CHASE
363 !
364 ! 'ntxyz.data' : print at each position of space charge computation:
365 ! the coordinates of the particles in the 3D plane (x(cm), y(cm) and z(cm))
366 ! This file is rewound each time, only the last result is kept
367 !
368 ! 'rms.size' :print at each position of space charge computation the RMS(m) of the bunch
369 ! in x, y and z-direction
370 !
371 ! 'egun_prtcl.data' : print of the coordinates of the particle icont (see RDBEAM) along the DC EGUN
372 !
373 ! 'champ_sol.data' : plot field in the solenoid
374 ! ****************************************************************************************
375 ! SV 24/08/2015
376  myfile='cavdat.out'
377  lfile=len_trim(myfile)
378  myfile(lpath+1:lpath+lfile)=myfile(1:lfile)
379  myfile(1:lpath)=dpath(1:lpath)
380  myfile=trim(myfile)
381  open(13,file=myfile,status='unknown')
382 !old open(14,file='emtr.data',status='unknown')
383 !omment open(15,file='chemlg.data',status='unknown')
384 !omment open(17,file='rms.size',status='unknown')
385 !omment open(18,file='chemtr.data',status='unknown')
386 !omment open(19,file='nxyz.data',status='unknown')
387 !omment open(21,file='ntxyz.data',status='unknown')
388 !omment open(49,file='egun_prtcl.data',status='unknown')
389 ! ****************************************************
390 !omment write(14,7787)
391 !omment write(18,7787)
392 !omment7787 format(4x,'N',6x,'length',5x,'emitx',5x,'emity')
393 !omment write(13,7788)
394 !omment write(15,7788)
395 !omment7788 format(4x,'N',6x,'length',5x,'emitz',6x,'energy',1x,'part.good')
396 !********************************************************
397 ! SV 24/10/2015
398 !c write(13,99)
399 !c99 format(3x,'ncav',2x,'ncell',2x,'pos I(cm)',4x,'pos S(cm)',6x,
400 !c *'L cell(cm)',5x,'W(Mev)',7x,'dw(Mev)',6x,'TOF(dg)',7x,'Ph RF(dg)'
401 !c *,6x,'pos M(cm)',5x,'WM(Mev)',7x,'dwM(Mev)',6x,
402 !c *'TOFM(dg)',5x,'PhM RF(dg)')
403 !**************************************************************************************
404 ! initialize constants
405 ! in corresponds to dynac input file
406  in=7
407 ! itout corresponds to TRACE3D input file
408  itout=48
409 !
410 ! pi2=pi*pi, sqpi=(pi/2)**3/2 , pwtpi=(2*pi)**3/2 ,sqpi2=sqrt(pi/2.)
411  pi=4.*atan(1.)
412  pi2=pi*pi
413  sqpi=(pi/2.)**(3./2.)
414  pwtpi=(2.*pi)**(3./2.)
415  sqpi2=sqrt(pi/2.)
416  sq2pi=sqrt(2.*pi)
417 ! initialize the number of charge states to 1
418  ncstat=1
419 ! initialize the # of zones (see ZONES card) to zero
420  izrot=.false.
421  ofeldf=''
422  ofelds=''
423  icour=0
424 ! initialize trace3d related stuff
425 ! frequency indicator
426  fid=1.
427  t3d=.false.
428  xiset=.false.
429  kt3h=1
430  trace3h(kt3h)=' $DATA'
431  kt3t=0
432 ! DONE:
433 ! DATA KLE/'GEBEAM','INPUT','RDBEAM','ETAC','DRIFT',
434 ! 1* 'QUADRUPO', , ,'SOLENO', ,
435 ! 2* 'BMAGNET', ,'CAVSC' ,'FIELD' , ,
436 ! 3* 'BUNCHER', ,'NEWF' , ,'SCDYNAC',
437 ! 11* ,'CAVNUM', , ,
438 ! TO LOOK AT:
439 ! DATA KLE/ , ,
440 ! 1* ,'SEXTUPO','QUADSXT', ,'SOQUAD',
441 ! 2* , , , , 'HARM' ,
442 ! 3* ,'RFQCL', ,'NREF', ,
443 ! 4* 'SCDYNEL','SCPOS','TILT','TILZ','CHANGREF',
444 ! 5* 'TOF','REJECT','ZROT','ALINER',
445 ! 7* 'RWFIELD','RANDALI','TWQA','EMIPRT',
446 ! 8* 'MMODE','RFQPTQ', ,'STEER',
447 ! 9* , , ,'FDRIFT','FSOLE',
448 ! 10* 'REFCOG','FPART', ,
449 ! 11* 'QUAFK', , , ,'RFKICK'
450 !
451 ! IGNORE: 'ZONES','STOP','T3D','DCBEAM','FIRORD','COMMENT'
452 ! 'EMIT','EMITGR','WRBEAM','ENVEL','REJECT','CHASE'
453 ! 'ACCEPT','EMITL','EGUN','COMPRES','RASYN','SECORD'
454 ! 'STRIPPER','EDFLEC','PROFGR','QUAELEC','CAVMC'
455  fracc=.false.
456  rfqiflg=0
457  acpt=.false.
458  irfqp=.false.
459  inisk=0
460  ttvols=0.
461  iprf=1
462  ncell=0
463  nzone=0
464 ! eflvl=0.
465 ! rflvl=0.
466  bflvl=0.
467  nbemit=0
468  iell=0
469  imcs=0
470  ifw=1
471  wdisp=1000.
472  wphas=400.*pi
473  wx=100.
474  wy=100.
475  rlim=140.
476  nrtre=0
477  do i=1,3000
478  prlab(i)=" "
479  enddo
480  do i=1,6
481  centre(i)=0.
482  enddo
483  do i=1,maxcell1
484  davprt(i)=""
485  enddo
486  DO i=1,iptsz
487  ichas(i)=1
488  ichxyz(i)=1
489  ENDDO
490  shift=.false.
491  ichaes=.false.
492  iseor=.false.
493  iraysh=.false.
494  icont=iptsz+5
495  iprin=1
496  nrres=0
497  ndtl=0
498  ncavnm=0
499  ncavmc=0
500  nrbunc=0
501  dtiph=0.
502  icont=150000
503  intgct=0
504  itye=1000
505  ierpf=0
506  ialin=.false.
507  itwist=.false.
508  ichsp=.false.
509  iesp=.false.
510  itvol=.false.
511  imamin=.false.
512  chasit=.false.
513  ifield=.false.
514  iemgrw=.false.
515  idav=0
516  davtot=0.
517  iapel=1
518  iaqu=1
519  xpsc=.5
520  fractx=1.
521  fracty=1.
522  fractl=1.
523  iscsp=0
524  ifile=11
525  imax=0
526 ! default for beams is to be bunched (not continuous)
527  ifcont=.false.
528 ! *******************************************************
529  WRITE(6,3101)
530  WRITE(16,3101)
531  WRITE(12,3101)
532 3101 FORMAT('****** DYNAC V6R16, 15-Sep-2016 *******')
533  write(16,*) 'Input file: ',infiln
534  write(12,*) 'Input file: ',infiln
535  text=' '
536  call mytime(iitime)
537  if (mg) then
538 ! using old MINGW style gfortran format: 03/30/10 20:51:06 (10 is 2010)
539  text(1:4)=' '
540  if(iitime(1:2).eq.'01')text(5:7)='Jan'
541  if(iitime(1:2).eq.'02')text(5:7)='Feb'
542  if(iitime(1:2).eq.'03')text(5:7)='Mar'
543  if(iitime(1:2).eq.'04')text(5:7)='Apr'
544  if(iitime(1:2).eq.'05')text(5:7)='May'
545  if(iitime(1:2).eq.'06')text(5:7)='Jun'
546  if(iitime(1:2).eq.'07')text(5:7)='Jul'
547  if(iitime(1:2).eq.'08')text(5:7)='Aug'
548  if(iitime(1:2).eq.'09')text(5:7)='Sep'
549  if(iitime(1:2).eq.'10')text(5:7)='Oct'
550  if(iitime(1:2).eq.'11')text(5:7)='Nov'
551  if(iitime(1:2).eq.'12')text(5:7)='Dec'
552  text(8:8)=' '
553  text(9:10)=iitime(4:5)
554  text(11:13)=' 20'
555  text(14:15)=iitime(7:8)
556  text(16:19)=' at '
557  text(20:27)=iitime(10:17)
558  else
559 ! standard gfortran format: Tue Mar 30 20:51:06 2010
560  text(1:11)=iitime(1:11)
561  text(12:15)=iitime(21:24)
562  text(16:19)=' at '
563  text(20:27)=iitime(12:19)
564  endif
565  write(6,789) text(1:27)
566 789 format('Started on ',a27)
567  write(16,*) 'Started on ',text(1:27)
568  write(12,*) 'Started on ',text(1:27)
569  call cpu_time(exstrt)
570 ! Read title
571  READ (in,3333) titre(1:80)
572  WRITE(16,3334) titre(1:80)
573  WRITE(12,3334) titre(1:80)
574 3333 FORMAT(a80)
575 3334 FORMAT(1x,a80)
576 ! Read the input file and check for valid cards
577  DO
578  cfound=.false.
579  READ (in,3333) cmnt(1:80)
580  if (cmnt(1:1).eq.';') then
581  write(16,3334) cmnt(1:80)
582  cycle
583  else
584  kley=cmnt(1:8)
585  endif
586  DO i=1,ncards
587  IF(kley.EQ.kle(i)) THEN
588  cfound=.true.
589  exit
590  ENDIF
591  ENDDO
592  IF(cfound) then
593 !*********************************************************************
594 ! GEBEAM 1 | INPUT 2 | RDBEAM 3 | ETAC 4 | DRIFT 5
595 ! QUADRUPO 6 | SEXTUPO 7 | QUADSXT 8 | SOLENO 9 | SOQUAD 10
596 ! BMAGNET 11 | CAVMC 12 | CAVSC 13 | FIELD 14 | HARM 15
597 ! BUNCHER 16 | RFQCL 17 | NEWF 18 | NREF 19 | SCDYNAC 20
598 ! SCDYNEL 21 | SCPOS 22 | TILT 23 | TILZ 24 | CHANGREF 25
599 ! TOF 26 | REJECT 27 | ZROT 28 | ALINER 29 | ACCEPT 30
600 ! EMIT 31 | EMITGR 32 | COMMENT 33 | WRBEAM 34 | ENVEL 35
601 ! CHASE 36 | RWFIELD 37 | RANDALI 38 | TWQA 39 | EMIPRT 40
602 ! MMODE 41 | RFQPTQ 42 | STRIPPER 43 | STEER 44 | ZONES 45
603 ! PROFGR 46 | SECORD 47 | RASYN 48 | FDRIFT 49 | FSOLE 50
604 ! EGUN 51 | COMPRES 52 | STOP 53 | REFCOG 54 | FPART 55
605 ! QUAELEC 56 | QUAFK 57 | CAVNUM 58 | EDFLEC 59 | EMITL 60
606 ! RFKICK 61 | FIRORD 62 | DCBEAM 63 | T3D 64 |
607 !*********************************************************************
608  IF(i.eq.1) then
609 ! AFTER GEBEAM:Generates randomly the input beam
610  write(16,*) ' TYPE CODE:GEBEAM********* '
611  CALL monte
612  write(16,*) '********************************'
613  ELSEIF(i.eq.2) then
614 ! AFTER INPUT: define the dynamics at input
615 ! --- INPUT must be preceded by GEBEAM
616 ! --- the reference (synchronous) particle is the c.o.g of the bunch
617 ! --- ENTRY:
618 ! ---- 1) uem, atm, qst
619 ! --- uem : unit of Rest mass in MeV
620 ! Examples:
621 ! proton:938.27231 MeV
622 ! H- :939.3145 MeV
623 ! mesons:33.9093 MeV
624 ! pions :139.5685 MeV
625 ! kaons :493.667 MeV
626 ! electrons : 0.511 MeV
627 ! --- atm : Atomic number
628 ! --- qst : charge (unit of charge) of the reference
629 !
630 ! ---- 2) enedep,tof
631 ! --- enedep: Kinetic energy of the reference
632 ! --- tofini: Time of flight of the reference at input (sec)
633  write(16,*) ' TYPE CODE:INPUT ********'
634  CALL entre
635  write(16,*) '********************************'
636  ELSEIF(i.eq.3) then
637 ! AFTER RDBEAM: Read the input beam in the disk
638  write(16,*) 'TYPE CODE:RDBEAM **********'
639 ! --- ENTRY
640 ! ---- 1) filen : filename of file containing the particle distribution
641 ! ---- 2) iflag : flag type of distribution file
642 ! --- iflag = 0 particle coordinates x,xp,y,yp,z,zp with z in rad
643 ! --- iflag = 1 particle coordinates x,xp,y,yp,z,zp,q,m0 with z in rad
644 ! --- iflag = 2 particle coordinates x,xp,y,yp,z,zp,q with z in rad
645 ! --- iflag = 10 particle coordinates x,xp,y,yp,z,zp with z in ns
646 ! --- iflag = 11 particle coordinates x,xp,y,yp,z,zp,q,m0 with z in ns
647 ! --- iflag = 12 particle coordinates x,xp,y,yp,z,zp,q with z in ns
648 ! --- add 100 to the above iflg values to read a file that has Wref as
649 ! --- 4th parameter on line 1
650 ! ---- 3) freq, tof
651 ! --- freq: RF frquency (MHz)
652 ! --- tof: phase offset to be applied to the beam (deg)
653 !
654 ! ---- 4) uem, atm, qst
655 ! like ENTRY in type code INPUT
656 !
657  myfile=''
658  READ(in,'(a)') myfile
659  lfile=len_trim(myfile)
660  myfile(lpath+1:lpath+lfile)=myfile(1:lfile)
661  myfile(1:lpath)=dpath(1:lpath)
662  myfile=trim(myfile)
663  write(16,*) 'Distribution file: ',myfile
664  open(55,file=myfile,status='unknown')
665  CALL adjrfq
666  write(16,*) '********************************'
667  ELSEIF(i.eq.4) then
668 ! AFTER ETAC :possibility of a multiple charge state beam
669  write(16,*) 'TYPE CODE:ETAC **********'
670  kt3h=kt3h+1
671  trace3h(kt3h)='ERROR: ETAC not supported'
672  CALL etac
673  write(16,*) '********************************'
674 ! AFTER DRIFT : dl:drift length (cm),if dl is negatif no space charge effect
675  ELSEIF(i.eq.5) then
676  write(16,*) 'TYPE CODE:DRIFT **********'
677  READ(in,*)dl
678  kt3t=kt3t+1
679  write(tif,6001) kt3t,kt3t,10.*dl
680 6001 format(' nt(',i4,')= 1, a(1,',i4,')=',f12.6)
681  trace3t(kt3t)=tif
682  CALL drift(dl)
683  write(16,*) '********************************'
684  ELSEIF(i.eq.6) then
685 ! AFTER QUADRUPO: quadrupole
686 ! BQUAD: field at pole tip (kG)
687 ! XLQUA: EFFECTIVE LENGHT (cm )
688 ! RG: APERTURE RADIUS (cm)
689  write(16,*) 'TYPE CODE:QUADRUPO**********'
690  READ(in,*)xlqua,bquad,rg
691  kt3t=kt3t+1
692  write(tif,6002) kt3t,kt3t,10.*bquad/rg,xlqua*10.
693 6002 format(' nt(',i4,')= 3, a(1,',i4,')= ',f9.5,' , ',f9.5)
694  trace3t(kt3t)=tif
695  call qalva(bquad,xlqua,rg)
696  write(16,*) '********************************'
697  ELSEIF(i.eq.7) then
698 ! AFTER SEXTUPO: sextupole
699 ! IMK2: IFLAG (see arg)
700 ! ARG = KS2 (cm-3) if IMK2 = 0, otherwise ARG = BSEX (kG)
701 ! XLSEX : EFFECTIVE LENGHT (CM )
702 ! RG :APERTURE RADIUS (CM)
703  write(16,*) 'TYPE CODE:SEXTUPO**********'
704  READ(in,*)imk2,arg,xlsex,rg
705  call sextu(imk2,arg,xlsex,rg)
706  write(16,*) '********************************'
707  ELSEIF(i.eq.8) then
708 ! AFTER QUADSXT:
709 ! quadrupole associated with sextupole
710 ! IKSQ: IFLAG (see ARGS and ARGQ)
711 ! ARGS: strength of SEXTUPOLE
712 ! IKSQ = 0, then ARGS = KS2 (cm-3), otherwise ARGS = FIELD BS(kG)
713 ! ARGQ: strength of QUADRUPOLE
714 ! If IKSQ = 0, then ARGQ = K2 (cm-2), otherwise ARGQ = FIELD BQ(kG)
715 ! XLQUA : EFFECTIVE LENGHT OF THE LENS(cm)
716 ! RG : APERTURE RADIUS OF THE LENS (cm)
717  write(16,*) 'TYPE CODE:QUADSXT**********'
718  READ(in,*)iksq,args,argq,xlqua,rg
719  call qasex(iksq,args,argq,xlqua,rg)
720  write(16,*) '********************************'
721  ELSEIF(i.eq.9) then
722 ! AFTER SOLENO: solenoid
723 ! IMKS: IFLAG (see ARG)
724 ! ARG: IMKS = 0 then ARG is the strength K (cm-1), otherwise ARG is the field B (kG)
725 ! XLSOL : EFFECTIVE LENGHT (CM )
726  write(16,*) 'TYPE CODE SOLENO**********'
727  READ(in,*)imks,xlsol,arg
728  call solnoid(imks,arg,xlsol)
729  write(16,*) '********************************'
730  ELSEIF(i.eq.10) then
731 ! AFTER SOQUAD: solenoid associated with quadrupole
732 ! --IKSQ: IFLAG
733 ! --ARGS: STRENGTH or FIELD OF SOLENOID
734 ! If IKSQ = 0 then ARGS = K (cm-1), otherwise ARGS = B(kG)
735 ! --ARGQ: STRENGTH or FIELD of QUADRUPOLE
736 ! If IKSQ = 0 then ARGQ = K2 (cm-2), otherwise ARGQ = B(kG)
737 ! SIGN CONVENTIONS:
738 ! SOLENOID: K positive => rotate the transverse coordinates about the
739 ! z-axis in the clockwise direction.
740 ! QUADRUPOLE: K2 positive => focusing in the H plane (x,z)
741 ! --XLSOL : EFFECTIVE LENGHT OF THE LENS(cm)
742 ! --RG : APERTURE RADIUS OF THE LENS (cm)
743  write(16,*) 'TYPE CODE:SOQUAD**********'
744  READ(in,*) iksq,args,argq,xlsol,rg
745  call solquad(iksq,args,argq,xlsol,rg)
746  write(16,*) '********************************'
747  ELSEIF(i.eq.11) then
748 ! AFTER BMAGNET (sign conventions as in the code TRANSPORT)
749 ! NSECTOR: number of sectors dividing the bending magnet
750 ! WEDGE BENDING MAGNET
751 ! ANGL : DEG bend angle of the central trajectory
752 ! RMO : CM radius of curvature of the central trajectory
753 ! BAIM : KG field of the bending magnet
754 ! BAIM = 0 the field is computed from the momentum of the reference
755 ! otherwise the momentum is computed from the field
756 ! XN : FIELD GRADIENT (dimensionless,TRANSPORT: n)
757 ! XB : NORMALIZED SECOND DERIVATIVE OF B (TRANSPORT : beta)
758 ! AP(1) = AP(2) CM vertical half aperture (only if IPOLE = 0)
759 ! ENTRANCE FACE
760 ! PENT1 EK1 EK2 RAB1
761 ! PENT1: DEG angle of pole face rotation (deg)
762 ! RAB1 : CM radius of curvature
763 ! EK1 : integral related to the extent of the fringing field (TRANSPORT K1)
764 ! EK2 : integral related to the extent of the fringing field (TRANSPORT K2)
765 ! AP(1) : CM vertical half aperture
766 ! EXIT FACE
767 ! PENT2 SK1 SK2 RAB2
768 ! PENT2: DEG angle of pole face rotation
769 ! RAB2 : CM radius of curvature
770 ! SK1 : integral related to the extent of the fringing field
771 ! SK2 : integral related to the extent of the fringing field
772 ! AP(2) : CM vertical half aperture
773 !
774 ! SPACE CHARGE COMPUTATION is automatically provided in the routine
775 ! CAUTION: with several states charges in the beam, ONLY THE SCHEFF METHOD MUST BE USED in the bending magnet
776 ! --------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
777 ! nsprint: allow plotting the beam after the sector number nsprint in file 13 ('emlg.data')
778 !cc read(in,*) nsector,nsprint
779  read(in,*) nsector
780  READ(in,*)angl,rmo,baim,xn,xb
781  READ(in,*)pent1,rab1,ek1,ek2,apb(1)
782 ! if apb(1) ne 0 and if ek1 = 0 the program inserts a default value of ek1 = 0.5
783  if(apb(1).ne.0..and.ek1.lt.0.) ek1=0.5
784  READ(in,*)pent2,rab2,sk1,sk2,apb(2)
785 ! if apb(2) ne 0 and sk1 = 0 the program inserts a default value of sk1 = 0.5
786  if(apb(2).ne.0..and.sk1.lt.0.) sk1=0.5
787 ! trace3d
788 ! edge
789  kt3t=kt3t+1
790  write(tif,6005) kt3t,kt3t,pent1,10.*abs(rmo),
791  * 20.*apb(1),ek1,ek2
792 6005 format(' nt(',i4,')= 9, a(1,',i4,')=',f9.5,' , ',f9.2,
793  * ' , ',f9.2,' , ',f9.2,' , ',f9.2)
794  trace3t(kt3t)=tif
795 ! bend
796  kt3t=kt3t+1
797  write(tif,6006) kt3t,kt3t,angl,10.*abs(rmo)
798 6006 format(' nt(',i4,')= 8, a(1,',i4,')=',f9.5,' , ',f9.2,
799  * ' , 0 , 0 ')
800  trace3t(kt3t)=tif
801 ! edge
802  kt3t=kt3t+1
803  write(tif,6005) kt3t,kt3t,pent2,10.*abs(rmo),
804  * 20.*apb(2),sk1,sk2
805  trace3t(kt3t)=tif
806 !
807 !
808  CALL aimalv(angl,rmo,baim,xn,xb,ek1,ek2,pent1,rab1,
809  * sk1,sk2,pent2,rab2)
810  write(16,*) '********************************'
811  ELSEIF(i.eq.12) then
812 ! AFTER CAVMC: Multicell accelerating element
813 ! the electromagnetic field can be read:
814 ! in the file 'field.txt' in the form (z,E(z))
815 ! or from the type code: HARM in the form of a Fourier series expansion
816  write(16,*) 'TYPE CODE:CAVMC **********'
817  CALL restay
818  write(16,*) '********************************'
819  ELSEIF(i.eq.13) then
820 ! AFTER CAVSC: single cell accelerating element
821 ! The transit time factors describe the eletromagnetic field
822  write(16,*) 'TYPE CODE:CAVSC **********'
823  CALL etgap
824  write(16,*) '********************************'
825  ELSEIF(i.eq.14) then
826 ! AFTER FIELD
827 ! --- the axial field of the cavity is read from file in the form (z,E(z)) with a step size h in z
828 ! in the SUPERFISH format: z(m) E(z) (V/m)
829 ! PART: the step size h may be divided in 'part' elements (with PART (= >) 1)
830 ! ATT: the field E(z) is multiplied by ATT and converted in MV/cm
831 !
832  write(16,*) 'TYPE CODE: FIELD **********'
833  write(16,*) 'ELECTRIC FIELD (z, E(z) ) '
834 ! get filename of input file of the electromagnetic field in the form (z,E(z))
835  myfile=''
836  READ(in,'(a)') myfile
837 ! check if file is already open
838  iostats = int(ftell(20))
839  if(iostats.eq.-1) then
840 ! file not yet open
841  lfile=len_trim(myfile)
842  myfile(lpath+1:lpath+lfile)=myfile(1:lfile)
843  myfile(1:lpath)=dpath(1:lpath)
844  myfile=trim(myfile)
845  open(20,file=myfile,status='unknown')
846  write(16,*) 'Opening field file: ',myfile
847  ofeldf=myfile
848  else
849  if(ofeldf.ne.myfile) then
850  write(16,*) 'Closing field file: ',ofeldf
851  write(16,*) 'Opening field file: ',myfile
852  close(20)
853  lfile=len_trim(myfile)
854  myfile(lpath+1:lpath+lfile)=myfile(1:lfile)
855  myfile(1:lpath)=dpath(1:lpath)
856  myfile=trim(myfile)
857  open(20,file=myfile,status='unknown')
858  ofeldf=myfile
859  endif
860  endif
861  read(in,*) att
862 !omment write(16,*) ' partition of a step h: ',part,' field factor: ', att
863 ! conversion V/m (SUPERFISH) --> MV/cm
864  att=1.e-08*att
865  write(16,*) ' * Read the cavity field from ',myfile(1:80)
866  call fieldcav(att)
867  write(16,*) '********************************'
868  ELSEIF(i.eq.15) then
869 ! AFTER HARM: the field is read on the form of a Fourier series expansion
870  write(16,*) ' TYPE CODE: HARM **********'
871  write(16,*) 'ELECTRIC FIELD (Fourier series expansion)'
872  call rharm
873  write(16,*) '********************************'
874  ELSEIF(i.eq.16) then
875 ! After BUNCHER: buncher as a single element
876 ! PV: Voltage
877 ! PDP: PHASE OF RF (deg)
878 ! PRLIM: aperture radius (cm)
879 ! PHARM: harmonic factor (bucher fq.)/(DTL freq.)
880  write(16,*) 'TYPE CODE:BUNCHER ************************'
881  READ(in,*) pv,pdp,pharm,prlim
882  write(16,7777) pv,pdp,prlim
883 7777 format(' BUNCHER CAVITY ',/,' Voltage ',e12.5,' MV',/,
884  x ' RF Phase ',e12.5,' deg',' Aperture Radius ',e12.5,' cm')
885  kt3t=kt3t+1
886  write(tif,6007) kt3t,kt3t,pv,pdp,pharm
887 6007 format(' nt(',i4,')=10, a(1,',i4,')=',f9.5,' , ',f9.2,
888  & ' , 1 , 1 , ',f5.1)
889  trace3t(kt3t)=tif
890  pdp=pdp*pi/180.
891  call bunparm(pv,pdp,pharm,prlim)
892  write(16,*) '********************************'
893  ELSEIF(i.eq.17) then
894 ! AFTER RFQCL (single cell of a RFQ)
895  write(16,*) 'TYPE CODE:RFQCL DEPRECATED *************'
896  write(16,*) 'Use RFQPTQ instead *************'
897  write(6,*)
898  write(6,*) 'TYPE CODE:RFQCL DEPRECATED *************'
899  write(6,*) 'Use RFQPTQ instead *************'
900  stop
901  ELSEIF(i.eq.18) then
902 ! AFTER NEWF:define a new frequency (Hertz)
903  IF (imax.EQ.0) THEN
904  WRITE(16,*)' NEWF HAS TO BE PRECEEDED BY GEBEAM',
905  * ' OR RDBEAM'
906  stop
907  ENDIF
908  write(16,*) 'TYPE CODE:NEWF ************************'
909  READ (in,*) fh1
910 ! record frequency change in view of trace3d file
911  fh1=2.*pi*fh1
912  fid=fh1/fh
913 ! adjust beam current
914  beamc=beamc*fh1/fh
915 ! rflvl=rflvl*fh1/fh
916  fh=fh1
917  WRITE(16,*)' NEW FREQUENCY : ',fh/(2.*pi),' Hertz'
918  ELSEIF(i.eq.19) then
919 ! AFTER NREF: define a new syncronous particle
920 ! ---- DEPHAS: the change of phase (DEG)
921 ! ---- DEW : the change of kinetic energy (see IREFW)
922 ! ---- follow two falgs, IREF and IREFW
923 ! ---- IF IREF=0: RELATIVE TO the previous synchronous particle
924 ! ---- IF IREF=1: RELATIVE TO the previous COG
925 ! ---- IF IREFW=0: DEWREF is in dW/W
926 ! ---- IF IREFW=1: DEWREF is in dW (MeV)
927  write(16,*) ' TYPE CODE:NREF ***********'
928  read (in,*) dephas,dewref,iref,irefw
929  CALL refer
930  write(16,*) '********************************'
931  ELSEIF(i.eq.20) then
932 ! AFTER SCDYNAC
933 ! ISCSP: METHOD FOR SPACE CHARGE COMPUTATIONS
934 ! ISCSP=1 HERSC METHOD
935 ! ISCSP=2 SCHERM METHOD
936 ! ISCSP=3 SCHEFF METHOD
937  write(16,*) ' TYPE CODE:SCDYNAC ***********'
938  read(in,*) iscsp
939 ! sce10 =1 : call in quads,solenoids,accelarating elements
940 ! sce10 =2 : call in drifts,accelarating elements
941 ! sce10 =3 : call in quads,solenoids,drifts,accelarating elements
942 ! BEAM CURRENT IN ma
943  READ(in,*) beamc,sce10
944  beame=beamc
945  if(.not.xiset) then
946  kt3h=kt3h+1
947  write(tif,7001) beamc
948 7001 format(' XI= ',f9.4)
949  trace3h(kt3h)=tif
950  xiset=.true.
951  endif
952  if(iscsp.le.1) write(16,*) 'HERSC method '
953  if(iscsp.eq.2) write(16,*) 'SCHERM method '
954  if(iscsp.eq.3) write(16,*) 'SCHEFF method '
955  if(iscsp.gt.3) then
956  write(16,*) 'Error in SCDYNAC iscsp: ',iscsp
957  stop
958  endif
959  WRITE(16,*)' Beam current : ',beamc,' mA'
960  ect=4.
961  ichaes=.true.
962  if(iscsp.le.1) then
963 ! initialise the routine HERSC
964  if(iscsp.eq.1)ini=0
965  if(iscsp.lt.1)ini=-1
966  call hersc(ini)
967  iscsp=1
968  endif
969 !--- SCHERM, read third line as dummy
970  if(iscsp.eq.2) read(in,*) idum
971 ! --- SCHEFF
972 ! initialise the mesh of routine SCHEFF
973  if(iscsp.eq.3) then
974  call schfdyn
975  endif
976  if (beamc.eq.0.) ichaes=.false.
977  write(16,*) '****************************'
978  ELSEIF(i.eq.21) then
979 ! AFTER SCDYNEL: space charge computations in the current position (i.e.bending magnet)
980 ! XTRANS is the acting lenght of the beam self-fields (cm)
981  write(16,*) ' TYPE CODE:SCDYNEL ****'
982  READ(in,*) xtrans
983  CALL cesp(xtrans)
984  write(16,*) '****************************'
985  ELSEIF(i.eq.22) then
986 ! AFTER SCPOS : change the position of space charge computation in gaps or cavities
987  write(16,*) ' TYPE CODE:SCPOS(space charge position)****'
988  read(in,*) xpsc
989  if(xpsc.ge.1.)xpsc=.5
990  write(16,*) '****************************'
991  ELSEIF(i.eq.23) then
992 ! AFTER TILT:rotation and shift of beam ellipsoid
993 ! ICG : = 1 => REFERENCE PARTICLE IS THE C.O.G. OF THE BEAM
994 ! ICG : = 0 => IT IS DISTINCT FROM THE C.O.G.
995  write(16,*) ' TYPE CODE:TILT *********************'
996  READ(in,*)icg
997  READ(in,*)tipha,tix,tiy,shifw,shifp
998  CALL tiltbm(icg)
999  write(16,*) '****************************'
1000  ELSEIF(i.eq.24) then
1001 ! AFTER TILZ: tilt in the plane (x,z) around the c.o.g. of the upright ellipse
1002  write(16,*) ' TYPE CODE:TILZ *********************'
1003  READ(in,*) tilta
1004  call tiltz(tilta)
1005  write(16,*) '****************************'
1006  ELSEIF(i.eq.25) then
1007 ! AFTER CHANGREF: change of reference frame
1008  write(16,*) ' TYPE CODE:CHANGREF *********************'
1009  CALL chrefe
1010  ELSEIF(i.eq.26) then
1011 ! After TOF:
1012 ! --- the T.O.F may be activated in the dynamics of bunchers, cavities and acc. gaps
1013 ! --- Entry: indic and icor
1014 ! --- indic = 0 : the T.O.F is activated, otherwise it is passive
1015 ! --- icor = 0 : no adjustement on the phase offset, otherwise adjustments are automatically made on the phase offset
1016  write(16,*) ' TYPE CODE: TOF ************'
1017  CALL rmami
1018  write(16,*) '****************************'
1019  ELSEIF(i.eq.27) then
1020 ! AFTER REJECT: defining limits in X,X',Y,Y',Z,Z'
1021 ! ---- aperture of the Beam
1022 ! ---- WDISP: in half dispersion
1023 ! ------ IF IFW=0 ==> WDISP in (+-) dW/W
1024 ! ------ IF IFW=1 ==> WDISP in (+-) dW (MeV)
1025 ! ------ IF IFW=10 ==> wdisp = dW/W relative to REF
1026 ! ------ IF IFW=11 ==> wdisp = dW relative to REF
1027 ! ---- WPHAS: in half phase (+-) deg
1028 ! ---- WX : in x-direction (+-) cm
1029 ! ---- WY : in y-direction (+-) cm
1030 ! ---- RLIM : in radius (cm)
1031  write(16,*) ' TYPE CODE:REJECT*********************'
1032  READ(in,*) ifw,wdisp,wphas,wx,wy,rlim
1033  if(ifw.eq.0) then
1034  WRITE(16,1050)wdisp,wphas,wx,wy,rlim
1035  else
1036  WRITE(16,1051)wdisp,wphas,wx,wy,rlim
1037  endif
1038 1050 FORMAT(5x,' *** BEAM SIZE LIMITS ',/,
1039  x 4x,' 1/2 dW/W :',e12.5,' 1/2 PHASE(DEG) :'
1040  x ,e12.5,/,4x,' 1/2 x (cm) :',e12.5,
1041  x ' 1/2 y(cm) :',e12.5,
1042  x ' RADIUS (cm) :',e12.5)
1043 1051 FORMAT(5x,' *** BEAM SIZE LIMITS ',/,
1044  x 4x,'1/2 dW (MeV) :',e12.5,' 1/2 PHASE(DEG) :'
1045  x ,e12.5,/,4x,' 1/2 x (cm) :',e12.5,
1046  x ' 1/2 y(cm) :',e12.5,
1047  x ' RADIUS (cm) :',e12.5)
1048 ! ---- convert WPHAS in rad
1049  wphas=wphas*pi/180.
1050  write(16,*) '****************************'
1051  ELSEIF(i.eq.28) then
1052 ! AFTER ZROT : beam rotation
1053 ! The transverse coordinates x and y may be rotated through an
1054 ! angle ZROTA(deg).The positive sense of ratation is clockwise
1055 ! about the positive z axis
1056  write(16,*) ' TYPE CODE:ZROT*********************'
1057  READ(in,*)zrota
1058  CALL zrotat(zrota)
1059  write(16,*) '****************************'
1060  ELSEIF(i.eq.29) then
1061 ! after ALINER: ALIGNMENT errors IN X,X',Y,Y'
1062 ! XL,YL (cm) XPL,YPL (mrad)
1063  write(16,*) ' TYPE CODE:ALINER*********************'
1064  read(in,*) xl,yl,xpl,ypl
1065  CALL aliner
1066  write(16,*) '****************************'
1067  ELSEIF(i.eq.30) then
1068 ! AFTER ACCEPT: Determination of the input acceptance for the structure
1069  write(16,*) ' TYPE CODE:ACCEPT*********************'
1070  acpt=.true.
1071  CALL accept
1072  acpt=.false.
1073  write(16,*) '****************************'
1074  ELSEIF(i.eq.31) then
1075 ! AFTER EMIT Print emittance data in the file 'dynac.short'
1076  CALL emiprt(0)
1077  ELSEIF(i.eq.32) then
1078 ! AFTER EMITGR: emittance plots
1079 ! PLOTS IN XX', YY', XY AND ZZ'
1080  write(16,*) ' TYPE CODE:EMITGR*********************'
1081  igrprm=0
1082  call ytzp
1083  write(16,*) '****************************'
1084  ELSEIF(i.eq.33) then
1085 ! AFTER COMMENT
1086 ! allows for comments in the input data file
1087  write(16,'(a8)') kley
1088  READ (in,'(A)') cmnt(1:80)
1089  WRITE(16,'(A)') cmnt(1:80)
1090  ELSEIF(i.eq.34) then
1091 ! AFTER WRBEAM: prints coordinates of particles on output files
1092  write(16,*)'WRBEAM output coordinates of particles'
1093 ! irec:flag irec=0 the phase is recentered with regard to the c.o.g
1094 ! irec<>0 the phase is not recentered around the c.o.g
1095  read(in,'(A)') wfile
1096  write(16,'(A)') ' Distribution will be written to ',wfile
1097  read(in,'(A)') text
1098  read(text,*) irec,iflg
1099  if(iflg.ge.0) then
1100  fromrfq=.false.
1101  call prbeam(iflg,wfile,fromrfq)
1102  else
1103 ! write beam to file after RFQ cells
1104  read(text,*) irec,iflg,rfqiflg
1105  if(rfqiflg.lt.0) then
1106 ! output for more than one individual cell
1107  nrwc=-rfqiflg
1108  read(text,*) irec,iflg,rfqiflg,(iwcl(i),i=1,nrwc)
1109  write(16,'(A)') ' Do this after RFQ cell(s):'
1110  write(16,*) (iwcl(i),i=1,nrwc)
1111  else
1112 ! output for one cell or all cells
1113  write(16,'(A)')' Do this after one or all RFQ cell(s)'
1114  endif
1115  iflgr=-iflg
1116  rfqwfil=wfile
1117  rfqirec=irec
1118  endif
1119  write(16,*) '****************************'
1120  ELSEIF(i.eq.35) then
1121 ! AFTER ENVEL: plot the longitudinal and the tranverse envelope of the beam
1122  write(16,*) ' ENVEL *********************'
1123  CALL profil
1124  write(16,*) '****************************'
1125  ELSEIF(i.eq.36) then
1126 ! AFTER CHASE:Temporary elimination of most distant particles for statistical purposes
1127  write(16,*) ' TYPE CODE:CHASE ********************'
1128  CALL chase
1129  write(16,*) '****************************'
1130  ELSEIF(i.eq.37) then
1131 ! AFTER RWFIELD : rewinds the file 'field.txt'
1132  rewind(20)
1133  ELSEIF(i.eq.38) then
1134 ! AFTER RANDALI : generates random errors in alignments
1135 ! XL,YL (cm) XPL,YPL (mrad)
1136 ! ilier = 0 stop the effects of the random misalignment
1137  write(16,*) ' TYPE CODE:RANDALI*********************'
1138  read(in,*) ilier
1139  if(ilier.eq.0) then
1140  ialin=.false.
1141  write(16,*) '****************************'
1142  else
1143  ialin=.true.
1144  read(in,*) xl,yl,xpl,ypl
1145  endif
1146  write(16,*) '****************************'
1147  ELSEIF(i.eq.39) then
1148 ! AFTER TWQA generates systematic or random twist of quadrupoles
1149 ! QTWIST: rotation about Y axis (deg)
1150 ! IQRAND: =0 systematic twist, otherwise random twist
1151  write(16,*) ' TYPE CODE TWQA*********************'
1152  read(in,*) iqrand,qtwist
1153  itwist=.true.
1154  if(abs(qtwist).le.1.e-20) itwist=.false.
1155  write(16,*) '****************************'
1156  ELSEIF(i.eq.40) then
1157 ! AFTER EMIPRT : print the beam characteristics to disk (unit 12, file='dynac.short')
1158 ! --- the beam characteristics are systematically printed after:
1159 ! cavities, accelerating gaps, bunchers, electrons gun, rfq
1160 !
1161 ! IEMQESG : =0 stop the prints for all optical lenses
1162 ! =1 after all optical lenses apart from positive drifts
1163 ! =2 after all optical lenses and positive drifts
1164 ! =3 after quads, solen.,positive drifts and accel. elements
1165  iemgrw=.true.
1166  read(in,*) iemqesg
1167  if(iemqesg.eq.0) iemgrw=.false.
1168  ELSEIF(i.eq.41) then
1169 ! AFTER MMODE: systematic or random error on the phase offset and on the level of the field
1170 ! --- MMODE is only acting on particles in the bunch (no change of the reference)
1171 ! --- ENTRY: ierpf , vphase , vfield
1172 ! --- ierpf: flag
1173 ! --- IF: ierpf = 0 ===> stop the type code effects
1174 ! --- ierpf = 1 ===> systematic error
1175 ! --- ierpf > 1 ===> random error
1176 ! --- vphase (deg): error added to the nominal phase offset
1177 ! --- vfield (%) : error added to the level of the electric field
1178 ! --- (new phase offset) = (previous phase offset) + vphase
1179 ! --- (new level of field) = (previous level of field) * (1.+ vfield/100)
1180  write(16,*) ' TYPE CODE MMODE*********************'
1181  read(in,*) ierpf,vphase,vfield
1182  if(ierpf.eq.0) then
1183  vphase=0.
1184  vfield=0.
1185  endif
1186  if(ierpf.eq.1) write(16,4279) vphase,vfield
1187 4279 format(2x,'systematic error on phase offset: ',e12.2,
1188  * ' deg',/,2x,'systematic error on level of field: ',
1189  * e12.5,' %')
1190  if(ierpf.gt.1) write(16,4290) vphase,vfield
1191 4290 format(2x,'maximun randon error on phase offset: ',e12.2,
1192  * ' deg',/, 2x,'maximum random error on level of field: ',
1193  * e12.5,' %')
1194  vfield=vfield/100.
1195  write(16,*) '****************************'
1196  ELSEIF(i.eq.42) then
1197 ! --- AFTER RFQPTQ (RFQ per tutti quanti)
1198  write(16,*) 'TYPE CODE:RFQPTQ ************************'
1199  write(6,*)
1200 ! -- ENTRIES:
1201 ! --- ENTRY 1: input file 'myfile' contains the geometry of the RFQ (unit 27)
1202 ! --- ENTRY 2: nceltot
1203 ! nceltot: number of cells (may be less than the total number of cells)
1204 ! --- ENTRY 3: tvolt avolt fph
1205 ! ---- tvolt: factor applied to intervane-voltage Vref of the synchronous particle (in %)
1206 ! ---- avolt: factor applied to intervane-voltage Vpart for particles (in %)
1207 ! Vref = Vref(1 + tvolt/100)
1208 ! Vpart = Vpart(1 + avolt/100)
1209 ! --- fph: factor applied to the phase at entrance of cells in the file myfile in %)
1210 ! (phase at entrance of cells)= (1 + fph/100) X (phase in myfile)
1211 ! NOTE: fph is only available for cells of type = 0, type = 2 (type = E) or type = 5 (type R)
1212 ! --- pib > 0: shift the particles at the entrance of the RFQ inside (+/-) pi w.r.t.the synchronous particle
1213 ! --- pib = 0: no action
1214 !
1215 !
1216 ! related files:
1217 !
1218 ! 'rfq_list.data' : list of parameters of the RFQ
1219 !
1220 ! 'rfq_coeflist.data' list of coefficients
1221  myfile=''
1222  READ(in,'(A)') myfile
1223  lfile=len_trim(myfile)
1224  myfile(lpath+1:lpath+lfile)=myfile(1:lfile)
1225  myfile(1:lpath)=dpath(1:lpath)
1226  myfile=trim(myfile)
1227  write(16,*) 'RFQ input data file: ',myfile
1228  open(27,file=myfile,status='unknown')
1229  myfile='rfq_list.data'
1230  lfile=len_trim(myfile)
1231  myfile(lpath+1:lpath+lfile)=myfile(1:lfile)
1232  myfile(1:lpath)=dpath(1:lpath)
1233  myfile=trim(myfile)
1234  open(70,file=myfile,status='unknown')
1235  myfile='rfq_coef.data'
1236  lfile=len_trim(myfile)
1237  myfile(lpath+1:lpath+lfile)=myfile(1:lfile)
1238  myfile(1:lpath)=dpath(1:lpath)
1239  myfile=trim(myfile)
1240  open(75,file=myfile,status='unknown')
1241 ! myfile='rfq_listmid.data'
1242 ! lfile=LEN_TRIM(myfile)
1243 ! myfile(lpath+1:lpath+lfile)=myfile(1:lfile)
1244 ! myfile(1:lpath)=dpath(1:lpath)
1245 ! myfile=TRIM(myfile)
1246 ! open(89,file=myfile,status='unknown')
1247  read(in,*) nceltot
1248  read(in,*) tvolt,avolt,fph,pib
1249  write(16,5279)nceltot,tvolt,avolt
1250 5279 format(' RFQ number of cells: ',i5,/,
1251  * ' factor on intervane voltage (reference):',e12.5,' %',
1252  * /,' factor on intervane voltage (bunch):',e12.5,' % ')
1253  tvolt=tvolt/100.
1254  avolt=avolt/100.
1255  fph=(1.+fph/100.)
1256  if(ichaes) then
1257  write(16,*)'***** beam current: ',beamc,' mA'
1258  if(iscsp.lt.3) then
1259  write(6,*)'*** HERSC and SCHERM cannot be used in',
1260  * 'the RFQ'
1261  write(16,*)'*** HERSC and SCHERM cannot be used in',
1262  * 'the RFQ'
1263  stop
1264  endif
1265  endif
1266  call cpardyn(pib)
1267  write(6,*)
1268  write(16,*) '****************************'
1269  ELSEIF(i.eq.43) then
1270 ! --- AFTER STRIPPER: stripper foils
1271 ! --- ( based on the works of D.A. Eastham, ref. )
1272 ! --- available for 'slow' hadron particles
1273 ! --- STRIPPER FOILS PARAMETERS:
1274 ! --- qs : charge (unit of charge)
1275 ! --- atms: atomic mass
1276 ! --- ths : thickness of the foils (g/cm**2)
1277 ! --- PARTICLES
1278 !*2010-12-02 Use Baron formula for charge state distribution in case of carbon foils
1279 ! --- anp : atomic number of the projectile
1280 ! --- nqst: number of charge states after the stripper
1281 ! --- sqst: array holding the nsqt charge states
1282 ! --- qop : charge of particles after crossing the stripper foils (unit of charge)
1283 ! --- the atomic mass of particles (atm) is the one given in INPUT or in RDBEAM
1284  write(16,*) 'TYPE CODE:STRIPPER ***********************'
1285  read(in,*)qs,atms,ths,anp
1286  call stripp
1287  write(16,*) '****************************'
1288  ELSEIF(i.eq.44) then
1289 ! AFTER STEER: thin steering element
1290 !---- PARAMETERS ARE INTEGRATED FIELD fld, nvf
1291 ! fld in units of (Tm) for magnetic steerer
1292 ! fld in units of (kV*m/m) for electrostatic steerer
1293 ! (Voltage * length / plate separation)
1294 ! if nvf=0, horizontal magnetic steerer
1295 ! if nvf=1, vertical magnetic steerer
1296 ! if nvf=2, horzontal electrostatic steerer
1297 ! if nvf=3, vertical electrostatic steerer
1298  write(16,*) ' TYPE CODE:STEER*********************'
1299  read(in,*) fld,nvf
1300  call steer(fld,nvf)
1301  write(16,*) '****************************'
1302 ! start of writes in file '.short' for steerer
1303  idav=idav+1
1304  iitem(idav)=9
1305  dav1(idav,1)=fld
1306  dav1(idav,2)=float(nvf)
1307  dav1(idav,3)=davtot*10.
1308 ! end daves
1309  ELSEIF(i.eq.45) then
1310 ! AFTER ZONES: specify zones of different colours in the bunch
1311  write(16,*) ' TYPE CODE:ZONES*********************'
1312  init=1
1313  call area(init)
1314  write(16,*) '****************************'
1315  ELSEIF(i.eq.46) then
1316 ! AFTER PROFGR: X-Z and Y-Z scatter plots,(X,Y,Z) and (Xp,Yp,Zp) profiles
1317  write(16,*) ' TYPE CODE:PROFGR*********************'
1318  igrprm=0
1319  if (igrprm.eq.0) then
1320 ! READ GRAPH TITLE
1321  READ(in,6620) text
1322 6620 FORMAT(a)
1323 ! idwdp=0 cog=ref in XZ,YZ plots (for instance for Alvarez structure)
1324 ! idwdp=1 cog<>ref in XZ,YZ plots (for instance for IH structrure)
1325 ! iskale=0 vertical scale on profile plots is NOT a log scale
1326 ! iskale=1 vertical scale on profile plots IS a log scale
1327  READ(in,*) idwdp,iskale
1328 ! READ GRAPH LIMITS INTO GLIM(J,K), J=GRAPH NUMBER
1329 ! K=1 HOR. LIMIT , K=2 VERT. LIMIT
1330  READ(in,*) glim(3,1),glim(3,2),glim(4,1),glim(4,2)
1331  endif
1332  call grcomp(text,iskale)
1333  write(16,*) '****************************'
1334  ELSEIF(i.eq.47) then
1335 ! AFTER SECORD : second order matrix for optical lenses
1336  write(16,*) '*****************************************'
1337  write(16,*) ' SECOND ORDER IN BEAM TRANSPORT**********'
1338  iseor=.true.
1339  write(16,*) '*****************************************'
1340  ELSEIF(i.eq.48) then
1341 ! AFTER RASYN : Radiation exitation in bending magnets (only for electrons)
1342  write(16,*) ' SYNCHRTRON RADIATION IN BENDING MAGNET****'
1343  iraysh=.true.
1344  write(16,*) '*******************************************'
1345  ELSEIF(i.eq.49) then
1346 ! AFTER FDRIFT : Divide a drift length in partial drifts (for space charge computations)
1347  write(16,*) ' TYPE CODE:FDRIFT*********************'
1348 ! XL : Total drift length (cm)
1349 ! NPART : number of partial drifts
1350 ! IMIT : if IMIT not equal zero,print emittance datas in the file 'short.txt'
1351  read(in,*) xl,npart,imit
1352  dl=xl/float(npart)
1353  write(16,*) ' total drift length : ',xl,
1354  * ' cm divided in : ',npart,' drifts of : ',dl,' cm'
1355  call fdrift(xl,npart,imit)
1356  write(16,*) '*******************************************'
1357  ELSEIF(i.eq.50) then
1358 !AFTER FSOLE: solenoid the magnetic field is read from disk in the form (z,B(z))
1359 ! unities: z (m), B(z) kG
1360 ! BCRET : coefficient multiplier, the magnetic is: B(z) * BCRET
1361 ! sign field convention like in the code TRANSPORT
1362  write(16,*) 'TYPE CODE FSOLE*****************'
1363  myfile=''
1364  READ(in,'(A)') myfile
1365 ! unit 25 corresponds to an input file giving solenoid magnetic field(s) in the form (z,B(z))
1366 ! check if file is already open
1367  iostats = int(ftell(25))
1368  if(iostats.eq.-1) then
1369 ! file not yet open
1370  lfile=len_trim(myfile)
1371  myfile(lpath+1:lpath+lfile)=myfile(1:lfile)
1372  myfile(1:lpath)=dpath(1:lpath)
1373  myfile=trim(myfile)
1374  open(25,file=myfile,status='unknown')
1375  write(16,*) 'Opening solenoid field file: ',
1376  * myfile
1377  ofelds=myfile
1378  else
1379  if(ofeldf.ne.myfile) then
1380  write(16,*) 'Closing solenoid field file: ',ofelds
1381  write(16,*) 'Opening solenoid field file: ',
1382  * myfile
1383  close(25)
1384  lfile=len_trim(myfile)
1385  myfile(lpath+1:lpath+lfile)=myfile(1:lfile)
1386  myfile(1:lpath)=dpath(1:lpath)
1387  myfile=trim(myfile)
1388  open(25,file=myfile,status='unknown')
1389  ofelds=myfile
1390  endif
1391  endif
1392  read(in,*)bcret,intgr
1393  write(16,990) intgr
1394 990 format('*** SOLENOID WITH ARBITRARY MAGNETIC FIELD ',/,
1395  * 5x,'PARTITION IN: ',i4,' ELEMENTARY SOLENOIDS')
1396  call solfield(bcret,intgr)
1397  write(16,*) '********************************'
1398  ELSEIF(i.eq.51) then
1399 ! AFTER EGUN:
1400 ! Only the SCHEFF routine is avalaible in the routine EGUN
1401 !omment ichaes=.false.
1402  write(16,*) 'TYPE CODE EGUN*****************'
1403 ! unit 22 corresponds to an input file giving egun field (z,E(z)) E(z) normalised
1404  myfile=''
1405  READ(in,'(A)') myfile
1406  lfile=len_trim(myfile)
1407  myfile(lpath+1:lpath+lfile)=myfile(1:lfile)
1408  myfile(1:lpath)=dpath(1:lpath)
1409  myfile=trim(myfile)
1410  write(16,*) 'Egun field file: ',myfile
1411  open(22,file=myfile,status='unknown')
1412 ! follows the particle ifpt (not active)
1413 ! not actived read(in,*)ifpt
1414 ! fmult: field factor
1415  read(in,*)fmult,indp
1416  if(.not.ichaes) indp=1
1417 ! indp: number of space charge computations to be made in the EGUN
1418 ! indp = 1 : 8 space charge computations. The EGUN field is divided in 16 elements
1419 ! indp = 2 : 16 space charge computations. in 32 elements
1420 ! indp = 3 : 32 space charge computations. in 64 elements
1421  if(ichaes) then
1422  write(16,*)'***** beam current: ',beamc,' mA'
1423  if(iscsp.lt.3) then
1424  write(6,*)'*** HERSC and SCHERM cannot be used',
1425  * 'with EGUN'
1426  write(16,*)'*** HERSC and SCHERM cannot be used with',
1427  * 'with EGUN'
1428  stop
1429  endif
1430  endif
1431  call egun(fmult,indp)
1432  write(16,*) '*******************************************'
1433  ELSEIF(i.eq.52) then
1434 ! AFTER COMPRES
1435 ! Do so by shifting particles belonging to the same bunch outside the (+/-) pib/2 (deg) window
1436 ! w.r.t.the COG to inside the (+/-) pib/2 window w.r.t.the COG
1437  write(16,*) ' TYPE CODE: COMPRES ********'
1438 ! --- pib (deg)
1439  read(in,*) pib
1440  pib=pib/2.
1441  write(16,1890) pib
1442  call compress(pib)
1443 1890 format('*** shift particles inside +/- ',e12.5, 'deg')
1444  write(16,*) '*******************************************'
1445  ELSEIF(i.eq.54) then
1446 ! AFTER REFCOG:
1447 ! ISHIFT = 0: the synchronous particle and the cog are coinciding (shift = false)
1448 ! ISHIFT = 1: the synchronous particle and the cog are separated (shift = true)
1449 ! ISHIFT = 2: at the start the TOF of synchronous particle is the TOF of the cog
1450 ! after synchronous particle and cog are separated (shift = true)
1451 ! (at the begining shift = false)
1452  write(16,*) ' TYPE CODE:REFCOG *********************'
1453  read(in,*) ishift
1454  if(ishift.eq.0) then
1455  shift=.false.
1456  write(16,*)' Synchronous particle is the COG of the',
1457  * ' bunch'
1458  obref=vref/vl
1459  otref=tref
1460  tcog=0.
1461  wcog=0.
1462  do ijp=1,ngood
1463  wcog=wcog+f(7,ijp)
1464  tcog=tcog+f(6,ijp)
1465  enddo
1466  wcog=wcog/float(ngood)
1467  tcog=tcog/float(ngood)
1468  gcog=wcog/xmat
1469  bcog=sqrt(gcog*gcog-1.)/gcog
1470  vref=bcog*vl
1471  tref=tcog
1472  fcpi=fh*180./pi
1473  write(16,5433)obref,otref*fcpi,vref/vl,tref*fcpi,
1474  * bcog,tcog*fcpi
1475 5433 format(' old ref. beta: ',e12.5,' TOF: ',e12.5,' deg',
1476  * /,' new ref. beta: ',e12.5,' TOF: ',e12.5,' deg',/,
1477  * ' COG beta: ',e12.5,' TOF: ',e12.5,' deg')
1478 ! write(16,*) 'old TTVOL (deg): ',ottvols*fcpi
1479 ! write(16,*) 'new TTVOL (deg): ',ttvols*fcpi
1480  endif
1481  if(ishift.eq.1) then
1482  shift=.true.
1483  write(16,*)' Synchronous particle and COG of the ',
1484  * 'bunch are independent'
1485  endif
1486  if(ishift.gt.1) then
1487  write(16,*)
1488  write(16,*)' Synchronous particle and COG of the ',
1489  * 'bunch are independent, but initially TOF and energy',
1490  * 'of the synchronous particle are the ones of the ',
1491  * 'bunch'
1492  shift=.true.
1493 ! --- the reference is the cog
1494  obref=vref/vl
1495  otref=tref
1496  wcog=0.
1497  tcog=0.
1498  do ijp=1,ngood
1499  wcog=wcog+f(7,ijp)
1500  tcog=tcog+f(6,ijp)
1501  enddo
1502  wcog=wcog/float(ngood)
1503  tcog=tcog/float(ngood)
1504  gcog=wcog/xmat
1505  bcog=sqrt(gcog*gcog-1.)/gcog
1506  vref=bcog*vl
1507  tref=tcog
1508  ottvols=ttvols
1509  if(itvol) ttvols=tref
1510  fcpi=fh*180./pi
1511 ! write(16,5420)obref,otref*fcpi,obref,tref*fcpi
1512  write(16,5420)obref,otref*fcpi,vref/vl,tref*fcpi
1513 5420 format(' old ref. beta: ',e12.5,' tref: ',e12.5,' deg'
1514  * ,/,' new ref. beta: ',e12.5,' tref: ',e12.5,' deg')
1515  write(16,*) 'old TTVOL (deg): ',ottvols*fcpi
1516  write(16,*) 'new TTVOL (deg): ',ttvols*fcpi
1517  endif
1518  write(16,*) '****************************'
1519  ELSEIF(i.eq.55) then
1520 ! AFTER FPART:
1521 ! --- a given particle is followed in the accelerating elements
1522 ! --- ICONT : the number of the particle followed in accelerating elements
1523  write(16,*) ' TYPE CODE:FPART *********************'
1524  read(in,*) icont
1525  write(16,*) ' the particle:',icont,' is followed'
1526  write(16,*) '****************************'
1527  ELSEIF(i.eq.56) then
1528 ! AFTER QUAELEC: electric quadrupole
1529 ! VOLT: voltage at pole tip (kV)
1530 ! XLQUA: effective length (cm)
1531 ! RS: radial distance of pole tip from axis (cm)
1532  write(16,*) 'TYPE CODE:QUALEC**********'
1533  READ(in,*)xlqua,volt,rs
1534  call qelec(volt,xlqua,rs)
1535  write(16,*) '********************************'
1536  ELSEIF(i.eq.57) then
1537 ! AFTER QUAFK: quadrupole (magnetic or electric)
1538 ! ITYQU: ITYQU = 0 electric quadrupole , otherwise magnetic quadrupole
1539 ! ARG: K2 (cm-2)
1540 ! XLQUA: effective length (cm)
1541 ! RS: radial distance of pole tip from the axis (cm)
1542  write(16,*) 'TYPE CODE:QUAFK**********'
1543  READ(in,*)ityqu,arg,xlqua,rs
1544  call qfk (ityqu,arg,xlqua,rs)
1545  write(16,*) '********************************'
1546  ELSEIF(i.eq.58) then
1547 ! AFTER CAVNUM: numerical computation of multicell cavities
1548 ! the electromagnetic field can be read:on the disk in the form (z,E(z))
1549 ! or from the type code: HARM in the form of a Fourier series expansion
1550  write(16,*) 'TYPE CODE:CAVNUM **********'
1551  call cavnum
1552  write(16,*) '********************************'
1553  ELSEIF(i.eq.59) then
1554 ! AFTER EDFLEC: ELECTROSTATIC DEFLECTOR
1555 ! --- Input parameters
1556 ! radial radius (cm)
1557 ! bend angle (deg)
1558 ! radii: vertical (radial) radii of curvature (cm)
1559  call e_deflec
1560  write(16,*) '********************************'
1561  ELSEIF(i.eq.60) then
1562 ! AFTER EMITL Print emittance datas in the file 'dynac.short' but
1563 ! also read label to be written to dynac.short
1564  read(in,'(A)') shortl
1565  call emiprt(1)
1566  ELSEIF(i.eq.61) then
1567 ! After RFKICK: Electric RF kicker
1568 ! PV: Voltage Factor (Voltage (kV) * electrode length (m) / gap (m))
1569 ! PDP: PHASE OF RF (deg)
1570 ! PHARM: harmonic factor (bucher fq.)/(DTL freq.)
1571 ! NVF: 0 = horizontal, 1 = vertical
1572  write(16,*) 'TYPE CODE:RFKICK ************************'
1573  READ(in,*) pv,pdp,pharm,nvf
1574  plane='horizontal'
1575  if(nvf.eq.1) plane='vertical '
1576  write(16,7779) pv,pdp,plane
1577 7779 format(' RF Kicker ',/,' Voltage Factor',e12.5,' kV*m/m'
1578  x ,/,' RF Phase ',e12.5,' deg',' Type: ',a10)
1579  pdp=pdp*pi/180.
1580  call rfkick(pv,pdp,pharm,nvf)
1581  write(16,*) '********************************'
1582  ELSEIF(i.eq.62) then
1583 ! AFTER FIRORD : first order matrix for optical lenses
1584  write(16,*) '*****************************************'
1585  write(16,*) ' FIRST ORDER IN BEAM TRANSPORT**********'
1586  iseor=.false.
1587  write(16,*) '*****************************************'
1588  ELSEIF(i.eq.63) then
1589 ! AFTER DCBEAM : select DC or bunched beam
1590  READ(in,*) iscont
1591  write(16,*) '****************************'
1592  if(iscont.eq.1) then
1593  ifcont=.true.
1594  write(16,*) ' DC BEAM SELECTED **********'
1595  elseif(iscont.eq.0) then
1596  ifcont=.false.
1597  write(16,*) ' BUNCHED BEAM SELECTED ********'
1598  endif
1599  write(16,*) '****************************'
1600  ELSEIF(i.eq.64) then
1601 ! AFTER T3D : request TRACE3D input file
1602  t3d=.true.
1603  write(16,*) '**************************************'
1604  write(16,*) '* TRACE3D INPUT FILE WILL BE WRITTEN *'
1605  write(16,*) '**************************************'
1606  ELSEIF(i.eq.53) then
1607 ! AFTER STOP: mandatory, stop the computations
1608  tcog=0.
1609  wcog=0.
1610  do ijp=1,ngood
1611  wcog=wcog+f(7,ijp)
1612  tcog=tcog+f(6,ijp)
1613  enddo
1614  wcog=wcog/float(ngood)
1615  tcog=tcog/float(ngood)
1616  gcog=wcog/xmat
1617  bcog=sqrt(gcog*gcog-1.)/gcog
1618 ! store END data for .dmp file
1619 ! dmpdat(1)=davtot/100.
1620 ! dmpdat(2)=100.*float(ngood/imax)
1621 ! dmpdat(3)=0.
1622 ! dmpdat(4)=tcog*180.*fh/pi
1623 ! dmpdat(5)=bcog
1624 ! dmpdat(6)=(sqrt(1./(1.-bcog*bcog))-1.)*xmat
1625 ! dmpdat(7)=tref*180.*fh/pi
1626 ! bref=vref/vl
1627 ! dmpdat(8)=bref
1628 ! dmpdat(9)=(sqrt(1./(1.-bref*bref))-1.)*xmat
1629 ! dmpdat(10), dmpdat(11), dmpdat(12) loaded in emiprt
1630 ! dmpdat(13)=0.
1631 ! dmpdat(14)=0.
1632  shortl='STOP card encountered; beam data are:'
1633  call emiprt(1)
1634 ! nd=0
1635 ! write(50,*) '# end Z trans ',
1636 ! * 'dummy TOF(COG) COG Wcog TOF(REF) ',
1637 ! * ' REF Wref Ex,RMS,n Ey,RMS,n ',
1638 ! * 'El,RMS dummy dummy'
1639 ! write(50,*) '# # (m) (%) ',
1640 ! * ' (deg) beta (MeV) (deg) ',
1641 ! * ' beta (MeV) (mm.mrad) (mm.mrad) (ns.keV)'
1642 ! write(50,7023) nd,(dmpdat(j),j=1,14)
1643 !7023 format(1x,i4,1x,e12.5,1x,f6.2,1x,f7.2,1x,
1644 ! * 2(e14.7,1x,f7.5,1x,e14.7,1x),7(e12.5,1x))
1645  write(16,100) kle(i)
1646  exit
1647  ENDIF
1648  ELSE
1649 !! key not found, go to STOP
1650  indic=999
1651  WRITE(66,*) indic
1652  WRITE(16,111)kley
1653  WRITE(6,111) kley
1654  EXIT
1655  ENDIF
1656  ENDDO
1657 ! write trace file (if requested)
1658  if(t3d) then
1659 ! write trace file (header part)
1660  myfile=''
1661  myfile='for_trace3d.t3d'
1662  lfile=len_trim(myfile)
1663  myfile(lpath+1:lpath+lfile)=myfile(1:lfile)
1664  myfile(1:lpath)=dpath(1:lpath)
1665  myfile=trim(myfile)
1666  open(itout,file=myfile,status='unknown')
1667  write(itout,'(A)') trace3h(1)
1668  write(itout,1990) kt3t,kt3t,kt3t
1669 1990 format(' N1= 1, N2= ',i4,', NEL1= 1, NEL2= ',i4,
1670  * ', NP1= 1, NP2= ',i4)
1671  do i=2,kt3h
1672  write(itout,'(A)') trace3h(i)
1673  enddo
1674  write(itout,1992)
1675 1992 format(' PQEXT= 2.5, ICHROM= 0, IBS= 0, SMAX= 2.0')
1676  write(itout,1993)
1677 1993 format(' XM= 15.00, XPM= 50.00, YM= 15.00')
1678  write(itout,1994)
1679 1994 format(' XMI= 15.00, XPMI= 50.00, XMF= 15.00, XPMF= 25.00')
1680  write(itout,1995)
1681 1995 format(' DPM= 90.0, DWM= 50.00, DPP= 90.00')
1682  write(itout,1996)
1683 1996 format(' DPMI= 90.0, DPMF= 35.00, DWMI= 50.0, DWMF= 200.0')
1684 ! write trace file (beam line part)
1685 !
1686 ! deal with negative drifts (typical within DTLs)
1687 ! if the current drift is negative, then see if there is a drift before or
1688 ! after it. If so, add the 2 drifts, devide by 2 and put this result in both
1689 ! drifts
1690  do k=2,kt3t-1
1691  trdrifa=0.
1692  trdrifb=0.
1693  tif=trace3t(k)
1694  tifb=trace3t(k-1)
1695  tifa=trace3t(k+1)
1696  if(tif(12:13).eq.' 1' .and. tifb(12:13).eq.' 1') then
1697  read(tif(28:50),*) trdrift
1698  if(trdrift.lt.0.) then
1699  read(tifb(28:50),*) trdrifb
1700  if(trdrifb.gt.0.) then
1701  aver=(trdrifb+trdrift)/2.
1702  trdrifb=aver
1703  trdrift=aver
1704 ! write(6,*) k,'beforeb',tif(12:13),trdrift,trdrifb
1705  write(fdrft,555) trdrift
1706 555 format(f12.6)
1707  tif(28:40)=fdrft
1708  write(fdrft,555) trdrifb
1709  tifb(28:40)=fdrft
1710  trace3t(k)=tif
1711  trace3t(k-1)=tifb
1712  endif
1713  endif
1714  elseif(tif(12:13).eq.' 1' .and. tifa(12:13).eq.' 1') then
1715  read(tif(28:50),*) trdrift
1716  if(trdrift.lt.0.) then
1717  read(tifa(28:50),*) trdrifa
1718  if(trdrifa.gt.0.) then
1719  aver=(trdrifa+trdrift)/2.
1720  trdrifa=aver
1721  trdrift=aver
1722 ! write(6,*) k,'aftera',tif(12:13),trdrift,trdrifa
1723  write(fdrft,555) trdrift
1724  tif(28:40)=fdrft
1725  write(fdrft,555) trdrifa
1726  tifa(28:40)=fdrft
1727  trace3t(k)=tif
1728  trace3t(k+1)=tifa
1729  endif
1730  endif
1731  endif
1732  enddo
1733  do k=1,kt3t
1734  write(itout,'(A)') trace3t(k)
1735  enddo
1736  write(itout,'(A)') ' $END'
1737  endif
1738  call daves(beame)
1739  call eugwrt
1740  call cpu_time(exfin)
1741  exfin=exfin-exstrt
1742  call mytime(iitime)
1743  write(6,*)
1744  if (mg) then
1745 ! using MINGW style gfortran format: 03/30/10 20:51:06 (10 is 2010)
1746  text(1:4)=' '
1747  if(iitime(1:2).eq.'01')text(5:7)='Jan'
1748  if(iitime(1:2).eq.'02')text(5:7)='Feb'
1749  if(iitime(1:2).eq.'03')text(5:7)='Mar'
1750  if(iitime(1:2).eq.'04')text(5:7)='Apr'
1751  if(iitime(1:2).eq.'05')text(5:7)='May'
1752  if(iitime(1:2).eq.'06')text(5:7)='Jun'
1753  if(iitime(1:2).eq.'07')text(5:7)='Jul'
1754  if(iitime(1:2).eq.'08')text(5:7)='Aug'
1755  if(iitime(1:2).eq.'09')text(5:7)='Sep'
1756  if(iitime(1:2).eq.'10')text(5:7)='Oct'
1757  if(iitime(1:2).eq.'11')text(5:7)='Nov'
1758  if(iitime(1:2).eq.'12')text(5:7)='Dec'
1759  text(8:8)=' '
1760  text(9:10)=iitime(4:5)
1761  text(11:13)=' 20'
1762  text(14:15)=iitime(7:8)
1763  text(16:19)=' at '
1764  text(20:27)=iitime(10:17)
1765  else
1766  text(1:11)=iitime(1:11)
1767  text(12:15)=iitime(21:24)
1768  text(16:19)=' at '
1769  text(20:27)=iitime(12:19)
1770  endif
1771  write(12,*) 'Stopped on ',text(1:27)
1772  write(16,*) 'Stopped on ',text(1:27)
1773  write(6,'(A11,A27)') 'Stopped on ',text(1:27)
1774  write(6,'(A12,F14.6,A4)') 'Executed in ',exfin,' sec'
1775  write(16,101)
1776 ! close input files
1777  close(10)
1778  close(20)
1779  close(22)
1780  close(25)
1781  close(27)
1782  close(55)
1783 ! close output files
1784 ! files actived in the code
1785 ! 44=chase_emith.out
1786  close(44)
1787  close(45)
1788  close(46)
1789  close(16)
1790  close(12)
1791  close(71)
1792  close(50)
1793  close(61)
1794  close(60)
1795  close(11)
1796  close(66)
1797  close(75)
1798  close(49)
1799 ! files not actived in the code
1800 ! SV 24/08/2015
1801  close(13)
1802 !old close(14)
1803 !omment close(15)
1804 !omment close(17)
1805 !omment close(18)
1806 !omment close(19)
1807 !omment close(21)
1808 !omment close(49)
1809  close(70)
1810  stop
1811 111 FORMAT('STOP ON KEY: ',a8,' (invalid key)')
1812 100 FORMAT(/,40x,' STOP on key : ',a8,//)
1813 101 FORMAT('*******************************************************',
1814  1 '*****************')
1815  END
1816 
1820  SUBROUTINE mytime(iitime)
1821  implicit real(8) (a-h,o-z)
1822  character iitime*30
1823  integer(8) inttim
1824  inttim=time8()
1825  iitime=ctime(inttim)
1826  return
1827  end
1828 
1846  SUBROUTINE rmami
1847  implicit real(8) (a-h,o-z)
1848  parameter(maxcell1=3000)
1849  common/tapes/in,ifile,meta
1850  common/dyn/tref,vref
1851  common/ttfc/tk,t1k,t2k,sk,s1k,s2k,fh
1852  COMMON /consta/ vl, pi, xmat, rpel, qst
1853  common/davcom/dav1(maxcell1,40),davtot,iitem(maxcell1),idav
1854  common/itvole/itvol,imamin
1855  common/tofev/ttvols
1856  logical itvol,imamin
1857  fcpi=fh*180./pi
1858  ttvols=0.
1859  read(in,*) indic,icor
1860  if(indic.eq.0) then
1861  itvol=.true.
1862  ttvols=tref
1863  write(16,10) ttvols*fcpi,davtot,tref*fcpi
1864  else
1865  itvol=.false.
1866  write(16,*) 'time of flight passive '
1867  endif
1868 10 FORMAT(' ** time of flight activated at: ',e12.5,
1869  * ' deg at position: ',e12.5,' cm in the lattice',
1870  * /,3x,'tof of the reference: ',e12.5,' deg')
1871  imamin = .false.
1872  if(itvol.and.icor.ne.0) imamin = .true.
1873  if(imamin)
1874  * write(16,*)' Adjustments on phase offset of acc. elements'
1875  if(.not.imamin)
1876  * write(16,*) ' No adjustments on phase offset'
1877  RETURN
1878  END
1879 
1883 ! SUBROUTINE kick
1884 ! implicit real(8) (a-h,o-z)
1885 !C ..................................
1886 !C ALIGNMENT DEFAULTS :
1887 !C HORIZONTAL : XL(cm)
1888 !C VERTICAL : YL(cm)
1889 !C ..................................
1890 ! parameter (iptsz=100002,maxcell=3000,maxcell1=3000)
1891 ! COMMON/DESA/XL,YL,IFLAG
1892 ! common/faisc/f(10,iptsz),imax,ngood
1893 ! WRITE(16,100) XL,YL
1894 !100 FORMAT(/,5X,' KICK x(cm) y(cm): ',2(e12.5,2x),/)
1895 !C CM-MRD
1896 ! DO II=1,ngood
1897 ! if(iflag.ne.1) then
1898 ! F(2,II)=F(2,II) + XL
1899 ! F(4,II)=F(4,II) + YL
1900 ! else
1901 !C F(2,II)=F(2,II) - XL
1902 ! F(4,II)=F(4,II) - YL
1903 ! endif
1904 ! enddo
1905 ! RETURN
1906 ! END
1912  SUBROUTINE shuffle
1913  implicit real(8) (a-h,o-z)
1914 ! parameter (iptsz=100002,maxcell=3000,maxcell1=3000)
1915  parameter(iptsz=100002)
1916  common/faisc/f(10,iptsz),imax,ngood
1917  common/mcs/imcs,ncstat,cstat(20)
1918  common/macro/ratei
1919  k=ngood
1920  ngood1=0
1921  DO
1922  if(ngood1.ge.k) exit
1923  if(f(8,ngood1+1).ne.1.) then
1924  do j=1,10
1925  c=f(j,ngood1+1)
1926  f(j,ngood1+1)=f(j,k)
1927  f(j,k)=c
1928  enddo
1929  k=k-1
1930  else
1931  ngood1=ngood1+1
1932  endif
1933  ENDDO
1934  ngood=ngood1
1935  if(ngood.eq.0) then
1936  ratei=0.
1937  else
1938  ratei=float(imax)/float(ngood)
1939  endif
1940 !*ets*2015/05/20
1941  ncstat=1
1942  cstat(1)=f(9,1)
1943  do j=2,ngood
1944  mcstat=0
1945  do k=1,ncstat
1946  if(f(9,j).eq.cstat(k)) then
1947  mcstat=1
1948  endif
1949  enddo
1950  if(mcstat.eq.0) then
1951  ncstat=ncstat+1
1952  cstat(ncstat)=f(9,j)
1953  endif
1954  enddo
1955  write(16,*) 'Number of charge states after shuffle: ',ncstat
1956  write(16,*) 'Charge state(s): ',(cstat(j),j=1,ncstat)
1957  imcs=0
1958  if(ncstat.gt.1) imcs=1
1959 !*ete*2015/05/20
1960 !omment write(16,*) '***reshuffle: ',ngood,' good particles'
1961  if(ngood.lt.10) then
1962  write(16,*)'Less than 10 particles left, statistics too low'
1963  write(6,*)
1964  write(6,*)'Less than 10 particles left, statistics too low'
1965  stop
1966  endif
1967  return
1968  end
1969 
1973  FUNCTION xitl0(GAMI,GAMS,BETR,SAPHI,QQC)
1974  implicit real(8) (a-h,o-z)
1975  COMMON /consta/ vl, pi, xmat, rpel, qst
1976  common/ttfc/tk,t1k,t2k,sk,s1k,s2k,fh
1977  common/bedycp/phslip,eqvl,asdl,peqvl,pavph,xkp1,xkp2,
1978  * aa,bb,cc,dd,ee,pcrest,sqcttf
1979  fh0=fh/vl
1980  cgi=qqc/xmat
1981  beti=sqrt(1.-1./(gami*gami))
1982  bets=sqrt(1.-1./(gams*gams))
1983  xk1=fh0/beti
1984  xk2=fh0/bets
1985  xkm=fh0/betr
1986  tilta2=phslip/(2.*eqvl)
1987  pavph=1./10.*(xk1- xk2)*eqvl
1988  x +(xk1-xkm)*asdl
1989  xkc1=-fh0/(beti**3 * gami**3)
1990  xkc2=-fh0/(bets**3 * gams**3)
1991  DO i=1,2
1992  phit10=saphi-phslip/2.+pavph
1993  daz0=cos(phit10)*tilta2
1994  dbz0=sin(phit10)*tilta2
1995  dgz0=cgi*(tk*daz0-sk*dbz0)
1996  dgz0=dgz0/sin(phslip/2.)
1997  xkp1=xkc1*dgz0
1998  phit11=saphi+phslip/2.+pavph
1999  daz1=cos(phit11)*tilta2
2000  dbz1=sin(phit11)*tilta2
2001  dgz1=cgi*(tk*daz1-sk*dbz1)
2002  dgz1=dgz1/sin(phslip/2.)
2003  xkp2=xkc2*dgz1
2004  pavph=1./10.*(xk1- xk2)*eqvl
2005  x +(xk1-xkm)*asdl
2006  pavph=pavph+(xkp1+xkp2)*eqvl**2 / 120.
2007  ENDDO
2008  xk11=xk1-xkm
2009  xk22=xk2-xkm
2010  aa=xk11
2011  bb=xkp1/2.
2012  ccl1=-(4.*xk22+6.*xk11)/(eqvl**2)
2013  ccl2=-(3./2.*xkp1-xkp2/2.)/eqvl
2014  cc=ccl1+ccl2
2015  ddl1=(7.*xk22+8.*xk11)/(eqvl**3)
2016  ddl2=(3./2.*xkp1-xkp2)/(eqvl**2)
2017  dd=ddl1+ddl2
2018  eel1=-(3.*xk22+3.*xk11)/(eqvl**4)
2019  eel2=-(xkp1/2.-xkp2/2.)/(eqvl**3)
2020  ee=eel1+eel2
2021  phit0=saphi+pavph
2022  git = cgi * (
2023  x tk*cos(phit0)-sk*sin(phit0))
2024  xitl0=gami+git
2025  RETURN
2026  END
2027 
2033  FUNCTION xitl2(GAMI,GAMS,BETR,SAPHI,QQC)
2034  implicit real(8) (a-h,o-z)
2035  COMMON /consta/ vl, pi, xmat, rpel, qst
2036  common/ttfc/tk,t1k,t2k,sk,s1k,s2k,fh
2037  common/bedycp/phslip,eqvl,asdl,peqvl,pavph,xkp1,xkp2,
2038  * aa,bb,cc,dd,ee,pcrest,sqcttf
2039  dimension h(8),t(8)
2040  DATA h /.101228536,.222381034,.313706646,.362683783,
2041  1 .362683783,.313706646,.222381034,.101228536/
2042  DATA t /-.960289856,-.796666477,-.525532409,
2043  1 -.183434642,.183434642,.525532409,
2044  2 .796666477,.960289856/
2045  fh0=fh/vl
2046  cgi=qqc/xmat
2047  xitl2=0.
2048  beti=sqrt(1.-1./(gami*gami))
2049  bets=sqrt(1.-1./(gams*gams))
2050  xk1=fh0/beti
2051  xk2=fh0/bets
2052  xkm=fh0/betr
2053  tilta2=phslip/(2.*eqvl)
2054  DO i=1,8
2055  xcc= eqvl*(1.+t(i))/2.
2056  phit0=saphi-phslip*(eqvl-xcc)/(2.*eqvl)+pavph
2057  git = cgi * (
2058  x tk*cos(phit0)-sk*sin(phit0) )
2059  gi=gami+git *
2060  x sin(xcc*tilta2)/sin(phslip/2.)
2061  bi=sqrt(1.-1./(gi*gi))
2062  phit1=phit0+xcc*phslip/(2.*eqvl)
2063  daz=cos(phit1)*tilta2
2064  dbz=sin(phit1)*tilta2
2065  dgz=cgi*(tk*daz-sk*dbz)
2066  dgz=dgz/sin(phslip/2.)
2067  ez = xmat/qqc * dgz
2068  xint=1./(bi*gi)
2069  xcc1=xcc+asdl
2070  xitl2=xitl2+h(i)*xint**3 *xcc1*ez
2071  ENDDO
2072  xitl2=xitl2/2. *eqvl
2073  RETURN
2074  END
2075 
2081  FUNCTION xitl3(GAMI,GAMS,BETR,NIT,SAPHI,QQC)
2082  implicit real(8) (a-h,o-z)
2083  COMMON /consta/ vl, pi, xmat, rpel, qst
2084  common/ttfc/tk,t1k,t2k,sk,s1k,s2k,fh
2085  common/bedycp/phslip,eqvl,asdl,peqvl,pavph,xkp1,xkp2,
2086  * aa,bb,cc,dd,ee,pcrest,sqcttf
2087  common/midgap/enmil,vapmi
2088  common/gaus13/h(13),t(13)
2089  common/sgcos/xkpc
2090  fh0=fh/vl
2091  cgi=qqc/xmat
2092  xitl3=0.
2093  beti=sqrt(1.-1./(gami*gami))
2094  bets=sqrt(1.-1./(gams*gams))
2095  xk1=fh0/beti
2096  xk2=fh0/bets
2097  xkm=fh0/betr
2098  xk11=xk1-xkm
2099  tilta2=phslip/(2.*eqvl)
2100  DO i=1,13
2101  xcc= eqvl*(1.+t(i))/2.
2102  phit0=saphi-phslip*(eqvl-xcc)/(2.*eqvl)+pavph
2103  git = cgi * (tk*cos(phit0)-sk*sin(phit0))
2104  gi=gami+git * sin(xcc*tilta2)/sin(phslip/2.)
2105  bi=sqrt(1.-1./(gi*gi))
2106  phit1=phit0+xcc*phslip/(2.*eqvl)
2107  daz=cos(phit1)*tilta2
2108  dbz=sin(phit1)*tilta2
2109  dgz=cgi*(tk*daz-sk*dbz)
2110  dgz=dgz/sin(phslip/2.)
2111  ez = xmat/qqc * dgz
2112  xint=1./(bi*gi)
2113  xcc1=xcc+asdl
2114  xitl3=xitl3+h(i)*xint**3 *xcc1*ez
2115 ! ENERGY AND PHASE AT THE MIDDLE OF THE GAP
2116  IF(nit.EQ.3.AND.i.EQ.7) THEN
2117 ! ENMIL=XMAT*(GI-GAMI)
2118  enmil=xmat*(gi-1.)
2119  vapmi=(xk11*asdl+saphi+xkm*xcc1+aa*xcc+
2120  * bb*xcc*xcc+cc*xcc**3+dd*xcc**4+ee*xcc**5)*180./pi
2121  ENDIF
2122  ENDDO
2123  xitl3=xitl3/2. *eqvl
2124  RETURN
2125  END
2126 
2132  SUBROUTINE xtypl2(GAMI,SAPHI,QSC,DCG)
2133  implicit real(8) (a-h,o-z)
2134  COMMON /consta/ vl, pi, xmat, rpel, qst
2135  common/ttfc/tk,t1k,t2k,sk,s1k,s2k,fh
2136  common/bedycp/phslip,eqvl,asdl,peqvl,pavph,xkp1,xkp2,
2137  * aa,bb,cc,dd,ee,pcrest,sqcttf
2138  common/thad2/h0aki,h0akim,h0akm,h0bki,h0bkim,h0bkm,
2139  x h1aki,h1akim,h1akm,h1bki,h1bkim,h1bkm
2140  common/gaus17/h1(17),t1(17)
2141  fh0=fh/vl
2142  cgi=qsc/xmat
2143  gam2=gami**2
2144  beti=sqrt(1. - 1./gam2 )
2145  xk1=fh0/beti
2146 ! circular functions in cos
2147  h0aki=0.
2148  h0akim=0.
2149  h0akm=0.
2150  h1aki=0.
2151  h1akim=0.
2152  h1akm=0.
2153 ! circular functions in sin
2154  h0bki=0.
2155  h0bkim=0.
2156  h0bkm=0.
2157  h1bki=0.
2158  h1bkim=0.
2159  h1bkm=0.
2160 !
2161  dtilk=eqvl
2162  tilta2=phslip/(2.*eqvl)
2163  cgam10=((gami*gami-1.)**3)/(fh0*fh0)
2164  dgam10=gami*((gami*gami-1.)**2)/(fh0*fh0)
2165  phcrtk=(t1k*sk-s1k*tk)/(tk*tk+sk*sk)
2166  dphc1=(t2k*sk-s2k*tk)/(tk*tk+sk*sk)
2167  dphc2=(t1k*tk+s1k*sk)*(t1k*sk-s1k*tk)/
2168  x ((tk*tk+sk*sk)**2)
2169  dphcrtk=dphc1-2.*dphc2
2170  bim1=beti
2171  gakm1=0.
2172  gait=gami
2173  do i=1,17
2174  xcc= eqvl*(1.+h1(i))/2.
2175  xcc1=xcc+asdl
2176  IF(xcc1.GT.dcg) EXIT
2177  phit0=saphi-phslip*(eqvl-xcc)/(2.*eqvl)+pavph
2178 ! Function GAMMA (Z)
2179  IF(phslip.NE.0.) THEN
2180  git = cgi * sqcttf*cos(phit0-pcrest)/phslip
2181  gis = sin(xcc*tilta2)
2182  ELSE
2183  git = cgi * sqcttf*cos(phit0-pcrest)
2184  gis = xcc/(2.*eqvl)
2185  ENDIF
2186  gitc=git * gis
2187  gi=gami+git * gis
2188  bi=sqrt(1.-1./(gi*gi))
2189 ! FONCTION DERIVE G0(Z) RELATIF A K MOYEN
2190  phit0k=-dtilk*(1.-xcc/eqvl)/2.
2191 ! DERIVE PREMIERE FONGTION GAMMA
2192  IF(phslip.NE.0.) THEN
2193  gic = cos(xcc*tilta2)
2194  gak1=dtilk*cos(phit0-pcrest)*gis/(phslip*phslip)
2195  gak2=sin(phit0-pcrest)*gis*(phit0k-phcrtk)/phslip
2196  gak3=dtilk*cos(phit0-pcrest)*xcc*gic/(2.*phslip*eqvl)
2197  gak =cgi * sqcttf* (-gak1-gak2+gak3)
2198  ELSE
2199  gak1=sin(phit0-pcrest)*gis*(phit0k-phcrtk)
2200  gak =-cgi * sqcttf* gak1
2201  ENDIF
2202 ! Second derivative of GAMMA(z)
2203  if(gi.ne.gait) then
2204  dgak=(gak-gakm1)/(gi-gait) *gak
2205  else
2206  dgak=0.
2207  endif
2208  gakm1=gak
2209  gait=gi
2210  xcc1=xcc+asdl
2211  phit1=phit0+xcc*phslip/(2.*eqvl)
2212  phtz0=(xcc/eqvl-.5)*dtilk
2213  dphtz0=dtilk/eqvl
2214  phcrz0=(phtz0-phcrtk)
2215 ! INTEGRALES FONCTIONS HAKI(Z) (a multipler par (k1i-k10)**2 )
2216  haki1=sqcttf*cos(phit1-pcrest)/((gi*gi-1.)**2.5)
2217  haki2=sqcttf*cos(phit1-pcrest)*gi/((gi*gi-1.)**2.5)
2218  haki3=sqcttf*cos(phit1-pcrest)*gi*gi/((gi*gi-1.)**3.5)
2219 ! n=0
2220  h0aki=h0aki+t1(i)*cgam10*(-3.*haki1+15*haki3)-
2221  x t1(i)*dgam10*9.*haki2
2222 ! n=1
2223  h1aki=h1aki+t1(i)*cgam10*xcc1*(-3.*haki1+15.*haki3)-
2224  x t1(i)*dgam10*9.*haki2*xcc1
2225 ! Integral of HAKIM(Z) (to be multiplied by (k1i-k10)*(kmi-km0) )
2226  hakim1=sqcttf*cos(phit1-pcrest)*gak/((gi*gi-1.)**2.5)
2227  hakim2=sqcttf*cos(phit1-pcrest)*gi*gi*gak/((gi*gi-1.)**3.5)
2228  hakim2=hakim2
2229  hakim3=sqcttf*sin(phit1-pcrest)*gi/((gi*gi-1.)**2.5)
2230 ! n=0
2231  h0akim=h0akim+t1(i)*sqrt(cgam10)*(6.*hakim1-30.*hakim2 -
2232  x 3.*phcrz0*hakim3)
2233 ! n=1
2234  h1akim=h1akim+t1(i)*sqrt(cgam10)*(6.*hakim1-30.*hakim2 -
2235  x 3.*phcrz0*hakim3)*xcc1
2236 ! Integral of HAKM(Z) (to be multiplied by (kmi-km0)**2 )
2237  hakm1=sqcttf*cos(phit1-pcrest)*gak*gak/((gi*gi-1.)**2.5)
2238  hakm2=sqcttf*cos(phit1-pcrest)*dgak*gi/((gi*gi-1.)**2.5)
2239  hakm3=sqcttf*cos(phit1-pcrest)*gak*gak*gi*gi/
2240  x ((gi*gi-1.)**3.5)
2241  hakm4=sqcttf*sin(phit1-pcrest)*gak*gi/
2242  x ((gi*gi-1.)**2.5)
2243  hakm5=sqcttf*cos(phit1-pcrest)/
2244  x ((gi*gi-1.)**1.5)
2245  hakm6=sqcttf*sin(phit1-pcrest)/
2246  x ((gi*gi-1.)**1.5)
2247 ! n=0
2248  h0akm=h0akm+t1(i)*(-3.*hakm1-3.*hakm2+15.*hakm3 +
2249  x 3.*phcrz0*hakm4 -
2250  x phcrz0*phcrz0*hakm5+dphcrtk*hakm6)
2251 ! n=1
2252  h1akm=h1akm+t1(i)*xcc1*(-3.*hakm1-3.*hakm2+15.*hakm3 +
2253  x 3.*phcrz0*hakm4 -
2254  x phcrz0*phcrz0*hakm5+dphcrtk*hakm6)
2255 !
2256 ! INTEGRALES FONCTIONS HBKI(Z) (a multipler par (k1i-k10)**2 )
2257  hbki1=sqcttf*sin(phit1-pcrest)/((gi*gi-1.)**2.5)
2258  hbki2=sqcttf*sin(phit1-pcrest)*gi/((gi*gi-1.)**2.5)
2259  hbki3=sqcttf*sin(phit1-pcrest)*gi*gi/((gi*gi-1.)**3.5)
2260 ! n=0
2261  h0bki=h0bki+t1(i)*cgam10*(-3.*hbki1+15.*hbki3) -
2262  x t1(i)*dgam10*9.*hbki2
2263 ! n=1
2264  h1bki=h1bki+t1(i)*cgam10*xcc1*(-3.*hbki1+15.*hbki3) -
2265  x t1(i)*dgam10*9.*hbki2*xcc1
2266 ! Integral of HBKIM(Z) (to be multiplied by (k1i-k10)*(kmi-km0) )
2267  hbkim1=sqcttf*sin(phit1-pcrest)*gak/((gi*gi-1.)**2.5)
2268  hbkim2=sqcttf*sin(phit1-pcrest)*gi*gi*gak/((gi*gi-1.)**3.5)
2269  hbkim2=hbkim2
2270  hbkim3=sqcttf*cos(phit1-pcrest)*gi/((gi*gi-1.)**2.5)
2271 ! n=0
2272  h0bkim=h0bkim+t1(i)*sqrt(cgam10)*(6.*hakim1-30.*hakim2 +
2273  x 3.*phcrz0*hakim3)
2274 ! n=1
2275  h1bkim=h1bkim+t1(i)*sqrt(cgam10)*(6.*hakim1-30.*hakim2 +
2276  x 3.*phcrz0*hakim3)*xcc1
2277 ! Integral of HBKM(Z) (to be multiplied by (kmi-km0)**2 )
2278  hbkm1=sqcttf*sin(phit1-pcrest)*gak*gak/((gi*gi-1.)**2.5)
2279  hbkm2=sqcttf*sin(phit1-pcrest)*dgak*gi/((gi*gi-1.)**2.5)
2280  hbkm3=sqcttf*sin(phit1-pcrest)*gak*gak*gi*gi/
2281  x ((gi*gi-1.)**3.5)
2282  hbkm4=sqcttf*cos(phit1-pcrest)*gak*gi/
2283  x ((gi*gi-1.)**2.5)
2284  hbkm5=sqcttf*sin(phit1-pcrest)/
2285  x ((gi*gi-1.)**1.5)
2286  hbkm6=sqcttf*cos(phit1-pcrest)/
2287  x ((gi*gi-1.)**1.5)
2288 ! n=0
2289  h0bkm=h0bkm+t1(i)*(-3.*hbkm1-3.*hbkm2+15.*hbkm3 -
2290  x 3.*phcrz0*hbkm4 -
2291  x phcrz0*phcrz0*hbkm5-dphcrtk*hbkm6)
2292 ! n=1
2293  h1bkm=h1bkm+t1(i)*xcc1*(-3.*hbkm1-3.*hbkm2+15.*hbkm3-
2294  x 3.*phcrz0*hbkm4 -
2295  x phcrz0*phcrz0*hbkm5-dphcrtk*hbkm6)
2296  enddo
2297 ! integrals in cos
2298  h0aki=h0aki/2. *eqvl
2299  h0akim=h0akim/2. *eqvl
2300  h0akm=h0akm/2. *eqvl
2301  h1aki=h1aki/2. *eqvl
2302  h1akim=h1akim/2. *eqvl
2303  h1akm=h1akm/2. *eqvl
2304 ! integrals in sin
2305  h0bki=h0bki/2. *eqvl
2306  h0bkim=h0bkim/2. *eqvl
2307  h0bkm=h0bkm/2. *eqvl
2308  h1bki=h1bki/2. *eqvl
2309  h1bkim=h1bkim/2. *eqvl
