2310  h1bkm=h1bkm/2. *eqvl
2311  RETURN
2312  END
2313 
2321  SUBROUTINE xtyplp1(GAMI,SAPHI,QSC,DCG)
2322  implicit real(8) (a-h,o-z)
2323  COMMON /consta/ vl, pi, xmat, rpel, qst
2324  common/jacob/gaks,gaps
2325  common/ttfc/tk,t1k,t2k,sk,s1k,s2k,fh
2326  common/bedycp/phslip,eqvl,asdl,peqvl,pavph,xkp1,xkp2,
2327  * aa,bb,cc,dd,ee,pcrest,sqcttf
2328  common/typlp1/yh1p1,yh2p1,hapi,hbpi
2329  common/typlp2/happi,hbppi
2330  common/gaus17/h1(17),t1(17)
2331  fh0=fh/vl
2332  cgi=qsc/xmat
2333  gam2=gami**2
2334  beti=sqrt(1. - 1./gam2 )
2335  xk1=fh0/beti
2336  dtilk=eqvl
2337 ! circular functions in cos
2338  yh1p1=0.
2339  hapi=0.
2340  happi=0.
2341 ! circular functions in sin
2342  yh2p1=0.
2343  hbpi=0.
2344  hbppi=0.
2345  tilta2=phslip/(2.*eqvl)
2346  IF(phslip.NE.0.) desy=phslip/sin(phslip/2.)
2347  IF(phslip.EQ.0.) desy=2.
2348  do i=1,17
2349  xcc= eqvl*(1.+h1(i))/2.
2350  xcc1=xcc+asdl
2351  IF(xcc1.GT.dcg) EXIT
2352  phit0=saphi-phslip*(eqvl-xcc)/(2.*eqvl)+pavph
2353 ! FONCTION GAMMA (Z)
2354  IF(phslip.NE.0.) THEN
2355  git = cgi * sqcttf*cos(phit0-pcrest)/phslip
2356  gis = sin(xcc*tilta2)
2357  ELSE
2358  git = cgi * sqcttf*cos(phit0-pcrest)
2359  gis = xcc/(2.*eqvl)
2360  ENDIF
2361  gi=gami+git * gis
2362  bi=sqrt(1.-1./(gi*gi))
2363 ! FONCTION DERIVE G0(Z) RELATIF A PH01
2364  IF(phslip.NE.0.) THEN
2365  gap=-cgi*sqcttf*sin(phit0-pcrest)*gis/phslip
2366 ! DERIVE TROISIEME
2367  ddgap=-gap
2368  ELSE
2369  gap = sin(phit0-pcrest)*gis
2370  gap = -cgi * sqcttf* gap
2371  ddgap=-gap
2372  ENDIF
2373  IF(i.EQ.17) gaps=gap
2374 ! Second derivative of G0(Z) in relation with PH01
2375  IF(phslip.NE.0.) THEN
2376  dgap=-cgi*sqcttf*cos(phit0-pcrest)*gis/phslip
2377  ELSE
2378  dgap = cos(phit0-pcrest)*gis
2379  dgap = -cgi * sqcttf*dgap
2380  ENDIF
2381 ! INTEGRALES FONCTIONS HA0(Z) et HB0(Z)
2382  xint=1./(bi*bi*bi*gi*gi*gi)
2383  phit1=phit0+xcc*phslip/(2.*eqvl)
2384  phtz0=(xcc/eqvl-.5)*dtilk
2385 ! INTEGRALES DERIVES HA0(Z)
2386  dha01=sqcttf*cos(phit1-pcrest)*gi*gap/((gi*gi-1.)**2.5)
2387  dha02=0.
2388 ! n=1
2389  yh1p1=yh1p1+t1(i)*xcc1*(-6.*dha01-2.*dha02)
2390 ! INTEGRALES DERIVES HB0(Z)
2391  dhb01=sqcttf*sin(phit1-pcrest)*gi*gap/((gi*gi-1.)**2.5)
2392  dhb02=0.
2393 ! n=1
2394  yh2p1=yh2p1+t1(i)*xcc1*(-6.*dhb01+2.*dhb02)
2395 ! INTEGRALES HAPI(Z) (multiplies par (ph1i-ph10)**2 )
2396  hapi1=sqcttf*cos(phit1-pcrest)*gap*gap/((gi*gi-1.)**2.5)
2397  hapi2=sqcttf*cos(phit1-pcrest)*gi*dgap/((gi*gi-1.)**2.5)
2398  hapi3=sqcttf*cos(phit1-pcrest)*gi*gi*gap*gap/
2399  x ((gi*gi-1.)**3.5)
2400 ! n=1
2401  hapi=hapi+t1(i)*xcc1*(-3.*hapi1-3.*hapi2+15.*hapi3)
2402 ! INTEGRALES HAPPI(Z) (multiplies par (ph1i-ph10)**3 )/3
2403  happi1=sqcttf*cos(phit1-pcrest)*gap*dgap/
2404  x ((gi*gi-1.)**2.5)
2405  happi2=sqcttf*cos(phit1-pcrest)*gap*gap*gap*gi/
2406  x ((gi*gi-1.)**3.5)
2407  happi3=sqcttf*cos(phit1-pcrest)*gap*dgap/
2408  x ((gi*gi-1.)**2.5)
2409  happi4=sqcttf*cos(phit1-pcrest)*gi*ddgap/
2410  x ((gi*gi-1.)**2.5)
2411  happi5=sqcttf*cos(phit1-pcrest)*gi*gi*gap*dgap/
2412  x ((gi*gi-1.)**3.5)
2413  happi6=sqcttf*cos(phit1-pcrest)*gi*gap**3/
2414  x ((gi*gi-1.)**3.5)
2415  happi7=sqcttf*cos(phit1-pcrest)*gi*gi*dgap*gap/
2416  x ((gi*gi-1.)**3.5)
2417  happi8=sqcttf*cos(phit1-pcrest)*gi*gi*gi*gap*gap*gap/
2418  x ((gi*gi-1.)**4.5)
2419 ! n=1
2420  happi=happi+t1(i)*xcc1*(-6.*happi1+15.*happi2-3.*happi3 -
2421  x 3.*happi4 +15.*happi5 +30.*happi6 +30.*happi7 -105.*happi8)
2422 !
2423 ! INTEGRAL OF HBPI(Z) (to be multiplied by (ph1i-ph10)**2 )
2424  hbpi1=sqcttf*sin(phit1-pcrest)*gap*gap/((gi*gi-1.)**2.5)
2425  hbpi2=sqcttf*sin(phit1-pcrest)*gi*dgap/((gi*gi-1.)**2.5)
2426  hbpi3=sqcttf*sin(phit1-pcrest)*gi*gi*gap*gap/
2427  x ((gi*gi-1.)**3.5)
2428 ! n=1
2429  hbpi=hbpi+t1(i)*xcc1*(-3.*hbpi1-3.*hbpi2+15.*hbpi3 )
2430 ! INTEGRALS of HBPPI(Z) (to be multiplied by(ph1i-ph10)**3 )/3
2431  hbppi1=sqcttf*sin(phit1-pcrest)*gap*dgap/
2432  x ((gi*gi-1.)**2.5)
2433  hbppi2=sqcttf*sin(phit1-pcrest)*gap*gap*gap*gi/
2434  x ((gi*gi-1.)**3.5)
2435  hbppi3=sqcttf*sin(phit1-pcrest)*gap*dgap/
2436  x ((gi*gi-1.)**2.5)
2437  hbppi4=sqcttf*sin(phit1-pcrest)*gi*ddgap/
2438  x ((gi*gi-1.)**2.5)
2439  hbppi5=sqcttf*sin(phit1-pcrest)*gi*gi*gap*dgap/
2440  x ((gi*gi-1.)**3.5)
2441  hbppi6=sqcttf*sin(phit1-pcrest)*gi*gap**3/
2442  x ((gi*gi-1.)**3.5)
2443  hbppi7=sqcttf*sin(phit1-pcrest)*gi*gi*dgap*gap/
2444  x ((gi*gi-1.)**3.5)
2445  hbppi8=sqcttf*sin(phit1-pcrest)*gi*gi*gi*gap*gap*gap/
2446  x ((gi*gi-1.)**4.5)
2447 ! n=1
2448  hbppi=happi+t1(i)*xcc1*(-6.*hbppi1+15.*hbppi2-3.*hbppi3 -
2449  x 3.*hbppi4 +15.*hbppi5 +30.*hbppi6 +30.*hbppi7 -105.*hbppi8)
2450  enddo
2451 ! INTEGRALS to be multiplied by cos
2452  yh1p1=yh1p1/2. *eqvl
2453  hapi=hapi/2. *eqvl
2454  happi=happi/2. *eqvl
2455 ! INTEGRALS to be multiplied by sin
2456  yh2p1=yh2p1/2. *eqvl
2457  hbpi=hbpi/2. *eqvl
2458  hbppi=hbppi/2. *eqvl
2459  RETURN
2460  END
2461 
2468  SUBROUTINE xtylpk(GAMI,SAPHI,QSC,DCG)
2469  implicit real(8) (a-h,o-z)
2470  COMMON /consta/ vl, pi, xmat, rpel, qst
2471  common/ttfc/tk,t1k,t2k,sk,s1k,s2k,fh
2472  common/bedycp/phslip,eqvl,asdl,peqvl,pavph,xkp1,xkp2,
2473  * aa,bb,cc,dd,ee,pcrest,sqcttf
2474  common/typlpk/yh10pk,yh11pk,yh20pk,yh21pk
2475  common/gaus17/h1(17),t1(17)
2476  fh0=fh/vl
2477  cgi=qsc/xmat
2478  gam2=gami**2
2479  beti=sqrt(1. - 1./gam2 )
2480  xk1=fh0/beti
2481  dtilk=eqvl
2482 ! CIRCULAIRES EN COS
2483  yh10pk=0.
2484  yh11pk=0.
2485 ! CIRCULAIRES EN SIN
2486  yh20pk=0.
2487  yh21pk=0.
2488  tilta2=phslip/(2.*eqvl)
2489  IF(phslip.NE.0.) desy=phslip/sin(phslip/2.)
2490  IF(phslip.EQ.0.) desy=2.
2491  cgam10=((gami*gami-1.)**1.5)/fh0
2492  phcrtk=(t1k*sk-s1k*tk)/(tk*tk+sk*sk)
2493  do i=1,17
2494  xcc= eqvl*(1.+h1(i))/2.
2495  xcc1=xcc+asdl
2496  IF(xcc1.GT.dcg) EXIT
2497  phit0=saphi-phslip*(eqvl-xcc)/(2.*eqvl)+pavph
2498 ! FONCTION GAMMA (Z)
2499  IF(phslip.NE.0.) THEN
2500  git = cgi * sqcttf*cos(phit0-pcrest)/phslip
2501  gis = sin(xcc*tilta2)
2502  ELSE
2503  git = cgi * sqcttf*cos(phit0-pcrest)
2504  gis = xcc/(2.*eqvl)
2505  ENDIF
2506  gi=gami+git * gis
2507  bi=sqrt(1.-1./(gi*gi))
2508 ! Derivative of G0(Z) in relation with: PH01
2509  IF(phslip.NE.0.) THEN
2510  gap=-cgi*sqcttf*sin(phit0-pcrest)*gis/phslip
2511  ELSE
2512  gap = sin(phit0-pcrest)*gis
2513  gap = -cgi * sqcttf* gap
2514  ENDIF
2515 ! Derivative of G0(Z) in relation with the equivalent K
2516  phit0k=-dtilk*(1.-xcc/eqvl)/2.
2517  IF(phslip.NE.0.) THEN
2518  gic =cos(xcc*tilta2)
2519  gak1=dtilk*cos(phit0-pcrest)*gis/(phslip*phslip)
2520  gak2=sin(phit0-pcrest)*gis*(phit0k-phcrtk)/phslip
2521  gak3=dtilk*cos(phit0-pcrest)*xcc*gic/(2.*phslip*eqvl)
2522  gak =cgi * sqcttf* (-gak1-gak2+gak3)
2523  ELSE
2524  gak1=sin(phit0-pcrest)*gis*(phit0k-phcrtk)
2525  gak =-cgi * sqcttf* gak1
2526  ENDIF
2527 ! derivative of G0(Z) in relation with the equivalent k and the phase PHI
2528  IF(phslip.NE.0.) THEN
2529  gic = cos(xcc*tilta2)
2530  gakp1=dtilk*sin(phit0-pcrest)*gis/(phslip*phslip)
2531  gakp2=cos(phit0-pcrest)*gis*(phit0k-phcrtk)/phslip
2532  gakp3=dtilk*sin(phit0-pcrest)*xcc*gic/(2.*phslip*eqvl)
2533  gakp =cgi * sqcttf* (gakp1-gakp2-gakp3)
2534  ELSE
2535  gakp1 = cos(phit0-pcrest)*gis*(phit0k-phcrtk)
2536  gakp = -cgi * sqcttf* gakp1
2537  ENDIF
2538 ! INTEGRALS of HA0(Z) and HB0(Z)
2539  xint=1./(bi*bi*bi*gi*gi*gi)
2540  phit1=phit0+xcc*phslip/(2.*eqvl)
2541 ! INTEGRALES DERIVE HA0(Z) HB0(Z) k0 ET PHI
2542  dha01=sqcttf*cos(phit1-pcrest)*gap/((gi*gi-1.)**2.5)
2543  dha02=sqcttf*cos(phit1-pcrest)*gi*gi*gap/
2544  x ((gi*gi-1.)**3.5)
2545  dhb01=sqcttf*sin(phit1-pcrest)*gap/((gi*gi-1.)**2.5)
2546  dhb02=sqcttf*sin(phit1-pcrest)*gi*gi*gap/
2547  x ((gi*gi-1.)**3.5)
2548 ! n=1
2549  yh10pk=yh10pk+t1(i)*xcc1*cgam10*(3.*dha01-15.*dha02)
2550  yh20pk=yh20pk+t1(i)*xcc1*cgam10*(3.*dhb01-15.*dhb02)
2551 ! Integrals of HA(Z) (multiplied by (ph1i-ph10)*(kmi-km0)
2552  hapi1=sqcttf*cos(phit1-pcrest)*gap*gak/((gi*gi-1.)**2.5)
2553  hapi2=sqcttf*cos(phit1-pcrest)*gi*gakp/((gi*gi-1.)**2.5)
2554  hapi3=sqcttf*cos(phit1-pcrest)*gi*gi*gap*gak/
2555  x ((gi*gi-1.)**3.5)
2556 ! n=1
2557  yh11pk=yh11pk+t1(i)*xcc1*(-3.*hapi1-3.*hapi2+15.*hapi3)
2558 ! Integrals of HB(Z) (multiplied by (ph1i-ph10)*(kmi-km0)
2559  hbpi1=sqcttf*sin(phit1-pcrest)*gap*gak/((gi*gi-1.)**2.5)
2560  hbpi2=sqcttf*sin(phit1-pcrest)*gi*gakp/((gi*gi-1.)**2.5)
2561  hbpi3=sqcttf*sin(phit1-pcrest)*gi*gi*gap*gak/
2562  x ((gi*gi-1.)**3.5)
2563 ! n=1
2564  yh21pk=yh21pk+t1(i)*xcc1*(-3.*hbpi1-3.*hbpi2+15.*hbpi3)
2565  enddo
2566 ! Cosinus integrals
2567  yh10pk=yh10pk/2. *eqvl
2568  yh11pk=yh11pk/2. *eqvl
2569 ! Sinus integrals
2570  yh20pk=yh20pk/2. *eqvl
2571  yh21pk=yh21pk/2. *eqvl
2572  RETURN
2573  END
2574 
2579  SUBROUTINE xtypj(GAMI,SAPHI,QSC,DCG)
2580  implicit real(8) (a-h,o-z)
2581  COMMON /consta/ vl, pi, xmat, rpel, qst
2582  common/ttfc/tk,t1k,t2k,sk,s1k,s2k,fh
2583  common/bedycp/phslip,eqvl,asdl,peqvl,pavph,xkp1,xkp2,
2584  * aa,bb,cc,dd,ee,pcrest,sqcttf
2585  common/typj/yfsk0,yfsk1,yfsk2,yfsp0,yfsp1,yfsp2,
2586  x yfskc0,yfskc1,yfskc2,
2587  x yfsck0,yfsck1,yfsck2,
2588  x yfscp0,yfscp1,yfscp2,
2589  x yfs0,yfs1,yfs2
2590  common/gaus17/h1(17),t1(17)
2591  fh0=fh/vl
2592  cgi=qsc/xmat
2593  gam2=gami**2
2594  beti=sqrt(1. - 1./gam2 )
2595  xk1=fh0/beti
2596  dtilk=eqvl
2597  yfs0=0.
2598  yfs1=0.
2599  yfs2=0.
2600  yfskc0=0.
2601  yfskc1=0.
2602  yfskc2=0.
2603  yfsk0=0.
2604  yfsk1=0.
2605  yfsk2=0.
2606  yfsck0=0.
2607  yfsck1=0.
2608  yfsck2=0.
2609  yfscp0=0.
2610  yfscp1=0.
2611  yfscp2=0.
2612  yfsp0=0.
2613  yfsp1=0.
2614  yfsp2=0.
2615  tilta2=phslip/(2.*eqvl)
2616  IF(phslip.NE.0.) desy=phslip/sin(phslip/2.)
2617  IF(phslip.EQ.0.) desy=2.
2618  cgam10=((gami*gami-1.)**1.5)/fh0
2619  phcrtk=(t1k*sk-s1k*tk)/(tk*tk+sk*sk)
2620  do i=1,17
2621  xcc= eqvl*(1.+h1(i))/2.
2622  xcc1=xcc+asdl
2623  IF(xcc1.GT.dcg) EXIT
2624  phit0=saphi-phslip*(eqvl-xcc)/(2.*eqvl)+pavph
2625 ! Function GAMMA (Z)
2626  IF(phslip.NE.0.) THEN
2627  git = cgi * sqcttf*cos(phit0-pcrest)/phslip
2628  gis = sin(xcc*tilta2)
2629  ELSE
2630  git = cgi * sqcttf*cos(phit0-pcrest)
2631  gis = xcc/(2.*eqvl)
2632  ENDIF
2633  gi=gami+git * gis
2634  bi=sqrt(1.-1./(gi*gi))
2635 ! Derivative of G0(Z) with regard to the average k
2636  phit0k=-dtilk*(1.-xcc/eqvl)/2.
2637  IF(phslip.NE.0.) THEN
2638  gic =cos(xcc*tilta2)
2639  gak1=dtilk*cos(phit0-pcrest)*gis/(phslip*phslip)
2640  gak2=sin(phit0-pcrest)*gis*(phit0k-phcrtk)/phslip
2641  gak3=dtilk*cos(phit0-pcrest)*xcc*gic/(2.*phslip*eqvl)
2642  gak =cgi * sqcttf* (-gak1-gak2+gak3)
2643  ELSE
2644  gak1=sin(phit0-pcrest)*gis*(phit0k-phcrtk)
2645  gak =-cgi * sqcttf* gak1
2646  ENDIF
2647  phit1=phit0+xcc*phslip/(2.*eqvl)
2648  phtz0=(xcc/eqvl-.5)*dtilk
2649  xint=(gi*gi+2.)/((gi*gi-1.)**2)
2650  xfk1=2.*gi*(1.-2.*(gi*gi+2.)/(gi*gi-1.))/((gi*gi-1.)**2)
2651  ha0=cos(phit1-pcrest)
2652  hb0=sin(phit1-pcrest)
2653 ! n=0
2654  yfs0=yfs0+t1(i)*ha0*ha0*xint
2655  yfskc0=yfskc0-t1(i)*ha0*ha0*xfk1*cgam10
2656  yfsk0=yfsk0+t1(i)*ha0*ha0*xfk1*gak
2657  yfsck0=yfsck0-2.*t1(i)*ha0*hb0*xint*(phtz0-phcrtk)
2658 ! n=1
2659  yfs1=yfs1+t1(i)*ha0*ha0*xint*xcc
2660  yfskc1=yfskc1-t1(i)*ha0*ha0*xfk1*cgam10*xcc
2661  yfsk1=yfsk1+t1(i)*ha0*ha0*xfk1*gak*xcc
2662  yfsck1=yfsck1-2.*t1(i)*ha0*hb0*xint*(phtz0-phcrtk)*xcc
2663 ! n=2
2664  yfs2=yfs2+t1(i)*ha0*ha0*xint*xcc*xcc
2665  yfskc2=yfskc2-t1(i)*ha0*ha0*xfk1*cgam10*xcc*xcc
2666  yfsk2=yfsk2+t1(i)*ha0*ha0*xfk1*gak*xcc*xcc
2667  yfsck2=yfsck2-2.*t1(i)*ha0*hb0*xint*(phtz0-phcrtk)*xcc*xcc
2668 ! Derivative of G0(Z) with regard to PH01
2669  IF(phslip.NE.0.) THEN
2670  gap = -cgi*sqcttf*sin(phit0-pcrest)*gis/phslip
2671  ELSE
2672  gap=sin(phit0-pcrest)*gis
2673  gap=-cgi*sqcttf*gap
2674  ENDIF
2675 ! n=0
2676  yfsp0=yfsp0+t1(i)*xfk1*gap*ha0*ha0
2677  yfscp0=yfscp0-2.*t1(i)*xint*ha0*hb0
2678 ! n=1
2679  yfsp1=yfsp1+t1(i)*xfk1*gap*ha0*ha0*xcc
2680  yfscp1=yfscp1-2.*t1(i)*xint*ha0*hb0*xcc
2681 ! n=2
2682  yfsp2=yfsp2+t1(i)*xfk1*gap*ha0*ha0*xcc*xcc
2683  yfscp2=yfscp2-2.*t1(i)*xint*ha0*hb0*xcc*xcc
2684  enddo
2685 ! IST=IAST
2686  yfs0=yfs0/2. *eqvl
2687  yfs1=yfs1/2. *eqvl
2688  yfs2=yfs2/2. *eqvl
2689  yfskc0=yfskc0/2. *eqvl
2690  yfskc1=yfskc1/2. *eqvl
2691  yfskc2=yfskc2/2. *eqvl
2692  yfsk0=yfsk0/2. *eqvl
2693  yfsk1=yfsk1/2. *eqvl
2694  yfsk2=yfsk2/2. *eqvl
2695  yfsck0=yfsck0/2. *eqvl
2696  yfsck1=yfsck1/2. *eqvl
2697  yfsck2=yfsck2/2. *eqvl
2698  yfscp0=yfscp0/2. *eqvl
2699  yfscp1=yfscp1/2. *eqvl
2700  yfscp2=yfscp2/2. *eqvl
2701  yfsp0=yfsp0/2. *eqvl
2702  yfsp1=yfsp1/2. *eqvl
2703  yfsp2=yfsp2/2. *eqvl
2704  RETURN
2705  END
2706 
2711  SUBROUTINE xtypm(GAMI,SAPHI,QSC,DCG)
2712  implicit real(8) (a-h,o-z)
2713  COMMON /consta/ vl, pi, xmat, rpel, qst
2714  common/ttfc/tk,t1k,t2k,sk,s1k,s2k,fh
2715  common/bedycp/phslip,eqvl,asdl,peqvl,pavph,xkp1,xkp2,
2716  * aa,bb,cc,dd,ee,pcrest,sqcttf
2717  common/typm/ynsk0,ynsk1,ynsk2,ynsp0,ynsp1,ynsp2,
2718  x ynsk0c,ynsk1c,ynsk2c,
2719  x yns0,yns1,yns2
2720  common/gaus17/h1(17),t1(17)
2721  fh0=fh/vl
2722  cgi=qsc/xmat
2723  dtilk=eqvl
2724  yns0=0.
2725  yns1=0.
2726  yns2=0.
2727  ynsk0c=0.
2728  ynsk1c=0.
2729  ynsk2c=0.
2730  ynsk0=0.
2731  ynsk1=0.
2732  ynsk2=0.
2733  ynsp0=0.
2734  ynsp1=0.
2735  ynsp2=0.
2736  gam2=gami**2
2737  beti=sqrt(1. - 1./gam2 )
2738  xk1=fh0/beti
2739  tilta2=phslip/(2.*eqvl)
2740  IF(phslip.NE.0.) desy=phslip/sin(phslip/2.)
2741  IF(phslip.EQ.0.) desy=2.
2742  cgam10=((gami*gami-1.)**1.5)/fh0
2743  phcrtk=(t1k*sk-s1k*tk)/(tk*tk+sk*sk)
2744  do i=1,17
2745  xcc= eqvl*(1.+h1(i))/2.
2746  xcc1=xcc+asdl
2747  IF(xcc1.GT.dcg) EXIT
2748  phit0=saphi-phslip*(eqvl-xcc)/(2.*eqvl)+pavph
2749 ! Function GAMMA (Z)
2750  IF(phslip.NE.0.) THEN
2751  git=cgi * sqcttf*cos(phit0-pcrest)/phslip
2752  gis=sin(xcc*tilta2)
2753  ELSE
2754  git = cgi * sqcttf*cos(phit0-pcrest)
2755  gis = xcc/(2.*eqvl)
2756  ENDIF
2757  gi=gami+git * gis
2758  bi=sqrt(1.-1./(gi*gi))
2759 ! Derivative of G0(Z) with regard to the average k
2760  phit0k=-dtilk*(1.-xcc/eqvl)/2.
2761  IF(phslip.NE.0.) THEN
2762  gic =cos(xcc*tilta2)
2763  gak1=dtilk*cos(phit0-pcrest)*gis/(phslip*phslip)
2764  gak2=sin(phit0-pcrest)*gis*(phit0k-phcrtk)/phslip
2765  gak3=dtilk*cos(phit0-pcrest)*xcc*gic/(2.*phslip*eqvl)
2766  gak=cgi * sqcttf* (-gak1-gak2+gak3)
2767  ELSE
2768  gak1=sin(phit0-pcrest)*gis*(phit0k-phcrtk)
2769  gak =-cgi * sqcttf* gak1
2770  ENDIF
2771  xint=(gi*gi+2.)/((gi*gi-1.)**2)
2772  xnk1=2.*gi*(1.-2.*(gi*gi+2.)/(gi*gi-1.))/((gi*gi-1.)**2)
2773 ! n=0
2774  yns0=yns0+t1(i)*xint
2775  ynsk0c=ynsk0c-t1(i)*xnk1*cgam10
2776  ynsk0=ynsk0+t1(i)*xnk1*gak
2777 ! n=1
2778  yns1=yns1+t1(i)*xint*xcc
2779  ynsk1c=ynsk1c-t1(i)*xnk1*cgam10*xcc
2780  ynsk1=ynsk1+t1(i)*xnk1*gak*xcc
2781 ! n=2
2782  yns2=yns2+t1(i)*xint*xcc*xcc
2783  ynsk2c=ynsk2c-t1(i)*xnk1*cgam10*xcc*xcc
2784  ynsk2=ynsk2+t1(i)*xnk1*gak*xcc*xcc
2785 ! DERIVE G0(Z) RELATIF A PH01
2786  IF(phslip.NE.0.) THEN
2787  gap = -cgi*sqcttf*sin(phit0-pcrest)*gis/phslip
2788  ELSE
2789  gap=sin(phit0-pcrest)*gis
2790  gap=-cgi*sqcttf*gap
2791  ENDIF
2792  ynsp0=ynsp0+t1(i)*xnk1*gap
2793  ynsp1=ynsp1+t1(i)*xnk1*gap*xcc
2794  ynsp2=ynsp2+t1(i)*xnk1*gap*xcc*xcc
2795  enddo
2796  yns0=yns0/2. *eqvl
2797  yns1=yns1/2. *eqvl
2798  yns2=yns2/2. *eqvl
2799  ynsk0c=ynsk0c/2. *eqvl
2800  ynsk1c=ynsk1c/2. *eqvl
2801  ynsk2c=ynsk2c/2. *eqvl
2802  ynsk0=ynsk0/2. *eqvl
2803  ynsk1=ynsk1/2. *eqvl
2804  ynsk2=ynsk2/2. *eqvl
2805  ynsp0=ynsp0/2. *eqvl
2806  ynsp1=ynsp1/2. *eqvl
2807  ynsp2=ynsp2/2. *eqvl
2808  RETURN
2809  END
2810 
2815  FUNCTION gamci(PHI,PCRESI,GAMI,IST,QSC)
2816  implicit real(8) (a-h,o-z)
2817  COMMON /consta/ vl, pi, xmat, rpel, qst
2818  common/ttfc/tk,t1k,t2k,sk,s1k,s2k,fh
2819  common/bedycp/phslip,eqvl,asdl,peqvl,pavph,xkp1,xkp2,
2820  * aa,bb,cc,dd,ee,pcrest,sqcttf
2821  common/gaus17/h1(17),t1(17)
2822  gamci=0.
2823  IF(ist.GT.17) RETURN
2824  cgi=qsc/xmat
2825  tilta2=phslip/(2.*eqvl)
2826  i=ist
2827  xcc= eqvl*(1.+h1(i))/2.
2828  phit0=phi-phslip*(eqvl-xcc)/(2.*eqvl)
2829 ! Function GAMMA (Z)
2830  IF(phslip.NE.0.) THEN
2831  git = cgi * sqcttf*cos(phit0-pcresi)/phslip
2832  gis = sin(xcc*tilta2)
2833  ELSE
2834  git = cgi * sqcttf*cos(phit0-pcrest)
2835  gis = xcc/(2.*eqvl)
2836  ENDIF
2837  gamci=gami+git * gis
2838  RETURN
2839  END
2840 
2845  SUBROUTINE intga(npt,ireca)
2846  implicit real(8) (a-h,o-z)
2847  parameter(iptsz=100002)
2848  COMMON /consta/ vl, pi, xmat, rpel, qst
2849  common/ttfc/tk,t1k,t2k,sk,s1k,s2k,fh
2850  common/hermt/afxt(22),afyt(22),afzt(22)
2851  common/hermd/afxm(20),afym(20),afzm(20)
2852  common/hermr/afxr(20),afyr(20),afzr(20)
2853  common/hermrr/afxrr(20),afyrr(20),afzrr(20)
2854  common/sizr/xrms3,yrms3,zrms3,zcgr3
2855  common/degherm/nmaz,nmazr,nmaxy
2856  common/sizt/xrms,yrms,zrms
2857  common/sizp/xrms1,yrms1,zrms1,xrms2,yrms2,zrms2,imaxd
2858  common/elcg/xcgd,ycgd,zcgd,xcgr,ycgr,zcgr
2859  common/faisc/f(10,iptsz),imax,ngood
2860  common/intgrt/ex,ey,ez
2861  common/sc3/beamc,scdist,sce10,cplm,ect,apl,ichaes,iscsp
2862  common/part/xc(iptsz),yc(iptsz),zc(iptsz)
2863  common/twcst/epsilon
2864  common/ecor/const
2865  common/npart/imaxr
2866  common/macro/ratei
2867  LOGICAL ichaes
2868  dimension ui(6),wi(6)
2869  DATA (ui(j),j=1,6)/.033765,.169395,.380690,.619310,.830605,
2870  * .966234/
2871  DATA (wi(j),j=1,6)/.085662,.180381,.233957,.233957,.180381,
2872  * .085662/
2873 !
2874 ! Initialize some constants and variables
2875 ! freq. in MHz
2876  freq=fh*0.5e-06/pi
2877 ! qmpart=coul , xrms=meters
2878 ! ireca=0 : first ellipsoid over nmaxy terms
2879 ! ireca=4 : one ellipsoid over the first term
2880  xrmsc=0.
2881  yrmsc=0.
2882  zrmsc=0.
2883  xgc=0.
2884  ygc=0.
2885  zgc=0.
2886  if(ireca.eq.0.or.ireca.eq.4) then
2887  xrmsc=xrms1
2888  yrmsc=yrms1
2889  zrmsc=zrms1
2890  xgc=xcgd
2891  ygc=ycgd
2892  zgc=zcgd
2893  endif
2894 ! ireca=1 : second ellipsoid
2895  if(ireca.eq.1) then
2896  xrmsc=xrms2
2897  yrmsc=yrms2
2898  zrmsc=zrms2
2899  xgc=xcgr
2900  ygc=ycgr
2901  zgc=zcgr
2902  endif
2903 ! ireca=2 : third elllipsoid
2904  if(ireca.eq.2) then
2905  xrmsc=xrms3
2906  yrmsc=yrms3
2907  zrmsc=zrms3
2908  xgc=0.
2909  ygc=0.
2910  zgc=zcgr3
2911  endif
2912  qmpart=1.0e-09*beamc/(float(imax)*freq)
2913 !omment const=qmpart*xrmsc*yrmsc*zrmsc/(2.*epsilon)
2914  qmpart=qmpart*ratei
2915  const=qmpart/(2.*epsilon)
2916  dnorm=(xrmsc*yrmsc*zrmsc)**.333333333
2917  dsq=dnorm*dnorm
2918  xsq=(xc(npt)-xgc)*(xc(npt)-xgc)
2919  ysq=(yc(npt)-ygc)*(yc(npt)-ygc)
2920  zsq=(zc(npt)-zgc)*(zc(npt)-zgc)
2921  if(ireca.eq.0) zc1=zc(npt)-zgc
2922  if(ireca.eq.1) zc2=zc(npt)-zgc
2923  ex=0.
2924  if(ireca.eq.2) zc2=zc(npt)-zgc
2925  ey=0.
2926  ez=0.
2927 ! initialize integrals to 0.
2928 ! integrate all 3 components (x,y,z)
2929  DO j=1,6
2930  a1=xrmsc*xrmsc-dsq+dsq/ui(j)
2931  a2=yrmsc*yrmsc-dsq+dsq/ui(j)
2932  a3=zrmsc*zrmsc-dsq+dsq/ui(j)
2933  t1=xsq/a1
2934  t2=ysq/a2
2935  t3=zsq/a3
2936  txyz=sqrt(t1+t2+t3)
2937  ff1=drxyz(nmaxy,txyz,ireca)/(ui(j)*ui(j)*sqrt(a1*a2*a3))
2938  fxn=ff1/a1
2939  fyn=ff1/a2
2940  fzn=ff1/a3
2941  ex=ex+wi(j)*fxn*dsq
2942  ey=ey+wi(j)*fyn*dsq
2943  ez=ez+wi(j)*fzn*dsq
2944  ENDDO
2945 ! Field components are in Newton/Coulomb
2946  ex=ex*const*xc(npt)
2947  ey=ey*const*yc(npt)
2948  ez=ez*const*(zc(npt)-zgc)
2949  RETURN
2950  END
2951 
2956  SUBROUTINE sizcor(ect,xrms,yrms,zrms,imaxd)
2957  implicit real(8) (a-h,o-z)
2958  parameter(iptsz=100002)
2959  common/part/xc(iptsz),yc(iptsz),zc(iptsz)
2960  common/cgrms/xsum,ysum,zsum
2961  common/faisc/f(10,iptsz),imax,ngood
2962  imaxf=0
2963  imaxx=ngood
2964  xsum=0.
2965  ysum=0.
2966  zsum=0.
2967  xrmsp=xrms
2968  yrmsp=yrms
2969  zrmsp=zrms
2970  xsqsum=0.
2971  ysqsum=0.
2972  zsqsum=0.
2973  if(imaxd.gt.0) imaxx=imaxd
2974  do i=1,imaxx
2975  xcoup=abs(xc(i)/xrmsp)
2976  ycoup=abs(yc(i)/yrmsp)
2977  zcoup=abs(zc(i)/zrmsp)
2978  if(xcoup.le.ect.and.ycoup.le.ect.and.zcoup.le.ect) then
2979  xsum=xsum+xc(i)
2980  ysum=ysum+yc(i)
2981  zsum=zsum+zc(i)
2982  xsqsum=xsqsum+xc(i)*xc(i)
2983  ysqsum=ysqsum+yc(i)*yc(i)
2984  zsqsum=zsqsum+zc(i)*zc(i)
2985  imaxf=imaxf+1
2986  endif
2987  enddo
2988  xsum=xsum/imaxf
2989  ysum=ysum/imaxf
2990  zsum=zsum/imaxf
2991  xsqsum=xsqsum/imaxf
2992  ysqsum=ysqsum/imaxf
2993  zsqsum=zsqsum/imaxf
2994  xrms=sqrt(xsqsum-xsum*xsum)
2995  yrms=sqrt(ysqsum-ysum*ysum)
2996  zrms=sqrt(zsqsum-zsum*zsum)
2997  RETURN
2998  END
2999 
3003  SUBROUTINE sizrms(imaxd,xrms,yrms,zrms,zmin)
3004  implicit real(8) (a-h,o-z)
3005  parameter(iptsz=100002)
3006  common/part/xc(iptsz),yc(iptsz),zc(iptsz)
3007  common/cgrms/xsum,ysum,zsum
3008  common/faisc/f(10,iptsz),imax,ngood
3009  imaxx=ngood
3010  xsum=0.
3011  ysum=0.
3012  zsum=0.
3013  if(imaxd.gt.0) then
3014  do i=1,imaxd
3015  zc(i)=zc(i)-zmin
3016  enddo
3017  imaxx=imaxd
3018  endif
3019  xsqsum=0.
3020  ysqsum=0.
3021  zsqsum=0.
3022  do i=1,imaxx
3023  xsum=xsum+xc(i)
3024  ysum=ysum+yc(i)
3025  zsum=zsum+zc(i)
3026  xsqsum=xsqsum+xc(i)*xc(i)
3027  ysqsum=ysqsum+yc(i)*yc(i)
3028  zsqsum=zsqsum+zc(i)*zc(i)
3029  enddo
3030  xsum=xsum/imaxx
3031  ysum=ysum/imaxx
3032  zsum=zsum/imaxx
3033  xsqsum=xsqsum/float(imaxx)
3034  ysqsum=ysqsum/float(imaxx)
3035  zsqsum=zsqsum/float(imaxx)
3036  xrms=sqrt(xsqsum-xsum*xsum)
3037  yrms=sqrt(ysqsum-ysum*ysum)
3038  zrms=sqrt(zsqsum-zsum*zsum)
3039  RETURN
3040  END
3041 
3045  FUNCTION snzt(CC,DD)
3046  implicit real(8) (a-h,o-z)
3047  common/degherm/nmaz,nmazr,nmaxy
3048  common/sizt/xrms,yrms,zrms
3049  common/sizp/xrms1,yrms1,zrms1,xrms2,yrms2,zrms2,imaxd
3050  common/gaus17/h1(17),t1(17)
3051  snzt=0.
3052  DO i=1,17
3053  z= (cc+dd)/2.+(dd-cc)*h1(i)/2.
3054  denz=densz(nmaz,z,0)
3055  IF(denz.LT.0.) denz=0.
3056  snzt=snzt+t1(i)*denz
3057  ENDDO
3058  snzt=snzt*(dd-cc)/2.
3059  RETURN
3060  END
3061 
3065  FUNCTION snzd(cc,dd)
3066  implicit real(8) (a-h,o-z)
3067  common/degherm/nmaz,nmazr,nmaxy
3068  common/sizt/xrms,yrms,zrms
3069  common/sizp/xrms1,yrms1,zrms1,xrms2,yrms2,zrms2,imaxd
3070  common/gaus17/h1(17),t1(17)
3071  snzd=0.
3072  DO i=1,17
3073  z= (cc+dd)/2.+(dd-cc)*h1(i)/2.
3074  denz=densz(nmaz,z,0)
3075  IF(denz.LT.0.) EXIT
3076  zz=(z-cc)
3077  snzd=snzd+t1(i)*denz
3078  ENDDO
3079  snzd=snzd*(dd-cc)
3080  RETURN
3081  END
3082 
3086  FUNCTION vaprz(CC,DD)
3087  implicit real(8) (a-h,o-z)
3088  common/degherm/nmaz,nmazr,nmaxy
3089  common/sizt/xrms,yrms,zrms
3090  common/sizp/xrms1,yrms1,zrms1,xrms2,yrms2,zrms2,imaxd
3091  common/gaus17/h1(17),t1(17)
3092  vaprz=0.
3093  var1=0.
3094  var2=0.
3095  DO i=1,17
3096  z= (cc+dd)/2.+(dd-cc)*h1(i)/2.
3097  denz=densz(nmaz,z,0)
3098  IF(denz.LT.0.) EXIT
3099  zz=(z-cc)
3100  var1=var1+t1(i)*zz*zz*denz
3101  var2=var2+t1(i)*denz
3102  ENDDO
3103  vaprz=var1/var2
3104  RETURN
3105  END
3106 
3110  FUNCTION prinz(CC,DD,KAP,ZRMSS1)
3111  implicit real(8) (a-h,o-z)
3112  common/degherm/nmaz,nmazr,nmaxy
3113  common/sizt/xrms,yrms,zrms
3114  common/sizp/xrms1,yrms1,zrms1,xrms2,yrms2,zrms2,imaxd
3115  common/gaus17/h1(17),t1(17)
3116  prinz=0.
3117  k=kap-1
3118  DO i=1,17
3119  denz=0.
3120  z= (cc+dd)/2.+(dd-cc)*h1(i)/2.
3121  denz=densz(nmaz,z,0)
3122  IF(denz.LT.0.) EXIT
3123  zz=(z-cc)/zrmss1
3124  prinz=prinz+t1(i)*herm(2*k,zz)*denz
3125  ENDDO
3126  prinz=prinz*(dd-cc)/2.
3127  RETURN
3128  END
3129 
3134  SUBROUTINE rchsom(ZI,ZF,NMAZ)
3135  implicit real(8) (a-h,o-z)
3136  xpz=abs((zf-zi))/400.
3137  DO
3138  ztest=abs(zf-zi)
3139  IF(ztest.LE.xpz) EXIT
3140  z1=(zf+zi)/2.
3141  z2=(z1+zi)/2.
3142  t1=densz(nmaz,z1,0)
3143  t2=densz(nmaz,z2,0)
3144 ! new interval: Z2,ZF
3145  IF(t1.GT.t2) zi=z2
3146 ! new interval : ZI,Z1
3147  IF(t1.LT.t2) zf=z1
3148  ENDDO
3149  RETURN
3150  END
3151 
3156  SUBROUTINE rchsor(AA,BB,CC,DD,ZS)
3157  implicit real(8) (a-h,o-z)
3158  zi=aa
3159  zf=cc
3160  xpz=abs((zf-zi))/400.
3161  DO
3162  ztest=abs(zf-zi)
3163  IF(ztest.LE.xpz) EXIT
3164  z1=(zf+zi)/2.
3165  z2=(z1+zi)/2.
3166  t1=dendif(z1,aa,bb,cc,dd)
3167  t2=dendif(z2,aa,bb,cc,dd)
3168 ! NEW INTERVAL : Z2,ZF
3169  IF(t1.GT.t2) zi=z2
3170 ! NEW INTERVAL : ZI,Z1
3171  IF(t1.LT.t2) zf=z1
3172  ENDDO
3173  zs=(zi+zf)/2.
3174  RETURN
3175  END
3176 
3180  FUNCTION herm(M,X)
3181  implicit real(8) (a-h,o-z)
3182  dimension he(30)
3183  IF(m.EQ.0) THEN
3184  herm=1.
3185  RETURN
3186  ENDIF
3187  IF(m.EQ.1) THEN
3188  herm=x
3189  RETURN
3190  ENDIF
3191  he(1)=1.
3192  he(2)=x
3193  m1=m-1
3194  DO k=1,m1
3195  he(k+2)=x*he(k+1)-float(k)*he(k)
3196  ENDDO
3197  herm=he(m+1)
3198  RETURN
3199  END
3200 
3205  FUNCTION densz(M,Z,IRECA)
3206  implicit real(8) (a-h,o-z)
3207  common/hermt/afxt(22),afyt(22),afzt(22)
3208  common/hermd/afxm(20),afym(20),afzm(20)
3209  common/hermr/afxr(20),afyr(20),afzr(20)
3210  densz=0.
3211  DO k=1,m
3212  kap=k-1
3213  IF(ireca.EQ.0)
3214  x densz=densz+exp(-z*z/2.)*afzt(k)*herm(kap,z)
3215  IF(ireca.EQ.2)
3216  x densz=densz+exp(-z*z/2.)*afzm(k)*herm(2*kap,z)
3217  IF(ireca.EQ.3)
3218  x densz=densz+exp(-z*z/2.)*afzr(k)*herm(2*kap,z)
3219  ENDDO
3220  RETURN
3221  END
3222 
3226  FUNCTION codsy(BB,CC,DD,EE,KAP)
3227  implicit real(8) (a-h,o-z)
3228  common/degherm/nmaz,nmazr,nmaxy
3229  common/sizt/xrms,yrms,zrms
3230  common/sizp/xrms1,yrms1,zrms1,xrms2,yrms2,zrms2,imaxd
3231  common/gaus13/h(13),t(13)
3232  codsy=0.
3233  k=kap-1
3234  ff=2.*ee-cc
3235  DO i=1,13
3236  dendifr=0.
3237  z= (cc+ff)/2.+(cc-ff)*t(i)/2.
3238  IF(z.GE.ff.AND.z.LT.ee) THEN
3239  zs=2.*ee-z
3240  z1=dd+bb-zs
3241  IF(zs.LT.bb) dendifr=densz(nmaz,zs,0)
3242  IF(zs.GE.bb)
3243  x dendifr=densz(nmaz,zs,0)-densz(nmaz,z1,0)
3244  ENDIF
3245  IF(z.GE.ee) THEN
3246  IF(z.LT.bb) dendifr=densz(nmaz,z,0)
3247  z1=dd+bb-z
3248  IF(z.GE.bb)
3249  x dendifr=densz(nmaz,z,0)-densz(nmaz,z1,0)
3250  ENDIF
3251  IF(dendifr.LT.0.) dendifr=0.
3252  zz=z-ee
3253 ! ZRMS2(EFFECTIF)=ZRMS2(CALCULE)*ZRMS
3254  zz=zz/zrms2
3255  codsy=codsy+h(i)*herm(2*k,zz)*dendifr
3256  ENDDO
3257  codsy=codsy*(cc-ff)/2.
3258  RETURN
3259  END
3260 
3264  FUNCTION codif(BB,CC,DD,EE,EE1,KAP)
3265  implicit real(8) (a-h,o-z)
3266  common/degherm/nmaz,nmazr,nmaxy
3267  common/sizt/xrms,yrms,zrms
3268  common/sizp/xrms1,yrms1,zrms1,xrms2,yrms2,zrms2,imaxd
3269  common/sizr/xrms3,yrms3,zrms3,zcgr3
3270  common/gaus13/h(13),t(13)
3271  codif=0.
3272  k=kap-1
3273  ff=2.*ee1-ee
3274  ff1=2.*ee-cc
3275  dendifr=0.
3276  DO i=1,13
3277  z=(ee+ff)/2.+(ee-ff)*t(i)/2.
3278  IF(z.LE.ff1) dendifr=densz(nmaz,z,0)
3279  IF(z .GE.ff1) THEN
3280  zs=2.*ee-z
3281  z1=dd+bb-zs
3282  IF(zs.LT.bb) dendifr=densz(nmaz,zs,0)
3283  IF(zs.GE.bb)
3284  x dendifr=densz(nmaz,zs,0)-densz(nmaz,z1,0)
3285  dendifr=densz(nmaz,z,0)-dendifr
3286  endif
3287  IF(z.Gt.0.) dendifr=0.
3288  IF(dendifr.LT.0.) dendifr=0.
3289  zz=z-ee1
3290 ! ZRMS2(EFFECTIF)=ZRMS2(CALCULE)*ZRMS
3291  zz=zz/zrms3
3292  codif=codif+h(i)*herm(2*k,zz)*dendifr
3293  ENDDO
3294  codif=-codif*ff/2.
3295  RETURN
3296  END
3297 
3301  FUNCTION varia(BB,CC,DD,EE)
3302  implicit real(8) (a-h,o-z)
3303  common/degherm/nmaz,nmazr,nmaxy
3304  common/sizt/xrms,yrms,zrms
3305  common/sizp/xrms1,yrms1,zrms1,xrms2,yrms2,zrms2,imaxd
3306  common/gaus13/h(13),t(13)
3307  varia=0.
3308  codi1=0.
3309  codi2=0.
3310  ff=2.*ee-cc
3311  DO i=1,13
3312  dendifr=0.
3313  z= (cc+ff)/2.+(cc-ff)*t(i)/2.
3314  IF(z.GE.ff.AND.z.LT.ee) THEN
3315  zs=2.*ee-z
3316  z1=dd+bb-zs
3317  IF(zs.LT.bb) dendifr=densz(nmaz,zs,0)
3318  IF(zs.GE.bb)
3319  x dendifr=densz(nmaz,zs,0)-densz(nmaz,z1,0)
3320  ENDIF
3321  IF(z.GE.ee) THEN
3322  IF(z.LT.bb) dendifr=densz(nmaz,z,0)
3323  z1=dd+bb-z
3324  IF(z.GE.bb)
3325  x dendifr=densz(nmaz,z,0)-densz(nmaz,z1,0)
3326  ENDIF
3327  zz=z-ee
3328  IF(dendifr.LT.0.) dendifr=0.
3329  codi1=codi1+h(i)*zz*zz*dendifr
3330  codi2=codi2+h(i)*dendifr
3331  ENDDO
3332  varia=codi1/codi2
3333  RETURN
3334  END
3335 
3339  FUNCTION variz(BB,CC,DD,EE,EE1)
3340  implicit real(8) (a-h,o-z)
3341  common/degherm/nmaz,nmazr,nmaxy
3342  common/sizt/xrms,yrms,zrms
3343  common/sizp/xrms1,yrms1,zrms1,xrms2,yrms2,zrms2,imaxd
3344  common/gaus13/h(13),t(13)
3345  variz=0.
3346  codi1=0.
3347  codi2=0.
3348  ff=2.*ee1-ee
3349  ff1=2.*ee-cc
3350  DO i=1,13
3351  dendifr=0.
3352  z= (ee+ff)/2.+(ee-ff)*t(i)/2.
3353  IF(z.LE.ff1) dendifr=densz(nmaz,z,0)
3354  IF(z .GE.ff1) THEN
3355  zs=2.*ee-z
3356  z1=dd+bb-zs
3357  IF(zs.LT.bb) dendifr=densz(nmaz,zs,0)
3358  IF(zs.GE.bb)
3359  x dendifr=densz(nmaz,zs,0)-densz(nmaz,z1,0)
3360  dendifr=densz(nmaz,z,0)-dendifr
3361  endif
3362  IF(z.Gt.ee) dendifr=0.
3363  IF(dendifr.LT.0.) dendifr=0.
3364  zz=z-ee1
3365  codi1=codi1+h(i)*zz*zz*dendifr
3366  codi2=codi2+h(i)*dendifr
3367  ENDDO
3368  variz=codi1/codi2
3369  RETURN
3370  END
3371 
3375  FUNCTION grz(AA,BB,CC,DD,EE)
3376  implicit real(8) (a-h,o-z)
3377  common/degherm/nmaz,nmazr,nmaxy
3378  common/sizt/xrms,yrms,zrms
3379  common/sizp/xrms1,yrms1,zrms1,xrms2,yrms2,zrms2,imaxd
3380  common/gaus13/h(13),t(13)
3381  grz=0.
3382  gz=0.
3383  gs=0.
3384  DO i=1,13
3385  z= (ee+aa)/2.+(ee-aa)*t(i)/2.
3386  dif=dendir(z,aa,bb,cc,dd,ee)
3387  if(dif.lt.0.)dif=0.
3388  gz=gz+h(i)*z*dif
3389  gs=gs+h(i)*dif
3390  ENDDO
3391  IF(gs.LE.0.) grz=0.
3392  IF(gs.GT.0.) grz=gz/gs
3393  RETURN
3394  END
3395 
3400  FUNCTION dendir(Z,AA,BB,CC,DD,EE)
3401  implicit real(8) (a-h,o-z)
3402  common/degherm/nmaz,nmazr,nmaxy
3403  dendir=0.
3404  ff=2.*ee-cc
3405  IF(z.LT.aa)dendir=0.
3406  IF(z.GE.aa.AND.z.LT.ff) dendir=densz(nmaz,z,0)
3407  IF(z.GE.ff.AND.z.LT.ee) THEN
3408  zs=2.*ee-z
3409  z1=dd+bb-zs
3410  dendifr=0.
3411  IF(zs.LT.bb) dendifr=densz(nmaz,zs,0)
3412  IF(zs.GE.bb)
3413  x dendifr=densz(nmaz,zs,0)-densz(nmaz,z1,0)
3414  dendir=densz(nmaz,z,0)-dendifr
3415  ENDIF
3416  IF(z.GE.ee) dendir=0.
3417  RETURN
3418  END
3419 
3424  FUNCTION dendif(Z,AA,BB,CC,DD)
3425  implicit real(8) (a-h,o-z)
3426  common/degherm/nmaz,nmazr,nmaxy
3427  dendif=0.
3428  IF(z.LT.aa)dendif=0.
3429  IF(z.GE.aa.AND.z.LT.bb) dendif=densz(nmaz,z,0)
3430  IF(z.GE.bb.AND.z.LT.cc) THEN
3431  z1=dd+bb-z
3432  dendif=densz(nmaz,z,0)-densz(nmaz,z1,0)
3433  ENDIF
3434  IF(z.GE.cc) dendif=0.
3435  RETURN
3436  END
3437 
3442  FUNCTION denpd(XYZ,NMAXY,NMAZ)
3443  implicit real(8) (a-h,o-z)
3444  denpd=(densx(nmaxy,xyz,1)+densy(nmaxy,xyz,1)+
3445  x densz(nmaz,xyz,2))/3.
3446  RETURN
3447  END
3448 
3456  FUNCTION drxyz(M,XYZ,IRECA)
3457  implicit real(8) (a-h,o-z)
3458  common/hermt/afxt(22),afyt(22),afzt(22)
3459  common/hermd/afxm(20),afym(20),afzm(20)
3460  common/hermr/afxr(20),afyr(20),afzr(20)
3461  common/sizp/xrms1,yrms1,zrms1,xrms2,yrms2,zrms2,imaxd
3462  common/hermrr/afxrr(20),afyrr(20),afzrr(20)
3463  common/sizr/xrms3,yrms3,zrms3,zcgr3
3464  COMMON /consta/ vl, pi, xmat, rpel, qst
3465  deriv1=0.
3466  deriv2=0.
3467  IF(abs(xyz).GT.13.) xyz=13.
3468  fe=exp(-xyz*xyz/2.)
3469  axyz=abs(xyz)
3470  msto=m
3471  DO k=2,m
3472  kap=k-1
3473  kah=2*kap-1
3474  IF(ireca.EQ.0) THEN
3475  dxxyz=fe*float(kap)*afxm(k)*hers(kah,axyz)
3476  dyxyz=fe*float(kap)*afym(k)*hers(kah,axyz)
3477  dzxyz=fe*float(kap)*afzm(k)*hers(kah,axyz)
3478  deriv1=deriv1+(dxxyz+dyxyz+dzxyz)
3479  ENDIF
3480  IF(ireca.EQ.1) THEN
3481  dxxyz=fe*float(kap)*afxr(k)*hers(kah,axyz)
3482  dyxyz=fe*float(kap)*afyr(k)*hers(kah,axyz)
3483  dzxyz=fe*float(kap)*afzr(k)*hers(kah,axyz)
3484  deriv1=deriv1+(dxxyz+dyxyz+dzxyz)
3485  ENDIF
3486  IF(ireca.EQ.2) THEN
3487  dxxyz=fe*float(kap)*afxrr(k)*hers(kah,axyz)
3488  dyxyz=fe*float(kap)*afyrr(k)*hers(kah,axyz)
3489  dzxyz=fe*float(kap)*afzrr(k)*hers(kah,axyz)
3490  deriv1=deriv1+(dxxyz+dyxyz+dzxyz)
3491  ENDIF
3492  ENDDO
3493  DO k=1,m
3494  kap=2*(k-1)
3495  IF(ireca.EQ.0) THEN
3496  dxxyz=-fe*afxm(k)*herm(kap,xyz)
3497  dyxyz=-fe*afym(k)*herm(kap,xyz)
3498  dzxyz=-fe*afzm(k)*herm(kap,xyz)
3499  deriv2=deriv2+.5*(dxxyz+dyxyz+dzxyz)
3500  ENDIF
3501  IF(ireca.EQ.1) THEN
3502  dxxyz=-fe*afxr(k)*herm(kap,xyz)
3503  dyxyz=-fe*afyr(k)*herm(kap,xyz)
3504  dzxyz=-fe*afzr(k)*herm(kap,xyz)
3505  deriv2=deriv2+.5*(dxxyz+dyxyz+dzxyz)
3506  ENDIF
3507  IF(ireca.EQ.2) THEN
3508  dxxyz=-fe*afxrr(k)*herm(kap,xyz)
3509  dyxyz=-fe*afyrr(k)*herm(kap,xyz)
3510  dzxyz=-fe*afzrr(k)*herm(kap,xyz)
3511  deriv2=deriv2+.5*(dxxyz+dyxyz+dzxyz)
3512  ENDIF
3513  ENDDO
3514  drxyz=-(deriv1+deriv2)/(3.*pi)
3515  m=msto
3516  RETURN
3517  END
3518 
3522  FUNCTION hers(M,X)
3523  implicit real(8) (a-h,o-z)
3524  dimension he(30)
3525  IF(m.EQ.1) THEN
3526  hers=1.
3527  RETURN
3528  ENDIF
3529  IF(m.EQ.3) THEN
3530  hers=x*x-3.
3531  RETURN
3532  ENDIF
3533  he(1)=1.
3534  he(2)=x*x-3.
3535  xm1=float((m+1)/2)+.01
3536  m1=int(xm1)-2
3537  DO k=1,m1
3538  he(k+2)=herm(2*(k+2)-2,abs(x))-float(2*(k+2)-2)*he(k+1)
3539  ENDDO
3540  hers=he(m1+2)
3541  RETURN
3542  END
3543 
3548  FUNCTION copdr(XI,XF,KAP)
3549  implicit real(8) (a-h,o-z)
3550  common/degherm/nmaz,nmazr,nmaxy
3551  common/gaus13/h(13),t(13)
3552  copdr=0.
3553  k=kap-1
3554  DO i=1,13
3555  z= (xi+xf)/2.+(xf-xi)*t(i)/2.
3556  dend=denrs(z)
3557  copdr=copdr+h(i)*herm(2*k,z)*dend
3558  ENDDO
3559  copdr=copdr*(xf-xi)/2.
3560  RETURN
3561  END
3562 
3567  FUNCTION densx(M,X,IRECA)
3568  implicit real(8) (a-h,o-z)
3569  common/hermt/afxt(22),afyt(22),afzt(22)
3570  common/hermd/afxm(20),afym(20),afzm(20)
3571  common/hermr/afxr(20),afyr(20),afzr(20)
3572  densx=0.
3573  DO k=1,m
3574  kap=k-1
3575  IF(ireca.EQ.0)
3576  x densx=densx+exp(-x*x/2.)*afxt(k)*herm(2*kap,abs(x))
3577  IF(ireca.EQ.1)
3578  x densx=densx+exp(-x*x/2.)*afxm(k)*herm(2*kap,abs(x))
3579  ENDDO
3580  RETURN
3581  END
3582 
3587  FUNCTION densy(M,Y,IRECA)
3588  implicit real(8) (a-h,o-z)
3589  common/hermt/afxt(22),afyt(22),afzt(22)
3590  common/hermd/afxm(20),afym(20),afzm(20)
3591  common/hermr/afxr(20),afyr(20),afzr(20)
3592  densy=0.
3593  DO k=1,m
3594  kap=k-1
3595  IF(ireca.EQ.0)
3596  x densy=densy+exp(-y*y/2.)*afyt(k)*herm(2*kap,abs(y))
3597  IF(ireca.EQ.1)
3598  x densy=densy+exp(-y*y/2.)*afym(k)*herm(2*kap,abs(y))
3599  ENDDO
3600  RETURN
3601  END
3602 
3608  FUNCTION denrs(XYZ)
3609  implicit real(8) (a-h,o-z)
3610  common/degherm/nmaz,nmazr,nmaxy
3611  sp1=(densx(nmaxy,xyz,0)+densy(nmaxy,xyz,0))/3.
3612  sp2=(densx(nmaxy,xyz,1)+densy(nmaxy,xyz,1))/3.
3613  denrs=sp1-sp2+densz(nmazr,xyz,3)/3.
3614  RETURN
3615  END
3616 
3621  FUNCTION scgx(XI,XF)
3622  implicit real(8) (a-h,o-z)
3623  common/degherm/nmaz,nmazr,nmaxy
3624  common/gaus13/h(13),t(13)
3625  cgx=0.
3626  cgxx=0.
3627  DO i=1,13
3628  x= (xi+xf)/2.+(xf-xi)*t(i)/2.
3629  dend=(densx(nmaxy,x,0)-densx(nmaxy,x,1))
3630  cgx=cgx+h(i)*dend
3631  cgxx=cgxx+h(i)*dend*x
3632  ENDDO
3633  cgx=cgx*(xf-xi)/2.
3634  cgxx=cgxx*(xf-xi)/2.
3635  scgx=cgxx/cgx
3636  RETURN
3637  END
3638 
3643  FUNCTION scgy(XI,XF)
3644  implicit real(8) (a-h,o-z)
3645  common/degherm/nmaz,nmazr,nmaxy
3646  common/gaus13/h(13),t(13)
3647  cgy=0.
3648  cgyy=0.
3649  DO i=1,13
3650  y=(xi+xf)/2.+(xf-xi)*t(i)/2.
3651  dend=(densy(nmaxy,y,0)-densy(nmaxy,y,1))
3652  cgy=cgy+h(i)*dend
3653  cgyy=cgyy+h(i)*dend*y
3654  ENDDO
3655  cgy=cgy*(xf-xi)/2.
3656  cgyy=cgyy*(xf-xi)/2.
3657  scgy=cgyy/cgy
3658  RETURN
3659  END
3660 
3665  FUNCTION corxy(XI,XF,KAP,IK,XYRMS)
3666  implicit real(8) (a-h,o-z)
3667  common/degherm/nmaz,nmazr,nmaxy
3668  common/gaus13/h(13),t(13)
3669  corxy=0.
3670  k=kap-1
3671  DO i=1,13
3672  z= (xi+xf)/2.+(xf-xi)*t(i)/2.
3673  IF(ik.EQ.0)
3674  x dend=densx(nmaxy,z,0)-densx(nmaxy,z,1)
3675  IF(ik.EQ.1)
3676  x dend=densy(nmaxy,z,0)-densy(nmaxy,z,1)
3677  IF(dend.LT.0.) dend=0.
3678  z=z/xyrms
3679  corxy=corxy+h(i)*herm(2*k,z)*dend
3680  ENDDO
3681  corxy=corxy*(xf-xi)/2.
3682  RETURN
3683  END
3684 
3690  FUNCTION varxy(XI,XF,IK)
3691  implicit real(8) (a-h,o-z)
3692  common/gaus13/h(13),t(13)
3693  common/degherm/nmaz,nmazr,nmaxy
3694  varxy=0.
3695  corxy1=0.
3696  corxy2=0.
3697  DO i=1,13
3698  z= (xi+xf)/2.+(xf-xi)*t(i)/2.
3699  IF(ik.EQ.0)
3700  x dend=densx(nmaxy,z,0)-densx(nmaxy,z,1)
3701  IF(ik.EQ.1)
3702  x dend=densy(nmaxy,z,0)-densy(nmaxy,z,1)
3703  corxy1=corxy1+h(i)*z*z*dend
3704  corxy2=corxy2+h(i)*dend
3705  ENDDO
3706  varxy=corxy1/corxy2
3707  RETURN
3708  END
3709 
3714  FUNCTION varzr(EE,CC,NMAZR)
3715  implicit real(8) (a-h,o-z)
3716  varzr=0.
3717  smt=densz(nmazr,0.0d0,3)/2.
3718  if(smt.gt.0.) then
3719  smte=smt/1000.
3720  v1=0.
3721  v2=cc-ee
3722  DO
3723  z1=(v1+v2)/2.
3724  spl=densz(nmazr,z1,3)
3725  IF(abs(spl-smt).GT.smte) THEN
3726  IF(spl.GT.smt) v1=z1
3727  IF(spl.LT.smt) v2=z1
3728  ENDIF
3729  IF(spl.EQ.smt) EXIT
3730  ENDDO
3731  varzr=2.*z1/2.36
3732  else
3733  varzr=0.
3734  endif
3735  RETURN
3736  END
3737 
3749  SUBROUTINE cdg(IDCH)
3750  implicit real(8) (a-h,o-z)
3751  parameter(iptsz=100002,maxcell1=3000)
3752  common/faisc/f(10,iptsz),imax,ngood
3753  common/etcha1/ichas(iptsz),chexmin(10),chexmax(10),chasit
3754  common/etcom/cog(8),exten(17),fd(iptsz)
3755  common/dyn/tref,vref
3756  LOGICAL chasit
3757  cog(1)=0.
3758  cog(3)=0.
3759  cog(4)=0.
3760  cog(5)=0.
3761  cog(6)=0.
3762  cog(7)=0.
3763  imaxf=0
3764  IF(idch.EQ.1) THEN
3765  chexmin(1)=f(2,1)
3766  chexmax(1)=f(2,1)
3767  chexmin(2)=f(4,1)
3768  chexmax(2)=f(4,1)
3769  chexmin(3)=f(6,1)
3770  chexmax(3)=f(6,1)
3771  chexmin(4)=f(7,1)
3772  chexmax(4)=f(7,1)
3773  ENDIF
3774  IF(idch.EQ.1.) THEN
3775  DO i=1,ngood
3776  IF(ichas(i).EQ.1) THEN
3777  if(f(2,i).lt.chexmin(1)) chexmin(1)=f(2,i)
3778  if(f(4,i).lt.chexmin(2)) chexmin(2)=f(4,i)
3779  if(f(6,i).lt.chexmin(3)) chexmin(3)=f(6,i)
3780  if(f(7,i).lt.chexmin(4)) chexmin(4)=f(7,i)
3781  if(f(2,i).gt.chexmax(1)) chexmax(1)=f(2,i)
3782  if(f(4,i).gt.chexmax(2)) chexmax(2)=f(4,i)
3783  if(f(6,i).gt.chexmax(3)) chexmax(3)=f(6,i)
3784  if(f(7,i).gt.chexmax(4)) chexmax(4)=f(7,i)
3785  cog(1)=cog(1)+f(7,i)
3786  cog(3)=cog(3)+f(6,i)
3787  cog(4)=cog(4)+f(2,i)
3788  cog(5)=cog(5)+f(3,i)
3789  cog(6)=cog(6)+f(4,i)
3790  cog(7)=cog(7)+f(5,i)
3791  imaxf=imaxf+1
3792  ENDIF
3793  ENDDO
3794  ELSE
3795  DO i=1,ngood
3796  cog(1)=cog(1)+f(7,i)
3797  cog(3)=cog(3)+f(6,i)
3798  cog(4)=cog(4)+f(2,i)
3799  cog(5)=cog(5)+f(3,i)
3800  cog(6)=cog(6)+f(4,i)
3801  cog(7)=cog(7)+f(5,i)
3802  imaxf=imaxf+1
3803  ENDDO
3804  ENDIF
3805  cog(1)=cog(1)/imaxf
3806  cog(3)=cog(3)/imaxf
3807  cog(4)=cog(4)/imaxf
3808  cog(5)=cog(5)/imaxf
3809  cog(6)=cog(6)/imaxf
3810  cog(7)=cog(7)/imaxf
3811  IF(ichas(i).EQ.1) THEN
3812  chexmin(1)=chexmin(1)-cog(4)
3813  chexmin(2)=chexmin(2)-cog(6)
3814  chexmin(3)=chexmin(3)-cog(3)
3815  chexmin(4)=chexmin(4)-cog(1)
3816  chexmax(1)=chexmax(1)-cog(4)
3817  chexmax(2)=chexmax(2)-cog(6)
3818  chexmax(3)=chexmax(3)-cog(3)
3819  chexmax(4)=chexmax(4)-cog(1)
3820  ENDIF
3821  return
3822  end
3823 
3854  SUBROUTINE ext2d(IDCH)
3855  implicit real(8) (a-h,o-z)
3856  parameter(iptsz=100002,maxcell1=3000)
3857  COMMON /consta/ vl, pi, xmat, rpel, qst
3858  common/ttfc/tk,t1k,t2k,sk,s1k,s2k,fh
3859  common/faisc/f(10,iptsz),imax,ngood
3860  common/qmoyen/qmoy
3861  common/dyn/tref,vref
3862  common/dyni/vrefi,trefi,fhinit,acpt
3863  common/etcom/cog(8),exten(17),fd(iptsz)
3864  common/etcha1/ichas(iptsz),chexmin(10),chexmax(10),chasit
3865  dimension ffd(iptsz)
3866  LOGICAL chasit,acpt
3867  exten(1)=0.
3868  exten(2)=0.
3869  exten(3)=0.
3870  exten(4)=0.
3871  exten(5)=0.
3872  exten(6)=0.
3873  exten(7)=0.
3874  exten(8)=0.
3875  exten(9)=0.
3876  exten(12)=0.
3877  exten(13)=0.
3878  exten(14)=0.
3879  exten(15)=0.
3880  exten(16)=0.
3881  exten(17)=0.
3882  qmoy=0.
3883 ! --- imaxf: particles keep in the bunch. With CHASE imaxf may be different from ngood(i.e. imaxf < ngood)
3884  imaxf=0
3885  gcog=cog(1)/xmat
3886  bcog=sqrt(1.-1./(gcog*gcog))
3887  if(acpt) then
3888  bref=vrefi/vl
3889  else
3890  bref=vref/vl
3891  endif
3892  gref=1./sqrt(1.-bref*bref)
3893  do i=1,ngood
3894  gpai=f(7,i)/xmat
3895  if(gpai.gt.1) then
3896  bpai=sqrt(1.-1./(gpai*gpai))
3897  else
3898  bpai=0.
3899  gpai=1.
3900  endif
3901  fd(i)=(gpai*bpai)/(gref*bref)
3902  ffd(i)=(gpai*bpai)/(gcog*bcog)
3903  enddo
3904  do i=1,ngood
3905  fdpp=fd(i)-1.
3906  ffdpp=ffd(i)-1.
3907  fdp=f(7,i)-cog(1)
3908  trph1=fh*(f(6,i)-cog(3))
3909  trxf=f(2,i)-cog(4)
3910  trtf=f(3,i)-cog(5)
3911  tryf=f(4,i)-cog(6)
3912  trpf=f(5,i)-cog(7)
3913 ! --- without CHASE
3914  IF(idch.NE.1) THEN
3915  exten(1)=exten(1)+fdp**2
3916  exten(2)=exten(2)+trph1*fdp
3917  exten(3)=exten(3)+trph1**2
3918  exten(4)=exten(4)+trxf**2
3919  exten(5)=exten(5)+trtf**2
3920  exten(6)=exten(6)+tryf**2
3921  exten(7)=exten(7)+trpf**2
3922  exten(8)=exten(8)+trxf*trtf
3923  exten(9)=exten(9)+tryf*trpf
3924  exten(12)=exten(12)+fdpp*trxf
3925  exten(13)=exten(13)+fdpp*tryf
3926  exten(14)=exten(14)+fdpp**2
3927  exten(15)=exten(15)+ffdpp*trxf
3928  exten(16)=exten(16)+ffdpp*tryf
3929  exten(17)=exten(17)+ffdpp**2
3930  qmoy=qmoy+f(9,i)
3931  imaxf=imaxf+1
3932  ELSEIF(idch.EQ.1.AND.ichas(i).EQ.1) THEN
3933 ! --- with CHASE
3934  exten(1)=exten(1)+fdp**2
3935  exten(2)=exten(2)+trph1*fdp
3936  exten(3)=exten(3)+trph1**2
3937  exten(4)=exten(4)+trxf**2
3938  exten(5)=exten(5)+trtf**2
3939  exten(6)=exten(6)+tryf**2
3940  exten(7)=exten(7)+trpf**2
3941  exten(8)=exten(8)+trxf*trtf
3942  exten(9)=exten(9)+tryf*trpf
3943  exten(12)=exten(12)+fdpp*trxf
3944  exten(13)=exten(13)+fdpp*tryf
3945  exten(14)=exten(14)+fdpp**2
3946  exten(15)=exten(15)+ffdpp*trxf
3947  exten(16)=exten(16)+ffdpp*tryf
3948  exten(17)=exten(17)+ffdpp**2
3949  qmoy=qmoy+f(9,i)
3950  imaxf=imaxf+1
3951  ENDIF
3952  enddo
3953  do i=1,9
3954  exten(i)=exten(i)/float(imaxf)
3955  enddo
3956  do i=12,17
3957  exten(i)=exten(i)/float(imaxf)
3958  enddo
3959  qmoy=qmoy/float(imaxf)
3960  return
3961  end
3962 
3995  SUBROUTINE ext2(IDCH)
3996  implicit real(8) (a-h,o-z)
3997  parameter(iptsz=100002,maxcell1=3000)
3998  COMMON /consta/ vl, pi, xmat, rpel, qst
3999  common/ttfc/tk,t1k,t2k,sk,s1k,s2k,fh
4000  common/faisc/f(10,iptsz),imax,ngood
4001  common/qmoyen/qmoy
4002  common/dyn/tref,vref
4003  common/dyni/vrefi,trefi,fhinit,acpt
4004  common/etcom/cog(8),exten(17),fd(iptsz)
4005  common/etcha1/ichas(iptsz),chexmin(10),chexmax(10),chasit
4006  dimension fdd(iptsz)
4007  LOGICAL chasit,acpt
4008 ! EXT2 looks for average extensions squared and returns them in exten(14)
4009  exten(1)=0.
4010  exten(2)=0.
4011  exten(3)=0.
4012  exten(4)=0.
4013  exten(5)=0.
4014  exten(6)=0.
4015  exten(7)=0.
4016  exten(8)=0.
4017  exten(9)=0.
4018  exten(10)=0.
4019  exten(11)=0.
4020  exten(12)=0.
4021  exten(13)=0.
4022  exten(14)=0.
4023  exten(15)=0.
4024  exten(16)=0.
4025  exten(17)=0.
4026  qmoy=0.
4027  imaxf=0
4028  gcog=cog(1)/xmat
4029  bcog=sqrt(1.-1./(gcog*gcog))
4030  if(acpt) then
4031  bref=vrefi/vl
4032  else
4033  bref=vref/vl
4034  endif
4035  gref=1./sqrt(1.-bref*bref)
4036  do i=1,ngood
4037  gpai=f(7,i)/xmat
4038  if(gpai.gt.1) then
4039  bpai=sqrt(1.-1./(gpai*gpai))
4040  else
4041  bpai=0.
4042  gpai=1.
4043  endif
4044  fd(i)=(gpai*bpai)/(gcog*bcog)
4045  fdd(i)=(gpai*bpai)/(gref*bref)
4046  enddo
4047  do i=1,ngood
4048  fdp=fd(i)-1.
4049  fddp=fdd(i)-1.
4050  dener=f(7,i)-cog(1)
4051  trph1=fh*(f(6,i)-cog(3))
4052  trxf=f(2,i)-cog(4)
4053  trtf=f(3,i)-cog(5)
4054  tryf=f(4,i)-cog(6)
4055  trpf=f(5,i)-cog(7)
4056  IF(idch.EQ.1.AND.ichas(i).EQ.1) THEN
4057  exten(1)=exten(1)+fdp**2
4058  exten(2)=exten(2)+trph1*fdp
4059  exten(3)=exten(3)+trph1**2
4060  exten(4)=exten(4)+trxf**2
4061  exten(5)=exten(5)+trtf**2
4062  exten(6)=exten(6)+tryf**2
4063  exten(7)=exten(7)+trpf**2
4064  exten(8)=exten(8)+trxf*trtf
4065  exten(9)=exten(9)+tryf*trpf
4066  exten(10)=exten(10)+dener*dener
4067  exten(11)=exten(11)+dener*trph1
4068  exten(12)=exten(12)+fddp*trxf
4069  exten(13)=exten(13)+fddp*tryf
4070  exten(14)=exten(14)+fddp**2
4071  exten(15)=exten(15)+fdp*trxf
4072  exten(16)=exten(16)+fdp*tryf
4073  exten(17)=exten(17)+fdp**2
4074  qmoy=qmoy+f(9,i)
4075  imaxf=imaxf+1
4076  ENDIF
4077  IF(idch.NE.1) THEN
4078  exten(1)=exten(1)+fdp**2
4079  exten(2)=exten(2)+trph1*fdp
4080  exten(3)=exten(3)+trph1**2
4081  exten(4)=exten(4)+trxf**2
4082  exten(5)=exten(5)+trtf**2
4083  exten(6)=exten(6)+tryf**2
4084  exten(7)=exten(7)+trpf**2
4085  exten(8)=exten(8)+trxf*trtf
4086  exten(9)=exten(9)+tryf*trpf
4087  exten(10)=exten(10)+dener*dener
4088  exten(11)=exten(11)+dener*trph1
4089  exten(12)=exten(12)+fddp*trxf
4090  exten(13)=exten(13)+fddp*tryf
4091  exten(14)=exten(14)+fddp**2
4092  exten(15)=exten(15)+fdp*trxf
4093  exten(16)=exten(16)+fdp*tryf
4094  exten(17)=exten(17)+fdp**2
4095  qmoy=qmoy+f(9,i)
4096  imaxf=imaxf+1
4097  ENDIF
4098  enddo
4099  do i=1,17
4100  exten(i)=exten(i)/float(imaxf)
4101  enddo
4102  qmoy=qmoy/float(imaxf)
4103  return
4104  end
4105 
4113  SUBROUTINE chrefe
4114  implicit real(8) (a-h,o-z)
4115  parameter(iptsz=100002)
4116  COMMON /consta/ vl, pi, xmat, rpel, qst
4117  common/faisc/f(10,iptsz),imax,ngood
4118  common/qmoyen/qmoy
4119  common/tapes/in,ifile,meta
4120  READ(in,*)xc,yc,a
4121  a=a*pi/180.
4122  WRITE(16,100)xc,yc,a
4123  do i=1,ngood
4124  x=f(2,i)
4125  xp=f(3,i)*0.001
4126  yp=f(5,i)*0.001
4127  y=f(4,i)
4128  x0=x
4129  x=((x-yc)*cos(xp)+xc*sin(xp))/cos(xp-a)
4130  xp=xp-a
4131  xl=xc-x*sin(a)
4132  yl=yc-x0+x*cos(a)
4133  dl=sqrt(xl*xl+yl*yl)
4134  dl=sign(dl,xl)
4135  y=y+dl*tan(yp)
4136  f(2,i)=x
4137  f(3,i)=xp*1000.
4138  f(4,i)=y
4139  f(5,i)=yp*1000.
4140  enddo
4141  100 FORMAT(' New reference frame XC =',f6.2,' CM , YC =',
4142  * f6.2,' CM , A =',f6.4,' RADIAN',///)
4143  return
4144  end
4145 
4156  SUBROUTINE etac
4157  implicit real(8) (a-h,o-z)
4158  parameter(iptsz=100002)
4159  COMMON /consta/ vl, pi, xmat, rpel, qst
4160  common/faisc/f(10,iptsz),imax,ngood
4161  common/qmoyen/qmoy
4162  common/tapes/in,ifile,meta
4163  common/mcs/imcs,ncstat,cstat(20)
4164  common/paths/dpath
4165  character*(256) dpath
4166  dimension charge(20),pcent(20),charm(20),pc(20),eoff(20),vecx(1)
4167 ! dimension foo(20,9),NDP(20)
4168  character myfile*256
4169  READ(in,*) ncstat
4170  n=ncstat
4171  IF (n.GT.20) THEN
4172  WRITE (16,140) n
4173  stop
4174  ENDIF
4175  imcs=1
4176  IF(n.EQ.0) then
4177 ! read charge state distribution from file
4178  myfile=''
4179  READ(in,'(A)') myfile
4180  lpath=len_trim(dpath)
4181  lfile=len_trim(myfile)
4182  myfile(lpath+1:lpath+lfile)=myfile(1:lfile)
4183  myfile(1:lpath)=dpath(1:lpath)
4184  myfile=trim(myfile)
4185  write(16,*) 'Charge state distribution file: ',myfile
4186  open(56,file=myfile,status='unknown')
4187  read(56,*) ntot
4188  write(16,*) 'Maximum number of particles:',imax
4189  write(16,*) 'Number of good particles:',ngood
4190  write(16,*) 'Number of particles in charge state file:',ntot
4191  IF(ntot.lt.ngood) then
4192  write(16,*) 'Not enough particles in charge state file'
4193  stop
4194  ENDIF
4195  DO j=1,ntot
4196  read(56,*) chstate
4197  f(9,i)=chstate
4198  enddo
4199  close(56)
4200  ELSE
4201 ! generate charge state distribution
4202  pourc=0.
4203  DO i=1,n
4204 ! for each charge state read charge, percentage and energy offset
4205  READ(in,*) charm(i),pc(i),eoff(i)
4206  cstat(i)=charm(i)
4207  pourc=pourc+pc(i)
4208  IF (pourc.GT.100.) THEN
4209  WRITE (16,100) i,pourc
4210  stop
4211  ENDIF
4212  enddo
4213  pourc=0.
4214  DO i=1,n
4215 ! WRITE(16,110) charm(I),PC(I),eoff(i)
4216  pourc=pourc+pc(i)
4217  enddo
4218  IF (pourc.NE.100.) THEN
4219  WRITE (16,120) pourc
4220  stop
4221  ENDIF
4222  j=1
4223  DO
4224  if(j.gt.n) exit
4225  ts=500.
4226  is=1
4227  do i=1,n
4228  if(ts.ge.charm(i)) then
4229  ts=charm(i)
4230  is=i
4231  endif
4232  enddo
4233  charge(j)=ts
4234  pcent(j)=pc(is)
4235  charm(is)=1000.
4236  j=j+1
4237  ENDDO
4238  write(16,*) '**********************'
4239 ! for each charge state write charge, percentage and energy offset
4240  jjj=0
4241  do i=1,n
4242  WRITE(16,110) charge(i),pcent(i),eoff(i)
4243  if(charge(i).eq.qst) jjj=1
4244  enddo
4245  len=1
4246 ! FIRST TRAJECTORY HAS CHARGE STATE AS DEFINED BY INPUT
4247  pcent(1)=pcent(1)/100.
4248  DO i=2,n
4249  pcent(i)=pcent(i-1)+pcent(i)/100.
4250  enddo
4251  DO i=1,imax
4252  call rlux(vecx,len)
4253  xarpha=vecx(1)
4254  IF (xarpha.LE.pcent(1)) THEN
4255  f(9,i)=charge(1)
4256  f(7,i)=f(7,i)+eoff(1)
4257  ELSE
4258  DO j=1,n-1
4259  IF (xarpha.GT.pcent(j) .AND. xarpha.LE.pcent(j+1))then
4260  f(7,i)=f(7,i)+eoff(j+1)
4261  f(9,i)=charge(j+1)
4262  ENDIF
4263  enddo
4264  ENDIF
4265  ENDDO
4266  ENDIF
4267 ! print energy, boro for each charge state
4268 ! 2016-04-17 ET code below eliminated: replaced by call to emiprt
4269 ! DO k=1,ncstat
4270 ! NDP(k)=0
4271 ! do j=2,7
4272 ! foo(k,j)=0.
4273 ! enddo
4274 ! ENDDO
4275 ! DO i=1,imax
4276 ! DO k=1,ncstat
4277 ! if(f(9,i).eq.cstat(k)) then
4278 ! NDP(k)=NDP(k)+1
4279 ! do j=2,7
4280 ! foo(k,j)=foo(k,j)+f(j,i)
4281 ! enddo
4282 ! endif
4283 ! ENDDO
4284 ! ENDDO
4285 ! DO k=1,ncstat
4286 ! do j=2,7
4287 ! foo(k,j)=foo(k,j)/float(NDP(k))
4288 ! enddo
4289 ! ENDDO
4290 ! DO k=1,ncstat
4291 ! gref=foo(k,7)/xmat
4292 ! bref=sqrt(1.-1./(gref*gref))
4293 ! xe=(gref-1.)*xmat
4294 ! magnetic rigidity
4295 ! bor=3.3356*xmat*bref*gref/cstat(k)
4296 ! write(16,*) ' Q: ',cstat(k),' COG : energy ',xe,
4297 ! * ' MeV momentum ',bor,' kG.cm'
4298 ! ENDDO
4299  call emiprt(0)
4300 100 FORMAT(3x,' WRONG PERCENTAGE IN CHARGE STATE DISTRIBUTION',/,
4301  * 4x,' CHARGE STATE ',i3,' PERCENTAGE ',e12.5)
4302 110 FORMAT(3x,' CHARGE STATE ',f6.1,' PERCENTAGE ',e12.5,' %',
4303  * 4x,' ENERGY OFFSET ',e12.5,' MeV')
4304 120 FORMAT(3x,' TOTAL PERCENTAGE OF ALL CHARGE STATES < 100 %',/,
4305  * 4x,' PERCENTAGE ',e12.5)
4306 140 FORMAT(3x,' NUMBER OF CHARGE STATES : ',i3,' GREATER THAN 20')
4307  RETURN
4308  END
4309 
4315  SUBROUTINE crest(betr,eqvl,xpos,bkcr,ffield)
4316  implicit real(8) (a-h,o-z)
4317  common/ttfc/tk,t1k,t2k,sk,s1k,s2k,fh
4318  common/func/a(200),ylg,atte,ncel,nharm
4319  COMMON /consta/ vl, pi, xmat, rpel, qst
4320  xlhe=ylg
4321  itr=0
4322  be1=betr
4323  be2=betr-8.333e-03*betr
4324  xleq=xlhe
4325  DO
4326  itr=itr+1
4327  xk1=fh/(vl*be1)
4328  xk2=fh/(vl*be2)
4329  t1=tta0(be1)*ffield
4330  s1=tsb0(be1)*ffield
4331  tp1=tta1(be1)*ffield
4332  sp1=tsb1(be1)*ffield
4333  t2=tta0(be2)*ffield
4334  s2=tsb0(be2)*ffield
4335  tp2=tta1(be2)*ffield
4336  sp2=tsb1(be2)*ffield
4337  dts=(t1*tp1+s1*sp1)/(t1*t1+s1*s1)
4338  a1k12=(t1*tp1+s1*sp1)/(t2*tp2+s2*sp2)
4339  a2k12=(t2*t2+s2*s2)/(t1*t1+s1*s1)
4340  ak12=a1k12*a2k12
4341  ak12=1./ak12
4342  bk12=(xk2-xk1)/(ak12-1.)
4343  bk12=bk12*dts
4344  desy=-4.*atan(dts*3.2/xleq)
4345 ! improve DESYNCHRONISATION
4346  epsrd=1.e-04
4347  IF(abs(desy).GE.epsrd) THEN
4348  til2=desy/2.
4349  DO iii=1,3
4350  ftil=til2/tan(til2)-1.-bk12
4351  dftil=-til2/(sin(til2)*sin(til2))+1./tan(til2)
4352  til2=til2-ftil/dftil
4353  ENDDO
4354  desy=til2*2.
4355  ENDIF
4356  IF(abs(desy).LT.epsrd) EXIT
4357 ! XPOS=(T1*SP1-S1*TP1)/(T1*T1+S1*S1)
4358 ! BKCR=SQRT(T1*T1+S1*S1)
4359 ! EQVL=XLEQ
4360 ! RETURN
4361 ! ENDIF
4362 ! calculates the equivalent length
4363  xleq=desy*(ak12-1.)/(xk2-xk1)
4364  deltk=desy/xleq
4365  xkcrt=xk1-deltk
4366  becrt=fh/(vl*xkcrt)
4367  be1=becrt
4368  be2=becrt-becrt/120.
4369  ENDDO
4370  xpos=(t1*sp1-s1*tp1)/(t1*t1+s1*s1)
4371  bkcr=sqrt(t1*t1+s1*s1)
4372  eqvl=xleq
4373  RETURN
4374  END
4375 
4388  SUBROUTINE gaus(r1,r2,z1,z2,opt,er,ez)
4389  implicit real(8) (a-h,o-z)
4390  dimension r(6),z(6),wr(6),wz(6),xx(3,3),wx(3,3)
4391  data ((xx(i,j),i=1,3),j=1,3)/.2113248654,0.0,0.0,
4392  1 .06943184420,
4393  1 .33000947820,0.0,.03376524290,.16939530680,.3806904070/
4394  data ((wx(i,j),i=1,3),j=1,3)/.50,0.0,0.0,.17392742260,
4395  1 .32607257740,
4396  1 0.0, .085662246190,.1803807865000,.2339569673000/
4397  cr=r2-r1
4398  cz=z2-z1
4399  ir=1
4400  jz=1
4401  m=1
4402  if (opt.ge.0.) then
4403 !---determine number of integration points
4404  rat=abs(cz/cr)
4405  l=0
4406  if (rat.lt.1.) then
4407  rat=1./rat
4408  l=1
4409  endif
4410  if (rat.gt.2.)m=2
4411  if (rat.gt.4.)m=3
4412  if (l.eq.0) jz=m
4413  if (l.eq.1) ir=m
4414  endif
4415  do i=1,ir
4416  k=2*i-1
4417  r(k)=r1+cr*xx(i,ir)
4418  r(k+1)=r2-cr*xx(i,ir)
4419  wr(k)=wx(i,ir)
4420  wr(k+1)=wx(i,ir)
4421  enddo
4422  do j=1,jz
4423  k=2*j-1
4424  z(k)=z1+cz*xx(j,jz)
4425  z(k+1)=z2-cz*xx(j,jz)
4426  wz(k)=wx(j,jz)
4427  wz(k+1)=wx(j,jz)
4428  enddo
4429  ser=0.
4430  sez=0.
4431  kr=2*ir
4432  kz=2*jz
4433  do i=1,kr
4434  do j=1,kz
4435  call flds(r(i),z(j),er1,ez1)
4436  ser=ser+wr(i)*wz(j)*er1*r(i)
4437  sez=sez+wr(i)*wz(j)*ez1*r(i)
4438  enddo
4439  enddo
4440  er=cr*cz*ser
4441  ez=cr*cz*sez
4442  return
4443  end
4444 
4450  SUBROUTINE flds(r,z,er,ez)
4451  implicit real(8) (a-h,o-z)
4452  common/fldcom/ rp, zp,pl,opt,nip
4453  r1=rp
4454  z1=zp
4455 ! **********************************
4456  d=z1-z
4457  c=(r1-r)**2
4458  b=(r1+r)**2
4459  a=4.0*r*r1/(b+d**2)
4460  call eint (a,ee,ek)
4461  er1=0.0
4462  a=sqrt(b+d**2)
4463  if (r1.ne.0.) then
4464  er1=(ek-(r**2-r1**2+d**2)*ee/(c+d**2))/(2.0*r1*a)
4465  endif
4466  ez1=d*ee/(a*(c+d**2))
4467  if (nip.ne.0) then
4468  do i=1,nip
4469  xi=i
4470  do j=1,2
4471  d=z1-(z+xi*pl)
4472  a=4.0*r*r1/(b+d**2)
4473  call eint (a,ee,ek)
4474  a=sqrt(b+d**2)
4475  if (r1.ne.0.) then
4476  er1=er1+(ek-(r**2-r1**2+d**2)*ee/(c+d**2))/(2.0*r1*a)
4477  endif
4478  ez1=ez1+d*ee/(a*(c+d**2))
4479  xi=-xi
4480  enddo
4481  enddo
4482  endif
4483  er=er1
4484  ez=ez1
4485  return
4486  end
4487 
4491  SUBROUTINE eint(a,ee,ek)
4492  implicit real(8) (a-h,o-z)
4493  b=1.0-a
4494  c=log(b)
4495  ee=1.0+b*(.4630106-0.2452740*c+b*(0.1077857-0.04125321*c))
4496  ek=1.38629436-.5*c+b*(0.1119697-0.1213486*c+
4497  * b*(.07253230-.028874721*c))
4498  return
4499  end
4500 
4504  SUBROUTINE tiltz(tilta)
4505  implicit real(8) (a-h,o-z)
4506  parameter(iptsz=100002)
4507  COMMON /consta/ vl, pi, xmat, rpel, qst
4508  common/faisc/f(10,iptsz),imax,ngood
4509  common/qmoyen/qmoy
4510  common/rigid/boro
4511  common/dyn/tref,vref
4512  common/tapes/in,ifile,meta
4513  common/etcom/cog(8),exten(17),fd(iptsz)
4514  WRITE(16,1)tilta
4515 1 FORMAT(' tilt in the plane (x,z) around the c.o.g',
4516  x ' ANGLE :',e12.5,' DEG',/)
4517  tilta=tilta*pi/180.
4518  tref=0.
4519  vref=0.
4520  DO i=1,imax
4521  gpai=f(7,i)/xmat
4522  vref=vref+vl*sqrt(1.-1./(gpai*gpai))
4523  tref=tref+f(6,i)
4524  enddo
4525  vref=vref/float(imax)
4526  tref=tref/float(imax)
4527  vref1=0.
4528  tref1=0.
4529  DO i=1,imax
4530  gpai=f(7,i)/xmat
4531  vpai=sqrt(1.-1./(gpai*gpai))*vl
4532  trot=(f(6,i)-tref)*cos(tilta)-sin(tilta)*f(2,i)/vpai
4533  xrot=(f(6,i)-tref)*sin(tilta)*vpai+cos(tilta)*f(2,i)
4534  f(6,i)=trot
4535  f(2,i)=xrot
4536  tref1=tref1+f(6,i)
4537  vref1=vref1+vpai
4538  ENDDO
4539  tref=tref1/float(imax)
4540  vref=vref1/float(imax)
4541  RETURN
4542  END
4543 
4550  SUBROUTINE tdens(m,ireca,iacc)
4551  implicit real(8) (a-h,o-z)
4552  common/hermt/afxt(22),afyt(22),afzt(22)
4553  common/hermd/afxm(20),afym(20),afzm(20)
4554  common/hermr/afxr(20),afyr(20),afzr(20)
4555  common/sizp/xrms1,yrms1,zrms1,xrms2,yrms2,zrms2,imaxd
4556  COMMON /consta/ vl, pi, xmat, rpel, qst
4557  iacc=0
4558  t=1.e-05
4559  dt=5.e-02
4560  fc=drxyz(m,t,ireca)
4561  f1=fc
4562  DO i=1,100
4563  t=t+dt
4564  fu=drxyz(m,t,ireca)
4565  if(fu.lt.fc) exit
4566  fc=fu
4567  ENDDO
4568  IF(abs(fc/f1).GT.1.2) iacc=1
4569  RETURN
4570  END
4571 
4589  SUBROUTINE schfdyn
4590  implicit real(8) (a-h,o-z)
4591  common/tapes/in,ifile,meta
4592  common/rcshef/sce(20)
4593  read(in,*) iread
4594  if(iread.eq.0) then
4595 ! standard SCHEFF parameters
4596  sce(2)=4.
4597  sce(3)=4.
4598  sce(4)=20
4599  sce(5)=40
4600  sce(6)=0
4601  sce(9)=0.
4602  sce(7)=0.
4603  else
4604 ! read SCHEFF parameters
4605  READ(in,*) sce(2),sce(3),sce(4),sce(5),sce(6),sce(7),sce(9)
4606  endif
4607  sce(3)=sce(3)*2.
4608  sce(8)=0.
4609  call schefini
4610  RETURN
4611  END
4612 
4618  SUBROUTINE intg3(npt)
4619  implicit real(8) (a-h,o-z)
4620  parameter(iptsz=100002)
4621  COMMON /consta/ vl, pi, xmat, rpel, qst
4622  common/ttfc/tk,t1k,t2k,sk,s1k,s2k,fh
4623  common/hermt/afxt(22),afyt(22),afzt(22)
4624  common/hermd/afxm(20),afym(20),afzm(20)
4625  common/hermr/afxr(20),afyr(20),afzr(20)
4626  common/hermrr/afxrr(20),afyrr(20),afzrr(20)
4627  common/sizr/xrms3,yrms3,zrms3,zcgr3
4628  common/degherm/nmaz,nmazr,nmaxy
4629  common/sizt/xrms,yrms,zrms
4630  common/sizzt/xrmsz,yrmsz,zrmsz
4631  common/elcg/xcgd,ycgd,zcgd,xcgr,ycgr,zcgr
4632  common/intgrt/ex,ey,ez
4633  common/faisc/f(10,iptsz),imax,ngood
4634  common/sc3/beamc,scdist,sce10,cplm,ect,apl,ichaes,iscsp
4635  LOGICAL ichaes
4636  common/part/xc(iptsz),yc(iptsz),zc(iptsz)
4637  common/twcst/epsilon
4638  common/ecor/const
4639  common/cgrms/xsum,ysum,zsum
4640  common/npart/imaxr
4641  dimension ui(6),wi(6)
4642  DATA (ui(j),j=1,6)/.033765,.169395,.380690,.619310,.830605,
4643  * .966234/
4644  DATA (wi(j),j=1,6)/.085662,.180381,.233957,.233957,.180381,
4645  * .085662/
4646 !
4647 ! Initialize some constants and variables
4648 ! freq. in MHz
4649  freq=fh*0.5e-06/pi
4650  xrmsc=xrmsz
4651  yrmsc=yrmsz
4652  zrmsc=zrmsz
4653  xgc=xsum
4654  ygc=ysum
4655  zgc=zsum
4656  qmpart=1.0e-09*beamc/(float(ngood)*freq)
4657 !omment const=qmpart*xrmsc*yrmsc*zrmsc/(2.*epsilon)
4658  const=qmpart/(2.*epsilon)
4659  dnorm=(xrmsc*yrmsc*zrmsc)**.333333333
4660  dsq=dnorm*dnorm
4661  xsq=(xc(npt)-xgc)*(xc(npt)-xgc)
4662  ysq=(yc(npt)-ygc)*(yc(npt)-ygc)
4663  zsq=(zc(npt)-zgc)*(zc(npt)-zgc)
4664  ex=0.
4665  ey=0.
4666  ez=0.
4667 ! initialize integrals to 0.
4668 ! integrate all 3 components (x,y,z)
4669  DO j=1,6
4670  a1=xrmsc*xrmsc-dsq+dsq/ui(j)
4671  a2=yrmsc*yrmsc-dsq+dsq/ui(j)
4672  a3=zrmsc*zrmsc-dsq+dsq/ui(j)
4673  t1=xsq/a1
4674  t2=ysq/a2
4675  t3=zsq/a3
4676  txyz=sqrt(t1+t2+t3)
4677  if(abs(txyz).gt.13.)txyz=13.
4678  ff1=exp(-txyz*txyz/2.)*afzt(1)
4679  ff1=ff1/(2.*pi)
4680  fxn=ff1/(ui(j)*ui(j)*sqrt(a1)*a1*sqrt(a2)*sqrt(a3))
4681  fyn=ff1/(ui(j)*ui(j)*sqrt(a1)*a2*sqrt(a2)*sqrt(a3))
4682  fzn=ff1/(ui(j)*ui(j)*sqrt(a1)*a3*sqrt(a2)*sqrt(a3))
4683  ex=ex+wi(j)*fxn*dsq
4684  ey=ey+wi(j)*fyn*dsq
4685  ez=ez+wi(j)*fzn*dsq
4686  ENDDO
4687 ! Field components are in Newton/Coulomb
4688  ex=ex*const*(xc(npt)-xgc)
4689  ey=ey*const*(yc(npt)-ygc)
4690  ez=ez*const*(zc(npt)-zgc)
4691  RETURN
4692  END
4693 
4697  SUBROUTINE compress(pib)
4698  implicit real(8) (a-h,o-z)
4699  parameter(iptsz=100002)
4700  COMMON /consta/ vl, pi, xmat, rpel, qst
4701  common/faisc/f(10,iptsz),imax,ngood
4702 ! COMMON/etcha1/ichas(iptsz),chexmin(10),chexmax(10),chasit
4703 ! common/sc3/beamc,scdist,sce10,cplm,ectt,apl,ichaes,iscsp
4704  common/ttfc/tk,t1k,t2k,sk,s1k,s2k,fh
4705 ! COMMON/DYN/TREF,VREF
4706 ! common/mcs/imcs,ncstat,cstat(20)
4707 ! common/tapes/in,ifile,meta
4708 ! common/etcha3/ichxyz(iptsz)
4709 ! common/rec/irec
4710 ! common/etcom/cog(8),exten(17),fd(iptsz)
4711 ! logical chasit
4712 ! Do so by shifting particles belonging to the same bunch outside the (+/-) pib window to
4713 ! inside the +/- pib window.
4714  pib=pib*pi/180
4715  do ite=1,3
4716 ! Find cog of bunch in time
4717  tcog=0.
4718  do i=1,ngood
4719  tcog=tcog+f(6,i)
4720  enddo
4721  tcog=tcog/float(ngood)
4722  write(16,58) tcog*fh*180./pi
4723 58 format(' cog phase before shifting particles: ',e13.7,' deg')
4724  do i=1,ngood
4725  drad=(f(6,i)-tcog)*fh
4726  if(drad.gt.pib) then
4727  f(6,i)=(f(6,i)-2.*pi/fh)
4728  endif
4729  if(drad.lt.-pib) then
4730  f(6,i)=(f(6,i)+2.*pi/fh)
4731  endif
4732  enddo
4733  enddo
4734 ! Find cog of bunch in time after shifting particles
4735  do i=1,ngood
4736  tcog=tcog+f(6,i)
4737  enddo
4738  tcog=tcog/float(ngood)
4739  write(16,59) tcog*fh*180./pi
4740 59 format(' cog phase after shifting particles : ',e13.7,' deg')
4741  return
4742  end
4743 
4747  SUBROUTINE prbeam(iflg,wfile,fromrfq)
4748  implicit real(8) (a-h,o-z)
4749  parameter(iptsz=100002,maxcell1=3000)
4750  COMMON /consta/ vl, pi, xmat, rpel, qst
4751  common/faisc/f(10,iptsz),imax,ngood
4752  common/etcha1/ichas(iptsz),chexmin(10),chexmax(10),chasit
4753  common/sc3/beamc,scdist,sce10,cplm,ectt,apl,ichaes,iscsp
4754  common/ttfc/tk,t1k,t2k,sk,s1k,s2k,fh
4755  common/dyn/tref,vref
4756  common/mcs/imcs,ncstat,cstat(20)
4757  common/tapes/in,ifile,meta
4758  common/etcha3/ichxyz(iptsz)
4759  common/rec/irec
4760  common/etcom/cog(8),exten(17),fd(iptsz)
4761  common/paths/dpath
4762  character*(256) dpath,myfile
4763  logical chasit,fromrfq
4764  character wfile*80
4765 ! PRINT OF PARTICLE COORDINATES
4766  myfile=''
4767  ecog=0.
4768  tcog=0.
4769  xav=0.
4770  xpav=0.
4771  yav=0.
4772  ypav=0.
4773 ! **********************************************
4774 ! cog of the bunch
4775  do i=1,ngood
4776  ecog=ecog+f(7,i)
4777  tcog=tcog+f(6,i)
4778  xav=xav+f(2,i)
4779  xpav=xpav+f(3,i)
4780  yav=yav+f(4,i)
4781  ypav=ypav+f(5,i)
4782  enddo
4783  ecog=ecog/float(ngood)
4784  tcog=tcog/float(ngood)
4785  xav=xav/float(ngood)
4786  xpav=xpav/float(ngood)
4787  yav=yav/float(ngood)
4788  ypav=ypav/float(ngood)
4789 ! write particle coordinates to files, phase in radian
4790  beref=vref/vl
4791  gamref=1./sqrt(1.-(beref*beref))
4792  enref=xmat*gamref
4793  myfile(1:80)=wfile
4794  lpath=len_trim(dpath)
4795  lfile=len_trim(myfile)
4796  myfile(lpath+1:lpath+lfile)=myfile(1:lfile)
4797  myfile(1:lpath)=dpath(1:lpath)
4798  myfile=trim(myfile)
4799  if(fromrfq) then
4800  nunit=57
4801  else
4802  nunit=58
4803  open(nunit,file=myfile,status='unknown')
4804  endif
4805  if(iflg.lt.100) then
4806  write(nunit,*) ngood,iflg, fh/(2000000.*pi)
4807  if(fromrfq) then
4808  else
4809  if (chasit) then
4810  write(60,*) ngood,iflg, fh/(2000000.*pi)
4811  write(61,*) ngood,iflg, fh/(2000000.*pi)
4812  endif
4813  endif
4814  else
4815  write(nunit,*) ngood,iflg, fh/(2000000.*pi),enref-xmat,
4816  * ecog-xmat
4817  if(fromrfq) then
4818  else
4819  if (chasit) then
4820  write(60,*) ngood,iflg, fh/(2000000.*pi),enref-xmat,
4821  * ecog-xmat
4822  write(61,*) ngood,iflg, fh/(2000000.*pi),enref-xmat,
4823  * ecog-xmat
4824  endif
4825  endif
4826  endif
4827  f2=0.
4828  f3=0.
4829  f4=0.
4830  f5=0.
4831  do i=1,ngood
4832  if(irec.eq.2) then
4833 ! coordinates relative to the reference
4834  eprt=f(7,i)-enref
4835  tprt=fh*(f(6,i)-tref)
4836  f2=f(2,i)
4837  f3=f(3,i)
4838  f4=f(4,i)
4839  f5=f(5,i)
4840  endif
4841  if(irec.eq.1) then
4842 ! absolute values for phase and energy
4843  eprt=f(7,i)-xmat
4844  tprt=fh*(f(6,i)-tcog)
4845 ! **********************************
4846  f2=f(2,i)
4847  f3=f(3,i)
4848  f4=f(4,i)
4849  f5=f(5,i)
4850  endif
4851  if(irec.eq.0) then
4852 ! values for phase and energy relative to the COG
4853  tprt=fh*(f(6,i)-tcog)
4854  eprt=f(7,i)-ecog
4855  f2=f(2,i)-xav
4856  f3=f(3,i)-xpav
4857  f4=f(4,i)-yav
4858  f5=f(5,i)-ypav
4859  endif
4860  if(iflg.eq.0 .or. iflg.eq.100)
4861  * write(nunit,100)f2,f3/1000.,f4,f5/1000.,tprt,eprt
4862  if(iflg.eq.1 .or. iflg.eq.101)
4863  * write(nunit,101)f2,f3/1000.,f4,f5/1000.,tprt,eprt,f(1,i)
4864  if(iflg.eq.2 .or. iflg.eq.102)
4865  * write(nunit,102)f2,f3/1000.,f4,f5/1000.,tprt,eprt,f(9,i)
4866  if(iflg.eq.3 .or. iflg.eq.103)
4867  * write(nunit,103)f2,f3/1000.,f4,f5/1000.,tprt,eprt,f(9,i),
4868  * f(1,i)
4869  if(iflg.eq.10 .or. iflg.eq.110)
4870  * write(nunit,100)f2,f3/1000.,f4,f5/1000.,1.e09*tprt/fh,eprt
4871  if(iflg.eq.11 .or. iflg.eq.111)
4872  * write(nunit,101)f2,f3/1000.,f4,f5/1000.,1.e09*tprt/fh,eprt,
4873  * f(1,i)
4874  if(iflg.eq.12 .or. iflg.eq.112)
4875  * write(nunit,102)f2,f3/1000.,f4,f5/1000.,1.e09*tprt/fh,eprt,
4876  * f(9,i)
4877  if(iflg.eq.13 .or. iflg.eq.113)
4878  * write(nunit,103)f2,f3/1000.,f4,f5/1000.,1.e09*tprt/fh,eprt,
4879  * f(9,i),f(1,i)
4880 ! ************** only with CHASE, write to file particles removed
4881  if(fromrfq) then
4882  else
4883  if (chasit) then
4884  if(ichxyz(i).eq.0) then
4885  if(iflg.eq.0 .or. iflg.eq.100)
4886  * write(60,100)f2,f3/1000.,f4,f5/1000.,tprt,eprt
4887  if(iflg.eq.10 .or. iflg.eq.110)
4888  * write(60,100)f2,f3/1000.,f4,f5/1000.,1.e09*tprt/fh,eprt
4889  if(iflg.eq.1 .or. iflg.eq.101)
4890  * write(60,101)f2,f3/1000.,f4,f5/1000.,tprt,eprt,f(1,i)
4891  if(iflg.eq.11 .or. iflg.eq.111)
4892  * write(60,102)f2,f3/1000.,f4,f5/1000.,1.e09*tprt/fh,eprt,
4893  * f(1,i)
4894  if(iflg.eq.2 .or. iflg.eq.102)
4895  * write(60,101)f2,f3/1000.,f4,f5/1000.,tprt,eprt,f(9,i)
4896  if(iflg.eq.12 .or. iflg.eq.112)
4897  * write(60,102)f2,f3/1000.,f4,f5/1000.,1.e09*tprt/fh,eprt,
4898  * f(9,i)
4899  endif
4900 ! ************** only with CHASE, write to file particles kept
4901  if(ichxyz(i).eq.1) then
4902  if(iflg.eq.0 .or. iflg.eq.100)
4903  * write(61,100)f2,f3/1000.,f4,f5/1000.,tprt,eprt
4904  if(iflg.eq.10 .or. iflg.eq.110)
4905  * write(61,100)f2,f3/1000.,f4,f5/1000.,1.e09*tprt/fh,eprt
4906  if(iflg.eq.1 .or. iflg.eq.101)
4907  * write(61,101)f2,f3/1000.,f4,f5/1000.,tprt,eprt,f(1,i)
4908  if(iflg.eq.11 .or. iflg.eq.111)
4909  * write(61,102)f2,f3/1000.,f4,f5/1000.,1.e09*tprt/fh,eprt,
4910  * f(1,i)
4911  if(iflg.eq.2 .or. iflg.eq.102)
4912  * write(61,101)f2,f3/1000.,f4,f5/1000.,tprt,eprt,f(9,i)
4913  if(iflg.eq.12 .or. iflg.eq.112)
4914  * write(61,102)f2,f3/1000.,f4,f5/1000.,1.e09*tprt/fh,eprt,
4915  * f(9,i)
4916  endif
4917  endif
4918  endif
4919  enddo
4920  if(fromrfq) then
4921  else
4922  close(nunit)
4923  endif
4924 100 format(6(e13.6,1x))
4925 101 format(7(e13.6,1x))
4926 102 format(7(e13.6,1x))
4927 103 format(8(e13.6,1x))
4928  return
4929  end
4930 
4935  SUBROUTINE gausse
4936  implicit real(8) (a-h,o-z)
4937  common/gauss1/absg(40),wg(40),igaus
4938  common/randu/ck(15),kmax
4939  dimension ui(40),u9(9),u10(10),u12(12)
4940  dimension w9(9),w10(10),w12(12)
4941 ! GAUSS n=9 de -1. a 1
4942  DATA (u9(j),j=1,9)/-.9681602,-.8360311,-.6133714,-.3242534,0.,
4943  1 .3242534,.6133714,.8360311,.9681602/
4944  data (w9(j),j=1,9)/.0812744,.1806482,.2606107,.3123471,.3302394,
4945  1 .3123471,.2606107,.1806482,.0812744/
4946 ! GAUSS n=10 de -1. a 1
4947  DATA (u10(j),j=1,10)/-.9739065,-.8650634,-.6794096,-.4333954,
4948  1 -.1488743,.1488743,.4333954,.6794096,.8650634,.9739065/
4949  data (w10(j),j=1,10)/.0666713,.1494513,.2190864,.2692667,
4950  1 .2955242,.2955242,.2692667,.2190864,.1494513,.0666713/
4951 ! GAUSS n=12 de -1. a 1
4952  DATA (u12(j),j=1,12)/-.9815606,-.9041173,-.7699027,-.5873180,
4953  1 -.3678315,-.1252334,.1252334,.3678315,.5873180,.7699027,
4954  2 .9041173,.9815606/
4955  data (w12(j),j=1,12)/.0471753,.1069393,.1600783,.2031674,
4956  1 .2334925,.2491470,.2491470,.2334925,.2031674,.1600783,
4957  2 .1069393,.0471753/
4958 ! built the abscissas from (-1,1) to (1,0)
4959  if(igaus.eq.9) then
4960  do i=1,igaus
4961  ui(i)=u9(i)
4962  wg(i)=w9(i)
4963  enddo
4964  endif
4965 ! following options in case one wishes to use 10 or 12 steps
4966  if(igaus.eq.10) then
4967  do i=1,igaus
4968  ui(i)=u10(i)
4969  wg(i)=w10(i)
4970  enddo
4971  endif
4972  if(igaus.eq.12) then
4973  do i=1,igaus
4974  ui(i)=u12(i)
4975  wg(i)=w12(i)
4976  enddo
4977  endif
4978  do i=1,igaus
4979  absg(i)=(1.+ui(i))/2.
4980  wg(i)=wg(i)/2.
4981  enddo
4982  return
4983  end
4984 
4991  SUBROUTINE table(lbmax,mbmax,nbmax)
4992  implicit real(8) (a-h,o-z)
4993  common/gauss1/absg(40),wg(40),igaus
4994  common/circu/co(40,50),sn(40,50),blam(40,100)
4995  common/expmod/ragp(40,100),ragm1(40,40)
4996  common/randu/ck(15),kmax
4997  common/hass/carg(100),sarg(100),argip(100)
4998  common/const/pi2,sqpi,pwtpi,sqpi2,sq2pi
4999  common/consta/vl,pi,xmat,rpel,qst
5000  common/factor/fpir(40,40),fect(30)
5001 ! maximum of subscripts : ideg
5002 ! igaus: order of the Gauss integration ******
5003 ! maximum of lbmax,mmax,nbmax -->ideg
5004  ideg=nbmax
5005  if(lbmax.ge.ideg) ideg=lbmax
5006  if(mbmax.ge.ideg) ideg=mbmax
5007  ideg=ideg+1
5008  idegp2=ideg+2
5009 ! arrays of the power of the circular functions fo the Gauss positions absg(i)
5010 ! the maximum power is ideg+2
5011  do i=1,igaus
5012  co(i,1)=1.
5013  sn(i,1)=1.
5014  enddo
5015  do i=1,igaus
5016  aco=pi*absg(i)/2.
5017  cod=cos(aco)
5018  snd=sin(aco)
5019  do j=2,idegp2
5020  co(i,j)=co(i,j-1)*cod
5021  sn(i,j)=sn(i,j-1)*snd
5022  enddo
5023  enddo
5024 ! arrays used in the integrals of tables 75 and 76
5025 ! absg(i)**2(t1+t2+t3+1)+1-->ragp(i,j) i: Gauss positions, j: is the power
5026  idgp=3*ideg+kmax
5027  kemax=kmax/2
5028  do i=1,igaus
5029  ragp(i,1)=1.
5030  ragm1(i,1)=1.
5031  absm2=(1.-absg(i))*(1.-absg(i))
5032  do j=2,idgp
5033  ragp(i,j)=ragp(i,j-1)*absg(i)
5034  enddo
5035 ! storage of (absg(i)-1)**2*kemax -->ragm1
5036  do j=2,kemax+1
5037  ragm1(i,j)=ragm1(i,j-1)*absm2
5038  enddo
5039  enddo
5040  do i=1,idgp+1
5041  carg(i)=sqrt((4.*float(i-1)+1.)/2.)
5042  sarg(i)=sqrt((4.*float(i-1)+3.)/2.)
5043  argip(i)=sqrt(2.*float(i-1)+1.)
5044  enddo
5045 ! store the factorials
5046  do i=1,40
5047  do j=1,i
5048  fpir(i,j)=fper(i-1,j-1)
5049  enddo
5050  enddo
5051  fj=1.
5052  fect(1)=1.
5053  do i=1,23
5054  fi=float(i)
5055  fj=fj*fi
5056  fect(i+1)=fj
5057  enddo
5058  return
5059  end
5060 
5064  FUNCTION fpar(i,j)
5065  implicit real(8) (a-h,o-z)
5066  common/factor/fpir(40,40),fect(30)
5067  ii=i+1
5068  jj=j+1
5069  fpar=fpir(ii,jj)
5070  return
5071  end
5072 
5077  FUNCTION fper(i,j)
5078  implicit real(8) (a-h,o-z)
5079  faci=1.
5080  facj=1.
5081  fper=1.
5082  if(i.eq.0) return
5083  if(j.eq.0) return
5084  do k=1,j
5085  facj=facj*float(k)
5086  enddo
5087  ii=i
5088  do k=1,j
5089  faci=faci*float(ii)
5090  ii=ii-1
5091  enddo
5092  fper=faci/facj
5093  return
5094  end
5095 
5099  FUNCTION hermint(s,ihd)
5100  implicit real(8) (a-h,o-z)
5101  dimension he(100)
5102  hermint=0.
5103  if(ihd.eq.0) then
5104  hermint=1.
5105  return
5106  endif
5107  if(ihd.eq.1) then
5108  hermint=s
5109  return
5110  endif
5111  he(1)=1.
5112  he(2)=s
5113  m1=ihd-1
5114  do k=1,m1
5115  he(k+2)=s*he(k+1)-float(k)*he(k)
5116  enddo
5117  hermint=he(ihd+1)*exp(-s*s/2.)
5118  return
5119  end
5120 
5124  FUNCTION fact(m)
5125  implicit real(8) (a-h,o-z)
5126  fact=1.
5127  IF(m.EQ.0) RETURN
5128  DO k=1,m
5129  fact=fact*float(k)
5130  ENDDO
5131  RETURN
5132  END
5133 
5137  FUNCTION factd(m)
5138  implicit real(8) (a-h,o-z)
5139  dimension he(100)
5140  factd=1.
5141  if(m.eq.0) factd=1.
5142  if(m.eq.1) then
5143  factd=-1.
5144  else
5145  he(1)=1.
5146  do k=1,2*m-1,2
5147  he(k+2)=-float(k)*he(k)
5148  enddo
5149  factd=he(2*m+1)
5150  endif
5151  return
5152  end
5153 
5162  SUBROUTINE bhdist
5163  implicit real(8) (a-h,o-z)
5164  common/coef/a(30,30,30),xa,xb,xc
5165  common/ind/lmax,mmax,nmax
5166  common/indin/lmaxi,mmaxi,nmaxxi
5167  common/hcgrms/xcdg,ycdg,zcdg,ect,eps
5168 ! character iitime*30
5169 ! hermite degrees
5170  lmax=lmaxi
5171  mmax=mmaxi
5172  nmax=nmaxxi
5173  ect=4.
5174  call pintfast
5175  call hcoef
5176  return
5177  end
5178 
5189  SUBROUTINE trms(isucc)
5190  implicit real(8) (a-h,o-z)
5191  common/consta/vl,pi,xmat,rpel,qst
5192  common/coef/a(30,30,30),xa,xb,xc
5193  common/ind/lmax,mmax,nmax
5194 ! lmax,mmax,nmax from zero
5195  common/rms/rms(3,50),s1,s2,s3
5196  common/gauss1/absg(40),wg(40),igaus
5197  common/circu/co(40,50),sn(40,50),blam(40,100)
5198  common/randu/ck(15),kmax
5199 ! minimum of the rms sizes xa,xb,xc
5200  rmin=xa
5201  if(rmin.gt.xb) rmin=xb
5202  if(rmin.gt.xc) rmin=xc
5203 ! order of the succession of the integrals
5204  if(rmin.eq.xc) isucc=3
5205  if(rmin.eq.xb) isucc=2
5206  if(rmin.eq.xa) isucc=1
5207 ! maximum of lmax,mmax,nmax
5208  maxi=lmax
5209  if(maxi.lt.mmax) maxi=mmax
5210  if(maxi.lt.nmax) maxi=nmax
5211  maxt=2*(maxi+1)+3
5212  x3=0.
5213  x2=0.
5214  x1=0.
5215 ! order of succession x->y->z
5216  if(isucc.eq.1) then
5217  x3=xa
5218  x2=xb
5219  x1=xc
5220  endif
5221 ! order of succession y->z->x
5222  if(isucc.eq.2) then
5223  x3=xb
5224  x2=xc
5225  x1=xa
5226  endif
5227 ! order of succession z->x->y
5228  if(isucc.eq.3) then
5229  x3=xc
5230  x2=xa
5231  x1=xb
5232  endif
5233 ! array rms(j,i) Powers of the rms sizes j=1,2,3, the value i is the power
5234  rms(3,1)=1.
5235  rms(2,1)=1.
5236  rms(1,1)=1.
5237  do i=2,maxt
5238  rms(3,i)=rms(3,i-1)*x3
5239  rms(2,i)=rms(2,i-1)*x2
5240  rms(1,i)=rms(1,i-1)*x1
5241  enddo
5242  j1=kmax/2
5243  i1m=(lmax+1)/2
5244  i2m=(mmax+1)/2
5245  i3m=(nmax+1)/2
5246  im=i1m+i2m+i3m+j1+4
5247  if(im.ge.40) then
5248  write(16,*) ' overlap the array blam with im= ',im
5249  stop
5250  endif
5251  do i=1,igaus
5252  blam(i,1)=(rms(1,3)*co(i,3)+rms(2,3)*sn(i,3))/rms(3,3)
5253  do ii=2,im
5254  blam(i,ii)=blam(i,ii-1)*blam(i,1)
5255  enddo
5256  enddo
5257  return
5258  end
5259 
5264  SUBROUTINE uvrms
5265  implicit real(8) (a-h,o-z)
5266  COMMON /consta/ vl, pi, xmat, rpel, qst
5267  common/rms/rms(3,50),s1,s2,s3
5268  common/gauss1/absg(40),wg(40),igaus
5269  common/circu/co(40,50),sn(40,50),blam(40,100)
5270  common/uvtab/epsi1(40,40),epsi2(40,40),akpcc(40,40),
5271  * akpcs(40,40),akpsc(40,40),akpss(40,40)
5272  common/expmod/ragp(40,100),ragm1(40,40)
5273  common/cars3/exs3,exs2,exs1,as3,sgns3,s32,pwas3,pw3as3
5274  common/ind/lmax,mmax,nmax
5275  common/indttal/lmnt
5276  common/randu/ck(15),kmax
5277  common/const/pi2,sqpi,pwtpi,sqpi2,sq2pi
5278 ! pi2=pi*pi, sqpi=(pi/2)**3/2
5279  common/comtab/hsint(40,2,60),sqblam(40),s3pw(15)
5280  common/herfun/hs1(60),hs2(60),hs3(60)
5281  s32=s3*s3
5282  s22=s2*s2
5283  s12=s1*s1
5284  exs3=exp(-s32/2.)
5285  exs2=exp(-s22/2.)
5286  exs1=exp(-s12/2.)
5287  as3=abs(s3)
5288  sgns3=1.
5289  if(s3.lt.0.) sgns3=-1.
5290  as31=as3*s1
5291  as32=as3*s2
5292  s1rms=s1*rms(1,2)
5293  s2rms=s2*rms(2,2)
5294 ! power of as3, used in the functions spii,......
5295  s3pw(1)=1.
5296  do i=2,kmax
5297  s3pw(i)=s3pw(i-1)*as3
5298  enddo
5299 ! memory array hsint(ig,arg,indice) for functions sipp,...
5300  do ig=1,igaus
5301  wgpi=wg(ig)*pi/2.
5302  sqblam(ig)=sqrt(blam(ig,1))
5303  xlblam=sqblam(ig)*rms(3,2)
5304  do iarg=1,2
5305  arghm1=s1rms*co(ig,2)/xlblam
5306  arghm2=s2rms*sn(ig,2)/xlblam
5307  if(iarg.eq.1) then
5308  arg=arghm1+arghm2
5309  earg=exp(-arg*arg/2.)
5310  endif
5311  if(iarg.eq.2) then
5312  arg=arghm1-arghm2
5313  earg=exp(-arg*arg/2.)
5314  endif
5315  hsint(ig,iarg,1)=1.*earg*wgpi
5316  hsint(ig,iarg,2)=arg*earg*wgpi
5317  do inhs=3,lmnt
5318  hsint(ig,iarg,inhs)=arg*hsint(ig,iarg,inhs-1)
5319  * -float(inhs-2)*hsint(ig,iarg,inhs-2)
5320  enddo
5321  enddo
5322  enddo
5323  r13=rms(1,2)/rms(3,2)
5324  r23=rms(2,2)/rms(3,2)
5325  do j=1,igaus
5326  do i=1,igaus
5327  aeps1=ragp(i,3)*(blam(j,1)-1.)/2.
5328  aeps1=s32*(aeps1+ragp(i,2))
5329  aeps2=ragp(i,3)*blam(j,1)/2.
5330  aeps2=aeps2*s32
5331  akc1=ragp(i,2)*r13*co(j,2)*as31
5332  akc2=ragp(i,2)*r23*sn(j,2)*as32
5333  aks1=ragp(i,2)*r13*co(j,2)*as31
5334  aks2=ragp(i,2)*r23*sn(j,2)*as32
5335  epsi1(i,j)=exp(-aeps1)*wg(i)
5336  epsi2(i,j)=exp(-aeps2)*wg(i)
5337  akpcc(i,j)=cos(akc1)*cos(akc2)
5338  akpcs(i,j)=cos(akc1)*sin(akc2)
5339  akpsc(i,j)=sin(akc1)*cos(akc2)
5340  akpss(i,j)=sin(akc1)*sin(akc2)
5341  enddo
5342  enddo
5343 ! Hermite functions
5344  hs1(1)=exs1
5345  hs2(1)=exs2
5346  hs3(1)=exs3
5347  hs1(2)=s1*exs1
5348  hs2(2)=s2*exs2
5349  hs3(2)=s3*exs3
5350  do ihe=3,lmnt
5351  hs1(ihe)=s1*hs1(ihe-1)-float(ihe-2)*hs1(ihe-2)
5352  hs2(ihe)=s2*hs2(ihe-1)-float(ihe-2)*hs2(ihe-2)
5353  hs3(ihe)=s3*hs3(ihe-1)-float(ihe-2)*hs3(ihe-2)
5354  enddo
5355  return
5356  end
5357 
5370  SUBROUTINE fielde(lc,mc,nc,isucc)
5371  implicit real(8) (a-h,o-z)
5372  common/rms/rms(3,50),s1,s2,s3
5373  common/partcl/x,y,z
5374  common/const/pi2,sqpi,pwtpi,sqpi2,sq2pi
5375  common/field/ex,ey,ez
5376  common/randu/ck(15),kmax
5377 ! pi2=pi*pi, sqpi=(pi/2)**3/2
5378  common/cars3/exs3,exs2,exs1,as3,sgns3,s32,pwas3,pw3as3
5379 ! exs3=exp(-s3*s3/2),abs3=abs(s3),sgns3=sign s3,s32=s3*s3
5380 ! pwas3=as3**(2(it1+it2+it3)+1),pw3as3=as3**(2*it3))
5381  common/sgpth/mksgi,mksgp
5382  common/ftth/makti,maktp
5383  common/fsth/maksi,maksp
5384  logical maksi,maksp
5385  logical makti,maktp
5386  logical mksgi,mksgp
5387  logical lpl,lpm,lpn
5388 ! look for the parity of the currents lc,mc,nc
5389  lpl=.false.
5390  lpm=.false.
5391  lpn=.false.
5392  makti=.false.
5393  maktp=.false.
5394  maksi=.false.
5395  maksp=.false.
5396  mksgi=.false.
5397  mksgp=.false.
5398  xlc=lc
5399  tl=xlc-2.*int(xlc/2.+0.0001)
5400  if(tl.eq.0.)lpl=.true.
5401  xmc=mc
5402  tm=xmc-2.*int(xmc/2.+0.0001)
5403  if(tm.eq.0.)lpm=.true.
5404  xnc=nc
5405  tn=xnc-2.*int(xnc/2.+0.0001)
5406  if(tn.eq.0.)lpn=.true.
5407  if(lpl.and.lpm.and.lpn) itpar=1
5408  if(lpl.and.lpm.and..not.lpn) itpar=2
5409  if(lpl.and..not.lpm.and.lpn) itpar=3
5410  if(lpl.and..not.lpm.and..not.lpn) itpar=4
5411  if(.not.lpl.and.lpm.and.lpn) itpar=5
5412  if(.not.lpl.and.lpm.and..not.lpn) itpar=6
5413  if(.not.lpl.and..not.lpm.and.lpn) itpar=7
5414  if(.not.lpl.and..not.lpm.and..not.lpn) itpar=8
5415 !
5416 ! values of the variables it1,it2,it3 in relation with lc,mc,nc
5417 ! the initial values of these lc,mc,nc is zero
5418  if (isucc.eq.1) then
5419 ! a<b,c
5420  if(itpar.eq.1) then
5421 ! E E E and a<b,c:
5422 ! table 67-a: Ex=E(2t3+1,2t2,2t1)
5423 ! Ey=E(2t3,2t2+1,2t1)
5424 ! Ez=E(2t3,2t2,2t1+1)
5425 ! values of it1,it2,it3 in table 3-a
5426  it3=lc/2
5427  it2=mc/2
5428  it1=nc/2
5429  if(s3.ne.0.) then
5430 ! it=2*(it1+it2+it3)+1
5431  it=lc+mc+nc+1
5432  pwas3=as3**it
5433  endif
5434  ex=eipp(it1,it2,it3)
5435  ey=epip(it1,it2,it3)
5436  ez=eppi(it1,it2,it3)
5437  return
5438  endif
5439  if(itpar.eq.2) then
5440 ! E E I and a<b,c
5441 ! table 67-g: Ex=E(2t3+1,2t2,2t1+1)
5442 ! Ey=E(2t3,2t2+1,2t1+1)
5443 ! Ez=E(2t3,2t2,2t1)
5444 ! values of it1,it2,it3 in table 3-g
5445 ! x-direction and y-direction
5446  it3=lc/2
5447  it2=mc/2
5448  it1=(nc-1)/2
5449  if(s3.ne.0.) then
5450 ! it=2*(it1+it2+it3)+1
5451  it=lc+mc+nc
5452  pwas3=as3**it
5453  endif
5454  ex=eipi(it1,it2,it3)
5455  ey=epii(it1,it2,it3)
5456 ! z-direction
5457  it1=(nc+1)/2
5458  if(s3.ne.0.)pwas3=pwas3*s32
5459 ! it=2*(it1+it2+it3)+1
5460  ez=eppp(it1,it2,it3)
5461  return
5462  endif
5463  if(itpar.eq.3) then
5464 ! E I E and a<b,c
5465 ! in table 67-h: Ex=E(2t3+1,2t2+1,2t1)
5466 ! Ey=E(2t3,2t2,2t1)
5467 ! Ez=E(2t3,2t2+1,2t1+1)
5468 ! values of it1,it2,it3 in table 3-h
5469 ! x-direction
5470  it3=lc/2
5471  it2=(mc-1)/2
5472  it1=nc/2
5473  if(s3.ne.0.) then
5474 ! it=2*(it1+it2+it3)+1
5475  it=lc+mc+nc
5476  apwas3=as3**it
5477  pwas3=apwas3
5478  endif
5479  ex=eiip(it1,it2,it3)
5480 ! y-direction
5481  it3=lc/2
5482  it2=(mc+1)/2
5483  it1=nc/2
5484 ! it=2*(it1+it2+it3)+1
5485  if(s3.ne.0.) pwas3=pwas3*s32
5486  ey=eppp(it1,it2,it3)
5487 ! z-direction
5488  it3=lc/2
5489  it2=(mc-1)/2
5490  it1=nc/2
5491  if(s3.ne.0.)pwas3=apwas3
5492 ! it=2*(it1+it2+it3)+1
5493  ez=epii(it1,it2,it3)
5494  return
5495  endif
5496  if(itpar.eq.4) then
5497 ! E I I and a<b,c
5498 ! in table 67-f: Ex=E(2t3+1,2t2+1,2t1+1)
5499 ! Ey=E(2t3,2t2,2t1+1)
5500 ! Ez=E(2t3,2t2+1,2t1)
5501 ! values of it1,it2,it3 in table 3-f
5502 ! x-direction
5503  it3=lc/2
5504  it2=(mc-1)/2
5505  it1=(nc-1)/2
5506  if(s3.ne.0.) then
5507 ! it=2*(it1+it2+it3)+1
5508  it=lc+mc+nc-1
5509  pwas3=as3**it
5510  endif
5511  ex=eiii(it1,it2,it3)
5512 ! y-direction
5513  it3=lc/2
5514  it2=(mc+1)/2
5515  it1=(nc-1)/2
5516 ! it=2*(it1+it2+it3)+1
5517  if(s3.ne.0.)pwas3=pwas3*s32
5518  ey=eppi(it1,it2,it3)
5519 ! z-direction
5520  it3=lc/2
5521  it2=(mc-1)/2
5522  it1=(nc+1)/2
5523  ez=epip(it1,it2,it3)
5524  return
5525  endif
5526  if(itpar.eq.5) then
5527 ! I E E and a<b,c
5528 ! in table 67-c: Ex=E(2t3,2t2,2t1)
5529 ! Ey=E(2t3+1,2t2+1,2t1)
5530 ! Ez=E(2t3+1,2t2,2t1+1)
5531 ! values of it1,it2,it3 in table 3-c
5532 ! x-direction
5533  it3=(lc+1)/2
5534  it2=mc/2
5535  it1=nc/2
5536  if(s3.ne.0.) then
5537 ! it=2*(it1+it2+it3)+1
5538  it=lc+mc+nc
5539  apwas3=as3**it
5540  pwas3=apwas3*s32
5541  endif
5542  ex=eppp(it1,it2,it3)
5543 ! y-direction
5544  it3=(lc-1)/2
5545  it2=mc/2
5546  it1=nc/2
5547  if(s3.ne.0.) then
5548 ! it=2*(it1+it2+it3)+1
5549  pwas3=apwas3
5550  pw3as3=apwas3
5551  endif
5552  ey=eiip(it1,it2,it3)
5553 ! z-direction
5554  it3=(lc-1)/2
5555  it2=mc/2
5556  it1=nc/2
5557  ez=eipi(it1,it2,it3)
5558  return
5559  endif
5560  if(itpar.eq.6) then
5561 ! I E I and a<b,c
5562 ! in table 67-e: Ex=E(2t3,2t2,2t1+1)
5563 ! Ey=E(2t3+1,2t2+1,2t1+1)
