5564 ! Ez=E(2t3+1,2t2,2t1)
5565 ! values of it1,it2,it3 in table 3-e
5566 ! x-direction
5567  it3=(lc+1)/2
5568  it2=mc/2
5569  it1=(nc-1)/2
5570  if(s3.ne.0.) then
5571 ! it=2*(it1+it2+it3)+1
5572  it=lc+mc+nc-1
5573  apwas3=as3**it
5574  pwas3=apwas3*s32
5575  endif
5576  ex=eppi(it1,it2,it3)
5577 ! y-direction
5578  it3=(lc-1)/2
5579  it2=mc/2
5580  it1=(nc-1)/2
5581  if(s3.ne.0.) then
5582 ! it=2*(it1+it2+it3)+1
5583  pwas3=apwas3
5584  endif
5585  ey=eiii(it1,it2,it3)
5586 ! z-direction
5587  it3=(lc-1)/2
5588  it2=mc/2
5589  it1=(nc+1)/2
5590 ! it=2*(it1+it2+it3)+1
5591  if(s3.ne.0.) pwas3=pwas3*s32
5592  ez=eipp(it1,it2,it3)
5593  return
5594  endif
5595  if(itpar.eq.7) then
5596 ! I I E and a<b,c
5597 ! in table 67-d: Ex=E(2t3,2t2+1,2t1)
5598 ! Ey=E(2t3+1,2t2,2t1)
5599 ! Ez=E(2t3+1,2t2+1,2t1+1)
5600 ! values of it1,it2,it3 in table 3-d
5601 ! x-direction
5602  it3=(lc+1)/2
5603  it2=(mc-1)/2
5604  it1=nc/2
5605  if(s3.ne.0.) then
5606 ! it=2*(it1+it2+it3)+1
5607  it=lc+mc+nc-1
5608  apwas3=as3**it
5609  pwas3=apwas3*s32
5610  endif
5611  ex=epip(it1,it2,it3)
5612 ! y-direction
5613  it3=(lc-1)/2
5614  it2=(mc+1)/2
5615  it1=nc/2
5616 ! it=2*(it1+it2+it3)+1
5617  ey=eipp(it1,it2,it3)
5618 ! z-direction
5619  it3=(lc-1)/2
5620  it2=(mc-1)/2
5621  it1=nc/2
5622 ! it=2*(it1+it2+it3)+1
5623  if(s3.ne.0.) pwas3=apwas3
5624  ez=eiii(it1,it2,it3)
5625  return
5626  endif
5627  if(itpar.eq.8) then
5628 ! I I I and a<b,c
5629 ! in table 67-b: Ex=E(2t3,2t2+1,2t1+1)
5630 ! Ey=E(2t3+1,2t2,2t1+1)
5631 ! Ez=E(2t3+1,2t2+1,2t1)
5632 ! values of it1,it2,it3 in table 3-b
5633 ! x-direction
5634  it3=(lc+1)/2
5635  it2=(mc-1)/2
5636  it1=(nc-1)/2
5637  if(s3.ne.0.) then
5638 ! it=2*(it1+it2+it3)+1
5639  it=lc+mc+nc
5640  pwas3=as3**it
5641  endif
5642  ex=epii(it1,it2,it3)
5643 ! y-direction
5644  it3=(lc-1)/2
5645  it2=(mc+1)/2
5646  it1=(nc-1)/2
5647 ! it=2*(it1+it2+it3)+1
5648  ey=eipi(it1,it2,it3)
5649 ! z-direction
5650  it3=(lc-1)/2
5651  it2=(mc-1)/2
5652  it1=(nc+1)/2
5653  ez=eiip(it1,it2,it3)
5654  return
5655  endif
5656 ! endif of isucc=1----> a<b,c
5657  endif
5658  if (isucc.eq.2) then
5659 ! b<a,c
5660  if(itpar.eq.1) then
5661 ! E E E and b<a,c
5662 ! table 67-a: Ex=E(2t3,2t2,2t1+1)
5663 ! Ey=E(2t3+1,2t2,2t1)
5664 ! Ez=E(2t3,2t2+1,2t1)
5665 ! values of it1,it2,it3 in table 3-a
5666  it3=mc/2
5667  it2=nc/2
5668  it1=lc/2
5669  if(s3.ne.0.) then
5670 ! it=2*(it1+it2+it3)+1
5671  it=mc+nc+lc+1
5672  pwas3=as3**it
5673  endif
5674  ex=eppi(it1,it2,it3)
5675  ey=eipp(it1,it2,it3)
5676  ez=epip(it1,it2,it3)
5677  return
5678  endif
5679  if(itpar.eq.2) then
5680 ! E E I and b<a,c
5681 ! table 67-h: Ex=E(2t3,2t2+1,2t1+1)
5682 ! Ey=E(2t3+1,2t2+1,2t1)
5683 ! Ez=E(2t3,2t2,2t1)
5684 ! values of it1,it2,it3 in table 3-h
5685 ! x-direction and y-direction
5686  it3=mc/2
5687  it2=(nc-1)/2
5688  it1=lc/2
5689  if(s3.ne.0) then
5690 ! it=2*(it1+it2+it3)+1
5691  it=mc+nc+lc
5692  pwas3=as3**it
5693  endif
5694  ex=epii(it1,it2,it3)
5695  ey=eiip(it1,it2,it3)
5696 ! z-direction
5697  it2=(nc+1)/2
5698 ! it=2*(it1+it2+it3)+1
5699  if(s3.ne.0.)pwas3=pwas3*s32
5700  ez=eppp(it1,it2,it3)
5701  return
5702  endif
5703  if(itpar.eq.3) then
5704 ! E I E and b<a,c
5705 ! in table 67-c: Ex=E(2t3+1,2t2,2t1+1)
5706 ! Ey=E(2t3,2t2,2t1)
5707 ! Ez=E(2t3+1,2t2+1,2t1)
5708 ! values of it1,it2,it3 in table 3-c
5709 ! x-direction
5710  it3=(mc-1)/2
5711  it2=nc/2
5712  it1=lc/2
5713  if(s3.ne.0.) then
5714 ! it=2*(it1+it2+it3)+1
5715  it=mc+nc+lc
5716  apwas3=as3**it
5717  pwas3= apwas3
5718  endif
5719  ex=eipi(it1,it2,it3)
5720 ! y-direction
5721  it3=(mc+1)/2
5722  it2=nc/2
5723  it1=lc/2
5724  if(s3.ne.0.) then
5725 ! it=2*(it1+it2+it3)+1
5726  pwas3=pwas3*s32
5727  endif
5728  ey=eppp(it1,it2,it3)
5729 ! z-direction
5730  it3=(mc-1)/2
5731  it2=nc/2
5732  it1=lc/2
5733  if(s3.ne.0.) pwas3= apwas3
5734  ez=eiip(it1,it2,it3)
5735  return
5736  endif
5737  if(itpar.eq.4) then
5738 ! E I I and b<a,c
5739 ! in table 67-d: Ex=E(2t3+1,2t2+1,2t1+1)
5740 ! Ey=E(2t3,2t2+1,2t1)
5741 ! Ez=E(2t3+1,2t2,2t1)
5742 ! values of it1,it2,it3 in table 3-d
5743 ! x-direction
5744  it3=(mc-1)/2
5745  it2=(nc-1)/2
5746  it1=lc/2
5747  if(s3.ne.0.) then
5748 ! it=2*(it1+it2+it3)+1
5749  it=mc+nc+lc-1
5750  pwas3=as3**it
5751  endif
5752  ex=eiii(it1,it2,it3)
5753 ! y-direction
5754  it3=(mc+1)/2
5755  it2=(nc-1)/2
5756  it1=lc/2
5757 ! it=2*(it1+it2+it3)+1
5758  if(s3.ne.0.) then
5759  pwas3=pwas3*s32
5760  endif
5761  ey=epip(it1,it2,it3)
5762 ! z-direction
5763  it3=(mc-1)/2
5764  it2=(nc+1)/2
5765  it1=lc/2
5766 ! it=2*(it1+it2+it3)+1
5767  ez=eipp(it1,it2,it3)
5768  return
5769  endif
5770  if(itpar.eq.5) then
5771 ! I E E and b<a,c
5772 ! in table 67-g: Ex=E(2t3,2t2,2t1)
5773 ! Ey=E(2t3+1,2t2,2t1+1)
5774 ! Ez=E(2t3,2t2+1,2t1+1)
5775 ! values of it1,it2,it3 in table 3-g
5776 ! x-direction
5777  it3=mc/2
5778  it2=nc/2
5779  it1=(lc+1)/2
5780  if(s3.ne.0.) then
5781 ! it=2*(it1+it2+it3)+1
5782  it=mc+nc+lc
5783  apwas3=as3**it
5784  pwas3=apwas3*s32
5785  endif
5786  ex=eppp(it1,it2,it3)
5787 ! y-direction
5788  it3=mc/2
5789  it2=nc/2
5790  it1=(lc-1)/2
5791 ! it=2*(it1+it2+it3)+1
5792  if(s3.ne.0.)pwas3=apwas3
5793  ey=eipi(it1,it2,it3)
5794 ! z-direction
5795  it3=mc/2
5796  it2=nc/2
5797  it1=(lc-1)/2
5798  ez=epii(it1,it2,it3)
5799  return
5800  endif
5801  if(itpar.eq.6) then
5802 ! I E I and b<a,c
5803 ! in table 67-f: Ex=E(2t3,2t2+1,2t1)
5804 ! Ey=E(2t3+1,2t2+1,2t1+1)
5805 ! Ez=E(2t3,2t2,2t1+1)
5806 ! values of it1,it2,it3 in table 3-f
5807 ! x-direction
5808  it3=mc/2
5809  it2=(nc-1)/2
5810  it1=(lc+1)/2
5811  if(s3.ne.0.) then
5812 ! it=2*(it1+it2+it3)+1
5813  it=mc+nc+lc-1
5814  apwas3=as3**it
5815  pwas3=apwas3*s32
5816  endif
5817  ex=epip(it1,it2,it3)
5818 ! y-direction
5819  it3=mc/2
5820  it2=(nc-1)/2
5821  it1=(lc-1)/2
5822 ! it=2*(it1+it2+it3)+1
5823  if(s3.ne.0.) pwas3=apwas3
5824  ey=eiii(it1,it2,it3)
5825 ! z-direction
5826  it3=mc/2
5827  it2=(nc+1)/2
5828  it1=(lc-1)/2
5829 ! it=2*(it1+it2+it3)+1
5830  if(s3.ne.0.) pwas3=apwas3*s32
5831  ez=eppi(it1,it2,it3)
5832  return
5833  endif
5834  if(itpar.eq.7) then
5835 ! I I E and b<a,c
5836 ! in table 66-e: Ex=E(2t3+1,2t2,2t1)
5837 ! Ey=E(2t3,2t2,2t1+1)
5838 ! Ez=E(2t3+1,2t2+1,2t1+1)
5839 ! values of it1,it2,it3 in table 3-e
5840 ! x-direction
5841  it3=(mc-1)/2
5842  it2=nc/2
5843  it1=(lc+1)/2
5844  if(s3.ne.0.) then
5845 ! it=2*(it1+it2+it3)+1
5846  it=mc+nc+lc-1
5847  apwas3=as3**it
5848  pwas3=apwas3*s32
5849  endif
5850  ex=eipp(it1,it2,it3)
5851 ! y-direction
5852  it3=(mc+1)/2
5853  it2=nc/2
5854  it1=(lc-1)/2
5855 ! it=2*(it1+it2+it3)+1
5856  ey=eppi(it1,it2,it3)
5857 ! z-direction
5858  it3=(mc-1)/2
5859  it2=nc/2
5860  it1=(lc-1)/2
5861  if(s3.ne.0.) pwas3=apwas3
5862 ! it=2*(it1+it2+it3)+1
5863  ez=eiii(it1,it2,it3)
5864  return
5865  endif
5866  if(itpar.eq.8) then
5867 ! I I I and b<a,c
5868 ! in table 67-b: Ex=E(2t3+1,2t2+1,2t1)
5869 ! Ey=E(2t3,2t2+1,2t1+1)
5870 ! Ez=E(2t3+1,2t2,2t1+1)
5871 ! values of it1,it2,it3 in table 3-b
5872 ! x-direction
5873  it3=(mc-1)/2
5874  it2=(nc-1)/2
5875  it1=(lc+1)/2
5876  if(s3.ne.0.) then
5877 ! it=2*(it1+it2+it3)+1
5878  it=mc+nc+lc
5879  pwas3=as3**it
5880  endif
5881  ex=eiip(it1,it2,it3)
5882 ! y-direction
5883  it3=(mc+1)/2
5884  it2=(nc-1)/2
5885  it1=(lc-1)/2
5886 ! it=2*(it1+it2+it3)+1
5887  ey=epii(it1,it2,it3)
5888 ! z-direction
5889  it3=(mc-1)/2
5890  it2=(nc+1)/2
5891  it1=(lc-1)/2
5892 ! it=2*(it1+it2+it3)+1
5893  ez=eipi(it1,it2,it3)
5894  return
5895  endif
5896 ! endif of isucc=2----> b<a,c
5897  endif
5898  if (isucc.eq.3) then
5899 ! c<a,b
5900  if(itpar.eq.1) then
5901 ! E E E and c<a,b
5902 ! table 67-a: Ex=E(2t3,2t2+1,2t1)
5903 ! Ey=E(2t3,2t2,2t1+1)
5904 ! Ez=E(2t3+1,2t2,2t1)
5905 ! values of it1,it2,it3 in table 3-a
5906  it3=nc/2
5907  it2=lc/2
5908  it1=mc/2
5909  if(s3.ne.0.) then
5910 ! it=2*(it1+it2+it3)+1
5911  it=nc+lc+mc+1
5912  pwas3=as3**it
5913  endif
5914  ex=epip(it1,it2,it3)
5915  ey=eppi(it1,it2,it3)
5916  ez=eipp(it1,it2,it3)
5917  return
5918  endif
5919  if(itpar.eq.2) then
5920 ! E E I and c<a,b
5921 ! table 67-c: Ex=E(2t3+1,2t2+1,2t1)
5922 ! Ey=E(2t3+1,2t2,2t1+1)
5923 ! Ez=E(2t3,2t2,2t1)
5924 ! values of it1,it2,it3 in table 3-c
5925 ! x-direction and y-direction
5926  it3=(nc-1)/2
5927  it2=lc/2
5928  it1=mc/2
5929  if(s3.ne.0.) then
5930 ! it=2*(it1+it2+it3)+1
5931  it=nc+lc+mc
5932  pwas3=as3**it
5933  endif
5934  ex=eiip(it1,it2,it3)
5935  ey=eipi(it1,it2,it3)
5936 ! z-direction
5937  it3=(nc+1)/2
5938  if(s3.ne.0.) pwas3=pwas3*s32
5939 ! it=2*(it1+it2+it3)+1
5940  ez=eppp(it1,it2,it3)
5941  return
5942  endif
5943  if(itpar.eq.3) then
5944 ! E I E and c<a,b
5945 ! in table 67-g: Ex=E(2t3,2t2+1,2t1+1)
5946 ! Ey=E(2t3,2t2,2t1)
5947 ! Ez=E(2t3+1,2t2,2t1+1)
5948 ! values of it1,it2,it3 in table 3-g
5949 ! x-direction
5950  it3=nc/2
5951  it2=lc/2
5952  it1=(mc-1)/2
5953  if(s3.ne.0.) then
5954 ! it=2*(it1+it2+it3)+1
5955  it=nc+lc+mc
5956  apwas3=as3**it
5957  pwas3=apwas3
5958  endif
5959  ex=epii(it1,it2,it3)
5960 ! y-direction
5961  it3=nc/2
5962  it2=lc/2
5963  it1=(mc+1)/2
5964 ! it=2*(it1+it2+it3)+1
5965  if(s3.ne.0.) pwas3=pwas3*s32
5966  ey=eppp(it1,it2,it3)
5967 ! z-direction
5968  it3=nc/2
5969  it2=lc/2
5970  it1=(mc-1)/2
5971  if(s3.ne.0.) pwas3=apwas3
5972  ez=eipi(it1,it2,it3)
5973  return
5974  endif
5975  if(itpar.eq.4) then
5976 ! E I I and c<a,b
5977 ! in table 67-e: Ex=E(2t3+1,2t2+1,2t1+1)
5978 ! Ey=E(2t3+1,2t2,2t1)
5979 ! Ez=E(2t3,2t2,2t1+1)
5980 ! values of it1,it2,it3 in table 3-e
5981 ! x-direction
5982  it3=(nc-1)/2
5983  it2=lc/2
5984  it1=(mc-1)/2
5985  if(s3.ne.0.) then
5986 ! it=2*(it1+it2+it3)+1
5987  it=nc+lc+mc-1
5988  pwas3=as3**it
5989  endif
5990  ex=eiii(it1,it2,it3)
5991 ! y-direction
5992  it3=(nc-1)/2
5993  it2=lc/2
5994  it1=(mc+1)/2
5995 ! it=2*(it1+it2+it3)+1
5996  if(s3.ne.0.) pwas3=pwas3*s32
5997  ey=eipp(it1,it2,it3)
5998 ! z-direction
5999  it3=(nc+1)/2
6000  it2=lc/2
6001  it1=(mc-1)/2
6002 ! it=2*(it1+it2+it3)+1
6003  ez=eppi(it1,it2,it3)
6004  return
6005  endif
6006  if(itpar.eq.5) then
6007 ! I E E and c<a,b
6008 ! in table 67-h: Ex=E(2t3,2t2,2t1)
6009 ! Ey=E(2t3,2t2+1,2t1+1)
6010 ! Ez=E(2t3+1,2t2+1,2t1)
6011 ! values of it1,it2,it3 in table 3-h
6012 ! x-direction
6013  it3=nc/2
6014  it2=(lc+1)/2
6015  it1=mc/2
6016  if(s3.ne.0.) then
6017 ! it=2*(it1+it2+it3)+1
6018  it=nc+lc+mc
6019  apwas3=as3**it
6020  pwas3=apwas3*s32
6021  endif
6022  ex=eppp(it1,it2,it3)
6023 ! y-direction
6024  it3=nc/2
6025  it2=(lc-1)/2
6026  it1=mc/2
6027 ! it=2*(it1+it2+it3)+1
6028  if(s3.ne.0.) pwas3=apwas3
6029  ey=epii(it1,it2,it3)
6030 ! z-direction
6031  it3=nc/2
6032  it2=(lc-1)/2
6033  it1=mc/2
6034  ez=eiip(it1,it2,it3)
6035  return
6036  endif
6037  if(itpar.eq.6) then
6038 ! I E I and c<a,b
6039 ! in table 67-d: Ex=E(2t3+1,2t2,2t1)
6040 ! Ey=E(2t3+1,2t2+1,2t1+1)
6041 ! Ez=E(2t3,2t2+1,2t1)
6042 ! values of it1,it2,it3 in table 3-d
6043 ! x-direction
6044  it3=(nc-1)/2
6045  it2=(lc+1)/2
6046  it1=mc/2
6047  if(s3.ne.0.) then
6048 ! it=2*(it1+it2+it3)+1
6049  it=nc+lc+mc-1
6050  apwas3=as3**it
6051  pwas3=apwas3*s32
6052  endif
6053  ex=eipp(it1,it2,it3)
6054 ! y-direction
6055  it3=(nc-1)/2
6056  it2=(lc-1)/2
6057  it1=mc/2
6058 ! it=2*(it1+it2+it3)+1
6059  if(s3.ne.0.) pwas3=apwas3
6060  ey=eiii(it1,it2,it3)
6061 ! z-direction
6062  it3=(nc+1)/2
6063  it2=(lc-1)/2
6064  it1=mc/2
6065 ! it=2*(it1+it2+it3)+1
6066  if(s3.ne.0.) pwas3=pwas3*s32
6067  ez=epip(it1,it2,it3)
6068  return
6069  endif
6070  if(itpar.eq.7) then
6071 ! I I E and c<a,b
6072 ! in table 67-f: Ex=E(2t3,2t2,2t1+1)
6073 ! Ey=E(2t3,2t2+1,2t1)
6074 ! Ez=E(2t3+1,2t2+1,2t1+1)
6075 ! values of it1,it2,it3 in table 3-f
6076 ! x-direction
6077  it3=nc/2
6078  it2=(lc+1)/2
6079  it1=(mc-1)/2
6080  if(s3.ne.0.) then
6081 ! it=2*(it1+it2+it3)+1
6082  it=nc+lc+mc-1
6083  apwas3=as3**it
6084  pwas3=apwas3*s32
6085  endif
6086  ex=eppi(it1,it2,it3)
6087 ! y-direction
6088  it3=nc/2
6089  it2=(lc-1)/2
6090  it1=(mc+1)/2
6091 ! it=2*(it1+it2+it3)+1
6092  ey=epip(it1,it2,it3)
6093 ! z-direction
6094  it3=nc/2
6095  it2=(lc-1)/2
6096  it1=(mc-1)/2
6097 ! it=2*(it1+it2+it3)+1
6098  if(s3.ne.0.) pwas3=apwas3
6099  ez=eiii(it1,it2,it3)
6100  return
6101  endif
6102  if(itpar.eq.8) then
6103 ! I I I and c<a,b
6104 ! in table 67-b: Ex=E(2t3+1,2t2,2t1+1)
6105 ! Ey=E(2t3+1,2t2+1,2t1)
6106 ! Ez=E(2t3,2t2+1,2t1+1)
6107 ! values of it1,it2,it3 in table 3-b
6108 ! x-direction
6109  it3=(nc-1)/2
6110  it2=(lc+1)/2
6111  it1=(mc-1)/2
6112 ! it=2*(it1+it2+it3)+1
6113  if(s3.ne.0.) then
6114  it=nc+lc+mc
6115  pwas3=as3**it
6116  endif
6117  ex=eipi(it1,it2,it3)
6118 ! y-direction
6119  it3=(nc-1)/2
6120  it2=(lc-1)/2
6121  it1=(mc+1)/2
6122 ! it=2*(it1+it2+it3)+1
6123  ey=eiip(it1,it2,it3)
6124 ! z-direction
6125  it3=(nc+1)/2
6126  it2=(lc-1)/2
6127  it1=(mc-1)/2
6128 ! it=2*(it1+it2+it3)+1
6129  ez=eppi(it1,it2,it3)
6130  return
6131  endif
6132 ! endif of isucc=3----> c<a,b
6133  endif
6134  end
6135 
6139  FUNCTION eppp(it1,it2,it3)
6140  implicit real(8) (a-h,o-z)
6141  common/rms/rms(3,50),s1,s2,s3
6142  common/partcl/x,y,z
6143  common/const/pi2,sqpi,pwtpi,sqpi2,sq2pi
6144 ! pi2=pi*pi, sqpi=(pi/2)**3/2
6145  common/randu/ck(15),kmax
6146  common/cars3/exs3,exs2,exs1,as3,sgns3,s32,pwas3,pw3as3
6147 ! exs3=exp(-s3*s3/2),abs3=abs(s3),isgns3=sign s3,s32=s3*s3
6148 ! pwas3=as3**(2(it1+it2+it3)+1)
6149  eppp=0.
6150  isgnw=4*(it2+it1)+5*it3
6151  ipar=isgnw-2*(isgnw/2)
6152  wsng=-1.
6153  if(ipar.eq.0)wsng=1.
6154  eppp=wsng*pi2*exs3*rms(3,3)
6155  eppp=eppp*(tppp(it1,it2,it3)+sppp(it1,it2,it3))
6156  eppp=eppp-8.*wsng*rms(3,3)*sqpi*sgppp(it1,it2,it3)
6157  if(s3.ne.0.) then
6158  sgn1=-1.
6159  sgn2=1.
6160  isgn1=3*(it1+it2)+4*it3
6161  ipar=isgn1-2*(isgn1/2)
6162  if(ipar.eq.0) then
6163  sgn1=1.
6164  sgn2=-1
6165  endif
6166  ipt12=2*it1+1
6167  ipt22=2*it2+1
6168  ipt212=2*(it1+it2)
6169  rint=rms(1,ipt12+1)*rms(2,ipt22+1)/rms(3,ipt212+1)
6170  e1=2.*sgn1*pi2*pwas3*rint*uppp(it1,it2,it3)
6171  scum=0.
6172  kj=1
6173  pcas3=pwas3
6174  do k=1,kmax,2
6175  scum=scum+ck(k)*pcas3*vppp(kj)
6176  kj=kj+1
6177  pcas3=pcas3*s32
6178  enddo
6179  e2=scum*sgn2*2.*pi2*rint*exs3
6180  eppp=eppp+e1+e2
6181  endif
6182  return
6183  end
6184 
6188  FUNCTION epip(it1,it2,it3)
6189  implicit real(8) (a-h,o-z)
6190  common/rms/rms(3,50),s1,s2,s3
6191  common/partcl/x,y,z
6192  common/const/pi2,sqpi,pwtpi,sqpi2,sq2pi
6193  common/randu/ck(15),kmax
6194 ! pi2=pi*pi, sqpi=(pi/2)**3/2
6195  common/cars3/exs3,exs2,exs1,as3,sgns3,s32,pwas3,pw3as3
6196 ! exs3=exp(-s3*s3/2),abs3=abs(s3),isgns3=sign s3,s32=s3*s3
6197 ! pwas3=as3**(2(it1+it2+it3)+1)
6198  epip=0.
6199  isgnw=4*(it2+it1)+5*it3+2
6200  ipar=isgnw-2*(isgnw/2)
6201  wsng=-1.
6202  if(ipar.eq.0)wsng=1.
6203  epip=wsng*pi2*exs3*rms(3,3)
6204  epip=epip*(tpip(it1,it2,it3)+spip(it1,it2,it3))
6205  epip=epip-8.*wsng*rms(3,3)*sqpi*sgpip(it1,it2,it3)
6206  if(s3.ne.0.) then
6207  pwas31=pwas3*as3
6208  sgn1=-1.
6209  sgn2=1.
6210  isgn1=3*(it1+it2)+4*it3+2
6211  ipar=isgn1-2*(isgn1/2)
6212  if(ipar.eq.0) then
6213  sgn1=1.
6214  sgn2=-1.
6215  endif
6216  ipt12=2*it1+1
6217  ipt22=2*it2+2
6218  ipt212=2*(it1+it2)+1
6219  rint=rms(1,ipt12+1)*rms(2,ipt22+1)/rms(3,ipt212+1)
6220  e1=2.*sgn1*pi2*pwas31*rint*upip(it1,it2,it3)
6221  scum=0.
6222  kj=1
6223  pcas3=pwas31
6224  do k=1,kmax,2
6225  scum=scum+ck(k)*pcas3*vpip(kj)
6226  kj=kj+1
6227  pcas3=pcas3*s32
6228  enddo
6229  e2=scum*sgn2*2.*pi2*rint*exs3
6230  epip=epip+(e1+e2)
6231  endif
6232  return
6233  end
6234 
6238  FUNCTION eppi(it1,it2,it3)
6239  implicit real(8) (a-h,o-z)
6240  common/rms/rms(3,50),s1,s2,s3
6241  common/partcl/x,y,z
6242  common/const/pi2,sqpi,pwtpi,sqpi2,sq2pi
6243  common/randu/ck(15),kmax
6244  common/cars3/exs3,exs2,exs1,as3,sgns3,s32,pwas3,pw3as3
6245 ! exs3=exp(-s3*s3/2),abs3=abs(s3),isgns3=sign s3,s32=s3*s3
6246 ! pwas3=as3**(2(it1+it2+it3)+1),pw3as3=as3**(2*it3)
6247  eppi=0.
6248  isgnw=4*(it2+it1)+5*it3+2
6249  ipar=isgnw-2*(isgnw/2)
6250  wsng=-1.
6251  if(ipar.eq.0)wsng=1.
6252  eppi=wsng*pi2*exs3*rms(3,3)
6253  eppi=eppi*(tppi(it1,it2,it3)+sppi(it1,it2,it3))
6254  eppi=eppi-8.*wsng*rms(3,3)*sqpi*sgppi(it1,it2,it3)
6255  if(s3.ne.0.) then
6256  pwas31=pwas3*as3
6257  sgn1=-1.
6258  sgn2=1.
6259  isgn1=3*(it1+it2)+4*it3+2
6260  xsgn1=isgn1
6261  pari=xsgn1-2.*int(xsgn1/2.+0.0001)
6262  if(pari.eq.0.) then
6263  sgn1=1.
6264  sgn2=-1.
6265  endif
6266  ipt12=2*it1+2
6267  ipt22=2*it2+1
6268  ipt212=2*(it1+it2)+1
6269  rint=rms(1,ipt12+1)*rms(2,ipt22+1)/rms(3,ipt212+1)
6270  e1=2.*sgn1*pi2*pwas31*rint*uppi(it1,it2,it3)
6271  scum=0.
6272  kj=1
6273  pcas3=pwas31
6274  do k=1,kmax,2
6275  scum=scum+ck(k)*pcas3*vppi(kj)
6276  kj=kj+1
6277  pcas3=pcas3*s32
6278  enddo
6279  e2=scum*sgn2*2.*pi2*rint*exs3
6280  eppi=eppi+(e1+e2)
6281  endif
6282  return
6283  end
6284 
6288  FUNCTION epii(it1,it2,it3)
6289  implicit real(8) (a-h,o-z)
6290  common/rms/rms(3,50),s1,s2,s3
6291  common/partcl/x,y,z
6292  common/const/pi2,sqpi,pwtpi,sqpi2,sq2pi
6293  common/randu/ck(15),kmax
6294 ! pi2=pi*pi, sqpi=(pi/2)**3/2
6295  common/cars3/exs3,exs2,exs1,as3,sgns3,s32,pwas3,pw3as3
6296 ! exs3=exp(-s3*s3/2),abs3=abs(s3),isgns3=sign s3,s32=s3*s3
6297 ! pwas3=as3**(2(it1+it2+it3)+1),pw3as3=as3**(2*it3)
6298  epii=0.
6299  isgnw=4*(it2+it1)+5*it3+4
6300  ipar=isgnw-2*(isgnw/2)
6301  wsng=-1.
6302  if(ipar.eq.0)wsng=1.
6303  epii=wsng*pi2*exs3*rms(3,3)
6304  epii=epii*(tpii(it1,it2,it3)+spii(it1,it2,it3))
6305  epii=epii-8.*wsng*rms(3,3)*sqpi*sgpii(it1,it2,it3)
6306  if(s3.ne.0.) then
6307  pwas31=pwas3*s32
6308  sgn1=-1.
6309  sgn2=1.
6310  isgn1=3*(it1+it2)+4*it3+4
6311  ipar=isgn1-2*(isgn1/2)
6312  if(ipar.eq.0) then
6313  sgn1=1.
6314  sgn2=-1
6315  endif
6316  ipt12=2*it1+2
6317  ipt22=2*it2+2
6318  ipt212=2*(it1+it2+1)
6319  rint=rms(1,ipt12+1)*rms(2,ipt22+1)/rms(3,ipt212+1)
6320  e1=2.*sgn1*pi2*pwas31*rint*upii(it1,it2,it3)
6321  scum=0.
6322  kj=1
6323  pcas3=pwas31
6324  do k=1,kmax,2
6325  scum=scum+ck(k)*pcas3*vpii(kj)
6326  kj=kj+1
6327  pcas3=pcas3*s32
6328  enddo
6329  e2=scum*sgn2*2.*pi2*rint*exs3
6330  epii=epii+e1+e2
6331  endif
6332  return
6333  end
6334 
6338  FUNCTION eipp(it1,it2,it3)
6339  implicit real(8) (a-h,o-z)
6340  common/rms/rms(3,50),s1,s2,s3
6341  common/partcl/x,y,z
6342  common/const/pi2,sqpi,pwtpi,sqpi2,sq2pi
6343  common/randu/ck(15),kmax
6344 ! pi2=pi*pi, sqpi=(pi/2)**3/2
6345  common/cars3/exs3,exs2,exs1,as3,sgns3,s32,pwas3,pw3as3
6346 ! exs3=exp(-s3*s3/2),abs3=abs(s3),sgns3=sign s3,s32=s3*s3
6347 ! pwas3=as3**(2(it1+it2+it3)+1),pw3as3=as3**(2*it3)
6348  eipp=0.
6349  isgnw=4*(it2+it1)+5*it3+3
6350  ipar=isgnw-2*(isgnw/2)
6351  wsng=-1.
6352  if(ipar.eq.0)wsng=1.
6353  eipp=wsng*sgns3*pi2*exs3*rms(3,3)
6354  eipp=eipp*(tipp(it1,it2,it3)+sipp(it1,it2,it3))
6355  eipp=eipp+8.*wsng*rms(3,3)*sqpi*sgipp(it1,it2,it3)
6356  if(s3.ne.0.) then
6357  pwas31=pwas3*as3
6358  sgn1=-1.
6359  sgn2=1.
6360  isgn1=3*(it1+it2)+4*it3+3
6361  ipar=isgn1-2*(isgn1/2)
6362  if(ipar.eq.0) then
6363  sgn1=1.
6364  sgn2=-1
6365  endif
6366  ipt12=2*it1+1
6367  ipt22=2*it2+1
6368  ipt212=2*(it1+it2)
6369  rint=rms(1,ipt12+1)*rms(2,ipt22+1)/rms(3,ipt212+1)
6370  e1=2.*sgn1*pi2*pwas31*rint*uipp(it1,it2,it3)*sgns3
6371  scum=0.
6372  kj=1
6373  pcas3=pwas31
6374  do k=1,kmax,2
6375  scum=scum+ck(k)*pcas3*vipp(kj)
6376  kj=kj+1
6377  pcas3=pcas3*s32
6378  enddo
6379  e2=scum*sgn2*2.*pi2*rint*exs3*sgns3
6380  eipp=eipp-(e1+e2)
6381  endif
6382  return
6383  end
6384 
6388  FUNCTION eiip(it1,it2,it3)
6389  implicit real(8) (a-h,o-z)
6390  common/rms/rms(3,50),s1,s2,s3
6391  common/partcl/x,y,z
6392  common/const/pi2,sqpi,pwtpi,sqpi2,sq2pi
6393  common/randu/ck(15),kmax
6394 ! pi2=pi*pi, sqpi=(pi/2)**3/2
6395  common/cars3/exs3,exs2,exs1,as3,sgns3,s32,pwas3,pw3as3
6396 ! exs3=exp(-s3*s3/2),abs3=abs(s3),sgns3=sign s3,s32=s3*s3
6397 ! pwas3=as3**(2(it1+it2+it3)+1)
6398  eiip=0.
6399  isgnw=4*(it2+it1)+5*it3+5
6400  ipar=isgnw-2*(isgnw/2)
6401  wsng=-1.
6402  if(ipar.eq.0)wsng=1.
6403  eiip=wsng*sgns3*pi2*exs3*rms(3,3)
6404  eiip=eiip*(tiip(it1,it2,it3)+siip(it1,it2,it3))
6405  eiip=eiip+8.*wsng*rms(3,3)*sqpi*sgiip(it1,it2,it3)
6406  if(s3.ne.0.) then
6407  pwas31=pwas3*s32
6408  sgn1=-1.
6409  sgn2=1.
6410  isgn1=3*(it1+it2)+4*it3+5
6411  ipar=isgn1-2*(isgn1/2)
6412  if(ipar.eq.0) then
6413  sgn1=1.
6414  sgn2=-1
6415  endif
6416  ipt12=2*it1+1
6417  ipt22=2*it2+2
6418  ipt212=2*(it1+it2)+1
6419  rint=rms(1,ipt12+1)*rms(2,ipt22+1)/rms(3,ipt212+1)
6420  e1=2.*sgn1*pi2*pwas31*rint*uiip(it1,it2,it3)*sgns3
6421  scum=0.
6422  kj=1
6423  pcas3=pwas31
6424  do k=1,kmax,2
6425  scum=scum+ck(k)*pcas3*viip(kj)
6426  kj=kj+1
6427  pcas3=pcas3*s32
6428  enddo
6429  e2=scum*sgn2*2.*pi2*rint*exs3*sgns3
6430  eiip=eiip-(e1+e2)
6431  endif
6432  return
6433  end
6434 
6438  FUNCTION eipi(it1,it2,it3)
6439  implicit real(8) (a-h,o-z)
6440  common/rms/rms(3,50),s1,s2,s3
6441  common/partcl/x,y,z
6442  common/const/pi2,sqpi,pwtpi,sqpi2,sq2pi
6443  common/randu/ck(15),kmax
6444 ! pi2=pi*pi, sqpi=(pi/2)**3/2
6445  common/cars3/exs3,exs2,exs1,as3,sgns3,s32,pwas3,pw3as3
6446 ! exs3=exp(-s3*s3/2),abs3=abs(s3),sgns3=sign s3,s32=s3*s3
6447 ! pwas3=as3**(2(it1+it2+it3)+1)
6448  eipi=0.
6449  isgnw=4*(it2+it1)+5*it3+5
6450  ipar=isgnw-2*(isgnw/2)
6451  wsng=-1.
6452  if(ipar.eq.0)wsng=1.
6453  eipi=wsng*sgns3*pi2*exs3*rms(3,3)
6454  eipi=eipi*(tipi(it1,it2,it3)+sipi(it1,it2,it3))
6455  eipi=eipi+8.*wsng*rms(3,3)*sqpi*sgipi(it1,it2,it3)
6456  if(s3.ne.0.) then
6457  pwas31=pwas3*s32
6458  sgn1=-1.
6459  sgn2=1.
6460  isgn1=3*(it1+it2)+4*it3+5
6461  ipar=isgn1-2*(isgn1/2)
6462  if(ipar.eq.0) then
6463  sgn1=1.
6464  sgn2=-1
6465  endif
6466  ipt12=2*it1+2
6467  ipt22=2*it2+1
6468  ipt212=2*(it1+it2)+1
6469  rint=rms(1,ipt12+1)*rms(2,ipt22+1)/rms(3,ipt212+1)
6470  e1=2.*sgn1*pi2*pwas31*rint*uipi(it1,it2,it3)*sgns3
6471  scum=0.
6472  kj=1
6473  pcas3=pwas31
6474  do k=1,kmax,2
6475  scum=scum+ck(k)*pcas3*vipi(kj)
6476  kj=kj+1
6477  pcas3=pcas3*s32
6478  enddo
6479  e2=scum*sgn2*2.*pi2*rint*exs3*sgns3
6480  eipi=eipi-(e1+e2)
6481  endif
6482  return
6483  end
6484 
6488  FUNCTION eiii(it1,it2,it3)
6489  implicit real(8) (a-h,o-z)
6490  common/rms/rms(3,50),s1,s2,s3
6491  common/partcl/x,y,z
6492  common/const/pi2,sqpi,pwtpi,sqpi2,sq2pi
6493  common/randu/ck(15),kmax
6494 ! pi2=pi*pi, sqpi=(pi/2)**3/2
6495  common/cars3/exs3,exs2,exs1,as3,sgns3,s32,pwas3,pw3as3
6496 ! exs3=exp(-s3*s3/2),abs3=abs(s3),sgns3=sign s3,s32=s3*s3
6497 ! pwas3=as3**(2(it1+it2+it3)+1),pw3as3=as3**(2*it3)
6498  eiii=0.
6499  isgnw=4*(it2+it1)+5*it3+5
6500  ipar=isgnw-2*(isgnw/2)
6501  wsng=-1.
6502  if(ipar.eq.0)wsng=1.
6503  eiii=wsng*sgns3*pi2*exs3*rms(3,3)
6504  eiii=eiii*(tiii(it1,it2,it3)+siii(it1,it2,it3))
6505  eiii=eiii+8.*wsng*rms(3,3)*sqpi*sgiii(it1,it2,it3)
6506  if(s3.ne.0.) then
6507  pwas31=pwas3*s32*as3
6508  sgn1=-1.
6509  sgn2=1.
6510  isgn1=3*(it1+it2)+4*it3+5
6511  ipar=isgn1-2*(isgn1/2)
6512  if(ipar.eq.0) then
6513  sgn1=1.
6514  sgn2=-1
6515  endif
6516  ipt12=2*it1+2
6517  ipt22=2*it2+2
6518  ipt212=2*(it1+it2)+2
6519  rint=rms(1,ipt12+1)*rms(2,ipt22+1)/rms(3,ipt212+1)
6520  e1=2.*sgn1*pi2*pwas31*rint*uiii(it1,it2,it3)*sgns3
6521  scum=0.
6522  kj=1
6523  pcas3=pwas31
6524  do k=1,kmax,2
6525  scum=scum+ck(k)*pcas3*viii(kj)
6526  kj=kj+1
6527  pcas3=pcas3*s32
6528  enddo
6529  e2=scum*sgn2*2.*pi2*rint*exs3*sgns3
6530  eiii=eiii-(e1+e2)
6531  endif
6532  return
6533  end
6534 
6539  FUNCTION tipp(it1,it2,it3)
6540  implicit real(8) (a-h,o-z)
6541  common/randu/ck(15),kmax
6542  common/gauss1/absg(40),wg(40),igaus
6543  common/circu/co(40,50),sn(40,50),blam(40,100)
6544  common/rms/rms(3,50),s1,s2,s3
6545  common/cars3/exs3,exs2,exs1,as3,sgns3,s32,pwas3,pw3as3
6546  common/comtab/hsint(40,2,60),sqblam(40),s3pw(15)
6547  common/herfun/hs1(60),hs2(60),hs3(60)
6548  common/const/pi2,sqpi,pwtpi,sqpi2,sq2pi
6549  common/ftsk/stc1i(8,8,40),stc1p(8,8,40),stc2i(8,8),stc2p(8,8)
6550  common/ftth/makti,maktp
6551  logical makti,maktp
6552  tipp=0.
6553  if(.not.makti) then
6554  makti=.true.
6555  kk=1
6556  do k=2,kmax,2
6557  km1=k-1
6558  tt1=0.
6559  jm1=0
6560  xsj1=1.
6561  jj1=1
6562  do j1=1,km1,2
6563  j1km=km1-2*jm1
6564 ! term T(2t3+1,2t2,2t1,j1) in table 41
6565  it3j1=it3+jm1
6566  tt=0.
6567  mm=1
6568  do m=1,it3j1+1
6569  mm1=m-1
6570  stoc=rms(1,2*mm1+1)*rms(2,2*(it3j1-mm1)+1)
6571  stc1i(kk,jj1,mm)=fpar(it3j1,mm1)/stoc
6572  it23jm=2*(it2+it3+jm1-mm1)
6573  it1m=2*(it1+mm1)
6574  tt=tt+stc1i(kk,jj1,mm)*hs2(it23jm+1)*hs1(it1m+1)
6575  mm=mm+1
6576  enddo
6577 ! s3pw(j1km+1)=as3**j1km
6578  stoc=rms(3,2*it3j1+1)*s3pw(j1km+1)*xsj1
6579  stc2i(kk,jj1)=2.*fpar(km1,2*jm1)*stoc
6580  tt1=tt1+tt*stc2i(kk,jj1)
6581  xsj1=-xsj1
6582  jm1=jm1+1
6583  jj1=jj1+1
6584  enddo
6585  tipp=tt1*ck(k)+tipp
6586  kk=kk+1
6587  enddo
6588  return
6589  else
6590  kk=1
6591  do k=2,kmax,2
6592  km1=k-1
6593  tt1=0.
6594  jm1=0
6595  jj1=1
6596  do j1=1,km1,2
6597  j1km=km1-2*jm1
6598 ! term T(2t3+1,2t2,2t1,j1) in table 41
6599  it3j1=it3+jm1
6600  tt=0.
6601  mm=1
6602  do m=1,it3j1+1
6603  mm1=m-1
6604  it23jm=2*(it2+it3+jm1-mm1)
6605  it1m=2*(it1+mm1)
6606  tt=tt+stc1i(kk,jj1,mm)*hs2(it23jm+1)*hs1(it1m+1)
6607  mm1=mm1+1
6608  enddo
6609  tt1=tt1+tt*stc2i(kk,jj1)
6610  jm1=jm1+1
6611  jj1=jj1+1
6612  enddo
6613  tipp=tt1*ck(k)+tipp
6614  kk=kk+1
6615  enddo
6616  return
6617  endif
6618  end
6619 
6624  FUNCTION tiip(it1,it2,it3)
6625  implicit real(8) (a-h,o-z)
6626  common/randu/ck(15),kmax
6627  common/gauss1/absg(40),wg(40),igaus
6628  common/circu/co(40,50),sn(40,50),blam(40,100)
6629  common/rms/rms(3,50),s1,s2,s3
6630  common/cars3/exs3,exs2,exs1,as3,sgns3,s32,pwas3,pw3as3
6631  common/comtab/hsint(40,2,60),sqblam(40),s3pw(15)
6632  common/herfun/hs1(60),hs2(60),hs3(60)
6633  common/const/pi2,sqpi,pwtpi,sqpi2,sq2pi
6634  common/ftsk/stc1i(8,8,40),stc1p(8,8,40),stc2i(8,8),stc2p(8,8)
6635  common/ftth/makti,maktp
6636  logical makti,maktp
6637  tiip=0.
6638  if(.not.makti) then
6639  makti=.true.
6640  kk=1
6641  do k=2,kmax,2
6642  km1=k-1
6643  tt1=0.
6644  jm1=0
6645  xsj1=1.
6646  jj1=1
6647  do j1=1,km1,2
6648  j1km=km1-2*jm1
6649  it3j1=it3+jm1
6650  tt=0.
6651  mm=1
6652  do m=1,it3j1+1
6653  mm1=m-1
6654  stoc=rms(1,2*mm1+1)*rms(2,2*(it3j1-mm1)+1)
6655  stc1i(kk,jj1,mm)=fpar(it3j1,mm1)/stoc
6656  it23jm=2*(it2+it3+jm1-mm1)
6657  it1m=2*(it1+mm1)
6658  tt=tt+stc1i(kk,jj1,mm)*hs2(it23jm+2)*hs1(it1m+1)
6659  mm=mm+1
6660  enddo
6661 ! s3pw(j1km+1)=as3**j1km
6662  stoc=rms(3,2*it3j1+1)*s3pw(j1km+1)*xsj1
6663  stc2i(kk,jj1)=2.*fpar(km1,2*jm1)*stoc
6664  tt1=tt1+tt*stc2i(kk,jj1)
6665  xsj1=-xsj1
6666  jm1=jm1+1
6667  jj1=jj1+1
6668  enddo
6669  tiip=tt1*ck(k)+tiip
6670  kk=kk+1
6671  enddo
6672  return
6673  else
6674  kk=1
6675  do k=2,kmax,2
6676  km1=k-1
6677  tt1=0.
6678  jm1=0
6679  jj1=1
6680  do j1=1,km1,2
6681  j1km=km1-2*jm1
6682 ! term T(2t3+1,2t2,2t1,j1) in table 41
6683  it3j1=it3+jm1
6684  tt=0.
6685  mm=1
6686  do m=1,it3j1+1
6687  mm1=m-1
6688  it23jm=2*(it2+it3+jm1-mm1)
6689  it1m=2*(it1+mm1)
6690  tt=tt+stc1i(kk,jj1,mm)*hs2(it23jm+2)*hs1(it1m+1)
6691  mm=mm+1
6692  enddo
6693  tt1=tt1+tt*stc2i(kk,jj1)
6694  jm1=jm1+1
6695  jj1=jj1+1
6696  enddo
6697  tiip=tt1*ck(k)+tiip
6698  kk=kk+1
6699  enddo
6700  return
6701  endif
6702  end
6703 
6708  FUNCTION tipi(it1,it2,it3)
6709  implicit real(8) (a-h,o-z)
6710  common/randu/ck(15),kmax
6711  common/gauss1/absg(40),wg(40),igaus
6712  common/circu/co(40,50),sn(40,50),blam(40,100)
6713  common/rms/rms(3,50),s1,s2,s3
6714  common/cars3/exs3,exs2,exs1,as3,sgns3,s32,pwas3,pw3as3
6715  common/comtab/hsint(40,2,60),sqblam(40),s3pw(15)
6716  common/herfun/hs1(60),hs2(60),hs3(60)
6717  common/const/pi2,sqpi,pwtpi,sqpi2,sq2pi
6718  common/ftsk/stc1i(8,8,40),stc1p(8,8,40),stc2i(8,8),stc2p(8,8)
6719  common/ftth/makti,maktp
6720  logical makti,maktp
6721  tipi=0.
6722  if(.not.makti) then
6723  makti=.true.
6724  kk=1
6725  do k=2,kmax,2
6726  km1=k-1
6727  tt1=0.
6728  jm1=0
6729  xsj1=1.
6730  jj1=1
6731  do j1=1,km1,2
6732  j1km=km1-2*jm1
6733 ! term T(2t3+1,2t2+1,2t1,j1) in table 41
6734  it3j1=it3+jm1
6735  tt=0.
6736  mm=1
6737  do m=1,it3j1+1
6738  mm1=m-1
6739  stoc=rms(1,2*mm1+1)*rms(2,2*(it3j1-mm1)+1)
6740  stc1i(kk,jj1,mm)=fpar(it3j1,mm1)/stoc
6741  it23jm=2*(it2+it3+jm1-mm1)
6742  it1m=2*(it1+mm1)
6743  tt=tt+stc1i(kk,jj1,mm)*hs2(it23jm+1)*hs1(it1m+2)
6744  mm=mm+1
6745  enddo
6746 ! s3pw(j1km+1)=as3**j1km
6747  stoc=rms(3,2*it3j1+1)*s3pw(j1km+1)*xsj1
6748  stc2i(kk,jj1)=2.*fpar(km1,2*jm1)*stoc
6749  tt1=tt1+tt*stc2i(kk,jj1)
6750  xsj1=-xsj1
6751  jm1=jm1+1
6752  jj1=jj1+1
6753  enddo
6754  tipi=tt1*ck(k)+tipi
6755  kk=kk+1
6756  enddo
6757  return
6758  else
6759  kk=1
6760  do k=2,kmax,2
6761  km1=k-1
6762  tt1=0.
6763  jm1=0
6764  jj1=1
6765  do j1=1,km1,2
6766  j1km=km1-2*jm1
6767 ! term T(2t3+1,2t2,2t1,j1) in table 41
6768  it3j1=it3+jm1
6769  tt=0.
6770  mm=1
6771  do m=1,it3j1+1
6772  mm1=m-1
6773  it23jm=2*(it2+it3+jm1-mm1)
6774  it1m=2*(it1+mm1)
6775  tt=tt+stc1i(kk,jj1,mm)*hs2(it23jm+1)*hs1(it1m+2)
6776  mm=mm+1
6777  enddo
6778  tt1=tt1+tt*stc2i(kk,jj1)
6779  jm1=jm1+1
6780  jj1=jj1+1
6781  enddo
6782  tipi=tt1*ck(k)+tipi
6783  kk=kk+1
6784  enddo
6785  return
6786  endif
6787  end
6788 
6793  FUNCTION tiii(it1,it2,it3)
6794  implicit real(8) (a-h,o-z)
6795  common/randu/ck(15),kmax
6796  common/gauss1/absg(40),wg(40),igaus
6797  common/circu/co(40,50),sn(40,50),blam(40,100)
6798  common/rms/rms(3,50),s1,s2,s3
6799  common/cars3/exs3,exs2,exs1,as3,sgns3,s32,pwas3,pw3as3
6800  common/comtab/hsint(40,2,60),sqblam(40),s3pw(15)
6801  common/herfun/hs1(60),hs2(60),hs3(60)
6802  common/const/pi2,sqpi,pwtpi,sqpi2,sq2pi
6803  common/ftsk/stc1i(8,8,40),stc1p(8,8,40),stc2i(8,8),stc2p(8,8)
6804  common/ftth/makti,maktp
6805  logical makti,maktp
6806  tiii=0.
6807  if(.not.makti) then
6808  makti=.true.
6809  kk=1
6810  do k=2,kmax,2
6811  km1=k-1
6812  tt1=0.
6813  jm1=0
6814  xsj1=1.
6815  jj1=1
6816  do j1=1,km1,2
6817  j1km=km1-2*jm1
6818 ! term T(2t3+1,2t2+1,2t1,j1) in table 41
6819  it3j1=it3+jm1
6820  tt=0.
6821  mm=1
6822  do m=1,it3j1+1
6823  mm1=m-1
6824  stoc=rms(1,2*mm1+1)*rms(2,2*(it3j1-mm1)+1)
6825  stc1i(kk,jj1,mm)=fpar(it3j1,mm1)/stoc
6826  it23jm=2*(it2+it3+jm1-mm1)
6827  it1m=2*(it1+mm1)
6828  tt=tt+stc1i(kk,jj1,mm)*hs2(it23jm+2)*hs1(it1m+2)
6829  mm=mm+1
6830  enddo
6831 ! s3pw(j1km+1)=as3**j1km
6832  stoc=rms(3,2*it3j1+1)*s3pw(j1km+1)*xsj1
6833  stc2i(kk,jj1)=2.*fpar(km1,2*jm1)*stoc
6834  tt1=tt1+tt*stc2i(kk,jj1)
6835  xsj1=-xsj1
6836  jm1=jm1+1
6837  jj1=jj1+1
6838  enddo
6839  tiii=tt1*ck(k)+tiii
6840  kk=kk+1
6841  enddo
6842  return
6843  else
6844  kk=1
6845  do k=2,kmax,2
6846  km1=k-1
6847  tt1=0.
6848  jm1=0
6849  jj1=1
6850  do j1=1,km1,2
6851  j1km=km1-2*jm1
6852 ! term T(2t3+1,2t2+1,2t1+1,j1) in table 41
6853  it3j1=it3+jm1
6854  tt=0.
6855  mm=1
6856  do m=1,it3j1+1
6857  mm1=m-1
6858  it23jm=2*(it2+it3+jm1-mm1)
6859  it1m=2*(it1+mm1)
6860  tt=tt+stc1i(kk,jj1,mm)*hs2(it23jm+2)*hs1(it1m+2)
6861  mm1=mm1+1
6862  enddo
6863  tt1=tt1+tt*stc2i(kk,jj1)
6864  jm1=jm1+1
6865  jj1=jj1+1
6866  enddo
6867  tiii=tt1*ck(k)+tiii
6868  kk=kk+1
6869  enddo
6870  return
6871  endif
6872  end
6873 
6878  FUNCTION tppp(it1,it2,it3)
6879  implicit real(8) (a-h,o-z)
6880  common/randu/ck(15),kmax
6881  common/gauss1/absg(40),wg(40),igaus
6882  common/circu/co(40,50),sn(40,50),blam(40,100)
6883  common/rms/rms(3,50),s1,s2,s3
6884  common/cars3/exs3,exs2,exs1,as3,sgns3,s32,pwas3,pw3as3
6885  common/comtab/hsint(40,2,60),sqblam(40),s3pw(15)
6886  common/herfun/hs1(60),hs2(60),hs3(60)
6887  common/const/pi2,sqpi,pwtpi,sqpi2,sq2pi
6888  common/ftsk/stc1i(8,8,40),stc1p(8,8,40),stc2i(8,8),stc2p(8,8)
6889  common/ftth/makti,maktp
6890  logical makti,maktp
6891  tppp=0.
6892  if(.not.maktp) then
6893  maktp=.true.
6894  kk=1
6895  do k=2,kmax,2
6896  km1=k-1
6897  xsj1=1
6898  tt1=0.
6899  jm1=0
6900  jj1=1
6901  do j1=1,km1,2
6902  j1km=km1-2*jm1-1
6903 ! j1km must be always greather or equal to zero
6904  if(j1km.lt.0) EXIT
6905 ! T(2t3,2t2,2t1,j1) in table 41
6906  it3j1=it3+jm1
6907  tt=0.
6908  mm=1
6909  do m=1,it3j1+1
6910  mm1=m-1
6911  stoc=rms(1,2*mm1+1)*rms(2,2*(it3j1-mm1)+1)
6912  stc1p(kk,jj1,mm)=fpar(it3j1,mm1)/stoc
6913  it23jm=2*(it2+it3+jm1-mm1)
6914  it1m=2*(it1+mm1)
6915  tt=tt+stc1p(kk,jj1,mm)*hs2(it23jm+1)*hs1(it1m+1)
6916  mm=mm+1
6917  enddo
6918 ! s3pw(j1km+1)=as3**j1km
6919  stoc=rms(3,2*it3j1+1)*s3pw(j1km+1)*xsj1
6920  stc2p(kk,jj1)=2.*fpar(km1,2*jm1+1)*stoc
6921  tt1=tt1+tt*stc2p(kk,jj1)
6922  xsj1=-xsj1
6923  jm1=jm1+1
6924  jj1=jj1+1
6925  enddo
6926  if(j1km.ge.0) then
6927  tppp=tt1*ck(k)+tppp
6928  kk=kk+1
6929  endif
6930  enddo
6931  return
6932  else
6933  kk=1
6934  do k=2,kmax,2
6935  km1=k-1
6936  tt1=0.
6937  jm1=0
6938  jj1=1
6939  do j1=1,km1,2
6940  j1km=km1-2*jm1-1
6941 ! j1km must be always greather or equal to zero
6942  if(j1km.lt.0) EXIT
6943 ! T(2t3,2t2,2t1,j1) in table 41
6944  it3j1=it3+jm1
6945  tt=0.
6946  mm=1
6947  do m=1,it3j1+1
6948  mm1=m-1
6949  it23jm=2*(it2+it3+jm1-mm1)
6950  it1m=2*(it1+mm1)
6951  tt=tt+stc1p(kk,jj1,mm)*hs2(it23jm+1)*hs1(it1m+1)
6952  mm=mm+1
6953  enddo
6954  tt1=tt1+tt*stc2p(kk,jj1)
6955  jm1=jm1+1
6956  jj1=jj1+1
6957  enddo
6958  if(j1km.ge.0) then
6959  tppp=tt1*ck(k)+tppp
6960  kk=kk+1
6961  endif
6962  enddo
6963  return
6964  endif
6965  end
6966 
6971  FUNCTION tpip(it1,it2,it3)
6972  implicit real(8) (a-h,o-z)
6973  common/randu/ck(15),kmax
6974  common/gauss1/absg(40),wg(40),igaus
6975  common/circu/co(40,50),sn(40,50),blam(40,100)
6976  common/rms/rms(3,50),s1,s2,s3
6977  common/cars3/exs3,exs2,exs1,as3,sgns3,s32,pwas3,pw3as3
6978  common/comtab/hsint(40,2,60),sqblam(40),s3pw(15)
6979  common/herfun/hs1(60),hs2(60),hs3(60)
6980  common/const/pi2,sqpi,pwtpi,sqpi2,sq2pi
6981  common/ftsk/stc1i(8,8,40),stc1p(8,8,40),stc2i(8,8),stc2p(8,8)
6982  common/ftth/makti,maktp
6983  logical makti,maktp
6984  tpip=0.
6985  if(.not.maktp) then
6986  maktp=.true.
6987  kk=1
6988  do k=2,kmax,2
6989  km1=k-1
6990  xsj1=1
6991  tt1=0.
6992  jm1=0
6993  jj1=1
6994  do j1=1,km1,2
6995  j1km=km1-2*jm1-1
6996 ! j1km must be always greather or equal to zero
6997  if(j1km.lt.0) EXIT
6998 ! T(2t3,2t2,2t1,j1) in table 41
6999  it3j1=it3+jm1
7000  tt=0.
7001  mm=1
7002  do m=1,it3j1+1
7003  mm1=m-1
7004  stoc=rms(1,2*mm1+1)*rms(2,2*(it3j1-mm1)+1)
7005  stc1p(kk,jj1,mm)=fpar(it3j1,mm1)/stoc
7006  it23jm=2*(it2+it3+jm1-mm1)
7007  it1m=2*(it1+mm1)
7008  tt=tt+stc1p(kk,jj1,mm)*hs2(it23jm+2)*hs1(it1m+1)
7009  mm=mm+1
7010  enddo
7011 ! s3pw(j1km+1)=as3**j1km
7012  stoc=rms(3,2*it3j1+1)*s3pw(j1km+1)*xsj1
7013  stc2p(kk,jj1)=2.*fpar(km1,2*jm1+1)*stoc
7014  tt1=tt1+tt*stc2p(kk,jj1)
7015  xsj1=-xsj1
7016  jm1=jm1+1
7017  jj1=jj1+1
7018  enddo
7019  if(j1km.ge.0) then
7020  tpip=tt1*ck(k)+tpip
7021  kk=kk+1
7022  endif
7023  enddo
7024  return
7025  else
7026  kk=1
7027  do k=2,kmax,2
7028  km1=k-1
7029  tt1=0.
7030  jm1=0
7031  jj1=1
7032  do j1=1,km1,2
7033  j1km=km1-2*jm1-1
7034 ! j1km must be always greather or equal to zero
7035  if(j1km.lt.0) EXIT
7036 ! T(2t3,2t2,2t1,j1) in table 41
7037  it3j1=it3+jm1
7038  tt=0.
7039  mm=1
7040  do m=1,it3j1+1
7041  mm1=m-1
7042  it23jm=2*(it2+it3+jm1-mm1)
7043  it1m=2*(it1+mm1)
7044  tt=tt+stc1p(kk,jj1,mm)*hs2(it23jm+2)*hs1(it1m+1)
7045  mm=mm+1
7046  enddo
7047  tt1=tt1+tt*stc2p(kk,jj1)
7048  jm1=jm1+1
7049  jj1=jj1+1
7050  enddo
7051  if(j1km.ge.0) then
7052  tpip=tt1*ck(k)+tpip
7053  kk=kk+1
7054  endif
7055  enddo
7056  return
7057  endif
7058  end
7059 
7064  FUNCTION tppi(it1,it2,it3)
7065  implicit real(8) (a-h,o-z)
7066  common/randu/ck(15),kmax
7067  common/gauss1/absg(40),wg(40),igaus
7068  common/circu/co(40,50),sn(40,50),blam(40,100)
7069  common/rms/rms(3,50),s1,s2,s3
7070  common/cars3/exs3,exs2,exs1,as3,sgns3,s32,pwas3,pw3as3
7071  common/comtab/hsint(40,2,60),sqblam(40),s3pw(15)
7072  common/herfun/hs1(60),hs2(60),hs3(60)
7073  common/const/pi2,sqpi,pwtpi,sqpi2,sq2pi
7074  common/ftsk/stc1i(8,8,40),stc1p(8,8,40),stc2i(8,8),stc2p(8,8)
7075  common/ftth/makti,maktp
7076  logical makti,maktp
7077  tppi=0.
7078  if(.not.maktp) then
7079  maktp=.true.
7080  kk=1
7081  do k=2,kmax,2
7082  km1=k-1
7083  xsj1=1
7084  tt1=0.
7085  jm1=0
7086  jj1=1
7087  do j1=1,km1,2
7088  j1km=km1-2*jm1-1
7089 ! j1km must be always greather or equal to zero
7090  if(j1km.lt.0) EXIT
7091 ! T(2t3,2t2,2t1,j1) in table 41
7092  it3j1=it3+jm1
7093  tt=0.
7094  mm=1
7095  do m=1,it3j1+1
7096  mm1=m-1
7097  stoc=rms(1,2*mm1+1)*rms(2,2*(it3j1-mm1)+1)
7098  stc1p(kk,jj1,mm)=fpar(it3j1,mm1)/stoc
7099  it23jm=2*(it2+it3+jm1-mm1)
7100  it1m=2*(it1+mm1)
7101  tt=tt+stc1p(kk,jj1,mm)*hs2(it23jm+1)*hs1(it1m+2)
7102  mm=mm+1
7103  enddo
7104 ! s3pw(j1km+1)=as3**j1km
7105  stoc=rms(3,2*it3j1+1)*s3pw(j1km+1)*xsj1
7106  stc2p(kk,jj1)=2.*fpar(km1,2*jm1+1)*stoc
7107  tt1=tt1+tt*stc2p(kk,jj1)
7108  xsj1=-xsj1
7109  jm1=jm1+1
7110  jj1=jj1+1
7111  enddo
7112  if(j1km.ge.0) then
7113  tppi=tt1*ck(k)+tppi
7114  kk=kk+1
7115  endif
7116  enddo
7117  return
7118  else
7119  kk=1
7120  do k=2,kmax,2
7121  km1=k-1
7122  tt1=0.
7123  jm1=0
7124  jj1=1
7125  do j1=1,km1,2
7126  j1km=km1-2*jm1-1
7127 ! j1km must be always greather or equal to zero
7128  if(j1km.lt.0) EXIT
7129 ! T(2t3,2t2,2t1,j1) in table 41
7130  it3j1=it3+jm1
7131  tt=0.
7132  mm=1
7133  do m=1,it3j1+1
7134  mm1=m-1
7135  it23jm=2*(it2+it3+jm1-mm1)
7136  it1m=2*(it1+mm1)
7137  tt=tt+stc1p(kk,jj1,mm)*hs2(it23jm+1)*hs1(it1m+2)
7138  mm=mm+1
7139  enddo
7140  tt1=tt1+tt*stc2p(kk,jj1)
7141  jm1=jm1+1
7142  jj1=jj1+1
7143  enddo
7144  if(j1km.ge.0) then
7145  tppi=tt1*ck(k)+tppi
7146  kk=kk+1
7147  endif
7148  enddo
7149  return
7150  endif
7151  end
7152 
7157  FUNCTION tpii(it1,it2,it3)
7158  implicit real(8) (a-h,o-z)
7159  common/randu/ck(15),kmax
7160  common/gauss1/absg(40),wg(40),igaus
7161  common/circu/co(40,50),sn(40,50),blam(40,100)
7162  common/rms/rms(3,50),s1,s2,s3
7163  common/cars3/exs3,exs2,exs1,as3,sgns3,s32,pwas3,pw3as3
7164  common/comtab/hsint(40,2,60),sqblam(40),s3pw(15)
7165  common/herfun/hs1(60),hs2(60),hs3(60)
7166  common/const/pi2,sqpi,pwtpi,sqpi2,sq2pi
7167  common/ftsk/stc1i(8,8,40),stc1p(8,8,40),stc2i(8,8),stc2p(8,8)
7168  common/ftth/makti,maktp
7169  logical makti,maktp
7170  tpii=0.
7171  if(.not.maktp) then
7172  maktp=.true.
7173  kk=1
7174  do k=2,kmax,2
7175  km1=k-1
7176  xsj1=1
7177  tt1=0.
7178  jm1=0
7179  jj1=1
7180  do j1=1,km1,2
7181  j1km=km1-2*jm1-1
7182 ! j1km must be always greather or equal to zero
7183  if(j1km.lt.0) EXIT
7184 ! T(2t3,2t2,2t1,j1) in table 41
7185  it3j1=it3+jm1
7186  tt=0.
7187  mm=1
7188  do m=1,it3j1+1
7189  mm1=m-1
7190  stoc=rms(1,2*mm1+1)*rms(2,2*(it3j1-mm1)+1)
7191  stc1p(kk,jj1,mm)=fpar(it3j1,mm1)/stoc
7192  it23jm=2*(it2+it3+jm1-mm1)
7193  it1m=2*(it1+mm1)
7194  tt=tt+stc1p(kk,jj1,mm)*hs2(it23jm+2)*hs1(it1m+2)
7195  mm=mm+1
7196  enddo
7197 ! s3pw(j1km+1)=as3**j1km
7198  stoc=rms(3,2*it3j1+1)*s3pw(j1km+1)*xsj1
7199  stc2p(kk,jj1)=2.*fpar(km1,2*jm1+1)*stoc
7200  tt1=tt1+tt*stc2p(kk,jj1)
7201  xsj1=-xsj1
7202  jm1=jm1+1
7203  jj1=jj1+1
7204  enddo
7205  if(j1km.ge.0) then
7206  tpii=tt1*ck(k)+tpii
7207  kk=kk+1
7208  endif
7209  enddo
7210  return
7211  else
7212  kk=1
7213  do k=2,kmax,2
7214  km1=k-1
7215  tt1=0.
7216  jm1=0
7217  jj1=1
7218  do j1=1,km1,2
7219  j1km=km1-2*jm1-1
7220 ! j1km must be always greather or equal to zero
7221  if(j1km.lt.0) EXIT
7222 ! T(2t3,2t2,2t1,j1) in table 41
7223  it3j1=it3+jm1
7224  tt=0.
7225  mm=1
7226  do m=1,it3j1+1
7227  mm1=m-1
7228  it23jm=2*(it2+it3+jm1-mm1)
7229  it1m=2*(it1+mm1)
7230  tt=tt+stc1p(kk,jj1,mm)*hs2(it23jm+1)*hs1(it1m+2)
7231  mm=mm+1
7232  enddo
7233  tt1=tt1+tt*stc2p(kk,jj1)
7234  jm1=jm1+1
7235  jj1=jj1+1
7236  enddo
7237  if(j1km.ge.0) then
7238  tpii=tt1*ck(k)+tpii
7239  kk=kk+1
7240  endif
7241  enddo
7242  return
7243  endif
7244  end
7245 
7250  FUNCTION sipp(it1,it2,it3)
7251  implicit real(8) (a-h,o-z)
7252  common/consta/vl,pi,xmat,rpel,qst
7253  common/randu/ck(15),kmax
7254  common/gauss1/absg(40),wg(40),igaus
7255  common/circu/co(40,50),sn(40,50),blam(40,100)
7256  common/rms/rms(3,50),s1,s2,s3
7257  common/comtab/hsint(40,2,60),sqblam(40),s3pw(15)
7258  common/const/pi2,sqpi,pwtpi,sqpi2,sq2pi
7259  common/cars3/exs3,exs2,exs1,as3,sgns3,s32,pwas3,pw3as3
7260  common/hass/carg(100),sarg(100),argip(100)
7261  common/fssk/sstci(8,8),sstcp(8,8)
7262  common/fsth/maksi,maksp
7263  logical maksi,maksp
7264  sipp=0.
7265  it1p=2*it1+1
7266  it2p=2*it2+1
7267  it12p=2*(it1+it2+1)+1
7268  bsp=rms(1,it1p+1)*rms(2,it2p+1)/(sq2pi*rms(3,it12p))
7269  kk=1
7270  do k=1,kmax,2
7271  xsj1=-1.
7272  km1=k-1
7273  tt1=0.
7274  jm1=0
7275  jj2=1
7276  do j1=1,km1,2
7277  jj1=2*jm1+1
7278  j1km=km1-jj1
7279  if(j1km.lt.0) EXIT
7280 ! S(2t3+1,2t2,2t1,j1) computation
7281 ! Gauss quadrature in table 70-b
7282  i1123j1=it1+it2+it3+jm1+1
7283  i2123j1=2*i1123j1
7284  tt=0.
7285  do ig=1,igaus
7286 ! Hermite functions are in the table hsint(ig,,ind )
7287 ! caution!! !! in the table hsint the indice ind is starting from 1
7288 ! i2123j1 is starting from zero
7289  base=co(ig,it1p)*sn(ig,it2p)/blam(ig,i1123j1)
7290  htm0=hsint(ig,2,i2123j1+1)
7291  htp0=hsint(ig,1,i2123j1+1)
7292  tt=tt+base/sqblam(ig)*(htm0+htp0)
7293  enddo
7294  if(.not.maksi) then
7295 ! s3pw(j1km+1)=as3**j1km
7296  stock=2.*xsj1*s3pw(j1km+1)
7297  sstci(kk,jj2)=fpar(km1,jj1)*stock
7298  xsj1=-xsj1
7299  endif
7300  tt1=sstci(kk,jj2)*tt+tt1
7301  jj2=jj2+1
7302  jm1=jm1+1
7303  enddo
7304  if(j1km.ge.0) then
7305  sipp=sipp+tt1*ck(k)
7306  kk=kk+1
7307 ! enddo from k (k=1,kmax+1)
7308  endif
7309  enddo
7310  sipp=sipp*bsp
7311  maksi=.true.
7312  return
7313  end
7314 
7319  FUNCTION siip(it1,it2,it3)
7320  implicit real(8) (a-h,o-z)
7321  common/consta/vl,pi,xmat,rpel,qst
7322  common/randu/ck(15),kmax
7323  common/gauss1/absg(40),wg(40),igaus
7324  common/circu/co(40,50),sn(40,50),blam(40,100)
7325  common/rms/rms(3,50),s1,s2,s3
7326  common/comtab/hsint(40,2,60),sqblam(40),s3pw(15)
7327  common/const/pi2,sqpi,pwtpi,sqpi2,sq2pi
7328  common/cars3/exs3,exs2,exs1,as3,sgns3,s32,pwas3,pw3as3
7329  common/fssk/sstci(8,8),sstcp(8,8)
7330  common/fsth/maksi,maksp
7331  logical maksi,maksp
7332  siip=0.
7333  it1p=2*it1+1
7334  it2p=2*it2+2
7335  it12p=2*(it1+it2+2)
7336  bsp=rms(1,it1p+1)*rms(2,it2p+1)/(sq2pi*rms(3,it12p))
7337  kk=1
7338  do k=1,kmax,2
7339  xsj1=-1.
7340  km1=k-1
7341  tt1=0.
7342  jm1=0
7343  jj2=1
7344  do j1=1,km1,2
7345  jj1=2*jm1+1
7346  j1km=km1-jj1
7347  if(j1km.lt.0) EXIT
7348 ! S(2t3+1,2t2,2t1,j1) computation
7349 ! Gauss quadrature in table 70-b
7350  i1123j1=it1+it2+it3+jm1+2
7351  i2123j1=2*i1123j1-1
7352  tt=0.
7353  do ig=1,igaus
7354 ! Hermite functions
7355  base=co(ig,it1p)*sn(ig,it2p)/blam(ig,i1123j1)
7356  htm0=hsint(ig,2,i2123j1+1)
7357  htp0=hsint(ig,1,i2123j1+1)
7358  tt=tt+base*(htp0-htm0)
7359  enddo
7360  if(.not.maksi) then
7361 ! s3pw(j1km+1)=as3**j1km
7362  stock=2.*xsj1*s3pw(j1km+1)
7363  sstci(kk,jj2)=fpar(km1,jj1)*stock
7364  xsj1=-xsj1
7365  endif
7366  tt1=sstci(kk,jj2)*tt+tt1
7367  jj2=jj2+1
7368  jm1=jm1+1
7369  enddo
7370  if(j1km.ge.0) then
7371  siip=siip+tt1*ck(k)
7372  kk=kk+1
7373  endif
7374 ! enddo from k (k=1,kmax+1)
7375  enddo
7376  siip=siip*bsp
7377  maksi=.true.
7378  return
7379  end
7380 
7385  FUNCTION sipi(it1,it2,it3)
7386  implicit real(8) (a-h,o-z)
7387  common/consta/vl,pi,xmat,rpel,qst
7388  common/randu/ck(15),kmax
7389  common/gauss1/absg(40),wg(40),igaus
7390  common/circu/co(40,50),sn(40,50),blam(40,100)
7391  common/rms/rms(3,50),s1,s2,s3
7392  common/comtab/hsint(40,2,60),sqblam(40),s3pw(15)
7393  common/const/pi2,sqpi,pwtpi,sqpi2,sq2pi
7394  common/cars3/exs3,exs2,exs1,as3,sgns3,s32,pwas3,pw3as3
7395  common/fssk/sstci(8,8),sstcp(8,8)
7396  common/fsth/maksi,maksp
7397  logical maksi,maksp
7398  sipi=0.
7399  it1p=2*it1+2
7400  it2p=2*it2+1
7401  it12p=2*(it1+it2+2)
7402  bsp=rms(1,it1p+1)*rms(2,it2p+1)/(sq2pi*rms(3,it12p))
7403  kk=1
7404  do k=1,kmax,2
7405  xsj1=-1.
7406  km1=k-1
7407  tt1=0.
7408  jm1=0
7409  jj2=1
7410  do j1=1,km1,2
7411  jj1=2*jm1+1
7412  j1km=km1-jj1
7413  if(j1km.lt.0) EXIT
7414 ! S(2t3+1,2t2,2t1,j1) computation
7415 ! Gauss quadrature in table 70-b
7416  i1123j1=it1+it2+it3+jm1+2
7417  i2123j1=2*i1123j1-1
7418  tt=0.
7419  do ig=1,igaus
7420 ! Hermite functions
7421  base=co(ig,it1p)*sn(ig,it2p)/blam(ig,i1123j1)
7422  htm0=hsint(ig,2,i2123j1+1)
7423  htp0=hsint(ig,1,i2123j1+1)
7424  tt=tt+base*(htp0+htm0)
7425  enddo
7426  if(.not.maksi) then
7427 ! s3pw(j1km+1)=as3**j1km
7428  stock=2.*xsj1*s3pw(j1km+1)
7429  sstci(kk,jj2)=fpar(km1,jj1)*stock
7430  xsj1=-xsj1
7431  endif
7432  tt1=sstci(kk,jj2)*tt+tt1
7433  jj2=jj2+1
7434  jm1=jm1+1
7435  enddo
7436  if(j1km.ge.0) then
7437  sipi=sipi+tt1*ck(k)
7438  kk=kk+1
7439  endif
7440 ! enddo from k (k=1,kmax+1)
7441  enddo
7442  sipi=sipi*bsp
7443  maksi=.true.
7444  return
7445  end
7446 
7451  FUNCTION siii(it1,it2,it3)
7452  implicit real(8) (a-h,o-z)
7453  common/consta/vl,pi,xmat,rpel,qst
7454  common/randu/ck(15),kmax
7455  common/gauss1/absg(40),wg(40),igaus
7456  common/circu/co(40,50),sn(40,50),blam(40,100)
7457  common/rms/rms(3,50),s1,s2,s3
7458  common/comtab/hsint(40,2,60),sqblam(40),s3pw(15)
7459  common/const/pi2,sqpi,pwtpi,sqpi2,sq2pi
7460  common/cars3/exs3,exs2,exs1,as3,sgns3,s32,pwas3,pw3as3
7461  common/fssk/sstci(8,8),sstcp(8,8)
7462  common/fsth/maksi,maksp
7463  logical maksi,maksp
7464  siii=0.
7465  it1p=2*it1+2
7466  it2p=2*it2+2
7467  it12p=2*(it1+it2+2)+1
7468  bsp=rms(1,it1p+1)*rms(2,it2p+1)/(sq2pi*rms(3,it12p))
7469  kk=1
7470  do k=1,kmax,2
7471  xsj1=-1.
7472  km1=k-1
7473  tt1=0.
7474  jm1=0
7475  jj2=1
7476  do j1=1,km1,2
7477  jj1=2*jm1+1
7478  j1km=km1-jj1
7479  if(j1km.lt.0) EXIT
7480 ! S(2t3+1,2t2,2t1,j1) computation
7481 ! Gauss quadrature in table 70-b
7482  i1123j1=it1+it2+it3+jm1+2
7483  i2123j1=2*i1123j1
7484  tt=0.
7485  do ig=1,igaus
7486 ! Hermite functions
7487  base=co(ig,it1p)*sn(ig,it2p)/blam(ig,i1123j1)
7488  htm0=hsint(ig,2,i2123j1+1)
7489  htp0=hsint(ig,1,i2123j1+1)
7490  tt=tt+base*(htm0-htp0)/sqblam(ig)
7491  enddo
7492  if(.not.maksi) then
7493 ! s3pw(j1km+1)=as3**j1km
7494  stock=2.*xsj1*s3pw(j1km+1)
7495  sstci(kk,jj2)=fpar(km1,jj1)*stock
7496  xsj1=-xsj1
7497  endif
7498  tt1=sstci(kk,jj2)*tt+tt1
7499  jj2=jj2+1
7500  jm1=jm1+1
7501  enddo
7502  if(j1km.ge.0) then
7503  siii=siii+tt1*ck(k)
7504  kk=kk+1
7505  endif
7506 ! enddo from k (k=1,kmax+1)
7507  enddo
7508  siii=-siii*bsp
7509  maksi=.true.
7510  return
7511  end
7512 
7517  FUNCTION sppp(it1,it2,it3)
7518  implicit real(8) (a-h,o-z)
7519  common/consta/vl,pi,xmat,rpel,qst
7520  common/randu/ck(15),kmax
7521  common/gauss1/absg(40),wg(40),igaus
7522  common/circu/co(40,50),sn(40,50),blam(40,100)
7523  common/rms/rms(3,50),s1,s2,s3
7524  common/comtab/hsint(40,2,60),sqblam(40),s3pw(15)
7525  common/const/pi2,sqpi,pwtpi,sqpi2,sq2pi
7526  common/cars3/exs3,exs2,exs1,as3,sgns3,s32,pwas3,pw3as3
7527  common/fssk/sstci(8,8),sstcp(8,8)
7528  common/fsth/maksi,maksp
7529  logical maksi,maksp
7530  sppp=0.
7531  it1p=2*it1+1
7532  it2p=2*it2+1
7533  it12p=2*(it1+it2+1)+1
7534  bsp=rms(1,it1p+1)*rms(2,it2p+1)/(sq2pi*rms(3,it12p))
7535  kk=1
7536  do k=1,kmax,2
7537  km1=k-1
7538  xsj1=1
7539  tt1=0.
7540  jj1=1
7541  do j1=1,k
7542  jm1=j1-1
7543  j1km=km1-2*jm1
7544  if(j1km.lt.0) EXIT
7545 ! j1km must be always greather or equal to zero
7546 ! Gauss quadrature in table 70-a
7547  i1123j1=it1+it2+it3+jm1
7548  i2123j1=2*i1123j1
7549  tt=0.
7550  do ig=1,igaus
7551 ! Hermite functions
7552  base=co(ig,it1p)*sn(ig,it2p)/blam(ig,i1123j1)
7553  htm0=hsint(ig,2,i2123j1+1)
7554  htp0=hsint(ig,1,i2123j1+1)
7555  tt=tt+base*(htm0+htp0)/sqblam(ig)
7556  enddo
7557  if(.not.maksp) then
7558 ! s3pw(j1km+1)=as3**j1km
7559  stock=2.*xsj1*s3pw(j1km+1)
7560  sstcp(kk,jj1)=fpar(km1,2*jm1)*stock
7561  xsj1=-xsj1
7562  endif
7563  tt1=sstcp(kk,jj1)*tt+tt1
7564 ! enddo from j1
7565  jj1=jj1+1
7566  enddo
7567  sppp=sppp+tt1*ck(k)
7568  kk=kk+1
7569 ! enddo from k (k=1,kmax+1)
7570  enddo
7571  sppp=sppp*bsp
7572  maksp=.true.
7573  return
7574  end
7575 
7580  FUNCTION spip(it1,it2,it3)
7581  implicit real(8) (a-h,o-z)
7582  common/consta/vl,pi,xmat,rpel,qst
7583  common/randu/ck(15),kmax
7584  common/gauss1/absg(40),wg(40),igaus
7585  common/circu/co(40,50),sn(40,50),blam(40,100)
7586  common/rms/rms(3,50),s1,s2,s3
7587  common/comtab/hsint(40,2,60),sqblam(40),s3pw(15)
7588  common/const/pi2,sqpi,pwtpi,sqpi2,sq2pi
7589  common/cars3/exs3,exs2,exs1,as3,sgns3,s32,pwas3,pw3as3
7590  common/fssk/sstci(8,8),sstcp(8,8)
7591  common/fsth/maksi,maksp
7592  logical maksi,maksp
7593  spip=0.
7594  it1p=2*it1+1
7595  it2p=2*it2+2
7596  it12p=2*(it1+it2+1)+2
7597  bsp=rms(1,it1p+1)*rms(2,it2p+1)/(sq2pi*rms(3,it12p))
7598  kk=1
7599  do k=1,kmax,2
7600  km1=k-1
7601  xsj1=1
7602  tt1=0.
7603  jj1=1
7604  do j1=1,k
7605  jm1=j1-1
7606  j1km=km1-2*jm1
7607  if(j1km.lt.0) EXIT
7608 ! j1km must be always greather or equal to zero
7609 ! Gauss quadrature in table 70-a
7610  i1123j1=it1+it2+it3+jm1
7611  i2123j1=2*i1123j1+1
7612  tt=0.
7613  do ig=1,igaus
7614 ! Hermite functions
7615  base=co(ig,it1p)*sn(ig,it2p)/blam(ig,i1123j1+1)
7616  htm0=hsint(ig,2,i2123j1+1)
7617  htp0=hsint(ig,1,i2123j1+1)
7618  tt=tt+base*(htp0-htm0)
7619  enddo
7620  if(.not.maksp) then
7621 ! s3pw(j1km+1)=as3**j1km
7622  stock=2.*xsj1*s3pw(j1km+1)
7623  sstcp(kk,jj1)=fpar(km1,2*jm1)*stock
7624  xsj1=-xsj1
7625  endif
7626  tt1=sstcp(kk,jj1)*tt+tt1
7627 ! enddo from j1
7628  jj1=jj1+1
7629  enddo
7630  spip=spip+tt1*ck(k)
7631  kk=kk+1
7632 ! enddo from k (k=1,kmax+1)
7633  enddo
7634  spip=spip*bsp
7635  maksp=.true.
7636  return
7637  end
7638 
7643  FUNCTION sppi(it1,it2,it3)
7644  implicit real(8) (a-h,o-z)
7645  common/consta/vl,pi,xmat,rpel,qst
7646  common/randu/ck(15),kmax
7647  common/gauss1/absg(40),wg(40),igaus
7648  common/circu/co(40,50),sn(40,50),blam(40,100)
7649  common/rms/rms(3,50),s1,s2,s3
7650  common/comtab/hsint(40,2,60),sqblam(40),s3pw(15)
7651  common/const/pi2,sqpi,pwtpi,sqpi2,sq2pi
7652  common/cars3/exs3,exs2,exs1,as3,sgns3,s32,pwas3,pw3as3
7653  common/fssk/sstci(8,8),sstcp(8,8)
7654  common/fsth/maksi,maksp
7655  logical maksi,maksp
7656  sppi=0.
7657  it1p=2*it1+2
7658  it2p=2*it2+1
7659  it12p=2*(it1+it2+1)+2
7660  bsp=rms(1,it1p+1)*rms(2,it2p+1)/(sq2pi*rms(3,it12p))
7661  kk=1
7662  do k=1,kmax,2
7663  km1=k-1
7664  xsj1=1.
7665  tt1=0.
7666  jj1=1
7667  do j1=1,k
7668  jm1=j1-1
7669  j1km=km1-2*jm1
7670 ! j1km must be always greather or equal to zero
7671  if(j1km.lt.0) EXIT
7672 ! Gauss quadrature in table 70-a
7673  i1123j1=it1+it2+it3+jm1
7674  i2123j1=2*i1123j1+1
7675  tt=0.
7676  do ig=1,igaus
7677 ! Hermite functions
7678  base=co(ig,it1p)*sn(ig,it2p)/blam(ig,i1123j1+1)
7679  htm0=hsint(ig,2,i2123j1+1)
7680  htp0=hsint(ig,1,i2123j1+1)
7681  tt=tt+base*(htm0+htp0)
7682  enddo
7683  if(.not.maksp) then
7684 ! s3pw(j1km+1)=as3**j1km
7685  stock=2.*xsj1*s3pw(j1km+1)
7686  sstcp(kk,jj1)=fpar(km1,2*jm1)*stock
7687  xsj1=-xsj1
7688  endif
7689  tt1=sstcp(kk,jj1)*tt+tt1
7690 ! enddo from j1
7691  jj1=jj1+1
7692  enddo
7693  sppi=sppi+tt1*ck(k)
7694  kk=kk+1
7695 ! enddo from k (k=1,kmax+1)
7696  enddo
7697  sppi=sppi*bsp
7698  maksp=.true.
7699  return
7700  end
7701 
7706  FUNCTION spii(it1,it2,it3)
7707  implicit real(8) (a-h,o-z)
7708  common/consta/vl,pi,xmat,rpel,qst
7709  common/randu/ck(15),kmax
7710  common/gauss1/absg(40),wg(40),igaus
7711  common/circu/co(40,50),sn(40,50),blam(40,100)
7712  common/rms/rms(3,50),s1,s2,s3
7713  common/comtab/hsint(40,2,60),sqblam(40),s3pw(15)
7714  common/const/pi2,sqpi,pwtpi,sqpi2,sq2pi
7715  common/cars3/exs3,exs2,exs1,as3,sgns3,s32,pwas3,pw3as3
7716  common/fssk/sstci(8,8),sstcp(8,8)
7717  common/fsth/maksi,maksp
7718  logical maksi,maksp
7719  spii=0.
7720  it1p=2*it1+2
7721  it2p=2*it2+2
7722  it12p=2*(it1+it2+2)+1
7723  bsp=rms(1,it1p+1)*rms(2,it2p+1)/(sq2pi*rms(3,it12p))
7724  kk=1
7725  do k=1,kmax,2
7726  km1=k-1
7727  xsj1=1.
7728  tt1=0.
7729  jj1=1
7730  do j1=1,k
7731  jm1=j1-1
7732  j1km=km1-2*jm1
7733  if(j1km.lt.0) EXIT
7734 ! j1km must be always greather or equal to zero
7735 ! Gauss quadrature in table 70-a
7736  i1123j1=it1+it2+it3+jm1
7737  i2123j1=2*i1123j1+2
7738  tt=0.
7739  do ig=1,igaus
7740 ! Hermite functions
7741  base=co(ig,it1p)*sn(ig,it2p)/blam(ig,i1123j1+1)
7742  htm0=hsint(ig,2,i2123j1+1)
7743  htp0=hsint(ig,1,i2123j1+1)
7744  tt=tt+base*(htm0-htp0)/sqblam(ig)
7745  enddo
7746  if(.not.maksp) then
7747 ! s3pw(j1km+1)=as3**j1km
7748  stock=2.*xsj1*s3pw(j1km+1)
7749  sstcp(kk,jj1)=fpar(km1,2*jm1)*stock
7750  xsj1=-xsj1
7751  endif
7752  tt1=sstcp(kk,jj1)*tt+tt1
7753 ! enddo from j1
7754  jj1=jj1+1
7755  enddo
7756  spii=spii+tt1*ck(k)
7757  kk=kk+1
7758 ! enddo from k (k=1,kmax+1)
7759  enddo
7760  maksp=.true.
7761  spii=-spii*bsp
7762  return
7763  end
7764 !****************************************************************
7765 ! funtions sigma in table 14
7766 ! these functions are used in tables 77-a-1 to 77-b-2
7767 ! sgppp -->l,m and n even
7768 ! sgpip --> l even, m odd, n even
7769 ! .................................
7770 !*****************************************************************
7776  FUNCTION sgppp(it1,it2,it3)
7777  implicit real(8) (a-h,o-z)
7778  common/rms/rms(3,50),s1,s2,s3
7779  common/herfun/hs1(60),hs2(60),hs3(60)
7780  common/cars3/exs3,exs2,exs1,as3,sgns3,s32,pwas3,pw3as3
7781  common/sgsk/sgp3(30),sgi3(30),sgrp(30,30),sgri(30,30)
7782  common/sgpth/mksgi,mksgp
7783  logical mksgi,mksgp
7784  sgppp=0.
7785  if(it3.eq.0) return
7786  sgn=-1.
7787  if(.not.mksgp) then
7788  mksgp=.true.
7789  do ik=1,it3
7790  sg1=0.
7791  km2=2*ik-2
7792  it3kp1=it3-ik+1
7793  it3k=2*(it3-ik)
7794  sgp3(ik)=sgn*hs3(km2+1)*rms(3,it3k+1)
7795  do jk=1,it3kp1
7796  jkm1=jk-1
7797  jt3kj=2*(it3-ik-jkm1)
7798  jt23kj=2*(it3+it2-ik-jkm1)
7799  jt1j=2*(it1+jkm1)
7800  stoc=rms(1,2*jkm1+1)*rms(2,jt3kj+1)
7801  sgrp(ik,jk)=fpar(it3-ik,jkm1)/stoc
7802  sg1=sg1+sgrp(ik,jk)*hs2(jt23kj+1)*hs1(jt1j+1)
7803  enddo
7804  sgppp=sgppp+sgp3(ik)*sg1
7805  sgn=-sgn
7806  enddo
7807  return
7808  else
7809  do ik=1,it3
7810  sg1=0.
7811  it3kp1=it3-ik+1
7812  do jk=1,it3kp1
7813  jkm1=jk-1
7814  jt23kj=2*(it3+it2-ik-jkm1)
7815  jt1j=2*(it1+jkm1)
7816  sg1=sg1+sgrp(ik,jk)*hs2(jt23kj+1)*hs1(jt1j+1)
7817  enddo
7818  sgppp=sgppp+sgp3(ik)*sg1
7819  enddo
7820  return
7821  endif
7822  end
7823 
7828  FUNCTION sgpip(it1,it2,it3)
7829  implicit real(8) (a-h,o-z)
7830  common/rms/rms(3,50),s1,s2,s3
7831  common/herfun/hs1(60),hs2(60),hs3(60)
7832  common/cars3/exs3,exs2,exs1,as3,sgns3,s32,pwas3,pw3as3
7833  common/sgsk/sgp3(30),sgi3(30),sgrp(30,30),sgri(30,30)
7834  common/sgpth/mksgi,mksgp
7835  logical mksgi,mksgp
7836  sgpip=0.
7837  if(it3.eq.0) return
7838  sgn=-1.
7839  if(.not.mksgp) then
7840  mksgp=.true.
7841  do ik=1,it3
7842  sg1=0.
7843  km2=2*ik-2
7844  it3kp1=it3-ik+1
7845  it3k=2*(it3-ik)
7846 !omment hs30=hs3(km2+1)*rms(3,it3k+1)
7847  sgp3(ik)=sgn*hs3(km2+1)*rms(3,it3k+1)
7848  do jk=1,it3kp1
7849  jkm1=jk-1
7850  jt3kj=2*(it3-ik-jkm1)
7851  jt23kj=2*(it3+it2-ik-jkm1)
7852  jt1j=2*(it1+jkm1)
7853  stoc=rms(1,2*jkm1+1)*rms(2,jt3kj+1)
7854  sgrp(ik,jk)=fpar(it3-ik,jkm1)/stoc
7855  sg1=sg1+sgrp(ik,jk)*hs2(jt23kj+2)*hs1(jt1j+1)
7856  enddo
7857  sgpip=sgpip+sgp3(ik)*sg1
7858  sgn=-sgn
7859  enddo
7860  return
7861  else
7862  do ik=1,it3
7863  sg1=0.
7864  it3kp1=it3-ik+1
7865  do jk=1,it3kp1
7866  jkm1=jk-1
7867  jt23kj=2*(it3+it2-ik-jkm1)
7868  jt1j=2*(it1+jkm1)
7869  sg1=sg1+sgrp(ik,jk)*hs2(jt23kj+2)*hs1(jt1j+1)
7870  enddo
7871  sgpip=sgpip+sgp3(ik)*sg1
7872  enddo
7873  return
7874  endif
7875  end
7876 
7881  FUNCTION sgppi(it1,it2,it3)
7882  implicit real(8) (a-h,o-z)
7883  common/rms/rms(3,50),s1,s2,s3
7884  common/herfun/hs1(60),hs2(60),hs3(60)
7885  common/cars3/exs3,exs2,exs1,as3,sgns3,s32,pwas3,pw3as3
7886  common/sgsk/sgp3(30),sgi3(30),sgrp(30,30),sgri(30,30)
7887  common/sgpth/mksgi,mksgp
7888  logical mksgi,mksgp
7889  sgppi=0.
7890  if(it3.eq.0) return
7891  sgn=-1.
7892  if(.not.mksgp) then
7893  mksgp=.true.
7894  do ik=1,it3
7895  sg1=0.
7896  km2=2*ik-2
7897  it3kp1=it3-ik+1
7898  it3k=2*(it3-ik)
7899  sgp3(ik)=sgn*hs3(km2+1)*rms(3,it3k+1)
7900  do jk=1,it3kp1
7901  jkm1=jk-1
7902  jt3kj=2*(it3-ik-jkm1)
7903  jt23kj=2*(it3+it2-ik-jkm1)
7904  jt1j=2*(it1+jkm1)
7905  stoc=rms(1,2*jkm1+1)*rms(2,jt3kj+1)
7906  sgrp(ik,jk)=fpar(it3-ik,jkm1)/stoc
7907  sg1=sg1+sgrp(ik,jk)*hs2(jt23kj+1)*hs1(jt1j+2)
7908  enddo
7909  sgppi=sgppi+sgp3(ik)*sg1
7910  sgn=-sgn
7911  enddo
7912  return
7913  else
7914  do ik=1,it3
7915  sg1=0.
7916  it3kp1=it3-ik+1
7917  do jk=1,it3kp1
7918  jkm1=jk-1
7919  jt23kj=2*(it3+it2-ik-jkm1)
7920  jt1j=2*(it1+jkm1)
7921  sg1=sg1+sgrp(ik,jk)*hs2(jt23kj+1)*hs1(jt1j+2)
7922  enddo
7923  sgppi=sgppi+sgp3(ik)*sg1
7924  enddo
7925  return
7926  endif
7927  end
7928 
7933  FUNCTION sgpii(it1,it2,it3)
7934  implicit real(8) (a-h,o-z)
7935  common/rms/rms(3,50),s1,s2,s3
7936  common/herfun/hs1(60),hs2(60),hs3(60)
7937  common/cars3/exs3,exs2,exs1,as3,sgns3,s32,pwas3,pw3as3
7938  common/sgsk/sgp3(30),sgi3(30),sgrp(30,30),sgri(30,30)
7939  common/sgpth/mksgi,mksgp
7940  logical mksgi,mksgp
7941  sgpii=0.
7942  if(it3.eq.0) return
7943  sgn=-1.
7944  if(.not.mksgp) then
7945  mksgp=.true.
7946  do ik=1,it3
7947  sg1=0.
7948  km2=2*ik-2
7949  it3kp1=it3-ik+1
7950  it3k=2*(it3-ik)
7951  sgp3(ik)=sgn*hs3(km2+1)*rms(3,it3k+1)
7952  do jk=1,it3kp1
7953  jkm1=jk-1
7954  jt3kj=2*(it3-ik-jkm1)
7955  jt23kj=2*(it3+it2-ik-jkm1)
7956  jt1j=2*(it1+jkm1)
7957  stoc=rms(1,2*jkm1+1)*rms(2,jt3kj+1)
7958  sgrp(ik,jk)=fpar(it3-ik,jkm1)/stoc
7959  sg1=sg1+sgrp(ik,jk)*hs2(jt23kj+2)*hs1(jt1j+2)
7960  enddo
7961  sgpii=sgpii+sgp3(ik)*sg1
7962  sgn=-sgn
7963  enddo
7964  return
7965  else
7966  do ik=1,it3
7967  sg1=0.
7968  it3kp1=it3-ik+1
7969  do jk=1,it3kp1
7970  jkm1=jk-1
7971  jt23kj=2*(it3+it2-ik-jkm1)
7972  jt1j=2*(it1+jkm1)
7973  sg1=sg1+sgrp(ik,jk)*hs2(jt23kj+2)*hs1(jt1j+2)
7974  enddo
7975  sgpii=sgpii+sgp3(ik)*sg1
7976  enddo
7977  return
7978  endif
7979  end
7980 
7985  FUNCTION sgipp(it1,it2,it3)
7986  implicit real(8) (a-h,o-z)
7987  common/rms/rms(3,50),s1,s2,s3
7988  common/herfun/hs1(60),hs2(60),hs3(60)
7989  common/cars3/exs3,exs2,exs1,as3,sgns3,s32,pwas3,pw3as3
7990  common/sgsk/sgp3(30),sgi3(30),sgrp(30,30),sgri(30,30)
7991  common/sgpth/mksgi,mksgp
7992  logical mksgi,mksgp
7993  sgipp=0.
7994  if(it3.le.0) return
7995  sgn=-1.
7996  if(.not.mksgi) then
7997  mksgi=.true.
7998  do ik=1,it3
7999  sg1=0.
8000  km1=2*ik-1
8001  it3kp1=it3-ik+1
8002  it3k=2*(it3-ik)
8003  sgi3(ik)=sgn*hs3(km1+1)*rms(3,it3k+1)
8004  do jk=1,it3kp1
8005  jkm1=jk-1
8006  jt3kj=2*(it3-ik-jkm1)
8007  jt23kj=2*(it3+it2-ik-jkm1)
8008  jt1j=2*(it1+jkm1)
8009  stoc=rms(1,2*jkm1+1)*rms(2,jt3kj+1)
8010  sgri(ik,jk)=fpar(it3-ik,jkm1)/stoc
8011  sg1=sg1+sgri(ik,jk)*hs2(jt23kj+1)*hs1(jt1j+1)
8012  enddo
8013  sgipp=sgipp+sgi3(ik)*sg1
8014  sgn=-sgn
8015  enddo
8016  return
8017  else
8018  do ik=1,it3
8019  sg1=0.
8020  it3kp1=it3-ik+1
8021  do jk=1,it3kp1
8022  jkm1=jk-1
8023  jt23kj=2*(it3+it2-ik-jkm1)
8024  jt1j=2*(it1+jkm1)
8025  sg1=sg1+sgri(ik,jk)*hs2(jt23kj+1)*hs1(jt1j+1)
8026  enddo
8027  sgipp=sgipp+sgi3(ik)*sg1
8028  enddo
8029  return
8030  endif
8031  end
8032 
8037  FUNCTION sgiip(it1,it2,it3)
8038  implicit real(8) (a-h,o-z)
8039  common/rms/rms(3,50),s1,s2,s3
8040  common/herfun/hs1(60),hs2(60),hs3(60)
8041  common/cars3/exs3,exs2,exs1,as3,sgns3,s32,pwas3,pw3as3
8042  common/sgsk/sgp3(30),sgi3(30),sgrp(30,30),sgri(30,30)
8043  common/sgpth/mksgi,mksgp
8044  logical mksgi,mksgp
8045  sgiip=0.
8046  if(it3.eq.0) return
8047  sgn=-1.
8048  if(.not.mksgi) then
8049  mksgi=.true.
8050  do ik=1,it3
8051  sg1=0.
8052  km1=2*ik-1
8053  it3kp1=it3-ik+1
8054  it3k=2*(it3-ik)
8055  sgi3(ik)=sgn*hs3(km1+1)*rms(3,it3k+1)
8056  do jk=1,it3kp1
8057  jkm1=jk-1
8058  jt3kj=2*(it3-ik-jkm1)
8059  jt23kj=2*(it3+it2-ik-jkm1)
8060  jt1j=2*(it1+jkm1)
8061  stoc=rms(1,2*jkm1+1)*rms(2,jt3kj+1)
8062  sgri(ik,jk)=fpar(it3-ik,jkm1)/stoc
8063  sg1=sg1+sgri(ik,jk)*hs2(jt23kj+2)*hs1(jt1j+1)
8064  enddo
8065  sgiip=sgiip+sgi3(ik)*sg1
8066  sgn=-sgn
8067  enddo
8068  return
8069  else
8070  do ik=1,it3
8071  sg1=0.
8072  it3kp1=it3-ik+1
8073  do jk=1,it3kp1
8074  jkm1=jk-1
8075  jt23kj=2*(it3+it2-ik-jkm1)
8076  jt1j=2*(it1+jkm1)
8077  sg1=sg1+sgri(ik,jk)*hs2(jt23kj+2)*hs1(jt1j+1)
8078  enddo
8079  sgiip=sgiip+sgi3(ik)*sg1
8080  enddo
8081  return
8082  endif
8083  end
8084 
8089  FUNCTION sgipi(it1,it2,it3)
8090  implicit real(8) (a-h,o-z)
8091  common/rms/rms(3,50),s1,s2,s3
8092  common/herfun/hs1(60),hs2(60),hs3(60)
8093  common/cars3/exs3,exs2,exs1,as3,sgns3,s32,pwas3,pw3as3
8094  common/sgsk/sgp3(30),sgi3(30),sgrp(30,30),sgri(30,30)
8095  common/sgpth/mksgi,mksgp
8096  logical mksgi,mksgp
8097  sgipi=0.
8098  if(it3.eq.0) return
8099  sgn=-1.
8100  if(.not.mksgi) then
8101  mksgi=.true.
8102  do ik=1,it3
8103  sg1=0.
8104  km1=2*ik-1
8105  it3kp1=it3-ik+1
8106  it3k=2*(it3-ik)
8107  sgi3(ik)=sgn*hs3(km1+1)*rms(3,it3k+1)
8108  do jk=1,it3kp1
8109  jkm1=jk-1
8110  jt3kj=2*(it3-ik-jkm1)
8111  jt23kj=2*(it3+it2-ik-jkm1)
8112  jt1j=2*(it1+jkm1)
8113  stoc=rms(1,2*jkm1+1)*rms(2,jt3kj+1)
8114  sgri(ik,jk)=fpar(it3-ik,jkm1)/stoc
8115  sg1=sg1+sgri(ik,jk)*hs2(jt23kj+1)*hs1(jt1j+2)
8116  enddo
8117  sgipi=sgipi+sgi3(ik)*sg1
8118  sgn=-sgn
8119  enddo
8120  return
8121  else
8122  do ik=1,it3
8123  sg1=0.
8124  it3kp1=it3-ik+1
8125  do jk=1,it3kp1
8126  jkm1=jk-1
8127  jt23kj=2*(it3+it2-ik-jkm1)
8128  jt1j=2*(it1+jkm1)
8129  sg1=sg1+sgri(ik,jk)*hs2(jt23kj+1)*hs1(jt1j+2)
8130  enddo
8131  sgipi=sgipi+sgi3(ik)*sg1
8132  enddo
8133  return
8134  endif
8135  end
8136 
8141  FUNCTION sgiii(it1,it2,it3)
8142  implicit real(8) (a-h,o-z)
8143  common/rms/rms(3,50),s1,s2,s3
8144  common/herfun/hs1(60),hs2(60),hs3(60)
8145  common/cars3/exs3,exs2,exs1,as3,sgns3,s32,pwas3,pw3as3
8146  common/sgsk/sgp3(30),sgi3(30),sgrp(30,30),sgri(30,30)
8147  common/sgpth/mksgi,mksgp
8148  logical mksgi,mksgp
8149  sgiii=0.
8150  if(it3.eq.0) return
8151  sgn=-1.
8152  if(.not.mksgi) then
8153  mksgi=.true.
8154  do ik=1,it3
8155  sg1=0.
8156  km1=2*ik-1
8157  it3kp1=it3-ik+1
8158  it3k=2*(it3-ik)
8159  sgi3(ik)=sgn*hs3(km1+1)*rms(3,it3k+1)
8160  do jk=1,it3kp1
8161  jkm1=jk-1
8162  jt3kj=2*(it3-ik-jkm1)
8163  jt23kj=2*(it3+it2-ik-jkm1)
8164  jt1j=2*(it1+jkm1)
8165  stoc=rms(1,2*jkm1+1)*rms(2,jt3kj+1)
8166  sgri(ik,jk)=fpar(it3-ik,jkm1)/stoc
8167  sg1=sg1+sgri(ik,jk)*hs2(jt23kj+2)*hs1(jt1j+2)
8168  enddo
8169  sgiii=sgiii+sgi3(ik)*sg1
8170  sgn=-sgn
8171  enddo
8172  return
8173  else
8174  do ik=1,it3
8175  sg1=0.
8176  it3kp1=it3-ik+1
8177  do jk=1,it3kp1
8178  jkm1=jk-1
8179  jt23kj=2*(it3+it2-ik-jkm1)
8180  jt1j=2*(it1+jkm1)
8181  sg1=sg1+sgri(ik,jk)*hs2(jt23kj+2)*hs1(jt1j+2)
8182  enddo
8183  sgiii=sgiii+sgi3(ik)*sg1
8184  enddo
8185  return
8186  endif
8187  end
8188 !*****************************************************************************
8189 ! Functions U and V given in tables 75 and 76
8190 ! uppp ---> l,m,n even
8191 ! upip ---> l even, m odd, n even
8192 ! .................................
8193 !*****************************************************************************
8200  FUNCTION uppp(it1,it2,it3)
8201  implicit real(8) (a-h,o-z)
8202  common/rms/rms(3,50),s1,s2,s3
8203  common/gauss1/absg(40),wg(40),igaus
8204  common/circu/co(40,50),sn(40,50),blam(40,100)
8205  common/uvtab/epsi1(40,40),epsi2(40,40),akpcc(40,40),
8206  * akpcs(40,40),akpsc(40,40),akpss(40,40)
8207  common/expmod/ragp(40,100),ragm1(40,40)
8208  common/uvint/arcc(40,40),arcs(40,40),arsc(40,40),
8209  * arss(40,40),cs(40)
8210  uppp=0.
8211  ind=2*(it1+it2+it3)+1
8212  idt1=2*it1+1
8213  idt2=2*it2+1
8214  do j=1,igaus
8215  cs(j)=co(j,idt1)*sn(j,idt2)*wg(j)
8216  u=0.
8217  do i=1,igaus
8218  arcc(i,j)=ragp(i,ind)*akpcc(i,j)
8219  u=u+arcc(i,j)*epsi1(i,j)
8220  enddo
8221  uppp=uppp+cs(j)*u
8222  enddo
8223  return
8224  end
8225 
8231  FUNCTION upip(it1,it2,it3)
8232  implicit real(8) (a-h,o-z)
8233  common/rms/rms(3,50),s1,s2,s3
8234  common/gauss1/absg(40),wg(40),igaus
8235  common/circu/co(40,50),sn(40,50),blam(40,100)
8236  common/uvtab/epsi1(40,40),epsi2(40,40),akpcc(40,40),
8237  * akpcs(40,40),akpsc(40,40),akpss(40,40)
8238  common/expmod/ragp(40,100),ragm1(40,40)
8239  common/uvint/arcc(40,40),arcs(40,40),arsc(40,40),
8240  * arss(40,40),cs(40)
8241  upip=0.
8242  ind=2*(it1+it2+it3)+2
8243  idt1=2*it1+1
8244  idt2=2*it2+2
8245  do j=1,igaus
8246  cs(j)=co(j,idt1)*sn(j,idt2)*wg(j)
8247  u=0.
8248  do i=1,igaus
8249  arcs(i,j)=ragp(i,ind)*akpcs(i,j)
8250  u=u+arcs(i,j)*epsi1(i,j)
8251  enddo
8252  upip=upip+cs(j)*u
8253  enddo
8254  return
8255  end
8256 
8262  FUNCTION uppi(it1,it2,it3)
8263  implicit real(8) (a-h,o-z)
8264  common/rms/rms(3,50),s1,s2,s3
8265  common/gauss1/absg(40),wg(40),igaus
8266  common/circu/co(40,50),sn(40,50),blam(40,100)
8267  common/uvtab/epsi1(40,40),epsi2(40,40),akpcc(40,40),
8268  * akpcs(40,40),akpsc(40,40),akpss(40,40)
8269  common/expmod/ragp(40,100),ragm1(40,40)
8270  common/uvint/arcc(40,40),arcs(40,40),arsc(40,40),
8271  * arss(40,40),cs(40)
8272  uppi=0.
8273  ind=2*(it1+it2+it3)+2
8274  idt1=2*it1+2
8275  idt2=2*it2+1
8276  do j=1,igaus
8277  cs(j)=co(j,idt1)*sn(j,idt2)*wg(j)
8278  u=0.
8279  do i=1,igaus
8280  arsc(i,j)=ragp(i,ind)*akpsc(i,j)
8281  u=u+arsc(i,j)*epsi1(i,j)
8282  enddo
8283  uppi=uppi+cs(j)*u
8284  enddo
8285  return
8286  end
8287 
8293  FUNCTION upii(it1,it2,it3)
8294  implicit real(8) (a-h,o-z)
8295  common/rms/rms(3,50),s1,s2,s3
8296  common/gauss1/absg(40),wg(40),igaus
8297  common/circu/co(40,50),sn(40,50),blam(40,100)
8298  common/uvtab/epsi1(40,40),epsi2(40,40),akpcc(40,40),
8299  * akpcs(40,40),akpsc(40,40),akpss(40,40)
8300  common/expmod/ragp(40,100),ragm1(40,40)
8301  common/uvint/arcc(40,40),arcs(40,40),arsc(40,40),
8302  * arss(40,40),cs(40)
8303  upii=0.
8304  ind=2*(it1+it2+it3+1)+1
8305  idt1=2*it1+2
8306  idt2=2*it2+2
8307  do j=1,igaus
8308  cs(j)=co(j,idt1)*sn(j,idt2)*wg(j)
8309  u=0.
8310  do i=1,igaus
8311  arss(i,j)=ragp(i,ind)*akpss(i,j)
8312  u=u+arss(i,j)*epsi1(i,j)
8313  enddo
8314  upii=upii+cs(j)*u
8315  enddo
8316  return
8317  end
8318 
8324  FUNCTION uipp(it1,it2,it3)
8325  implicit real(8) (a-h,o-z)
8326  common/rms/rms(3,50),s1,s2,s3
8327  common/gauss1/absg(40),wg(40),igaus
8328  common/circu/co(40,50),sn(40,50),blam(40,100)
8329  common/uvtab/epsi1(40,40),epsi2(40,40),akpcc(40,40),
8330  * akpcs(40,40),akpsc(40,40),akpss(40,40)
8331  common/expmod/ragp(40,100),ragm1(40,40)
8332  common/uvint/arcc(40,40),arcs(40,40),arsc(40,40),
8333  * arss(40,40),cs(40)
8334  uipp=0.
8335  ind=2*(it1+it2+it3+1)
8336  idt1=2*it1+1
8337  idt2=2*it2+1
8338  do j=1,igaus
8339  cs(j)=co(j,idt1)*sn(j,idt2)*wg(j)
8340  u=0.
8341  do i=1,igaus
8342  arcc(i,j)=ragp(i,ind)*akpcc(i,j)
8343  u=u+arcc(i,j)*epsi1(i,j)
8344  enddo
8345  uipp=uipp+cs(j)*u
8346  enddo
8347  return
8348  end
8349 
8354  FUNCTION uiip(it1,it2,it3)
8355  implicit real(8) (a-h,o-z)
8356  common/rms/rms(3,50),s1,s2,s3
8357  common/gauss1/absg(40),wg(40),igaus
8358  common/circu/co(40,50),sn(40,50),blam(40,100)
8359  common/uvtab/epsi1(40,40),epsi2(40,40),akpcc(40,40),
8360  * akpcs(40,40),akpsc(40,40),akpss(40,40)
8361  common/expmod/ragp(40,100),ragm1(40,40)
8362  common/uvint/arcc(40,40),arcs(40,40),arsc(40,40),
8363  * arss(40,40),cs(40)
8364  uiip=0.
8365  ind=2*(it1+it2+it3+1)+1
8366  idt1=2*it1+1
8367  idt2=2*it2+2
8368  do j=1,igaus
8369  cs(j)=co(j,idt1)*sn(j,idt2)*wg(j)
8370  u=0.
8371  do i=1,igaus
8372  arcs(i,j)=ragp(i,ind)*akpcs(i,j)
8373  u=u+arcs(i,j)*epsi1(i,j)
8374  enddo
8375  uiip=uiip+cs(j)*u
8376  enddo
8377  return
8378  end
8379 
8384  FUNCTION uipi(it1,it2,it3)
8385  implicit real(8) (a-h,o-z)
8386  common/rms/rms(3,50),s1,s2,s3
8387  common/gauss1/absg(40),wg(40),igaus
8388  common/circu/co(40,50),sn(40,50),blam(40,100)
8389  common/uvtab/epsi1(40,40),epsi2(40,40),akpcc(40,40),
8390  * akpcs(40,40),akpsc(40,40),akpss(40,40)
8391  common/expmod/ragp(40,100),ragm1(40,40)
8392  common/uvint/arcc(40,40),arcs(40,40),arsc(40,40),
8393  * arss(40,40),cs(40)
8394  uipi=0.
8395  ind=2*(it1+it2+it3+1)+1
8396  idt1=2*it1+2
8397  idt2=2*it2+1
8398  do j=1,igaus
8399  cs(j)=co(j,idt1)*sn(j,idt2)*wg(j)
8400  u=0.
8401  do i=1,igaus
8402  arsc(i,j)=ragp(i,ind)*akpsc(i,j)
8403  u=u+arsc(i,j)*epsi1(i,j)
8404  enddo
8405  uipi=uipi+cs(j)*u
8406  enddo
8407  return
8408  end
8409 
8415  FUNCTION uiii(it1,it2,it3)
8416  implicit real(8) (a-h,o-z)
8417  common/rms/rms(3,50),s1,s2,s3
8418  common/gauss1/absg(40),wg(40),igaus
8419  common/circu/co(40,50),sn(40,50),blam(40,100)
8420  common/uvtab/epsi1(40,40),epsi2(40,40),akpcc(40,40),
8421  * akpcs(40,40),akpsc(40,40),akpss(40,40)
8422  common/expmod/ragp(40,100),ragm1(40,40)
8423  common/uvint/arcc(40,40),arcs(40,40),arsc(40,40),
8424  * arss(40,40),cs(40)
8425  uiii=0.
8426  ind=2*(it1+it2+it3+1)+2
8427  idt1=2*it1+2
8428  idt2=2*it2+2
8429  do j=1,igaus
8430  cs(j)=co(j,idt1)*sn(j,idt2)*wg(j)
8431  u=0.
8432  do i=1,igaus
8433  arss(i,j)=ragp(i,ind)*akpss(i,j)
8434  u=u+arss(i,j)*epsi1(i,j)
8435  enddo
8436  uiii=uiii+cs(j)*u
8437  enddo
8438  return
8439  end
8440 
8445  FUNCTION vppp(k)
8446  implicit real(8) (a-h,o-z)
8447  common/rms/rms(3,50),s1,s2,s3
8448  common/gauss1/absg(40),wg(40),igaus
8449  common/circu/co(40,50),sn(40,50),blam(40,100)
8450  common/uvtab/epsi1(40,40),epsi2(40,40),akpcc(40,40),
8451  * akpcs(40,40),akpsc(40,40),akpss(40,40)
8452  common/expmod/ragp(40,100),ragm1(40,40)
8453  common/uvint/arcc(40,40),arcs(40,40),arsc(40,40),
8454  * arss(40,40),cs(40)
8455  vppp=0.
8456  do j=1,igaus
8457  u=0.
8458  do i=1,igaus
8459  u=u+arcc(i,j)*ragm1(i,k)*epsi2(i,j)
8460  enddo
8461  vppp=vppp+cs(j)*u
8462  enddo
8463  return
8464  end
8465 
8470  FUNCTION vpip(k)
8471  implicit real(8) (a-h,o-z)
8472  common/rms/rms(3,50),s1,s2,s3
8473  common/gauss1/absg(40),wg(40),igaus
8474  common/circu/co(40,50),sn(40,50),blam(40,100)
8475  common/uvtab/epsi1(40,40),epsi2(40,40),akpcc(40,40),
8476  * akpcs(40,40),akpsc(40,40),akpss(40,40)
8477  common/expmod/ragp(40,100),ragm1(40,40)
8478  common/uvint/arcc(40,40),arcs(40,40),arsc(40,40),
8479  * arss(40,40),cs(40)
8480  vpip=0.
8481  do j=1,igaus
8482  u=0.
8483  do i=1,igaus
8484  u=u+arcs(i,j)*ragm1(i,k)*epsi2(i,j)
8485  enddo
8486  vpip=vpip+cs(j)*u
8487  enddo
8488  return
8489  end
8490 
8495  FUNCTION vppi(k)
8496  implicit real(8) (a-h,o-z)
8497  common/rms/rms(3,50),s1,s2,s3
8498  common/gauss1/absg(40),wg(40),igaus
8499  common/circu/co(40,50),sn(40,50),blam(40,100)
8500  common/uvtab/epsi1(40,40),epsi2(40,40),akpcc(40,40),
8501  * akpcs(40,40),akpsc(40,40),akpss(40,40)
8502  common/expmod/ragp(40,100),ragm1(40,40)
8503  common/uvint/arcc(40,40),arcs(40,40),arsc(40,40),
8504  * arss(40,40),cs(40)
8505  vppi=0.
8506  do j=1,igaus
8507  u=0.
8508  do i=1,igaus
8509  u=u+arsc(i,j)*ragm1(i,k)*epsi2(i,j)
8510  enddo
8511  vppi=vppi+cs(j)*u
8512  enddo
8513  return
8514  end
8515 
8520  FUNCTION vpii(k)
8521  implicit real(8) (a-h,o-z)
8522  common/rms/rms(3,50),s1,s2,s3
8523  common/gauss1/absg(40),wg(40),igaus
8524  common/circu/co(40,50),sn(40,50),blam(40,100)
8525  common/uvtab/epsi1(40,40),epsi2(40,40),akpcc(40,40),
8526  * akpcs(40,40),akpsc(40,40),akpss(40,40)
8527  common/expmod/ragp(40,100),ragm1(40,40)
8528  common/uvint/arcc(40,40),arcs(40,40),arsc(40,40),
8529  * arss(40,40),cs(40)
8530  vpii=0.
8531  do j=1,igaus
8532  u=0.
8533  do i=1,igaus
8534  u=u+arss(i,j)*ragm1(i,k)*epsi2(i,j)
8535  enddo
8536  vpii=vpii+cs(j)*u
8537  enddo
8538  return
8539  end
8540 
8545  FUNCTION vipp(k)
8546  implicit real(8) (a-h,o-z)
8547  common/rms/rms(3,50),s1,s2,s3
8548  common/gauss1/absg(40),wg(40),igaus
8549  common/circu/co(40,50),sn(40,50),blam(40,100)
8550  common/uvtab/epsi1(40,40),epsi2(40,40),akpcc(40,40),
8551  * akpcs(40,40),akpsc(40,40),akpss(40,40)
8552  common/expmod/ragp(40,100),ragm1(40,40)
8553  common/uvint/arcc(40,40),arcs(40,40),arsc(40,40),
8554  * arss(40,40),cs(40)
8555  vipp=0.
8556  do j=1,igaus
8557  u=0.
8558  do i=1,igaus
8559  u=u+arcc(i,j)*ragm1(i,k)*epsi2(i,j)
8560  enddo
8561  vipp=vipp+cs(j)*u
8562  enddo
8563  return
8564  end
8565 
8570  FUNCTION viip(k)
8571  implicit real(8) (a-h,o-z)
8572  common/rms/rms(3,50),s1,s2,s3
8573  common/gauss1/absg(40),wg(40),igaus
8574  common/circu/co(40,50),sn(40,50),blam(40,100)
8575  common/uvtab/epsi1(40,40),epsi2(40,40),akpcc(40,40),
8576  * akpcs(40,40),akpsc(40,40),akpss(40,40)
8577  common/expmod/ragp(40,100),ragm1(40,40)
8578  common/uvint/arcc(40,40),arcs(40,40),arsc(40,40),
8579  * arss(40,40),cs(40)
8580  viip=0.
8581  do j=1,igaus
8582  u=0.
8583  do i=1,igaus
8584  u=u+arcs(i,j)*ragm1(i,k)*epsi2(i,j)
8585  enddo
8586  viip=viip+cs(j)*u
8587  enddo
8588  return
8589  end
8590 
8595  FUNCTION vipi(k)
8596  implicit real(8) (a-h,o-z)
8597  common/rms/rms(3,50),s1,s2,s3
8598  common/gauss1/absg(40),wg(40),igaus
8599  common/circu/co(40,50),sn(40,50),blam(40,100)
8600  common/uvtab/epsi1(40,40),epsi2(40,40),akpcc(40,40),
8601  * akpcs(40,40),akpsc(40,40),akpss(40,40)
8602  common/expmod/ragp(40,100),ragm1(40,40)
8603  common/uvint/arcc(40,40),arcs(40,40),arsc(40,40),
8604  * arss(40,40),cs(40)
8605  vipi=0.
8606  do j=1,igaus
8607  u=0.
8608  do i=1,igaus
8609  u=u+arsc(i,j)*ragm1(i,k)*epsi2(i,j)
8610  enddo
8611  vipi=vipi+cs(j)*u
8612  enddo
8613  return
8614  end
8615 
8620  FUNCTION viii(k)
8621  implicit real(8) (a-h,o-z)
8622  common/rms/rms(3,50),s1,s2,s3
8623  common/gauss1/absg(40),wg(40),igaus
8624  common/circu/co(40,50),sn(40,50),blam(40,100)
8625  common/uvtab/epsi1(40,40),epsi2(40,40),akpcc(40,40),
8626  * akpcs(40,40),akpsc(40,40),akpss(40,40)
8627  common/expmod/ragp(40,100),ragm1(40,40)
8628  common/uvint/arcc(40,40),arcs(40,40),arsc(40,40),
8629  * arss(40,40),cs(40)
8630  viii=0.
8631  do j=1,igaus
8632  u=0.
8633  do i=1,igaus
8634  u=u+arss(i,j)*ragm1(i,k)*epsi2(i,j)
8635  enddo
8636  viii=viii+cs(j)*u
8637  enddo
8638  return
8639  end
8640 
8645  SUBROUTINE pintfast
8646  implicit real(8) (a-h,o-z)
8647  parameter(iptsz=100002)
8648  common/faisc/f(10,iptsz),imax,ngood
8649  common/consta/vl,pi,xmat,rpel,qst
8650  common/dyn/tref,vref
8651  common/sc3/beamc,scdist,sce10,cplm,ectt,apl,ichaes,iscsp
8652  common/ttfc/tk,t1k,t2k,sk,s1k,s2k,fh
8653  common/part/xc(iptsz),yc(iptsz),zc(iptsz)
8654  common/dimens/zcp(iptsz),xcp(iptsz),ycp(iptsz)
8655  common/nume/nuelm
8656  common/vpintim/gcg,bcg
8657  common/coef/a(30,30,30),xrmsz,yrmsz,zrmsz
8658  common/macro/ratei
8659  nuelm=nuelm+1
8660  write(16,*)' space charge with HERSC call number: ',nuelm
8661  trmoy=0.
8662  wcg=0.
8663  xcg=0.
8664  xcg=0.
8665  ycg=0.
8666  do i=1,ngood
8667  trmoy=trmoy+f(6,i)
8668  wcg=wcg+f(7,i)
8669  xcg=xcg+f(2,i)
8670  ycg=ycg+f(4,i)
8671  enddo
8672  trmoy=trmoy/float(ngood)
8673  wcg=wcg/float(ngood)
8674  gcg=wcg/xmat
8675  bcg=sqrt(1.-1./(gcg*gcg))
8676  xcg=xcg/float(ngood)
8677  ycg=ycg/float(ngood)
8678  zcg=trmoy*fh
8679 ! Isochronism correction in bending magnet
8680 ! apl is the angle due to the lack of isochronicity in the plane (x,z)
8681 ! (see : A modified space charge routine for high intensity bunched
8682 ! beam,P.Lapostolle and 5 authors,NIM A Vol.379,pp21-40,
8683 ! September 1996)
8684 ! does not work with SCHEFF method (iscsp=3)
8685  apl=0.
8686  if(iscsp.le.2) then
8687  xb2x=0.
8688  xb2z=0.
8689  xbxz=0.
8690  imaxx=0
8691  do np=1,ngood
8692  gnp=f(7,np)/xmat
8693  bnp=sqrt(1.-1./(gnp*gnp))
8694  zc(np)=(trmoy-f(6,np))*bnp*vl/100.
8695 ! * correct. relativiste
8696 !omment zc(np)=zc(np)*gcg
8697 ! *
8698  xc(np)=(f(2,np)-xcg)/100.
8699  xb2z=xb2z+zc(np)*zc(np)
8700  xb2x=xb2x+xc(np)*xc(np)
8701  xbxz=xbxz+zc(np)*xc(np)
8702  imaxx=imaxx+1
8703  enddo
8704  xb2z=xb2z/float(imaxx)
8705  xb2x=xb2x/float(imaxx)
8706  xbxz=xbxz/float(imaxx)
8707  apl=atan(-2.*xbxz/(xb2x-xb2z))/2.
8708  endif
8709  write(16,*)'*slope of the bunch in plane(Oz,Ox):',apl,' radian'
8710 ! bunch at the space charge position
8711  xbar=0.
8712  ybar=0.
8713  zbar=0.
8714  imaxx=0
8715 ! Divide by 100. to convert from centimeters to meters
8716  do np=1,ngood
8717  gnp=f(7,np)/xmat
8718  bnp=sqrt(1.-1./(gnp*gnp))
8719  znp=(trmoy-f(6,np))*bnp*vl
8720 ! * correct. relativiste valero
8721 !omment znp=znp*gcg
8722 ! *
8723  xnp=f(2,np)
8724  zc(np)=znp*cos(apl)+xnp*sin(apl)
8725  xnp=xnp*cos(apl)-znp*sin(apl)
8726 ! convert from mrad to rad
8727  f3=f(3,np)*1.e-03
8728  f5=f(5,np)*1.e-03
8729 ! convert from cm to m
8730  xc(np)=(xnp+zc(np)*f3)/100.
8731  yc(np)=(f(4,np)+zc(np)*f5)/100.
8732  zc(np)=zc(np)/100.
8733 ! evaluate xbar , ybar , zbar
8734  xbar=xbar+xc(np)
8735  ybar=ybar+yc(np)
8736  zbar=zbar+zc(np)
8737  enddo
8738  eng=float(ngood)
8739  xbar=xbar/eng
8740  ybar=ybar/eng
8741  zbar=zbar/eng
8742  do np=1,ngood
8743  xc(np)=xc(np)-xbar
8744  yc(np)=yc(np)-ybar
8745  zc(np)=zc(np)-zbar
8746  enddo
8747  return
8748  end
8749 
8753  SUBROUTINE hcoef
8754  implicit real(8) (a-h,o-z)
8755  parameter(iptsz=100002)
8756  common/faisc/f(10,iptsz),imax,ngood
8757  common/consta/vl,pi,xmat,rpel,qst
8758  common/const/pi2,sqpi,pwtpi,sqpi2,sq2pi
8759  common/hcgrms/xcdg,ycdg,zcdg,ect,eps
8760  common/ind/lmax,mmax,nmax
8761  common/indttal/lmnt
8762  common/randu/ck(15),kmax
8763  common/coef/a(30,30,30),xrmsz,yrmsz,zrmsz
8764  common/part/xc(iptsz),yc(iptsz),zc(iptsz)
8765  common/isoch/apl
8766  common/dimens/zcp(iptsz),xcp(iptsz),ycp(iptsz)
8767  common/nume/nuelm
8768  common/macro/ratei
8769  common/facrms/fxrms,fyrms,fzrms
8770  common/rcoef/rdcf
8771  common/factor/fpir(40,40),fect(30)
8772  dimension hx(30),hy(30),hz(30),tran(1)
8773 ! calculation of Hermite coefficients on the principal axis in x,y,z
8774  do i=1,ngood
8775  zcp(i)=zc(i)
8776  xcp(i)=xc(i)
8777  ycp(i)=yc(i)
8778  enddo
8779  do kn=1,nmax
8780  do km=1,mmax
8781  do kl=1,lmax
8782  a(kl,km,kn)=0.
8783  enddo
8784  enddo
8785  enddo
8786  zcg=0.
8787  xcg=0.
8788  ycg=0.
8789  do i=1,ngood
8790  zcg=zcg+zc(i)
8791  xcg=xcg+xc(i)
8792  ycg=ycg+yc(i)
8793  enddo
8794  xcg=xcg/float(ngood)
8795  ycg=ycg/float(ngood)
8796  zcg=zcg/float(ngood)
8797  xsqsum=0.
8798  ysqsum=0.
8799  zsqsum=0.
8800 ! evaluate the rms sizes
8801  do j=1,ngood
8802  xcj=xc(j)-xcg
8803  ycj=yc(j)-ycg
8804  zcj=zc(j)-zcg
8805  xsqsum=xsqsum+xcj*xcj
8806  ysqsum=ysqsum+ycj*ycj
8807  zsqsum=zsqsum+zcj*zcj
8808  enddo
8809  xrmsz=xsqsum/float(ngood)
8810  yrmsz=ysqsum/float(ngood)
8811  zrmsz=zsqsum/float(ngood)
8812  xrmsz=sqrt(xrmsz)
8813  yrmsz=sqrt(yrmsz)
8814  zrmsz=sqrt(zrmsz)
8815  write(16,*) '*RMS of the bunch (m): ',xrmsz,yrmsz,zrmsz
8816 !omment write(17,25) nuelm,xrmsz,yrmsz,zrmsz
8817 !omment25 format(2x,i5,3(2x,e12.5))
8818 ! ***TEST control s.c.
8819 !omment rewind(19)
8820 !omment irep=0
8821 !omment rewind(21)
8822 !omment write(21,*) ' x(cm) y(cm) z(cm)'
8823 ! coordinates of the bunch x, y, z
8824 !omment do j=1,ngood
8825 !omment xcoup=(xcp(j)-xcg)/xrmsz
8826 !omment ycoup=(ycp(j)-ycg)/yrmsz
8827 !omment zcoup=(zcp(j)-zcg)/zrmsz
8828 !omment write(21,1188) xcoup,ycoup,zcoup
8829 !omment if((abs(xcoup).lt.fxrms).and.(abs(ycoup).lt.fyrms).and.
8830 !omment * (abs(zcoup).lt.fzrms)) then
8831 !omment write(19,1188) xcoup,ycoup,zcoup
8832 !omment irep=irep+1
8833 !omment endif
8834 !omment enddo
8835 !omment1188 format(3(2x,e12.5))
8836 ! ***END TEST control s.c.
8837  if(rdcf.ge.1.) then
8838  hz(1)=1.
8839  hy(1)=1.
8840  hx(1)=1.
8841  irct=0
8842  do j=1,ngood
8843  xc(j)=(xcp(j)-xcg)/xrmsz
8844  yc(j)=(ycp(j)-ycg)/yrmsz
8845  zc(j)=(zcp(j)-zcg)/zrmsz
8846  if((abs(xc(j)).lt.fxrms).and.(abs(yc(j)).lt.fyrms).and.
8847  * (abs(zc(j)).lt.fzrms)) then
8848  irct=irct+1
8849  ach=abs(f(9,j))
8850  hz(2)=zc(j)
8851  hy(2)=yc(j)
8852  hx(2)=xc(j)
8853  do kn=1,nmax
8854  if(kn.gt.2) hz(kn)=zc(j)*hz(kn-1)-float(kn-2)*hz(kn-2)
8855  do km=1,mmax
8856  if(km.gt.2) hy(km)=yc(j)*hy(km-1)-float(km-2)*hy(km-2)
8857  do kl=1,lmax
8858  if(kl.gt.2) hx(kl)=xc(j)*hx(kl-1)-float(kl-2)*
8859  * hx(kl-2)
