8860  xherm=hx(kl)*hy(km)*hz(kn)/(fect(kl)*fect(km)*
8861  * fect(kn))
8862  a(kl,km,kn)=a(kl,km,kn)+xherm/pwtpi*ach
8863  enddo
8864  enddo
8865  enddo
8866  endif
8867  enddo
8868  rate=float(ngood)/float(irct)
8869 ! write(16,*) ' particles kept in Almn computation: ',irct
8870  do kn=1,nmax
8871  do km=1,mmax
8872  do kl=1,lmax
8873  a(kl,km,kn)=a(kl,km,kn)*rate
8874  enddo
8875  enddo
8876  enddo
8877  endif
8878 !*********************************
8879  if(rdcf.lt.1.) then
8880  rdcfc=rdcf*float(imax)/float(ngood)
8881  if(rdcfc.gt.1.) rdcfc=1.
8882  len=1
8883  irct=0
8884  hz(1)=1.
8885  hy(1)=1.
8886  hx(1)=1.
8887  do j=1,ngood
8888  call rlux(tran,len)
8889  if(tran(1).le.rdcfc) then
8890  xc(j)=(xcp(j)-xcg)/xrmsz
8891  yc(j)=(ycp(j)-ycg)/yrmsz
8892  zc(j)=(zcp(j)-zcg)/zrmsz
8893  if((abs(xc(j)).lt.fxrms).and.(abs(yc(j)).le.fyrms).and.
8894  * (abs(zc(j)).lt.fzrms)) then
8895  ach=abs(f(9,j))
8896  irct=irct+1
8897  hz(2)=zc(j)
8898  hy(2)=yc(j)
8899  hx(2)=xc(j)
8900  do kn=1,nmax
8901  if(kn.gt.2) hz(kn)=zc(j)*hz(kn-1)-float(kn-2)*hz(kn-2)
8902  do km=1,mmax
8903  if(km.gt.2) hy(km)=yc(j)*hy(km-1)-float(km-2)*
8904  * hy(km-2)
8905  do kl=1,lmax
8906  if(kl.gt.2) hx(kl)=xc(j)*hx(kl-1)-float(kl-2)*
8907  * hx(kl-2)
8908  xherm=hx(kl)*hy(km)*hz(kn)/(fect(kl)*fect(km)*
8909  * fect(kn))
8910  a(kl,km,kn)=a(kl,km,kn)+xherm/pwtpi*ach
8911  enddo
8912  enddo
8913  enddo
8914  endif
8915  endif
8916  enddo
8917  rate=float(ngood)/float(irct)
8918  write(16,*) ' particles kept in Almn: ',irct
8919  do kn=1,nmax
8920  do km=1,mmax
8921  do kl=1,lmax
8922  a(kl,km,kn)=a(kl,km,kn)*rate
8923  enddo
8924  enddo
8925  enddo
8926  endif
8927 !118 format(3(2x,e12.5))
8928 ! * cesaro transformation
8929  lsup=lmax
8930  msup=mmax
8931  nsup=nmax
8932  do kn=1,nsup
8933  do km=1,msup
8934  do kl=1,lsup
8935  cesl=(1.-float(kl-1)/float(lsup))
8936  cesm=(1.-float(km-1)/float(msup))
8937  cesn=(1.-float(kn-1)/float(nsup))
8938  ces=cesl*cesm*cesn
8939 !esaro force a(kl,km,kn)=a(kl,km,kn)*ces*ces
8940  a(kl,km,kn)=a(kl,km,kn)*ces
8941  enddo
8942  enddo
8943  enddo
8944 ! *
8945 ! select the significant coefficients
8946  fond=abs(a(1,1,1))
8947  itot=0
8948  iret=0
8949  do kn=1,nmax
8950  n=kn-1
8951  ipar=n-2*int(n/2)
8952  if(ipar.eq.0)zz=0.
8953  if(ipar.ne.0) then
8954  if(n.eq.1) zz=1.
8955  if(n.eq.3) zz=.75
8956  if(n.eq.5) zz=.625
8957  if(n.gt.5.and.n.le.11) zz=0.50
8958  if(n.gt.11) zz=0.375
8959  endif
8960  do km=1,mmax
8961  m=km-1
8962  ipar=m-2*int(m/2)
8963  if(ipar.eq.0)yy=0.
8964  if(ipar.ne.0) then
8965  if(m.eq.1) yy=1.
8966  if(m.eq.3) yy=.75
8967  if(m.eq.5) yy=.625
8968  if(m.gt.5.and.m.le.11) yy=0.50
8969  if(m.gt.11) yy=0.375
8970  endif
8971  do kl=1,lmax
8972  l=kl-1
8973  ipar=l-2*int(l/2)
8974  if(ipar.eq.0)xx=0.
8975  if(ipar.ne.0) then
8976  if(l.eq.1) xx=1.
8977  if(l.eq.3) xx=.75
8978  if(l.eq.5) xx=.625
8979  if(l.gt.5.and.l.le.11) xx=0.50
8980  if(l.gt.11) xx=0.375
8981  endif
8982  itot=itot+1
8983  xherm=hermint(xx,l)*hermint(yy,m)*hermint(zz,n)
8984  ab=abs(a(kl,km,kn)*xherm)/fond
8985  if(ab.ge.eps) then
8986  iret=iret+1
8987  else
8988  a(kl,km,kn)=0.
8989  endif
8990  enddo
8991  enddo
8992  enddo
8993  rpeps=float(iret)/float(itot)
8994  write(16,*)'*significant terms in Hermite series expansion: ',
8995  * iret,' total of terms :',itot
8996  if(rpeps.ge..3) then
8997  write(16,*) ' problem in space charge : rpeps gt .3 ',rpeps
8998  stop
8999  endif
9000 ! select the maximum values l, m and n for the significant coefficients
9001  lsup=0
9002  msup=0
9003  nsup=0
9004  lmnt=0
9005  do kn=1,nmax
9006  do km=1,mmax
9007  do kl=1,lmax
9008  if(a(kl,km,kn).ne.0.) then
9009  itm=kl+km+kn-3
9010  if(itm.ge.lmnt) lmnt=itm
9011  if(lsup.le.kl) lsup=kl
9012  if(msup.le.km) msup=km
9013  if(nsup.le.kn) nsup=kn
9014  endif
9015  enddo
9016  enddo
9017  enddo
9018  lmnt=lmnt+kmax+4+3
9019  write(16,*) ' maximum of n m l for the significants terms ',
9020  * nsup-1,msup-1,lsup-1
9021  write(16,*) ' maximun of (t) for the significants terms ',lmnt
9022 ! * cesaro transformation
9023 !cc do kn=1,nsup
9024 !cc do km=1,msup
9025 !cc do kl=1,lsup
9026 !cc cesl=(1.-float(kl-1)/float(lsup))
9027 !cc cesm=(1.-float(km-1)/float(msup))
9028 !cc cesn=(1.-float(kn-1)/float(nsup))
9029 !cc ces=cesl*cesm*cesn
9030 !cc a(kl,km,kn)=a(kl,km,kn)*ces
9031 !cc enddo
9032 !cc enddo
9033 !cc enddo
9034 ! *
9035  return
9036  end
9037 
9041  SUBROUTINE hersc(ini)
9042  implicit real(8) (a-h,o-z)
9043  parameter(iptsz=100002)
9044  common/faisc/f(10,iptsz),imax,ngood
9045  common/consta/vl,pi,xmat,rpel,qst
9046  common/sc3/beamc,scdist,sce10,cplm,ectt,apl,ichaes,iscsp
9047  common/ttfc/tk,t1k,t2k,sk,s1k,s2k,fh
9048  common/cdek/dwp(iptsz)
9049  common/part/xc(iptsz),yc(iptsz),zc(iptsz)
9050  common/coef/a(30,30,30),xrmsz,yrmsz,zrmsz
9051  common/hcgrms/xcdg,ycdg,zcdg,ect,eps
9052  common/ind/lmax,mmax,nmax
9053  common/indin/lmaxi,mmaxi,nmaxxi
9054  common/indttal/lmnt
9055  common/rms/rms(3,50),s1,s2,s3
9056  common/randu/ck(15),kmax
9057  common/circu/co(40,50),sn(40,50),blam(40,100)
9058  common/gauss1/absg(40),wg(40),igaus
9059  common/field/ex,ey,ez
9060  common/expmod/ragp(40,100),ragm1(40,40)
9061  common/const/pi2,sqpi,pwtpi,sqpi2,sq2pi
9062  common/facrms/fxrms,fyrms,fzrms
9063  common/dimens/zcp(iptsz),xcp(iptsz),ycp(iptsz)
9064  common/beamsa/fs(7,iptsz)
9065  common/dcspa/iesp
9066  common/cmpte/iell
9067  common/npart/imaxr
9068  common/compt/nrres,nrtre,nrbunc,nrdbun
9069  common/rcoef/rdcf
9070  common/macro/ratei
9071  common/tapes/in,ifile,meta
9072  common/posc/xpsc
9073  common/locher/rx,ry,rz,nx,ny,nz
9074  logical ichaes,iesp
9075  dimension exk(15,15,30),eyk(15,15,30),ezk(15,15,30)
9076  data lbmax,mbmax,nbmax/23,23,23/
9077 ! ini = 0 :initialisation of the routine
9078  if(ini.le.0) then
9079  sq2pi=sqrt(2.*pi)
9080 ! input parameters
9081  igaus=9
9082 ! eps allows to select the significant terms in the HERMITE series expansion
9083  eps=8.e-03
9084 ! maximun of the upper limits in the HERMITE series expansion
9085  lmaxi=11
9086  mmaxi=11
9087  nmaxxi=11
9088 ! The HERMITE coefficients Almn are computed with the particles include in a cube
9089 ! with regard to the RMS of the bunch. The sizes of the cube are:RMSx*fxrms, ........
9090  fxrms=2.5
9091  fyrms=2.5
9092  fzrms=2.5
9093  if(ini.lt.0) then
9094  read(in,*)lmaxi,mmaxi,nmaxxi
9095  write(16,*)'upper limits ',lmaxi,mmaxi,nmaxxi
9096  read(in,*)fxrms,fyrms,fzrms
9097  write(16,*) ' rms factors',fxrms,fyrms,fzrms
9098  read(in,*)eps
9099  write(16,*) ' select the Hermite cefficients with: ',eps
9100  endif
9101 ! MESH**********
9102 ! limits in (+-) RMS
9103  rx=4.
9104  ry=4.
9105  rz=4.
9106 ! number of nodes in each direction
9107  nx=8
9108  ny=8
9109  nz=8
9110 ! rdcf : in %/100 , allows to select a reduced number of particles for the Almn.
9111  call shuffle
9112  call gausse
9113  read(in,*) rdcf
9114  if(rdcf.gt.1.) rdcf=1.
9115  if(rdcf.le.0.) then
9116  if(ngood.gt.15000) then
9117  rdcf=15000./float(ngood)
9118  else
9119  rdcf=1.
9120  endif
9121  endif
9122  call table(lbmax,mbmax,nbmax)
9123  return
9124  endif
9125 ! **********************************************************************
9126  if(ini.eq.1) then
9127 ! .................................................................................
9128 ! seeks: the significant coefficients in the Hermite series expansions
9129 ! ---> storage array a(l,m,n)
9130 ! maximum values of l,m and n of the significants a(l,m,n) --->lmax,mmax,nmax
9131 ! RMS of the bunch ---> xa,xb and xc
9132 ! order of the succesives integrals
9133 ! isucc=1: xa<xb,xc , rms(3,2)=xa, rms(2,2)=xb, rms(1,2)=xc
9134 ! rms(3,k)=xa**(k-1), ..........
9135 ! isucc=2: xb<xa,xc , rms(3,2)=xb, rms(2,2)=xc, rms(1,2)=xa
9136 ! isucc=1: xc<xa,xb , rms(3,2)=xc, rms(2,2)=xa, rms(1,2)=xb
9137 ! compute the array blam(i,j)
9138 ! blam(i,j): FUNCTION beta**2 in the fifth relation in table 31
9139 ! blam(i,j)=beta**2j,j=1,...,im=(lmax+mmax+nmax+kmax)/2+2
9140 ! i is given from the i-Gauss position in absg(i)
9141 ! ..................................................................................
9142  call bhdist
9143  call trms(isucc)
9144  sta=a(1,1,1)
9145  icoa=0
9146  do ican=1,nmax
9147  do icam=1,mmax
9148  do ical=1,lmax
9149  if(a(ican,icam,ical).ne.0.) icoa=icoa+1
9150  enddo
9151  enddo
9152  enddo
9153  return
9154  endif
9155 ! **********************************************************************
9156 ! beam self-fields
9157  if(ini.eq.2) then
9158 ! limits of the mesch : rx ry rz
9159 ! length of the steps
9160  delx=2.*rx/float(nx)
9161  dely=2.*ry/float(ny)
9162  delz=2.*rz/float(nz)
9163 ! Initialize constants
9164 ! xmass-Kg,wavel=cm,charge=coul.
9165 ! clight=cm/sec MHz/Hz ,freq=Mhz ,xmat=MeV
9166 ! freq. in MHz
9167  freq=fh*0.5e-06/pi
9168  epsilon=8.854189586e-12
9169  const3=1.e-06
9170  const2=1.e-06/xmat
9171  dxp=0.
9172  dyp=0.
9173  dw=0.
9174  dz=scdist/100.
9175  dz1=dz
9176  zsot1=0.
9177 ! qmpart=macro-charge
9178  qmpart=1.0e-9*beamc/(float(imax)*freq)
9179  if(ratei.le.0.) then
9180  write(16,*) ' all the particles are lost '
9181  stop
9182  endif
9183  qmpart=qmpart*ratei
9184  vrms=xrmsz*yrmsz*zrmsz
9185  cmacro=qmpart/(epsilon*vrms)
9186  wcg=0.
9187  do i=1,ngood
9188  wcg=wcg+f(7,i)
9189  enddo
9190  wcg=wcg/float(ngood)
9191  gcg=wcg/xmat
9192  gmoy=gcg
9193  bcg=sqrt(1.-1./(gcg*gcg))
9194  bmoy=bcg
9195 ! relativistic correction
9196  cmacro=cmacro/gmoy
9197 !
9198  cmacrxy=cmacro/(bmoy*bmoy*gmoy*gmoy)
9199 ! beam self-fields at the nodes of the mesh
9200  imail=0
9201  rcy=-ry
9202  do j=1,ny
9203  rcx=-rx
9204  do i=1,nx
9205  rcz=-rz
9206  do k=1,nz
9207  if(isucc.eq.1) then
9208  s3=rcx
9209  s2=rcy
9210  s1=rcz
9211  ax=pwtpi*rms(3,2)
9212  ay=pwtpi*rms(2,2)
9213  az=pwtpi*rms(1,2)
9214  rrx=rms(3,2)
9215  rry=rms(2,2)
9216  rrz=rms(1,2)
9217  endif
9218  if(isucc.eq.2) then
9219  s3=rcy
9220  s2=rcz
9221  s1=rcx
9222  ax=pwtpi*rms(1,2)
9223  ay=pwtpi*rms(3,2)
9224  az=pwtpi*rms(2,2)
9225  rrx=rms(1,2)
9226  rry=rms(3,2)
9227  rrz=rms(2,2)
9228  endif
9229  if(isucc.eq.3) then
9230  s3=rcz
9231  s2=rcx
9232  s1=rcy
9233  ax=pwtpi*rms(2,2)
9234  ay=pwtpi*rms(1,2)
9235  az=pwtpi*rms(3,2)
9236  rrx=rms(2,2)
9237  rry=rms(1,2)
9238  rrz=rms(3,2)
9239  endif
9240  call uvrms
9241 ! fields
9242 ! loop over the l,m and n
9243  exk(i,j,k)=0.
9244  eyk(i,j,k)=0.
9245  ezk(i,j,k)=0.
9246  do jn=1,nmax
9247  jn1=jn-1
9248  do jm=1,mmax
9249  jm1=jm-1
9250  do jl=1,lmax
9251  jl1=jl-1
9252  if(a(jl,jm,jn).ne.0.) then
9253  call fielde(jl1,jm1,jn1,isucc)
9254 ! the beam self-fields are in tables 67-a to 67-h
9255  exk(i,j,k)=a(jl,jm,jn)/ax*ex+exk(i,j,k)
9256  eyk(i,j,k)=a(jl,jm,jn)/ay*ey+eyk(i,j,k)
9257  ezk(i,j,k)=a(jl,jm,jn)/az*ez+ezk(i,j,k)
9258  endif
9259  enddo
9260  enddo
9261  enddo
9262  rcz=rcz+delz
9263  imail=imail+1
9264  enddo
9265  rcx=rcx+delx
9266  enddo
9267  rcy=rcy+dely
9268  enddo
9269 ! xi in Amps, ibeam in mA
9270  dxp=0.
9271  dyp=0.
9272  dw=0.
9273 ! save the particles coordinates
9274  do i=1,ngood
9275  xc(i)=xcp(i)
9276  yc(i)=ycp(i)
9277  zc(i)=zcp(i)
9278  enddo
9279 ! Do integration to determine Ex,Ey,Ez for each macro particle
9280  nprint=1
9281  insd=0
9282  iout=0
9283  ickl=0
9284  do ic=1,ngood
9285 ! position in the mesh
9286  ickl=ickl+1
9287 ! * valero
9288  u=xc(ic)/xrmsz
9289  v=yc(ic)/yrmsz
9290  w=zc(ic)/zrmsz
9291 !omment u=xc(ic)/rrx
9292 !omment v=yc(ic)/rry
9293 !omment w=zc(ic)/rrz
9294  i=int((u+rx)/delx)+1
9295  j=int((v+ry)/dely)+1
9296  k=int((w+rz)/delz)+1
9297 ! the particle is in the mesh
9298  if(i.gt.0.and.i.le.nx.and.j.gt.0.and.j.le.ny.
9299  * and.k.gt.0.and.k.le.nz) then
9300  xnd1=-rx+float(i-1)*delx
9301  ynd1=-ry+float(j-1)*dely
9302  znd1=-rz+float(k-1)*delz
9303  delu=u-xnd1
9304  delv=v-ynd1
9305  delw=w-znd1
9306  delux=delu/delx
9307  delvy=delv/dely
9308  delwz=delw/delz
9309 ! *******interpollation for particle inside a cube
9310 ! %%%%%% in plane 1:
9311 ! node 1: (i,j,k) node 2:(i+1,j,k) node 3:(i+1,j,k+1) node 4:(i,j,k+1)
9312 ! axis (nd1,nd2)
9313  ex12=(exk(i+1,j,k)-exk(i,j,k))*delux+exk(i,j,k)
9314 ! axis (nd4,nd3)
9315  ex43=(exk(i+1,j,k+1)-exk(i,j,k+1))*delux+exk(i,j,k+1)
9316 ! plane 1
9317  exp1=(ex43-ex12)*delwz+ex12
9318 ! %%%%%%% in plane 3:
9319 ! node 5:(i,j+1,k) node 6:(i+1,j+1,k) node 7:(i+1,j+1,k+1) node 8:(i,j+1,k+1)
9320 ! axis(nd5,nd6)
9321  ex56=(exk(i+1,j+1,k)-exk(i,j+1,k))*delux+exk(i,j+1,k)
9322 ! axis(nd8,nd7)
9323  ex87=(exk(i+1,j+1,k+1)-exk(i,j+1,k+1))*delux+exk(i,j+1,
9324  * k+1)
9325 ! plane 3
9326  exp3=(ex87-ex56)*delwz+ex56
9327 ! $$$$$ plane1+plane3
9328  exp13=(exp3-exp1)*delvy+exp1
9329 ! %%%%% in plane 2:
9330 ! node 1: (i,j,k) node 2:(i+1,j,k) node 5:(i,j+1,k) node 6:(i+1,j+1,k)
9331 ! axis (nd1,nd2) : ex12
9332 ! axis (nd5,nd6) : ex56
9333 ! plane 2
9334  exp2=(ex56-ex12)*delvy+ex12
9335 ! %%%%%% in plane 5
9336 ! node 4:(i,j,k+1) node 3:(i+1,j,k+1) node 8:(i,j+1,k+1) node 7:(i+1,j+1,k+1)
9337 ! axis(nd4,nd3)
9338  ex43=(exk(i+1,j,k+1)-exk(i,j,k+1))*delux+exk(i,j,k+1)
9339 ! axis(nd8,nd7)
9340  ex87=(exk(i+1,j+1,k+1)-exk(i,j+1,k+1))*delux+exk(i,j+1,
9341  * k+1)
9342 ! plane 5
9343  exp5=(ex87-ex43)*delvy+ex43
9344 ! $$$$ plane2+plane5
9345  exp25=(exp5-exp2)*delwz+exp2
9346 ! &&&& (plane1+plane3)+(plane2+plane5) --> field Ex(u,v,w)
9347  ext=(exp13+exp25)/2.
9348 ! ******* field component Ey
9349 ! %%%%%% in plane 2:
9350 ! node 1: (i,j,k) node 2:(i+1,j,k) node 5:(i,j+1,k) node 6:(i+1,j+1,k)
9351 ! axis(nd1,nd5)
9352  ey15=(eyk(i,j+1,k)-eyk(i,j,k))*delvy+eyk(i,j,k)
9353 ! axis (nd2,nd6)
9354  ey26=(eyk(i+1,j+1,k)-eyk(i+1,j,k))*delvy+eyk(i+1,j,k)
9355 ! plane 2
9356  eyp2=(ey26-ey15)*delu/delx+ey15
9357 ! %%%%%% in plane 5:
9358 ! node 4:(i,j,k+1) node 3:(i+1,j,k+1) node 8:(i,j+1,k+1) node 7:(i+1,j+1,k+1)
9359 ! axis(nd4,nd8)
9360  ey48=(eyk(i,j+1,k+1)-eyk(i,j,k+1))*delvy+eyk(i,j,k+1)
9361 ! axis(nd3,nd7)
9362  ey37=(eyk(i+1,j+1,k+1)-eyk(i+1,j,k+1))*delvy+eyk(i+1,j,
9363  * k+1)
9364 ! plane 5
9365  eyp5=(ey37-ey48)*delux+ey48
9366 ! $$$$$$ plane2+plane5
9367  eyp25=(eyp5-eyp2)*delwz+eyp2
9368 ! %%%%%% in plane 6:
9369 ! node 1:(i,j,k) node 5:(i,j+1,k) node 4:(i,j,k+1) node 8:(i,j+1,k+1)
9370 ! axis(nd1,nd5): ey15
9371 ! axis(nd4,nd8): ey48
9372 ! plane 6
9373  eyp6=(ey48-ey15)*delwz+ey15
9374 ! %%%%%% in plane 4:
9375 ! node 2:(i+1,j,k) node 3:(i+1,j,k+1) node 6:(i+1,j+1,k) node 7:(i+1,j+1,k+1)
9376 ! axis(nd2,nd6): ey26
9377 ! axis(nd3,nd7): ey37
9378 ! plane 4
9379  eyp4=(ey37-ey26)*delwz+ey26
9380 ! $$$$plane6+plane4
9381  eyp46=(eyp4-eyp6)*delux+eyp6
9382 ! (plane2+plane5)+(plane4+plane6)--> field Ez(u,v,w)
9383  eyt=(eyp25+eyp46)/2.
9384 ! *******interpollation of the field component Ez
9385 ! %%%%%% in plane 1:
9386 ! node 1:(i,j,k) node 2:(i+1,j,k) node 3:(i+1,j,k+1) node 4:(i,j,k+1)
9387 ! axis(nd1,nd4)
9388  ez14=(ezk(i,j,k+1)-ezk(i,j,k))*delwz+ezk(i,j,k)
9389 ! axis(nd2,nd3)
9390  ez23=(ezk(i+1,j,k+1)-ezk(i+1,j,k))*delwz+ezk(i+1,j,k)
9391 ! plane 1
9392  ezp1=(ez23-ez14)*delux+ez14
9393 ! %%%%%% in plane 3:
9394 ! node 5:(i,j+1,k) node 6:(i+1,j+1,k) node 7:(i+1,j+1,k+1) node 8:(i,j+1,k+1)
9395 ! axis (nd5,nd8)
9396  ez58=(ezk(i,j+1,k+1)-ezk(i,j+1,k))*delwz+ezk(i,j+1,k)
9397 ! axis (nd6,nd7)
9398  ez67=(ezk(i+1,j+1,k+1)-ezk(i+1,j+1,k))*delwz+ezk(i+1,
9399  * j+1,k)
9400 ! plane 3
9401  ezp3=(ez67-ez58)*delux+ez58
9402 ! $$$$$$ plane1+plane3
9403  ezp13=(ezp3-ezp1)*delvy+ezp1
9404 ! %%%%%% in plane 6:
9405 ! node 1:(i,j,k) node 5:(i,j+1,k) node 4:(i,j,k+1) node 8:(i,j+1,k+1)
9406 ! axis (nd1,nd4)
9407  ez14=(ezk(i,j,k+1)-ezk(i,j,k))*delwz+ezk(i,j,k)
9408 ! axis (nd5,nd8)
9409  ez58=(ezk(i,j+1,k+1)-ezk(i,j+1,k))*delwz+ezk(i,j+1,k)
9410 ! plane 6
9411  ezp6=(ez58-ez14)*delvy+ez14
9412 ! %%%%%% in plane 4:
9413 ! node 2:(i+1,j,k) node 3:(i+1,j,k+1) node 6:(i+1,j+1,k) node 7:(i+1,j+1,k+1)
9414 ! axis(nd2,nd3)
9415  ez23=(ezk(i+1,j,k+1)-ezk(i+1,j,k))*delwz+ezk(i+1,j,k)
9416 ! axis(nd6,nd7)
9417  ez67=(ezk(i+1,j+1,k+1)-ezk(i+1,j+1,k))*delwz+ezk(i+1,
9418  * j+1,k)
9419 ! plane 4
9420  ezp4=(ez67-ez23)*delvy+ez23
9421 ! $$$$$$ plane6+plane4
9422  ezp64=(ezp4-ezp6)*delux+ezp6
9423 ! (P1+P3)+(P6+P4)----> Ez(u,v,w)
9424  ezt=(ezp13+ezp64)/2.
9425  insd=insd+1
9426 ! calculate kicks in x',y' and z' (energy)
9427  eztp=ezt*cos(apl)-ext*sin(apl)
9428  extp=ezt*sin(apl)+ext*cos(apl)
9429  ezt=eztp
9430  ext=extp
9431  gsc=f(7,ic)/xmat
9432  bsc=sqrt(1.-1./(gsc*gsc))
9433 !omment cmacrxy=cmacro/(bmoy*bmoy*gmoy*gmoy*gmoy)
9434 !omment cmacrxy=cmacro/(bsc*bsc*gsc*gsc)
9435  dxp=const2*ext*dz*cmacrxy*abs(f(9,ic))
9436  dyp=const2*eyt*dz*cmacrxy*abs(f(9,ic))
9437  dw=const3*ezt*dz*cmacro*abs(f(9,ic))
9438 ! ****test************************************
9439 !omment dw=dw/gmoy
9440 ! ****************************************
9441  if(.not.iesp) then
9442 ! load the entrance beam parameters for cavities or gaps
9443  do js=1,7
9444  f(js,ic)=fs(js,ic)
9445  enddo
9446  f(3,ic)=f(3,ic)+dxp*1000.
9447  f(5,ic)=f(5,ic)+dyp*1000.
9448  f(2,ic)=f(2,ic)-dz1*dxp*100.*xpsc
9449  f(4,ic)=f(4,ic)-dz1*dyp*100.*xpsc
9450 !omment f(2,ic)=f(2,ic)-dz1*dxp*100.
9451 !omment f(4,ic)=f(4,ic)-dz1*dyp*100.
9452  dwp(ic)=dw
9453  else
9454  f(3,ic)=f(3,ic)+dxp*1000.
9455  f(5,ic)=f(5,ic)+dyp*1000.
9456  f(7,ic)=f(7,ic)+dw
9457  endif
9458  else
9459 ! the particle is not in the mesh
9460 ! computed the beam self-fields as made at the nodes
9461  ax=0.
9462  ay=0.
9463  az=0.
9464  if(isucc.eq.1) then
9465  s3=xc(ic)/rms(3,2)
9466  s2=yc(ic)/rms(2,2)
9467  s1=zc(ic)/rms(1,2)
9468  ax=pwtpi*rms(3,2)
9469  ay=pwtpi*rms(2,2)
9470  az=pwtpi*rms(1,2)
9471  rrx=rms(3,2)
9472  rry=rms(2,2)
9473  rrz=rms(1,2)
9474  endif
9475  if(isucc.eq.2) then
9476  s3=yc(ic)/rms(3,2)
9477  s2=zc(ic)/rms(2,2)
9478  s1=xc(ic)/rms(1,2)
9479  ax=pwtpi*rms(1,2)
9480  ay=pwtpi*rms(3,2)
9481  az=pwtpi*rms(2,2)
9482  rrx=rms(1,2)
9483  rry=rms(3,2)
9484  rrz=rms(2,2)
9485  endif
9486  if(isucc.eq.3) then
9487  s3=zc(ic)/rms(3,2)
9488  s2=xc(ic)/rms(2,2)
9489  s1=yc(ic)/rms(1,2)
9490  ax=pwtpi*rms(2,2)
9491  ay=pwtpi*rms(1,2)
9492  az=pwtpi*rms(3,2)
9493  rrx= rms(2,2)
9494  rry=rms(1,2)
9495  rrz=rms(3,2)
9496  endif
9497 ! storage arrays of the functions in the integrals in tables 75 and 76
9498 ! these values given in table 73 are independent of l, m and n
9499 ! They are stored in: epsi1(i,j),epsi2(i,j), akpc1(i,j), akpc2(i,j),
9500 ! akps1(i,j), akps2(i,j) where i,j are the Gauss positions
9501  call uvrms
9502 ! field computation
9503 ! loop over the l,m and n
9504  ext=0.
9505  eyt=0.
9506  ezt=0.
9507  do jn=1,nmax
9508  jn1=jn-1
9509  do jm=1,mmax
9510  jm1=jm-1
9511  do jl=1,lmax
9512  jl1=jl-1
9513  if(a(jl,jm,jn).ne.0.) then
9514 ! in output the SUBROUTINE field returns the values of the FUNCTION E*(l,m,n)
9515 ! shown in tables 77-a-1 to 77-b-2 in x,y and z-directions-->ex,ey,ez
9516  call fielde(jl1,jm1,jn1,isucc)
9517 ! the corresonding field components are obtained from tables 67-a to 67-h
9518  ext=a(jl,jm,jn)/ax*ex+ext
9519  eyt=a(jl,jm,jn)/ay*ey+eyt
9520  ezt=a(jl,jm,jn)/az*ez+ezt
9521  endif
9522  enddo
9523  enddo
9524  enddo
9525  iout=iout+1
9526 ! kicks
9527 ! kicks computation
9528 ! calculate kick in x',y' and z' (energy)
9529 ! isochronism correction
9530  eztp=ezt*cos(apl)-ext*sin(apl)
9531  extp=ezt*sin(apl)+ext*cos(apl)
9532  ezt=eztp
9533  ext=extp
9534  gsc=f(7,ic)/xmat
9535  bsc=sqrt(1.-1./(gsc*gsc))
9536 !omment cmacrxy=cmacro/(bmoy*bmoy*gmoy*gmoy)
9537 !omment cmacrxy=cmacro/(bsc*bsc*gsc*gsc)
9538  dxp=const2*ext*dz*cmacrxy*abs(f(9,ic))
9539  dyp=const2*eyt*dz*cmacrxy*abs(f(9,ic))
9540  dw=const3*ezt*dz*cmacro*abs(f(9,ic))
9541  if(.not.iesp) then
9542 ! load the beam at the input at cavities or gaps
9543  do js=1,7
9544  f(js,ic)=fs(js,ic)
9545  enddo
9546  f(3,ic)=f(3,ic)+dxp*1000.
9547  f(5,ic)=f(5,ic)+dyp*1000.
9548  f(2,ic)=f(2,ic)-dz1*dxp*100.*xpsc
9549  f(4,ic)=f(4,ic)-dz1*dyp*100.*xpsc
9550 !omment f(2,ic)=f(2,ic)-dz1*dxp*100.
9551 !omment f(4,ic)=f(4,ic)-dz1*dyp*100.
9552  dwp(ic)=dw
9553  else
9554  f(3,ic)=f(3,ic)+dxp*1000.
9555  f(5,ic)=f(5,ic)+dyp*1000.
9556  f(7,ic)=f(7,ic)+dw
9557  endif
9558  endif
9559 ! end of if particle not in mesh
9560  nprint=nprint+1
9561 ! end of the loop ic
9562  enddo
9563  write(16,*) ' particles in the mesh:',insd,' outside: ',iout
9564 ! end of if when ini=2
9565  endif
9566 !1000 format(4(2x,e12.5))
9567  return
9568  end
9569 
9577  SUBROUTINE xtypl1(GAMI,SAPHI,QSC,DCG)
9578  implicit real(8) (a-h,o-z)
9579  COMMON /consta/ vl, pi, xmat, rpel, qst
9580  common/posi/ist
9581  common/jacob/gaks,gaps
9582  common/ttfc/tk,t1k,t2k,sk,s1k,s2k,fh
9583  common/bedycp/phslip,eqvl,asdl,peqvl,pavph,xkp1,xkp2,
9584  * aa,bb,cc,dd,ee,pcrest,sqcttf
9585  common/typl1/yh1k0,yh1k1,yp1k1,yp1k2,
9586  x yh1k00,yh1k01,yp1k01,yp1k02,
9587  x yh10,yh11,yp11,yp12
9588  common/typl2/yh2k0,yh2k1,
9589  x yp2k1,yp2k2,
9590  x yh2k00,yh2k01,yp2k01,yp2k02,
9591  x yh20,yh21,yp21,yp22
9592 ! TRANSVERSAL dE(z)/dt
9593  common/typi1/ye1k0,ye1k1,ye1k2,
9594  x ye1kc0,ye1kc1,ye1kc2,
9595  x ye10,ye11,ye12
9596  common/typi2/ye2k0,ye2k1,ye2k2,
9597  x ye2kc0,ye2kc1,ye2kc2,
9598  x ye20,ye21,ye22
9599  dimension h(17),t(17)
9600  DATA t /-.990575473,-.950675522,-.880239154,
9601  1 -.781514004,-.657671159,-.512690537,
9602  2 -.351231763,-.178484181, 0.,
9603  3 .178484181, .351231763,.512690537,
9604  4 .657671159, .781514004,.880239154,
9605  5 .950675522, .990575473/
9606  DATA h /.024148303,.055459529,.085036148,
9607  1 .111883847,.135136368,.154045761,
9608  2 .168004102,.176562705,.179446470,
9609  3 .176562705,.168004102,.154045761,
9610  4 .135136368,.111883847,.085036148,
9611  5 .055459529,.024148303/
9612  fh0=fh/vl
9613  cgi=qsc/xmat
9614 ! Circular cosinus functions
9615 ! In longitudinal direction
9616  yh1k0=0.
9617  yh1k1=0.
9618  yp1k1=0.
9619  yp1k2=0.
9620  yh1k00=0.
9621  yh1k01=0.
9622  yp1k01=0.
9623  yp1k02=0.
9624  yh10=0.
9625  yh11=0.
9626  yp11=0.
9627  yp12=0.
9628 ! In transverse direction ( dE(z)/dt )
9629  ye1k0=0.
9630  ye1k1=0.
9631  ye1k2=0.
9632  ye1kc0=0.
9633  ye1kc1=0.
9634  ye1kc2=0.
9635  ye10=0.
9636  ye11=0.
9637  ye12=0.
9638 ! Circular sinus functions
9639 ! In longitudinal direction
9640  yh2k0=0.
9641  yh2k1=0.
9642  yp2k1=0.
9643  yp2k2=0.
9644  yh2k00=0.
9645  yh2k01=0.
9646  yp2k01=0.
9647  yp2k02=0.
9648  yh20=0.
9649  yh21=0.
9650  yp21=0.
9651  yp22=0.
9652 ! In transverse direction ( dE(z)/dt )
9653  ye2k0=0.
9654  ye2k1=0.
9655  ye2k2=0.
9656  ye2kc0=0.
9657  ye2kc1=0.
9658  ye2kc2=0.
9659  ye20=0.
9660  ye21=0.
9661  ye22=0.
9662 ! Calculates the integrals
9663  dtilk=eqvl
9664  gam2=gami**2
9665  beti=sqrt(1. - 1./gam2 )
9666  xk1=fh0/beti
9667  tilta2=phslip/(2.*eqvl)
9668  cgam10=((gami*gami-1.)**1.5)/fh0
9669  phcrtk=(t1k*sk-s1k*tk)/(tk*tk+sk*sk)
9670  ist=0
9671  do i=1,17
9672  ist=ist+1
9673  xcc= eqvl*(1.+t(i))/2.
9674  xcc1=xcc+asdl
9675  IF(xcc1.GT.dcg) EXIT
9676  phit0=saphi-phslip*(eqvl-xcc)/(2.*eqvl)+pavph
9677 ! FONCTION GAMMA (Z)
9678  IF(phslip.NE.0.) THEN
9679  git = cgi * sqcttf*cos(phit0-pcrest)/phslip
9680  gis = sin(xcc*tilta2)
9681  ELSE
9682  git = cgi * sqcttf*cos(phit0-pcrest)
9683  gis = xcc/(2.*eqvl)
9684  ENDIF
9685  gi=gami+git * gis
9686  bi=sqrt(1.-1./(gi*gi))
9687 ! Derivative of G0(Z) relative to the equivalent k
9688  phit0k=-dtilk*(1.-xcc/eqvl)/2.
9689  IF(phslip.NE.0.) THEN
9690  gic = cos(xcc*tilta2)
9691  gak1 = dtilk*cos(phit0-pcrest)*gis/(phslip*phslip)
9692  gak2 = sin(phit0-pcrest)*gis*(phit0k-phcrtk)/phslip
9693  gak3 = dtilk*cos(phit0-pcrest)*xcc*gic/(2.*phslip*eqvl)
9694  gak = cgi * sqcttf* (-gak1-gak2+gak3)
9695  ELSE
9696  gak1 = sin(phit0-pcrest)*gis*(phit0k-phcrtk)
9697  gak = -cgi * sqcttf* gak1
9698  ENDIF
9699  IF(i.EQ.17) gaks=gak
9700 ! Calculate the integrals of HA0(Z) and HB0(Z)
9701  xint=1./(bi*bi*bi*gi*gi*gi)
9702  phit1=phit0+xcc*phslip/(2.*eqvl)
9703  phtz0=(xcc/eqvl-.5)*dtilk
9704  ha0=2.*sqcttf*cos(phit1-pcrest)*xint
9705  hb0=2.*sqcttf*sin(phit1-pcrest)*xint
9706 ! n=0
9707 ! Longitudinal direction
9708  yh10=yh10+h(i)*ha0
9709  yh20=yh20+h(i)*hb0
9710 ! Transverse direction
9711  ye10=yh20
9712  ye20=yh10
9713 ! n=1
9714 ! Longitudinal direction
9715  yh11=yh11+h(i)*ha0*xcc1
9716  yh21=yh21+h(i)*hb0*xcc1
9717 ! Transverse direction
9718  ye11=ye11+h(i)*hb0*xcc
9719  ye21=ye21+h(i)*ha0*xcc
9720 ! n=2
9721  ye12=ye12+h(i)*hb0*xcc*xcc
9722  ye22=ye22+h(i)*ha0*xcc*xcc
9723 ! Calculate the integrals of the derivative of HA0(Z)
9724  dha01=sqcttf*cos(phit1-pcrest)*gi/((gi*gi-1.)**2.5)
9725  dha02=sqcttf*cos(phit1-pcrest)*gi*gak/((gi*gi-1.)**2.5)
9726  dha03=sqcttf*sin(phit1-pcrest)/((gi*gi-1.)**1.5)
9727 ! n=0
9728 ! Longitudinal direction
9729  yh1k00=yh1k00+h(i)*dha01*6.*cgam10
9730  yh1k0=yh1k0+h(i)*(-6.*dha02+
9731  x 2.*(phcrtk-phtz0)*dha03)
9732 ! Transverse direction
9733  ye2kc0=yh1k00
9734  ye2k0=yh1k0
9735 ! n=1
9736 ! Longitudinal direction
9737  yh1k01=yh1k01+h(i)*dha01*xcc1*6.*cgam10
9738  yh1k1=yh1k1+h(i)*xcc1*(-6.*dha02+
9739  x 2.*(phcrtk-phtz0)*dha03)
9740 ! Transverse direction
9741  ye2kc1=ye2kc1+h(i)*dha01*xcc*6.*cgam10
9742  ye2k1=ye2k1+h(i)*xcc*(-6.*dha02-
9743  x 2.*(phcrtk-phtz0)*dha03)
9744 ! n=2
9745  ye2kc2=ye2kc2+h(i)*dha01*xcc*xcc*6.*cgam10
9746  ye2k2=ye2k2+h(i)*xcc*xcc*(-6.*dha02-
9747  x 2.*(phcrtk-phtz0)*dha03)
9748 ! INTEGRALS Of HB0(Z)
9749  dhb01=sqcttf*sin(phit1-pcrest)*gi/((gi*gi-1.)**2.5)
9750  dhb02=sqcttf*sin(phit1-pcrest)*gi*gak/((gi*gi-1.)**2.5)
9751  dhb03=sqcttf*cos(phit1-pcrest)/((gi*gi-1.)**1.5)
9752 ! n=0
9753 ! LONGITUDINAL
9754  yh2k00=yh2k00+h(i)*dhb01*6.*cgam10
9755  yh2k0=yh2k0+h(i)*(-6.*dhb02-
9756  x 2.*(phcrtk-phtz0)*dhb03)
9757 ! TRANSVERSE
9758  ye1kc0=yh2k00
9759  ye1k0=yh2k0
9760 ! n=1
9761 ! LONGITUDINAL
9762  yh2k01=yh2k01+h(i)*dhb01*xcc1*6.*cgam10
9763  yh2k1=yh2k1+h(i)*xcc1*(-6.*dhb02-
9764  x 2.*(phcrtk-phtz0)*dhb03)
9765 ! TRANSVERSE
9766  ye1kc1=ye1kc1+h(i)*dhb01*xcc*6.*cgam10
9767  ye1k1=ye1k1+h(i)*xcc*(-6.*dhb02-
9768  x 2.*(phcrtk-phtz0)*dhb03)
9769 ! n=2
9770  ye1kc2=ye1kc2+h(i)*dhb01*xcc*xcc*6.*cgam10
9771  ye1k2=ye1k2+h(i)*xcc*xcc*(-6.*dhb02-
9772  x 2.*(phcrtk-phtz0)*dhb03)
9773 ! Calculate the integrals of PA0(Z) et PB0(Z)
9774  pa0=2.*sqcttf*cos(phit1-pcrest)*xint*xint
9775  pb0=2.*sqcttf*sin(phit1-pcrest)*xint*xint
9776 ! n=1
9777  yp11=yp11+h(i)*pa0*xcc1
9778  yp21=yp21+h(i)*pb0*xcc1
9779 ! n=2
9780  yp12=yp12+h(i)*pa0*xcc1*xcc1
9781  yp22=yp22+h(i)*pb0*xcc1*xcc1
9782 ! Calculate the integrals of the derivatives of PA0(Z)
9783  dpa01=sqcttf*cos(phit1-pcrest)*gi/((gi*gi-1.)**4)
9784  dpa02=sqcttf*cos(phit1-pcrest)*gi*gak/((gi*gi-1.)**4)
9785  dpa03=sqcttf*sin(phit1-pcrest)/((gi*gi-1.)**3)
9786 ! n=1
9787  yp1k01=yp1k01+h(i)*dpa01*12.*cgam10*xcc1
9788  yp1k1=yp1k1+h(i)*xcc1*(-12.*dpa02+
9789  x 2.*(phcrtk-phtz0)*dpa03)
9790 ! n=2
9791  yp1k02=yp1k02+h(i)*dpa01*12.*cgam10*xcc1*xcc1
9792  yp1k2=yp1k2+h(i)*xcc1*xcc1*(-12.*dpa02 +
9793  x 2.*(phcrtk-phtz0)*dpa03)
9794 ! INTEGRALES DERIVES PB0(Z)
9795  dpb01=sqcttf*sin(phit1-pcrest)*gi/((gi*gi-1.)**4)
9796  dpb02=sqcttf*sin(phit1-pcrest)*gi*gak/((gi*gi-1.)**4)
9797  dpb02=dpb02
9798  dpb03=sqcttf*cos(phit1-pcrest)/((gi*gi-1.)**3)
9799 ! n=1
9800  yp2k01=yp2k01+h(i)*dpb01*12.*cgam10*xcc1
9801  yp2k1=yp2k1+h(i)*xcc1*(-12.*dpb02-
9802  x 2.*(phcrtk-phtz0)*dpb03)
9803 ! n=2
9804  yp2k02=yp2k02+h(i)*dpb01*12.*cgam10*xcc1*xcc1
9805  yp2k2=yp2k2+h(i)*xcc1*xcc1*(-12.*dpb02 -
9806  x 2.*(phcrtk-phtz0)*dpb03)
9807  enddo
9808 ! in COS
9809 ! LONGITUDINAL INTEGRALS
9810  yh1k00=yh1k00/2. *eqvl
9811  yh1k01=yh1k01/2. *eqvl
9812  yh1k0=yh1k0/2. *eqvl
9813  yh1k1=yh1k1/2. *eqvl
9814  yp1k1=yp1k1/2. *eqvl
9815  yp1k2=yp1k2/2. *eqvl
9816  yp1k01=yp1k01/2. *eqvl
9817  yp1k02=yp1k02/2. *eqvl
9818  yh10=yh10*eqvl/2.
9819  yh11=yh11*eqvl/2.
9820  yp11=yp11*eqvl/2.
9821  yp12=yp12*eqvl/2.
9822 ! Transverse integrals
9823  ye1k0=ye1k0/2. *eqvl
9824  ye1kc0=ye1kc0/2. *eqvl
9825  ye1k1=ye1k1/2. *eqvl
9826  ye1kc1=ye1kc1/2. *eqvl
9827  ye1k2=ye1k2/2. *eqvl
9828  ye1kc2=ye1kc2/2. *eqvl
9829  ye10=ye10*eqvl/2.
9830  ye11=ye11*eqvl/2.
9831  ye12=ye12*eqvl/2.
9832 ! in SIN
9833 ! LONGITUDINAL INTEGRALS
9834  yh2k00=yh2k00/2. *eqvl
9835  yh2k01=yh2k01/2. *eqvl
9836  yh2k0=yh2k0/2. *eqvl
9837  yh2k1=yh2k1/2. *eqvl
9838  yp2k1=yp2k1/2. *eqvl
9839  yp2k2=yp2k2/2. *eqvl
9840  yp2k01=yp2k01/2. *eqvl
9841  yp2k02=yp2k02/2. *eqvl
9842  yh20=yh20*eqvl/2.
9843  yh21=yh21*eqvl/2.
9844  yp21=yp21*eqvl/2.
9845  yp22=yp22*eqvl/2.
9846 ! TRANSVERSE INTEGRALS
9847  ye2k0=ye2k0/2. *eqvl
9848  ye2kc0=ye2kc0/2. *eqvl
9849  ye2k1=ye2k1/2. *eqvl
9850  ye2kc1=ye2kc1/2. *eqvl
9851  ye2k2=ye2k2/2. *eqvl
9852  ye2kc2=ye2kc2/2. *eqvl
9853  ye20=ye20*eqvl/2.
9854  ye21=ye21*eqvl/2.
9855  ye22=ye22*eqvl/2.
9856  RETURN
9857  END
9858 
9863  SUBROUTINE chasel
9864  implicit real(8) (a-h,o-z)
9865  parameter(iptsz=100002,maxcell1=3000)
9866  common/ttfc/tk,t1k,t2k,sk,s1k,s2k,fh
9867  common/fene/wdisp,wphas,wx,wy,rlim,ifw
9868  common/faisc/f(10,iptsz),imax,ngood
9869  common/qmoyen/qmoy
9870  COMMON /consta/ vl, pi, xmat, rpel, qst
9871  common/tapes/in,ifile,meta
9872  common/etcha1/ichas(iptsz),chexmin(10),chexmax(10),chasit
9873  LOGICAL CHASIT
9874  common/etchas/fractx,fracty,fractl
9875  common/etcom/cog(8),exten(17),fd(iptsz)
9876  common/pool/zl(iptsz),ipin(iptsz)
9877  if(fractl.ge.1.) return
9878  do i=1,ngood
9879  ichas(i)=1
9880  zl(i)=0.
9881  ipin(i)=1
9882  enddo
9883  nl=int(float(ngood)*fractl)
9884  inz=0
9885  imaxf=ngood
9886  inx=0
9887 ! ellipsoid of concentration (phase-dispersion)
9888  tx2=0.
9889  txp2=0.
9890  txxp=0.
9891  do i=1,ngood
9892  tx2=tx2+f(6,i)*f(6,i)
9893  txp2=txp2+fd(i)*fd(i)
9894  txxp=txxp+f(6,i)*fd(i)
9895  enddo
9896  tx2=tx2/float(ngood)
9897  txp2=txp2/float(ngood)
9898  txxp=txxp/float(ngood)
9899  delxxp=tx2*txp2-txxp*txxp
9900  ikept=0
9901  do i=1,ngood
9902  theta=pi/2.
9903  if(fd(i).ne.0.)theta=atan(f(6,i)/fd(i))
9904  rpart=f(6,i)*f(6,i)+fd(i)*fd(i)
9905  cos2=cos(theta)*cos(theta)
9906  sin2=sin(theta)*sin(theta)
9907  denom=tx2*cos2+txp2*sin2-2.*txxp*cos(theta)*sin(theta)
9908  relpse=2.5*delxxp/denom
9909  if(fractl.ge..97) then
9910  relpse=3.5*delxxp/denom
9911  else
9912  if(fractl.ge..95) relpse=3.*delxxp/denom
9913  endif
9914  if(rpart.le.relpse) then
9915  ipin(i)=0
9916  ikept=ikept+1
9917  endif
9918  enddo
9919  write(16,*) ' CHASEL: keep',100.*fractl,' % of ',ngood,
9920  * ' particles; chase ',ngood-int(fractl*ngood),
9921  * ' from the ',ngood-ikept,' most outlying particles'
9922  do j=1,ngood
9923  if(ipin(j).eq.1) then
9924  inz=inz+1
9925  if(imaxf.le.nl) go to 9990
9926  imaxx=0
9927  tx=0.
9928  txp=0.
9929  txxp=0.
9930  tx2=0.
9931  txp2=0.
9932  do i=1,ngood
9933  if(ichas(i).eq.1) then
9934  tx=f(6,i)+tx
9935  txp=fd(i)+txp
9936  tx2=tx2+f(6,i)*f(6,i)
9937  txp2=txp2+fd(i)*fd(i)
9938  txxp=txxp+f(6,i)*fd(i)
9939  imaxx=imaxx+1
9940  endif
9941  enddo
9942  tx=tx/float(imaxx)
9943  txp=txp/float(imaxx)
9944  tx2=tx2/float(imaxx)
9945  txp2=txp2/float(imaxx)
9946  txxp=txxp/float(imaxx)
9947  xcg=tx
9948  zcg=txp
9949 ! betatron parameters
9950  xxl=tx2-tx*tx
9951  zzl=txp2-txp*txp
9952  xzl=txxp-tx*txp
9953  if(inz.ne.1) then
9954  flcrit=2.*fl2rms*log(2.*imaxx)
9955  if(zlma.lt.flcrit) goto 7770
9956  endif
9957  emil=sqrt(xxl*zzl-xzl*xzl)
9958  if (emil.eq.0.) then
9959  al=0.
9960  bl=0.
9961  cl=0.
9962  else
9963  bl=sqrt(xxl/emil)
9964  cl=1./bl
9965  al=-xzl/emil
9966  endif
9967  tlx0=tx
9968  tlz0=txp
9969 7770 fl2rms=(1.+al*al)*xxl/bl+2.*al*xzl+bl*zzl
9970  zlma=0.
9971  do i=1,ngood
9972  zl(i)=0.
9973  if(ichas(i).eq.1) then
9974  psx=f(6,i)-tlx0
9975  psz=fd(i)-tlz0
9976  zl(i)=psx*psx*cl*cl+(psx*al/bl+psz*bl)**2
9977  if (zlma.lt.zl(i)) then
9978  zlma=zl(i)
9979  izlma=i
9980  endif
9981  endif
9982  enddo
9983 ! particle is eliminated
9984  imaxf=0
9985  if (zlma.eq.0.) zlma=1.e10
9986  do i=1,ngood
9987  if(ichas(i).eq.1 .and. zl(i).lt.zlma) then
9988  imaxf=imaxf+1
9989  else
9990  ichas(i)=0
9991  endif
9992  enddo
9993  endif
9994  enddo
9995 9990 continue
9996 ! write(16,*) ' CHASEL:',imaxf,' retained'
9997  return
9998  end
9999 
10004  SUBROUTINE chasex
10005  implicit real(8) (a-h,o-z)
10006  parameter(iptsz=100002,maxcell1=3000)
10007  common/ttfc/tk,t1k,t2k,sk,s1k,s2k,fh
10008  common/fene/wdisp,wphas,wx,wy,rlim,ifw
10009  common/faisc/f(10,iptsz),imax,ngood
10010  common/qmoyen/qmoy
10011  COMMON /consta/ vl, pi, xmat, rpel, qst
10012  common/tapes/in,ifile,meta
10013  common/etcha1/ichas(iptsz),chexmin(10),chexmax(10),chasit
10014  LOGICAL CHASIT
10015  common/etchas/fractx,fracty,fractl
10016  common/pool/zl(iptsz),ipin(iptsz)
10017  if(fractx.ge.1.) return
10018  do i=1,ngood
10019  ichas(i)=1
10020  zl(i)=0.
10021  ipin(i)=1
10022  enddo
10023  nl=int(float(ngood)*fractx)
10024  inz=0
10025  imaxf=ngood
10026  inx=0
10027 ! ellipsoid of concentration (x-xp)
10028  tx2=0.
10029  txp2=0.
10030  txxp=0.
10031  do i=1,ngood
10032  f2=f(2,i)*1.e-02
10033  f3=f(3,i)*1.e-03
10034  tx2=tx2+f2*f2
10035  txp2=txp2+f3*f3
10036  txxp=txxp+f2*f3
10037  enddo
10038  tx2=tx2/float(ngood)
10039  txp2=txp2/float(ngood)
10040  txxp=txxp/float(ngood)
10041  delxxp=tx2*txp2-txxp*txxp
10042  ikept=0
10043  do i=1,ngood
10044  theta=pi/2.
10045  f2=f(2,i)*1.e-02
10046  f3=f(3,i)*1.e-03
10047  if(f3.ne.0.)theta=atan(f2/f3)
10048  rpart=f2*f2+f3*f3
10049  cos2=cos(theta)*cos(theta)
10050  sin2=sin(theta)*sin(theta)
10051  denom=tx2*cos2+txp2*sin2-2.*txxp*cos(theta)*sin(theta)
10052  relpse=2.5*delxxp/denom
10053  if(fractx.ge..97) then
10054  relpse=3.5*delxxp/denom
10055  else
10056  if(fractx.ge..95) relpse=3.*delxxp/denom
10057  endif
10058  if(rpart.le.relpse) then
10059  ipin(i)=0
10060  ikept=ikept+1
10061  endif
10062  enddo
10063  write(16,*) ' CHASEX: keep',100.*fractx,' % of ',ngood,
10064  * ' particles; chase ',ngood-int(fractx*ngood),
10065  * ' from the ',ngood-ikept,' most outlying particles'
10066  do j=1,ngood
10067  if(ipin(j).eq.1) then
10068  inz=inz+1
10069  if(imaxf.le.nl) go to 9990
10070  imaxx=0
10071  tx=0.
10072  txp=0.
10073  txxp=0.
10074  tx2=0.
10075  txp2=0.
10076  do i=1,ngood
10077  if(ichas(i).eq.1) then
10078  tx=f(2,i)+tx
10079  txp=f(3,i)+txp
10080  tx2=tx2+f(2,i)*f(2,i)
10081  txp2=txp2+f(3,i)*f(3,i)
10082  txxp=txxp+f(2,i)*f(3,i)
10083  imaxx=imaxx+1
10084  endif
10085  enddo
10086  tx=tx/float(imaxx)
10087  txp=txp/float(imaxx)
10088  tx2=tx2/float(imaxx)
10089  txp2=txp2/float(imaxx)
10090  txxp=txxp/float(imaxx)
10091  xcg=tx
10092  zcg=txp
10093 ! betatron parameters
10094  xxl=tx2-tx*tx
10095  zzl=txp2-txp*txp
10096  xzl=txxp-tx*txp
10097  if(inz.ne.1) then
10098  flcrit=2.*fl2rms*log(2.*imaxx)
10099  if(zlma.lt.flcrit) goto 7770
10100  endif
10101  emil=sqrt(xxl*zzl-xzl*xzl)
10102  if (emil.eq.0.) then
10103  al=0.
10104  bl=0.
10105  cl=0.
10106  else
10107  bl=sqrt(xxl/emil)
10108  cl=1./bl
10109  al=-xzl/emil
10110  endif
10111  tlx0=tx
10112  tlz0=txp
10113 7770 fl2rms=(1.+al*al)*xxl/bl+2.*al*xzl+bl*zzl
10114  zlma=0.
10115  do i=1,ngood
10116  zl(i)=0.
10117  if(ichas(i).eq.1) then
10118  psx=f(2,i)-tlx0
10119  psz=f(3,i)-tlz0
10120  zl(i)=psx*psx*cl*cl+(psx*al/bl+psz*bl)**2
10121  if (zlma.lt.zl(i)) then
10122  zlma=zl(i)
10123  izlma=i
10124  endif
10125  endif
10126  enddo
10127 ! particle is eliminated
10128  imaxf=0
10129  if (zlma.eq.0.) zlma=1.e10
10130  do i=1,ngood
10131  if(ichas(i).eq.1 .and. zl(i).lt.zlma) then
10132  imaxf=imaxf+1
10133  else
10134  ichas(i)=0
10135  endif
10136  enddo
10137  endif
10138  enddo
10139 9990 continue
10140  return
10141  end
10142 
10147  SUBROUTINE chase
10148  implicit real(8) (a-h,o-z)
10149  parameter(iptsz=100002,maxcell1=3000)
10150  common/tapes/in,ifile,meta
10151  common/etchas/fractx,fracty,fractl
10152  common/etcha1/ichas(iptsz),chexmin(10),chexmax(10),chasit
10153  LOGICAL CHASIT
10154  READ(in,*)fractx,fracty,fractl
10155  WRITE(16,1) fractx*100.,fracty*100.,fractl*100.
10156 1 FORMAT(' ARE KEPT IN THE BUNCH ',/,
10157  x ' (x,xp) : ',f7.3,' %',/,
10158  x ' (y,yp) : ',f7.3,' % ',/,
10159  x ' (w,phase): ',f7.3,' %')
10160 ! write heading for the reduced_emit.dat file; emmittances are RMS
10161  open(44,file='chase_emith.out',status='unknown')
10162  WRITE(44,'(A,A,A,A,A,A)') '# z(m) % in H ',
10163  * ' Wcog(MeV) PHIcog(deg)',
10164  * ' Eh(mm.mrad) Ev(mm.mrad) El(kev.ns)',
10165  * ' #remain ngood xmin(mm) xmax(mm) ymin(mm)',
10166  * ' ymax(mm) tmin(s) tmax(s) ',
10167  * ' Wmin(MeV) Wmax(MeV)'
10168  open(45,file='chase_emitv.out',status='unknown')
10169  WRITE(45,'(A,A,A,A,A,A)') '# z(m) % in V ',
10170  * ' Wcog(MeV) PHIcog(deg)',
10171  * ' Eh(mm.mrad) Ev(mm.mrad) El(kev.ns)',
10172  * ' #remain ngood xmin(mm) xmax(mm) ymin(mm)',
10173  * ' ymax(mm) tmin(s) tmax(s) ',
10174  * ' Wmin(MeV) Wmax(MeV)'
10175  open(46,file='chase_emitl.out',status='unknown')
10176  WRITE(46,'(A,A,A,A,A,A)') '# z(m) % in L ',
10177  * ' Wcog(MeV) PHIcog(deg)',
10178  * ' Eh(mm.mrad) Ev(mm.mrad) El(kev.ns)',
10179  * ' #remain ngood xmin(mm) xmax(mm) ymin(mm)',
10180  * ' ymax(mm) tmin(s) tmax(s) ',
10181  * ' Wmin(MeV) Wmax(MeV)'
10182  chasit=.false.
10183  if(fractx.lt.1.) chasit=.true.
10184  if(fracty.lt.1.) chasit=.true.
10185  if(fractl.lt.1.) chasit=.true.
10186  if(chasit) then
10187  else
10188  WRITE(16,*) 'All 3 fractions are set to 100%, CHASE disabled'
10189  endif
10190  RETURN
10191  END
10192 
10197  SUBROUTINE chasey
10198  implicit real(8) (a-h,o-z)
10199  parameter(iptsz=100002,maxcell1=3000)
10200  common/ttfc/tk,t1k,t2k,sk,s1k,s2k,fh
10201  common/fene/wdisp,wphas,wx,wy,rlim,ifw
10202  common/faisc/f(10,iptsz),imax,ngood
10203  common/qmoyen/qmoy
10204  COMMON /consta/ vl, pi, xmat, rpel, qst
10205  common/tapes/in,ifile,meta
10206  common/etcha1/ichas(iptsz),chexmin(10),chexmax(10),chasit
10207  LOGICAL CHASIT
10208  common/etchas/fractx,fracty,fractl
10209  common/pool/zl(iptsz),ipin(iptsz)
10210  if(fracty.ge.1.) return
10211  do i=1,ngood
10212  ichas(i)=1
10213  zl(i)=0.
10214  ipin(i)=1
10215  enddo
10216  nl=int(float(ngood)*fracty)
10217  imaxf=ngood
10218 ! ellipsoid of concentration (y-yp)
10219  ty2=0.
10220  typ2=0.
10221  tyyp=0.
10222  do i=1,ngood
10223  f4=f(4,i)*1.e-02
10224  f5=f(5,i)*1.e-03
10225  ty2=ty2+f4*f4
10226  typ2=typ2+f5*f5
10227  tyyp=tyyp+f4*f5
10228  enddo
10229  ty2=ty2/float(ngood)
10230  typ2=typ2/float(ngood)
10231  tyyp=tyyp/float(ngood)
10232  delyyp=ty2*typ2-tyyp*tyyp
10233  ikept=0
10234  do i=1,ngood
10235  f4=f(4,i)*1.e-02
10236  f5=f(5,i)*1.e-03
10237  theta=pi/2.
10238  if(f5.ne.0.)theta=atan(f4/f5)
10239  rpart=f4*f4+f5*f5
10240  cos2=cos(theta)*cos(theta)
10241  sin2=sin(theta)*sin(theta)
10242  denom=ty2*cos2+typ2*sin2-2.*tyyp*cos(theta)*sin(theta)
10243  relpse=2.5*delyyp/denom
10244  if(fracty.ge..97) then
10245  relpse=3.5*delyyp/denom
10246  else
10247  if(fracty.ge..95) relpse=3.*delyyp/denom
10248  endif
10249  if(rpart.le.relpse) then
10250  ipin(i)=0
10251  ikept=ikept+1
10252  endif
10253  enddo
10254  write(16,*) ' CHASEY: keep',100.*fracty,' % of ',ngood,
10255  * ' particles; chase ',ngood-int(fracty*ngood),
10256  * ' from the ',ngood-ikept,' most outlying particles'
10257  inz=0
10258  do j=1,ngood
10259  if(ipin(j).eq.1) then
10260  inz=inz+1
10261  if(imaxf.le.nl) go to 9990
10262  imaxx=0
10263  ty=0.
10264  typ=0.
10265  tyyp=0.
10266  ty2=0.
10267  typ2=0.
10268  do i=1,ngood
10269  if(ichas(i).eq.1) then
10270  ty=f(4,i)+ty
10271  typ=f(5,i)+typ
10272  ty2=ty2+f(4,i)*f(4,i)
10273  typ2=typ2+f(5,i)*f(5,i)
10274  tyyp=tyyp+f(4,i)*f(5,i)
10275  imaxx=imaxx+1
10276  endif
10277  enddo
10278  ty=ty/float(imaxx)
10279  typ=typ/float(imaxx)
10280  ty2=ty2/float(imaxx)
10281  typ2=typ2/float(imaxx)
10282  tyyp=tyyp/float(imaxx)
10283  xcg=ty
10284  zcg=typ
10285 ! betatron parameters
10286  xxl=ty2-ty*ty
10287  zzl=typ2-typ*typ
10288  xzl=tyyp-ty*typ
10289  if(inz.ne.1) then
10290  flcrit=2.*fl2rms*log(2.*imaxx)
10291  if(zlma.lt.flcrit) goto 7770
10292  endif
10293  emil=sqrt(xxl*zzl-xzl*xzl)
10294  if (emil.eq.0.) then
10295  al=0.
10296  bl=0.
10297  cl=0.
10298  else
10299  bl=sqrt(xxl/emil)
10300  cl=1./bl
10301  al=-xzl/emil
10302  endif
10303  tlx0=ty
10304  tlz0=typ
10305 7770 fl2rms=(1.+al*al)*xxl/bl+2.*al*xzl+bl*zzl
10306  zlma=0.
10307  do i=1,ngood
10308  zl(i)=0.
10309  if(ichas(i).eq.1) then
10310  psx=f(4,i)-tlx0
10311  psz=f(5,i)-tlz0
10312  zl(i)=psx*psx*cl*cl+(psx*al/bl+psz*bl)**2
10313  if (zlma.lt.zl(i)) then
10314  zlma=zl(i)
10315  izlma=i
10316  endif
10317  endif
10318  enddo
10319 ! particle is eliminated
10320  imaxf=0
10321  if (zlma.eq.0.) zlma=1.e10
10322  do i=1,ngood
10323  if(ichas(i).eq.1 .and. zl(i).lt.zlma) then
10324  imaxf=imaxf+1
10325  else
10326  ichas(i)=0
10327  endif
10328  enddo
10329  endif
10330  enddo
10331 9990 continue
10332  return
10333  end
10334 
10338  SUBROUTINE corre(n,nall)
10339  implicit real(8) (a-h,o-z)
10340  parameter(iptsz=100002)
10341  COMMON /com4/cord(iptsz,6)
10342  dimension a(6,6),b(6,6),c(6,6),d(6),e(6),f(6),g(6)
10343  DO i =1,6
10344  d(i)=0.0
10345  e(i)=0.0
10346  f(i)=0.0
10347  g(i)=0.0
10348  DO j =1,6
10349  a(i,j)=0.0
10350  b(i,j)=0.0
10351  c(i,j)=0.0
10352  ENDDO
10353  ENDDO
10354  DO j =1,6
10355  DO i =1,n
10356  d(j)=d(j)+cord(i,j)
10357  ENDDO
10358  d(j)=d(j)/n
10359  ENDDO
10360  DO j =1,6
10361  DO i=1,nall
10362  cord(i,j)=cord(i,j)-d(j)
10363  ENDDO
10364  ENDDO
10365  DO j=1,6
10366  DO k=1,j
10367  DO i=1,n
10368  a(j,k)=a(j,k)+ cord(i,j)*cord(i,k)
10369  ENDDO
10370  a(j,k)=a(j,k)/n
10371  ENDDO
10372  ENDDO
10373 ! WE MAKE MATRIX A=B*BT WHERE B,BT ARE TRIANGULAR
10374  DO i=1,6
10375  DO j=1,i
10376  h=a(i,j)
10377  j1=j-1
10378  IF(j.NE.1) then
10379  DO k=1,j1
10380  h=h-a(i,k)*a(j,k)
10381  ENDDO
10382  ENDIF
10383  IF(i.NE.j) THEN
10384  a(i,j)=h/a(j,j)
10385  ELSE
10386  a(i,j)=sqrt(h)
10387  ENDIF
10388  b(i,j)=a(i,j)
10389  ENDDO
10390  ENDDO
10391 ! WE INVERT B TO GIVE AN UPDATED B
10392  e(1)=1.0/b(1,1)
10393  DO i=2,6
10394  e(i)= 1.0/b(i,i)
10395  j1=i-1
10396  DO jj=1,j1
10397  j=i-jj
10398  j3=j+1
10399  s=0.0
10400  IF(jj.NE.1) THEN
10401  DO k=j3,j1
10402  s=s-b(k,i)*b(k,j)
10403  ENDDO
10404  ENDIF
10405  b(j,i)=(s-b(i,j)*e(i))/b(j,j)
10406  ENDDO
10407  ENDDO
10408  DO i=1,6
10409  b(i,i)=e(i)
10410  ENDDO
10411  DO i=1,6
10412  DO j=1,i
10413  dum=b(i,j)
10414  b(i,j)=b(j,i)
10415  b(j,i)=dum
10416  ENDDO
10417  ENDDO
10418 ! WE CONVERT CORD(**) SO THAT ITS SIGMA MATRIX IS UNITY
10419  DO i=1,nall
10420  DO k=1,6
10421  f(k)=0.0
10422  DO j=1,k
10423  f(k)=f(k)+ b(k,j)*cord(i,j)
10424  ENDDO
10425  ENDDO
10426  DO k=1,6
10427  cord(i,k)=f(k)
10428  ENDDO
10429  ENDDO
10430 ! WE TEST THE MEANS AND SIGMA MATRIX
10431  DO j=1,6
10432  DO i=1,n
10433  g(j)=g(j)+cord(i,j)
10434  ENDDO
10435  g(j)=g(j)/n
10436  ENDDO
10437  DO j=1,6
10438  DO i=1,n
10439  cord(i,j)=cord(i,j)-g(j)
10440  ENDDO
10441  ENDDO
10442  DO j=1,6
10443  DO k=1,6
10444  DO i=1,n
10445  c(j,k)=c(j,k)+ cord(i,j)*cord(i,k)
10446  ENDDO
10447  c(j,k)=c(j,k)/n
10448  ENDDO
10449  ENDDO
10450  RETURN
10451  END
10452 
10458  SUBROUTINE pintim
10459  implicit real(8) (a-h,o-z)
10460  parameter(iptsz=100002)
10461  common/faisc/f(10,iptsz),imax,ngood
10462  common/qmoyen/qmoy
10463  common/part/xc(iptsz),yc(iptsz),zc(iptsz)
10464  COMMON /consta/ vl, pi, xmat, rpel, qst
10465  common/sc3/beamc,scdist,sce10,cplm,ect,apl,ichaes,iscsp
10466  common/azlist/icont,iprin
10467  grmoy=0.
10468  trmoy=0.
10469  xbax=0.
10470  do i=1,ngood
10471  grmoy=grmoy+f(7,i)/xmat
10472  trmoy=trmoy+f(6,i)
10473  xbax=xbax+f(2,i)
10474  enddo
10475  trmoy=trmoy/float(ngood)
10476  grmoy=grmoy/float(ngood)
10477  brmoy=sqrt(1.-1./(grmoy*grmoy))
10478  xbax=xbax/float(ngood)
10479  apl=0.
10480 ! Isochronism correction (bending magnet) only with SCHERM
10481 ! does not work with with SCHEFF (iscsp=3)
10482  if(iscsp.eq.2) then
10483  xb2x=0.
10484  xb2z=0.
10485  xbxz=0.
10486  do np=1,ngood
10487  gpai=f(7,np)/xmat
10488  bpai=sqrt(1.-1./(gpai*gpai))
10489  zc(np)=(trmoy-f(6,np))*bpai*vl/100.
10490  xc(np)=(f(2,np)-xbax)/100.
10491  xb2z=xb2z+zc(np)*zc(np)
10492  xb2x=xb2x+xc(np)*xc(np)
10493  xbxz=xbxz+zc(np)*xc(np)
10494  enddo
10495  xb2z=xb2z/float(ngood)
10496  xb2x=xb2x/float(ngood)
10497  xbxz=xbxz/float(ngood)
10498  apl=atan(-2.*xbxz/(xb2x-xb2z))/2.
10499  write(16,*) 'slope of the bunch in plane(Oz,Ox):',apl,
10500  * ' radian'
10501  endif
10502  do np=1,ngood
10503  gpai=f(7,np)/xmat
10504  bpai=sqrt(1.-1./(gpai*gpai))
10505 ! iscsp = 3 Lorentz transformation (only with scheff)
10506 !omment if(iscsp.eq.3) znp=(trmoy-f(6,np))*bpai*vl*grmoy
10507 !omment if(iscsp.eq.2) znp=(trmoy-f(6,np))*bpai*vl
10508  znp=(trmoy-f(6,np))*bpai*vl
10509  xnp=f(2,np)
10510  zc(np)=znp*cos(apl)+xnp*sin(apl)
10511  xnp=xnp*cos(apl)-znp*sin(apl)
10512 ! convert from mrad to rad
10513  f3=f(3,np)*1.e-03
10514  f5=f(5,np)*1.e-03
10515 ! convert from cm to m
10516  xc(np)=(xnp+zc(np)*f3)/100.
10517  yc(np)=(f(4,np)+zc(np)*f5)/100.
10518  zc(np)=zc(np)/100.
10519  enddo
10520  xbar=0.
10521  ybar=0.
10522  zbar=0.
10523  do np=1,ngood
10524 ! evaluate xbar , ybar , zbar
10525  xbar=xbar+xc(np)
10526  ybar=ybar+yc(np)
10527  zbar=zbar+zc(np)
10528  enddo
10529  xbar=xbar/float(ngood)
10530  ybar=ybar/float(ngood)
10531  zbar=zbar/float(ngood)
10532 ! Translate distribution by center of mass coordinates to shift
10533 ! coordinate origin to (0,0,0)
10534  do np=1,ngood
10535  xc(np)=xc(np)-xbar
10536  yc(np)=yc(np)-ybar
10537  zc(np)=zc(np)-zbar
10538  enddo
10539  return
10540  end
10541 
10546  SUBROUTINE schermi1
10547  implicit real(8) (a-h,o-z)
10548  parameter(iptsz=100002)
10549  common/ttfc/tk,t1k,t2k,sk,s1k,s2k,fh
10550  common/hermt/afxt(22),afyt(22),afzt(22)
10551  common/hermd/afxm(20),afym(20),afzm(20)
10552  common/hermr/afxr(20),afyr(20),afzr(20)
10553  common/sizt/xrms,yrms,zrms
10554  common/sizp/xrms1,yrms1,zrms1,xrms2,yrms2,zrms2,imaxd
10555  common/elcg/xcgd,ycgd,zcgd,xcgr,ycgr,zcgr
10556  common/intgrt/ex,ey,ez
10557  common/degherm/nmaz,nmazr,nmaxy
10558  common/cdek/dwp(iptsz)
10559  COMMON /consta/ vl, pi, xmat, rpel, qst
10560  common/faisc/f(10,iptsz),imax,ngood
10561  common/sc3/beamc,scdist,sce10,cplm,ect,apl,ichaes,iscsp
10562  common/npart/imaxr
10563  common/part/xc(iptsz),yc(iptsz),zc(iptsz)
10564  common/twcst/epsilon
10565  common/beamsa/fs(7,iptsz)
10566  common/dcspa/iesp
10567  common/cmpte/iell
10568  common/cgrms/xsum,ysum,zsum
10569  common/compt/nrres,nrtre,nrbunc,nrdbun
10570  common/dimens/zcp(iptsz),xcp(iptsz),ycp(iptsz)
10571  common/posc/xpsc
10572  LOGICAL ichaes,iesp
10573  dimension afx(20),afy(20)
10574  IF (beamc.eq.0. .OR. scdist.eq.0.) return
10575  iell=iell+1
10576  imaxf=ngood
10577  wavel=2.*pi*vl/fh
10578  xmass=xmat*1.78267581e-30
10579  nmaxy=5
10580  dxp=0.
10581  dyp=0.
10582  dw=0.
10583  dz=scdist/100.
10584  dz1=dz
10585  if(ngood.eq.0) then
10586  write(16,*) ' all the particles are lost '
10587  stop
10588  endif
10589 ! xi in Amps, beamc in mA
10590 ! epsilon =(coul*coul)/nt*(m*m)
10591  epsilon=8.854189586e-12
10592  c1=1./(3.*pi*sqrt(5.))
10593  cl=vl/100.
10594 ! charge per macro particle
10595 !omment const1=c1*xi*xi*wavel*wavel/(10000.*imaxf*xmass*
10596 ! * epsilon*cl*cl*cl*cl)
10597  const3=1.e-06
10598  const2=1.e-06/xmat
10599 ! calculate rms beam size for beam in one point in time
10600  CALL sizrms(0,xrms,yrms,zrms,zz)
10601 !6875 format(2x,e12.5,2x,e12.5,2x,e12.5)
10602  xrmsp=xrms
10603  yrmsp=yrms
10604  zrmsp=zrms
10605  CALL sizcor(ect,xrms,yrms,zrms,0)
10606  xrmsc=xrms
10607  yrmsc=yrms
10608  zrmsc=zrms
10609  xrms1=xrmsp
10610  yrms1=yrmsp
10611  zrms1=zrmsp
10612  xrms=xrmsp
10613  yrms=yrmsp
10614  zrms=zrmsp
10615  xcgd=xsum
10616  ycgd=ysum
10617  zcgd=zsum
10618  do i=1,ngood
10619  zcp(i)=zc(i)
10620  xcp(i)=xc(i)
10621  ycp(i)=yc(i)
10622  enddo
10623 ! limits in z-direction
10624  zmat=0.
10625  zmit=1000.
10626  do i=1,ngood
10627  IF(zcp(i).GE.zmat) zmat=zcp(i)
10628  IF(zcp(i).LT.zmit) zmit=zcp(i)
10629  enddo
10630  zmat=zmat/zrms
10631  zmit=zmit/zrms
10632 ! extends zmat
10633  zmat=zmat+zmat*.50
10634  zmit=zmit+zmit*.50
10635  if(zmat.gt.ect) zmat=ect
10636  if(abs(zmit).gt.ect) zmit=-ect
10637 ! Hermite coefficients in x and y-direction
10638  nmaz=0
10639 !6876 format(2x,i3,2x,i3)
10640  do k=1,20
10641  afzt(k)=0.
10642  afxt(k)=0.
10643  afyt(k)=0.
10644  afzm(k)=0.
10645  afxm(k)=0.
10646  afym(k)=0.
10647  enddo
10648  do k=1,nmaxy
10649  kap=k-1
10650  do j=1,ngood
10651  xcoup=abs(xcp(j)/xrms)
10652  ycoup=abs(ycp(j)/yrms)
10653  zcoup=abs(zcp(j)/zrms)
10654  if(xcoup.le.ect.and.ycoup.le.ect.and.zcoup.le.ect) then
10655  xc(j)=xcp(j)/xrmsc
10656  yc(j)=ycp(j)/yrmsc
10657  zc(j)=zcp(j)/zrmsc
10658  afxm(k)=afxm(k)+herm(2*kap,xc(j))
10659  afym(k)=afym(k)+herm(2*kap,yc(j))
10660  afzm(k)=afzm(k)+herm(2*kap,zc(j))
10661  endif
10662  enddo
10663  afxm(k)=afxm(k)/(fact(2*kap)*sqrt(2.*pi))
10664  afym(k)=afym(k)/(fact(2*kap)*sqrt(2.*pi))
10665  afzm(k)=afzm(k)/(fact(2*kap)*sqrt(2.*pi))
10666  enddo
10667  nmaz=10
10668 ! Hermite coefficients in z-direction
10669  zcdg=0.
10670  imaxx=0
10671  do j=1,ngood
10672  xcoup=abs(xcp(j)/xrms)
10673  ycoup=abs(ycp(j)/yrms)
10674  zcoup=abs(zcp(j)/zrms)
10675  if(xcoup.le.ect.and.ycoup.le.ect.and.zcoup.le.ect) then
10676  zcdg=zcdg+zcp(j)
10677  imaxx=imaxx+1
10678  endif
10679  enddo
10680  zcdg=zcdg/float(imaxx)
10681  zsqsum=0.
10682  zcub=0.
10683  zcub1=0.
10684  do j=1,ngood
10685  xcoup=abs(xcp(j)/xrms)
10686  ycoup=abs(ycp(j)/yrms)
10687  zcoup=abs(zcp(j)/zrms)
10688  if(xcoup.le.ect.and.ycoup.le.ect.and.zcoup.le.ect) then
10689  zc(j)=zcp(j)-zcdg
10690  zsqsum=zsqsum+zc(j)*zc(j)
10691  zcub=zcub+zc(j)*zc(j)*zc(j)
10692  zcub1=zcub1+zc(j)
10693  endif
10694  enddo
10695  zrmsz=zsqsum/float(imaxx)
10696  zrmsz=sqrt(zrmsz)
10697  zcub3=zcub
10698  zcub=zcub/(zrmsz*zrmsz*zrmsz)-3.*zcub1/zrmsz
10699  zcub=zcub/(6.*sqrt(2.*pi))
10700  do k=1,nmaz
10701  afzt(k)=0.
10702  afx(k)=0.
10703  afy(k)=0.
10704  kap=k-1
10705  do j=1,ngood
10706  xcoup=abs(xcp(j)/xrms)
10707  ycoup=abs(ycp(j)/yrms)
10708  zcoup=abs(zcp(j)/zrms)
10709  if(xcoup.le.ect.and.ycoup.le.ect.and.zcoup.le.ect) then
10710  zc(j)=zcp(j)/zrmsc
10711  xc(j)=xcp(j)/xrmsc
10712  yc(j)=ycp(j)/yrmsc
10713  afzt(k)=afzt(k)+herm(kap,zc(j))
10714  afx(k)=afx(k)+herm(kap,xc(j))
10715  afy(k)=afy(k)+herm(kap,yc(j))
10716  endif
10717  enddo
10718  afzt(k)=afzt(k)/(fact(kap)*sqrt(2.*pi))
10719  afx(k)=afx(k)/(fact(kap)*sqrt(2.*pi))
10720  afy(k)=afy(k)/(fact(kap)*sqrt(2.*pi))
10721  enddo
10722 ! Do Hermite integration to determine Ex,Ey,Ez for each macro particle
10723 ! and apply space charge kick. Field components are passed through the
10724 ! common INTGRT in units Newton/Coulomb
10725  DO i=1,ngood
10726 ! reprise coordonnees spaciales pour calcul des champs
10727  xc(i)=xcp(i)
10728  yc(i)=ycp(i)
10729  zc(i)=zcp(i)
10730  CALL intga(i,0)
10731  ext=ex
10732  eyt=ey
10733  ezt=ez
10734 ! calculate kick in x',y' and z' (energy)
10735 ! calculate kick in x',y' and z' (energy)
10736 ! isochronism correction
10737  eztp=ezt*cos(apl)-ext*sin(apl)
10738  extp=ezt*sin(apl)+ext*cos(apl)
10739  ezt=eztp
10740  ext=extp
10741  gsc=f(7,i)/xmat
10742  bsc=sqrt(1.-1./(gsc*gsc))
10743 ! * valero
10744  dxp=const2*ext*dz/(bsc*bsc*gsc*gsc*gsc)*abs(f(9,i))
10745  dyp=const2*eyt*dz/(bsc*bsc*gsc*gsc*gsc)*abs(f(9,i))
10746  dw=const3*ezt*dz*abs(f(9,i))/gsc
10747 ! *
10748  if(.not.iesp) then
10749 ! load the entrance beam in cavities or gaps
10750  do js=1,7
10751  f(js,i)=fs(js,i)
10752  enddo
10753  f(3,i)=f(3,i)+dxp*1000.
10754  f(5,i)=f(5,i)+dyp*1000.
10755  f(2,i)=f(2,i)-dz1*dxp*100.*xpsc
10756  f(4,i)=f(4,i)-dz1*dyp*100.*xpsc
10757  dwp(i)=dw
10758  else
10759  f(3,i)=f(3,i)+dxp*1000.
10760  f(5,i)=f(5,i)+dyp*1000.
10761  f(7,i)=f(7,i)+dw
10762  endif
10763  enddo
10764  RETURN
10765  END
10766 
10771  SUBROUTINE schermi
10772  implicit real(8) (a-h,o-z)
10773  parameter(iptsz=100002)
10774  common/ttfc/tk,t1k,t2k,sk,s1k,s2k,fh
10775  common/hermt/afxt(22),afyt(22),afzt(22)
10776  common/hermd/afxm(20),afym(20),afzm(20)
10777  common/hermr/afxr(20),afyr(20),afzr(20)
10778  common/hermrr/afxrr(20),afyrr(20),afzrr(20)
10779  common/sizr/xrms3,yrms3,zrms3,zcgr3
10780  common/sizt/xrms,yrms,zrms
10781  common/sizp/xrms1,yrms1,zrms1,xrms2,yrms2,zrms2,imaxd
10782  common/elcg/xcgd,ycgd,zcgd,xcgr,ycgr,zcgr
10783  common/intgrt/ex,ey,ez
10784  common/degherm/nmaz,nmazr,nmaxy
10785  common/cdek/dwp(iptsz)
10786  COMMON /consta/ vl, pi, xmat, rpel, qst
10787  common/faisc/f(10,iptsz),imax,ngood
10788  common/sc3/beamc,scdist,sce10,cplm,ect,apl,ichaes,iscsp
10789  common/npart/imaxr
10790  common/part/xc(iptsz),yc(iptsz),zc(iptsz)
10791  common/twcst/epsilon
10792  common/beamsa/fs(7,iptsz)
10793  common/dcspa/iesp
10794  common/cmpte/iell
10795  common/champ/fxrms(10,15),fyrms(10,15),fzrms(10,15),nchamp(10),
10796  x nccham(10),nchpas,jcham,itye
10797  common/compt/nrres,nrtre,nrbunc,nrdbun
10798  common/posc/xpsc
10799  LOGICAL ichaes,iesp
10800 ! *************************************************
10801 ! nquad : number of quad in the transport line
10802  COMMON /chqua/icqd,nquad
10803  LOGICAL ICQD
10804 ! *************************************************
10805  common/dimens/zcp(iptsz),xcp(iptsz),ycp(iptsz)
10806  IF (beamc.eq.0. .OR. scdist.eq.0.) return
10807 ! dummy: in order to have the same entry as HERSC and SCHEFF
10808 ! Initialize some constants and variables c wavel in cm
10809  ect=4.
10810  call shuffle
10811  call pintim
10812  iell=iell+1
10813  imaxf=ngood
10814  wavel=2.*pi*vl/fh
10815  xmass=xmat*1.78267581e-30
10816  nmaz=14
10817  nmazr=8
10818  nmaxy=4
10819  dxp=0.
10820  dyp=0.
10821  dw=0.
10822  dz=scdist/100.
10823  dz1=dz
10824  zsot1=0.
10825  if(ngood.eq.0) then
10826  write(16,*) ' all the particles are lost '
10827  stop
10828  endif
10829  WRITE(16,*)' call SCHERM N: ',iell
10830 ! xi in Amps, beamc in mA
10831 ! epsilon =(coul*coul)/nt*(m*m)
10832  epsilon=8.854189586e-12
10833  c1=1./(3.*pi*sqrt(5.))
10834  cl=vl/100.
10835 ! charge per macro particle
10836  const3=1.e-06
10837  const2=1.e-06/xmat
10838 ! normalized emittances(normalized) in m.radian
10839 ! calculate rms beam size for beam in one point in time
10840  CALL sizrms(0,xrms,yrms,zrms,zz)
10841  xrmsp=xrms
10842  yrmsp=yrms
10843  zrmsp=zrms
10844  CALL sizcor(ect,xrms,yrms,zrms,0)
10845  write(16,*) ' bunch RMS(m): ',xrms,yrms,zrms
10846 !6875 format(2x,e12.5,2x,e12.5,2x,e12.5)
10847  xrmsc=xrms
10848  yrmsc=yrms
10849  zrmsc=zrms
10850  xrms=xrmsp
10851  yrms=yrmsp
10852  zrms=zrmsp
10853 ! Total bunch charge densities in x,y,z
10854 ! calculation of Hermite coefficients
10855  do i=1,ngood
10856  zcp(i)=zc(i)
10857  xcp(i)=xc(i)
10858  ycp(i)=yc(i)
10859  enddo
10860 ! limits in z-direction
10861  zmat=0.
10862  zmit=1000.
10863  do i=1,ngood
10864  if(zcp(i).ge.zmat) zmat=zcp(i)
10865  if(zcp(i).lt.zmit) zmit=zcp(i)
10866  enddo
10867  zmat=zmat/zrms
10868  zmit=zmit/zrms
10869 ! extend zmat
10870  zmat=zmat+zmat*.50
10871  zmit=zmit+zmit*.50
10872 ! (xmat,ymat,zmat) >0
10873  if(zmat.gt.ect) zmat=ect
10874  if(abs(zmit).gt.ect) zmat=-ect
10875 ! Hermite coefficients
10876  do k=1,nmaxy
10877  afxt(k)=0.
10878  afyt(k)=0.
10879  kap=k-1
10880  do j=1,ngood
10881  xcoup=abs(xcp(j)/xrms)
10882  ycoup=abs(ycp(j)/yrms)
10883  zcoup=abs(zcp(j)/zrms)
10884  if(xcoup.le.ect.and.ycoup.le.ect.and.zcoup.le.ect) then
10885  xc(j)=xcp(j)/xrmsc
10886  yc(j)=ycp(j)/yrmsc
10887  afxt(k)=afxt(k)+herm(2*kap,xc(j))
10888  afyt(k)=afyt(k)+herm(2*kap,yc(j))
10889  endif
10890  enddo
10891  afxt(k)=afxt(k)/(fact(2*kap)*sqrt(2.*pi))
10892  afyt(k)=afyt(k)/(fact(2*kap)*sqrt(2.*pi))
10893  enddo
10894 !6876 format(2x,i5,3x,e12.5,3x,e12.5)
10895  do k=1,nmaz
10896  afzt(k)=0.
10897  kap=k-1
10898  do j=1,ngood
10899  xcoup=abs(xcp(j)/xrms)
10900  ycoup=abs(ycp(j)/yrms)
10901  zcoup=abs(zcp(j)/zrms)
10902  if(xcoup.le.ect.and.ycoup.le.ect.and.zcoup.le.ect) then
10903  zc(j)=zcp(j)/zrms
10904  afzt(k)=afzt(k)+herm(kap,zc(j))
10905  endif
10906  enddo
10907  afzt(k)=afzt(k)/(fact(kap)*sqrt(2.*pi))
10908  enddo
10909 !6877 format(3x,e12.5)
10910 ! Seek for surface of the bunch
10911  szbt=snzt(zmit,zmat)
10912 ! Seek for the vertex of the distribution n(z)
10913 ! between 0 and zmat/2
10914  zf=zmat/2.
10915  zi=0.
10916  call rchsom(zi,zf,nmaz)
10917  zsot=(zi+zf)/2.
10918  zcgd=zsot*zrms
10919 ! Main ellipsoid (in the right of the vertex)
10920  imaxd=1
10921  do i=1,ngood
10922  if(zcp(i).ge.zcgd) then
10923  xc(imaxd)=xcp(i)
10924  yc(imaxd)=ycp(i)
10925  zc(imaxd)=zcp(i)
10926  imaxd=imaxd+1
10927  endif
10928  enddo
10929  imaxd=imaxd-1
10930  imaxr=ngood-2*imaxd
10931  if(imaxr.lt.0) then
10932 ! if imaxr<0 => use one ellips only, rather than 2
10933  pcent1=float(2*imaxd)/float(ngood)
10934  pcent2=float(imaxr)/float(ngood)
10935  if(icqd)nquad=nquad-1
10936  iell=iell-1
10937  write(16,*) ' one ellipsoid in z-direction '
10938  call pintim
10939  call schermi1
10940  return
10941  endif
10942  IF(25*imaxr.LT.imaxf.OR.imaxr.LE.30) THEN
10943  pcent1=float(2*imaxd)/float(ngood)
10944  pcent2=float(imaxr)/float(ngood)
10945  iell=iell-1
10946  if(icqd)nquad=nquad-1
10947 ! if imaxr<.04*imaxf => use one ellips only, rather than 2
10948  write(16,*) 'one ellipsoid in z-direction '
10949  call pintim
10950  call schermi1
10951  IF (12*imaxr.LT.ngood)
10952  x write(16,*) 'one ellipsoid in z-direction '
10953  IF (imaxr.LE.40)
10954  x write(16,*) ' one ellipsoid in z-direction '
10955  return
10956  endif
10957  i1elli=0
10958 ! C.O.G. of the principal ellipsoid (in cm)
10959 ! longitudinal RMS of the pricipal ellipsoid
10960  zrmss1=sqrt(vaprz(zsot,zmat))
10961  zrms1=zrmss1*zrms
10962 ! RMS in the transverse directions
10963  xrms1=xrms
10964  yrms1=yrms
10965 ! surface n(z)
10966  szbd=snzd(zsot,zmat)
10967  rsnz=szbd/szbt
10968 ! coefficients Hermite en x,y,z sur partie droite en z
10969 ! principal ellipsoid
10970  do k=1,nmaxy
10971  kap=k-1
10972  afxm(k)=afxt(k)*rsnz
10973  afym(k)=afyt(k)*rsnz
10974  afzm(k)=prinz(zsot,zmat,k,zrmss1)
10975  afzm(k)=2.*afzm(k)/(fact(2*kap)*sqrt(2.*pi))
10976  enddo
10977 ! limits in x,y,z of the principal ellipsoid
10978  do i=1,imaxd
10979  xc(i)=xc(i)/xrms
10980  yc(i)=yc(i)/yrms
10981  zc(i)=zc(i)/zrms
10982  enddo
10983  xmam=xc(1)
10984  ymam=yc(1)
10985  zmam=zc(1)
10986  do i=1,imaxd
10987  if(xc(i).ge.xmam) xmam=xc(i)
10988  if(yc(i).ge.ymam) ymam=yc(i)
10989  if(zc(i).ge.zmam) zmam=zc(i)
10990  enddo
10991  if(abs(xmam).ge.ect) xmam=ect
10992  if(abs(ymam).ge.ect) ymam=ect
10993  if(abs(zmam).ge.ect) zmam=ect
10994  xmim=xmam
10995  ymim=ymam
10996  zmim=zmam
10997  do i=1,imaxd
10998  if(xc(i).lt.xmim) xmim=xc(i)
10999  if(yc(i).lt.ymim) ymim=yc(i)
11000  if(zc(i).lt.zmim) zmim=zc(i)
11001  enddo
11002  if(abs(xmim).ge.ect) xmim=-ect
11003  if(abs(ymim).ge.ect) ymim=-ect
11004  if(abs(zmim).ge.ect) zmim=-ect
11005 ! partition commune @ x,y,z
11006  xymam=ymam
11007  xymim=ymim
11008  if(xmam.ge.xymam) xymam=xmam
11009  if(zmam.ge.xymam) xymam=zmam
11010  if(xmim.lt.xymim) xymim=xmim
11011  if(zmim.lt.xymim) xymim=zmim
11012 ! symmetrisation de l'intervalle
11013  if(abs(xymim).ge.xymam) then
11014  xymam=abs(xymim)
11015  else
11016  xymim=-xymam
11017  endif
11018 ! vertex of the second ellipsoid
11019  aa=zmit
11020  bb=2.*zsot-zmat
11021  cc=zsot
11022  dd=zmat
11023  call rchsor(aa,bb,cc,dd,ee)
11024 ! second ellipsoid around ee
11025 ! sz2e : surface
11026  zrms2=varia(bb,cc,dd,ee)
11027  zrms2=sqrt(zrms2)
11028  zcgr=ee*zrms
11029  sz2e=codsy(bb,cc,dd,ee,1)
11030  afzr(1)=sz2e/sqrt(2.*pi)
11031  stm12=abs(afzt(1)-afzm(1)-afzr(1))
11032  rs2e=sz2e/szbt
11033  xrms2=xrms
11034  yrms2=yrms
11035  do k=1,nmaxy
11036  kap=k-1
11037  afxr(k)=afxt(k)*rs2e
11038  afyr(k)=afyt(k)*rs2e
11039  afzr(k)=codsy(bb,cc,dd,ee,k)
11040  afzr(k)=afzr(k)/(fact(2*kap)*sqrt(2.*pi))
11041  enddo
11042 ! two ellipsoids:
11043  if(stm12*10.le.afzr(1)) inint=2
11044  if(stm12*10.gt.afzr(1)) then
11045 ! 3 ellipsoids;the principal ellipsoid,the second ellipsoid is symmetrized
11046 ! the third ellipsoid is defined around the c. of g. of the residu
11047  ee1=grz(aa,bb,cc,dd,ee)
11048  if(ee1.gt.ee) then
11049  inint=2
11050  else
11051  zrms3=variz(bb,cc,dd,ee,ee1)
11052  zrms3=sqrt(zrms3)
11053  xrms3=xrms
11054  yrms3=yrms
11055  zcgr3=ee1*zrms
11056 ! C.O.G. of the second ellipsoid
11057 ! on suppose xcgr et ycgr nuls pour le residu
11058  xcgr=0.
11059  ycgr=0.
11060  sz3e=codif(bb,cc,dd,ee,ee1,1)
11061  rs3e=sz3e/szbt
11062 ! correction complementaire
11063  srtot=sz3e/sqrt(2.*pi)+afzr(1)+afzm(1)
11064  srtot=srtot-afzt(1)
11065 ! HERMITE coefficients over the residual ellips
11066  do k=1,nmaxy
11067  kap=k-1
11068  afxrr(k)=afxt(k)*rs3e
11069  afyrr(k)=afyt(k)*rs3e
11070  afzrr(k)=codif(bb,cc,dd,ee,ee1,k)
11071  afzrr(k)=afzrr(k)/(fact(2*kap)*sqrt(2.*pi))
11072  if(k.eq.1) then
11073  tzrr=afzrr(k)-srtot
11074  if(tzrr.ge.0..and.abs(tzrr).ge.(afzrr(k)/10.)) then
11075  afxrr(k)=afxrr(k)-srtot
11076  afyrr(k)=afyrr(k)-srtot
11077  afzrr(k)=afzrr(k)-srtot
11078  endif
11079  endif
11080  enddo
11081 ! end of calculus of 2nd ellips
11082  inint=3
11083  endif
11084  endif
11085  if(ee1.le.ee) zrms3=zrms3*zrms
11086  zrms2=zrms2*zrms
11087 ! surface of the ellipsoids in pourcent
11088  write(16,*) ' surface of the ellipsoids in % of the bunch:'
11089  if(inint.eq.2) then
11090  pcent1=afzm(1)/afzt(1)
11091  pcent2=afzr(1)/afzt(1)
11092  write(16,7777) iell,pcent1,pcent2
11093  endif
11094  if(inint.eq.3) then
11095  pcent1=afzm(1)/afzt(1)
11096  pcent2=afzr(1)/afzt(1)
11097  pcent3=afzrr(1)/afzt(1)
11098  write(16,7778) iell,pcent1,pcent2,pcent3
11099  endif
11100 7777 format(2x,i4,2x,f7.4,2x,f7.4)
11101 7778 format(2x,i4,2x,f7.4,2x,f7.4,2x,f7.4)
11102 ! Do Hermite integration to determine Ex,Ey,Ez for each macro particle
11103 ! and apply space charge kick. Field components are passed through the
11104 ! common INTGRT in units Newton/Coulomb
11105 ! gsct introduit pour calcul specifique impulsion
11106  gsct=0.
11107  igsct=0
11108  DO i=1,ngood
11109 ! reprise coordonnees spaciales pour calcul des champs
11110  xc(i)=xcp(i)
11111  yc(i)=ycp(i)
11112  zc(i)=zcp(i)
11113 ! principal ellipsoid
11114  CALL intga(i,0)
11115  ext=ex
11116  eyt=ey
11117  ezt=ez
11118 ! second ellipsoid
11119  CALL intga(i,1)
11120  ext=ext+ex
11121  eyt=eyt+ey
11122  ezt=ezt+ez
11123 ! third ellipsoid
11124  if(inint.eq.3) then
11125  CALL intga(i,2)
11126  ext=ext+ex
11127  eyt=eyt+ey
11128  ezt=ezt+ez
11129  endif
11130 ! calculate kick in x',y' and z' (energy)
11131 ! isochronism correction
11132  eztp=ezt*cos(apl)-ext*sin(apl)
11133  extp=ezt*sin(apl)+ext*cos(apl)
11134  ezt=eztp
11135  ext=extp
11136  gsc=f(7,i)/xmat
11137  gsct=gsct+gsc
11138  igsct=igsct+1
11139  bsc=sqrt(1.-1./(gsc*gsc))
11140  dxp=const2*ext*dz/(bsc*bsc*gsc*gsc*gsc)*abs(f(9,i))
11141  dyp=const2*eyt*dz/(bsc*bsc*gsc*gsc*gsc)*abs(f(9,i))
11142  dw=const3*ezt*dz/gsc
11143  if(.not.iesp) then
11144 ! load the entrance beam parameters for cavities or gaps
11145  do js=1,7
11146  f(js,i)=fs(js,i)
11147  enddo
11148  f(3,i)=f(3,i)+dxp*1000.
11149  f(5,i)=f(5,i)+dyp*1000.
11150  f(2,i)=f(2,i)-dz1*dxp*100.*xpsc
11151  f(4,i)=f(4,i)-dz1*dyp*100.*xpsc
11152 !omment f(2,i)=f(2,i)-dz1*dxp*100.
11153 !omment f(4,i)=f(4,i)-dz1*dyp*100.
11154  dwp(i)=dw
11155  else
11156  f(3,i)=f(3,i)+dxp*1000.
11157  f(5,i)=f(5,i)+dyp*1000.
11158  f(7,i)=f(7,i)+dw
11159  endif
11160  enddo
11161  RETURN
11162  END
11163 
11183  SUBROUTINE entre
11184  implicit real(8) (a-h,o-z)
11185  parameter(iptsz=100002,maxcell1=3000)
11186  COMMON /consta/ vl, pi, xmat, rpel, qst
11187  common/speda/dave,idave
11188  common/ttfc/tk,t1k,t2k,sk,s1k,s2k,fh
11189  common/dyn/tref,vref
11190  common/dyni/vrefi,trefi,fhinit,acpt
11191  common/faisc/f(10,iptsz),imax,ngood
11192  common/objet/fo(9,iptsz),imaxo
11193  common/histo/centre(6)
11194  common/qmoyen/qmoy
11195  common/rigid/boro
11196  common/mastrp/xma(2,2),xmb(2,2),xmc(2,2)
11197  common/stis/suryth,surzph,enedep,ecogde,testca
11198  common/etcom/cog(8),exten(17),fd(iptsz)
11199  common/tapes/in,ifile,meta
11200  common/davcom/dav1(maxcell1,40),davtot,iitem(maxcell1),idav
11201  common/tilt/tipha,tix,tiy,shifw,shifp
11202  common/newtlt/twissa(3),itwiss
11203  common/tof/tofini
11204  common/strip/atm,qs,atms,ths,qop,sqst(6),anp,nqst
11205  common/mcs/imcs,ncstat,cstat(20)
11206  common/trace3d/trace3h(100),trace3t(maxcell1),tif,kt3h,kt3t,fid
11207  common/trace3e/tracebi(6),traceei(3)
11208  common/dmp/dmpdat(14)
11209  character trace3h*128,trace3t*128,tif*128
11210  logical acpt
11211  logical dave
11212 ! dimension foo(9)
11213  dave=.false.
11214  read(in,*)uem,atm,qst
11215  if(ncstat.eq.1) cstat(1)=qst
11216 ! input energy(MeV) and initial time of flight(deg)
11217  read(in,*) enedep,tofini
11218 ! if icog=0 reference (vref,tref) is not cog
11219 ! if icog=1 reference (vref,tref) is cog
11220 ! --- xmat= rest mass
11221  xmat=uem*atm
11222  write(16,101) uem,atm,xmat,qst
11223 101 format(' **** unit mass: ',e12.5,' MeV mass units: ',
11224  * f5.1,' rest mass: ',e12.5,' MeV charge ',f4.1)
11225  write(16,102)enedep,tofini
11226 102 format(' **** energy: ',e12.5,' MeV initial tof: ',e12.5,
11227  * ' deg')
11228  tmp=tofini
11229  tofini=tofini*pi/(180.*fh)
11230  gdep=enedep/xmat+1.
11231  bdep=sqrt(1.-1./(gdep*gdep))
11232 ! trace3d stuff start
11233  write(tif,901) (tracebi(i),i=1,6)
11234 901 format(' BEAMI(1)= ',5(f12.6,1x),f12.4)
11235  kt3h=kt3h+1
11236  trace3h(kt3h)=tif
11237  write(tif,902) (traceei(i),i=1,3)
11238 902 format(' EMITI(1)= ',f12.6,1x,f12.6,1x,f12.4)
11239  kt3h=kt3h+1
11240  trace3h(kt3h)=tif
11241  write(tif,903) uem*atm,int(qst),fhinit/2./pi/1.e6
11242 903 format(' ER= ',e16.7,', Q=',i3,', FREQ= ',e14.7)
11243  kt3h=kt3h+1
11244  trace3h(kt3h)=tif
11245  write(tif,7001) enedep
11246 7001 format(' W= ',f12.4)
11247  kt3h=kt3h+1
11248  trace3h(kt3h)=tif
11249 ! fo(index,i), index=1 initial particle # ,
11250 ! index=2 x
11251 ! index=3 xp
11252 ! index=4 y
11253 ! index=5 yp
11254 ! index=6 time of flight (tof)
11255 ! index=7 energy
11256 ! index=8 if = 0 , then particle is lost
11257 ! index=9 charge
11258 ! i= particle #
11259  do i=1,ngood
11260 ! if itwiss=1, apply tofini in tiltbm routine
11261  if(itwiss.ne.1) fo(6,i)=fo(6,i)+tofini
11262  fo(9,i)=qst
11263  fo(7,i)=enedep+fo(1,i)+xmat
11264  if(fo(7,i).lt.xmat) fo(7,i)=xmat
11265  fo(1,i)=float(i)
11266  enddo
11267 ! --- the reference particle and the cog coincide
11268  bref=0.
11269  tref=0.
11270  encog=0.
11271  do i=1,ngood
11272  encog=encog+fo(7,i)
11273  gai=fo(7,i)/xmat
11274  bref=bref+sqrt(1.-1/(gai*gai))
11275  tref=tref+fo(6,i)
11276  enddo
11277  encog=encog/float(ngood)
11278  bref=bref/float(ngood)
11279  vref=bref*vl
11280  tref=tref/float(ngood)
11281  vrefi=vref
11282  trefi=tref
11283 ! pack the table f(,) of the current beam
11284  do i=1,ngood
11285  do j=1,9
11286  f(j,i)=fo(j,i)
11287  enddo
11288  enddo
11289 ! momentum of the reference (i.e. the c.o.g.)
11290  gcog=1./sqrt(1.-bref*bref)
11291  boro=3.3356*xmat*bref*gcog/abs(qst)
11292  write(16,3450) boro
11293 3450 format(' **** momentum of c.o.g. (kG.cm): ',e12.5)
11294  if (itwiss.eq.1) then
11295 ! Beam was defined in MCOBJET with Twiss parameters
11296 ! call TILTBM to apply Twiss alpha
11297  tipha=twissa(3)
11298  tix=twissa(1)
11299  tiy=twissa(2)
11300  shifw=.000000
11301  shifp=.000000
11302  icg=1
11303  call tiltbm(icg)
11304 ! write the input beam in file 'input.beam'
11305  dum=0.
11306  write(11,*) ngood,dum,fh/(2000000.*pi)
11307  do i=1,ngood
11308  f(2,i)=f(2,i)+centre(2)
11309  f(3,i)=f(3,i)+centre(3)
11310  f(4,i)=f(4,i)+centre(4)
11311  f(5,i)=f(5,i)+centre(5)
11312  f(6,i)=f(6,i)+centre(6)
11313  f(7,i)=f(7,i)+centre(1)
11314  etphas=fh*(f(6,i)-tref)
11315  etener=f(7,i)-xmat
11316  write(11,777) f(2,i),f(3,i)/1000.,f(4,i),f(5,i)/1000.,
11317  * etphas,etener
11318  enddo
11319 777 format(6(f13.8,1x))
11320  else
11321 ! in case of itwiss.ne.1 apply CENTRE and write input beam in TILTBM
11322  tipha=0.
11323  tix=0.
11324  tiy=0.
11325  shifw=.000000
11326  shifp=.000000
11327  icg=1
11328  call tiltbm(icg)
11329  endif
11330  call emiprt(0)
11331 ! store START data for .dmp file
11332  dmpdat(1)=0.
11333  dmpdat(2)=100.
11334  dmpdat(3)=0.
11335  dmpdat(4)=tmp
11336  dmpdat(5)=bdep
11337  dmpdat(6)=enedep
11338  dmpdat(7)=tref*180.*fh/pi
11339  dmpdat(8)=bdep
11340  dmpdat(9)=enedep
11341 ! dmpdat(10), dmpdat(11), dmpdat(12) loaded in emiprt
11342 ! dmpdat(13)=0.
11343 ! dmpdat(14)=0.
11344 ! nd=0
11345 ! write(50,*) '# start Z trans ',
11346 ! * 'dummy TOF(COG) COG Wcog TOF(REF) ',
11347 ! * ' REF Wref Ex,RMS,n Ey,RMS,n ',
11348 ! * 'El,RMS dummy dummy'
11349 ! write(50,*) '# # (m) (%) ',
11350 ! * ' (deg) beta (MeV) (deg) ',
11351 ! * ' beta (MeV) (mm.mrad) (mm.mrad) (ns.keV)'
11352 ! write(50,7023) nd,(dmpdat(i),i=1,14)
11353 !7023 format(1x,i4,1x,e12.5,1x,f6.2,1x,f7.2,1x,
11354 ! * 2(e14.7,1x,f7.5,1x,e14.7,1x),7(e12.5,1x))
11355  return
11356  end
11357 
11387  SUBROUTINE monte
11388  implicit real(8) (a-h,o-z)
11389  parameter(iptsz=100002,maxcell1=3000)
11390  common/dcspa/iesp
11391  common/ttfc/tk,t1k,t2k,sk,s1k,s2k,fh
11392  COMMON /com4/cord(iptsz,6)
11393  common/faisc/f(10,iptsz),imax,ngood
11394  common/objet/fo(9,iptsz),imaxo
11395  common/qmoyen/qmoy
11396  common/histo/centre(6)
11397  COMMON /consta/ vl, pi, xmat, rpel, qst
11398  common/tapes/in,ifile,meta
11399  common/ranec1/dummy(6)
11400  common/etcha1/ichas(iptsz),chexmin(10),chexmax(10),chasit
11401  common/sc3/beamc,scdist,sce10,cplm,ect,apl,ichaes,iscsp
11402  common/newtlt/twissa(3),itwiss
11403  common/dyni/vrefi,trefi,fhinit,acpt
11404  common/speda/dave,idave
11405  common/ragau/ntir
11406 !********************************************
11407 ! v28/04/2015
11408  common/fcont/ifcont
11409  logical ifcont
11410  common/trace3d/trace3h(100),trace3t(maxcell1),tif,kt3h,kt3t,fid
11411  common/trace3e/tracebi(6),traceei(3)
11412  character trace3h*128,trace3t*128,tif*128
11413  logical iesp,chasit,dave,acpt
11414 ! dimension fn(9,iptsz),foo(9),so(6),vecx(1)
11415  dimension vecx(1)
11416  read(in,*)loi,itwiss
11417  WRITE(16,*) ' Generate particles based on law ',loi
11418  if(loi.gt.6) then
11419  write(16,*) .gt.' ERROR in GEBEAM: law 6 invalid !! '
11420  stop
11421  endif
11422  read(in,*)fh,imax
11423  WRITE(16,102) fh
11424  102 FORMAT(//,30x,' FREQUENCY : ',e12.5,' Hz',//)
11425  fh=fh*2.*pi
11426  fhinit=fh
11427 ! Center of the beam ellipsoid
11428 ! X X' Y Y' Z' Z
11429  read(in,*)(centre(j),j=2,5),centre(1),centre(6)
11430  if (itwiss.ne.1) then
11431  read(in,*)ymax,tmax,zmax,pmax,dmax,ttmax
11432  kt3h=kt3h+1
11433  trace3h(kt3h)=.NE.'ERROR: GEBEAM ITWISS1 not yet implemented'
11434  else
11435  read(in,*) alphax,betax,emitx
11436  read(in,*) alphay,betay,emity
11437  read(in,*) alphaz,betaz,emitz
11438  gammax=(1.+alphax*alphax)/betax
11439  gammay=(1.+alphay*alphay)/betay
11440  ymax=0.1*sqrt(emitx/gammax)
11441  tmax=sqrt(emitx*gammax)
11442  zmax=0.1*sqrt(emity/gammay)
11443  pmax=sqrt(emity*gammay)
11444  twissa(1)=-alphax*ymax
11445  twissa(2)=-alphay*zmax
11446 ! if(loi.ne.5) then
11447  if(loi.lt.5) then
11448  gammaz=(1.+alphaz*alphaz)/betaz
11449  dmax=0.001*sqrt(emitz*gammaz)
11450  ttmax=pi*sqrt(emitz/gammaz)/(fh*180.)
11451  twissa(3)=alphaz*sqrt(emitz/gammaz)
11452  endif
11453  if(loi.ge.5) then
11454  dmax=alphaz
11455  twissa(3)=0.
11456  ttmax=pi/fh
11457  endif
11458  if(loi.eq.6) then
11459  sig=betaz
11460  endif
11461 ! store parameters for trace3d, write them in ENTRE
11462  tracebi(1)=alphax
11463  tracebi(2)=betax
11464  tracebi(3)=alphay
11465  tracebi(4)=betay
11466  tracebi(5)=alphaz
11467  tracebi(6)=betaz
11468  traceei(1)=emitx
11469  traceei(2)=emity
11470  traceei(3)=emitz
11471  endif
11472 ! --- beam centre is activated in SUBROUTINE entre
11473  cph=centre(6)*fh*180/pi
11474  WRITE(16,123) (centre(j),j=2,5),centre(1),centre(6),cph
11475 123 FORMAT(' *** Beam centre defined as:',/,3x,
11476  x 4x,' Transverse direction :',/,6x,
11477  x' HORZ PLANE X(CM) = ',e12.5,' XP(MRD) = ',e12.5,/,6x,
11478  x' VERT PLANE Y(CM) = ',e12.5,' YP(MRD) = ',e12.5,/,4x,
11479  x' LONGITUDINAL :',/,5x,
11480  x' DELTA ENERGY(MeV) = ',e12.5,' TIME(SEC) = ',e12.5,/,
11481  x 41x,' PHASE(DEG) = ',e12.5,//)
11482  ptmax=ttmax*fh*180./pi
11483  if(itwiss.ne.1) then
11484  WRITE(16,99)ymax,tmax,zmax,pmax,dmax,ttmax,ptmax
11485 99 FORMAT(3x,' *** Limits of the random distribution ',/,
11486  x 4x,' Transverse direction :',/,6x,
11487  x' HORZ PLANE X(CM) = ',e12.5,' XP(MRD) = ',e12.5,/,6x,
11488  x' VERT PLANE Y(CM) = ',e12.5,' YP(MRD) = ',e12.5,/,4x,
11489  x' LONGITUDINAL :',/,5x,
11490  x' DELTA ENERGY(MeV) = ',e12.5,' TIME(SEC) = ',e12.5,/,
11491  x 41x,' PHASE(DEG) = ',e12.5,//)
11492  else
11493 ! if(loi.eq.5) then
11494  if(loi.ge.5) then
11495  write(16,*) ' Beam distribution based on Twiss parameters'
11496  write(16,199) alphax,betax,emitx,alphay,betay,emity
11497  write(16,399) ptmax,dmax
11498 399 format(4x,' Continuous beam in the longitudinal direction :',
11499  * /,6x,' half phase length (deg): ',e12.5,/,6x,
11500  * ' half energy width (MeV): ',e12.5)
11501 ! continuous beam
11502  ifcont=.true.
11503  else
11504  write(16,*) ' Beam distribution based on Twiss parameters'
11505  write(16,199) alphax,betax,emitx,alphay,betay,emity
11506 199 format(4x,' Transverse direction :',/,6x,
11507  * ' Horz plane: alpha: ',e12.5,' beta(mm/mrad): ',e12.5,
11508  * ' emit(pi*mm*mrad): ',e12.5,/,6x,
11509  * ' Vert plane: alpha: ',e12.5,' beta(mm/mrad): ',e12.5,
11510  * ' emit(pi*mm*mrad): ',e12.5)
11511  write(16,299) alphaz,betaz,emitz
11512 299 format(4x,' Longitudinal direction :',/,6x,
11513  * ' alpha: ',e12.5,' beta(deg/keV): ',e12.5,
11514  * ' emit(pi*deg*keV): ',e12.5)
11515  endif
11516  endif
11517 ! len : starting value of the random vector for the routine rlux
11518  len=1
11519  do j=1,6
11520  cord(1,j)=0.0
11521  enddo
11522  if(loi.eq.1) then
11523  do i=2,imax
11524  DO
11525  call rlux(vecx,len)
11526  r1=2.*vecx(1)-1.
11527  call rlux(vecx,len)
11528  r3=2.*vecx(1)-1.
11529  call rlux(vecx,len)
11530  r6=2.*vecx(1)-1.
11531 ! make round in x,y,z plane
11532  rho=r1**2+r3**2+r6**2
11533  if (rho.le.1.) EXIT
11534  ENDDO
11535  DO
11536  call rlux(vecx,len)
11537  r2=2.*vecx(1)-1.
11538 ! make beam round in x,x' plane
11539  if((r1*r1+r2*r2).le.1.) EXIT
11540  ENDDO
11541  DO
11542  call rlux(vecx,len)
11543  r4=2.*vecx(1)-1.
11544 ! make beam round in y,yp plane
11545  if((r4*r4+r3*r3).le.1.) EXIT
11546  ENDDO
11547  DO
11548  call rlux(vecx,len)
11549  r5=2.*vecx(1)-1.
11550 ! make beam round in plane z, zp
11551  if((r6*r6+r5*r5).le.1.) EXIT
11552  ENDDO
11553 ! store random numbers in preparation for rms correction
11554  cord(i,1)=r1
11555  cord(i,2)=r2
11556  cord(i,3)=r3
11557  cord(i,4)=r4
11558  cord(i,5)=r5
11559  cord(i,6)=r6
11560  enddo
11561  endif
11562  if(loi.eq.2) then
11563  do i=2,imax
11564  DO
11565  DO
11566  call rlux(vecx,len)
11567  r1=2.*vecx(1)-1.
11568  call rlux(vecx,len)
11569  r2=2.*vecx(1)-1.
11570 ! make round x,xp
11571  rho=r1*r1+r2*r2
11572  if(rho.le.1) EXIT
11573  ENDDO
11574  DO
11575  call rlux(vecx,len)
11576  r3=2.*vecx(1)-1.
11577  call rlux(vecx,len)
11578  r4=2.*vecx(1)-1.
11579 ! make beam round in y,yp plane
11580  if((r4*r4+r3*r3).le.1.) EXIT
11581  ENDDO
11582  DO
11583  call rlux(vecx,len)
11584  r5=2.*vecx(1)-1.
11585  call rlux(vecx,len)
11586  r6=2.*vecx(1)-1.
11587 ! make beam round in plane z, zp
11588  if((r6*r6+r5*r5).le.1.) EXIT
11589  ENDDO
11590 ! make round x,xp,y,yp,z,zp
11591  rho=r1**2+r2**2+r3**2+r4**2+r5**2+r6**2
11592  if (rho.le.1.) EXIT
11593  ENDDO
11594 ! store random numbers in preparation for rms correction
11595  cord(i,1)=r1
11596  cord(i,2)=r2
11597  cord(i,3)=r3
11598  cord(i,4)=r4
11599  cord(i,5)=r5
11600  cord(i,6)=r6
11601  enddo
11602  endif
11603  if(loi.eq.3) then
11604  ntir=24
11605  s=.2493
11606  am=0.
11607  do i=2,imax
11608  DO
11609  call gcern (len,s,am,vec)
11610  r1=vec
11611  call gcern (len,s,am,vec)
11612  r3=vec
11613  call gcern (len,s,am,vec)
11614  r6=vec
11615 ! make round in x,y,z plane
11616  rho=r1**2+r3**2+r6**2
11617  if (rho.le.1.) EXIT
11618  ENDDO
11619  DO
11620  call gcern (len,s,am,vec)
11621  r2=vec
11622 ! make beam round in x,x' plane
11623  if((r1*r1+r2*r2).le.1.) EXIT
11624  ENDDO
11625  DO
11626  call gcern (len,s,am,vec)
11627  r4=vec
11628 ! make beam round in y,yp plane
11629  if((r4*r4+r3*r3).le.1.) EXIT
11630  ENDDO
11631  DO
11632  call gcern (len,s,am,vec)
11633  r5=vec
11634 ! make beam round in plane z, zp
11635  if((r6*r6+r5*r5).le.1.) EXIT
11636  ENDDO
11637 ! store random numbers in preparation for rms correction
11638  cord(i,1)=r1
11639  cord(i,2)=r2
11640  cord(i,3)=r3
11641  cord(i,4)=r4
11642  cord(i,5)=r5
11643  cord(i,6)=r6
11644  enddo
11645  endif
11646  if(loi.eq.4) then
11647  ntir=12
11648  s=.2493
11649  am=0.
11650  do i=2,imax
11651  DO
11652  DO
11653  call gcern (len,s,am,vec)
11654  r1=vec
11655  call gcern (len,s,am,vec)
11656  r2=vec
11657 ! make beam round in x,xp plane
11658  rho=r1*r1+r2*r2
11659  if (rho.le.1.) EXIT
11660  ENDDO
11661  DO
11662  call gcern (len,s,am,vec)
11663  r3=vec
11664  call gcern (len,s,am,vec)
11665  r4=vec
11666 ! make beam round in y,yp plane
11667  if((r3*r3+r4*r4).le.1.) EXIT
11668  ENDDO
11669  DO
11670  call gcern (len,s,am,vec)
11671  r5=vec
11672  call gcern (len,s,am,vec)
11673  r6=vec
11674 ! make beam round in plane z, zp
11675  if((r6*r6+r5*r5).le.1.) EXIT
11676  ENDDO
11677 ! store random numbers in preparation for rms correction
11678 ! make round x,xp,y,yp,z,zp
11679  rho=r1**2+r2**2+r3**2+r4**2+r5**2+r6**2
11680  if (rho.le.1.) EXIT
11681  ENDDO
11682  cord(i,1)=r1
11683  cord(i,2)=r2
11684  cord(i,3)=r3
11685  cord(i,4)=r4
11686  cord(i,5)=r5
11687  cord(i,6)=r6
11688  enddo
11689  endif
11690  if(loi.eq.5) then
11691  do i=2,imax
11692  DO
11693  DO
11694  call rlux(vecx,len)
11695  r1=2.*vecx(1)-1.
11696  call rlux(vecx,len)
11697  r3=2.*vecx(1)-1.
11698 ! make round in x,y plane
11699  rho=r1**2+r3**2
11700  if (rho.le.1.) EXIT
11701  ENDDO
11702  DO
11703  call rlux(vecx,len)
11704  r2=2.*vecx(1)-1.
11705 ! make beam round in x,x' plane
11706  if((r1*r1+r2*r2).le.1.) EXIT
11707  ENDDO
11708  DO
11709  call rlux(vecx,len)
11710  r4=2.*vecx(1)-1.
11711 ! make beam round in y,yp plane
11712  if((r4*r4+r3*r3).le.1.) EXIT
11713  ENDDO
11714 ! make round x,xp,y,yp
11715  rho=r1**2+r2**2+r3**2+r4**2
11716  if (rho.le.1.) EXIT
11717  ENDDO
11718 !*et*2010-11-23 do NOT make beam round in z,zp plane
11719  call rlux(vecx,len)
11720  r5=2.*vecx(1)-1.
11721  call rlux(vecx,len)
11722  r6=2.*vecx(1)-1.
11723 ! store random numbers in preparation for rms correction
11724  cord(i,1)=r1
11725  cord(i,2)=r2
11726  cord(i,3)=r3
11727  cord(i,4)=r4
11728  cord(i,5)=r5
11729  cord(i,6)=r6
11730  enddo
11731  endif
11732  if(loi.eq.6) then
11733 ! Gaussian
11734  do i=2,imax
11735  CALL rgaus2(sig,y1,y2,y3,y4)
11736 ! do NOT make beam gaussian in z,zp plane
11737  call rlux(vecx,len)
11738  r5=2.*vecx(1)-1.
11739  call rlux(vecx,len)
11740  r6=2.*vecx(1)-1.
11741 !
11742 ! store random numbers in preparation for rms correction
11743  cord(i,1)=y1
11744  cord(i,2)=y2
11745  cord(i,3)=y3
11746  cord(i,4)=y4
11747  cord(i,5)=r5
11748  cord(i,6)=r6
11749  enddo
11750  y1x=abs(cord(2,1))
11751  y2x=abs(cord(2,2))
11752  y3x=abs(cord(2,3))
11753  y4x=abs(cord(2,4))
11754  do i=3,imax
11755  if(abs(cord(i,1)).gt.y1x)y1x=abs(cord(i,1))
11756  if(abs(cord(i,2)).gt.y2x)y2x=abs(cord(i,2))
11757  if(abs(cord(i,3)).gt.y3x)y3x=abs(cord(i,3))
11758  if(abs(cord(i,4)).gt.y4x)y4x=abs(cord(i,4))
11759  enddo
11760  do i=2,imax
11761  cord(i,1)=cord(i,1)/y1x
11762  cord(i,2)=cord(i,2)/y2x
11763  cord(i,3)=cord(i,3)/y3x
11764  cord(i,4)=cord(i,4)/y4x
11765  enddo
11766  endif
11767  call corre(imax,imax)
