11768 ! fimax=ttmax*fh*180./pi
11769 ! maximum extent in case of continous beam is +/-pi (i.e. +/-180 deg)
11770  tcorct=abs(.5*cord(2,6)*ttmax)
11771 ! in fo(1,) is stored the energy extent (MeV)
11772  do i=2,imax
11773  fo(1,i)=.5*cord(i,5)*dmax
11774  fo(2,i)=.5*cord(i,1)*ymax
11775  fo(3,i)=.5*cord(i,2)*tmax
11776  fo(4,i)=.5*cord(i,3)*zmax
11777  fo(5,i)=.5*cord(i,4)*pmax
11778  fo(6,i)=.5*cord(i,6)*ttmax
11779  if(abs(fo(6,i)).gt.tcorct) tcorct=abs(fo(6,i))
11780  enddo
11781 ! first particle
11782 !ccc imax=imax+1
11783  ichas(1)=1
11784  fo(8,1)=1.
11785  do j=1,6
11786  fo(j,1)=0.
11787  enddo
11788 ! if(loi.ne.5) then
11789  if(loi.lt.5) then
11790  do i=2,imax
11791  fo(8,i)=1
11792  ichas(i)=1
11793  enddo
11794  else
11795 ! correct the phase length for a continuous beam (force +/- 180 deg)
11796  tcorct=ttmax/tcorct
11797  do i=2,imax
11798  fo(8,i)=1
11799  ichas(i)=1
11800  fo(6,i)=fo(6,i)*tcorct
11801  enddo
11802  endif
11803  ngood=imax
11804  imaxo=imax
11805  WRITE(16,8)loi,imax
11806 8 FORMAT(8x ,' ****law ',i2,' with ',i6,' particles',/)
11807  RETURN
11808  END
11809 
11813  subroutine rgaus2(sigma,y1,y2,y3,y4)
11814  implicit real(8) (a-h,o-z)
11815  dimension vecx(1)
11816  len=1
11817  w1=0.
11818  do while ((w1.ge.1.0).or.(w1.eq.0.))
11819  call rlux(vecx,len)
11820  x1 = 2.0 * vecx(1) - 1.0
11821  call rlux(vecx,len)
11822  x3 = 2.0 * vecx(1) - 1.0
11823  w1 = x1 * x1 + x3 * x3
11824  enddo
11825  w2=0.
11826  do while ((w2.ge.1.0).or.(w2.eq.0.))
11827  call rlux(vecx,len)
11828  x2 = 2.0 * vecx(1) - 1.0
11829  call rlux(vecx,len)
11830  x4 = 2.0 * vecx(1) - 1.0
11831  w2 = x2 * x2 + x4 * x4
11832  enddo
11833  w1 = sigma*sqrt( (-2.0 * log( w1 ) ) / w1 )
11834  w2 = sigma*sqrt( (-2.0 * log( w2 ) ) / w2 )
11835  y1 = x1 * w1
11836  y2 = x2 * w2
11837  y3 = x3 * w1
11838  y4 = x4 * w2
11839  return
11840  end
11841 
11891  SUBROUTINE rlux(RVEC,LENV)
11892  implicit real(8) (a-h,o-z)
11893  dimension rvec(lenv)
11894  dimension seeds(24), iseeds(24)
11895  parameter(maxlev=4, lxdflt=3)
11896  dimension ndskip(0:maxlev)
11897  dimension next(24)
11898  parameter(igiga=1000000000,jsdflt=314159265)
11899  parameter(itwo24=2**24, icons=2147483563)
11900  SAVE notyet, i24, j24, carry, seeds, twom24, twom12, luxlev
11901  SAVE nskip, ndskip, in24, next, kount, mkount, inseed
11902  INTEGER LUXLEV
11903  LOGICAL NOTYET
11904  DATA notyet, luxlev, in24, kount, mkount /.true., lxdflt, 0,0,0/
11905  DATA i24,j24,carry/24,10,0./
11906 ! default
11907 ! Luxury Level 0 1 2 *3* 4
11908  DATA ndskip/0, 24, 73, 199, 365 /
11909 ! corresponds to p=24 48 97 223 389
11910 ! time factor 1 2 3 6 10 on slow workstation
11911 ! 1 1.5 2 3 5 on fast mainframe
11912 !
11913 ! NOTYET is .TRUE. if no initialization has been performed yet.
11914 ! Default Initialization by Multiplicative Congruential
11915  IF (notyet) THEN
11916  notyet = .false.
11917  jseed = jsdflt
11918  inseed = jseed
11919  WRITE(16,'(A,I12)')' RANLUX DEFAULT INITIALIZATION: ',jseed
11920  luxlev = lxdflt
11921  nskip = ndskip(luxlev)
11922  lp = nskip + 24
11923  in24 = 0
11924  kount = 0
11925  mkount = 0
11926  WRITE(16,'(A,I2,A,I4)')' RANLUX DEFAULT LUXURY LEVEL = ',
11927  + luxlev,' p =',lp
11928  twom24 = 1.
11929  DO i= 1, 24
11930  twom24 = twom24 * 0.5
11931  k = jseed/53668
11932  jseed = 40014*(jseed-k*53668) -k*12211
11933  IF (jseed .LT. 0) jseed = jseed+icons
11934  iseeds(i) = mod(jseed,itwo24)
11935  ENDDO
11936  twom12 = twom24 * 4096.
11937  DO i= 1,24
11938  seeds(i) = REAL(iseeds(i))*TWOM24
11939  next(i) = i-1
11940  ENDDO
11941  next(1) = 24
11942  i24 = 24
11943  j24 = 10
11944  carry = 0.
11945  IF (seeds(24) .EQ. 0.) carry = twom24
11946  ENDIF
11947 !
11948 ! The Generator proper: "Subtract-with-borrow",
11949 ! as proposed by Marsaglia and Zaman,
11950 ! Florida State University, March, 1989
11951 !
11952  DO ivec= 1, lenv
11953  uni = seeds(j24) - seeds(i24) - carry
11954  IF (uni .LT. 0.) THEN
11955  uni = uni + 1.0
11956  carry = twom24
11957  ELSE
11958  carry = 0.
11959  ENDIF
11960  seeds(i24) = uni
11961  i24 = next(i24)
11962  j24 = next(j24)
11963  rvec(ivec) = uni
11964 ! small numbers (with less than 12 "significant" bits) are "padded".
11965  IF (uni .LT. twom12) THEN
11966  rvec(ivec) = rvec(ivec) + twom24*seeds(j24)
11967 ! and zero is forbidden in case someone takes a logarithm
11968  IF (rvec(ivec) .EQ. 0.) rvec(ivec) = twom24*twom24
11969  ENDIF
11970 ! Skipping to luxury. As proposed by Martin Luscher.
11971  in24 = in24 + 1
11972  IF (in24 .EQ. 24) THEN
11973  in24 = 0
11974  kount = kount + nskip
11975  DO isk= 1, nskip
11976  uni = seeds(j24) - seeds(i24) - carry
11977  IF (uni .LT. 0.) THEN
11978  uni = uni + 1.0
11979  carry = twom24
11980  ELSE
11981  carry = 0.
11982  ENDIF
11983  seeds(i24) = uni
11984  i24 = next(i24)
11985  j24 = next(j24)
11986  ENDDO
11987  ENDIF
11988  ENDDO
11989  kount = kount + lenv
11990  IF (kount .GE. igiga) THEN
11991  mkount = mkount + 1
11992  kount = kount - igiga
11993  ENDIF
11994  RETURN
11995  END
11996 
12008  SUBROUTINE rluxin(ISDEXT)
12009  implicit real(8) (a-h,o-z)
12010  dimension seeds(24), isdext(25)
12011  parameter(maxlev=4, lxdflt=3)
12012  dimension ndskip(0:maxlev)
12013  dimension next(24)
12014  SAVE notyet, i24, j24, carry, seeds, twom24, twom12, luxlev
12015  SAVE nskip, ndskip, in24, next, kount, mkount, inseed
12016  INTEGER LUXLEV
12017  LOGICAL NOTYET
12018  DATA notyet, luxlev, in24, kount, mkount /.true., lxdflt, 0,0,0/
12019  DATA i24,j24,carry/24,10,0./
12020 ! default
12021 ! Luxury Level 0 1 2 *3* 4
12022  DATA ndskip/0, 24, 73, 199, 365 /
12023 !orresponds to p=24 48 97 223 389
12024 ! time factor 1 2 3 6 10 on slow workstation
12025 ! 1 1.5 2 3 5 on fast mainframe
12026 !
12027 !
12028 ! Entry to input and float integer seeds from previous run
12029  notyet = .false.
12030  twom24 = 1.
12031  DO i= 1, 24
12032  next(i) = i-1
12033  twom24 = twom24 * 0.5
12034  ENDDO
12035  next(1) = 24
12036  twom12 = twom24 * 4096.
12037  WRITE(16,'(A)')'FULL INITIALIZATION OF RANLUX WITH 25',
12038  * ' INTEGERS'
12039  WRITE(16,'(5X,5I12)') isdext
12040  DO i= 1, 24
12041  seeds(i) = REAL(isdext(i))*TWOM24
12042  ENDDO
12043  carry = 0.
12044  IF (isdext(25) .LT. 0) carry = twom24
12045  isd = iabs(isdext(25))
12046  i24 = mod(isd,100)
12047  isd = isd/100
12048  j24 = mod(isd,100)
12049  isd = isd/100
12050  in24 = mod(isd,100)
12051  isd = isd/100
12052  luxlev = isd
12053  IF (luxlev .LE. maxlev) THEN
12054  nskip = ndskip(luxlev)
12055  WRITE (6,'(A,I2)')'RANLUX LUXURY LEVEL SET BY RLUXIN TO: ',
12056  + luxlev
12057  ELSE IF (luxlev .GE. 24) THEN
12058  nskip = luxlev - 24
12059  WRITE (6,'(A,I5)')'RANLUX P-VALUE SET BY RLUXIN TO:',luxlev
12060  ELSE
12061  nskip = ndskip(maxlev)
12062  WRITE (6,'(A,I5)')'RANLUX ILLEGAL LUXURY RLUXIN: ',luxlev
12063  luxlev = maxlev
12064  ENDIF
12065  inseed = -1
12066  RETURN
12067  END
12068 
12077  SUBROUTINE rluxut(ISDEXT)
12078  implicit real(8) (a-h,o-z)
12079  dimension seeds(24), isdext(25)
12080  parameter(maxlev=4, lxdflt=3)
12081  dimension ndskip(0:maxlev)
12082  parameter(twop12=4096.)
12083  SAVE notyet, i24, j24, carry, seeds, luxlev
12084  SAVE ndskip, in24, kount, mkount
12085  INTEGER LUXLEV
12086  LOGICAL NOTYET
12087  DATA notyet, luxlev, in24, kount, mkount /.true., lxdflt, 0,0,0/
12088  DATA i24,j24,carry/24,10,0./
12089 ! default
12090 ! Luxury Level 0 1 2 *3* 4
12091  DATA ndskip/0, 24, 73, 199, 365 /
12092 !orresponds to p=24 48 97 223 389
12093 ! time factor 1 2 3 6 10 on slow workstation
12094 ! 1 1.5 2 3 5 on fast mainframe
12095 !
12096 !
12097 ! Entry to output seeds as integers
12098  DO i= 1, 24
12099  isdext(i) = int(seeds(i)*twop12*twop12)
12100  ENDDO
12101  isdext(25) = i24 + 100*j24 + 10000*in24 + 1000000*luxlev
12102  IF (carry .GT. 0.) isdext(25) = -isdext(25)
12103  RETURN
12104  END
12105 
12118  SUBROUTINE rluxat(LOUT,INOUT,K1,K2)
12119  implicit real(8) (a-h,o-z)
12120  parameter(lxdflt=3)
12121  SAVE notyet, luxlev
12122  SAVE in24, kount, mkount, inseed
12123  INTEGER LUXLEV
12124  LOGICAL NOTYET
12125  DATA notyet, luxlev, in24, kount, mkount /.true., lxdflt, 0,0,0/
12126 ! Entry to output the "convenient" restart point
12127  lout = luxlev
12128  inout = inseed
12129  k1 = kount
12130  k2 = mkount
12131  RETURN
12132  END
12133 
12146  SUBROUTINE rluxgo(LUX,INS,K1,K2)
12147  implicit real(8) (a-h,o-z)
12148  dimension seeds(24), iseeds(24)
12149  parameter(maxlev=4, lxdflt=3)
12150  dimension ndskip(0:maxlev)
12151  dimension next(24)
12152  parameter(igiga=1000000000,jsdflt=314159265)
12153  parameter(itwo24=2**24, icons=2147483563)
12154  SAVE notyet, i24, j24, carry, seeds, twom24, twom12, luxlev
12155  SAVE nskip, ndskip, in24, next, kount, mkount, inseed
12156  INTEGER LUXLEV
12157  LOGICAL NOTYET
12158  DATA notyet, luxlev, in24, kount, mkount /.true., lxdflt, 0,0,0/
12159  DATA i24,j24,carry/24,10,0./
12160 ! default
12161 ! Luxury Level 0 1 2 *3* 4
12162  DATA ndskip/0, 24, 73, 199, 365 /
12163 !orresponds to p=24 48 97 223 389
12164 ! time factor 1 2 3 6 10 on slow workstation
12165 ! 1 1.5 2 3 5 on fast mainframe
12166 !
12167 !
12168 ! Entry to initialize from one or three integers
12169  IF (lux .LT. 0) THEN
12170  luxlev = lxdflt
12171  ELSE IF (lux .LE. maxlev) THEN
12172  luxlev = lux
12173  ELSE IF (lux .LT. 24 .OR. lux .GT. 2000) THEN
12174  luxlev = maxlev
12175  WRITE (6,'(A,I7)')'RANLUX ILLEGAL LUXURY RLUXGO: ',lux
12176  ELSE
12177  luxlev = lux
12178  DO ilx= 0, maxlev
12179  IF (lux .EQ. ndskip(ilx)+24) luxlev = ilx
12180  ENDDO
12181  ENDIF
12182  IF (luxlev .LE. maxlev) THEN
12183  nskip = ndskip(luxlev)
12184  WRITE(16,'(A,I2,A,I4)')'RANLUX LUXURY LEVEL SET BY RLUXGO :',
12185  + luxlev,' P=', nskip+24
12186  ELSE
12187  nskip = luxlev - 24
12188  WRITE(16,'(A,I5)')'RANLUX P-VALUE SET BY RLUXGO TO:',luxlev
12189  ENDIF
12190  in24 = 0
12191  IF (ins .LT. 0) WRITE (6,'(A)')
12192  + ' Illegal initialization by RLUXGO, negative input seed'
12193  IF (ins .GT. 0) THEN
12194  jseed = ins
12195  WRITE(16,'(A,3I12)')'RANLUX INITIALIZED BY ',
12196  + 'RLUXGO FROM SEEDS',jseed, k1,k2
12197  ELSE
12198  jseed = jsdflt
12199  WRITE(16,'(A)')'RANLUX INITIALIZED BY RLUXGO FROM DEFAULT',
12200  + ' SEED'
12201  ENDIF
12202  inseed = jseed
12203  notyet = .false.
12204  twom24 = 1.
12205  DO i= 1, 24
12206  twom24 = twom24 * 0.5
12207  k = jseed/53668
12208  jseed = 40014*(jseed-k*53668) -k*12211
12209  IF (jseed .LT. 0) jseed = jseed+icons
12210  iseeds(i) = mod(jseed,itwo24)
12211  ENDDO
12212  twom12 = twom24 * 4096.
12213  DO i= 1,24
12214  seeds(i) = REAL(iseeds(i))*TWOM24
12215  next(i) = i-1
12216  ENDDO
12217  next(1) = 24
12218  i24 = 24
12219  j24 = 10
12220  carry = 0.
12221  IF (seeds(24) .EQ. 0.) carry = twom24
12222 ! If restarting at a break point, skip K1 + IGIGA*K2
12223 ! Note that this is the number of numbers delivered to
12224 ! the user PLUS the number skipped (if luxury .GT. 0).
12225  kount = k1
12226  mkount = k2
12227  IF (k1+k2 .NE. 0) THEN
12228  DO iouter= 1, k2+1
12229  inner = igiga
12230  IF (iouter .EQ. k2+1) inner = k1
12231  DO isk= 1, inner
12232  uni = seeds(j24) - seeds(i24) - carry
12233  IF (uni .LT. 0.) THEN
12234  uni = uni + 1.0
12235  carry = twom24
12236  ELSE
12237  carry = 0.
12238  ENDIF
12239  seeds(i24) = uni
12240  i24 = next(i24)
12241  j24 = next(j24)
12242  ENDDO
12243  ENDDO
12244 ! Get the right value of IN24 by direct calculation
12245  in24 = mod(kount, nskip+24)
12246  IF (mkount .GT. 0) THEN
12247  izip = mod(igiga, nskip+24)
12248  izip2 = mkount*izip + in24
12249  in24 = mod(izip2, nskip+24)
12250  ENDIF
12251 ! Now IN24 had better be between zero and 23 inclusive
12252  IF (in24 .GT. 23) THEN
12253  WRITE (6,'(A/A,3I11,A,I5)')
12254  + ' Error in RESTARTING with RLUXGO:',' The values',ins,
12255  + k1, k2, ' cannot occur at luxury level', luxlev
12256  in24 = 0
12257  ENDIF
12258  ENDIF
12259  RETURN
12260  END
12261 
12268  SUBROUTINE gcern(len,s,am,v)
12269  implicit real(8) (a-h,o-z)
12270  common/ragau/ntir
12271  dimension vecx(1)
12272  a=0.
12273  do i=1,ntir
12274  call rlux(vecx,len)
12275  y=vecx(1)
12276  a=a+y
12277  enddo
12278  v=(a-float(ntir)/2.)*s+am
12279  return
12280  end
12281 
12285  SUBROUTINE adjrfq
12286  implicit real(8) (a-h,o-z)
12287  parameter(iptsz=100002,maxcell1=3000)
12288  COMMON /consta/ vl, pi, xmat, rpel, qst
12289  common/davcom/dav1(maxcell1,40),davtot,iitem(maxcell1),idav
12290  common/speda/dave,idave
12291  common/dyn/tref,vref
12292  common/faisc/f(10,iptsz),imax,ngood
12293  common/objet/fo(9,iptsz),imaxo
12294  common/qmoyen/qmoy
12295  common/rigid/boro
12296  common/sc3/beamc,scdist,sce10,cplm,ect,apl,ichaes,iscsp
12297  common/etcom/cog(8),exten(17),fd(iptsz)
12298  common/tapes/in,ifile,meta
12299  common/isxpyp/iflag
12300  common/mcs/imcs,ncstat,cstat(20)
12301  common/ttfc/tk,t1k,t2k,sk,s1k,s2k,fh
12302  common/dyni/vrefi,trefi,fhinit,acpt
12303  common/strip/atm,qs,atms,ths,qop,sqst(6),anp,nqst
12304  common/trace3d/trace3h(100),trace3t(maxcell1),tif,kt3h,kt3t,fid
12305  common/trace3e/tracebi(6),traceei(3)
12306  common/t3dfld/fldctr(15),zend(15),t3d
12307  logical T3D
12308  character trace3h*128,trace3t*128,tif*128
12309  logical dave,acpt
12310  read(in,*) iflag
12311  if(iflag.eq.0 .or. iflag.eq.100)
12312  * write(16,*)'Standard file, phase in rad'
12313  if(iflag.eq.1 .or. iflag.eq.101)
12314  * write(16,*)'File with charge state and rest ',
12315  * 'mass, phase in rad'
12316  if(iflag.eq.2 .or. iflag.eq.102)
12317  * write(16,*)'File with several charge states',
12318  * ', phase in rad'
12319  if(iflag.eq.10 .or. iflag.eq.110)
12320  * write(16,*)'Standard file, phase in ns'
12321  if(iflag.eq.11 .or. iflag.eq.111)
12322  * write(16,*)'File with charge state and rest',
12323  * ' mass, phase in ns'
12324  if(iflag.eq.12 .or. iflag.eq.112)
12325  * write(16,*)'File with several charge states',
12326  * ', phase in ns'
12327 ! --- input: freq.(MHertz) tofini: phase offset (deg) to be applied both to the reference and the beam
12328  read(in,*) freq,tofini
12329  write(16,*) 'Frequency [MHz]:',freq
12330  fh=2.*pi*freq*1.e06
12331  fhinit=fh
12332  read(in,*)uem,atm
12333  xmat=uem*atm
12334 ! --- reference:
12335 ! enedep:energy(MeV), qst: charge of the reference
12336 ! when iflag =0 or iflag = 1 qst is the charge of the beam
12337  read(in,*) enedep,qst
12338  tofini=tofini*pi/(180.*fh)
12339  gdep=enedep/xmat+1.
12340  bdep=sqrt(1.-1./(gdep*gdep))
12341  vref=bdep*vl
12342  vrefi=vref
12343  tref=tofini
12344  trefi=tofini
12345  ncstat=1
12346  boro=3.3356*xmat*bdep*gdep/qst
12347  write(16,101) uem,atm,qst,tofini,enedep,boro
12348 101 format(' **** unit mass: ',e12.5,' MeV, mass units: ',f6.1,/,
12349  * ' **** reference charge ',f4.1,' time of flight ',e12.5,
12350  * ' sec',/,' **** reference : energy ',e12.5,
12351  * ' MeV momentum ',e12.5,' kG.cm')
12352 
12353  read(55,*) imax,dumf,dum
12354  ift=int(dumf)
12355  write(16,*)'File type listed in particle distribution file:',ift
12356  write(16,*)'File type listed in DYNAC input file:',
12357  * iflag
12358  if(imax+2.gt.iptsz) then
12359  WRITE(16,*) 'too many particles '
12360  stop
12361  endif
12362 ! iflag = 0 standard file:f(1,)=x, f(2,)=xp, f(3,)=y, f(4,)=yp, f(5,)=phase, f(6,)=kinetic energy
12363  if(iflag.eq.0 .or. iflag.eq.10) read(55,*)
12364  * ((f(i,j),i=1,6),j=1,imax)
12365 ! iflag = 1 File with rest mass: f(1,)=x, f(2,)=xp, f(3,)=y, f(4,)=yp, f(5,)=phase, f(6,)=kinetic energy, dum1, dum2
12366  if(iflag.eq.1 .or. iflag.eq.11) read(55,*)
12367  * ((f(i,j),i=1,6),dum1,dum2,j=1,imax)
12368 ! iflag = 2 beam with different charges: f(7,) = charge; figure out how many different ones there are and store them
12369  if(ncstat.eq.1) cstat(1)=qst
12370  if(iflag.eq.2 .or. iflag.eq.12) then
12371  ncstat=1
12372  read(55,*) (f(i,1),i=1,7)
12373  cstat(1)=f(7,1)
12374  do j=2,imax
12375  read(55,*) (f(i,j),i=1,7)
12376  mcstat=0
12377  do k=1,ncstat
12378  if(f(7,j).eq.cstat(k)) then
12379  mcstat=1
12380  endif
12381  enddo
12382  if(mcstat.eq.0) then
12383  ncstat=ncstat+1
12384  cstat(ncstat)=f(7,j)
12385  endif
12386  enddo
12387  write(16,*) 'Number of charge states: ',ncstat
12388  write(16,*) 'Charge state(s): ',(cstat(j),j=1,ncstat)
12389  if(ncstat.gt.1) imcs=1
12390  endif
12391  call intfac(tofini)
12392  if(t3d) then
12393  write(tif,901) (tracebi(i),i=1,6)
12394 901 format(' BEAMI(1)= ',5(f12.6,1x),f12.4)
12395  kt3h=kt3h+1
12396  trace3h(kt3h)=tif
12397  write(tif,902) (traceei(i),i=1,3)
12398 902 format(' EMITI(1)= ',f12.6,1x,f12.6,1x,f12.4)
12399  kt3h=kt3h+1
12400  trace3h(kt3h)=tif
12401  write(tif,903) uem*atm,int(qst),fhinit/2./pi/1.e6
12402 903 format(' ER= ',e16.7,', Q=',i3,' FREQ= ',e14.7)
12403  kt3h=kt3h+1
12404  trace3h(kt3h)=tif
12405  write(tif,7001) enedep
12406 7001 format(' W= ',f12.4)
12407  kt3h=kt3h+1
12408  trace3h(kt3h)=tif
12409  endif
12410  RETURN
12411  END
12412 
12416  SUBROUTINE intfac(tofini)
12417  implicit real(8) (a-h,o-z)
12418  parameter(iptsz=100002,maxcell1=3000)
12419  common/etcom/cog(8),exten(17),fd(iptsz)
12420  common/shif/dtiph,shift
12421  common/ttfc/tk,t1k,t2k,sk,s1k,s2k,fh
12422  common/faisc/f(10,iptsz),imax,ngood
12423  common/objet/fo(9,iptsz),imaxo
12424  common/qmoyen/qmoy
12425  common/rigid/boro
12426  common/dyn/tref,vref
12427  COMMON /consta/ vl, pi, xmat, rpel, qst
12428  common/tapes/in,ifile,meta
12429  common/etcha1/ichas(iptsz),chexmin(10),chexmax(10),chasit
12430  common/davcom/dav1(maxcell1,40),davtot,iitem(maxcell1),idav
12431  common/sc3/beamc,scdist,sce10,cplm,ect,apl,ichaes,iscsp
12432  common/speda/dave,idave
12433  common/isxpyp/iflag
12434  common/mcs/imcs,ncstat,cstat(20)
12435  common/dmp/dmpdat(14)
12436  dimension foo(20,9),ndp(20)
12437  common/trace3d/trace3h(100),trace3t(maxcell1),tif,kt3h,kt3t,fid
12438  common/trace3e/tracebi(6),traceei(3)
12439  common/t3dfld/fldctr(15),zend(15),t3d
12440  logical T3D
12441  character trace3h*128,trace3t*128,tif*128
12442  logical shift,chasit,dave
12443 ! FH :INITIAL FREQENCY (hertz)
12444 ! Use frequency from part. dist. file to calculate f(6,i)
12445 ! iflag = 0 : standard file, phase in rad
12446 ! iflag = 1 : special file, phase in rad
12447 ! iflag = 2 : several charge states, phase in rad
12448 ! iflag = 10 : standard file, phase in ns
12449 ! iflag = 11 : special file, phase in ns
12450 ! iflag = 12 : several charge states, phase in ns
12451  imcs=0
12452  if(iflag.eq.2 .or. iflag.eq.12) imcs=1
12453  qmoy=qst
12454  j=1
12455  breft=vref/vl
12456  treft=tref
12457  tcog=0.
12458 ! the table fo(,) is built from the input beam stored in the table f(,)
12459  if(iflag.le.2) then
12460  do i=1,imax
12461  fo(7,i)=f(6,j)+xmat
12462  if(iflag.le.1) fo(9,i)=qst
12463  if(iflag.eq.2) fo(9,i)=f(7,i)
12464  ichas(i)=1
12465  fo(8,i)=1.
12466  fo(1,i)=float(j+1)
12467  fo(2,i)=f(1,j)
12468  fo(3,i)=f(2,j)*1000.
12469  fo(4,i)=f(3,j)
12470  fo(5,i)=f(4,j)*1000.
12471  fo(6,i)=tofini+f(5,j)/fh
12472  tcog=tcog+fo(6,i)
12473  j=j+1
12474  enddo
12475  else
12476  do i=1,imax
12477  fo(7,i)=f(6,j)+xmat
12478  if(iflag.le.11) fo(9,i)=qst
12479  if(iflag.eq.12) fo(9,i)=f(7,i)
12480  ichas(i)=1
12481  fo(8,i)=1.
12482  fo(1,i)=float(j+1)
12483  fo(2,i)=f(1,j)
12484  fo(3,i)=f(2,j)*1000.
12485  fo(4,i)=f(3,j)
12486  fo(5,i)=f(4,j)*1000.
12487  fo(6,i)=tofini+f(5,j)*1.e-09
12488  tcog=tcog+fo(6,i)
12489  j=j+1
12490  enddo
12491  endif
12492  tcog=tcog/float(imax)
12493 ! cog of the beam
12494  if(iflag.eq.0.or.iflag.eq.1.or.iflag.eq.10.or.iflag.eq.11)then
12495 ! single charge state
12496  ndp(1)=imax
12497  do j=2,7
12498  foo(1,j)=0.
12499  enddo
12500  do i=1,imax
12501  do j=2,7
12502  foo(1,j)=foo(1,j)+fo(j,i)
12503  enddo
12504  enddo
12505  else
12506 ! multi charge state
12507  kt3h=kt3h+1
12508  trace3h(kt3h)='ERROR: RDBEAM reads more than 1 charge state'
12509  DO k=1,ncstat
12510  ndp(k)=0
12511  do j=2,7
12512  foo(k,j)=0.
12513  enddo
12514  ENDDO
12515  DO i=1,imax
12516  DO k=1,ncstat
12517  if(fo(9,i).eq.cstat(k)) then
12518  ndp(k)=ndp(k)+1
12519  do j=2,7
12520  foo(k,j)=foo(k,j)+fo(j,i)
12521  enddo
12522  endif
12523  ENDDO
12524  ENDDO
12525  endif
12526  DO k=1,ncstat
12527  do j=2,7
12528  foo(k,j)=foo(k,j)/float(ndp(k))
12529  enddo
12530  ENDDO
12531  ngood=imax
12532  if(iflag.eq.0 .or. iflag.eq.1 .or. iflag.eq.10 .or. iflag.eq.11
12533  * .or. iflag.eq.100 .or. iflag.eq.101 .or. iflag.eq.110 .or.
12534  * iflag.eq.111)then
12535 ! --- COG
12536  gref=foo(1,7)/xmat
12537  bref=sqrt(1.-1./(gref*gref))
12538  xe=(gref-1.)*xmat
12539 ! magnetic rigidity
12540  bor=3.3356*xmat*bref*gref/qst
12541  write(16,*) '**** COG : energy ',xe,' MeV momentum '
12542  * ,boro,' kG.cm'
12543  else
12544  DO k=1,ncstat
12545  gref=foo(k,7)/xmat
12546  bref=sqrt(1.-1./(gref*gref))
12547  xe=(gref-1.)*xmat
12548 ! magnetic rigidity
12549  bor=3.3356*xmat*bref*gref/cstat(k)
12550  write(16,*) ' Q: ',cstat(k),' COG : energy ',xe,
12551  * ' MeV momentum ',bor,' kG.cm'
12552  ENDDO
12553  endif
12554  vrefi=vref
12555  trefi=tref
12556 ! now save data back to f
12557  do i=1,ngood
12558  do k=1,9
12559  f(k,i)=fo(k,i)
12560  enddo
12561  enddo
12562 !9999 format(6(2x,e12.5))
12563  imaxo=ngood
12564  call emiprt(0)
12565 ! store START data for .dmp file
12566  dmpdat(1)=0.
12567  dmpdat(2)=100.
12568  dmpdat(3)=0.
12569  dmpdat(4)=tcog*180.*fh/pi
12570  dmpdat(5)=bref
12571  dmpdat(6)=xe
12572  dmpdat(7)=treft*180.*fh/pi
12573  dmpdat(8)=breft
12574  dmpdat(9)=(sqrt(1./(1.-breft*breft))-1.)*xmat
12575 ! dmpdat(10), dmpdat(11), dmpdat(12) loaded in emiprt
12576 ! dmpdat(13)=0.
12577 ! dmpdat(14)=0.
12578 ! nd=0
12579 ! write(50,*) '# start Z trans ',
12580 ! * 'dummy TOF(COG) COG Wcog TOF(REF) ',
12581 ! * ' REF Wref Ex,RMS,n Ey,RMS,n ',
12582 ! * 'El,RMS dummy dummy'
12583 ! write(50,*) '# # (m) (%) ',
12584 ! * ' (deg) beta (MeV) (deg) ',
12585 ! * ' beta (MeV) (mm.mrad) (mm.mrad) (ns.keV)'
12586 ! write(50,7023) nd,(dmpdat(i),i=1,14)
12587 !7023 format(1x,i4,1x,e12.5,1x,f6.2,1x,f7.2,1x,
12588 ! * 2(e14.7,1x,f7.5,1x,e14.7,1x),7(e12.5,1x))
12589  if(t3d) then
12590  call emit3d
12591  endif
12592  RETURN
12593  END
12594 
12610  SUBROUTINE stapl(zpos)
12611  implicit real(8) (a-h,o-z)
12612  parameter(iptsz=100002)
12613  common/pltprf/sprfx(3000),sprfy(3000),sprfl(3000),sprfw(3000),
12614  * sprfp(3000),sprng(3000),prlab(3000),iprf
12615  common/pltprf1/sprww(3000),eprfw(3000),eprnx(3000),eprny(3000),
12616  * sprfz(3000)
12617  common/pltprf2/sxmn(3000),sxmx(3000),symn(3000),symx(3000),
12618  * stmn(3000),stmx(3000),spmn(3000),spmx(3000),
12619  * swmn(3000),swmx(3000),disprx(3000),dispry(3000),
12620  * dispcx(3000),dispcy(3000),sdwbeam(3000),swref(3000)
12621  common/etcom/cog(8),exten(17),fd(iptsz)
12622  common /consta/ vl, pi, xmat, rpel, qst
12623  common/ttfc/tk,t1k,t2k,sk,s1k,s2k,fh
12624  common/faisc/f(10,iptsz),imax,ngood
12625  common/grot/rzot,izrot
12626  common/dyn/tref,vref
12627  CHARACTER*(8) PRLAB
12628  logical izrot
12629 ! izrot: logical flag set as .true. in the routine ZROTA
12630  if(izrot) call zrotap(-rzot)
12631  iarg=0
12632  call cdg(iarg)
12633  encog=cog(1)
12634  gcog=encog/xmat
12635  bcog=sqrt(1.-1./(gcog*gcog))
12636  tcog=cog(3)
12637  CALL ext2(iarg)
12638 ! qdisp=2.*sqrt(exten(1))
12639  qmd=exten(1)*exten(3)-exten(2)*exten(2)
12640  delw=encog*encog*bcog**4
12641  qmdv=qmd*delw
12642  sqmdv=4.*pi*sqrt(qmdv)
12643  eprfw(iprf)=sqmdv*1.e12/(pi*fh)
12644  sprfx(iprf)=2.*sqrt(exten(4))
12645  sprfy(iprf)=2.*sqrt(exten(6))
12646  trqtx=exten(4)*exten(5)-exten(8)*exten(8)
12647  trqpy=exten(6)*exten(7)-exten(9)*exten(9)
12648  surxth=4.*pi*sqrt(trqtx)
12649  suryph=4.*pi*sqrt(trqpy)
12650  eprnx(iprf)=bcog*surxth*10./(pi*sqrt(1.-bcog*bcog))
12651  eprny(iprf)=bcog*suryph*10./(pi*sqrt(1.-bcog*bcog))
12652 ! horizontal and vertical dispersion in meter (w.r.t. reference)
12653 ! disprx(iprf)=0.01*exten(12)/exten(14)
12654 ! dispry(iprf)=0.01*exten(13)/exten(14)
12655 ! horizontal and vertical dispersion in meter (w.r.t. COG)
12656  dispcx(iprf)=0.01*exten(15)/exten(17)
12657  dispcy(iprf)=0.01*exten(16)/exten(17)
12658  trqfi=0.
12659  tof=0.
12660  chxmx=f(2,1)
12661  chxmn=f(2,1)
12662  chymx=f(4,1)
12663  chymn=f(4,1)
12664  chpmx=f(6,1)-tcog
12665  chpmn=f(6,1)-tcog
12666  chwmx=f(7,1)-encog
12667  chwmn=f(7,1)-encog
12668  do i=1,ngood
12669  gpai=f(7,i)/xmat
12670  bpai=sqrt(1.-1./(gpai*gpai))
12671  fdp=(gpai*bpai)/(gcog*bcog)-1.
12672  trqfi=trqfi+fdp*fdp
12673  tf=(tcog-f(6,i))*bpai*vl
12674  tof=tof+tf*tf
12675  if(f(2,i).gt.chxmx)chxmx=f(2,i)
12676  if(f(2,i).lt.chxmn)chxmn=f(2,i)
12677  if(f(4,i).gt.chymx)chymx=f(4,i)
12678  if(f(4,i).lt.chymn)chymn=f(4,i)
12679  if(f(6,i)-tcog.gt.chpmx) then
12680  chpmx=f(6,i)-tcog
12681  chdmx=chpmx*fh*180./pi
12682  endif
12683  if(f(6,i)-tcog.lt.chpmn) then
12684  chpmn=f(6,i)-tcog
12685  chdmn=chpmn*fh*180./pi
12686  endif
12687  if(f(7,i)-encog.gt.chwmx)chwmx=f(7,i)-encog
12688  if(f(7,i)-encog.lt.chwmn)chwmn=f(7,i)-encog
12689  enddo
12690  trqfi=trqfi/float(ngood)
12691  tof=tof/float(ngood)
12692  sprfz(iprf)=sqrt(tof)
12693  cmult=(gcog+1.)/gcog
12694  sprfw(iprf)=2.*sqrt(trqfi)*cmult
12695  sprfp(iprf)=2.*sqrt(exten(3))*180./pi
12696  sprww(iprf)=cog(1)-xmat
12697 ! t.o.f of the reference in m
12698  sprfl(iprf)=zpos/1000.
12699  sprng(iprf)=ngood
12700 !*et*2014-Sep-25 Add recording of min. and max. positions in x,y and z,z'
12701  sxmx(iprf)=chxmx*10.
12702  sxmn(iprf)=chxmn*10.
12703  symx(iprf)=chymx*10.
12704  symn(iprf)=chymn*10.
12705  stmx(iprf)=chpmx
12706  stmn(iprf)=chpmn
12707  spmx(iprf)=chdmx
12708  spmn(iprf)=chdmn
12709  swmx(iprf)=chwmx
12710  swmn(iprf)=chwmn
12711 !*et*2014-Sep-25 Add recording of energy spread and Wref
12712  sdwbeam(iprf)=sqrt(exten(10))
12713  bref=vref/vl
12714  gref=1./sqrt(1.-bref*bref)
12715  swref(iprf)=(gref-1.)*xmat
12716 ! evolve pointer iprf
12717  iprf=iprf+1
12718  if(izrot) call zrotap(-rzot)
12719  return
12720  end
12721 
12725  SUBROUTINE eugwrt
12726  implicit real(8) (a-h,o-z)
12727  common/pltprf/sprfx(3000),sprfy(3000),sprfl(3000),sprfw(3000),
12728  * sprfp(3000),sprng(3000),prlab(3000),iprf
12729  common/pltprf1/sprww(3000),eprfw(3000),eprnx(3000),eprny(3000),
12730  * sprfz(3000)
12731  common/pltprf2/sxmn(3000),sxmx(3000),symn(3000),symx(3000),
12732  * stmn(3000),stmx(3000),spmn(3000),spmx(3000),
12733  * swmn(3000),swmx(3000),disprx(3000),dispry(3000),
12734  * dispcx(3000),dispcy(3000),sdwbeam(3000),swref(3000)
12735  CHARACTER*(8) PRLAB
12736 ! l(m) x(mm) y(mm) z(deg) z(mm) Ex(mm.mrd) Ey(mm.mrd) Ez(KeV.ns) Wcog(MeV) xmin(mm) xmax(mm) ymin(mm) ymax(mm)
12737 ! tmin(ns) tmax(ns) pmin(deg) pmax(deg) wmin(MeV) wmax(MeV) Dxcog(m) Dycog(m) dW(MeV) Wref(MeV)
12738  write(71,9)
12739 9 format(1x,'# ELEMENT l(m) ',1x,' x(mm) ',
12740  * 1x,' y(mm) ',3x,' z(deg) ',1x,' z(mm) ',
12741  * 2x,'Ex,n,RMS(mm.mrd)',2x,'Ey,n,RMS(mm.mrd)',
12742  * 1x,'Ez,RMS(KeV.ns)',2x,'Wcog(MeV) ',1x,'#particles',
12743  * 2x,'xmin(mm)',5x,'xmax(mm)',5x,'ymin(mm)',5x,'ymax(mm)',
12744  * 5x,'tmin(s)',6x,'tmax(s)',5x,'phmin(deg)',
12745  * 4x,'phmax(deg)',3x,'Wmin(MeV)',4x,'Wmax(MeV)',
12746  * 4x,'Dx(m)',8x,'Dy(m)',8x,'dW(MeV)',6x,'Wref(MeV)')
12747  iprf1=iprf-1
12748  do i=1,iprf1
12749 ! x and y: cm-->mm
12750  sprx=sprfx(i)*10./2.
12751  spry=sprfy(i)*10./2.
12752  sprp=sprfp(i)/2.
12753  sprz=sprfz(i)*10.
12754  write(71,10)prlab(i),sprfl(i),sprx,spry,sprp,sprz,eprnx(i)/4.,
12755  * eprny(i)/4.,eprfw(i)/4.,sprww(i),int(sprng(i)),
12756  * sxmn(i),sxmx(i),symn(i),symx(i),stmn(i),stmx(i),
12757  * spmn(i),spmx(i),swmn(i),swmx(i),
12758  * dispcx(i),dispcy(i),sdwbeam(i),swref(i)
12759 ! * disprx(i),dispry(i),dispcx(i),dispcy(i)
12760  enddo
12761 10 format(1x,a8,6(1x,e12.5),2(6x,e12.5),2x,e12.5,1x,i7,3x,
12762  * 14(1x,e12.5))
12763 !10 format(9(1x,e12.5),1x,i7,3x,14(1x,e12.5))
12764  return
12765  end
12766 
12778  SUBROUTINE etgap
12779  implicit real(8) (a-h,o-z)
12780  parameter(iptsz=100002,maxcell=3000,maxcell1=3000)
12781  common/ttfs/dynt(maxcell),dyntp(maxcell),dyntpp(maxcell),
12782  * dyne0(maxcell),dynph(maxcell),dynlg(maxcell),fhpar,nc
12783  common/posi/ist
12784  common/midgap/enmil,vapmi
12785  common/azmtch/dlg,xmcph,xmce
12786  common/azlist/icont,iprin
12787  common/itvole/itvol,imamin
12788  common/func/a(200),ylg,atte,ncel,nharm
12789 ! TRANSIT TIME COEFFICIENTS
12790  common/ttfc/tk,t1k,t2k,sk,s1k,s2k,fh
12791  common/ttfc1/t3k,t4k,s3k,s4k
12792  common/bedycp/phslip,eqvl,asdl,peqvl,pavph,xkp1,xkp2,
12793  * aa,bb,cc,dd,ee,pcrest,sqcttf
12794  common/jacob/gaks,gaps
12795  common/iter1/dxdki,dphii,phi,dkmske,dkmsphi,retph,xkmi,xkm,
12796  * dxk00,tke,t1ke,ske,s1ke,phiwc,xk1i,xk1ii,xk2ii
12797  common/faisc/f(10,iptsz),imax,ngood
12798  common/qmoyen/qmoy
12799  common/rigid/boro
12800  common/cdek/dwp(iptsz)
12801  common/sc3/beamc,scdist,sce10,cplm,ect,apl,ichaes,iscsp
12802  COMMON /consta/ vl, pi, xmat, rpel, qst
12803  common/dyn/tref,vref
12804  common/compt/nrres,nrtre,nrbunc,nrdbun
12805  common/compt1/ndtl,ncavmc,ncavnm
12806  common/fene/wdisp,wphas,wx,wy,rlim,ifw
12807  common/tapes/in,ifile,meta
12808  common/ranec1/dummy(6)
12809  common/etcom/cog(8),exten(17),fd(iptsz)
12810  common/speda/dave,idave
12811  common/shif/dtiph,shift
12812  common/davcom/dav1(maxcell1,40),davtot,iitem(maxcell1),idav
12813  common/etcha1/ichas(iptsz),chexmin(10),chexmax(10),chasit
12814  common/dcspa/iesp
12815  common/fct/fakt
12816 ! common/mode/eflvl,rflvl
12817  common/pltprf/sprfx(3000),sprfy(3000),sprfl(3000),sprfw(3000),
12818  x sprfp(3000),sprng(3000),prlab(3000),iprf
12819  CHARACTER*(8) PRLAB
12820  common/appel/irstay,ilost,iavp,ispcel
12821  common/posc/xpsc
12822  common/femt/iemgrw,iemqesg
12823  common/aerp/vphase,vfield,ierpf
12824  common/tofev/ttvols
12825  common/pstpla/tstp
12826  common/trace3d/trace3h(100),trace3t(maxcell1),tif,kt3h,kt3t,fid
12827  character trace3h*128,trace3t*128,tif*128
12828 ! --- synchronous particle:
12829 ! ***** DWRFS(MeV): energy gain
12830 ! ***** SPHRFS(rad): phase jump
12831 ! ***** PHRFS(rad):phase RF
12832 ! ***** common/parmrf/DWRFS,SPHRFS,PHRFS,ngdrf
12833  logical iesp,irstay,iavp,ispcel,iemgrw
12834  CHARACTER cr*1
12835 ! SHIFT =TRUE: cog and synchronous particle are independent
12836 ! SHIFT =FALSE: cog and synchronous particle are coinciding
12837  LOGICAL SHIFT,CHASIT,ITVOL,IMAMIN,DAVE,ICHAES
12838  dimension etcell(maxcell)
12839 ! --- iesp, irstay, ispcel logical flags used in the routines of space sharge computations
12840 ! iesp=false: accelerating element
12841 ! ispcel = .true.: space charge computation
12842  iesp=.false.
12843  irstay=.false.
12844  ispcel=.true.
12845  ilost=0
12846  fact=1.
12847  ndtl=ndtl+1
12848  nrres=nrres+1
12849 ! allow for print out on terminal of gap# on one and the same line
12850  cr=char(13)
12851  WRITE(6,8254,advance='no') nrtre,ndtl,cr
12852 8254 format('Transport element:',i5,
12853  * ' Accelerating gap :',i5,a1)
12854  WRITE(16,*)'ACCELERATING GAP N :',ndtl
12855  read(in,*) (etcell(iet),iet=1,16)
12856  fh=etcell(15)
12857  fakt=etcell(16)
12858  if (fakt.eq.0.) fakt=1.e-12
12859  fh=fh*2.*pi*1000000.
12860 ! --- YLG : CELL LENGTH (cm)
12861 ! --- YE0 : ELECTRIC FIELD (MV/cm)
12862  ylg=etcell(4)
12863  scdist=ylg
12864  ye0=etcell(11)/100.
12865 ! TRANSIT TIME COEFFICIENTS (at the middle OF THE CELL)
12866  t0=etcell(5)*ylg*ye0
12867  tp0=-etcell(6)*ylg*ylg*ye0
12868  tpp0=-etcell(14)*ylg*ylg*ylg*ye0
12869 ! TRANSIT TIME factors at the ENTRANCE OF THE CELL
12870 ! with kg=2*PI/ylg:
12871 ! TK0=T0*COS(kg*ylg/2) = -T0
12872 ! SK0=T0*SIN(kg*ylg/2) = 0
12873 ! TPK0=d(TK0)/dk
12874 ! SPK0=d(SK0)/dk
12875 ! TPPK0=d(TPK0)/dk
12876 ! SPPK0=d(SPK0)/dk
12877  tk0=-t0
12878  sk0=0.
12879  tpk0=-tp0
12880  spk0=-ylg*t0/2.
12881  tppk0=ylg*ylg*t0/4.-tpp0
12882  sppk0=-ylg*tp0/2.
12883  tk=tk0
12884  t1k=tpk0
12885  t2k=tppk0
12886  sk=sk0
12887  s1k=spk0
12888  s2k=sppk0
12889  tp3k0=0.
12890  tp4k0=0.
12891  sp3k0=0.
12892  sp4k0=0.
12893 ! MULTIPLY TRANSIT TIME factors WITH FAKT
12894  t0=t0*fakt
12895  tp0=tp0*fakt
12896  tpp0=tpp0*fakt
12897  tk0=-t0
12898  tpk0=-tp0
12899  spk0=-ylg*t0/2.
12900  tppk0=ylg*ylg*t0/4.-tpp0
12901  sppk0=-ylg*tp0/2.
12902  tk=tk0
12903  t1k=tpk0
12904  t2k=tppk0
12905  sk=sk0
12906  s1k=spk0
12907  s2k=sppk0
12908 ! IPOINR=IPOINR+1
12909 ! print in file: 'short.data'
12910 ! --- ylg : CELL LENGTH (cm) ==> (mm)
12911 ! --- ye0 : ELECTRIC FIELD (MV/cm) ==> (Kv/mm)
12912 ! --- davtot (mm)
12913  idav=idav+1
12914  iitem(idav)=17
12915  dav1(idav,1)=ylg*10.
12916  dav1(idav,2)=ye0*100.
12917  tstp=(davtot+ylg*xpsc)*10.
12918  davtot=davtot+ylg
12919  dav1(idav,24)=davtot*10.
12920 ! 21.11.09 dav1(idav,40)=fh
12921  fh0=fh/vl
12922 ! STATISTICS FOR PLOT
12923  IF(iprf.EQ.1) then
12924  prlab(iprf)='START '
12925  CALL stapl(dav1(idav,24))
12926  endif
12927 ! reference particle
12928  iarg=1
12929  call cdg(iarg)
12930  ecog=cog(1)
12931  enold=ecog
12932  gcog=ecog/xmat
12933  bcog=sqrt(1.-1./(gcog*gcog))
12934  tcog=cog(3)
12935  IF(shift) THEN
12936 ! reference particle and cog are independent
12937  beref=vref/vl
12938  gamref=1./sqrt(1.-(beref*beref))
12939  enref=xmat*gamref
12940  trefdg=tref*fh*180./pi
12941  tcogdg=tcog*fh*180./pi
12942  dav1(idav,3)=1.
12943  ELSE
12944 ! reference and c.o.g. are coinciding
12945  vref=bcog*vl
12946  tref=tcog
12947  gamref=gcog
12948  beref=bcog
12949  enref=cog(1)
12950  trefdg=tref*fh*180./pi
12951  tcogdg=tcog*fh*180./pi
12952  dav1(idav,3)=0.
12953  ENDIF
12954 ! --- ttvol: time of flight at entrance (sec)
12955  ttvol=0.
12956  if(itvol)ttvol=ttvols*fh
12957 ! ***** reference is placed in the position ngdrf=ngood+1 in array f(10,i)
12958 ! ***** ngdrf=ngood+1
12959 ! ***** BEREF=VREF/VL
12960 ! ***** GAMREF=1./SQRT(1.-(BEREF*BEREF))
12961 ! ***** ENREF=XMAT*GAMREF
12962 ! **** f(1,ngdrf)=ngdrf
12963 ! **** f(2,ngdrf)=0.
12964 ! **** f(3,ngdrf)=0.
12965 ! **** f(4,ngdrf)=0.
12966 ! **** f(5,ngdrf)=0.
12967 ! **** f(6,ngdrf)=tref
12968 ! **** f(7,ngdrf)=enref
12969 ! **** f(8,ngdrf)=1.
12970 ! **** f(9,ngdrf)=qst
12971 ! **** f(10,ngdrf)=0.
12972  if(dav1(idav,3).eq.1.) write(16,*)
12973  * ' ****reference and cog are different'
12974  if(dav1(idav,3).eq.0.) write(16,*)
12975  * ' **** reference and cog coincide '
12976  WRITE(16,178)
12977 178 FORMAT(/,' DYNAMICS AT THE INPUT ',/,
12978  2 5x,' BETA GAMMA ENERGY(MeV) ',
12979  3 ' TOF(deg) TOF(sec)')
12980  WRITE(16,1788) bcog,gcog,ecog-xmat,tcogdg,tcog
12981 1788 FORMAT(' COG ',f7.5,3x,e12.5,1x,e12.5,3x,e12.5,3x,e12.5)
12982  WRITE(16,165) beref,gamref,enref-xmat,trefdg,tref
12983 165 FORMAT(' REF ',f7.5,3x,e12.5,1x,e12.5,3x,e12.5,3x,e12.5)
12984  tofprt=tref
12985 ! iprint=1: full print ( in case of pbmes)
12986  iprint=0
12987  call statis
12988  xk1=fh/vref
12989 ! --- predictor of the average beta:BEMY.
12990  beref=vref/vl
12991  gamref = 1./sqrt(1.-(beref*beref))
12992 ! DPHASE : PHASE AT THE MIDDLE OF THE CELL (rad)
12993  dphete=etcell(12)
12994  dphase=etcell(12)*pi/180.
12995 ! 15/12/09 dpherd=dphase
12996 ! 15/12/09 ttvol=0.
12997 ! --- The option TOF is passive in the DTL
12998 ! t.o.f. at the middle of the cell
12999 ! 15/12/09 if(itvol) then
13000 ! 15/12/09 tvolm=ylg/(2.*vref)
13001 ! 15/12/09 ttvol=(ttvols+tvolm)
13002 ! 15/12/09 endif
13003 ! 15/12/09 adjust the phase of RF w.r.t. TOF
13004 ! 15/12/09 if(itvol.and.imamin) then
13005 ! 15/12/09 odphase=dphase
13006 ! 15/12/09 ottvol=fh*ttvol*180./pi
13007 ! 15/12/09 attvol=ottvol
13008 ! 15/12/09 xkpi=ottvol/360.
13009 ! 15/12/09 ixkpi=int(xkpi)
13010 ! 15/12/09 xkpi=(xkpi-float(ixkpi))*360.
13011 ! 15/12/09 dphase=dphase-xkpi*pi/180.
13012 ! 15/12/09 endif
13013  aqst=abs(qst)
13014  ddw=aqst*t0*cos(dphase)
13015  enrefs=enref+ddw
13016  gams= enrefs/xmat
13017  bets=sqrt(1.-1./(gams*gams))
13018  xk2=fh/(bets*vl)
13019  bemy=(gams*bets+gamref*beref)/(gams+gamref)
13020  xkm=fh/(bemy*vl)
13021  xkg=2.*pi/ylg
13022 ! --- average phase of RF at entrance
13023  saphi=dphase
13024  sapho=saphi
13025  eqvl=ylg
13026  dkg=(xkm-xkg)
13027  dts=tp0/t0
13028  fk1=2.*dts
13029  fpk0=(tp0*tp0+t0*tpp0)/(t0*t0)
13030  fpk1=2.*tp0**2/(t0*t0)
13031  fpk=2.*(fpk0-fpk1)
13032  pcrest=atan(-sk/tk)
13033  ddw=aqst*(tk*cos(pcrest)-sk*sin(pcrest))/2.
13034  IF(ddw.LT.0.) pcrest=pcrest+pi
13035  peqvl=ylg/2.
13036  sclen=ylg
13037 ! 15/12/09 if(.not.imamin) then
13038  WRITE(16,1555)fh/(2.*pi),ylg,dphase*180./pi
13039 1555 FORMAT(4x,'FREQENCY :',e12.5,' Hertz',/,4x,
13040  x 'GAP LENGTH :',e12.5,' cm',/,4x,
13041  x 'PHASE of RF (middle of the gap) :',e12.5,'deg',/)
13042 ! 15/12/09 else
13043 ! 15/12/09 WRITE(16,1556)FH/(2.*pi),YLG,DPHASE*180./PI,odphase
13044 ! 15/12/09 1556 FORMAT(4X,'FREQENCY :',E12.5,' Hertz',/,4x,
13045 ! 15/12/09 x 'GAP LENGTH :',e12.5,' cm',/,4x,
13046 ! 15/12/09 x 'phase of RF after adjustement:',e12.5,'deg',/,4x,
13047 ! 15/12/09 * 'phase of RF before adjustment',e12.5,'deg')
13048 ! 15/12/09 endif
13049 ! --- Follow ITERATIONS giving:
13050 ! The equivalent field length (cm)
13051 ! The asociated drift length (cm)
13052 ! The slip of phase (rd)
13053 ! The energy gain (MeV)
13054 ! The phase jump (rd)
13055 ! The average k (cm-1)
13056 ! The transit time coefficients (MeV,cm)
13057 ! The phase crest (rad)
13058 ! The phase offset at entrance (rad)
13059  eqvl=ylg
13060  dkg=(xkm-xkg)
13061  fpk=2.*(fpk0-fpk1)
13062  til2=0.
13063  DO it=1,3
13064 ! slip of phase and equivalent field length
13065  IF(it.EQ.1) phslip=-4.*atan(3.2*dts/eqvl)
13066  IF(phslip.NE.0.) THEN
13067  til2=phslip/2.
13068  DO iiii=1,4
13069  gx=1./tan(til2)-1./til2
13070  gpx=-1./(sin(til2)*sin(til2)) + 1./(til2*til2)
13071  gppx=2.*cos(til2)/(sin(til2)**3) - 2./(til2*til2*til2)
13072  hx=gpx/(gx*gx) -2.*fpk/(fk1**2)
13073  dhx=-(2.*gx*gpx*gpx-gx*gx*gppx)/(gx**4)
13074  til2=til2-hx/dhx
13075  eqvl=sqrt(abs(2.*fpk/gpx))
13076  IF(abs(hx).LE.1.e-05) EXIT
13077  ENDDO
13078  phslip=til2*2.
13079  ENDIF
13080  peqvl=ylg/2.
13081  asdl=peqvl-eqvl/2.
13082 ! ENERGY GAIN AND PHASE JUMP (i.e. DELPHR)
13083 ! saphi=sapho-pcrest+ttvol*fh
13084  saphi=sapho-pcrest+ttvol
13085 ! TESTsv05.05.2011 saphi=sapho-pcrest
13086  f0=xitl0(gamref,gams,bemy,saphi,aqst)
13087  delwrm=(f0-gamref)*xmat
13088  enrs=enref+delwrm
13089  gams= enrs/xmat
13090  bets=sqrt(1.-1./(gams*gams))
13091  xk2=fh0/bets
13092  coeph=fh*aqst/(vl*xmat)
13093  f2=xitl2(gamref,gams,bemy,saphi,aqst)
13094  delphr= coeph * f2
13095  xkm=delphr/eqvl + xk2*(1.+asdl/eqvl) - xk1*asdl/eqvl
13096  bemy=fh0/xkm
13097 ! TRANSIT TIME FACTORS
13098  dkg=(xkm-xkg)
13099  tk=tk0+dkg*tpk0+dkg*dkg*tppk0/2.+dkg**3*tp3k0/6.+
13100  x dkg**4*tp4k0/24.
13101  t1k=tpk0+dkg*tppk0+dkg*dkg*tp3k0/2.+dkg**3*tp4k0/6.
13102  t2k=tppk0+dkg*tp3k0+dkg*dkg*tp4k0/2.
13103  t3k=tp3k0+dkg*tp4k0
13104  t4k=tp4k0
13105  sk=sk0+dkg*spk0+dkg*dkg*sppk0/2.+dkg**3*sp3k0/6.+
13106  x dkg**4*sp4k0/24.
13107  s1k=spk0+dkg*sppk0+dkg*dkg*sp3k0/2.+dkg**3*sp4k0/6.
13108  s2k=sppk0+dkg*sp3k0+dkg*dkg*sp4k0/2.
13109  s3k=sp3k0+dkg*sp4k0
13110  s4k=sp4k0
13111 ! PHASE CREST
13112  pcrest=atan(-sk/tk)
13113  ddw=aqst*(tk*cos(pcrest)-sk*sin(pcrest))/2.
13114  IF(ddw.LT.0.) pcrest=pcrest+pi
13115  ENDDO
13116 ! CREST VALUE = SQCTTF*(PHSLIP/2)/SIN(PHSLIP/2)
13117  sqcttf=til2*sqrt(tk*tk+sk*sk)/sin(til2) *2.
13118 ! THE synchronous particle IS BASED ON CHARGE STATE : QMOY =AQST
13119  cfh=fh/(vl*2.*xmat)
13120  ckh=qmoy*qmoy/(4.*xmat*xmat)
13121  call gap(gamref,saphi,gams,delphr)
13122 ! output of the element
13123 ! new PHARES,TREFS to be in accordance with GENAC
13124  phares=saphi+fh*ylg/vref+delphr
13125  trefs=tref+ylg/(bets*vl)+delphr/fh
13126  phared=(phares-saphi)*180./pi
13127  tredg=fh*trefs *180./pi
13128  write(16,*) ' PARAMETERS RELATING TO THE REFERENCE PARTICLE '
13129  write(16,*) '************************************************'
13130  write(16,*) ' ENERGY GAIN(MeV): ',delwrm,' TOF(DEG) ',tredg
13131 ! write(16,*) ' PHASE JUMP(DEG): ',sphrfs*180./PI
13132  write(16,*) ' CREST PHASE OF RF (DG): ',
13133  * pcrest*180./pi
13134  write(16,*) ' PHASE OF RF AT THE MIDDLE (DG): ',sapho*180./pi
13135  write(16,*) ' PHASE OF RF AT THE ENTRANCE (DG): ',saphi*180./pi
13136  write(16,*) ' AVERAGE k (cm-1) (freq./velocity): ',xkm
13137  write(16,*) ' TRANSIT TIME FACTORS (MeV-cm):'
13138  write(16,*) ' T dT/dk d2T/dk2 ',tk,t1k,t2k
13139  WRITE(16,*) ' S dS/dk d2S/dk2 ',sk,s1k,s2k
13140  write(16,*) ' PHASE SLIP(DEG) ',phslip*180./pi
13141  write(16,*)
13142  write(16,*) ' PARAMETERS RELATING TO THE EQUIVALENT FIELD '
13143  write(16,*) '************************************************'
13144  WRITE(16,171)eqvl
13145 171 FORMAT(' length :',e12.5,' cm ')
13146  write(16,*) ' Associated drift length: ',asdl,' cm'
13147  WRITE(16,*)' magnitude: ',sqcttf,' MV/cm'
13148  iarg=1
13149  call cdg(iarg)
13150  encog=cog(1)
13151  gcog=encog/xmat
13152  bcog=sqrt(1.-1./(gcog*gcog))
13153  tcog=cog(3)
13154  CALL ext2d(1)
13155 ! sup phnew=-(int(tcog*fh/pi+0.5)-tcog*fh/pi)*180.
13156 ! sup dav1(idav,7)=phnew
13157  dav1(idav,37)=saphi*180./pi
13158 ! 15/12/09 if(itvol) then
13159 ! 15/12/09 dav1(idav,38)=dphete
13160 ! 15/12/09 dav1(idav,39)=dphase*180./pi
13161 ! 15/12/09 else
13162  dav1(idav,38)=dphete
13163 ! 15/12/09 endif
13164 ! end print in the file: 'short.data'
13165  WRITE(16,3777)
13166 3777 FORMAT(/,3x,3(1h*),' DYNAMICS AT THE OUTPUT: ',/,
13167  2 5x,' BETA dW(MeV) ENERGY(MeV) ',
13168  4 ' TOF(deg) TOF(sec)')
13169  write(16,3473) bets,delwrm,enrs-xmat,fh*trefs*180./pi,trefs
13170 3473 FORMAT(' REF ',f7.5,3x,f10.6,3x,f8.3,3x,e12.5,3x,e12.5)
13171  WRITE(16,1789) bcog,encog-enold,encog-xmat,tcog*fh*180./pi,tcog
13172 1789 FORMAT(' COG ',f7.5,3x,f10.6,3x,f8.3,3x,e12.5,3x,e12.5)
13173 ! trace3d
13174 ! split cell into drif-gap-drift
13175  kt3t=kt3t+1
13176  write(tif,6001) kt3t,kt3t,10.*etcell(4)/2.
13177 6001 format(' nt(',i4,')= 1, a(1,',i4,')=',f12.6)
13178  trace3t(kt3t)=tif
13179 !
13180  trphase=etcell(12)
13181 ! tre0tl=etcell(11)*etcell(5)*etcell(4)/100.
13182  tre0tl=delwrm/cos(pi*trphase/180.)
13183  kt3t=kt3t+1
13184  write(tif,6005) kt3t,kt3t,tre0tl,trphase,fid
13185 6005 format(' nt(',i4,')=10, a(1,',i4,')=',f9.5,' , ',f9.2,
13186  & ', 1., 1.,',f5.3,',')
13187  trace3t(kt3t)=tif
13188 !
13189  kt3t=kt3t+1
13190  write(tif,6001) kt3t,kt3t,10.*etcell(4)/2.
13191  trace3t(kt3t)=tif
13192 ! end trace3d drift-gap-drift
13193  testca=exten(1)*exten(2)*exten(3)
13194  epsil=1.e-40
13195  IF(abs(testca).gt.epsil) THEN
13196  qdisp=2.*sqrt(exten(1))
13197  qmd=exten(1)*exten(3)-exten(2)**2
13198  sqmdv=4.*pi*sqrt(qmd)
13199  surm=4.*pi*sqrt(qmd)*180./pi
13200  qdp=2.*sqrt(exten(3))
13201  cor12=exten(2)/sqrt(exten(1)*exten(3))
13202  qdpde=qdp*180./pi
13203  ELSE
13204  qdisp=0.
13205  qmd=0.
13206  sqmdv=0.
13207  surm=0.
13208  qdp=0.
13209  cor12=0.
13210  pent12=0.
13211  pent21=0.
13212  qdpde=0.
13213  ENDIF
13214  trqtx=exten(4)*exten(5)-exten(8)**2
13215  trqpy=exten(6)*exten(7)-exten(9)**2
13216  qditax=2.*sqrt(exten(4))
13217  qdiant=2.*sqrt(exten(5))
13218  qditay=2.*sqrt(exten(6))
13219  qdianp=2.*sqrt(exten(7))
13220  surxth=4.*pi*sqrt(trqtx)
13221  suryph=4.*pi*sqrt(trqpy)
13222  IF(shift) THEN
13223  vref=bets*vl
13224  tref=trefs
13225  ELSE
13226  vref=bcog*vl
13227  tref=tcog
13228  ENDIF
13229  if(itvol) then
13230  ttvols=tref
13231 ! 15/12/09 attvol=fh*ttvols*180./pi
13232 ! 15/12/09 write(16,7456) ottvol,attvol
13233  endif
13234 ! 15/12/09 7456 format(2x,'***tof at input: ',e12.5,' deg',/,
13235 ! 15/12/09 * 2x,'***tof at output: ',e12.5,' deg')
13236  call statis
13237 ! PROFIL (plot)
13238  prlab(iprf)='CAVSC '
13239  CALL stapl(dav1(idav,24))
13240  dltaw=qdisp*xmat*bcog*bcog/sqrt(1.-bcog*bcog)
13241 ! sup WRITE(16,9998) SQMDV
13242 ! sup9998 FORMAT(2X,' EMITTANCE (norm): ',
13243 ! sup * E12.5,' PI*MEV*RAD')
13244 ! print in the file: 'dynac.dmp':
13245 ! gap number, phase offset(deg), relativistic beta, energy(MeV), horz. emit.(mm*mrd,norm), vert. emit.(mm*mrd,norm),long. emit(keV*sec)
13246 ! dav1(idav,16): Emittance(norm) x-xp (mm*mrad)
13247  dav1(idav,16)=bcog*surxth*10./(pi*sqrt(1.-bcog*bcog))
13248 ! dav1(idav,21): Emittance(norm) y-yp (mm*mrad)
13249  dav1(idav,21)=bcog*suryph*10./(pi*sqrt(1.-bcog*bcog))
13250  dav1(idav,25)=ndtl
13251  emns=1.e12*sqmdv/(pi*fh)
13252  trfprt=fh*tref*180./pi
13253  tcgprt=fh*tcog*180./pi
13254 ! n2kp=int(tofprt/360.)
13255 ! tofprt=tofprt-float(n2kp)*360.
13256 ! if(tofprt.gt.180.) tofprt=tofprt-360.
13257 ! cavity number, z(m), transmission (%), synchronous phase (deg), time of flight (deg) (cog), COG relativistic beta (@ output)
13258 ! COG output energy (MeV), time of flight (deg) (REF), REF relativistic beta (@ output), REF output energy (MeV),
13259 ! horizontal emittance (mm.mrad, RMS normalized), vertical emittance (mm.mrad, RMS normalized),
13260 ! longitudinal emittance (RMS, ns.keV)
13261  trnsms=100.*float(ngood)/float(imax)
13262  if(ndtl.eq.1) write(50,*) '# gap.dmp'
13263  if(ndtl.eq.1) write(50,*) '# gap Z trans ',
13264  * 'PHIs TOF(COG) COG Wcog TOF(REF) ',
13265  * ' REF Wref Ex,RMS,n Ey,RMS,n ',
13266  * 'El,RMS dWref EffVolt'
13267  if(ndtl.eq.1) write(50,*) '# # (m) (%) ',
13268  * '(deg) (deg) beta (MeV) (deg) ',
13269  * ' beta (MeV) (mm.mrad) (mm.mrad) ',
13270  * '(ns.keV) (MeV) (MV)'
13271  write(50,7023) ndtl,0.01*davtot,trnsms,dphete,tcgprt,
13272  * bcog,encog-xmat,trfprt,bets,enrs-xmat,
13273  * 0.25*dav1(idav,16),0.25*dav1(idav,21),0.25*emns,delwrm,tre0tl
13274 7023 format(1x,i4,1x,e12.5,1x,f6.2,1x,f7.2,1x,
13275  * 2(e14.7,1x,f7.5,1x,e14.7,1x),5(e12.5,1x))
13276 ! RIGIDITY of the ref. prtcle
13277  gref=1./sqrt(1.-bets*bets)
13278  xmor=xmat*bets*gref
13279  boro=33.356*xmor*1.e-01/qst
13280  WRITE(16,*) ilost,' particles are lost in element ',ndtl
13281  write(16,*)
13282  call emiprt(0)
13283  return
13284  end
13285 
13290  SUBROUTINE gap(GAMREF,SAPHI,GAMS,DELPHR)
13291  implicit real(8) (a-h,o-z)
13292  parameter(iptsz=100002,maxcell=3000,maxcell1=3000)
13293  common/ttfs/dynt(maxcell),dyntp(maxcell),dyntpp(maxcell),
13294  * dyne0(maxcell),dynph(maxcell),dynlg(maxcell),fhpar,nc
13295  common/posi/ist
13296  common/midgap/enmil,vapmi
13297  common/azmtch/dlg,xmcph,xmce
13298  common/azlist/icont,iprin
13299  common/itvole/itvol,imamin
13300  common/func/a(200),ylg,atte,ncel,nharm
13301 ! TRANSIT TIME COEFFICIENTS
13302  common/ttfc/tk,t1k,t2k,sk,s1k,s2k,fh
13303 ! ***************************************************************
13304  common/bedycp/phslip,eqvl,asdl,peqvl,pavph,xkp1,xkp2,
13305  * aa,bb,cc,dd,ee,pcrest,sqcttf
13306  common/jacob/gaks,gaps
13307  common/iter1/dxdki,dphii,phi,dkmske,dkmsphi,retph,xkmi,xkm,
13308  * dxk00,tke,t1ke,ske,s1ke,phiwc,xk1i,xk1ii,xk2ii
13309 ! functions in COS(DXDPT)
13310  common/iterco/yh11t,yh1k1t,yh1k01t,yh10pkt,yh11pkt,yh1p1t,
13311  * h1akit,h1akimt,h1akmt,hapit,happit
13312 ! functions in SIN(DXDPT)
13313  common/itersi/yh21t,yh2k1t,yh2k01t,yh2p1t,yh20pkt,yh21pkt,
13314  * h1bkit,h1bkimt,h1bkmt,hbpit,hbppit
13315  common/tranrs/sa11,sa12,sa21,sa22,sact11,sact12,sact21,sact22
13316 ! --- routine XTYPL1
13317  common/typl1/yh1k0,yh1k1,yp1k1,yp1k2,yh1k00,yh1k01,yp1k01,
13318  x yp1k02,yh10,yh11,yp11,yp12
13319  common/typl2/yh2k0,yh2k1,yp2k1,yp2k2,yh2k00,yh2k01,yp2k01,
13320  x yp2k02,yh20,yh21,yp21,yp22
13321  common/typi1/ye1k0,ye1k1,ye1k2,ye1kc0,ye1kc1,ye1kc2,
13322  x ye10,ye11,ye12
13323  common/typi2/ye2k0,ye2k1,ye2k2,ye2kc0,ye2kc1,ye2kc2,
13324  x ye20,ye21,ye22
13325  common/thad2/h0aki,h0akim,h0akm,h0bki,h0bkim,h0bkm,
13326  x h1aki,h1akim,h1akm,h1bki,h1bkim,h1bkm
13327 ! --- routine XTYPLP1
13328  common/typlp1/yh1p1,yh2p1,hapi,hbpi
13329 ! --- routine XTYPL2
13330  common/typlp2/happi,hbppi
13331 ! --- routine XTYLPK
13332  common/typlpk/yh10pk,yh11pk,yh20pk,yh21pk
13333 ! Integrals of E(z)**2
13334 ! --- routine XTYPJ
13335  common/typj/yfsk0,yfsk1,yfsk2,yfsp0,yfsp1,yfsp2,
13336  x yfskc0,yfskc1,yfskc2,yfsck0,yfsck1,yfsck2,
13337  x yfscp0,yfscp1,yfscp2,yfs0,yfs1,yfs2
13338 ! --- routine XTYPM
13339  common/typm/ynsk0,ynsk1,ynsk2,ynsp0,ynsp1,ynsp2,
13340  x ynsk0c,ynsk1c,ynsk2c,yns0,yns1,yns2
13341 ! ********************************************************************
13342  common/faisc/f(10,iptsz),imax,ngood
13343  common/qmoyen/qmoy
13344  common/rigid/boro
13345  common/beamsa/fs(7,iptsz)
13346  common/cdek/dwp(iptsz)
13347  common/sc3/beamc,scdist,sce10,cplm,ect,apl,ichaes,iscsp
13348  COMMON /consta/ vl, pi, xmat, rpel,qst
13349  common/dyn/tref,vref
13350  common/tapes/in,ifile,meta
13351  common/etcom/cog(8),exten(17),fd(iptsz)
13352  common/speda/dave,idave
13353  common/shif/dtiph,shift
13354  common/davcom/dav1(maxcell1,40),davtot,iitem(maxcell1),idav
13355  common/etcha1/ichas(iptsz),chexmin(10),chexmax(10),chasit
13356  common/dcspa/iesp
13357  common/fene/wdisp,wphas,wx,wy,rlim,ifw
13358  common/appel/irstay,ilost,iavp,ispcel
13359  common/posc/xpsc
13360  common/pstpla/tstp
13361  common/rander/ialin
13362  common/cgtof/charm(20),cgtdv(20),nbch(20),netac
13363  logical iesp,ichaes,irstay,iavp,ispcel,ialin
13364  LOGICAL SHIFT,CHASIT,ITVOL,IMAMIN,DAVE
13365  CHARACTER*(8) PRTLAB
13366 ! ***** DWRFS(MeV): gain of energy of the fictitious reference
13367 ! ***** SPHRFS(rad): phase jump
13368 ! ***** PHRFS(rad): phase
13369 ! ***** NGDRF: position of the reference in the array f(10,iptsz)
13370 ! **** common/parmrf/DWRFS,SPHRFS,PHRFS,ngdrf
13371  fh0=fh/vl
13372 ! iesp is used in s.c. routines : iesp=.false. == > accel. element
13373  iesp=.false.
13374  iavp=.true.
13375  ipas=2
13376  dcum=ylg
13377  prtlab='GAP '
13378 ! random errors in alignment
13379  if(ialin) call randali
13380 ! Random variation on the phase for each particle
13381  varpha=0.
13382 ! INTEGRALS REQUIRED BY THE EXPANSIONS IN LONGITUDINAL MOTION (ALL THE ELEMENT)
13383 ! ( computations of the average k and slip of phase from which are computed deltk delphi,..)
13384 ! * valero 08/08/07
13385  aqmoy=abs(qst)
13386 !omment aqmoy=qst
13387 ! *
13388  CALL xtypl1(gamref,saphi,aqmoy,dcum)
13389 ! see here equations 88 and 106 of Part. Acc. 1994 vol44 pp215-255
13390  cxlg=aqmoy/(4.*xmat*eqvl)
13391  gami=gamref
13392  dkmp= (gami*gami-1.)**(1.5)*(gams*gams-1.)**(-1.5)
13393  dkms= dkmp*(1.+asdl/eqvl)
13394  x +yh1k01*fh0*cxlg/eqvl -asdl/eqvl
13395  dkm1= -gaks*(gams*gams-1.)**(-1.5)*fh0*(1.+asdl/eqvl)
13396 ! DKMSKE :(eq.106, see article of Part.Acc.)
13397  dkmske=dkms/(1.-yh1k1*cxlg*fh0/eqvl-dkm1)
13398  CALL xtypl2(gamref,saphi,aqmoy,dcum)
13399  CALL xtyplp1(gamref,saphi,aqmoy,dcum)
13400  CALL xtylpk(gamref,saphi,aqmoy,dcum)
13401  dphsph1=(yh1p1-yh21)*cxlg*fh0
13402  dkmsphi=-fh0*(gams*gams-1.)**(-1.5)*gaps*(1.+asdl/eqvl)+
13403  x dphsph1/eqvl
13404 ! These integrals are saved
13405  gakst=gaks
13406  gapst=gaps
13407 ! functions in COS(DXDPT)
13408  yh11t=yh11
13409  yh1k1t=yh1k1
13410  yh1k01t=yh1k01
13411  yh10pkt=yh10pk
13412  yh11pkt=yh11pk
13413  yh1p1t=yh1p1
13414  h1akit=h1aki
13415  h1akimt=h1akim
13416  h1akmt=h1akm
13417  hapit=hapi
13418  happit=happi
13419 ! functions in SIN(DXDPT)
13420  yh21t=yh21
13421  yh2k1t=yh2k1
13422  yh2k01t=yh2k01
13423  yh2p1t=yh2p1
13424  yh20pkt=yh20pk
13425  yh21pkt=yh21pk
13426  h1bkit=h1bki
13427  h1bkimt=h1bkim
13428  h1bkmt=h1bkm
13429  hbpit=hbpi
13430  hbppit=hbppi
13431  if(ichaes.and.ispcel) then
13432  ipas=1
13433  write(16,*)' SPACE CHARGE ACTING ON LENGTH: ',scdist,' CM'
13434  dcum=ylg*xpsc
13435  write(16,*)' POSITION OF S.C. COMPUTATION: ',dcum,' CM'
13436 ! computation of the integrals in the middle of the cavity
13437 ! INTEGRALS E(z)*(BG)**-3 *z**n n=0,1
13438 ! INTEGRALS dE(z)/dt*(BG)**-3 *z**n n=0,1,2
13439  call xtypl1(gamref,saphi,aqmoy,dcum)
13440  istm=ist-1
13441 ! INTEGRALS ON SECOND DERIVATIVES k HA0(Z) & HB0(Z)
13442  call xtypl2(gamref,saphi,aqmoy,dcum)
13443 ! 1st,2nd,3rd DERIVATIVES ON PHASE,HA0(Z) & HB0(Z)
13444  call xtyplp1(gamref,saphi,aqmoy,dcum)
13445 ! DERIVATIVES COUPLED ON PHASE, K FUNCTIONS HA0(Z) & HB0(Z)
13446  call xtylpk(gamref,saphi,aqmoy,dcum)
13447 ! TRANSVERSE INTEGRALS TYPE J & M
13448  call xtypj(gamref,saphi,aqmoy,dcum)
13449  call xtypm(gamref,saphi,aqmoy,dcum)
13450  endif
13451  DO
13452  if(ipas.eq.2) then
13453  dcum=ylg
13454  gaks=gakst
13455  gaps=gapst
13456 ! --- COS(DXDPT)
13457  yh11=yh11t
13458  yh1k1=yh1k1t
13459  yh1k01=yh1k01t
13460  yh10pk=yh10pkt
13461  yh11pk=yh11pkt
13462  yh1p1=yh1p1t
13463  h1aki=h1akit
13464  h1akim=h1akimt
13465  h1akm=h1akmt
13466  hapi=hapit
13467  happi=happit
13468 ! --- SIN(DXDPT)
13469  yh21=yh21t
13470  yh2k1=yh2k1t
13471  yh2k01=yh2k01t
13472  yh2p1=yh2p1t
13473  yh20pk=yh20pkt
13474  yh21pk=yh21pkt
13475  h1bki=h1bkit
13476  h1bkim=h1bkimt
13477  h1bkm=h1bkmt
13478  hbpi=hbpit
13479  hbppi=hbppit
13480  call xtypl1(gamref,saphi,aqmoy,dcum)
13481 ! INTEGRALS ON SECOND DERIVATIVES k HA0(Z) & HB0(Z)
13482  call xtypl2(gamref,saphi,aqmoy,dcum)
13483 ! 1st,2nd,3rd DERIVATIVES ON PHASE,HA0(Z) & HB0(Z)
13484  call xtyplp1(gamref,saphi,aqmoy,dcum)
13485 ! DERIVATIVES COUPLED ON PHASE, K FUNCTIONS HA0(Z) & HB0(Z)
13486  call xtylpk(gamref,saphi,aqmoy,dcum)
13487 ! TRANSVERSE INTEGRALS TYPE J & M
13488  call xtypj(gamref,saphi,aqmoy,dcum)
13489  call xtypm(gamref,saphi,aqmoy,dcum)
13490  endif
13491  sa11=1.
13492  sa12=0.
13493  sa21=0.
13494  sa22=1.
13495  sact11=1.
13496  sact12=0.
13497  sact21=0.
13498  sact22=1.
13499 ! SAVE BEAM
13500  do is=1,ngood
13501  do js=1,7
13502  fs(js,is)=f(js,is)
13503  enddo
13504  enddo
13505  call boucle(ipas,gamref,saphi,dcum,delphr)
13506 ! Reshuffles f(i,j) array after boucle
13507  call shuffle
13508  IF(ipas.EQ.1) THEN
13509 ! compute the space charge on the beam (except the reference)
13510 ! call stapl at the position of space charge computation
13511 !*et*26-Jul-2014 call stapl(tstp)
13512  if(iscsp.eq.1) then
13513  ini=1
13514  call hersc(ini)
13515  ini=2
13516  call hersc(ini)
13517  endif
13518  if(iscsp.eq.2) CALL schermi
13519  if(iscsp.eq.3) CALL scheff1(1)
13520 ! ----- window control
13521  write(16,*) 'Checking for lost particles'
13522  call reject(ilost,prtlab)
13523 ! second step of the gap
13524  ipas=2
13525  iavp=.false.
13526  ELSE
13527 ! end of space charge computation
13528  exit
13529  ENDIF
13530  ENDDO
13531 ! charateristics of the beam
13532 ! 18/03/2009 if (dave) then
13533 ! 18/03/2009 gimax=f(7,ngood)/xmat
13534 ! 18/03/2009 bimax=sqrt(1.-1./(gimax*gimax))
13535 ! 18/03/2009 dav1(idav,3)=bimax
13536 ! 18/03/2009 dav1(idav,4)=f(7,ngood)-xmat
13537 ! 18/03/2009 dav1(idav,5)=-(INT(f(6,ngood)*FH/PI+0.5)-
13538 ! 18/03/2009 * f(6,ngood)*FH/PI)*180.
13539 ! 18/03/2009 dav1(idav,38)=dphase*180./pi
13540 ! 18/03/2009 endif
13541 ! ---- WINDOW CONTROL
13542  call reject(ilost,prtlab)
13543 ! Reshuffles f(i,j) array after window (now done in 'reject')
13544 ! call shuffle
13545  RETURN
13546  END
13547 
13551  SUBROUTINE cogetc
13552  implicit real(8) (a-h,o-z)
13553  parameter(iptsz=100002)
13554  common/faisc/f(10,iptsz),imax,ngood
13555  common/cgtof/charm(20),cgtdv(20),nbch(20),netac
13556  itot=0
13557  n=1
13558  do i=1,20
13559  nbch(i)=0
13560  enddo
13561  charm(n)=f(9,1)
13562 100 continue
13563  do i=1,ngood
13564  if(f(9,i).eq.charm(n)) nbch(n)=nbch(n)+1
13565  enddo
13566 ! the following charge states
13567  itot=itot+nbch(n)
13568  if(itot.lt.ngood) then
13569  do i=1,ngood
13570  do j=1,n
13571  if(f(9,i).eq.charm(j)) go to 120
13572  enddo
13573  if(f(9,i).ne.charm(n)) then
13574  n=n+1
13575  charm(n)=f(9,i)
13576  go to 100
13577  endif
13578 120 continue
13579  enddo
13580  endif
13581 ! compute the cog of TOF for each charge state
13582  do i=1,n
13583  cgtdv(i)=0.
13584  do j=1,ngood
13585  if(f(9,j).eq.charm(i)) cgtdv(i)=cgtdv(i)+f(6,j)
13586  enddo
13587  cgtdv(i)=cgtdv(i)/float(nbch(i))
13588 ! write(16,*)'i,nch,cgtdv=',i,nbch(i),cgtdv(i),charm(i)
13589  enddo
13590  netac=n
13591  return
13592  end
13593 
13598  SUBROUTINE boucle(ipas,gamref,saphi,dcum,delphr)
13599  implicit real(8) (a-h,o-z)
13600  parameter(iptsz=100002)
13601  common/posi/ist
13602  common/midgap/enmil,vapmi
13603  common/azmtch/dlg,xmcph,xmce
13604  common/azlist/icont,iprin
13605  common/itvole/itvol,imamin
13606  common/iter1/dxdki,dphii,phi,dkmske,dkmsphi,retph,xkmi,xkm,
13607  * dxk00,tke,t1ke,ske,s1ke,phiwc,xk1i,xk1ii,xk2ii
13608  common/tranrs/sa11,sa12,sa21,sa22,sact11,sact12,sact21,sact22
13609  common/func/a(200),ylg,atte,ncel,nharm
13610  common/blvl/bflvl
13611 ! TRANSIT TIME COEFFICIENTS
13612  common/ttfc/tk,t1k,t2k,sk,s1k,s2k,fh
13613  common/ttfcb/t3k,t4k,s3k,s4k
13614  common/bedycp/phslip,eqvl,asdl,peqvl,pavph,xkp1,xkp2,
13615  * aa,bb,cc,dd,ee,pcrest,sqcttf
13616  common/jacob/gaks,gaps
13617  common/typl1/yh1k0,yh1k1,yp1k1,yp1k2,yh1k00,yh1k01,yp1k01,
13618  x yp1k02,yh10,yh11,yp11,yp12
13619  common/typl2/yh2k0,yh2k1,yp2k1,yp2k2,yh2k00,yh2k01,yp2k01,
13620  x yp2k02,yh20,yh21,yp21,yp22
13621  common/typi1/ye1k0,ye1k1,ye1k2,ye1kc0,ye1kc1,ye1kc2,
13622  x ye10,ye11,ye12
13623  common/typi2/ye2k0,ye2k1,ye2k2,ye2kc0,ye2kc1,ye2kc2,
13624  x ye20,ye21,ye22
13625  common/thad2/h0aki,h0akim,h0akm,h0bki,h0bkim,h0bkm,
13626  x h1aki,h1akim,h1akm,h1bki,h1bkim,h1bkm
13627 ! --- routine XTYPLP1
13628  common/typlp1/yh1p1,yh2p1,hapi,hbpi
13629 ! --- routine XTYPL2
13630  common/typlp2/happi,hbppi
13631 ! --- routine XTYLPK
13632  common/typlpk/yh10pk,yh11pk,yh20pk,yh21pk
13633 ! integrals of E(z)**2
13634 ! --- routine XTYPJ
13635  common/typj/yfsk0,yfsk1,yfsk2,yfsp0,yfsp1,yfsp2,
13636  x yfskc0,yfskc1,yfskc2,yfsck0,yfsck1,yfsck2,
13637  x yfscp0,yfscp1,yfscp2,yfs0,yfs1,yfs2
13638 ! E(z)**2 INTEGRALS (COMPLEMENTARY ELECTRIC FIELD)
13639 ! --- routine XTYPM
13640  common/typm/ynsk0,ynsk1,ynsk2,ynsp0,ynsp1,ynsp2,
13641  x ynsk0c,ynsk1c,ynsk2c,yns0,yns1,yns2
13642  common/faisc/f(10,iptsz),imax,ngood
13643  common/beamsa/fs(7,iptsz)
13644  common/cdek/dwp(iptsz)
13645  common/sc3/beamc,scdist,sce10,cplm,ect,apl,ichaes,iscsp
13646  common/consta/ vl, pi, xmat, rpel,qst
13647  common/dyn/tref,vref
13648  common/fene/wdisp,wphas,wx,wy,rlim,ifw
13649  common/tapes/in,ifile,meta
13650  common/dcspa/iesp
13651  common/tcav/sv1p(iptsz),sv2p(iptsz),sxv1p(iptsz),sxv2p(iptsz),
13652  * dwcis(iptsz),beini1(iptsz),phip(iptsz),
13653  * teglp(iptsz),dxdpip(iptsz),dxdkip(iptsz),
13654  * dxdptp(iptsz),dxk00p(iptsz),dphiip(iptsz),sauphcs(iptsz)
13655  common/iterco/yh11t,yh1k1t,yh1k01t,yh10pkt,yh11pkt,yh1p1t,
13656  * h1akit,h1akimt,h1akmt,hapit,happit
13657  common/itersi/yh21t,yh2k1t,yh2k01t,yh2p1t,yh20pkt,yh21pkt,
13658  * h1bkit,h1bkimt,h1bkmt,hbpit,hbppit
13659  common/appel/irstay,ilost,iavp,ispcel
13660  common/etcom/cog(8),exten(17),fd(iptsz)
13661  common/cgtof/charm(20),cgtdv(20),nbch(20),netac
13662  common/tofev/ttvols
13663  common/aerp/vphase,vfield,ierpf
13664  common/compt/nrres,nrtre,nrbunc,nrdbun
13665 ! ***** DWRFS(MeV): gain of energy of the fictitious reference
13666 ! ***** SPHRFS(rad):phase jump
13667 ! ***** PHRFS(rad):phase
13668 ! ***** NGDRF: position of the reference in the array f(10,iptsz)
13669 ! ***** common/parmrf/DWRFS,SPHRFS,PHRFS,ngdrf
13670  logical itvol,imamin,ispcel
13671  logical iesp,iavp,ichaes,irstay
13672  dimension vecx(1)
13673  character*(8) PRTLAB
13674  dimension lossreason(iptsz)
13675 ! lossreason= -2 --> energy
13676 ! lossreason= -1 --> phase
13677 ! lossreason= 0 --> not lost
13678 ! lossreason= 1 --> radius
13679 ! lossreason= 2 --> x position
13680 ! lossreason= 3 --> y position
13681  prtlab='CAV '
13682  ttvol=ttvols*fh
13683  fh0=fh/vl
13684  beref=sqrt(1.-1./(gamref*gamref))
13685  call cogetc
13686  tcog=0.
13687  gcog=0.
13688  do i=1,ngood
13689  gcog=gcog+f(7,i)/xmat
13690  tcog=tcog+f(6,i)
13691  enddo
13692  tcog=tcog/float(ngood)
13693  gcog=gcog/float(ngood)
13694  bcog=sqrt(1.-1./(gcog*gcog))
13695  wcg=(gcog-1.)*xmat
13696 ! ----- convert wdisp in dp/p (window control)
13697 ! ---- ifw = 0 ===> wdisp = dW/W
13698 ! ---- ifw = 1 ===> wdisp = dW (MeV)
13699 ! ----- convert wdisp in dp/p
13700  if(ifw.eq.0) dispr=gcog*gcog*wdisp/(gcog*(gcog+1.))
13701  if(ifw.eq.1) dispr=gcog*gcog*wdisp/(gcog*(gcog+1.)*wcg)
13702  DO 19 i=1,ngood
13703  IF(i.EQ.icont) THEN
13704  WRITE(16,*)'******************************************'
13705  WRITE(16,*)'*** FOLLOWED PARTICLE NUMBER: ',i
13706  IF(ipas.EQ.1)
13707  * WRITE(16,*) ' AT SPACE CHARGE POSITION'
13708  IF(ipas.EQ.2) WRITE(16,*) ' AT OUTPUT '
13709  WRITE(16,*)'******************************************'
13710  ENDIF
13711  if(iavp) then
13712  gini=f(7,i)/xmat
13713  beini=sqrt(1.-1./(gini*gini))
13714  fd(i)=(gini*beini)/(gcog*bcog)
13715  f6i=0.
13716  do istc=1,netac
13717  if(f(9,i).eq.charm(istc))f6i=f(6,i)-cgtdv(istc)
13718  enddo
13719 ! LONGITUDINAL WINDOW CONTROL
13720  if(fh*abs(f6i).ge.wphas) then
13721  f(8,i)=0.
13722  lossreason(i)=-1
13723  endif
13724  IF(abs(fd(i)-1.).GE.dispr) then
13725  f(8,i)=0.
13726  lossreason(i)=-2
13727  endif
13728 ! TRANSVERSE WINDOW CONTROL
13729  radiu=sqrt(f(2,i)*f(2,i)+f(4,i)*f(4,i))
13730  if(radiu.gt.rlim) then
13731  f(8,i)=0.
13732  lossreason(i)=1
13733  endif
13734  if(abs(f(2,i)).gt.wx) then
13735  f(8,i)=0.
13736  lossreason(i)=2
13737  endif
13738  if(abs(f(4,i)).gt.wy) then
13739  f(8,i)=0.
13740  lossreason(i)=3
13741  endif
13742  if(f(8,i).eq.0) then
13743  write(49,3928) prtlab,nrres,davtot/100.,i,int(f(1,i)),
13744  * f(2,i),f(3,i),f(4,i),f(5,i),f6i*fh*180./pi,f(7,i)-xmat,
13745  * f(9,i),lossreason(i)
13746 3928 FORMAT(1x,a8,1x,i4,1x,e12.5,i5,1x,i5,1x,6(f12.3,1x),1x,
13747  * f5.2,3x,i2)
13748  ilost=ilost+1
13749  if(ilost.ge.ngood) stop
13750  go to 19
13751  endif
13752 ! COMPUTATION OF AVERAGE K AND JUMP OF PHASE FOR THE CELL
13753 ! START IF BLOCK on ICONT
13754  IF(i.EQ.icont) THEN
13755  WRITE(16,558) f(2,i),f(3,i),f(4,i),f(5,i)
13756 558 FORMAT(1x,'* INPUT OF THE ELEMENT: ',/,1x,
13757  x '* X :',e12.5,' CM XP :',e12.5,' MRD',/,1x,
13758  x '* Y :',e12.5,' CM YP: ',e12.5,' MRD',/,1x,'*')
13759  f6dg=fh*f(6,i)*180./pi
13760  WRITE(16,*)' Tof(deg): ',f6dg,' ENER(MeV) ',f(7,i)-xmat
13761  ENDIF
13762  radiu=sqrt(f(2,i)*f(2,i)+f(4,i)*f(4,i))
13763  IF(radiu.LT.1.e-06) THEN
13764  dradiu=.001*sqrt(f(3,i)*f(3,i)+f(5,i)*f(5,i))
13765  ELSE
13766  dradiu=f(3,i)*.001*f(2,i)/radiu+f(4,i)*f(5,i)*.001/radiu
13767  ENDIF
13768 ! --- retph: phase delay between the actual particle and the reference
13769  retph=fh*(f(6,i)-tref)
13770 ! --- systematic or random defaults on the phase RF (not for the reference)
13771  if(ierpf.ne.0) then
13772  vphasi=vphase*pi/180.
13773 ! --- systematic default on the phase offset
13774  if(ierpf.eq.1) retph=retph+vphasi
13775 ! --- random error on phase offset
13776  if(ierpf.gt.1) then
13777  len=1
13778  call rlux(vecx,len)
13779  r1=(2.*vecx(1)-1.)*vphasi
13780  retph=retph+r1
13781  endif
13782  endif
13783  phi=saphi+retph
13784  IF(i.EQ.icont) write(16,*)
13785  * '* PHASE DELAY RELATIVE TO REFERENCE ',retph*180./pi,' DEG'
13786 ! --- the TTF are the ones of the reference particle based on the charge state qst (input)
13787 ! --- They are corrected in order to take into account the charge state of the current particle
13788 ! **** cort=-(1.-(qst/f(9,i)))
13789  cort=0.
13790  tkc=tk*cort+tk
13791  t1kc=t1k*cort+t1k
13792  t2kc=t2k*cort+t2k
13793  t3kc=t3k*cort+t3k
13794  t4kc=t4k*cort+t4k
13795  skc=sk*cort+sk
13796  s1kc=s1k*cort+s1k
13797  s2kc=s2k*cort+s2k
13798  s3kc=s3k*cort+s3k
13799  s4kc=s4k*cort+s4k
13800 ! cort1=qst/f(9,i)
13801  cort1=1.
13802 ! ************************************
13803 ! Predictor
13804  phase=phi
13805 ! DXKI0 : difference of energy betwen the reference and the actual particle
13806  dxki0=fh0*(1./beini-1./beref)
13807  dxdte=dxki0
13808  tke=tkc+dxdte*t1kc+dxdte*dxdte*t2kc/2.+dxdte**3*t3kc/6.+
13809  x dxdte**4*t4kc/24.
13810  ske=skc+dxdte*s1kc+dxdte*dxdte*s2kc/2.+dxdte**3*s3kc/6.+
13811  x dxdte**4*s4kc/24.
13812 ! TEST*******
13813 !cc TKE=TKC
13814 !cc SKE=SKC
13815 ! ******************************************
13816 ! --- systematic or random defaults on the field level (not for the reference)
13817  if(ierpf.ne.0) then
13818  if(ierpf.eq.1) then
13819  tke=tke*(1.+vfield)
13820  ske=ske*(1.+vfield)
13821  endif
13822  if(ierpf.gt.1) then
13823  len=1
13824  call rlux(vecx,len)
13825  r1=(2.*vecx(1)-1.)*vfield
13826  tke=tke*(1.+r1)
13827  ske=ske*(1.+r1)
13828  endif
13829  endif
13830  phiwc=phi+pavph
13831 ! TEST***********
13832 !ccc PHIWC=PHI
13833 ! *****************************************************
13834  ddwp=abs(f(9,i))*(tke*cos(phiwc)-ske*sin(phiwc))
13835  enpmt=f(7,i)+ddwp
13836  gamps=enpmt/xmat
13837  if(gamps.le.1.) f(8,i)=0.
13838  if(f(8,i).eq.0.) then
13839  ilost=ilost+1
13840  if(ilost.ge.ngood) stop
13841  go to 19
13842  endif
13843  betps=sqrt(1.-1./(gamps*gamps))
13844  xk1ii=fh0/beini
13845  xk2ii=fh0/betps
13846  xkmi=xk2ii+(xk2ii-xk1ii)*asdl/eqvl + delphr/eqvl
13847  xk1i=xk1ii-xkmi
13848  xk2i=xk2ii-xkmi
13849  bempy=fh0/xkmi
13850  sauphc=delphr
13851  dxdki=xkmi-xkm
13852  dphii=(xk1ii-xk2ii)*eqvl/10.+(xkp1+xkp2)/120.*eqvl**2
13853  x + xk1i*asdl
13854  DO ijk=1,3
13855 ! --- boucle IJK to improve TTF
13856  tke=tkc+dxdki*t1kc+dxdki*dxdki*t2kc/2.+dxdki**3*t3kc/6.+
13857  x dxdki**4*t4kc/24.
13858  t1ke=t1kc+dxdki*t2kc+dxdki*dxdki*t3kc/2.+dxdki**3*t4kc/6.
13859  ske=skc+dxdki*s1kc+dxdki*dxdki*s2kc/2.+dxdki**3*s3kc/6.+
13860  x dxdki**4*s4kc/24.
13861  s1ke=s1kc+dxdki*s2kc+dxdki*dxdki*s3kc/2.+dxdki**3*s4kc/6.
13862 ! TEST*********
13863 !cc TKE=TKC
13864 !cc T1KE=T1KC
13865 !cc SKE=SKC
13866 !cc S1KE=S1KC
13867 ! **********************************************************
13868 ! --- systematic or random defaults on the field level (not for the reference)
13869  if(ierpf.eq.1) then
13870  tke=tke*(1.+vfield)
13871  ske=ske*(1.+vfield)
13872  t1ke=t1ke*(1.+vfield)
13873  s1ke=s1ke*(1.+vfield)
13874  endif
13875  if(ierpf.gt.1) then
13876  len=1
13877  call rlux(vecx,len)
13878  r1=(2.*vecx(1)-1.)*vfield
13879  tke=tke*(1.+r1)
13880  ske=ske*(1.+r1)
13881  t1ke=t1ke*(1.+r1)
13882  s1ke=s1ke*(1.+r1)
13883  endif
13884  pcresi=0.
13885  dphci0=0.
13886 ! if(f(9,i).ne.qst) then
13887 ! --- new crest phase is PCRESI
13888 !cc PCRESI=ATAN(-SKE/TKE)
13889 !cc DDWC=abs(f(9,i))*(TKE*COS(PCRESI)-SKE*SIN(PCRESI))
13890 !cc IF(DDWC.LT.0.) PCRESI=PCRESI+PI
13891 ! --- DPHCI0 is the difference between the previous crest phase and the present one
13892 !cc DPHCI0=PCREST-PCRESI
13893 ! endif
13894 ! **************************************
13895 !cc PHIWC=PHI+DPHII-DPHCI0
13896 ! TEST********
13897  phiwc=phi+dphii
13898 ! ***********************************
13899 ! **** PHIWC=PHI+DPHII
13900  dwci=abs(f(9,i))*(tke*cos(phiwc)-ske*sin(phiwc))
13901  enrc=f(7,i)+dwci
13902  gacr=enrc/xmat
13903  becr=sqrt(1.-1./(gacr*gacr))
13904  xk2ii=fh0/becr
13905  cxlg=abs(f(9,i))/(4.*xmat*eqvl)
13906  dxdpi=retph-dphci0
13907 ! --- see Part. Acc., 1994, vol 44., pp. 215-255
13908 ! ---- relation 86
13909  dxdpt=dxdpi+dxk00*(1.-dkmske)*asdl-dxdpi*dkmsphi*asdl
13910  dxk00=fh0*(1./beini-1./beref)
13911  xlh11=(yh11t+dxk00*(dkmske*yh1k1t+yh1k01t))*cos(dxdpt)
13912  xlh11=xlh11+dxdpi*yh1p1t*cos(dxdpt)
13913 ! second derivative of Ha0(Z) (division by 2 has been made)
13914  xlh112=dxk00*dxk00*(h1akit+h1akimt*dkmske+
13915  x h1akmt*dkmske*dkmske)*cos(dxdpt)
13916  xlh112=xlh112+dxdpi*dxdpi*hapit*cos(dxdpt)
13917  xlh112=xlh112+dxdpi*dxk00*(yh10pkt+
13918  x dkmske*yh11pkt)*cos(dxdpt)
13919 ! third derivative of Ha0(Z)
13920  xlh113=(dxdpi**3)/3.*happit*cos(dxdpt)
13921  xlh11=xlh11+xlh112+xlh113
13922 ! first derivative of Hb0(Z)
13923  xlh21=(yh21t+dxk00*(dkmske*yh2k1t+yh2k01t))*sin(dxdpt)
13924  xlh21=xlh21+dxdpi*yh2p1t*sin(dxdpt)
13925 ! second derivative of Hb0(Z) (division by 2 has been made)
13926  xlh212=dxk00*dxk00*(h1bkit+h1bkimt*dkmske +
13927  x h1bkmt*dkmske**2)*sin(dxdpt)
13928  xlh212=xlh212+dxdpi*dxdpi*hbpit*sin(dxdpt)
13929  xlh212=xlh212+dxdpi*dxk00*(yh20pkt+
13930  x dkmske*yh21pkt)*sin(dxdpt)
13931 ! third derivative of of Hb0(Z)
13932  xlh213=(dxdpi**3)/3.*hbppit*sin(dxdpt)
13933  xlh21=xlh21+xlh212+xlh213
13934  xlh1i=cxlg*(xlh11-xlh21)
13935 ! --- SAUPHC is the jump of phase
13936  sauphc=fh0*xlh1i
13937 ! --- XKMI: AVERAGE factor k (k = frequency/velovity)
13938  xkmi=xk2ii+sauphc/eqvl+(xk2ii-xk1ii)*asdl/eqvl
13939  bempy=fh0/xkmi
13940  xk1i=xk1ii-xkmi
13941  dxdki=xkmi-xkm
13942  dphii=(xk1ii-xk2ii)*eqvl/10.+(xkp1+xkp2)/120.*eqvl**2
13943  x + xk1i*asdl
13944  ENDDO
13945 ! TEST**** ENDDO IJK=1,3
13946 ! Compute the shift of phase: PHSLIL
13947  dts=(tke*t1ke+ske*s1ke)/(tke*tke+ske*ske)
13948  tiltal=-4.*atan(dts*3.2/eqvl)
13949  IF(tiltal.NE.0.) THEN
13950  til2=tiltal/2.
13951  xlrei=eqvl
13952  DO iiii=1,4
13953  ftil=1./tan(til2) - 1./til2 -dts*2./xlrei
13954  dftil=-1./(sin(til2)*sin(til2)) + 1./(til2*til2)
13955  IF(dftil.NE.6.*0.) then
13956  til2=til2 - ftil/dftil
13957  gx=1./tan(til2) - 1./til2
13958  xlrei=2.*dts/gx
13959  endif
13960  ENDDO
13961  tiltal=til2*2.
13962  ENDIF
13963  phslil=tiltal
13964  tegl1=phslil*phslil/(sin(phslil/2.)*sin(phslil/2.))
13965  tegl2=(tke*tke+ske*ske)
13966  tegl=tegl1*tegl2/(eqvl*32.)
13967  tegl=tegl/eqvl
13968 ! --- Transverse motion (field E(z)**2)
13969  phitti=phiwc+xk1i*asdl-phslip/2.
13970  phitsi=phiwc+xk2i*asdl+phslip/2.
13971  cetf1=f(9,i)*f(9,i)/(16.*xmat*xmat*eqvl*eqvl)
13972 * TESTsv ***************************
13973 ! OLD**** CETF1=CETF1*cort1*cort1
13974 ! **************************
13975  cfv1=(gini*gini+2.)/((gini*gini-1.)**2)
13976  cfv2=(gacr*gacr+2.)/((gacr*gacr-1.)**2)
13977  sv1=cfv1*(tke*cos(phitti)-ske*sin(phitti))**2
13978  sv1=cetf1*sv1*(phslil/sin(phslil/2.))**2
13979  sv2=cfv2*(tke*cos(phitsi)-ske*sin(phitsi))**2
13980  sv2=cetf1*sv2*(phslil/sin(phslil/2.))**2
13981 ! Transverse motion (field dE(z)/dt)
13982  ceti=fh0*abs(f(9,i))/(4.*xmat*eqvl)
13983 * TESTsv ***************************
13984 ! OLD**** CETI=CETI*cort1
13985 ! **************************
13986  cxv1=(gini*gini-1.)**1.5
13987  cxv2=(gacr*gacr-1.)**1.5
13988  sxv1=(tke*sin(phitti)+ske*cos(phitti))*phslil/sin(phslil/2.)
13989  sxv1=-ceti*sxv1/cxv1
13990  sxv2=(tke*sin(phitsi)+ske*cos(phitsi))*phslil/sin(phslil/2.)
13991  sxv2=-ceti*sxv2/cxv2
13992 ! --- save all parameters
13993  sv1p(i)=sv1
13994  sv2p(i)=sv2
13995  sxv1p(i)=sxv1
13996  sxv2p(i)=sxv2
13997  dwcis(i)=dwci
13998  sauphcs(i)=sauphc
13999  beini1(i)=beini
14000  phip(i)=phi
14001  teglp(i)=tegl
14002  dxdpip(i)=dxdpi
14003  dxdkip(i)=dxdki
14004  dxdptp(i)=dxdpt
14005  dxk00p(i)=dxk00
14006  dphiip(i)=dphii
14007 ! END IF BLOCK on APV
14008  ENDIF
14009 ! --- ipas = 2: the dynamics is computed over all the element
14010  if(ipas.eq.2) then
14011 ! Recover all previous parameters
14012  sauphc=sauphcs(i)
14013  xlh1i=sauphc/fh0
14014  dwci=dwcis(i)
14015  sv1=sv1p(i)
14016  sv2=sv2p(i)
14017  sxv1=sxv1p(i)
14018  sxv2=sxv2p(i)
14019  beini=beini1(i)
14020  gini = 1./sqrt(1.-beini*beini)
14021  phi=phip(i)
14022  tegl=teglp(i)
14023  dxdpi=dxdpip(i)
14024  dxdki=dxdkip(i)
14025  dxdpt=dxdptp(i)
14026  dxk00=dxk00p(i)
14027  dphii=dphiip(i)
14028  else
14029 ! compute the jump of phase at position of space charge computation
14030  cxlg=abs(f(9,i))/(4.*xmat*eqvl)
14031 ! FUNCTION Ha0(Z)
14032  xlh11=(yh11+dxk00*(dkmske*yh1k1+yh1k01))*cos(dxdpt)
14033  xlh11=xlh11+dxdpi*yh1p1*cos(dxdpt)
14034 ! SECOND DERIVATIVES OF Ha0(Z) (division by 2 has been made)
14035  xlh112=dxk00*dxk00*(h1aki+h1akim*dkmske+
14036  x h1akm*dkmske*dkmske)*cos(dxdpt)
14037  xlh112=xlh112+dxdpi*dxdpi*hapi*cos(dxdpt)
14038  xlh112=xlh112+dxdpi*dxk00*(yh10pk+
14039  x dkmske*yh11pk)*cos(dxdpt)
14040 ! THIRD DERIVATIVE of Ha0(Z)
14041  xlh113=(dxdpi**3)/3.*happi*cos(dxdpt)
14042  xlh11=xlh11+xlh112+xlh113
14043 ! FUNCTION Hb0(Z)
14044  xlh21=(yh21+dxk00*(dkmske*yh2k1+yh2k01))*sin(dxdpt)
14045  xlh21=xlh21+dxdpi*yh2p1*sin(dxdpt)
14046 ! SECOND DERIVATIVE OF Hb0(Z) (division by 2 has been made)
14047  xlh212=dxk00*dxk00*(h1bki +h1bkim*dkmske+
14048  x h1bkm*dkmske**2)*sin(dxdpt)
14049  xlh212=xlh212+dxdpi*dxdpi*hbpi*sin(dxdpt)
14050  xlh212=xlh212+dxdpi*dxk00*(yh20pk+
14051  x dkmske*yh21pk)*sin(dxdpt)
14052 ! THIRD DERIVATIVE OF Hb0(Z)
14053  xlh213=(dxdpi**3)/3.*hbppi*sin(dxdpt)
14054  xlh21=xlh21+xlh212+xlh213
14055  xlh1i=cxlg*(xlh11-xlh21)
14056  sauphc=fh0*xlh1i
14057  endif
14058  cxlg=abs(f(9,i))/(4.*xmat*eqvl)
14059  xlh01=(yh10+dxdki*yh1k0+dxk00*yh1k00)*cos(dxdpt)
14060  xlh02=(yh20+dxdki*yh2k0+dxk00*yh2k00)*sin(dxdpt)
14061  xlh0i=cxlg*(xlh01-xlh02)
14062 ! -- COUPLING INTEGRALS
14063  xlp11=(yp11+ dxdki*yp1k1 + dxk00*yp1k01)*cos(dxdpt)
14064  xlp21=(yp21+ dxdki*yp2k1 + dxk00*yp2k01)*sin(dxdpt)
14065  xlp1i=cxlg*(xlp11-xlp21)
14066  xlp12=(yp12+ dxdki*yp1k2 + dxk00*yp1k02)*cos(dxdpt)
14067  xlp22=(yp22+ dxdki*yp2k2 + dxk00*yp2k02)*sin(dxdpt)
14068  xlp2i=cxlg*(xlp12-xlp22)
14069  radiu=sqrt(f(2,i)*f(2,i)+f(4,i)*f(4,i))
14070  IF(radiu.LT.1.e-06) THEN
14071  dradiu=.001*sqrt(f(3,i)*f(3,i)+f(5,i)*f(5,i))
14072  ELSE
14073  dradiu=f(3,i)*.001*f(2,i)/radiu+f(4,i)*f(5,i)*.001/radiu
14074  ENDIF
14075  rp=radiu
14076  rpp=dradiu
14077 ! Picht coordinates
14078  rrp=rp*sqrt(beini*gini)
14079  rrpp=rpp*sqrt(beini*gini)
14080 ! --- ipas = 1: the dynamics is computed until the position of space charge computation
14081 ! gain of energy at the position of space charge computation (not for the reference)
14082  if(ipas.eq.1) then
14083 ! ***** PHIWC=PHI+DPHII-DPHCI0
14084  phiwc=phi+dphii
14085 ! istm: flag ==> the energy is compute at the position of space charge computation
14086  istm=ist-1
14087  gacr=gamci(phiwc,pcresi,gini,istm,abs(f(9,i)))
14088  dwci=(gacr-gini)*xmat
14089  endif
14090  dwpi=dwci+xmat*fh0*fh0*rrp*rrp/4.*xlh0i +
14091  x xmat*rrp*rrpp*fh0*fh0/2. *xlh1i
14092 ! PHASE JUMP
14093  delphi=sauphc+ fh0**3*rrp*rrp/4. *xlp1i +
14094  x fh0**3*rrp*rrpp/2. *xlp2i
14095  IF(ipas.EQ.2) THEN
14096 ! kicks of energy from space charge effects are in dwp(i)
14097  IF(ichaes) THEN
14098  f(7,i)=f(7,i)+dwpi+dwp(i)
14099  gamsor = f(7,i)/xmat
14100  IF(gamsor.LE.1.) f(8,i)=0.
14101 ! particle is lost
14102  IF(f(8,i).EQ.0.) go to 19
14103  besor=sqrt(1. -1./(gamsor*gamsor))
14104 ! phase jump resulting from space charge
14105  delgam=dwp(i)/xmat
14106  gamkk0=f(7,i)/xmat
14107  bekk0=sqrt(1. -1./(gamkk0*gamkk0))
14108  dbek21=delgam/(bekk0**3 * gamkk0**3)
14109  delsc=fh0*scdist*dbek21/2.
14110  delphi=delphi+delsc
14111  ditemp=ylg/(besor*vl)+delphi/fh
14112  f(6,i)=fs(6,i)+ditemp
14113  ELSE
14114  f(7,i)=f(7,i)+dwpi
14115  gamsor = f(7,i)/xmat
14116  IF(gamsor.LE.1.) f(8,i)=0.
14117 ! particle is lost
14118  if(f(8,i).eq.0.) then
14119  f6i=f(6,i)-tcog
14120  lossreason(i)=-1
14121  write(49,3928) prtlab,nrres,davtot/100.,i,int(f(1,i)),
14122  * f(2,i),f(3,i),f(4,i),f(5,i),f6i*fh*180./pi,f(7,i)-xmat,
14123  * f(9,i),lossreason(i)
14124  if(ilost.ge.ngood) stop
14125  ilost=ilost+1
14126  go to 19
14127  ENDIF
14128  besor=sqrt(1. -1./(gamsor*gamsor))
14129  ditemp=ylg/(besor*vl)+delphi/fh
14130  f(6,i)=f(6,i)+ditemp
14131  ENDIF
14132  ENDIF
14133  IF(ipas.eq.1) THEN
14134  f(7,i)=f(7,i)+dwpi
14135  gamsor = f(7,i)/xmat
14136  if(gamsor.LE.1.) f(8,i)=0.
14137  if(f(8,i).eq.0.) then
14138  lossreason(i)=-2
14139  write(49,3928) prtlab,nrres,davtot/100.,i,int(f(1,i)),
14140  * f(2,i),f(3,i),f(4,i),f(5,i),f6i*fh*180./pi,f(7,i)-xmat,
14141  * f(9,i),lossreason(i)
14142  if(ilost.ge.ngood) stop
14143  ilost=ilost+1
14144  go to 19
14145  endif
14146  besor=sqrt(1. -1./(gamsor*gamsor))
14147 ! TEST******
14148 ! DITEMP=YLG/(BESOR*VL)+DELPHI/FH
14149  ditemp=ylg/(2.*besor*vl)+delphi/fh
14150 !2014-Aug-08 DITEMP=ylg/(BESOR*VL)+DELPHI/FH
14151 !cc DITEMP=(2.*XK1II*ASDL+XKMI*(EQVL-ASDL)+
14152 !cc x XK2II*(YLG-(EQVL+ASDL)))/FH+DELPHI/FH
14153 ! ****************************
14154  f(6,i)=f(6,i)+ditemp
14155  ENDIF
14156  IF(i.EQ.icont) THEN
14157  IF(ipas.EQ.2) THEN
14158  WRITE(16,*) '* DYNAMICS AT THE OUTPUT :'
14159  WRITE(16,994) delphi*180./pi,delsc*180./pi,dwp(i)
14160 994 FORMAT(1x,'* PHASE JUMP ',e12.5,' DEG CORRECTED BY :',
14161  x e12.5,' DEG ',' SC KICK(MEV) ',e12.5)
14162  enrprin=f(7,i)-xmat
14163  WRITE(16,88) dwpi,enrprin,besor,f(9,i),ditemp
14164 88 FORMAT(1x,'* ENERGY GAIN : ',e14.7,' MEV',' ENERGY :',
14165  x e14.7,' MEV',/,1x,'* BETA :',e12.5,/,
14166  x 1x,'* CHARGE :',f5.0,' TRANSIT TIME :',e12.5,' SEC',/,
14167  x 1x,'*')
14168  write(16,*) 'TK TKE ',tk,tke
14169  write(16,*) 'SK SKE ',sk,ske
14170  write(16,*) 'PCREST PCRESI',pcrest,pcresi
14171  ENDIF
14172  if(ipas.eq.1) then
14173  WRITE(16,*) '* DYNAMICS AT THE POSITION OF SPACE CHARGE :'
14174  enrprin=f(7,i)-xmat
14175  WRITE(16,9944) delphi*180./pi,dwpi,enrprin,ditemp
14176 9944 FORMAT(1x,'* PHASE JUMP ',e12.5,' DEG ',' ENERGY GAIN : ',
14177  x e14.7,' MeV',' ENERGY :',e14.7,' MEV',/,
14178  x ' TRANSIT TIME :',e12.5,' SEC',/,
14179  x 1x,'*')
14180  ENDIF
14181  ENDIF
14182  amort=sqrt(beini*gini/(besor*gamsor))
14183 ! INTEGRALS OF THE TRANSVERSE MOTION (not computed for the reference)
14184 ! ******************
14185 ! ****** if(i.ne.ngdrf) then
14186 ! ---- integrals of E(Z)**2
14187 ! ---- (G**2+2/(G**2-1)**2)*E(z)**2
14188  cetf=f(9,i)*f(9,i)*sqcttf*sqcttf/(16.*xmat*xmat*eqvl*eqvl)
14189 ! TESTsv ********
14190 ! OLD**** CETF=CETF*cort1*cort1
14191 ! *************************************
14192  xjf0i=yfs0+dxdki*(yfsk0+yfsck0) + dxdpi*(yfsp0 +yfscp0) +
14193  x dxk00*yfskc0
14194  xjf0i=xjf0i*cetf
14195  xjf1i=yfs1+dxk00*dkmske*(yfsk1+yfsck1)+dxdpi*(yfsp1+yfscp1)+
14196  x dxk00*yfskc1
14197  xjf1i=xjf1i*cetf
14198  xjf2i=yfs2+dxk00*dkmske*(yfsk2+yfsck2)+dxdpi*(yfsp2+yfscp2)+
14199  x dxk00*yfskc2
14200  xjf2i=xjf2i*cetf
14201  v1=sv1
14202  v2=sv2
14203 ! ---- (G**2+2/(G**2-1)**2)
14204  cetm=f(9,i)*f(9,i)*tegl/(xmat*xmat)
14205 ! TESTsv ********
14206 ! OLD**** CETM=CETM*cort1*cort1
14207 ! *************************************
14208  xmn0i=yns0+dxdki*ynsk0+dxdpi*ynsp0+dxk00*ynsk0c
14209  xmn0i=xmn0i*cetm
14210  xmn1i=yns1+dxk00*dkmske*ynsk1+dxdpi*ynsp1+dxk00*ynsk1c
14211  xmn1i=xmn1i*cetm
14212  xmn2i=yns2+dxk00*dkmske*ynsk2 + dxdpi*ynsp2 +dxk00*ynsk2c
14213  xmn2i=xmn2i*cetm
14214  f0=xjf0i + xmn0i
14215  f1=xjf1i + xmn1i
14216  f2=xjf2i + xmn2i
14217 ! --- 1/(B*G)**3 *dE(z)/dt
14218  ceti=fh0*abs(f(9,i))/(8.*xmat*eqvl)
14219 * TESTsv ***************************
14220 ! OLD**** CETI=CETI*cort1
14221 ! **************************
14222  xie01= (ye10+dxdki*ye1k0+dxk00*ye1kc0)*cos(dxdpt)
14223  xie02= (ye20+dxdki*ye2k0+dxk00*ye2kc0)*sin(dxdpt)
14224  xie0i=-ceti*(xie01+xie02)
14225  xie11= (ye11+dxdki*ye1k1+dxk00*ye1kc1)*cos(dxdpt)
14226  xie12= (ye21+dxdki*ye2k1+dxk00*ye2kc1)*sin(dxdpt)
14227  xie1i=-ceti*(xie11+xie12)
14228  xie21= (ye12+dxdki*ye1k2+dxk00*ye1kc2)*cos(dxdpt)
14229  xie22= (ye22+dxdki*ye2k2+dxk00*ye2kc2)*sin(dxdpt)
14230  xie2i=-ceti*(xie21+xie22)
14231  xv1=sxv1
14232  xv2=sxv2
14233  xi0=xie0i
14234  xi1=xie1i
14235  xi2=xie2i
14236 ! Transport matrix in 'PICHT' coordonates
14237  xq0=xi0-f0
14238  xq1=xi1-f1
14239  xq2=xi2-f2
14240  xq01=(xq1+asdl*xq0)
14241  xq12=(xq2+asdl*xq1)
14242  v1=xv1-v1
14243  v2=xv2-v2
14244  a11=-xq01*(1.+ (v1+v2)*eqvl*eqvl/120.)
14245  a12=-(xq2+2.*asdl*xq1+asdl*asdl*xq0 +
14246  x eqvl*eqvl*((v1+v2)/120. + eqvl*v2/120.)*xq01)
14247  za=-(xq12/eqvl +v2*eqvl*eqvl*xq01/120.)
14248  zb=-((eqvl+asdl)*xq12/eqvl -
14249  x eqvl*xq01/10. +v2*(eqvl+asdl)*eqvl*eqvl*xq01/120.)
14250  a21=xq0*(1.+ (v1+v2)*eqvl*eqvl/120.)
14251  a22= xq1 + xq0*(asdl+asdl*eqvl*eqvl*(v1+v2)/120. +
14252  x eqvl**3*v2/120.)
14253  zc=xq1/eqvl + v2*eqvl*eqvl*xq0/120.
14254  zd= (asdl+eqvl)*xq1/eqvl -
14255  x ( eqvl/10. + v2*(eqvl+asdl)*eqvl*eqvl/120.)*xq0
14256 !
14257  tma=1./(1.-za-zc*zb/(1.-zd))
14258  t11= (a11+zb*a21/(1.-zd)) *tma
14259  t12=( a12+zb*a22/(1.-zd) )*tma
14260  t21=(a21+zc*t11)/(1.-zd)
14261  t22=(a22+zc*t12)/(1.-zd)
14262  vr11=(1.+t11+dcum*t21)
14263  vr12=(t12+dcum*(1.+t22))
14264  vr21=t21
14265  vr22=1.+t22
14266  IF(i.EQ.icont) THEN
14267  detre=vr11*vr22-vr12*vr21
