14268  WRITE(16,8921) vr11,vr12,vr21,vr22,detre
14269 8921 FORMAT(2x,' TRANSVERSE CANONICAL MATRIX:(cm,radian) ',/,
14270  x 2x,' VR11:',e12.5,' VR12:',e12.5,/,
14271  x 2x,' VR21:',e12.5,' VR22:',e12.5,/,
14272  x 2x,' DETERMINANT :',e12.5,//)
14273  ENDIF
14274 ! REAL MATRIX
14275  a11=vr11*amort
14276  a12=vr12*amort
14277  a21=vr21*amort
14278  a22=vr22*amort
14279 !omment ** cumulative matrix (particle 1)
14280 !omment tables R(,) ET T(,,,)
14281 !omment IF (I .EQ. 1.AND.IPAS.EQ.2) THEN
14282 !omment STA11=VR11*SA11+VR12*SA21
14283 !omment STA12=VR11*SA12+VR12*SA22
14284 !omment STA21=VR21*SA11+VR22*SA21
14285 !omment STA22=VR21*SA12+VR22*SA22
14286 !omment SA11=STA11
14287 !omment SA12=STA12
14288 !omment SA21=STA21
14289 !omment SA22=STA22
14290 !omment SAA11=SA11*AMORT
14291 !omment SAA12=SA12*AMORT
14292 !omment SAA21=SA21*AMORT
14293 !omment SAA22=SA22*AMORT
14294 !omment RS(1,1) =SAA11
14295 !omment RS(1,2) =SAA12
14296 !omment RS(2,1) =SAA21
14297 !omment RS(2,2) =SAA22
14298 !omment RS(3,3) =SAA11
14299 !omment RS(3,4) =SAA12
14300 !omment RS(4,3) =SAA21
14301 !omment RS(4,4) =SAA22
14302 !omment DO IA=1,6
14303 !omment DO IB=1,6
14304 !omment R(IA,IB)=RCUL(IA,IB)
14305 !omment ENDDO
14306 !omment ENDDO
14307 !omment CALL MFORDRE(RCUL,RS,R)
14308 !omment ENDIF
14309 ! BEAM COORDINATES
14310  fxt1=a11*f(2,i)+a12*f(3,i)*1.e-03
14311  fxt2=a21*f(2,i)+a22*f(3,i)*1.e-03
14312  fxt3=a11*f(4,i)+a12*f(5,i)*1.e-03
14313  fxt4=a21*f(4,i)+a22*f(5,i)*1.e-03
14314  f(2,i)=fxt1
14315  f(3,i)=fxt2*1.e03
14316  f(4,i)=fxt3
14317  f(5,i)=fxt4*1.e03
14318  IF(i.EQ.icont) THEN
14319 ! ** CURRENT MATRIX
14320  stta11=vr11*sact11+vr12*sact21
14321  stta12=vr11*sact12+vr12*sact22
14322  stta21=vr21*sact11+vr22*sact21
14323  stta22=vr21*sact12+vr22*sact22
14324  sact11=stta11
14325  sact12=stta12
14326  sact21=stta21
14327  sact22=stta22
14328  saa11=sact11*amort
14329  saa12=sact12*amort
14330  saa21=sact21*amort
14331  saa22=sact22*amort
14332  det=a11*a22-a12*a21
14333  WRITE(16,992) a11,a12*1.e-3,a21*1.e3,a22,det,amort
14334 992 FORMAT(1x,'* TRANSVERSE MATRIX (cm,mrd)',/,1x,
14335  x '*',e12.5,3x,e12.5,/,1x,
14336  x '*',e12.5,3x,e12.5,/,1x,
14337  x '* DETERMINANT :',e12.5,' DUMPING OF ENERGY :',e12.5)
14338  write(16,*)'*'
14339  WRITE(16,559) f(2,i),f(3,i),f(4,i),f(5,i)
14340 559 FORMAT(
14341  x ' * TRANVERSE COORDINATES AT OUTPUT ',/,1x,
14342  x '* X :',e12.5,' CM XP :',e12.5,' MRD ',/,1x,
14343  x '* Y :',e12.5,' CM YP :',e12.5,' MRD')
14344  IF(ipas.EQ.2)
14345  x WRITE(16,*) '********** END OF FOLLOWED PARTICLE ********'
14346  ENDIF
14347 19 CONTINUE
14348  return
14349  end
14350 
14354  SUBROUTINE bunparm(v,dp,harm,prlim)
14355  implicit real(8) (a-h,o-z)
14356  parameter(iptsz=100002,maxcell1=3000)
14357  common/rigid/boro
14358  COMMON /consta/ vl, pi, xmat, rpel, qst
14359  common/dyn/tref,vref
14360  common/davcom/dav1(maxcell1,40),davtot,iitem(maxcell1),idav
14361  common/etcha1/ichas(iptsz),chexmin(10),chexmax(10),chasit
14362  common/ttfc/tk,t1k,t2k,sk,s1k,s2k,fh
14363  common/faisc/f(10,iptsz),imax,ngood
14364  common/etcom/cog(8),exten(17),fd(iptsz)
14365  common/fene/wdisp,wphas,wx,wy,rlim,ifw
14366  common/corec/tref1
14367  common/qmoyen/qmoy
14368  common/aerp/vphase,vfield,ierpf
14369  common/itvole/itvol,imamin
14370  common/compt/nrres,nrtre,nrbunc,nrdbun
14371  common/shif/dtiph,shift
14372  common/tofev/ttvols
14373  common/pltprf/sprfx(3000),sprfy(3000),sprfl(3000),sprfw(3000),
14374  x sprfp(3000),sprng(3000),prlab(3000),iprf
14375  CHARACTER*(8) PRLAB,PRTLAB
14376  common/fcont/ifcont
14377  logical ifcont
14378  CHARACTER cr*1
14379  dimension vecx(1)
14380  LOGICAL chasit,itvol,imamin,shift
14381 ! ENVELOPE
14382  prlab(iprf)='BUNCHER '
14383  prtlab=prlab(iprf)
14384  call stapl(davtot*10.)
14385 !xx ilost=0
14386  twopi=2.*pi
14387  freq=fh/twopi
14388  wavel=vl/freq
14389  fcpi=fh*180./pi
14390 ! print out on terminal of transport element # on one and the same line
14391  nrbunc=nrbunc+1
14392  cr=char(13)
14393  WRITE(6,8254,advance='no') nrtre,nrbunc,cr
14394 8254 format('Transport element:',i5,
14395  * ' Buncher :',i5,a1)
14396  if (harm.le.0.) harm=1.
14397  rhs=prlim*prlim
14398 ! test window
14399  call reject(ilost,prtlab)
14400 ! Reshuffles f(i,j) array after window (now done in 'reject')
14401 ! call shuffle
14402  tcog=0.
14403  bcog=0.
14404  do np=1,ngood
14405  tcog=tcog+f(6,np)
14406  gpa=f(7,np)/xmat
14407  bcog=sqrt(1.-1./(gpa*gpa))+bcog
14408  enddo
14409  tcog=tcog/float(ngood)
14410  bcog=bcog/float(ngood)
14411  gcog=1./sqrt(1.-bcog*bcog)
14412  encog=xmat*gcog-xmat
14413 ! adjustement of the phase of RF w.r.t. the T.O.F.
14414  xkpi=0.
14415  if(imamin) then
14416  ttvpi=harm*ttvols*fcpi
14417  xkpi=ttvpi/360.
14418  ixkpi=int(xkpi)
14419  xkpi=(xkpi-float(ixkpi))*360.
14420  write(16,*) ' *** TOF correction:',-xkpi,' deg'
14421  dp=dp-xkpi*pi/180.
14422  write(16,*)' ***phase of RF adjusted : ',dp*180./pi,' deg'
14423  endif
14424 ! 20/08/2009 delay of phase of the reference at input w.r.t. the synchronous phase
14425 ! 20/08/2009 ttvpi=harm*ttvols*fcpi
14426 ! 20/08/2009 xkpi=ttvpi/180.
14427 ! 20/08/2009 ixkpi=xkpi+0.5
14428 ! 20/08/2009 ixkpi=ixkpi*180
14429 ! 20/08/2009 xkpc=cos(ixkpi*pi/180.)
14430 ! 20/08/2009 xkpi=ttvpi-float(ixkpi)
14431 ! 20/08/2009 if(itvol.and.imamin)
14432 ! 20/08/2009 * write(16,8975) dp*180./pi,xkpi
14433 ! 20/08/2009 8975 format('***previous phase offset: ',e12.5,' deg',/,
14434 ! 20/08/2009 * '***new phase offset: ',e12.5,' deg')
14435 ! start of write to file '.short' for buncher
14436  idav=idav+1
14437  iitem(idav)=8
14438  dav1(idav,1)=v
14439  dav1(idav,2)=dp*180./pi
14440  dav1(idav,3)=prlim
14441  dav1(idav,4)=davtot*10.
14442  if(itvol) dav1(idav,5)=-xkpi
14443 ! end
14444  WRITE(16,178)
14445 178 FORMAT(/,' Dynamics at the input',/,
14446  2 5x,' BETA GAMMA ENERGY(MeV) ',
14447  3 ' TOF(deg) TOF(sec)')
14448  WRITE(16,1788) bcog,gcog,encog,tcog*fcpi,tcog
14449 1788 FORMAT(' COG ',f7.5,3x,e12.5,1x,e12.5,3x,e12.5,3x,e12.5)
14450  e0t=harm*v/(bcog*wavel)
14451  pveff=v
14452 ! random or systematic error on RF level
14453  if(ierpf.eq.1) then
14454 ! systematic error on RF level
14455  e0t=e0t*(1.+vfield)
14456  pveff=v*(1.+vfield)
14457 ! random error on RF level
14458  elseif(ierpf.ge.2) then
14459  len=1
14460  call rlux(vecx,len)
14461  r1=(2.*vecx(1)-1.)*vfield
14462  e0t=e0t*(1.+r1)
14463  pveff=v*(1.+r1)
14464  endif
14465  cay=harm*twopi/(bcog*gcog*wavel)
14466  caysq=cay**2
14467  con=twopi*e0t*qmoy/xmat
14468  rad=pi/180.
14469 ! systematic error on phase
14470  if(ierpf.eq.1) dp=dp+vphase*rad
14471 ! random error on phase
14472  if(ierpf.ge.2) then
14473  len=1
14474  call rlux(vecx,len)
14475  r1=(2.*vecx(1)-1.)*vphase*rad
14476  dp=dp+r1
14477  endif
14478 ! shift=true => reference and COG seperated, otherwise reference=COG
14479 ! --- save the reference
14480  ovref=vref
14481  otref=tref
14482 ! --- shift = false: the reference particle is the cog
14483  if(shift) then
14484  ovref=vref
14485  beref=vref/vl
14486  gamref=1./sqrt(1.-beref*beref)
14487  older=xmat*gamref
14488  else
14489  tref=tcog
14490  vref=bcog*vl
14491  ovref=vref
14492  beref=bcog
14493  gamref=1./sqrt(1.-beref*beref)
14494  older=xmat*gamref
14495  endif
14496 ! --- if imamin = false: phase setting has been forced equal to dp, otherwise phase setting has been adjusted
14497  dgr=v*cos(harm*ttvols*fh+dp)*qmoy
14498  ewer=older+dgr
14499  gor=ewer/xmat
14500  vref=vl*sqrt(1.-1./(gor*gor))
14501  enrprin=older-xmat
14502  WRITE(16,165) beref,gamref,enrprin,tref*fh*180./pi,tref
14503 165 FORMAT(' REF ',f7.5,3x,e12.5,1x,e12.5,3x,e12.5,3x,e12.5)
14504  wsync=0.
14505  bcour=0.
14506  tcog=0.
14507  do np=1,ngood
14508  rs=f(2,np)**2+f(4,np)**2
14509  a=harm*(f(6,np)-tref+ttvols)*fh+dp
14510  rs=rs*1.e-04
14511 ! 20/08/2009 s=sin(a)*xkpc
14512  s=sin(a)
14513  w=f(7,np)-xmat
14514  bg=sqrt(w/xmat*(2.+w/xmat))
14515 ! conversion cm-->m and mrd--->rd
14516  f2=f(2,np)
14517  f4=f(4,np)
14518  f3=f(3,np)*1.e-03
14519  f5=f(5,np)*1.e-03
14520  bgx=f3*bg
14521  bgy=f5*bg
14522  cayrsq=caysq*rs
14523  arg=cayrsq/4.
14524  xi0=1.+arg*(1.+arg*(.25+arg/36.))
14525 ! dw=v*cos(a)*xi0*qmoy
14526  dw=v*cos(a)*xi0*f(9,np)
14527 ! 20/08/2009 dw=dw*xkpc
14528  wb=w+.5*dw
14529  bgav=sqrt(wb/xmat*(2.+wb/xmat))
14530  gav=1.+wb/xmat
14531  bav=bgav/gav
14532  bcour=bcour+bav
14533  wf=w+dw
14534  bgf=sqrt(wf/xmat*(2.+wf/xmat))
14535  xi1okr=.5+.25*arg+arg**2/24.
14536  del=-con*s*(1.-bav*bcog)*xi1okr/bav
14537  tcog=tcog+f(6,np)
14538  f3=(bgx+del*f2)/bgf
14539  f(3,np)=f3*1.e03
14540  f5=(bgy+del*f4)/bgf
14541  f(5,np)=f5*1.e03
14542  f(7,np)=wf+xmat
14543  wsync=wsync+wf
14544  enddo
14545  wsync=wsync/float(ngood)
14546  bcour=bcour/float(ngood)
14547  tcog=tcog/float(ngood)
14548 ! Test window
14549  call reject(ilost,prtlab)
14550 ! Reshuffles f(i,j) array after window (now done in 'reject')
14551 ! call shuffle
14552 ! new output
14553 ! shift=true => reference and COG seperated, otherwise reference=COG
14554  engain=wsync-encog
14555  if(shift) then
14556  beref=vref/vl
14557  gamref=1./sqrt(1.-beref*beref)
14558  enref=ewer-xmat
14559  else
14560  tref=tcog
14561  vref=bcour*vl
14562  beref=bcour
14563  enref=wsync
14564  dgr=engain
14565  endif
14566  if(itvol) ttvols=tref
14567  WRITE(16,3777)
14568 3777 FORMAT(/,' Dynamics at the output',/,
14569  1 5x,' BETA dW(MeV) ENERGY(MeV) ',
14570  2 ' TOF(deg) TOF(sec)')
14571  WRITE(16,3473) beref,dgr,enref,fh*tref*180./pi,tref
14572 3473 FORMAT(' REF ',f7.5,3x,f10.6,3x,f8.3,3x,e12.5,3x,e12.5)
14573  WRITE(16,1789) bcour,engain,wsync,tcog*fh*180./pi,tcog
14574 1789 FORMAT(' COG ',f7.5,3x,f10.6,3x,f8.3,3x,e12.5,3x,e12.5)
14575 ! save number of good particles for .short file
14576  dav1(idav,36)=ngood
14577 ! as beam passed through buncher, assume bunched beam
14578  ifcont=.false.
14579  WRITE(16,*) 'After buncher, bunched beam assumed'
14580  call emiprt(0)
14581  emns=(1.e12)*dav1(idav,12)/(4.*fh)
14582  trnsms=100.*float(ngood)/float(imax)
14583  if(nrbunc.eq.1) write(50,*) '# buncher.dmp'
14584  if(nrbunc.eq.1) write(50,*) '# cav Z trans ',
14585  * 'PHIs TOF(COG) COG Wcog TOF(REF) ',
14586  * ' REF Wref Ex,RMS,n Ey,RMS,n ',
14587  * 'El,RMS dWref EffVolt'
14588  if(nrbunc.eq.1) write(50,*) '# # (m) (%) ',
14589  * '(deg) (deg) beta (MeV) (deg) ',
14590  * ' beta (MeV) (mm.mrad) (mm.mrad) ',
14591  * '(ns.keV) (MeV) (MV)'
14592  write(50,7023) nrbunc,0.001*dav1(idav-1,4),trnsms,
14593  * dav1(idav-1,2),tcog*fh*180./pi,bcour,wsync,fh*tref*180./pi,
14594  * beref,enref,0.25*dav1(idav,16),0.25*dav1(idav,21),emns,
14595  * dgr,pveff
14596 7023 format(1x,i4,1x,e12.5,1x,f6.2,1x,f7.2,1x,
14597  * 2(e14.7,1x,f7.5,1x,e14.7,1x),5(e12.5,1x))
14598  return
14599  end
14600 
14616  SUBROUTINE refer
14617  implicit real(8) (a-h,o-z)
14618  parameter(iptsz=100002)
14619  common/ttfc/tk,t1k,t2k,sk,s1k,s2k,fh
14620  common/dyn/tref,vref
14621  common/faisc/f(10,iptsz),imax,ngood
14622  common/qmoyen/qmoy
14623  COMMON /consta/ vl, pi, xmat, rpel, qst
14624  common/newref/dephas,dewref,iref,irefw
14625  common/tapes/in,ifile,meta
14626  common/itvole/itvol,imamin
14627  common/tofev/ttvols
14628  logical itvol,imamin
14629 ! ---- save reference
14630  avref=vref
14631  atref=tref
14632  attvols=ttvols
14633  if(irefw.eq.2) then
14634  wnref=dewref
14635  gnref=wnref/xmat+1.
14636  bref=sqrt(gnref*gnref-1.)/gnref
14637 ! ---- set tref in sec based on dephas (deg)
14638  delt=dephas*pi/(fh*180.)
14639 ! ------ the new reference is:
14640  tref=delt
14641  vref=bref*vl
14642  if(itvol)ttvols=tref
14643  endif
14644  if(iref.eq.0) then
14645  if(irefw.eq.0) then
14646  bref=vref/vl
14647  gref=1./sqrt(1-bref*bref)
14648  dbref=bref*dewref/(gref*(gref+1.))
14649 ! ---- change dephas (deg) in delt (sec)
14650  delt=dephas*pi/(fh*180.)
14651 ! ------ the new reference is:
14652  tref=tref+delt
14653  vref=vref+dbref*vl
14654  if(itvol)ttvols=tref
14655  endif
14656  if(irefw.eq.1) then
14657  bref=vref/vl
14658  gref=1./sqrt(1.-bref*bref)
14659  wref=(gref-1.)*xmat
14660  wnref=wref+dewref
14661  gnref=wnref/xmat+1.
14662  bref=sqrt(gnref*gnref-1.)/gnref
14663 ! ---- change dephas (deg) in delt (sec)
14664  delt=dephas*pi/(fh*180.)
14665 ! ------ the new reference is:
14666  tref=tref+delt
14667  vref=bref*vl
14668  if(itvol)ttvols=tref
14669  endif
14670  endif
14671  if(iref.eq.1) then
14672 ! ----- c.o.g. of the bunch is the new reference
14673  tcog=0.
14674  bcog=0.
14675  do i=1,ngood
14676  tcog=tcog+f(6,i)
14677  gpai=f(7,i)/xmat
14678  bcog=bcog+sqrt(1.-1./(gpai*gpai))
14679  enddo
14680  tcog=tcog/float(ngood)
14681  bcog=bcog/float(ngood)
14682  gcog=1./sqrt(1-bcog*bcog)
14683  wcog=(gcog-1.)*xmat
14684 ! ---- change dephas (deg) in delt (sec)
14685  delt=dephas*pi/(fh*180.)
14686  if(irefw.eq.0) then
14687  wrefn=wcog+wcog*dewref/100.
14688 ! ------ the new reference is:
14689  tref=tcog+delt
14690 ! vref=(bcog+dbcog)*vl
14691  grefn=wrefn/xmat+1.
14692  vref=vl*sqrt(grefn*grefn-1.)/grefn
14693  if(itvol)ttvols=tref
14694  endif
14695  if(irefw.eq.1) then
14696  wncog=wcog+dewref
14697  gncog=wncog/xmat+1.
14698  bcog=sqrt(gncog*gncog-1.)/gncog
14699 ! ------ the new reference is:
14700  tref=tcog+delt
14701  vref=bcog*vl
14702  if(itvol)ttvols=tref
14703  endif
14704  endif
14705  baref=avref/vl
14706  garef=1./sqrt(1.-baref*baref)
14707  waref=(garef-1.)*xmat
14708  bnref=vref/vl
14709  gnref=1./sqrt(1.-bnref*bnref)
14710  wnref=(gnref-1.)*xmat
14711  fcpi=fh*180/pi
14712  write(16,20)atref*fcpi,attvols*fcpi,waref
14713 20 format(3x,'**before NREF',/,5x,'tof of the reference: ',e12.5,
14714  *' deg tof for adjustments: ',e12.5,' deg energy of reference: '
14715  * ,e12.5,' MeV')
14716  write(16,21)tref*fcpi,ttvols*fcpi,wnref
14717 21 format(3x,'**after NREF',/,5x,'tof of the reference: ',e12.5,
14718  *' deg tof for adjustments: ',e12.5,' deg energy of reference: '
14719  * ,e12.5,' MeV')
14720  RETURN
14721  END
14722 
14741  SUBROUTINE steer(fld,nvf)
14742  implicit real(8) (a-h,o-z)
14743 ! 4/15/14 - Daniel Alt: Added electrostatic steerers.
14744 ! parameter (iptsz=100002,maxcell=3000,maxcell1=3000)
14745  parameter(iptsz=100002,maxcell1=3000)
14746  common/ttfc/tk,t1k,t2k,sk,s1k,s2k,fh
14747  common/dyn/tref,vref
14748  COMMON /consta/ vl, pi, xmat, rpel, qst
14749  common/rigid/boro
14750  common/faisc/f(10,iptsz),imax,ngood
14751  common/etcom/cog(8),exten(17),fd(iptsz)
14752  common/qmoyen/qmoy
14753  common/dcspa/iesp
14754  common/sc3/beamc,scdist,sce10,cplm,ect,apl,ichaes,iscsp
14755  common/tapes/in,ifile,meta
14756  common/pltprf/sprfx(3000),sprfy(3000),sprfl(3000),sprfw(3000),
14757  x sprfp(3000),sprng(3000),prlab(3000),iprf
14758  common/davcom/dav1(maxcell1,40),davtot,iitem(maxcell1),idav
14759  common/compt/nrres,nrtre,nrbunc,nrdbun
14760  CHARACTER*(8) PRLAB
14761  CHARACTER cr*1
14762  logical iesp,ichaes
14763 ! print out on terminal of transport element # on one and the same line
14764  nrtre=nrtre+1
14765  cr=char(13)
14766  WRITE(6,8254,advance='no') nrtre,nrres,cr
14767 8254 format('Transport element:',i5,
14768  * ' Accelerating element:',i5,a1)
14769  if (nvf.eq.0) then
14770 ! horizontal magnetic steerer
14771  write(16,*) 'Horizontal magnetic steerer: ',fld,' Tm'
14772  do i=1,ngood
14773  const=xmat*1.e8/(f(9,i)*vl)
14774  gpai=f(7,i)/xmat
14775  bpai=sqrt(1.-1./(gpai*gpai))
14776  dispx=fld/(const*gpai*bpai)*1000.
14777  f(3,i)=f(3,i)+dispx
14778  enddo
14779  else if (nvf.eq.1) then
14780 ! vertical magnetic steerer
14781  write(16,*) 'Vertical magnetic steerer: ',fld,' Tm'
14782  do i=1,ngood
14783  const=xmat*1.e8/(f(9,i)*vl)
14784  gpai=f(7,i)/xmat
14785  bpai=sqrt(1.-1./(gpai*gpai))
14786  dispy=fld/(const*gpai*bpai)*1000.
14787  f(5,i)=f(5,i)+dispy
14788  enddo
14789  else if (nvf.eq.2) then
14790 ! horizontal electrostatic steerer
14791  write (16,*) 'Horizontal electrostatic steerer: ',fld,' kV*m/m'
14792  do i=1,ngood
14793  gpai=f(7,i)/xmat
14794  const=(gpai/(gpai*gpai-1.))*f(9,i)
14795  dispx=const*fld/xmat
14796  f(3,i)=f(3,i)+dispx
14797  enddo
14798  else if (nvf.eq.3) then
14799 ! vertical electrostatic steerer
14800  write (16,*) 'Vertical electrostatic steerer: ',fld,' kV*m/m'
14801  do i=1,ngood
14802  gpai=f(7,i)/xmat
14803  const=(gpai*gpai/(gpai*gpai-1.))*f(9,i)
14804  dispy=const*fld/xmat
14805  f(5,i)=f(5,i)+dispy
14806  enddo
14807  else
14808 ! error on input
14809  write(16,*) 'Wrong value for NVF in STEERER'
14810  stop
14811  endif
14812  RETURN
14813  END
14814 
14842  SUBROUTINE emiprt(L)
14843  implicit real(8) (a-h,o-z)
14844  parameter(iptsz=100002,maxcell1=3000)
14845  common/etchas/fractx,fracty,fractl
14846  common/dyn/tref,vref
14847  common/faisc/f(10,iptsz),imax,ngood
14848  common/davcom/dav1(maxcell1,40),davtot,iitem(maxcell1),idav
14849  common/davprt/shortl
14850  common/qmoyen/qmoy
14851  common/etcom/cog(8),exten(17),fd(iptsz)
14852  common/etcha1/ichas(iptsz),chexmin(10),chexmax(10),chasit
14853  common/etcha3/ichxyz(iptsz)
14854  common/speda/dave,idave
14855  common/cptemit/xltot(maxcell1),nbemit
14856  common /consta/ vl, pi, xmat, rpel, qst
14857  common/ttfc/tk,t1k,t2k,sk,s1k,s2k,fh
14858  common/mcs/imcs,ncstat,cstat(20)
14859  common/strip/atm,qs,atms,ths,qop,sqst(6),anp,nqst
14860  common/shortl/davprt
14861  common/dyni/vrefi,trefi,fhinit,acpt
14862  common/frmacc/fracc
14863  common/dmp/dmpdat(14)
14864  logical dave,chasit,fracc
14865  dimension foo(20,9),ndp(20),chasdat(20),dav2(maxcell1,33)
14866  character davprt(maxcell1)*80,shortl*80
14867  nbemit=nbemit+1
14868 ! ichxyz(i)=1 for particles kept by chase
14869 ! ichxyz(i)=0 for particles rejected by chase
14870  do i=1,ngood
14871  ichxyz(i)=1
14872  enddo
14873  xltot(nbemit)=davtot
14874  idav=idav+1
14875  iitem(idav)=3
14876  dav1(idav,40)=fh
14877  do i=1,ngood
14878  ichas(i)=1
14879  enddo
14880  iarg=1
14881  if (l.eq.1) davprt(idav)=shortl
14882  call cdg(iarg)
14883  encog=cog(1)
14884  gcog=encog/xmat
14885  bcog=sqrt(1.-1./(gcog*gcog))
14886  tcog=cog(3)
14887  CALL ext2d(1)
14888 ! --- qdisp : average dispersion (MeV)
14889 ! --- sqmdv: emittance (MeV*rad)
14890  qdisp=2.*sqrt(exten(1))
14891  qmdv=exten(1)*exten(3)-exten(2)*exten(2)
14892  sqmdv=4.*pi*sqrt(qmdv)
14893 ! --- qdp : average extension in phase (rad)
14894  qdp=2.*sqrt(exten(3))
14895 ! --- cor12: coefficient of correlation in (dE, dPHI)
14896  if(exten(1).ne.0. .and. exten(3).ne.0.) then
14897  cor12=exten(2)/sqrt(exten(1)*exten(3))
14898  else
14899  cor12=0.
14900  endif
14901 ! sup pent12=sqrt(exten(1)/exten(3))/cor12
14902 ! sup pent21=sqrt(exten(1)/exten(3))*cor12
14903 ! sup qdpde=qdp*180./pi
14904 ! --- particle reference
14905 ! dav1(idav,3): relativistic beta
14906 ! dav1(idav,4): Kinetic energy (MeV)
14907 ! dav1(idav,5): phase (in deg. w.r.t. k*pi)
14908  beref=vref/vl
14909  gref=1./sqrt(1.-beref*beref)
14910  dav1(idav,3)=beref
14911  dav1(idav,4)=xmat*(gref-1.)
14912 ! dav1(idav,5)=-(int(tref*fh/pi+0.5)-tref*fh/pi)*180.
14913 ! print out absolute TOF
14914  dav1(idav,5)=180.*tref*fh/pi
14915 ! --- c.o.g of the bunch
14916 ! dav1(idav,6): Kinetic energy (MeV)
14917 ! dav1(idav,7): phase (in deg. w.r.t. k*pi)
14918 ! phnw=-(int(tcog*fh/pi+0.5)-tcog*fh/pi)*180.
14919 ! print out absolute TOF
14920  phnw=180.*tcog*fh/pi
14921  dav1(idav,6)=encog-xmat
14922  dav1(idav,7)=phnw
14923 ! ---- deviation between the fictious reference and the c.o.g. of the bunch
14924 ! dav1(idav,8) : deviation in energy (MeV)
14925 ! dav1(idav,9) : deviation of phase (deg)
14926  dav1(idav,8)=encog-xmat-dav1(idav,4)
14927  dav1(idav,9)=phnw-dav1(idav,5)
14928 ! ---- statistics in z-zp
14929 ! --- dav1(idav,10) : extension dPHI (deg)
14930 ! --- dav1(idav,11) : dispersion dE (MeV)
14931 ! --- dav1(idav,12) : emittance (MeV*rad)
14932 ! --- dav1(idav,23) : correlation in between dE an dPHI
14933  dav1(idav,10)=qdp*180./pi
14934  dav1(idav,11)=qdisp
14935  dav1(idav,12)=sqmdv/pi
14936  dmpdat(12)=(1.e12)*dav1(idav,12)/(4.*fh)
14937  dav1(idav,23)=cor12
14938 ! sup dav1(idav,39)=sqmdv*180./(pi*pi)
14939 ! sup Ez(ns.keV)
14940 ! sup dav1(idav,12)=sqmdv*(1.E09)/(pi*fh)
14941 ! ---- statistics in x-xp and y-yp
14942  trqtx=exten(4)*exten(5)-exten(8)*exten(8)
14943  trqpy=exten(6)*exten(7)-exten(9)*exten(9)
14944  surxth=4.*pi*sqrt(trqtx)
14945  suryph=4.*pi*sqrt(trqpy)
14946  qditax=2.*sqrt(exten(4))
14947  qdiant=2.*sqrt(exten(5))
14948  qditay=2.*sqrt(exten(6))
14949  qdianp=2.*sqrt(exten(7))
14950 ! dav1(idav,13): extension in x (mm)
14951 ! dav1(idav,14): extension in xp (mrad)
14952 ! --- dav1(idav,15): correlation between x and xp
14953  dav1(idav,13)=qditax*10.
14954  dav1(idav,14)=qdiant
14955  dav1(idav,15)=0.
14956  if (exten(4).ne.0. .and. exten(5).ne.0.)
14957  * dav1(idav,15)=exten(8)/sqrt(exten(4)*exten(5))
14958 ! Emittance(norm) x-xp (mm*mrad)
14959  dav1(idav,16)=bcog*surxth*10./(pi*sqrt(1.-bcog*bcog))
14960  dmpdat(10)=dav1(idav,16)/4.
14961 ! Emittance(non norm) x-xp (mm*mrad)
14962  dav1(idav,17)=surxth*10./pi
14963 ! --- dav1(idav,18): y-extension (mm)
14964 ! --- dav1(idav,19): yp-extension (mrad)
14965 ! --- dav1(idav,20): correlation between y and yp
14966  dav1(idav,20)=0.
14967  if (exten(6).ne.0. .and. exten(7).ne.0.)
14968  * dav1(idav,20)=exten(9)/sqrt(exten(6)*exten(7))
14969  dav1(idav,18)=qditay*10.
14970  dav1(idav,19)=qdianp
14971 ! dav1(idav,21) : Emittance(norm) y-yp (pi*mm*mrad)
14972  dav1(idav,21)=bcog*suryph*10./(pi*sqrt(1.-bcog*bcog))
14973  dmpdat(11)=dav1(idav,21)/4.
14974 ! dav1(idav,22) : Emittance(non norm) y-yp (mm*mrad)
14975  dav1(idav,22)=suryph*10./pi
14976  dav1(idav,30)=float(ngood)
14977  dav1(idav,31)=cog(4)*10.
14978  dav1(idav,32)=cog(5)
14979  dav1(idav,33)=cog(6)*10.
14980  dav1(idav,34)=cog(7)
14981 ! next card to indicate no chase
14982  dav1(idav,26)=0.
14983 !****************************
14984 ! --- statistics with chase *
14985 !****************************
14986  if (chasit .and. .not. fracc) then
14987  write(16,*)' EMIT: # of good particles :',ngood
14988  if(fractl.lt.1.) then
14989 ! --- chase in z-zp
14990  call chasel
14991 ! ngz is number of retained particles in Z
14992  ngz=0
14993  do i=1,ngood
14994  ichxyz(i)=ichas(i)
14995  if(ichxyz(i).eq.1) ngz=ngz+1
14996  enddo
14997  write(16,*)' EMIT: # of retained particles (chasel):',ngz
14998  iarg=1
14999  call cdg(iarg)
15000  tcog=cog(3)
15001  encog=cog(1)
15002  gcog=encog/xmat
15003  bcog=sqrt(1.-1./(gcog*gcog))
15004  enprt=encog-xmat
15005  CALL ext2d(1)
15006  qmdv=exten(1)*exten(3)-exten(2)*exten(2)
15007  trqty=exten(4)*exten(5)-exten(8)*exten(8)
15008  trqpz=exten(6)*exten(7)-exten(9)*exten(9)
15009 ! qdisp : average dispersion dE (MeV)
15010  qdisp=2.*sqrt(exten(1))
15011 ! qdp : average extension dPHI (rad)
15012  qdp=2.*sqrt(exten(3))
15013 ! cor12: coefficient of correlation in (dE, dPHI)
15014  cor12=exten(2)/sqrt(exten(1)*exten(3))
15015 ! --- fictitious reference
15016 ! dav2(idav,3): relativistic beta
15017 ! dav2(idav,4): Kinetic energy (MeV)
15018 ! dav2(idav,5): phase (in deg. w.r.t. k*pi)
15019  beref=vref/vl
15020  gref=1./sqrt(1.-beref*beref)
15021  dav2(idav,3)=beref
15022  dav2(idav,4)=xmat*(gref-1.)
15023  dav2(idav,5)=180.*tref*fh/pi
15024 ! --- c.o.g of the bunch
15025 ! dav2(idav,6): Kinetic energy (MeV)
15026  dav2(idav,6)=encog-xmat
15027 ! ---- deviation between fictitious reference and c.o.g.
15028 ! dav2(idav,8) : deviation in energy (MeV)
15029  dav2(idav,8)=encog-xmat-dav2(idav,4)
15030 ! ---- caracteristics of the bunch in longitudinal plane (dE, dPHI)
15031 ! dav2(idav,10) : dPHI extension (deg)
15032 ! dav2(idav,11) : dispersion dE (MeV)
15033 ! dav2(idav,23) : coefficient of correlation in (dE, dPHI)
15034  dav2(idav,10)=qdp*180./pi
15035  dav2(idav,11)=qdisp
15036  dav2(idav,23)=cor12
15037 ! 2016-05-16
15038  chasdat(1)=davtot/100.
15039  chasdat(2)=100.*fractl
15040  chasdat(3)=encog-xmat
15041  chasdat(4)=180.*tcog*fh/pi
15042 ! long emittance in keV.ns
15043  chasdat(7)=1.e12*sqrt(qmdv)/fhinit
15044 ! h emittance
15045  chasdat(5)=bcog*sqrt(trqty)*10./(sqrt(1.-bcog*bcog))
15046 ! v emittance
15047  chasdat(6)=bcog*sqrt(trqpz)*10./(sqrt(1.-bcog*bcog))
15048 ! write the chasel data
15049  write(46,
15050  * '(1x,E13.6,1x,F6.3,5(1x,E13.6),1x,I6,1x,I6,8(1x,E13.6))')
15051  * (chasdat(klm),klm=1,7),ngz,ngood,
15052  * (10.*chexmin(mlk),10.*chexmax(mlk),mlk=1,2),
15053  * (chexmin(mlk),chexmax(mlk),mlk=3,4)
15054  do i=1,ngood
15055  ichas(i)=1
15056  enddo
15057  endif
15058  if(fractx.lt.1.) then
15059 ! --- chase in x-xp
15060  call chasex
15061 ! ngx is number of retained particles in X
15062  ngx=0
15063 ! ichxyz(i)=1 for particles kept by chase
15064 ! ichxyz(i)=0 for particles rejected by chase
15065  do i=1,ngood
15066  ichxyz(i)=1
15067  enddo
15068  do i=1,ngood
15069  ichxyz(i)=ichas(i)*ichxyz(i)
15070  if(ichxyz(i).eq.1) ngx=ngx+1
15071  enddo
15072  write(16,*)' EMIT: # of retained particles (chasex):',ngx
15073  iarg=1
15074  call cdg(iarg)
15075  tcog=cog(3)
15076  encog=cog(1)
15077  gcog=encog/xmat
15078  bcog=sqrt(1.-1/(gcog*gcog))
15079  dav2(idav,26)=cog(4)*10.
15080  dav2(idav,27)=cog(5)
15081  CALL ext2d(1)
15082  qmdv=exten(1)*exten(3)-exten(2)*exten(2)
15083  trqty=exten(4)*exten(5)-exten(8)*exten(8)
15084  trqpz=exten(6)*exten(7)-exten(9)*exten(9)
15085  surxth=4.*pi*sqrt(trqty)
15086  qditax=2.*sqrt(exten(4))
15087  qdiant=2.*sqrt(exten(5))
15088 !cc below for fourth line of EMIT output
15089 ! ---- caracteristics of the bunch in x-direction
15090 ! dav2(idav,13): x-extension (mm)
15091 ! dav2(idav,14): xp-extension (mrad)
15092 ! dav2(idav,15): coefficient of correlation in plane (x, xp)
15093  dav2(idav,13)=qditax*10.
15094  dav2(idav,14)=qdiant
15095  dav2(idav,15)=0.
15096  if (exten(4).ne.0. .and. exten(5).ne.0.)
15097  * dav1(idav,15)=exten(8)/sqrt(exten(4)*exten(5))
15098 ! Emittance(non norm) in x-xp (mm*mrad)
15099 ! dav2(idav,17)=surxth*10./pi
15100 ! 2016-05-16
15101  chasdat(1)=davtot/100.
15102  chasdat(2)=100.*fractx
15103  chasdat(3)=encog-xmat
15104  chasdat(4)=180.*tcog*fh/pi
15105 ! long emittance in keV.ns
15106  chasdat(7)=1.e12*sqrt(qmdv)/fhinit
15107 ! h emittance
15108  chasdat(5)=bcog*sqrt(trqty)*10./(sqrt(1.-bcog*bcog))
15109 ! v emittance
15110  chasdat(6)=bcog*sqrt(trqpz)*10./(sqrt(1.-bcog*bcog))
15111 ! write the chasex data
15112  write(44,
15113  * '(1x,E13.6,1x,F6.3,5(1x,E13.6),1x,I6,1x,I6,8(1x,E13.6))')
15114  * (chasdat(klm),klm=1,7),ngx,ngood,
15115  * (10.*chexmin(mlk),10.*chexmax(mlk),mlk=1,2),
15116  * (chexmin(mlk),chexmax(mlk),mlk=3,4)
15117  do i=1,ngood
15118  ichas(i)=1
15119  enddo
15120  endif
15121  if(fracty.lt.1.) then
15122 ! --- chase in y-yp
15123  call chasey
15124 ! ngy is number of retained particles in Y
15125  ngy=0
15126 ! ichxyz(i)=1 for particles kept by chase
15127 ! ichxyz(i)=0 for particles rejected by chase
15128  do i=1,ngood
15129  ichxyz(i)=1
15130  enddo
15131  do i=1,ngood
15132  ichxyz(i)=ichas(i)*ichxyz(i)
15133  if(ichxyz(i).eq.1) ngy=ngy+1
15134  enddo
15135  write(16,*)' EMIT: # of retained particles (chasey):',ngy
15136  write(16,*)
15137  iarg=1
15138  call cdg(iarg)
15139  tcog=cog(3)
15140  encog=cog(1)
15141  gcog=encog/xmat
15142  bcog=sqrt(1.-1./(gcog*gcog))
15143  dav2(idav,28)=cog(6)*10.
15144  dav2(idav,29)=cog(7)
15145  CALL ext2d(1)
15146  qmdv=exten(1)*exten(3)-exten(2)*exten(2)
15147  trqty=exten(4)*exten(5)-exten(8)*exten(8)
15148  trqpz=exten(6)*exten(7)-exten(9)*exten(9)
15149  suryph=4.*pi*sqrt(trqpz)
15150  qditay=2.*sqrt(exten(6))
15151  qdianp=2.*sqrt(exten(7))
15152 ! dav2(idav,18): y-extension (mm)
15153 ! dav2(idav,19): yp-extension (mrad)
15154 ! dav2(idav,20): coefficient of correlation in the plane (y, yp)
15155  dav2(idav,20)=0.
15156  if (exten(6).ne.0. .and. exten(7).ne.0.)
15157  * dav2(idav,20)=exten(9)/sqrt(exten(6)*exten(7))
15158  dav2(idav,18)=qditay*10.
15159  dav2(idav,19)=qdianp
15160 ! dav1(idav,22) : Emittance(non norm) in y-yp (mm*mrad)
15161 ! dav2(idav,22)=suryph*10./pi
15162 ! 2016-05-16
15163  chasdat(1)=davtot/100.
15164  chasdat(2)=100.*fracty
15165  chasdat(3)=encog-xmat
15166  chasdat(4)=180.*tcog*fh/pi
15167 ! long emittance in keV.ns
15168  chasdat(7)=1.e12*sqrt(qmdv)/fhinit
15169 ! h emittance
15170  chasdat(5)=bcog*sqrt(trqty)*10./(sqrt(1.-bcog*bcog))
15171 ! v emittance
15172  chasdat(6)=bcog*sqrt(trqpz)*10./(sqrt(1.-bcog*bcog))
15173 ! write the chasey data
15174  write(45,
15175  * '(1x,E13.6,1x,F6.3,5(1x,E13.6),1x,I6,1x,I6,8(1x,E13.6))')
15176  * (chasdat(klm),klm=1,7),ngy,ngood,
15177  * (10.*chexmin(mlk),10.*chexmax(mlk),mlk=1,2),
15178  * (chexmin(mlk),chexmax(mlk),mlk=3,4)
15179  do i=1,ngood
15180  ichas(i)=1
15181  enddo
15182  endif
15183  endif
15184 ! print energy, boro etc for each charge state in long
15185  if(ncstat.gt.1) then
15186  write(16,'(1x,a4)') 'EMIT'
15187  DO k=1,ncstat
15188  ndp(k)=0
15189  do j=2,7
15190  foo(k,j)=0.
15191  enddo
15192  ENDDO
15193  DO i=1,imax
15194  if(f(8,i).eq.1) then
15195  DO k=1,ncstat
15196  if(f(9,i).eq.cstat(k)) then
15197  ndp(k)=ndp(k)+1
15198  do j=2,7
15199  foo(k,j)=foo(k,j)+f(j,i)
15200  enddo
15201  endif
15202  ENDDO
15203  endif
15204  ENDDO
15205  DO k=1,ncstat
15206  if(ndp(k).ne.0) then
15207  do j=2,7
15208  foo(k,j)=foo(k,j)/float(ndp(k))
15209  enddo
15210  endif
15211  ENDDO
15212  write(16,*) ' Q Particles beta Wcog(MeV)',
15213  * ' Wcog(MeV/u) Pcog(kG.cm) TOF(deg) TOF(sec) ',
15214  * ' X_avg(cm) Xp_avg(mrad) ',
15215  * 'Y_avg(cm) Yp_avg(mrad)'
15216  DO k=1,ncstat
15217  if(ndp(k).ne.0) then
15218  gref=foo(k,7)/xmat
15219  bref=sqrt(1.-1./(gref*gref))
15220  xe=(gref-1.)*xmat
15221 ! magnetic rigidity
15222  bor=3.3356*xmat*bref*gref/cstat(k)
15223  write(16,'(2x,f6.2,3x,I5,5x,F9.7,
15224  * 5(1x,E12.5),1x,4(F12.5,2x))')
15225  * cstat(k),ndp(k),bref,xe,xe/atm,bor,foo(k,6)*180.*fh/pi,
15226  * foo(k,6),foo(k,2),foo(k,3),foo(k,4),foo(k,5)
15227  else
15228  write(16,'(2x,f5.2,3x,I5)') cstat(k),ndp(k)
15229  endif
15230  ENDDO
15231  write(16,*)
15232  endif
15233  return
15234  end
15235 
15239  SUBROUTINE emit3d
15240  implicit real(8) (a-h,o-z)
15241  parameter(iptsz=100002,maxcell1=3000)
15242  common/dyn/tref,vref
15243  common/faisc/f(10,iptsz),imax,ngood
15244  common/qmoyen/qmoy
15245  common/etcom/cog(8),exten(17),fd(iptsz)
15246  common /consta/ vl, pi, xmat, rpel, qst
15247  common/trace3d/trace3h(100),trace3t(maxcell1),tif,kt3h,kt3t,fid
15248  common/trace3e/tracebi(6),traceei(3)
15249  character trace3h*128,trace3t*128,tif*128
15250  iarg=1
15251  call cdg(iarg)
15252  CALL ext2d(1)
15253 ! --- qdisp : average dispersion (MeV)
15254 ! --- sqmdv: emittance (MeV*rad)
15255  qdisp=2.*sqrt(exten(1))
15256  qmdv=exten(1)*exten(3)-exten(2)*exten(2)
15257  sqmdv=4.*pi*sqrt(qmdv)
15258 ! --- qdp : average extension in phase (rad)
15259  qdp=2.*sqrt(exten(3))
15260 ! --- cor12: coefficient of correlation in (dE, dPHI)
15261  cor12=exten(2)/sqrt(exten(1)*exten(3))
15262 ! ---- statistics in x-xp and y-yp
15263  trqtx=exten(4)*exten(5)-exten(8)*exten(8)
15264  trqpy=exten(6)*exten(7)-exten(9)*exten(9)
15265  surxth=4.*pi*sqrt(trqtx)
15266  suryph=4.*pi*sqrt(trqpy)
15267  qditax=2.*sqrt(exten(4))
15268  qdiant=2.*sqrt(exten(5))
15269  qditay=2.*sqrt(exten(6))
15270  qdianp=2.*sqrt(exten(7))
15271 ! trace3d
15272 ! x-xp (mm*mrad)
15273  emitx=surxth*10./pi
15274  sgn=1.
15275  if (exten(4).ne.0. .and. exten(5).ne.0.)
15276  * sgn=exten(8)/sqrt(exten(4)*exten(5))
15277  betax=qditax*10.*qditax*10./emitx
15278  gamx=qdiant*qdiant/emitx
15279  alphax=sqrt(betax*gamx-1.)
15280  if(sgn.gt.0.) alphax=-alphax
15281 ! y-yp (mm*mrad)
15282  emity=suryph*10./pi
15283  sgn=1.
15284  if (exten(6).ne.0. .and. exten(7).ne.0.)
15285  * sgn=exten(9)/sqrt(exten(6)*exten(7))
15286  betay=qditay*10.*qditay*10./emity
15287  gamy=qdianp*qdianp/emity
15288  alphay=sqrt(betay*gamy-1.)
15289  if(sgn.gt.0.) alphay=-alphay
15290 ! z-zp (keV*deg)
15291  emitz=sqmdv/pi*1000.*(180./pi)
15292  betaz=qdp*180./pi*qdp*180./pi/emitz
15293  gamz=qdisp*1000.*qdisp*1000./emitz
15294  alphaz=sqrt(betaz*gamz-1.)
15295  if(cor12.gt.0.) alphaz=-alphaz
15296 ! store parameters for trace3d
15297  tracebi(1)=alphax
15298  tracebi(2)=betax
15299  tracebi(3)=alphay
15300  tracebi(4)=betay
15301  tracebi(5)=alphaz
15302  tracebi(6)=betaz
15303  traceei(1)=emitx
15304  traceei(2)=emity
15305  traceei(3)=emitz
15306  return
15307  end
15308 
15322  SUBROUTINE statis
15323  implicit real(8) (a-h,o-z)
15324  parameter(iptsz=100002)
15325  common/dyn/tref,vref
15326  common/ttfc/tk,t1k,t2k,sk,s1k,s2k,fh
15327  common/faisc/f(10,iptsz),imax,ngood
15328  common/qmoyen/qmoy
15329  COMMON /consta/ vl, pi, xmat, rpel, qst
15330  common/stis/surxth,suryph,enedep,ecogde,testca
15331  common/etcom/cog(8),exten(17),fd(iptsz)
15332 ! EXT2D looks for average extensions squared and returns them in EXTEN
15333  iarg=1
15334  call cdg(iarg)
15335  encog=cog(1)
15336  gcog=encog/xmat
15337  bcog=sqrt(1.-1./(gcog*gcog))
15338  tcog=cog(3)
15339  bref=vref/vl
15340  gref=1./sqrt(1.-bref*bref)
15341  enref=xmat*gref
15342  ccgp=(tcog-tref)*fh*180./pi
15343  ccgd=encog-enref
15344  DO i=1,ngood
15345  gpai=f(7,i)/xmat
15346  bpai=sqrt(1.-1./(gpai*gpai))
15347  fd(i)=bpai/bcog * gpai/gcog
15348  enddo
15349  CALL ext2d(1)
15350  testca=exten(1)*exten(2)*exten(3)
15351  IF(abs(testca).gt.1.e-40) THEN
15352  qdisp=2.*sqrt(exten(1))
15353  qmd=exten(1)*exten(3)-exten(2)*exten(2)
15354  surm=4.*pi*sqrt(qmd)*180./pi
15355  qdp=2.*sqrt(exten(3))
15356  cor12=exten(2)/sqrt(exten(1)*exten(3))
15357 ! sup PENT12=SQRT(exten(1)/exten(3))/COR12
15358 ! sup PENT21=SQRT(exten(1)/exten(3))*COR12
15359  qdpde=qdp*180./pi
15360  ELSE
15361  qdisp=0.
15362  qmd=0.
15363  surm=0.
15364  qdp=0.
15365  cor12=0.
15366  pent12=0.
15367  pent21=0.
15368  qdpde=0.
15369  ENDIF
15370  trqtx=exten(4)*exten(5)-exten(8)*exten(8)
15371  trqpy=exten(6)*exten(7)-exten(9)*exten(9)
15372  qditax=2.*sqrt(exten(4))
15373  qdiant=2.*sqrt(exten(5))
15374  qditay=2.*sqrt(exten(6))
15375  qdianp=2.*sqrt(exten(7))
15376  surxth=4.*pi*sqrt(trqtx)
15377  suryph=4.*pi*sqrt(trqpy)
15378  sqmdv=4.*pi*sqrt(qmd)
15379  WRITE(16,52)imax,ngood
15380 52 FORMAT(4x,' TOTAL NUMBER OF PARTICLES :',
15381  x i5,' NUMBER OF PARTICLES CONSIDERED :',i6,/)
15382  WRITE(16,1557)
15383 1557 FORMAT(5x,' *** TRANSVERSE AND LONGITUDINAL STATISTICS')
15384  WRITE(16,1553) cog(4),cog(5)
15385 1553 FORMAT(4x,' COG COORD X : ',e12.5,' CM XP :',e12.5,' MRD')
15386  WRITE(16,1556) cog(6),cog(7)
15387 1556 FORMAT(4x,' COG COORD Y : ',e12.5,' CM YP :',e12.5,' MRD')
15388  WRITE(16,14)ccgp,ccgd
15389 14 FORMAT(4x,' COG COORD dPHI: ',e12.5,' deg dW :',e12.5,' MeV')
15390  WRITE(16,1552) qditax,qdiant,surxth/pi
15391 1552 FORMAT(4x,' X :',e12.5,' CM XP :',e12.5,' MRD EMITTANCE :',
15392  * e15.8,' CM.MRD')
15393  WRITE(16,1555) qditay,qdianp,suryph/pi
15394 1555 FORMAT(4x,' Y :',e12.5,' CM YP :',e12.5,' MRD EMITTANCE :',
15395  * e15.8,' CM.MRD')
15396  WRITE(16,154) qdpde,qdisp,sqmdv*180./(pi*pi)
15397 154 FORMAT(4x,' dPHI : ',f7.3,' deg dW :',3x,f7.3,3x,
15398  * 'MeV EMITTANCE :',e15.8,' MeV.deg',/)
15399 ! sup write(16,*) ' *** ellips (dE,dPHI) '
15400 ! sup write(16,19) surm,qdp,qdisp,cor12
15401 ! sup19 format(' area: ',e12.5,' MeV*deg half phase extent: ',e12.5,
15402 ! sup * ' deg half energy extend: ',e12.5,' MeV',/,
15403 ! sup * ' correlation coef: ',e12.5)
15404 ! sup *
15405  RETURN
15406  END
15407 
15419  SUBROUTINE tiltbm(icg)
15420  implicit real(8) (a-h,o-z)
15421  parameter(iptsz=100002,maxcell1=3000)
15422  COMMON /consta/ vl, pi, xmat, rpel, qst
15423  common/davcom/dav1(maxcell1,40),davtot,iitem(maxcell1),idav
15424  common/tilt/tipha,tix,tiy,shifw,shifp
15425  common/ttfc/tk,t1k,t2k,sk,s1k,s2k,fh
15426  common/faisc/f(10,iptsz),imax,ngood
15427  common/objet/fo(9,iptsz),imaxo
15428  common/qmoyen/qmoy
15429  common/rigid/boro
15430  common/dyn/tref,vref
15431  common/stis/suryth,surzph,enedep,ecogde,testca
15432  common/newtlt/twissa(3),itwiss
15433  common/histo/centre(6)
15434  common/pltprf/sprfx(3000),sprfy(3000),sprfl(3000),sprfw(3000),
15435  x sprfp(3000),sprng(3000),prlab(3000),iprf
15436  CHARACTER*(8) PRLAB
15437  common/shif/dtiph,shift
15438  common/tof/tofini
15439  LOGICAL SHIFT
15440  common/tapes/in,ifile,meta
15441  common/etcom/cog(8),exten(17),fd(iptsz)
15442  WRITE(16,1)tipha,tix,tiy,shifw,shifp
15443 1 FORMAT(' Shift the position of the bunch',/,
15444  x ' in the z-direction :',e12.5,' DEG',/,
15445  x ' in the x-direction :',e12.5,' CM ',/,
15446  x ' in the y-direction :',e12.5,' CM ',/,
15447  x ' shift the energy of the cog with :',e12.5,' MeV',/,
15448  x ' shift the phase of the cog with :',e12.5,' deg',/)
15449  tipha=tipha*pi/180.
15450  shifp=shifp*pi/180.
15451  deg=fh*180./pi
15452  iarg=1
15453  IF(iprf.EQ.1) then
15454  prlab(iprf)='START '
15455  ELSE
15456  prlab(iprf)='TILT '
15457  ENDIF
15458  call cdg(iarg)
15459  encog=cog(1)
15460  tcog=cog(3)
15461  gcog=encog/xmat
15462  bcog=sqrt(1.-1./(gcog*gcog))
15463 ! --- this routine is call by the routine ENTRE with icg = 1
15464 ! the reference particle is the cog of the bunch
15465  if(icg.ne.0) then
15466  tref=tcog
15467  vref=vl*bcog
15468  vcour=vref
15469  gcour=gcog
15470  bcour=bcog
15471  WRITE(16,*)'*** Before tilt and shift '
15472  WRITE(16,24)bcog,tref,tref*deg,encog-xmat
15473 24 FORMAT(2x,'*** the reference particle is the cog:',/,
15474  x ' REF AND COG: BETA :',e12.5,2x,'TOF :',e12.5,
15475  * ' SEC OR: ',e12.5,' deg',
15476  x 2x,' ENERGY :',e12.5,' MeV',/)
15477  endif
15478  if(icg.eq.0) then
15479  vcour=vl*bcog
15480  bcour=bcog
15481  gcour=gcog
15482  bvref=vref/vl
15483  gamref=1./sqrt(1.-bvref*bvref)
15484  wvref=(gamref-1.)*xmat
15485  WRITE(16,*)'*** Before tilt and shift '
15486  WRITE(16,*)' the reference particle and cog are distinct'
15487  WRITE(16,16)bvref,tref,tref*deg,wvref,bcog,tcog,
15488  * tcog*deg,encog-xmat
15489 16 FORMAT(2x,' REF: BETA ',e12.5,
15490  x ' T.O.F. ',e12.5,' SEC OR ',e12.5,' DG',
15491  x ' ENERGY ',e12.5,' MeV',//,2x,
15492  x ' COG: BETA ',e12.5,' T.O.F. ',
15493  x e12.5,' SEC OR ',e12.5,' DG',
15494  x ' ENERGY ',e12.5,' MeV',/)
15495  endif
15496  DO i=1,ngood
15497  gapi=f(7,i)/xmat
15498  bepi=sqrt(1.-1./(gapi*gapi))
15499  fd(i)=bepi/bcour*gapi/gcour
15500  ENDDO
15501  CALL ext2(1)
15502 ! shift of the ellipse in the longitudinal plane with regard to the cog (TILT)
15503 ! the slip of phase is : TIPHA
15504 ! the ellipsoid generated by GEBEAM and INPUT is upright
15505 ! qdispw=dispersion in energy
15506  qdispw=2.*sqrt(exten(10))
15507  encrt=encog+qdispw
15508  gamcrt=encrt/xmat
15509  bcrt=sqrt(1.-1./(gamcrt*gamcrt))
15510  vcrt=bcrt*vl
15511  delv=vcrt-vcour
15512 ! shift of the ellipse in the transverse planes with regard to the cog
15513 ! DELTH ET DELPH: slips in xp and yp (mrd)
15514 ! horizontal plane
15515  delxp=2.*sqrt(exten(5))
15516 ! vertical plane
15517  delyp=2.*sqrt(exten(7))
15518  write(16,22) qdispw,delxp,delyp
15519 22 format(' half size in energy ',e12.5,' MeV',/,
15520  * ' half size in xp ',e12.5,' mrd',/,
15521  * ' half size in yp ',e12.5,' mrd')
15522 ! Shift of the ellipses in the phase spaces
15523  tcrt=0.
15524  do i=1,ngood
15525  gapi=f(7,i)/xmat
15526  bpai=sqrt(1.-1./(gapi*gapi))
15527  vpai=vl*bpai
15528  dv=(vpai-vcour)*tipha/(delv*fh)
15529  f(6,i)=f(6,i)-dv
15530  tcrt=tcrt+f(6,i)
15531  dlx=0.
15532  dly=0.
15533  if(delxp.ne.0.) dlx=f(3,i)*tix/delxp
15534  if(delyp.ne.0.) dly=f(5,i)*tiy/delyp
15535  f(2,i)=f(2,i)+dlx
15536  f(4,i)=f(4,i)+dly
15537  enddo
15538  tcrt=tcrt/float(ngood)
15539  dtiph=0.
15540  if(shifw.ne.0. .or. shifp.ne.0.) then
15541  shtref=shifp/fh
15542  enshift=encog+shifw
15543  gshift=enshift/xmat
15544  bshift=sqrt(1.-1./(gshift*gshift))
15545  eshift=enshift-xmat
15546  vshift=vl*bshift
15547  tshift=tcrt+shtref
15548  deltav=vshift-vcour
15549  deltat=tshift-tcog
15550  endif
15551  if(shifw.eq.0. .and. shifp.eq.0.) then
15552  enshift=encog
15553  eshift=enshift-xmat
15554  gshift=gcour
15555  vshift=vcour
15556  bshift=vshift/vl
15557  tshift=tcrt
15558  shtref=0.
15559  deltav=0.
15560  deltat=0.
15561  endif
15562  do i=1,ngood
15563  f(7,i)=f(7,i)+shifw
15564  gpai=f(7,i)/xmat
15565  bpai=sqrt(1.-1./(gpai*gpai))
15566  f(6,i)=f(6,i)+shtref
15567  vapi=vl*bpai
15568  enddo
15569  if(itwiss.eq.1) tref=tref+tofini
15570  WRITE(16,*)' ***After tilt and shift '
15571  bvref=vref/vl
15572  gamref=1./sqrt(1.-bvref*bvref)
15573  wvref=(gamref-1.)*xmat
15574  write(16,16) bvref,tref,tref*deg,wvref,bshift,tshift,
15575  * tshift*deg,eshift
15576  do i=1,ngood
15577  fo(7,i)=f(7,i)
15578  fo(2,i)=f(2,i)
15579  fo(3,i)=f(3,i)
15580  fo(4,i)=f(4,i)
15581  fo(5,i)=f(5,i)
15582  fo(6,i)=f(6,i)
15583  enddo
15584  if(itwiss.ne.1) then
15585  dum=0.
15586  write(11,*) ngood,dum,fh/(2000000.*pi)
15587  do i=1,ngood
15588  f(2,i)=f(2,i)+centre(2)
15589  f(3,i)=f(3,i)+centre(3)
15590  f(4,i)=f(4,i)+centre(4)
15591  f(5,i)=f(5,i)+centre(5)
15592  f(6,i)=f(6,i)+centre(6)
15593  f(7,i)=f(7,i)+centre(1)
15594  etphas=fh*(f(6,i)-tcog)
15595 !option etener=f(7,i)-encog
15596  etener=f(7,i)-xmat
15597  write(11,777) f(2,i),f(3,i)/1000.,f(4,i),f(5,i)/1000.,
15598  * etphas,etener
15599  enddo
15600 777 format(6(f13.8,1x))
15601  endif
15602 ! ENVELOPE
15603  CALL stapl(davtot*10.)
15604  RETURN
15605  END
15606 
15618  SUBROUTINE tiltbm_bis(icg)
15619  implicit real(8) (a-h,o-z)
15620  parameter(iptsz=100002,maxcell1=3000)
15621  COMMON /consta/ vl, pi, xmat, rpel, qst
15622  common/davcom/dav1(maxcell1,40),davtot,iitem(maxcell1),idav
15623  common/tilt/tipha,tix,tiy,shifw,shifp
15624  common/ttfc/tk,t1k,t2k,sk,s1k,s2k,fh
15625  common/faisc/f(10,iptsz),imax,ngood
15626  common/objet/fo(9,iptsz),imaxo
15627  common/qmoyen/qmoy
15628  common/rigid/boro
15629  common/dyn/tref,vref
15630  common/stis/suryth,surzph,enedep,ecogde,testca
15631  common/newtlt/twissa(3),itwiss
15632  common/histo/centre(6)
15633  common/shif/dtiph,shift
15634 !omment common/tof/tofini
15635  LOGICAL SHIFT
15636  common/tapes/in,ifile,meta
15637  common/etcom/cog(8),exten(17),fd(iptsz)
15638  WRITE(16,1)tipha,tix,tiy,shifw,shifp
15639 1 FORMAT(' shift the position around the c.o.g. of the bunch',/,
15640  x ' with regard to the phase axis :',e12.5,' DEG',/,
15641  x ' in the x-direction :',e12.5,' CM ',/,
15642  x ' in the y-direction :',e12.5,' CM ',/,
15643  x ' Change of energy position of the c.o.g. :',e12.5,' MEV',/,
15644  x ' Change of phase position of the c.o.g. :',e12.5,' DEG',/)
15645  shtref=0.
15646  tipha=tipha*pi/180.
15647  shifp=shifp*pi/180.
15648  deg=fh*180./pi
15649  iarg=1
15650  call cdg(iarg)
15651  encog=cog(1)
15652  tcog=cog(3)
15653  gcog=encog/xmat
15654  bcog=sqrt(1.-1./(gcog*gcog))
15655  IF(icg.NE.0 .AND. (shifw.EQ.0. .OR. shifp.EQ.0.)) THEN
15656 ! the reference and the cog coincide
15657  tref=tcog
15658  vref=vl*bcog
15659  vcour=vref
15660  gcour=gcog
15661  bcour=bcog
15662  WRITE(16,*)' Before shift '
15663  WRITE(16,24)vref,tref,encog-xmat
15664 24 FORMAT(2x,' Note : reference will coincide with the cog',/,
15665  x 2x,' velocity :',e12.5,' CM/SEC',2x,'tof :',e12.5,' SEC',/,
15666  x 2x,' ENERGY :',e12.5,' MeV',/)
15667  ELSE
15668 ! the reference is distinct from the cog
15669  vcour=vl*bcog
15670  bcour=bcog
15671  gcour=gcog
15672  bvref=vref/vl
15673  gamref=1./sqrt(1.-bvref*bvref)
15674  wvref=(gamref-1.)*xmat
15675  WRITE(16,*)' Before shift '
15676  WRITE(16,16)vref,tref,tref*deg,wvref,vcour,tcog,
15677  * tcog*deg,encog-xmat
15678  ENDIF
15679  DO i=1,ngood
15680  gapi=f(7,i)/xmat
15681  bepi=sqrt(1.-1./(gapi*gapi))
15682  fd(i)=bepi/bcour*gapi/gcour
15683  ENDDO
15684  CALL ext2(1)
15685 ! shift of the ellipse in the longitudinal plane with regard to the cog (TILT)
15686 ! the slip of phase is : TIPHA
15687 ! the elipsoid generated from MONTE end ENTRE is upright
15688 ! qdispw=dispersion in energy
15689  qdispw=2.*sqrt(exten(10))
15690  encrt=encog+qdispw
15691  gamcrt=encrt/xmat
15692  bcrt=sqrt(1.-1./(gamcrt*gamcrt))
15693  vcrt=bcrt*vl
15694  delv=vcrt-vcour
15695 ! shift of the ellipse in the transverse planes with regard to the cog
15696 ! DELTH ET DELPH: slips in xp and yp (MRD)
15697 ! horizontal plane
15698  delxp=2.*sqrt(exten(5))
15699 ! vertical plane
15700  delyp=2.*sqrt(exten(7))
15701  write(16,22) qdispw,delxp,delyp
15702 22 format(' half size in energy ',e12.5,' MeV',/,
15703  * ' half size in xp ',e12.5,' mrd',/,
15704  * ' half size in yp ',e12.5,' mrd')
15705 ! Shift of the ellipses in the phase spaces
15706  tcrt=0.
15707  do i=1,ngood
15708  gapi=f(7,i)/xmat
15709  bpai=sqrt(1.-1./(gapi*gapi))
15710  vpai=vl*bpai
15711  dv=(vpai-vcour)*tipha/(delv*fh)
15712  f(6,i)=f(6,i)-dv
15713  tcrt=tcrt+f(6,i)
15714  dlx=0.
15715  dly=0.
15716  if(delxp.ne.0.) dlx=f(3,i)*tix/delxp
15717  if(delyp.ne.0.) dly=f(5,i)*tiy/delyp
15718  f(2,i)=f(2,i)+dlx
15719  f(4,i)=f(4,i)+dly
15720  enddo
15721  tcrt=tcrt/float(ngood)
15722  dtiph=0.
15723 ! shift=.true.: The reference and COG are independent
15724 ! shift=.false. The reference and COG are the same
15725  IF(shifw.NE.0. .OR. shifp.NE.0.) THEN
15726  shift=.true.
15727  shtref=shifp/fh
15728  enshift=encog+shifw
15729  gshift=enshift/xmat
15730  bshift=sqrt(1.-1./(gshift*gshift))
15731  eshift=enshift-xmat
15732  vshift=vl*bshift
15733  tshift=tcrt+shtref
15734  ELSE
15735  shift=.false.
15736  enshift=encog
15737  eshift=enshift-xmat
15738  gshift=gcour
15739  vshift=vcour
15740  tshift=tcrt
15741  ENDIF
15742  if(icg.eq.0) then
15743  deltav=vshift-vcour
15744  deltat=tshift-tcog
15745  else
15746  deltav=0.
15747  deltat=0.
15748  shifw=0.
15749  shtref=0.
15750  endif
15751  write(16,*) 'tofini,tcrt=',tofini,tcrt,tcrt*deg
15752  if(shift) then
15753  write(16,*) 'Reference and COG are independent',icg
15754  else
15755  write(16,*) 'Reference and COG coincide',icg
15756  endif
15757  do i=1,ngood
15758  f(7,i)=f(7,i)+shifw
15759  gpai=f(7,i)/xmat
15760  bpai=sqrt(1.-1./(gpai*gpai))
15761  f(6,i)=f(6,i)+shtref
15762  vapi=vl*bpai
15763  enddo
15764  if(itwiss.eq.1) tref=tref+tofini
15765  WRITE(16,*)' After shift '
15766  bvref=vref/vl
15767  gamref=1./sqrt(1.-bvref*bvref)
15768  wvref=(gamref-1.)*xmat
15769  write(16,16)vref,tref,tref*deg,wvref,vshift,tshift,
15770  * tshift*deg,eshift
15771 16 FORMAT(2x,' REFERENCE: VELOCITY :',e12.5,
15772  x ' CM/SEC, T.O.F. :',e12.5,' SEC OR ',e12.5,' DG',/,
15773  x 3x,' ENERGY : ',e12.5,' MeV',/,2x,
15774  x ' C.O.G.: VELOCITY :',e12.5,' CM/SEC, T.O.F. :',
15775  x e12.5,' SEC OR ',e12.5,' DG',/,
15776  x 3x,' ENERGY : ',e12.5,' MeV',//)
15777  bpai=0.
15778  do i=1,ngood
15779  fo(7,i)=f(7,i)
15780  fo(2,i)=f(2,i)
15781  fo(3,i)=f(3,i)
15782  fo(4,i)=f(4,i)
15783  fo(5,i)=f(5,i)
15784  fo(6,i)=f(6,i)
15785  enddo
15786  if(itwiss.ne.1) then
15787  write(11,*) ngood
15788  do i=1,ngood
15789  f(2,i)=f(2,i)+centre(2)
15790  f(3,i)=f(3,i)+centre(3)
15791  f(4,i)=f(4,i)+centre(4)
15792  f(5,i)=f(5,i)+centre(5)
15793  f(6,i)=f(6,i)+centre(6)
15794  f(7,i)=f(7,i)+centre(1)
15795  etphas=fh*(f(6,i)-tcog)
15796 !option etener=f(7,i)-encog
15797  etener=f(7,i)-xmat
15798  write(11,777) f(2,i),f(3,i),f(4,i),f(5,i),etphas,etener
15799  enddo
15800 777 format(6(f13.8,1x))
15801  endif
15802 ! ENVELOPE
15803  CALL stapl(davtot*10.)
15804  RETURN
15805  END
15806 
15810  SUBROUTINE accept
15811  implicit real(8) (a-h,o-z)
15812  parameter(iptsz=100002,maxcell1=3000)
15813  common/ttfc/tk,t1k,t2k,sk,s1k,s2k,fh
15814  common/tapes/in,ifile,meta
15815  common/faisc/f(10,iptsz),imax,ngood
15816  common/etcom/cog(8),exten(17),fd(iptsz)
15817  common/dyn/tref,vref
15818  common/dyni/vrefi,trefi,fhinit,acpt
15819  common/qmoyen/qmoy
15820  common/objet/fo(9,iptsz),imaxo
15821  common/consta/vl,pi,xmat,rpel,qst
15822  common/etcha1/ichas(iptsz),chexmin(10),chexmax(10),chasit
15823  common/paths/dpath
15824  character*(256) dpath,myfile
15825  dimension back(9,iptsz)
15826  logical chasit,ACPT,fracc
15827  common/mcs/imcs,ncstat,cstat(20)
15828  common/frmacc/fracc
15829  common/davprt/shortl
15830  character shortl*80
15831  myfile=''
15832 ! make statistics on initial beam using IEX at the point where
15833 ! the ACCEPT card has been placed
15834  write(16,*)
15835  write(16,*) 'Physical acceptance has:'
15836  write(16,*) imaxo,' particles at origin'
15837  iprint=1
15838  savfh=fh
15839  satref=tref
15840  savref=vref
15841 ! recall initial frequency
15842  fh=fhinit
15843  tref=trefi
15844  vref=vrefi
15845 ! save current beam
15846  do i=1,9
15847  do j=1,ngood
15848  back(i,j)=f(i,j)
15849  enddo
15850  enddo
15851 ! original particle number is in f(1,j)
15852 ! F (I,8): =1 the particle is good, =0 the particle is lost
15853 ! recuperate original particle numbers and their coordinates
15854 ! next loop for graphics and file of good particles
15855  do j=1,imax
15856  tprt=fh*fo(6,j)
15857  eprt=fo(7,j)-xmat
15858  f2=fo(2,j)
15859  f3=fo(3,j)/1000.
15860  f4=fo(4,j)
15861  f5=fo(5,j)/1000.
15862  nold=int(f(1,j))
15863  enddo
15864  myfile='input_kept.dst'
15865  lpath=len_trim(dpath)
15866  lfile=len_trim(myfile)
15867  myfile(lpath+1:lpath+lfile)=myfile(1:lfile)
15868  myfile(1:lpath)=dpath(1:lpath)
15869  myfile=trim(myfile)
15870  open(23,file=myfile,status='unknown')
15871  dummy=0.
15872  write(23,*) ngood,dummy, fh/(2000000.*pi)
15873  do j=1,ngood
15874  nold=int(f(1,j))
15875  do jj=1,9
15876  f(jj,j)=fo(jj,nold)
15877  enddo
15878  tprt=fh*f(6,j)
15879  eprt=f(7,j)-xmat
15880  f2=f(2,j)
15881  f3=f(3,j)
15882  f4=f(4,j)
15883  f5=f(5,j)
15884  if(ncstat.gt.1) then
15885  write(23,101)f2,f3/1000.,f4,f5/1000.,tprt,eprt,f(9,j)
15886  else
15887  write(23,100)f2,f3/1000.,f4,f5/1000.,tprt,eprt
15888  endif
15889  enddo
15890  close(23)
15891 ! now make graphics
15892  write(16,*) 'Starting good particles graphics for ACCEPT card'
15893  igrprm=0
15894  call ytzp
15895 ! print out beam statistics
15896  fracc=.true.
15897  shortl='ACCEPT input beam data for retained particles'
15898  call emiprt(1)
15899 ! next loop for graphics and file of lost particles
15900  myfile='input_lost.dst'
15901  lpath=len_trim(dpath)
15902  lfile=len_trim(myfile)
15903  myfile(lpath+1:lpath+lfile)=myfile(1:lfile)
15904  myfile(1:lpath)=dpath(1:lpath)
15905  myfile=trim(myfile)
15906  open(23,file=myfile,status='unknown')
15907  dummy=0.
15908  write(23,*) imax-ngood,dummy, fh/(2000000.*pi)
15909  j=1
15910  ngd=ngood
15911  do k=ngood+1,imax
15912  nold=int(f(1,k))
15913  do jj=1,9
15914  f(jj,j)=fo(jj,nold)
15915  enddo
15916  tprt=fh*f(6,j)
15917  eprt=f(7,j)-xmat
15918  f2=f(2,j)
15919  f3=f(3,j)
15920  f4=f(4,j)
15921  f5=f(5,j)
15922  if(ncstat.gt.1) then
15923  write(23,101)f2,f3/1000.,f4,f5/1000.,tprt,eprt,f(9,j)
15924  else
15925  write(23,100)f2,f3/1000.,f4,f5/1000.,tprt,eprt
15926  endif
15927  j=j+1
15928  enddo
15929  ngood=imax-ngood
15930 100 format(6(f15.8,1x))
15931 101 format(7(f15.8,1x))
15932  close(23)
15933 ! now make graphics
15934  write(16,*) 'Starting lost particles graphics for ACCEPT card'
15935  igrprm=0
15936  call ytzp
15937 ! print out beam statistics
15938  shortl='ACCEPT input beam data for rejected particles'
15939  call emiprt(1)
15940  fracc=.false.
15941 ! recall original coordinates
15942  ngood=ngd
15943  do i=1,9
15944  do j=1,ngood
15945  f(i,j)=back(i,j)
15946  enddo
15947  enddo
15948  tref=satref
15949  vref=savref
15950  fh=savfh
15951  return
15952  end
15953 
15957  SUBROUTINE ytzp
15958  implicit real(8) (a-h,o-z)
15959  parameter(iptsz=100002,maxcell1=3000)
15960  CHARACTER TEXT*80,PATITL*80
15961  COMMON /consta/ vl, pi, xmat, rpel, qst
15962  common/ttfc/tk,t1k,t2k,sk,s1k,s2k,fh
15963  common/faisc/f(10,iptsz),imax,ngood
15964  common/stis/suryth,surzph,enedep,ecogde,testca
15965  common/fene/wdisp,wphas,wx,wy,rlim,ifw
15966  common/dyn/tref,vref
15967  common/tapes/in,ifile,meta
15968  common/etcom/cog(8),exten(17),fd(iptsz)
15969  common/etcha1/ichas(iptsz),chexmin(10),chexmax(10),chasit
15970  common/grparm/glim(4,2),glim1(4,2),glim2(4,2),patitl,
15971  * ngraphs(100),idwdp,igrprm,ngrafs
15972  common/mcs/imcs,ncstat,cstat(20)
15973  common/zones/frms(6),nzone
15974  LOGICAL chasit
15975  dimension oldcog(7),slim(4,2)
15976  dimension xx(iptsz),yy(iptsz),cs(iptsz)
15977  satref=tref
15978  savref=vref
15979  init=0
15980  call area(init)
15981  if (igrprm.eq.0) then
15982 ! READ GRAPH TITLE
15983  READ(in,20) text
15984 20 FORMAT(a)
15985 ! idwdp=0 cog=ref in ZZ' plot (for instance for Alvarez structure)
15986 ! idwdp=1 cog<>ref in ZZ' plot (for instance for IH structrure)
15987  READ(in,*) idwdp,rmsmtp
15988 ! READ GRAPH LIMITS INTO GLIM(J,K), J=GRAPH NUMBER
15989 ! K=1 HOR. LIMIT , K=2 VERT. LIMIT
15990  READ(in,*) ((glim(j,k), k=1,2), j=1,4)
15991  endif
15992  if (igrprm.eq.1) then
15993  text=patitl
15994  endif
15995  if (igrprm.eq.2) then
15996  text=patitl
15997 ! save limits in GLIM(j,k)
15998  do j=1,4
15999  do k=1,2
16000  slim(j,k)=glim(j,k)
16001  glim(j,k)=glim1(j,k)
16002  enddo
16003  enddo
16004  endif
16005  if (igrprm.eq.3) then
16006  text=patitl
16007 ! save limits in GLIM(j,k)
16008  do j=1,4
16009  do k=1,2
16010  slim(j,k)=glim(j,k)
16011  glim(j,k)=glim2(j,k)
16012  enddo
16013  enddo
16014  endif
16015  do i=1,ngood
16016  ichas(i)=1
16017  enddo
16018  iarg=1
16019  call cdg(iarg)
16020  encog=cog(1)
16021  gcog=encog/xmat
16022  if(gcog.le.1) then
16023  write(6,*)
16024  write(6,*) 'Relativistic gamma of COG less < 1 in graphics'
16025  stop
16026  write(6,*)
16027  endif
16028  bcog=sqrt(1.-1./(gcog*gcog))
16029  tcog=cog(3)
16030  oldcog(1)=cog(4)
16031  oldcog(2)=cog(5)
16032  oldcog(3)=cog(6)
16033  oldcog(4)=cog(7)
16034  oldcog(5)=cog(3)
16035  oldcog(6)=cog(8)
16036  oldcog(7)=cog(1)
16037  enprt=encog-xmat
16038  teps=1.e-08
16039  rmssz=sqrt(rmsmtp)
16040  iarg=1
16041  call ext2(iarg)
16042  qdisp=rmssz*sqrt(exten(1))
16043  qmd=exten(1)*exten(3)-exten(2)*exten(2)
16044  qmdw=exten(10)*exten(3)-exten(11)*exten(11)
16045  surm=rmsmtp*180.*sqrt(qmd)
16046  qdp=rmssz*sqrt(exten(3))
16047  if(exten(1).ne.0. .and. exten(3).ne.0.) then
16048  cor12=exten(2)/sqrt(exten(1)*exten(3))
16049  pent12=sqrt(exten(1)/exten(3))/cor12
16050  pent21=sqrt(exten(1)/exten(3))*cor12
16051  else
16052  cor12=0.
16053  pent12=0.
16054  pent21=0.
16055  ENDIF
16056  qdpde=qdp*180./pi
16057  trqty=exten(4)*exten(5)-exten(8)*exten(8)
16058  trqpz=exten(6)*exten(7)-exten(9)*exten(9)
16059  suryth=rmsmtp*pi*sqrt(trqty)
16060  surzph=rmsmtp*pi*sqrt(trqpz)
16061  qditay=rmssz*sqrt(exten(4))
16062  qdiant=rmssz*sqrt(exten(5))
16063  qdita=rmssz*sqrt(exten(6))
16064  qdianp=rmssz*sqrt(exten(7))
16065  write(16,*) ' *** PLOT Ellips for ',rmsmtp,' RMS'
16066  write(16,'(a)') text
16067  WRITE(16,1557) imax,ngood
16068 1557 FORMAT(1x,' *** GRAPH, TOTAL NUMBER OF PARTICLES : ',i6,
16069  1 ' PARTICLES KEPT : ',i6,//,' *** HORIZONTAL phase plane ',/)
16070  WRITE(16,1553) cog(4),cog(5)
16071 1553 FORMAT(4x,' C.O.G. :',
16072  1 5x,' X : ',e12.5,' CM XP :',e12.5,' MRD',/)
16073  if(rmsmtp.gt.teps) then
16074  WRITE(16,1552) qditay,qdiant,suryth
16075 1552 FORMAT(4x,' 1/2 EXTENSION X : ',e12.5,' CM',/,4x,
16076  1 ' 1/2 EXTENSION XP : ',e12.5,' MRD',4x,
16077  2 ' SURFACE : ',e15.8,' CM.MRD',/)
16078  endif
16079  WRITE(16,1554)
16080 1554 FORMAT(' *** VERTICAL phase plane ',/)
16081  WRITE(16,1556) cog(6),cog(7)
16082 1556 FORMAT(4x,' C.O.G :',
16083  1 5x,' Y : ',e12.5,' CM YP :',e12.5,' MRD',/)
16084  if(rmsmtp.gt.teps) then
16085  WRITE(16,1555) qdita,qdianp,surzph
16086 1555 FORMAT(4x,' 1/2 EXTENSION Y : ',e12.5,' CM',/,4x,
16087  1 ' 1/2 EXTENSION YP : ',e12.5,' MRD',4x,
16088  2 ' SURFACE : ',e15.8,' CM.MRD',/)
16089  endif
16090 ! Store header and particle coordinates in binary file for
16091 ! graphics post-processor
16092 !
16093 ! igrtyp is type of graph
16094 ! igrtyp=1 for ytzp emittance plots
16095 ! igrtyp=6 for ytzp emittance plots for multi-charge state beam
16096 ! igrtyp=11 for ytzp emittance plots with ZONES card
16097 !
16098  igrtyp=1
16099  if(nzone.ne.0)igrtyp=11
16100  if(imcs.eq.1) igrtyp=6
16101  WRITE(66,*) igrtyp
16102  if (igrtyp.eq.6)then
16103  write(66,*) ncstat
16104  write(66,*) (cstat(j),j=1,ncstat)
16105  endif
16106  if (igrtyp.eq.11)then
16107  write(66,*) nzone
16108  write(66,*) (frms(j),j=2,nzone),' 0.'
16109  endif
16110  WRITE(66,*) text
16111  xx(1)=glim(1,1)
16112  yy(1)=glim(1,2)
16113  WRITE(66,*) -xx(1),xx(1),-yy(1),yy(1)
16114 ! first store ellips coordinates XX'
16115  step=qdiant/50.
16116  tta=exten(5)
16117  do 345 i=1,101
16118  xii=-qdiant+step*float(i-1)
16119  yy(i)=xii+cog(5)
16120  yy(202-i)=yy(i)
16121  ttb=exten(8)*xii
16122  ttc=exten(4)*xii**2-trqty*rmsmtp
16123  ttcb=ttb**2-ttc*tta
16124  IF(ttcb.LE.0.) ttcb=0.
16125  IF(tta.eq.0.) then
16126  yi=0.
16127  yii=0.
16128  ELSE
16129  quot=ttcb/tta**2
16130  yi=ttb/tta-sqrt(quot)
16131  yii=ttb/tta+sqrt(quot)
16132  ENDIF
16133  xx(i)=yi+cog(4)
16134  xx(202-i)=yii+cog(4)
16135 345 continue
16136  do i=1,201
16137  WRITE(66,*) xx(i),yy(i)
16138  enddo
16139  do i=1,ngood
16140  xx(i)=f(2,i)
16141  yy(i)=f(3,i)
16142  enddo
16143  if (imcs.eq.1) then
16144  do i=1,ngood
16145  cs(i)=f(9,i)
16146  enddo
16147  endif
16148 ! write particle coordinates to graphics file
16149  WRITE(66,*) ngood
16150  if (imcs.eq.0) then
16151  if(nzone.eq.0) then
16152  do i=1,ngood
16153  WRITE(66,*) xx(i),yy(i)
16154  enddo
16155  else
16156  do i=1,ngood
16157  WRITE(66,*) xx(i),yy(i),f(10,i)
16158  enddo
16159  endif
16160  else
16161  do i=1,ngood
16162  WRITE(66,*) xx(i),yy(i),cs(i)
16163  enddo
16164  endif
16165 ! YY' next
16166  xx(1)=glim(2,1)
16167  yy(1)=glim(2,2)
16168  WRITE(66,*) -xx(1),xx(1),-yy(1),yy(1)
16169 ! first write ellips coordinates
16170  step=qdianp/50.
16171  tta=exten(7)
16172  do 346 i=1,101
16173  xii=-qdianp+step*float(i-1)
16174  yy(i)=xii+cog(7)
16175  yy(202-i)=yy(i)
16176  ttb=exten(9)*xii
16177  ttc=exten(6)*xii**2-trqpz*rmsmtp
16178  ttcb=ttb**2-ttc*tta
16179  IF(ttcb.LE.0.) ttcb=0.
16180  IF(tta.eq.0.) then
16181  yi=0.
16182  yii=0.
16183  ELSE
16184  quot=ttcb/tta**2
16185  yi=ttb/tta-sqrt(quot)
16186  yii=ttb/tta+sqrt(quot)
16187  ENDIF
16188  xx(i)=yi+cog(6)
16189  xx(202-i)=yii+cog(6)
16190 346 continue
16191  do i=1,201
16192  WRITE(66,*) xx(i),yy(i)
16193  enddo
16194  do i=1,ngood
16195  xx(i)=f(4,i)
16196  yy(i)=f(5,i)
16197  enddo
16198 ! write particle coordinates to graphics file
16199  WRITE(66,*) ngood
16200  if (imcs.eq.0) then
16201  if(nzone.eq.0) then
16202  do i=1,ngood
16203  WRITE(66,*) xx(i),yy(i)
16204  enddo
16205  else
16206  do i=1,ngood
16207  WRITE(66,*) xx(i),yy(i),f(10,i)
16208  enddo
16209  endif
16210  else
16211  do i=1,ngood
16212  WRITE(66,*) xx(i),yy(i),cs(i)
16213  enddo
16214  endif
16215 !
16216 ! TRACE GRAPHE ZZ'
16217  xx(1)=glim(3,1)
16218  yy(1)=glim(3,2)
16219  WRITE(66,*) -xx(1),xx(1),-yy(1),yy(1)
16220 !
16221  xx(1)=glim(4,1)
16222  yy(1)=glim(4,2)
16223  WRITE(66,*) -xx(1),xx(1),-yy(1),yy(1)
16224 ! TRACE DE L ELLIPSE DE CONCENTRATION
16225  bref=vref/vl
16226  gref=1./sqrt(1.-bref*bref)
16227  wref=xmat*(gref-1.)
16228  gcog=1./sqrt(1.-bcog*bcog)
16229  wcog=xmat*(gcog-1.)
16230  WRITE(16,22) wref,tref,wcog,tcog
16231 22 FORMAT(' *** LONGITUDINAL phase plane ',/,
16232  1 6x,' REFERENCE : ',
16233  2 ' ENERGY: ',e15.8,' (MeV), TOF: ',e15.8,' (SEC)',
16234  3 /, 6x,' COG : ',
16235  4 ' ENERGY: ',e15.8,' (MeV), TOF: ',e15.8,' (SEC)',/)
16236  WRITE(16,167) qmd,surm,qdp,qdpde,qdisp,cor12,pent12,pent21
16237 167 FORMAT(3x,' ***',
16238  2 ' 2nd ORDER MOMENTS :',e12.5,' (RD DP/P)**2',
16239  3 ' SURFACE : ',e12.5,' (DEG DP/P)',/,
16240  4 6x,' 1/2 EXTENSION PHASE : ',e12.5,' RD ',
16241  5 ' OR ',e12.5,' DEG',/,6x,
16242  6 ' 1/2 EXTENSION DISPERSION : ',e15.8,' IN DP/P ',/,6x,
16243  7 ' CORRELATION COEF : ',e15.8,/,6x,
16244  8 ' DISPERSION SLOPE: ',e15.8,' (DP/P)/RD ',/,6x,
16245  9 ' PHASE SLOPE : ',e15.8,' (DP/P)/RD ')
16246 ! GRAPHE DE L ELLIPSE
16247  step=qdpde/50.
16248  tta=exten(3)*180.*180./(pi*pi)
16249  do 347 i=1,101
16250  xii=-qdpde+step*float(i-1)
16251  xx(i)=xii
16252  xx(202-i)=xx(i)
16253  ttb=exten(11)*xii*180./pi
16254  ttc=exten(10)*xii**2-qmdw*rmsmtp*180.*180./(pi*pi)
16255  ttcb=ttb**2-ttc*tta
16256  IF(ttcb.LE.0.) ttcb=0.
16257  IF(tta.eq.0.) then
16258  yi=0.
16259  yii=0.
16260  ELSE
16261  quot=ttcb/tta**2
16262  yi=ttb/tta-sqrt(quot)
16263  yii=ttb/tta+sqrt(quot)
16264  ENDIF
16265  yy(i)=yi
16266  yy(202-i)=yii
16267 347 continue
16268  enihrf=0.
16269  if(idwdp.eq.0) then
16270 ! Alvarez
16271  do i=1,201
16272  WRITE(66,*) xx(i),yy(i)
16273  enddo
16274  else
16275 ! IH
16276  bref=vref/vl
16277  gref=1./sqrt(1.-bref*bref)
16278  enihrf=xmat*(gref-1.)
16279  phihrf=fh*(tcog-tref)*180./pi
16280  do i=1,201
16281  axx=phihrf
16282  ayy=encog-enihrf-xmat
16283  WRITE(66,*) xx(i)+axx,yy(i)+ayy
16284  enddo
16285  endif
16286 ! write particle coordinates to graphics file
16287  do i=1,ngood
16288  if (idwdp.eq.0) then
16289 ! Alvarez like
16290  xx(i)=fh*(f(6,i)-tcog)*180./pi
16291  yy(i)=f(7,i)-encog
16292  if (imcs.eq.1) cs(i)=f(9,i)
16293  endif
16294  IF(idwdp.eq.1) THEN
16295 ! IH like
16296  xx(i)=fh*(f(6,i)-tref)*180./pi
16297  yy(i)=f(7,i)-enihrf-xmat
16298  if (imcs.eq.1) cs(i)=f(9,i)
16299  endif
16300  enddo
16301 ! write particle coordinates to graphics file
16302  WRITE(66,*) ngood
16303  if (imcs.eq.0) then
16304  if(nzone.eq.0) then
16305  do i=1,ngood
16306  WRITE(66,*) xx(i),yy(i)
16307  enddo
16308  else
16309  do i=1,ngood
16310  WRITE(66,*) xx(i),yy(i),f(10,i)
16311  enddo
16312  endif
16313  else
16314  do i=1,ngood
16315  WRITE(66,*) xx(i),yy(i),cs(i)
16316  enddo
16317  endif
16318 ! plot emittance with chase (if applicable)
16319 ! if (chasit) call ytzprc(glim,oldcog,idwdp)
16320  if (igrprm.eq.2.or.igrprm.eq.3) then
16321 ! restore limits in GLIM(j,k)
16322  do j=1,4
16323  do k=1,2
16324  glim(j,k)=slim(j,k)
16325  enddo
16326  enddo
16327  endif
16328  tref=satref
16329  vref=savref
16330  RETURN
16331  END
16332 
16336  SUBROUTINE grcomp(text,iskale)
16337  implicit real(8) (a-h,o-z)
16338  parameter(iptsz=100002,maxcell1=3000)
16339  CHARACTER TEXT*80,PATITL*80
16340  common/ttfc/tk,t1k,t2k,sk,s1k,s2k,fh
16341  common/faisc/f(10,iptsz),imax,ngood
16342  common/stis/suryth,surzph,enedep,ecogde,testca
16343  common/fene/wdisp,wphas,wx,wy,rlim,ifw
16344  COMMON /consta/ vl, pi, xmat, rpel, qst
16345  common/dyn/tref,vref
16346  common/tapes/in,ifile,meta
16347  common/etcom/cog(8),exten(17),fd(iptsz)
16348  common/etcha1/ichas(iptsz),chexmin(10),chexmax(10),chasit
16349  common/grparm/glim(4,2),glim1(4,2),glim2(4,2),patitl,
16350  * ngraphs(100),idwdp,igrprm,ngrafs
16351  common/mcs/imcs,ncstat,cstat(20)
16352  common/zones/frms(6),nzone
16353  common/hist/xpos(200),xn(200),ypos(200),yn(200),
16354  * zpos(200),zn(200),ixt,iyt,izt
16355  common/hist1/xps(200),xpn(200),yps(200),ypn(200),
16356  * zps(200),zpn(200),ixpt,iypt,izpt
16357  LOGICAL chasit
16358  dimension xx(iptsz),yy(iptsz),cs(iptsz)
16359  dimension slim(4,2)
16360  tcog=0.
16361  do i=1,ngood
16362  tcog=f(6,i)+tcog
16363  enddo
16364  tcog=tcog/float(ngood)
16365  if (igrprm.eq.1) then
16366  text=patitl
16367  endif
16368  if (igrprm.eq.2) then
16369  text=patitl
16370 ! save limits in GLIM(j,k)
16371  do j=1,4
16372  do k=1,2
16373  slim(j,k)=glim(j,k)
16374  glim(j,k)=glim1(j,k)
16375  enddo
16376  enddo
16377  endif
16378  if (igrprm.eq.3) then
16379  text=patitl
16380 ! save limits in GLIM(j,k)
16381  do j=1,4
16382  do k=1,2
16383  slim(j,k)=glim(j,k)
16384  glim(j,k)=glim2(j,k)
16385  enddo
16386  enddo
16387  endif
16388  write(16,*)
16389  write(16,*) 'LIMITS',((glim(j,k), k=1,2), j=1,4)
16390 ! X-Z start
16391  xyliz=glim(4,1)*vref*pi/(180.*fh)
16392  zlix=xyliz
16393  xlix=glim(3,1)
16394  dstrly=glim(4,2)
16395 !
16396 ! Store header and particle coordinates in binary file for
16397 ! graphics post-processor
16398 !
16399 ! igrtyp is type of graph
16400 ! igrtyp=2 for grcomp extra plots
16401 ! igrtyp=7 for grcomp extra plots with multi charge state beam
16402 ! igrtyp=12 for grcomp extra plots with ZONES card
16403  igrtyp=2
16404  if(nzone.ne.0) igrtyp=12
16405  if (imcs.eq.1)igrtyp=7
16406 ! igrtyp=2,7,12 --> normal scale in envelopes
16407 ! igrtyp=17,22,27 --> log scale in envelopes
16408  if(iskale.eq.1) then
16409  WRITE(66,*) igrtyp+15
16410  write(66,*) dstrly
16411  else
16412  WRITE(66,*) igrtyp
16413  endif
16414  if (igrtyp.eq.7)then
16415  write(66,*) ncstat
16416  write(66,*) (cstat(j),j=1,ncstat)
16417  endif
16418  if (igrtyp.eq.12)then
16419  write(66,*) nzone
16420  write(66,*) (frms(j),j=2,nzone),' 0.'
16421  endif
16422  WRITE(66,*) text
16423  xx(1)=zlix
16424  yy(1)=xlix
16425  WRITE(66,*) -xx(1),xx(1),-yy(1),yy(1)
16426  if (imcs.eq.1) then
16427  do i=1,ngood
16428  cs(i)=f(9,i)
16429  enddo
16430  endif
16431  if(idwdp.eq.0) then
16432 ! Alvarez type (plot w.r.t. reference)
16433  DO i=1,ngood
16434  gpai=f(7,i)/xmat
16435  bpai=sqrt(1.-1./(gpai*gpai))
16436  xx(i)=(tcog-f(6,i))*vl*bpai
16437  yy(i)=f(2,i)
16438  ENDDO
16439  else
16440 ! IH type (plot w.r.t. centre of gravity)
16441  DO i=1,ngood
16442  gpai=f(7,i)/xmat
16443  bpai=sqrt(1.-1./(gpai*gpai))
16444  xx(i)=(tref-f(6,i))*vl*bpai
16445  yy(i)=f(2,i)
16446  ENDDO
16447  endif
16448 ! write particle coordinates to graphics file
16449  WRITE(66,*) ngood
16450  if (imcs.eq.0) then
16451  if(nzone.eq.0) then
16452  do i=1,ngood
16453  WRITE(66,*) xx(i),yy(i)
16454  enddo
16455  else
16456  do i=1,ngood
16457  WRITE(66,*) xx(i),yy(i),f(10,i)
16458  enddo
16459  endif
16460  else
16461  do i=1,ngood
16462  WRITE(66,*) xx(i),yy(i),cs(i)
16463  enddo
16464  endif
16465 ! Y-Z start
16466  zliy=xyliz
16467  zliy=glim(3,2)
16468  xx(1)=zlix
16469  yy(1)=zliy
16470  WRITE(66,*) -xx(1),xx(1),-yy(1),yy(1)
16471  if(idwdp.eq.0) then
16472 ! Alvarez type (plot w.r.t. reference)
16473  do i=1,ngood
16474  gpai=f(7,i)/xmat
16475  bpai=sqrt(1.-1./(gpai*gpai))
16476  xx(i)=(tcog-f(6,i))*vl*bpai
16477  yy(i)=f(4,i)
16478  enddo
16479  else
16480 ! IH type (plot w.r.t. centre of gravity)
16481  do i=1,ngood
16482  gpai=f(7,i)/xmat
16483  bpai=sqrt(1.-1./(gpai*gpai))
16484  xx(i)=(tref-f(6,i))*vl*bpai
16485  yy(i)=f(4,i)
16486  enddo
16487  endif
16488 ! write particle coordinates to graphics file
16489  WRITE(66,*) ngood
16490  if (imcs.eq.0) then
16491  if(nzone.eq.0) then
16492  do i=1,ngood
16493  WRITE(66,*) xx(i),yy(i)
16494  enddo
16495  else
16496  do i=1,ngood
16497  WRITE(66,*) xx(i),yy(i),f(10,i)
16498  enddo
16499  endif
16500  else
16501  do i=1,ngood
16502  WRITE(66,*) xx(i),yy(i),cs(i)
16503  enddo
16504  endif
16505 ! beam profile plots for X,Y & Z
16506  call histgrm
16507  write(66,*) ixt
16508  do i=1,ixt
16509  write(66,*) xpos(i),xn(i)
16510  enddo
16511  write(66,*) iyt
16512  do i=1,iyt
16513  write(66,*) ypos(i),yn(i)
16514  enddo
16515  write(66,*) izt
16516  do i=1,izt
16517  write(66,*) zpos(i),zn(i)
16518  enddo
16519 ! beam profile plots for Xp,Yp & Zp
16520  write(66,*) ixpt
16521  do i=1,ixpt
16522  write(66,*) xps(i),xpn(i)
16523  enddo
16524  write(66,*) iypt
16525  do i=1,iypt
16526  write(66,*) yps(i),ypn(i)
16527  enddo
16528  write(66,*) izpt
16529  do i=1,izpt
16530  write(66,*) zps(i),zpn(i)
16531  enddo
16532  if (igrprm.eq.2.or.igrprm.eq.3) then
16533 ! restore limits in GLIM(j,k)
16534  do j=1,4
16535  do k=1,2
16536  glim(j,k)=slim(j,k)
16537  enddo
16538  enddo
16539  endif
16540  RETURN
16541  END
16542 
16548  SUBROUTINE restay
16549  implicit real(8) (a-h,o-z)
16550 ! ****************************************************
16551  parameter(iptsz=100002,maxcell=3000,maxcell1=3000)
16552  common/ttfs/dynt(maxcell),dyntp(maxcell),dyntpp(maxcell),
16553  * dyne0(maxcell),dynph(maxcell),dynlg(maxcell),fhpar,nc
16554  common/posi/ist
16555  common/midgap/enmil,vapmi
16556  common/azmtch/dlg,xmcph,xmce
16557  common/azlist/icont,iprin
16558  common/itvole/itvol,imamin
16559  common/func/a(200),ylg,atte,ncel,nharm
16560 ! TRANSIT TIME COEFFICIENTS
16561  common/ttfc/tk,t1k,t2k,sk,s1k,s2k,fh
16562  common/ttfcb/t3k,t4k,s3k,s4k
16563  common/bedycp/phslip,eqvl,asdl,peqvl,pavph,xkp1,xkp2,
16564  * aa,bb,cc,dd,ee,pcrest,sqcttf
16565  common/jacob/gaks,gaps
16566  common/iter1/dxdki,dphii,phi,dkmske,dkmsphi,retph,xkmi,xkm,
16567  * dxk00,tke,t1ke,ske,s1ke,phiwc,xk1i,xk1ii,xk2ii
16568  common/faisc/f(10,iptsz),imax,ngood
16569  common/cell/yf(10000),xf(10000),xlim(15),flength,fhc,att,
16570  * npoint(15),ncell
16571  common/rfield/ifield
16572  common/qmoyen/qmoy
16573  common/rigid/boro
16574  common/cdek/dwp(iptsz)
16575  common/sc3/beamc,scdist,sce10,cplm,ect,apl,ichaes,iscsp
16576  COMMON /consta/ vl, pi, xmat, rpel, qst
16577  common/dyn/tref,vref
16578  common/compt/nrres,nrtre,nrbunc,nrdbun
16579  common/compt1/ndtl,ncavmc,ncavnm
16580  common/fene/wdisp,wphas,wx,wy,rlim,ifw
16581  common/tapes/in,ifile,meta
16582  common/ranec1/dummy(6)
16583  common/etcom/cog(8),exten(17),fd(iptsz)
16584  common/speda/dave,idave
16585  common/shif/dtiph,shift
16586  common/davcom/dav1(maxcell1,40),davtot,iitem(maxcell1),idav
16587  common/etcha1/ichas(iptsz),chexmin(10),chexmax(10),chasit
16588  common/dcspa/iesp
16589  common/pltprf/sprfx(3000),sprfy(3000),sprfl(3000),sprfw(3000),
16590  x sprfp(3000),sprng(3000),prlab(3000),iprf
16591  CHARACTER*(8) PRLAB
16592  common/appel/irstay,ilost,iavp,ispcel
16593  common/posc/xpsc
16594  common/pstpla/tstp
16595  common/femt/iemgrw,iemqesg
16596 ! common/mode/eflvl,rflvl
16597  common/aerp/vphase,vfield,ierpf
16598  common/tofev/ttvols
16599 ! **** reference
16600 ! **** DWRFS(MeV): energy gain
16601 ! **** SPHRFS(rad):phase jump
16602 ! **** PHRFS(rad):phase
16603 ! **** common/parmrf/DWRFS,SPHRFS,PHRFS,ngdrf
16604  logical iesp,ichaes,irstay,iavp,ispcel,ifield,iemgrw
16605  LOGICAL SHIFT,CHASIT,ITVOL,IMAMIN,DAVE
16606  CHARACTER cr*1
16607 !************************************************************
16608 ! XESLN : NEGATIVE LENGHT OF THE DRIFT FOLLOWING THE GAP
16609 ! IF XESLN N.E.0 THEN THE CHARGE SPACE EFFECT IMPLIES THE
16610 ! LENGTH (YLG-XESLN)
16611  nrres=nrres+1
16612  ncavmc=ncavmc+1
16613 ! allow for print out on terminal of gap# on one and the same line
16614  cr=char(13)
16615  WRITE(6,8254,advance='no') nrtre,nrres,cr
16616 8254 format('Transport element:',i5,
16617  * ' Accelerating element:',i5,a1)
16618  WRITE(16,*)' CAVITY N :',nrres
16619  ilost=0
16620  aqst=abs(qst)
16621  qmoy=aqst
16622 ! --- the frequency fh may be changed with delfh
16623  oldfh=fh
16624 ! IDUM : dummy variable (indicate in input file the number of the cavity)
16625  READ (in,*) idum
16626 !
16627 ! --- XESLN (cm): difference between the length of the field YLG and the physical length of the cavity
16628 ! (The space charge is acting on the length (YLG-XESLN) )
16629 ! dphase (deg): phase offset from the phase crest (giving the maximum of energy gain)
16630 ! FFIELD : in percent;
16631 ! (electric field)=(initial electric field)*(1.+FFIELD/100)
16632 ! isec: flag
16633 ! isec = 0 : The crest phase (or the valley) is adjusted at the entrance of the accelerating element
16634 ! isec = 1 : The crest phase (or the valley)is adjusted at the middle of the accelerating element
16635 !
16636 ! idum is for compatability with CAVNUM
16637  read (in,*) xesln,dphase,ffield,isec,idum
16638  ffield=1.+ffield/100.
16639  if(ifield) then
16640 ! --- The field is read from the disk in file 'field.txt' in the form:
16641 ! z (cm) E(z) MV/cm
16642 ! fhc: frequency of the cavity (Hertz) (read in the file 'field.txt' )
16643  fh=fhc*2.*pi
16644  ncel=ncell
16645  atte=att
16646  ye0=atte
16647 ! flength : length of the field (cm)
16648  ylg=flength
16649  scdist=ylg-abs(xesln)
16650  else
16651 ! --- The field is read in the input list in the form of a Fourier series
16652  oldfh=fh
16653 ! atte: factor acting on the amplitude of the field (read in the input list)
16654  ye0=atte
16655  scdist=ylg-abs(xesln)
16656  endif
16657  dphete=dphase
16658  if(itvol.and.imamin) then
16659 ! --- adjustment of the phase offset w.r.t. the t.o.f. (deg)
16660  ottvol=fh*ttvols*180./pi
16661  attvol=ottvol
16662  xkpi=ottvol/360.
16663  ixkpi=int(xkpi)
16664  xkpi=(xkpi-float(ixkpi))*360.
16665  dphase=dphase-xkpi
16666  endif
16667 ! --- iesp, irstay and ispcel: logical flags for space charge computations
16668  iesp=.false.
16669  irstay=.true.
16670  ispcel=.true.
16671 ! --- dwp(*): array reserved to space charge computations
16672  do i=1,iptsz
16673  dwp(i)=0.
16674  enddo
16675  WRITE(16,150)fh/(2.*pi),ylg,atte,ffield,ncel
16676 150 FORMAT(4x,'FREQUENCY :',e12.5,' Hertz',/,4x,
16677  x 'FIELD LENGTH :',e12.5,' cm',/,4x,
16678  x 'FIELD FACTOR (UNITS CONVERSION) :',e12.5,/,4x,
16679  x 'FIELD FACTOR (ATTENUATION) :',f12.6,/,4x,
16680  x 'FIELD DIVIDED IN: ',i4,' SECTIONS ')
16681  if(.not.imamin) write(16,*) ' PHASE OFFSET: ',dphete,' DEG'
16682  if(imamin) write(16,1501)dphete,dphase,xkpi
16683 1501 format(4x,
16684  x 'PHASE OFFSET (before adjustment): ',e12.5,' deg',/,4x,
16685  x 'PHASE OFFSET (after adjustment): ',e12.5,' deg',/,4x,
16686  * 'ADJUSTMENT ON THE PHASE OFFSET: ',e12.5,' deg')
16687  beref=vref/vl
16688  fh0=fh/vl
16689 ! --- prediction of transit time factors TK and SK based on the velocity at the entrance
16690  tk=tta0(beref)/2. * ffield
16691  sk=tsb0(beref)/2. * ffield
16692 ! --- prediction of PCREST (phase of RF giving the maximum of energy gain in the cavity)
16693  pcrest=atan(-sk/tk)
16694  ddwc=aqst*(tk*cos(pcrest)-sk*sin(pcrest))
16695  IF(ddwc.LT.0.) pcrest=pcrest+pi
16696 ! --- ttvol: time of flight at entrance (sec)
16697  ttvol=0.
16698  if(itvol)ttvol=ttvols*fh
16699 ! start file 'short.data'
16700 ! --- dav1(idav,3)=0: the particle reference and the cog coincide at the input
16701 ! --- dav1(idav,3)=1: the particle reference and the cog are independent
16702  dav1(idav,3)=0.
16703  idav=idav+1
16704  iitem(idav)=1
16705  dav1(idav,1)=ylg*10.
16706  dav1(idav,2)=ye0*100.
16707  tstp=(davtot+ylg*xpsc)*10.
16708  davtot=davtot+ylg
16709  dav1(idav,24)=davtot*10.
16710  dav1(idav,40)=fh
16711  IF(iprf.EQ.1) then
16712  prlab(iprf)='START '
16713  CALL stapl(dav1(idav,24))
16714  endif
16715  iarg=1
16716  call cdg(iarg)
16717  enold=cog(1)
16718  encog=enold
16719  gcog=enold/xmat
16720  bcog=sqrt(1.-1./(gcog*gcog))
16721  tcog=cog(3)
16722  IF(shift) THEN
16723 ! --- the reference particle and the cog are independent
16724  beref=vref/vl
16725  gamref=1./sqrt(1.-(beref*beref))
16726  enref=xmat*gamref
16727  trefdg=tref*fh*180./pi
16728  dav1(idav,3)=1.
16729  ELSE
16730 ! --- the reference particle and the cog are coinciding
16731  beref=bcog
16732  vref=bcog*vl
16733  tref=tcog
16734  gamref=gcog
16735  enref=cog(1)
16736  dav1(idav,3)=0.
16737  ENDIF
16738 ! --- the reference particle is put in the array f(10,iptsz) at the position ngdrf = ngood + 1
16739 ! **** ngdrf=ngood+1
16740 ! **** BEREF=VREF/VL
16741 ! **** GAMREF=1./SQRT(1.-(BEREF*BEREF))
16742 ! **** ENREF=XMAT*GAMREF
16743 ! **** f(1,ngdrf)=ngdrf
16744 ! **** f(2,ngdrf)=0.
16745 ! **** f(3,ngdrf)=0.
16746 ! **** f(4,ngdrf)=0.
16747 ! **** f(5,ngdrf)=0.
16748 ! **** f(6,ngdrf)=tref
16749 ! **** f(7,ngdrf)=enref
16750 ! **** f(8,ngdrf)=1.
16751 ! **** f(9,ngdrf)=qst
16752 ! **** f(10,ngdrf)=0.
16753  if(dav1(idav,3).eq.1.) write(16,*)
16754  * ' ****reference and cog evolve independently'
16755  if(dav1(idav,3).eq.0.) write(16,*)
16756  * ' **** the reference is the cog '
16757  WRITE(16,178)
16758 178 FORMAT(/,' Dynamics at the input',/,
16759  2 5x,' BETA GAMMA ENERGY(MeV) ',
16760  3 ' TOF(deg) TOF(sec)')
16761  WRITE(16,1788) bcog,gcog,encog-xmat,tcog*fh*180./pi,tcog
16762 1788 FORMAT(' COG ',f7.5,3x,e12.5,1x,e12.5,3x,e12.5,3x,e12.5)
16763  enrprin=enref-xmat
16764  WRITE(16,165) beref,gamref,enrprin,tref*fh*180./pi,tref
16765 165 FORMAT(' REF ',f7.5,3x,e12.5,1x,e12.5,3x,e12.5,3x,e12.5)
16766  tofprt=tref
16767  iprint=0
16768  call statis
16769  xk1=fh/vref
16770 ! --- prediction of transit time factors based on an average value of velocity
16771  ddw=aqst*(tk*cos(pcrest)-sk*sin(pcrest))
16772  enrefs=enref+ddw
16773  gams= enrefs/xmat
16774  bets=sqrt(1.-1./(gams*gams))
16775  bemy=(gams+gamref)/(gams*bets+gamref*beref)
16776  bemy=1./bemy
16777  tk0=tta0(bemy)/2. * ffield
16778  tpk0=tta1(bemy)/2. * ffield
16779  tppk0=tta2(bemy)/2.* ffield
16780  tp3k0=tta3(bemy)/2.* ffield
16781  tp4k0=tta4(bemy)/2.* ffield
16782  sk0=tsb0(bemy)/2. * ffield
16783  spk0=tsb1(bemy)/2. * ffield
16784  sppk0=tsb2(bemy)/2.* ffield
16785  sp3k0=tsb3(bemy)/2.* ffield
16786  sp4k0=tsb4(bemy)/2.* ffield
16787  tk=tk0
16788  t1k=tpk0
16789  t2k=tppk0
16790  t3k=tp3k0
16791  t4k=tp4k0
16792  sk=sk0
16793  s1k=spk0
16794  s2k=sppk0
16795  s3k=sp3k0
16796  s4k=sp4k0
16797 ! ---- prediction of PCREST (crest phase) based on the actual coefficients factors T and S
16798  pcrest=atan(-sk0/tk0)
16799  ddwc=aqst*(tk*cos(pcrest)-sk*sin(pcrest))
16800  IF(ddwc.LT.0.) pcrest=pcrest+pi
16801 ! --- the routine crest is computing the equivalent field lenght: EQVL
16802  call crest(bemy,eqvl,xpos,sqcttf,ffield)
16803 ! --- follow computations of the parameters:
16804 ! equivalent field length (cm)
16805 ! asociated drift length (cm)
16806 ! slip of phase (rad)
16807 ! energy gain (MeV)
16808 ! phase jump (rad)
16809 ! average k (=frequency/velocity) (cm-1)
16810 ! transit time coefficients (MeV,cm)
16811 ! crest phase (rd)
16812 ! phase of RF at entrance (rd)
16813  saphi=pcrest
16814 ! --- start iterations: improve the average velocity and the transit time factors
16815  DO 770 it=1,3
16816  dts=(tk*t1k+sk*s1k)/(tk*tk+sk*sk)
16817  fk1=2.*dts
16818  eqvlp=eqvl
16819 ! --- computation of the phase slip: PHSLIP
16820  phslip=-4.*atan(3.2*dts/eqvl)
16821  IF(phslip.NE.0.) THEN
16822  til2=phslip/2.
16823  do iiii=1,4
16824  gx=1./tan(til2)-1./til2-fk1/eqvlp
16825  gpx=-1./(sin(til2)*sin(til2)) + 1./(til2*til2)
16826  til2=til2-gx/gpx
16827  hx=1./tan(til2)-1./til2
16828  eqvlp=fk1/hx
16829  enddo
16830  phslip=til2*2.
16831  ENDIF
16832  peqvl=xpos
16833  asdl=peqvl-eqvl/2.
16834  f0=xitl0(gamref,gams,bemy,saphi,aqst)
16835  delwrm=(f0-gamref)*xmat
16836  enrs=enref+delwrm
16837  gams=enrs/xmat
16838  bets=sqrt(1.-1./(gams*gams))
16839 ! --- computation of the jump of phase:DELPHR
16840  coeph =fh*aqst/(vl*xmat)
16841  f3=xitl3(gamref,gams,bemy,it,saphi,aqst)
16842  delphr= coeph * f3
16843  xk2=fh0/bets
16844  xkm=delphr/eqvl + xk2*(1.+asdl/eqvl) - xk1*asdl/eqvl
16845  bemy=fh0/xkm
16846 ! --- computations of transit time factors
16847  tk=tta0(bemy)/2. * ffield
16848  t1k=tta1(bemy)/2. * ffield
16849  sk=tsb0(bemy)/2. * ffield
16850  s1k=tsb1(bemy)/2. * ffield
16851 770 CONTINUE
16852 ! --- crest phase PCREST (after iterations)
16853  pcrest=atan(-sk/tk)
16854  ddwc=aqst*(tk*cos(pcrest)-sk*sin(pcrest))
16855  IF(ddwc.LT.0.) pcrest=pcrest+pi
16856  dcemd=0.
16857 ! --- isec = 0: the phase offset is given relative to the entrance of the cavity
16858 ! --- isec = 1: the phase offset is given relative to the middle of the cavity
16859 ! --- (vapmi has been computed in the function XITL3 (in deg) )
16860  if(isec.ne.0) then
16861  imedi=int(vapmi/360.+.4)
16862  dcemd=vapmi-360.*imedi
16863  WRITE(16,773) nrres,enmil,vapmi,dcemd
16864 773 FORMAT(2x,' AT THE MIDDLE OF THE CAVITY:',i4,/,2x,
16865  * ' *ENERGY :',e12.5,' MEV *PHASE :',e12.5,' DEG',2x,
16866  * ' *SLIP OF PHASE :',e12.5,' deg',/)
16867  dcemd=dcemd*pi/180.
16868  endif
16869 ! SAPHI: phase of RF w.r.t. the phase offset
16870  dphase=dphase*pi/180.
16871  saphi=pcrest+dphase+ttvol-dcemd
16872  ddw=aqst*(tk0*cos(saphi)-sk0*sin(saphi))
16873  enrs=enref+ddw
16874  gams=enrs/xmat
16875 ! --- start new iterations to improve:
16876 ! transit time factors
16877 ! phase slip
16878 ! jump of phase
16879 ! crest phase
16880 ! phase of RF
16881 !
16882  sapho=saphi
16883  DO 78 it=1,3
16884  dts=(tk*t1k+sk*s1k)/(tk*tk+sk*sk)
