16885  fk1=2.*dts
16886  eqvlp=eqvl
16887  phslip=-4.*atan(3.2*dts/eqvl)
16888  IF(phslip.NE.0.) THEN
16889  til2=phslip/2.
16890  do iiii=1,3
16891  gx=1./tan(til2)-1./til2-fk1/eqvlp
16892  gpx=-1./(sin(til2)*sin(til2)) + 1./(til2*til2)
16893  til2=til2-gx/gpx
16894  hx=1./tan(til2)-1./til2
16895  eqvlp=fk1/hx
16896  enddo
16897  phslip=til2*2.
16898  ENDIF
16899  peqvl=xpos
16900  asdl=peqvl-eqvl/2.
16901 ! --- ENERGY GAIN AND PHASE JUMP
16902  f0=xitl0(gamref,gams,bemy,saphi,aqst)
16903  delwrm=(f0-gamref)*xmat
16904  enrs=enref+delwrm
16905  gams=enrs/xmat
16906  bets=sqrt(1.-1./(gams*gams))
16907  xk2=fh0/bets
16908 ! --- DELPHR: jump of phase
16909  coeph =fh*aqst/(vl*xmat)
16910  f2=xitl3(gamref,gams,bemy,it,saphi,aqst)
16911  delphr= coeph * f2
16912 ! --- XKM: average k = frequency/velocity)
16913  xkm=delphr/eqvl + xk2*(1.+asdl/eqvl) - xk1*asdl/eqvl
16914  bemy=fh0/xkm
16915 ! --- TRANSIT TIME FACTORS (based on the velocity BEMY)
16916  tk=tta0(bemy)/2. * ffield
16917  t1k=tta1(bemy)/2. * ffield
16918  t2k=tta2(bemy)/2. * ffield
16919  t3k=tta3(bemy)/2. * ffield
16920  t4k=tta4(bemy)/2. * ffield
16921  sk=tsb0(bemy)/2. * ffield
16922  s1k=tsb1(bemy)/2. * ffield
16923  s2k=tsb2(bemy)/2. * ffield
16924  s3k=tsb3(bemy)/2. * ffield
16925  s4k=tsb4(bemy)/2. * ffield
16926  pcrest=atan(-sk/tk)
16927  ddwc=aqst*(tk*cos(pcrest)-sk*sin(pcrest))
16928  IF(ddwc.LT.0.) pcrest=pcrest+pi
16929  dphii=(xk1-xk2)*eqvl/10.+(xkp1+xkp2)/120.*eqvl*eqvl
16930  x + (xk1-xkm)*asdl
16931 ! --- phase of RF
16932 !*2011*July*16 DPHII sign
16933 !*2011 SV SAPHI=PCREST+DPHASE+TTVOL-DCEMD+DPHII
16934 !*2011 ET SAPHI=PCREST+DPHASE+TTVOL-DCEMD-DPHII
16935  saphi=pcrest+dphase+ttvol-dcemd+dphii
16936 78 CONTINUE
16937  savph=saphi*180./pi
16938 ! REFERENCE PARTICLE BASED ON CHARGE STATE: QMOY = ABS(QST)
16939  cfh=fh/(vl*2.*xmat)
16940  ckh=qmoy*qmoy/(4.*xmat*xmat)
16941  dphii=(xk1-xk2)*eqvl/10.+(xkp1+xkp2)/120.*eqvl*eqvl
16942  x + (xk1-xkm)*asdl
16943  phares=saphi+xk2*ylg+delphr
16944 ! ***** TEST
16945 ! DITEMP=(2.*XK1*ASDL+XKM*(EQVL-ASDL)+
16946 ! x XK2*(YLG-(EQVL+ASDL)))/FH+DELPHR/FH
16947 !cc DITEMP=(XK1*ASDL+XKM*(EQVL)+
16948 !cc x XK2*(YLG-(EQVL+ASDL)))/FH+DELPHR/FH
16949  trefs=tref+(xk2*ylg+delphr)/fh
16950 !cc TREFS1=TREF+DITEMP
16951 !cc write(6,*) 'trefs trefs1 ',trefs,trefs1
16952 !cc pause
16953 ! ****************************
16954  phared=(phares-saphi)*180./pi
16955  tredg=fh*trefs *180./pi
16956 ! ****** REFERENCE BASED ON THE AVERAGE CHARGE STATE QMOY (if several charges state)
16957 ! ******* CFH=FH/(VL*2.*XMAT)
16958 ! ****** CKH=QMOY*QMOY/(4.*XMAT*XMAT)
16959 ! ****** save the energy and the T.O.F of the particle reference at the input of the cavity
16960 ! ****** enri=f(7,ngdrf)
16961 ! ***** trefi=f(6,ngdrf)
16962 ! ***** call gap(gamref,saphi,gams,delphr)
16963 ! ***** trefs and enrs: time of flight and energy of the reference and the output of the cavity
16964 ! ***** trefs=f(6,ngdrf)
16965 ! ***** enrs=f(7,ngdrf)
16966 ! ***** grefs=f(7,ngdrf)/xmat
16967 ! ***** bets=sqrt(grefs*grefs-1.)/grefs
16968 ! ***** dwrfs=enrs-enri
16969 ! ***** PHARES=SAPHI+XK2*YLG+DELPHR
16970 ! ***** TREFS=TREF+(XK2*YLG+DELPHR)/FH
16971 ! ***** TREDG=fh*TREFS *180./PI
16972  write(16,*) ' PARAMETERS RELATING TO THE REFERENCE PARTICLE '
16973  write(16,*) '***********************************************'
16974  write(16,*) ' ENERGY GAIN(MeV) ',delwrm,' TOF ',tredg,' DEG'
16975  write(16,*) ' PHASE JUMP(DG) ',delphr*180./pi
16976  write(16,*) ' SLIP OF PHASE AT THE INPUT(DG) ',sapho*180./pi
16977  write(16,*) ' PHASE OF RF AT ENTRANCE(DG) ',savph
16978  write(16,*) ' AVERAGE k (cm-1) (freq./velocity): ',xkm
16979  write(16,*) ' Associated drift length ',asdl,' (cm)'
16980  write(16,*) ' Equivalent field length ',eqvl,' cm center at ',
16981  * xpos,' cm'
16982  write(16,*) ' TRANSIT TIME FACTORS AND DERIVATIVES (MeV,cm):'
16983  write(16,*) ' T ',tk,t1k,t2k,t3k,t4k
16984  WRITE(16,*) ' S ',sk,s1k,s2k,s3k,s4k
16985  write(16,*) ' PHASE SLIP(DEG) ',phslip*180./pi
16986  write(16,*) ' CREST PHASE OF RF (DEG) ',pcrest*180./pi
16987  WRITE(16,*) ' MAGNITUDE ',sqcttf,' MV/cm'
16988  t0s=sqrt(tk*tk+sk*sk)
16989  WRITE(16,*) ' T0 ',t0s
16990 ! *************************************************************************
16991  call gap(gamref,saphi,gams,delphr)
16992  iarg=1
16993  call cdg(iarg)
16994  encog=cog(1)
16995  gcog=encog/xmat
16996  bcog=sqrt(1.-1./(gcog*gcog))
16997  tcog=cog(3)
16998  CALL ext2d(1)
16999  if(itvol) then
17000  dav1(idav,38)=dphete
17001  dav1(idav,39)=dphase*180./pi
17002  else
17003  dav1(idav,38)=dphete
17004  endif
17005  WRITE(16,3777)
17006 3777 FORMAT(/,' Dynamics at the output',/,
17007  1 5x,' BETA dW(MeV) ENERGY(MeV) ',
17008  2 ' TOF(deg) TOF(sec)')
17009  engain=encog-enold
17010  WRITE(16,3473) bets,delwrm,enrs-xmat,fh*trefs *180./pi,trefs
17011 3473 FORMAT(' REF ',f7.5,3x,f10.6,3x,e12.5,3x,e12.5,3x,e12.5)
17012  WRITE(16,1789) bcog,engain,encog-xmat,tcog*fh*180./pi,tcog
17013 1789 FORMAT(' COG ',f7.5,3x,f10.6,3x,e12.5,3x,e12.5,3x,e12.5)
17014  testca=exten(1)*exten(2)*exten(3)
17015 ! epsil=1.E-20
17016  epsil=1.e-40
17017  IF(abs(testca).gt.epsil) THEN
17018  qdisp=2.*sqrt(exten(1))
17019  qmd=exten(1)*exten(3)-exten(2)**2
17020  sqmdv=4.*pi*sqrt(qmd)
17021  surm=4.*pi*sqrt(qmd)*180./pi
17022  qdp=2.*sqrt(exten(3))
17023  cor12=exten(2)/sqrt(exten(1)*exten(3))
17024  qdpde=qdp*180./pi
17025  ELSE
17026  qdisp=0.
17027  qmd=0.
17028  sqmdv=0.
17029  surm=0.
17030  qdp=0.
17031  cor12=0.
17032  pent12=0.
17033  pent21=0.
17034  qdpde=0.
17035  ENDIF
17036  trqtx=exten(4)*exten(5)-exten(8)**2
17037  trqpy=exten(6)*exten(7)-exten(9)**2
17038  qditax=2.*sqrt(exten(4))
17039  qdiant=2.*sqrt(exten(5))
17040  qditay=2.*sqrt(exten(6))
17041  qdianp=2.*sqrt(exten(7))
17042  surxth=4.*pi*sqrt(trqtx)
17043  suryph=4.*pi*sqrt(trqpy)
17044  IF(shift) THEN
17045  vref=bets*vl
17046  tref=trefs
17047  ELSE
17048  vref=bcog*vl
17049  tref=tcog
17050  ENDIF
17051  if(itvol) then
17052  ttvols=tref
17053  endif
17054  call statis
17055 ! ENVEL
17056  prlab(iprf)='CAVMC '
17057  CALL stapl(dav1(idav,24))
17058 !omment WRITE(16,9998) SQMDV
17059 !omment9998 FORMAT(2X,' EMITTANCE (norm): ',
17060 !omment * E12.5,' PI*MEV*RAD')
17061  dav1(idav,16)=bcog*surxth*10./(pi*sqrt(1.-bcog*bcog))
17062  dav1(idav,21)=bcog*suryph*10./(pi*sqrt(1.-bcog*bcog))
17063  dav1(idav,25)=nrres
17064  dav1(idav,30)=ngood
17065 !
17066 ! print to the file: 'dynac.dmp':
17067 ! gap number, phase offset(deg), relativistic beta, energy(MeV), horz. emit.(mm*mrd,norm), vert. emit.(mm*mrd,norm),long. emit(keV*sec)
17068 !
17069 ! --- dav1(idav,16): Emittance(norm) x-xp (mm*mrad)
17070 ! --- dav1(idav,21): Emittance(norm) y-yp (mm*mrad)
17071  emns=1.e12*sqmdv/(pi*fh)
17072  tcgprt=fh*tcog*180./pi
17073  trfprt=fh*tref*180./pi
17074 ! cavity number, z (m), transmission (%), synchronous phase (deg), time of flight (deg) (reference),
17075 ! COG relativistic beta (@ output), COG output energy (MeV), REF relativistic beta (@ output), REF output energy (MeV),
17076 ! horizontal emittance (mm.mrad, RMS normalized), vertical emittance (mm.mrad, RMS normalized),
17077 ! longitudinal emittance (RMS, ns.keV)
17078  trnsms=100.*float(ngood)/float(imax)
17079  if(ncavmc.eq.1) write(50,*) '# cavmc.dmp'
17080  if(ncavmc.eq.1) write(50,*) '# cav Z trans ',
17081  * 'PHIs TOF(COG) COG Wcog TOF(REF) ',
17082  * ' REF Wref Ex,RMS,n Ey,RMS,n El,RMS'
17083  if(ncavmc.eq.1) write(50,*) '# # (m) (%) ',
17084  * '(deg) (deg) beta (MeV) (deg) ',
17085  * ' beta (MeV) (mm.mrad) (mm.mrad) (ns.keV)'
17086  write(50,7023) nrres,0.001*dav1(idav,24),trnsms,dphete,
17087  * tcgprt,bcog,encog-xmat,trfprt,bets,enrs-xmat,
17088  * 0.25*dav1(idav,16),0.25*dav1(idav,21),0.25*emns,delwrm
17089 7023 format(1x,i4,1x,e12.5,1x,f6.2,1x,f7.2,1x,
17090  * 2(e14.7,1x,f7.5,1x,e14.7,1x),4(e12.5,1x))
17091  fh=oldfh
17092 ! new magnetic rigidity of the reference
17093  gref=1./sqrt(1.-bets*bets)
17094  xmor=xmat*bets*gref
17095  boro=33.356*xmor*1.e-01/aqst
17096  WRITE(16,*) ilost,' particles lost in cavity ',nrres
17097  call emiprt(0)
17098  return
17099  end
17100 
17106  SUBROUTINE fieldcav(atte)
17107  implicit real(8) (a-h,o-z)
17108  common/consta/vl,pi,xmat,rpel,qst
17109  common/rfield/ifield
17110  common/cell/yf(10000),xf(10000),xlim(15),flength,fhc,att,
17111  * npoint(15),ncell
17112  common/spl/xspl(4000),yspl(4000),s(5000),p(5000),q(5000)
17113 ! common/mode/eflvl,rflvl
17114  common/cavnum1/xnh,xpas,ffield,npt
17115  common/kcell/avrg(15)
17116  logical ifield
17117  part=1.
17118  ifield=.true.
17119  read(20,*)fhc
17120 !nov02 att=att*(1.+eflvl)
17121  att=atte
17122  read(20,*) xspl(1),yspl(1)
17123  yspl(1)=yspl(1)*att
17124  xspl(1)=xspl(1)*100.
17125  npt=2
17126  do i=2,4000
17127  read(20,*) xspl(i),yspl(i)
17128  if (xspl(i).eq.0.) exit
17129  xspl(i)=xspl(i)*100.
17130  yspl(i)=yspl(i)*att
17131  npt=npt+1
17132  enddo
17133  npt=npt-1
17134 ! **************************************
17135  tdep=xspl(1)
17136  do it=1,npt
17137  xspl(it)=xspl(it)-tdep
17138  enddo
17139 ! **************************************
17140  call deriv2(npt)
17141  xpas=(xspl(3)-xspl(2))/part
17142  xcour=xspl(1)
17143  nfpt=1
17144  do i=1,10000
17145  if(xcour.gt.xspl(npt) ) exit
17146  yf(i)=spline(npt,xcour)
17147  xf(i)=xcour
17148  xcour=xcour+xpas
17149  nfpt=nfpt+1
17150  enddo
17151 ! * valero mars 2006
17152  xlimf=xspl(npt)
17153  xf(nfpt)=0.
17154 !omment yf(nfpt)=0.
17155 ! look for the number of cells,the limits of the cells, the number of coordinates in each cell
17156  do i=1,15
17157  npoint(i)=0
17158  enddo
17159  ncell=1
17160  xlim(ncell)=xf(1)
17161  do i=2,nfpt
17162  if (xf(i).eq.0.) then
17163  ncell=ncell+1
17164  xlim(ncell)=xlimf
17165  exit
17166  endif
17167  if(yf(i)*yf(i-1).lt.0.) then
17168  ncell=ncell+1
17169  xlim(ncell)=xf(i)
17170  else
17171  npoint(ncell)=npoint(ncell)+1
17172  endif
17173  enddo
17174  flength=xlim(ncell)
17175  ncell=ncell-1
17176 ! write(16,*) ' ******Read the field of the cavity************'
17177  write(16,100) ncell,flength,att,fhc
17178 100 format(' Number of cells: ',i3,' field length: ',e12.5,'cm',
17179  * ' field factor: ',e12.5,' frequency: ',e12.5,' Hz')
17180 ! ******************************************
17181 ! sv 28/10/2015
17182  call celint
17183 ! *****************************************
17184  do i=1,ncell
17185  write(16,200) i,xlim(i),xlim(i+1),avrg(i)
17186  enddo
17187 200 format(' Cell number ',i3,' lower limit ',e12.5,' cm ',
17188  * ' upper limit ',e12.5,' cm ','average ',e12.5,' cm')
17189  return
17190  end
17191 
17195  SUBROUTINE celint
17196  implicit real(8) (a-h,o-z)
17197  common/cavnum1/xnh,xpas,fmult,npt
17198  common/consta/vl,pi,xmat,rpel,qst
17199  common/spl/xspl(4000),yspl(4000),s(5000),p(5000),q(5000)
17200  common/cell/yf(10000),xf(10000),xlim(15),flength,fhc,att,
17201  * npoint(15),ncell
17202  common/kcell/avrg(15)
17203  xlpos=0.
17204  isce=20
17205  xlcum=0.
17206  do inc=1,ncell
17207  xint1=0.
17208  xint2=0.
17209  xnh=0.
17210  xlcel=xlim(inc+1)-xlim(inc)
17211  xlpos=xlpos+xlcel
17212  xpas=xlcel/float(isce)
17213  xnhc=0
17214  estop=xpas/10.
17215  istop=0
17216  DO
17217  xpat=xnhc*xpas
17218  if(xpat.ge.(xlcel-estop)) EXIT
17219  z0=xnh*xpas
17220  z1=(xnh+0.20)*xpas
17221  z2=(xnh+0.40)*xpas
17222  z3=(xnh+0.60)*xpas
17223  z4=(xnh+0.80)*xpas
17224  z5=(xnh+1.00)*xpas
17225  fpos0=xnh*xpas+xlcum
17226  fpos1=(xnh+0.20)*xpas+xlcum
17227  fpos2=(xnh+0.40)*xpas+xlcum
17228  fpos3=(xnh+0.60)*xpas+xlcum
17229  fpos4=(xnh+0.80)*xpas+xlcum
17230  fpos5=(xnh+1.0)*xpas+xlcum
17231  tspl0=spline(npt,fpos0)
17232  tspl1=spline(npt,fpos1)
17233  tspl2=spline(npt,fpos2)
17234  tspl3=spline(npt,fpos3)
17235  tspl4=spline(npt,fpos4)
17236  tspl5=spline(npt,fpos5)
17237  xspl0=z0*tspl0
17238  xspl1=z1*tspl1
17239  xspl2=z2*tspl2
17240  xspl3=z3*tspl3
17241  xspl4=z4*tspl4
17242  xspl5=z5*tspl5
17243 ! integral E(z)*z over the cell
17244  tspl11=19.*xspl0+75.*xspl1+50.*xspl2+50.*xspl3+75.*xspl4
17245  * +19.*xspl5
17246  xi1=xpas/288. * tspl11
17247  xint1=xint1+xi1
17248  xspl0=tspl0
17249  xspl1=tspl1
17250  xspl2=tspl2
17251  xspl3=tspl3
17252  xspl4=tspl4
17253  xspl5=tspl5
17254 ! integral E(z) over the cell
17255  tspl2=19.*xspl0+75.*xspl1+50.*xspl2+50.*xspl3+75.*xspl4
17256  * +19.*xspl5
17257  xi2=xpas/288. * tspl2
17258  xint2=xint2+xi2
17259  xnh=xnh+1.
17260  xnhc=xnhc+1
17261  ENDDO
17262  avrg(inc)=xint1/xint2+xlcum
17263  xlcum=xlcum+xlcel
17264  enddo
17265  return
17266  end
17267 
17271  FUNCTION fcav(xc,nrc)
17272  implicit real(8) (a-h,o-z)
17273  common/cell/yf(10000),xf(10000),xlim(15),flength,fhc,att,
17274  * npoint(15),ncell
17275  common/fcv/jsav
17276  fcav=0.
17277  if(nrc.eq.1) then
17278  j=1
17279  else
17280  j=jsav
17281  endif
17282  do k=1,npoint(nrc)
17283  tk=xc-xf(j)
17284  if(tk.eq.0.)then
17285  fcav=yf(j)
17286  exit
17287  endif
17288  if(tk.lt.0.) then
17289  a=(xc-xf(j-1))/(xf(j)-xf(j-1))
17290  b=(xf(j)-xc)/(xf(j)-xf(j-1))
17291  fcav=b*yf(j-1)+a*yf(j)
17292  exit
17293  endif
17294  j=j+1
17295  enddo
17296  jsav=j
17297  return
17298  end
17299 
17303  FUNCTION ta0(betr,nrc)
17304  implicit real(8) (a-h,o-z)
17305  common/consta/vl,pi,xmat,rpel,qst
17306  common/cell/yf(10000),xf(10000),xlim(15),flength,fhc,att,
17307  * npoint(15),ncell
17308  common/gaus13/h(13),t(13)
17309  common/gaus17/h1(17),t1(17)
17310  common/fcv/jsav
17311  xk=fhc*2.*pi/(betr*vl)
17312  ar=0.
17313  xc1=xlim(nrc)
17314  xc2=xlim(nrc+1)
17315  DO i=1,17
17316  xc= (xc2+xc1)/2.+(xc2-xc1)*h1(i)/2.
17317  rfonc=fcav(xc,nrc)
17318  ar=ar+t1(i)*rfonc*cos(xk*xc)
17319  enddo
17320  ta0=ar*(xc2-xc1)
17321  return
17322  END
17323 
17327  FUNCTION tta0(betr)
17328  implicit real(8) (a-h,o-z)
17329  common/cell/yf(10000),xf(10000),xlim(15),flength,fhc,att,
17330  * npoint(15),ncell
17331  common/consta/vl,pi,xmat,rpel,qst
17332  common/func/a(200),ylg,atte,ncel,nharm
17333  common/ttfc/tk,t1k,t2k,sk,s1k,s2k,fh
17334  common/rfield/ifield
17335  common/gaus13/h(13),t(13)
17336  dimension xmin(15)
17337  logical ifield
17338  if(ifield) then
17339  tta0=0.
17340  do i=1,ncell
17341  tta0=tta0+ta0(betr,i)
17342  enddo
17343  else
17344  xk=fh/(betr*vl)
17345  xmin(1)=0.
17346  do i=2,ncel+2
17347  xmin(i)=0.
17348  enddo
17349  do i=2,ncel+1
17350  xmin(i)=ylg*(i-1)/ncel
17351  enddo
17352  ipas=1
17353  tta0=0.
17354  ar=0.
17355  DO
17356  if(xmin(ipas+1).eq.0.or.ipas.gt.(ncel+2)) EXIT
17357  do i=1,13
17358  xc1=xmin(ipas)
17359  xc2=xmin(ipas+1)
17360  xc= (xc2+xc1)/2.+(xc2-xc1)*t(i)/2.
17361  rfonc= fone(xc)
17362  ar=ar+h(i)*rfonc*cos(xk*xc)
17363  enddo
17364  ar=ar*(xc2-xc1)
17365  tta0=tta0+ar
17366  ar=0.
17367  ipas=ipas+1
17368  ENDDO
17369  endif
17370  return
17371  end
17372 
17376  FUNCTION ta1(betr,nrc)
17377  implicit real(8) (a-h,o-z)
17378  common/cell/yf(10000),xf(10000),xlim(15),flength,fhc,att,
17379  * npoint(15),ncell
17380  common/consta/vl,pi,xmat,rpel,qst
17381  common/gaus13/h(13),t(13)
17382  common/gaus17/h1(17),t1(17)
17383  xk=fhc*2.*pi/(betr*vl)
17384  ar=0.
17385  xc1=xlim(nrc)
17386  xc2=xlim(nrc+1)
17387  do i=1,17
17388  xc= (xc2+xc1)/2.+(xc2-xc1)*h1(i)/2.
17389  rfonc=fcav(xc,nrc)
17390  ar=ar-t1(i)*xc*rfonc*sin(xk*xc)
17391  enddo
17392  ta1=ar*(xc2-xc1)
17393  return
17394  end
17395 
17399  FUNCTION tta1(BETR)
17400  implicit real(8) (a-h,o-z)
17401  common/cell/yf(10000),xf(10000),xlim(15),flength,fhc,att,
17402  * npoint(15),ncell
17403  common/consta/vl,pi,xmat,rpel,qst
17404  common/func/a(200),ylg,atte,ncel,nharm
17405  common/ttfc/tk,t1k,t2k,sk,s1k,s2k,fh
17406  common/rfield/ifield
17407  common/gaus13/h(13),t(13)
17408  dimension xmin(15)
17409  logical ifield
17410  if(ifield) then
17411  tta1=0.
17412  do i=1,ncell
17413  tta1=tta1+ta1(betr,i)
17414  enddo
17415  return
17416  else
17417  xk=fh/(betr*vl)
17418  xmin(1)=0.
17419  do i=2,ncel+2
17420  xmin(i)=0.
17421  enddo
17422  do i=2,ncel+1
17423  xmin(i)=ylg*(i-1)/ncel
17424  enddo
17425  ipas=1
17426  tta1=0.
17427  ar=0.
17428  DO
17429  if(xmin(ipas+1).eq.0.or.ipas.gt.(ncel+2)) EXIT
17430  do i=1,13
17431  xc1=xmin(ipas)
17432  xc2=xmin(ipas+1)
17433  xc= (xc2+xc1)/2.+(xc2-xc1)*t(i)/2.
17434  rfonc= fone(xc)
17435  ar=ar-h(i)*xc*rfonc*sin(xk*xc)
17436  enddo
17437  ar=ar*(xc2-xc1)
17438  tta1=tta1+ar
17439  ar=0.
17440  ipas=ipas+1
17441  ENDDO
17442  endif
17443  end
17444 
17448  FUNCTION ta2(betr,nrc)
17449  implicit real(8) (a-h,o-z)
17450  common/cell/yf(10000),xf(10000),xlim(15),flength,fhc,att,
17451  * npoint(15),ncell
17452  common/consta/vl,pi,xmat,rpel,qst
17453  common/gaus13/h(13),t(13)
17454  common/gaus17/h1(17),t1(17)
17455  xk=fhc*2.*pi/(betr*vl)
17456  ar=0.
17457  xc1=xlim(nrc)
17458  xc2=xlim(nrc+1)
17459  do i=1,17
17460  xc= (xc2+xc1)/2.+(xc2-xc1)*h1(i)/2.
17461  rfonc=fcav(xc,nrc)
17462  ar=ar-t1(i)*xc*xc*rfonc*cos(xk*xc)
17463  enddo
17464  ta2=ar*(xc2-xc1)
17465  return
17466  END
17467 
17471  FUNCTION tta2(BETR)
17472  implicit real(8) (a-h,o-z)
17473  common/cell/yf(10000),xf(10000),xlim(15),flength,fhc,att,
17474  * npoint(15),ncell
17475  common/consta/vl,pi,xmat,rpel,qst
17476  common/func/a(200),ylg,atte,ncel,nharm
17477  common/ttfc/tk,t1k,t2k,sk,s1k,s2k,fh
17478  common/rfield/ifield
17479  common/gaus13/h(13),t(13)
17480  dimension xmin(15)
17481  logical ifield
17482  if(ifield) then
17483  tta2=0.
17484  do i=1,ncell
17485  tta2=tta2+ta2(betr,i)
17486  enddo
17487  return
17488  else
17489  xk=fh/(betr*vl)
17490  xmin(1)=0.
17491  do i=2,ncel+2
17492  xmin(i)=0.
17493  enddo
17494  do i=2,ncel+1
17495  xmin(i)=ylg*(i-1)/ncel
17496  enddo
17497  ipas=1
17498  tta2=0.
17499  ar=0.
17500  DO
17501  if(xmin(ipas+1).eq.0.or.ipas.gt.(ncel+2)) EXIT
17502  do i=1,13
17503  xc1=xmin(ipas)
17504  xc2=xmin(ipas+1)
17505  xc= (xc2+xc1)/2.+(xc2-xc1)*t(i)/2.
17506  rfonc= fone(xc)
17507  ar=ar-h(i)*xc*xc*rfonc*cos(xk*xc)
17508  enddo
17509  ar=ar*(xc2-xc1)
17510  tta2=tta2+ar
17511  ar=0.
17512  ipas=ipas+1
17513  ENDDO
17514  endif
17515  end

17534  ar=ar+t1(i)*xc*xc*xc*rfonc*sin(xk*xc)
17535  enddo
17536  ta3=ar*(xc2-xc1)

17592  FUNCTION ta4(betr,nrc)
17593  implicit real(8) (a-h,o-z)
17594  common/cell/yf(10000),xf(10000),xlim(15),flength,fhc,att,
17595  * npoint(15),ncell
17596  common/consta/vl,pi,xmat,rpel,qst
17597  common/gaus13/h(13),t(13)
17598  common/gaus17/h1(17),t1(17)
17599  xk=fhc*2.*pi/(betr*vl)
17600  ar=0.
17601  xc1=xlim(nrc)
17602  xc2=xlim(nrc+1)
17603  do i=1,17
17604  xc= (xc2+xc1)/2.+(xc2-xc1)*h1(i)/2.
17605  rfonc=fcav(xc,nrc)
17606  ar=ar+t1(i)*xc**4*rfonc*cos(xk*xc)
17607  enddo
17608  ta4=ar*(xc2-xc1)
17609  return
17610  END

17640  enddo

17647  xc1=xmin(ipas)

17651  ar=ar+h(i)*xc**4*rfonc*cos(xk*xc)
17652  enddo
17653  ar=ar*(xc2-xc1)
17654  tta4=tta4+ar
17655  ar=0.
17656  ipas=ipas+1
17657  ENDDO
17658  endif
17659  end

17666  common/cell/yf(10000),xf(10000),xlim(15),flength,fhc,att,

17672  ar=0.

17674  xc2=xlim(nrc+1)
17675  do i=1,17
17676  xc= (xc2+xc1)/2.+(xc2-xc1)*h1(i)/2.
17677  rfonc=fcav(xc,nrc)
17678  ar=ar-t1(i)*xc**5*rfonc*sin(xk*xc)
17679  enddo
17680  ta5=ar*(xc2-xc1)
17681  return
17682  END

17687  FUNCTION tta5(BETR)
17688  implicit real(8) (a-h,o-z)
17689  common/cell/yf(10000),xf(10000),xlim(15),flength,fhc,att,
17690  * npoint(15),ncell
17691  common/consta/vl,pi,xmat,rpel,qst
17692  common/func/a(200),ylg,atte,ncel,nharm
17693  common/ttfc/tk,t1k,t2k,sk,s1k,s2k,fh
17694  common/rfield/ifield
17695  common/gaus13/h(13),t(13)
17696  dimension xmin(15)
17697  logical ifield
17698  if(ifield) then
17699  tta5=0.
17700  do i=1,ncell
17701  tta5=tta5+ta5(betr,i)
17702  enddo
17703  return
17704  else

17706  xmin(1)=0.
17707  do i=2,ncel+2
17708  xmin(i)=0.
17709  enddo
17710  do i=2,ncel+1
17711  xmin(i)=ylg*(i-1)/ncel
17712  enddo
17713  ipas=1
17714  tta5=0.
17715  ar=0.
17716  DO
17717  if(xmin(ipas+1).eq.0.or.ipas.gt.(ncel+2)) EXIT
17718  do i=1,13
17719  xc1=xmin(ipas)
17720  xc2=xmin(ipas+1)
17721  xc= (xc2+xc1)/2.+(xc2-xc1)*t(i)/2.
17722  rfonc= fone(xc)
17723  ar=ar-h(i)*xc**5*rfonc*sin(xk*xc)
17724  enddo
17725  ar=ar*(xc2-xc1)
17726  tta5=tta5+ar
17727  ar=0.
17728  ipas=ipas+1
17729  ENDDO
17730  endif
17731  end

17736  FUNCTION sb0(BETR,nrc)
17737  implicit real(8) (a-h,o-z)
17738  common/cell/yf(10000),xf(10000),xlim(15),flength,fhc,att,
17739  * npoint(15),ncell
17740  common/consta/vl,pi,xmat,rpel,qst
17741  common/gaus13/h(13),t(13)
17742  common/gaus17/h1(17),t1(17)
17743  xk=fhc*2.*pi/(betr*vl)
17744  xc1=xlim(nrc)
17745  xc2=xlim(nrc+1)
17746  br=0.
17747  DO i=1,17
17748  xc= (xc2+xc1)/2.+(xc2-xc1)*h1(i)/2.
17749  rfonc=fcav(xc,nrc)
17750  br=br+t1(i)*rfonc*sin(xk*xc)
17751  enddo
17752  sb0=br*(xc2-xc1)
17753  return
17754  END
17755 
17759  FUNCTION tsb0(BETR)
17760  implicit real(8) (a-h,o-z)
17761  common/cell/yf(10000),xf(10000),xlim(15),flength,fhc,att,
17762  * npoint(15),ncell
17763  common/consta/vl,pi,xmat,rpel,qst
17764  common/func/a(200),ylg,atte,ncel,nharm
17765  common/ttfc/tk,t1k,t2k,sk,s1k,s2k,fh
17766  common/rfield/ifield
17767  common/gaus13/h(13),t(13)
17768  dimension xmin(15)
17769  logical ifield
17770  if(ifield) then
17771  tsb0=0.
17772  do i=1,ncell
17773  tsb0=tsb0+sb0(betr,i)
17774  enddo
17775  return
17776  else
17777  xk=fh/(betr*vl)
17778  xmin(1)=0.
17779  do i=2,ncel+2
17780  xmin(i)=0.
17781  enddo
17782  do i=2,ncel+1
17783  xmin(i)=ylg*(i-1)/ncel
17784  enddo
17785  ipas=1
17786  tsb0=0.
17787  br=0.
17788  DO
17789  if(xmin(ipas+1).eq.0.or.ipas.gt.(ncel+2)) EXIT
17790  do i=1,13
17791  xc1=xmin(ipas)
17792  xc2=xmin(ipas+1)
17793  xc= (xc2+xc1)/2.+(xc2-xc1)*t(i)/2.
17794  rfonc= fone(xc)
17795  br=br+h(i)*rfonc*sin(xk*xc)
17796  enddo
17797  br=br*(xc2-xc1)
17798  tsb0=tsb0+br
17799  br=0.
17800  ipas=ipas+1
17801  ENDDO
17802  endif
17803  end
17804 
17808  FUNCTION sb1(BETR,nrc)
17809  implicit real(8) (a-h,o-z)
17810  common/cell/yf(10000),xf(10000),xlim(15),flength,fhc,att,

17818  br=0.
17819  DO i=1,17
17820  xc= (xc2+xc1)/2.+(xc2-xc1)*h1(i)/2.
17821  rfonc=fcav(xc,nrc)
17822  br=br+t1(i)*xc*rfonc*cos(xk*xc)
17823  enddo
17824  sb1=br*(xc2-xc1)
17825  return
17826  END

17868  enddo

17870  tsb1=tsb1+br
17871  br=0.

17873  ENDDO

17895  enddo

17905  common/cell/yf(10000),xf(10000),xlim(15),flength,fhc,att,

17918  enddo
17919  return

17922  xmin(1)=0.

17925  enddo

17927  xmin(i)=ylg*(i-1)/ncel
17928  enddo

17932  DO
17933  if(xmin(ipas+1).eq.0.or.ipas.gt.(ncel+2)) EXIT
17934  do i=1,13
17935  xc1=xmin(ipas)
17936  xc2=xmin(ipas+1)
17937  xc= (xc2+xc1)/2.+(xc2-xc1)*t(i)/2.
17938  rfonc= fone(xc)
17939  br=br-h(i)*xc*xc*rfonc*sin(xk*xc)
17940  enddo
17941  br=br*(xc2-xc1)
17942  tsb2=tsb2+br
17943  br=0.
17944  ipas=ipas+1
17945  ENDDO
17946  endif
17947  end

17952  FUNCTION sb3(BETR,nrc)
17953  implicit real(8) (a-h,o-z)
17954  common/cell/yf(10000),xf(10000),xlim(15),flength,fhc,att,
17955  * npoint(15),ncell
17956  common/consta/vl,pi,xmat,rpel,qst
17957  common/gaus13/h(13),t(13)
17958  common/gaus17/h1(17),t1(17)
17959  xk=fhc*2.*pi/(betr*vl)
17960  xc1=xlim(nrc)
17961  xc2=xlim(nrc+1)
17962  br=0.
17963  DO i=1,17
17964  xc= (xc2+xc1)/2.+(xc2-xc1)*h1(i)/2.
17965  rfonc=fcav(xc,nrc)
17966  br=br-t1(i)*xc*xc*xc*rfonc*cos(xk*xc)
17967  enddo
17968  sb3=br*(xc2-xc1)
17969  return
17970  END
17971 
17975  FUNCTION tsb3(BETR)
17976  implicit real(8) (a-h,o-z)
17977  common/cell/yf(10000),xf(10000),xlim(15),flength,fhc,att,
17978  * npoint(15),ncell
17979  common/consta/vl,pi,xmat,rpel,qst
17980  common/func/a(200),ylg,atte,ncel,nharm
17981  common/ttfc/tk,t1k,t2k,sk,s1k,s2k,fh
17982  common/rfield/ifield
17983  common/gaus13/h(13),t(13)
17984  dimension xmin(15)
17985  logical ifield
17986  if(ifield) then
17987  tsb3=0.
17988  do i=1,ncell
17989  tsb3=tsb3+sb3(betr,i)
17990  enddo
17991  return
17992  else
17993  xk=fh/(betr*vl)
17994  xmin(1)=0.
17995  do i=2,ncel+2
17996  xmin(i)=0.
17997  enddo
17998  do i=2,ncel+1
17999  xmin(i)=ylg*(i-1)/ncel
18000  enddo
18001  ipas=1
18002  tsb3=0.
18003  br=0.
18004  DO
18005  if(xmin(ipas+1).eq.0.or.ipas.gt.(ncel+2)) EXIT
18006  do i=1,13
18007  xc1=xmin(ipas)
18008  xc2=xmin(ipas+1)
18009  xc= (xc2+xc1)/2.+(xc2-xc1)*t(i)/2.
18010  rfonc= fone(xc)
18011  br=br-h(i)*xc*xc*xc*rfonc*cos(xk*xc)
18012  enddo
18013  br=br*(xc2-xc1)
18014  tsb3=tsb3+br
18015  br=0.
18016  ipas=ipas+1
18017  ENDDO
18018  endif
18019  end
18020 
18024  FUNCTION sb4(BETR,nrc)
18025  implicit real(8) (a-h,o-z)
18026  common/cell/yf(10000),xf(10000),xlim(15),flength,fhc,att,
18027  * npoint(15),ncell
18028  common/consta/vl,pi,xmat,rpel,qst
18029  common/gaus13/h(13),t(13)
18030  common/gaus17/h1(17),t1(17)
18031  xk=fhc*2.*pi/(betr*vl)
18032  xc1=xlim(nrc)
18033  xc2=xlim(nrc+1)
18034  br=0.
18035  do i=1,17
18036  xc= (xc2+xc1)/2.+(xc2-xc1)*h1(i)/2.
18037  rfonc=fcav(xc,nrc)
18038  br=br+t1(i)*xc**4*rfonc*sin(xk*xc)
18039  enddo
18040  sb4=br*(xc2-xc1)
18041  return
18042  END
18043 
18047  FUNCTION tsb4(BETR)
18048  implicit real(8) (a-h,o-z)
18049  common/cell/yf(10000),xf(10000),xlim(15),flength,fhc,att,
18050  * npoint(15),ncell
18051  common/consta/vl,pi,xmat,rpel,qst
18052  common/func/a(200),ylg,atte,ncel,nharm
18053  common/ttfc/tk,t1k,t2k,sk,s1k,s2k,fh
18054  common/rfield/ifield
18055  common/gaus13/h(13),t(13)
18056  dimension xmin(15)
18057  logical ifield
18058  if(ifield) then
18059  tsb4=0.
18060  do i=1,ncell
18061  tsb4=tsb4+sb4(betr,i)
18062  enddo
18063  return
18064  else
18065  xk=fh/(betr*vl)
18066  xmin(1)=0.
18067  do i=2,ncel+2
18068  xmin(i)=0.
18069  enddo
18070  do i=2,ncel+1
18071  xmin(i)=ylg*(i-1)/ncel
18072  enddo
18073  ipas=1
18074  tsb4=0.
18075  br=0.
18076  DO
18077  if(xmin(ipas+1).eq.0.or.ipas.gt.(ncel+2)) EXIT
18078  do i=1,13
18079  xc1=xmin(ipas)
18080  xc2=xmin(ipas+1)
18081  xc= (xc2+xc1)/2.+(xc2-xc1)*t(i)/2.
18082  rfonc= fone(xc)
18083  br=br+h(i)*xc**4*rfonc*sin(xk*xc)
18084  enddo
18085  br=br*(xc2-xc1)
18086  tsb4=tsb4+br
18087  br=0.
18088  ipas=ipas+1
18089  ENDDO
18090  endif
18091  end
18092 
18096  FUNCTION sb5(BETR,nrc)
18097  implicit real(8) (a-h,o-z)
18098  common/cell/yf(10000),xf(10000),xlim(15),flength,fhc,att,
18099  * npoint(15),ncell
18100  common/consta/vl,pi,xmat,rpel,qst
18101  common/gaus13/h(13),t(13)
18102  common/gaus17/h1(17),t1(17)
18103  xk=fhc*2.*pi/(betr*vl)
18104  xc1=xlim(nrc)
18105  xc2=xlim(nrc+1)
18106  br=0.
18107  DO i=1,17
18108  xc= (xc2+xc1)/2.+(xc2-xc1)*h1(i)/2.
18109  rfonc=fcav(xc,nrc)
18110  br=br+t1(i)*xc**5*rfonc*cos(xk*xc)
18111  enddo
18112  sb5=br*(xc2-xc1)
18113  return
18114  END
18115 
18119  FUNCTION tsb5(BETR)
18120  implicit real(8) (a-h,o-z)
18121  common/cell/yf(10000),xf(10000),xlim(15),flength,fhc,att,
18122  * npoint(15),ncell
18123  common/consta/vl,pi,xmat,rpel,qst
18124  common/func/a(200),ylg,atte,ncel,nharm
18125  common/ttfc/tk,t1k,t2k,sk,s1k,s2k,fh
18126  common/rfield/ifield
18127  common/gaus13/h(13),t(13)
18128  dimension xmin(15)
18129  logical ifield
18130  if(ifield) then
18131  tsb5=0.
18132  do i=1,ncell
18133  tsb5=tsb5+sb5(betr,i)
18134  enddo
18135  return
18136  else
18137  xk=fh/(betr*vl)
18138  xmin(1)=0.
18139  do i=2,ncel+2
18140  xmin(i)=0.
18141  enddo
18142  do i=2,ncel+1
18143  xmin(i)=ylg*(i-1)/ncel
18144  enddo
18145  ipas=1
18146  tsb5=0.
18147  br=0.
18148  DO
18149  if(xmin(ipas+1).eq.0.or.ipas.gt.(ncel+2)) EXIT
18150  do i=1,13
18151  xc1=xmin(ipas)
18152  xc2=xmin(ipas+1)
18153  xc= (xc2+xc1)/2.+(xc2-xc1)*t(i)/2.
18154  rfonc= fone(xc)
18155  br=br+h(i)*xc**5*rfonc*cos(xk*xc)
18156  enddo
18157  br=br*(xc2-xc1)
18158  tsb5=tsb5+br
18159  br=0.
18160  ipas=ipas+1
18161  ENDDO
18162  endif
18163  end
18164 
18169  FUNCTION fone(Z)
18170  implicit real(8) (a-h,o-z)
18171  COMMON /consta/ vl, pi, xmat, rpel, qst
18172  common/func/a(200),ylg,atte,ncel,nharm
18173  common/ttfc/tk,t1k,t2k,sk,s1k,s2k,fh
18174  fone=0.
18175  DO j=1,nharm
18176  xl=pi*(j-1)/ylg
18177  fone=fone+a(j)*cos(xl*z)
18178  enddo
18179  RETURN
18180  end
18181 
18185  SUBROUTINE rharm
18186  implicit real(8) (a-h,o-z)
18187  common/func/a(200),ylg,atte,ncel,nharm
18188  common/ttfc/tk,t1k,t2k,sk,s1k,s2k,fh
18189  common/tapes/in,ifile,meta
18190  COMMON /consta/ vl, pi, xmat, rpel, qst
18191  common/rfield/ifield
18192 ! common/mode/eflvl,rflvl
18193  common/paths/dpath
18194  character*(256) dpath,myfile
18195  logical ifield
18196  myfile=''
18197  ifield=.false.
18198 ! ylg: length of the field (cm)
18199 ! fh: frequency (hertz)
18200 ! atte: field factor
18201 ! ncel: number of cells in the cavity
18202  read(in,*) ylg,fh,atte,ncel
18203  read(in,*) nharm
18204  read(in,*) (a(i),i=1,nharm)
18205  write(16,100) ncel,ylg,fh,atte
18206 100 format(' number of cells in the cavity: ',i3,/,
18207  * ' field length: ',e12.5, 'cm',/,
18208  * ' freq. ',e12.5,' Hertz',' field factor ',e12.5)
18209  write(16,*) ' number of harmonics: ',nharm
18210  write(16,200) (a(i),i=1,nharm)
18211 200 format(3(2x,e12.5))
18212  do i=1,nharm
18213  a(i)=a(i)*atte
18214  enddo
18215  fh=fh*2.*pi
18216 ! **********************************************
18217 ! sv 24/10/2015
18218  xp=ylg/100.
18219  myfile='chemtr.txt'
18220  lpath=len_trim(dpath)
18221  lfile=len_trim(myfile)
18222  myfile(lpath+1:lpath+lfile)=myfile(1:lfile)
18223  myfile(1:lpath)=dpath(1:lpath)
18224  myfile=trim(myfile)
18225  open(18,file=myfile,status='unknown')
18226  zx=0.
18227  yh=0.
18228  DO
18229 !98 continue
18230  do inh=1,nharm
18231  ff=fone(zx)
18232  enddo
18233  write(18,99) zx/100.,ff
18234 99 format(3(2x,e12.5))
18235  zx=zx+xp
18236  if(zx.ge.ylg) EXIT
18237  ENDDO
18238  close(18)
18239 ! **********************************************
18240  return
18241  end
18242 
18247  SUBROUTINE profil
18248  implicit real(8) (a-h,o-z)
18249  common/dplt/zdeb,zfin,ywmax,ypmax,rmsn
18250  common/tapes/in,ifile,meta
18251  CALL plprf1
18252  CALL plprf2
18253  RETURN
18254  END
18255 
18265  SUBROUTINE plprf1
18266  implicit real(8) (a-h,o-z)
18267  dimension xx(3000),yy(3000)
18268 ! RMSN :envelope size in multiples of RMS size
18269 ! ZDEB : Starting position of the plot
18270 ! ZFIN : End of the plot
18271  CHARACTER CAR*80,text*80
18272  common/dplt/zdeb,zfin,ywmax,ypmax,rmsn
18273  common/pltprf/sprfy(3000),sprfz(3000),sprfl(3000),sprfw(3000),
18274  x sprfp(3000),sprng(3000),prlab(3000),iprf
18275  CHARACTER*(8) PRLAB
18276  common/tapes/in,ifile,meta
18277  common/prof/car
18278  READ(in,69)car(1:80)
18279 69 FORMAT(a80)
18280  READ(in,*) rmsn
18281  READ(in,*) zdeb,zfin
18282  READ(in,*) xxmax,xymax,ywmax,ypmax
18283  iprf=iprf-1
18284  ideb=1
18285  ifin=iprf
18286  IF(zfin.GT.sprfl(iprf))zfin=sprfl(iprf)
18287  write(16,*) ' ******* PROFIL ***************** '
18288  write(16,*) ' IPRF ZFIN ',iprf,zfin
18289  DO i=2,iprf
18290  IF((zdeb.GT.sprfl(i-1)).AND.(zdeb.LE.sprfl(i)))ideb=i
18291  IF((zfin.GE.sprfl(i-1)).AND.(zfin.LT.sprfl(i)))ifin=i-1
18292  ENDDO
18293  if (xxmax.le.0.) then
18294  xxmax=0.
18295  DO i=ideb,ifin
18296  IF(0.5*sprfy(i)*rmsn .GT. xxmax) xxmax=0.5*sprfy(i)*rmsn
18297  ENDDO
18298  endif
18299  if (xymax.le.0.) then
18300  xymax=0.
18301  DO i=ideb,ifin
18302  IF(0.5*sprfz(i)*rmsn.GT.xymax) xymax=0.5*sprfz(i)*rmsn
18303  ENDDO
18304  endif
18305 ! Store header and envelopes in binary file for
18306 ! graphics post-processor
18307 !
18308 ! igrtyp is type of graph (igrtyp=3 for x,y envelope plots)
18309  igrtyp=3
18310  text='X and Y envelopes '
18311  text(21:80)=car(1:60)
18312  WRITE(66,*) igrtyp
18313  WRITE(66,*) text
18314  xx(1)=zdeb
18315  xx(2)=zfin
18316  yy(1)=-xymax
18317  yy(2)=xxmax
18318  write(16,*) ' XMAX YMAX ',xxmax,xymax
18319  WRITE(66,*) xx(1),xx(2),yy(1),yy(2)
18320 ! GRADX=XXMAX/3.
18321 ! YFAXE=XXMAX
18322  icnt=0
18323  DO i=ideb,ifin
18324  icnt=icnt+1
18325  xx(icnt)=sprfl(i)
18326  yy(icnt)=0.5*sprfy(i)*rmsn
18327  ENDDO
18328 ! write envelope coordinates to graphics file
18329  WRITE(66,*) icnt
18330  DO i=1,icnt
18331  WRITE(66,*) xx(i),yy(i)
18332  ENDDO
18333  icnt=0
18334  DO i=ideb,ifin
18335  icnt=icnt+1
18336  xx(icnt)=sprfl(i)
18337  yy(icnt)=-0.5*sprfz(i)*rmsn
18338  ENDDO
18339 ! write envelope coordinates to graphics file
18340  WRITE(66,*) icnt
18341  DO i=1,icnt
18342  WRITE(66,*) xx(i),yy(i)
18343  ENDDO
18344  RETURN
18345  END
18346 
18351  SUBROUTINE plprf2
18352  implicit real(8) (a-h,o-z)
18353  dimension xx(3000),yy(3000)
18354  CHARACTER CAR*80,text*80
18355  common/prof/car
18356  common/dplt/zdeb,zfin,ywmax,ypmax,rmsn
18357  common/pltprf/sprfy(3000),sprfz(3000),sprfl(3000),sprfw(3000),
18358  x sprfp(3000),sprng(3000),prlab(3000),iprf
18359  CHARACTER*(8) PRLAB
18360  ideb=1
18361  ifin=iprf
18362  DO i=2,iprf
18363  IF((zdeb.GT.sprfl(i-1)).AND.(zdeb.LE.sprfl(i)))ideb=i
18364  IF((zfin.GE.sprfl(i-1)).AND.(zfin.LT.sprfl(i)))ifin=i-1
18365  ENDDO
18366  xxmax=ywmax/1000.
18367  xymax=ypmax
18368  if (xxmax.le.0.) then
18369  xxmax=0.
18370  DO i=ideb,ifin
18371  IF(0.5*sprfw(i)*rmsn.GT.xxmax) xxmax=0.5*sprfw(i)*rmsn
18372  ENDDO
18373  endif
18374  if (xymax.le.0.) then
18375  xymax=0.
18376  DO i=ideb,ifin
18377  IF(0.5*sprfp(i)*rmsn.GT.xymax) xymax=0.5*sprfp(i)*rmsn
18378  ENDDO
18379  endif
18380 ! Store header and envelopes in binary file for
18381 ! graphics post-processor
18382 !
18383 ! igrtyp is type of graph (igrtyp=4 for dW/W envelope plots)
18384  igrtyp=4
18385  text='dW/W envelope '
18386  text(21:80)=car(1:60)
18387  WRITE(66,*) igrtyp
18388  WRITE(66,*) text
18389  xx(1)=zdeb
18390  xx(2)=zfin
18391  yy(1)=0.
18392  yy(2)=xxmax*1000.
18393  WRITE(66,*) xx(1),xx(2),yy(1),yy(2)
18394  icnt=0
18395  DO i=ideb,ifin
18396  icnt=icnt+1
18397  xx(icnt)=sprfl(i)
18398  yy(icnt)=0.5*sprfw(i)*1000.*rmsn
18399  ENDDO
18400 ! write envelope coordinates to graphics file
18401  WRITE(66,*) icnt
18402  DO i=1,icnt
18403  WRITE(66,*) xx(i),yy(i)
18404  ENDDO
18405 ! Store header and envelopes in binary file for
18406 ! graphics post-processor
18407 !
18408 ! igrtyp is type of graph (igrtyp=5 for dPHI envelope plots)
18409  igrtyp=5
18410  text='dPHI envelope '
18411  text(21:80)=car(1:60)
18412  WRITE(66,*) igrtyp
18413  WRITE(66,*) text
18414  xx(1)=zdeb
18415  xx(2)=zfin
18416  yy(1)=0.
18417  yy(2)=xymax
18418  write(16,*) ' dW/WMAX dPhiMAX ',xxmax,xymax
18419  WRITE(66,*) xx(1),xx(2),yy(1),yy(2)
18420  icnt=0
18421  DO i=ideb,ifin
18422  icnt=icnt+1
18423  xx(icnt)=sprfl(i)
18424  yy(icnt)=0.5*sprfp(i)*rmsn
18425  ENDDO
18426 ! write envelope coordinates to graphics file
18427  WRITE(66,*) icnt
18428  DO i=1,icnt
18429  WRITE(66,*) xx(i),yy(i)
18430  ENDDO
18431  iprf=iprf+1
18432  RETURN
18433  END
18434 
18438  FUNCTION slope(N,XV)
18439  implicit real(8) (a-h,o-z)
18440  common/spl/x(4000),y(4000),s(5000),p(5000),q(5000)
18441  do i=2,n
18442  xtvi=xv-x(i)
18443  if(xtvi.le.0.) EXIT
18444  enddo
18445  if(xtvi.ge.0.) then
18446  i=i-1
18447  avx=x(i+1)-x(i)
18448  slope=s(i+1)*avx/3.+s(i)*avx/6.+(y(i+1)-y(i))/avx
18449  else
18450  i=i-1
18451  dgx=xv-x(i)
18452  ddx=x(i+1)-xv
18453  avx=x(i+1)-x(i)
18454  slope=-(s(i)*ddx*ddx)/(2.*avx)+(s(i+1)*dgx*dgx)/(2.*avx)
18455  * +((y(i+1)-y(i))/avx)-(avx*(s(i+1)-s(i))/6.)
18456  endif
18457  return
18458  end
18459 
18463  FUNCTION spline (N,XV)
18464  implicit real(8) (a-h,o-z)
18465  COMMON /spl/x(4000),y(4000),s(5000),p(5000),q(5000)
18466  spline=y(1)
18467  xtv1=xv-x(1)
18468  if(xtv1.lt.0.) then
18469  spline=y(1)+((y(2)-y(1))/(x(2)-x(1))-s(2)*(x(2)-x(1))/6.)
18470  * *(xv-x(1))
18471  return
18472  endif
18473  if(xtv1.eq.0.0) then
18474  spline=y(1)
18475  return
18476  endif
18477  if(xtv1.gt.0.) then
18478  xtvn=xv-x(n)
18479  if(xtvn.eq.0.00) then
18480  spline=y(n)
18481  return
18482  endif
18483  if(xtvn.gt.0.) then
18484  spline=y(n)+((y(n)-y(n-1))/
18485  * (x(n)-x(n-1))+s(n-1)*(x(n)-x(n-1))/6.)*(xv-x(n))
18486  return
18487  endif
18488  if(xtvn.lt.0.) then
18489  do i=2,n
18490  xtvi=xv-x(i)
18491  if(xtvi.le.0.) EXIT
18492  enddo
18493  if(xtvi.ge.0.) then
18494  spline=y(i)
18495  else
18496  i=i-1
18497  dgx=xv-x(i)
18498  ddx=x(i+1)-xv
18499  avx=x(i+1)-x(i)
18500  spline=s(i)*ddx**3/(6.*avx)+s(i+1)*dgx**3/(6.*avx)
18501  * +(y(i+1)/avx-s(i+1)*avx/6.)*dgx+(y(i)/avx-s(i)*avx/6.)*ddx
18502  endif
18503  endif
18504  endif
18505  return
18506  end
18507 
18511  SUBROUTINE deriv2(N)
18512  implicit real(8) (a-h,o-z)
18513  common/spl/x(4000),y(4000),s(5000),p(5000),q(5000)
18514  avxn=x(n)-x(n-1)
18515  avvxn=x(n-1)-x(n-2)
18516  avyn=y(n)-y(n-1)
18517  avvyn=y(n-1)-y(n-2)
18518  f=avxn-(avvxn**2)/avxn
18519  p(n-1)=1.
18520  q(n-1)=0.
18521  if(f.ne.0.) then
18522  p(n-1)=(-2.*avxn-3.*avvxn-avvxn**2/avxn)/f
18523  q(n-1)=6.*(avyn/avxn-avvyn/avvxn)/f
18524  endif
18525  nm1=n-1
18526  DO j=2,nm1
18527  i=n-j
18528  avx=x(i+1)-x(i)
18529  avvx=x(i+2)-x(i+1)
18530  avy=y(i+1)-y(i)
18531  avvy=y(i+2)-y(i+1)
18532  d=2.*(avx+avvx)+avvx*p(i+1)
18533  p(i)=-avx/d
18534  q(i)=(6.*(avvy/avvx-avy/avx)-avvx*q(i+1))/d
18535  ENDDO
18536  avx1=x(2)-x(1)
18537  avvx1=x(3)-x(2)
18538  g1=(avvx1/avx1)+1.-p(2)-(q(2)/q(1))
18539  g2=(avvx1/(avx1*p(1)))-(avvx1/avx1)-1.+p(2)
18540  s(1)=(q(1)*g1)/(p(1)*g2)
18541  DO i=1,nm1
18542  s(i+1)=p(i)*s(i)+q(i)
18543  ENDDO
18544  RETURN
18545  END
18546 
18550  SUBROUTINE derif2(N)
18551  implicit real(8) (a-h,o-z)
18552  common/spff/x(400),y(400),s(500),p(500),q(500)
18553  avxn=x(n)-x(n-1)
18554  avvxn=x(n-1)-x(n-2)
18555  avyn=y(n)-y(n-1)
18556  avvyn=y(n-1)-y(n-2)
18557  f=avxn-(avvxn**2)/avxn
18558  p(n-1)=1.
18559  q(n-1)=0.
18560  if(f.ne.0.) then
18561  p(n-1)=(-2.*avxn-3.*avvxn-avvxn**2/avxn)/f
18562  q(n-1)=6.*(avyn/avxn-avvyn/avvxn)/f
18563  endif
18564  nm1=n-1
18565  DO j=2,nm1
18566  i=n-j
18567  avx=x(i+1)-x(i)
18568  avvx=x(i+2)-x(i+1)
18569  avy=y(i+1)-y(i)
18570  avvy=y(i+2)-y(i+1)
18571  d=2.*(avx+avvx)+avvx*p(i+1)
18572  p(i)=-avx/d
18573  q(i)=(6.*(avvy/avvx-avy/avx)-avvx*q(i+1))/d
18574  ENDDO
18575  avx1=x(2)-x(1)
18576  avvx1=x(3)-x(2)
18577  g1=(avvx1/avx1)+1.-p(2)-(q(2)/q(1))
18578  g2=(avvx1/(avx1*p(1)))-(avvx1/avx1)-1.+p(2)
18579  s(1)=(q(1)*g1)/(p(1)*g2)
18580  DO i=1,nm1
18581  s(i+1)=p(i)*s(i)+q(i)
18582  ENDDO
18583  RETURN
18584  END
18585 
18589  FUNCTION splinf (N,XV)
18590  implicit real(8) (a-h,o-z)
18591  COMMON /spff/x(400),y(400),s(500),p(500),q(500)
18592  splinf=y(1)
18593  xtv1=xv-x(1)
18594  if(xtv1.lt.0.) then
18595  splinf=y(1)+((y(2)-y(1))/(x(2)-x(1))-s(2)*(x(2)-x(1))/6.)
18596  * *(xv-x(1))
18597  return
18598  endif
18599  if(xtv1.eq.0.00) then
18600  splinf=y(1)
18601  return
18602  endif
18603  if(xtv1.gt.0.) then
18604  xtvn=xv-x(n)
18605  if(xtvn.eq.0.00) then
18606  splinf=y(n)
18607  return
18608  endif
18609  if(xtvn.gt.0.) then
18610  splinf=y(n)+((y(n)-y(n-1))/
18611  * (x(n)-x(n-1))+s(n-1)*(x(n)-x(n-1))/6.)*(xv-x(n))
18612  return
18613  endif
18614  if(xtvn.lt.0.) then
18615  do i=2,n
18616  xtvi=xv-x(i)
18617  if(xtvi.le.0.) EXIT
18618  enddo
18619  if(xtvi.ge.0.) then
18620  splinf=y(i)
18621  else
18622  i=i-1
18623  dgx=xv-x(i)
18624  ddx=x(i+1)-xv
18625  avx=x(i+1)-x(i)
18626  splinf=s(i)*ddx**3/(6.*avx)+s(i+1)*dgx**3/(6.*avx)
18627  * +(y(i+1)/avx-s(i+1)*avx/6.)*dgx+(y(i)/avx-s(i)*avx/6.)*ddx
18628  endif
18629  endif
18630  endif
18631  return
18632  end
18633 
18637  FUNCTION slopf(N,XV)
18638  implicit real(8) (a-h,o-z)
18639  COMMON /spff/x(400),y(400),s(500),p(500),q(500)
18640  do i=2,n
18641  xtvi=xv-x(i)
18642  if(xtvi.le.0.) EXIT
18643  enddo
18644  if(xtvi.ge.0.) then
18645  i=i-1
18646  avx=x(i+1)-x(i)
18647  slopf=s(i+1)*avx/3.+s(i)*avx/6.+(y(i+1)-y(i))/avx
18648  else
18649  i=i-1
18650  dgx=xv-x(i)
18651  ddx=x(i+1)-xv
18652  avx=x(i+1)-x(i)
18653  slopf=-(s(i)*ddx*ddx)/(2.*avx)+(s(i+1)*dgx*dgx)/(2.*avx)
18654  * +((y(i+1)-y(i))/avx)-(avx*(s(i+1)-s(i))/6.)
18655  endif
18656  return
18657  end
18658 
18665  SUBROUTINE area(init)
18666  implicit real(8) (a-h,o-z)
18667  parameter(iptsz=100002)
18668  common/faisc/f(10,iptsz),imax,ngood
18669  common/consta/vl,pi,xmat,rpel,qst
18670  common/ttfc/tk,t1k,t2k,sk,s1k,s2k,fh
18671  common/part/xc(iptsz),yc(iptsz),zc(iptsz)
18672  common/tapes/in,ifile,meta
18673  common/zones/frms(6),nzone
18674  dimension inzonn(6)
18675  if(init.eq.1) then
18676 ! set to -1. the last column of the table f(10,iptsz)
18677  do i=1,ngood
18678  f(10,i)=-1.
18679  enddo
18680 ! read: ityp and nzone; the number of regions
18681 ! ityp=0, the zones are defined in the 3-d space (x/a,y/b,z/c)
18682 ! ityp=1, the zones are defined in the plane (x/a,y/b)
18683  read(in,*) ityp,nzone
18684  write(16,*)'Number of zones selected:',nzone
18685  if(nzone.gt.5) then
18686  write(16,*) 'Number of zones is greater than 5 ',nzone
18687  stop
18688  endif
18689 ! The regions are selected in the space x/xrms,y/yrms and z/zrms
18690 ! limits of the zones ; read the upper limits of the regions
18691  frms(1)=0.
18692  if(nzone.ne.0) then
18693  read(in,*) (frms(i), i=2,nzone)
18694  frms(nzone+1)=100.
18695  do i=1,nzone
18696  write(16,*) 'Zone: ',i,' lower limit: ',frms(i),
18697  * ' upper limit:',frms(i+1)
18698  enddo
18699  else
18700  read(in,*) frms(2)
18701  endif
18702  endif
18703  if(nzone.ge.2) then
18704  trmoy=0.
18705  do i=1,ngood
18706  trmoy=trmoy+f(6,i)
18707  enddo
18708  trmoy=trmoy/float(ngood)
18709  xbar=0.
18710  ybar=0.
18711  zbar=0.
18712  imaxx=0
18713 ! Divide by 100. to convert from centimeters to meters
18714  do np=1,ngood
18715  gnp=f(7,np)/xmat
18716  vnp=vl*sqrt(1.-1./(gnp*gnp))
18717  zc(np)=(trmoy-f(6,np))*vnp
18718 ! convert from mrad to rad
18719  f3=f(3,np)*1.e-03
18720  f5=f(5,np)*1.e-03
18721 ! convert from cm to m
18722  xc(np)=(f(2,np)+zc(np)*f3)/100.
18723  yc(np)=(f(4,np)+zc(np)*f5)/100.
18724  zc(np)=zc(np)/100.
18725 ! evaluate xbar , ybar , zbar
18726  xbar=xbar+xc(np)
18727  ybar=ybar+yc(np)
18728  zbar=zbar+zc(np)
18729  enddo
18730  eng=float(ngood)
18731  xbar=xbar/eng
18732  ybar=ybar/eng
18733  zbar=zbar/eng
18734  do np=1,ngood
18735  xc(np)=xc(np)-xbar
18736  yc(np)=yc(np)-ybar
18737  zc(np)=zc(np)-zbar
18738  enddo
18739 ! evaluate the rms sizes
18740  xsqsum=0.
18741  ysqsum=0.
18742  zsqsum=0.
18743  do j=1,ngood
18744  xcj=xc(j)
18745  ycj=yc(j)
18746  zcj=zc(j)
18747  xsqsum=xsqsum+xcj*xcj
18748  ysqsum=ysqsum+ycj*ycj
18749  zsqsum=zsqsum+zcj*zcj
18750  enddo
18751  xrmsz=xsqsum/float(ngood)
18752  yrmsz=ysqsum/float(ngood)
18753  zrmsz=zsqsum/float(ngood)
18754  xrmsz=sqrt(xrmsz)
18755  yrmsz=sqrt(yrmsz)
18756  zrmsz=sqrt(zrmsz)
18757 ! select the particles in the regions and count them
18758  if(ityp.eq.0) then
18759 ! ityp=0, the zones are defined in the 3-d space (x/a,y/b,z/c)
18760  do i=1,nzone
18761  inzonn(i)=0
18762  do j=1,ngood
18763  xcp=xc(j)/xrmsz
18764  ycp=yc(j)/yrmsz
18765  zcp=zc(j)/zrmsz
18766  rxyz=sqrt((xcp*xcp+ycp*ycp+zcp*zcp)/3.)
18767  if(rxyz.lt.frms(i+1).and.rxyz.ge.frms(i)) then
18768  inzonn(i)=inzonn(i)+1
18769  if(init.eq.1) f(10,j)=frms(i+1)
18770  endif
18771  if(f(10,j).eq.100. .and. init.eq.1) f(10,j)=0.
18772  enddo
18773  if(init.eq.1) then
18774  write(16,*) inzonn(i),' particles initially in zone ',i
18775  else
18776  write(16,*) inzonn(i),' particles in zone ',i
18777  endif
18778  enddo
18779  else
18780 ! ityp=1, the zones are defined in the plane (x/a,y/b)
18781  do i=1,nzone
18782  inzonn(i)=0
18783  do j=1,ngood
18784  xcp=xc(j)/xrmsz
18785  ycp=yc(j)/yrmsz
18786  zcp=zc(j)/zrmsz
18787  rxyz=sqrt((xcp*xcp+ycp*ycp)/2.)
18788  if(rxyz.lt.frms(i+1).and.rxyz.ge.frms(i)) then
18789  inzonn(i)=inzonn(i)+1
18790  if(init.eq.1) f(10,j)=frms(i+1)
18791  endif
18792  if(f(10,j).eq.100. .and. init.eq.1) f(10,j)=0.
18793  enddo
18794  if(init.eq.1) then
18795  write(16,*) inzonn(i),' particles initially in zone ',i
18796  else
18797  write(16,*) inzonn(i),' particles in zone ',i
18798  endif
18799  enddo
18800  endif
18801  endif
18802  return
18803  end
18804 
18808  subroutine histgrm
18809  implicit real(8) (a-h,o-z)
18810  parameter(iptsz=100002)
18811  common/faisc/f(10,iptsz),imax,ngood
18812  common/consta/vl,pi,xmat,rpel,qst
18813  common/tapes/in,ifile,meta
18814  common/dyn/tref,vref
18815  common/ttfc/tk,t1k,t2k,sk,s1k,s2k,fh
18816  common/part/xc(iptsz),yc(iptsz),zc(iptsz)
18817  common/hist/xpos(200),xn(200),ypos(200),yn(200),
18818  * zpos(200),zn(200),ixt,iyt,izt
18819  common/hist1/xps(200),xpn(200),yps(200),ypn(200),
18820  * zps(200),zpn(200),ixpt,iypt,izpt
18821  trmoy=0.
18822  wcg=0.
18823  xcg=0.
18824  xcg=0.
18825  ycg=0.
18826  fnstp=100.
18827  do i=1,ngood
18828  trmoy=trmoy+f(6,i)
18829  wcg=wcg+f(7,i)
18830  xcg=xcg+f(2,i)
18831  ycg=ycg+f(4,i)
18832  enddo
18833  trmoy=trmoy/float(ngood)
18834  wcg=wcg/float(ngood)
18835  xcg=xcg/float(ngood)
18836  ycg=ycg/float(ngood)
18837  zcg=trmoy*fh
18838 ! Isochronism correction (in case the bunch is not erect)
18839  xb2x=0.
18840  xb2z=0.
18841  xbxz=0.
18842  imaxx=0
18843  do np=1,ngood
18844  gnp=f(7,np)/xmat
18845  vnp=vl*sqrt(1.-1./(gnp*gnp))
18846  zc(np)=(trmoy-f(6,np))*vnp/100.
18847  xc(np)=(f(2,np)-xcg)/100.
18848  xb2z=xb2z+zc(np)*zc(np)
18849  xb2x=xb2x+xc(np)*xc(np)
18850  xbxz=xbxz+zc(np)*xc(np)
18851  imaxx=imaxx+1
18852  enddo
18853  xb2z=xb2z/float(imaxx)
18854  xb2x=xb2x/float(imaxx)
18855  xbxz=xbxz/float(imaxx)
18856  apl=atan(-2.*xbxz/(xb2x-xb2z))/2.
18857 ! coordinates of the particles at the point of time position
18858  xbar=0.
18859  ybar=0.
18860  zbar=0.
18861  imaxx=0
18862 ! Divide by 100. to convert from centimeters to meters
18863  do np=1,ngood
18864  gnp=f(7,np)/xmat
18865  vnp=vl*sqrt(1.-1./(gnp*gnp))
18866  znp=(trmoy-f(6,np))*vnp
18867  xnp=f(2,np)
18868  zc(np)=znp*cos(apl)+xnp*sin(apl)
18869  xnp=xnp*cos(apl)-znp*sin(apl)
18870 ! convert from mrad to rad
18871  f3=f(3,np)*1.e-03
18872  f5=f(5,np)*1.e-03
18873 ! convert from cm to m
18874  xc(np)=(xnp+zc(np)*f3)/100.
18875  yc(np)=(f(4,np)+zc(np)*f5)/100.
18876  zc(np)=zc(np)/100.
18877 ! evaluate xbar , ybar , zbar
18878  xbar=xbar+xc(np)
18879  ybar=ybar+yc(np)
18880  zbar=zbar+zc(np)
18881  enddo
18882  eng=float(ngood)
18883  xbar=xbar/eng
18884  ybar=ybar/eng
18885  zbar=zbar/eng
18886  do np=1,ngood
18887  xc(np)=xc(np)-xbar
18888  yc(np)=yc(np)-ybar
18889  zc(np)=zc(np)-zbar
18890  enddo
18891 ! evaluate the rms sizes
18892  xsqsum=0.
18893  ysqsum=0.
18894  zsqsum=0.
18895  do j=1,ngood
18896  xsqsum=xsqsum+xc(j)*xc(j)
18897  ysqsum=ysqsum+yc(j)*yc(j)
18898  zsqsum=zsqsum+zc(j)*zc(j)
18899  enddo
18900  xrmsz=xsqsum/float(ngood)
18901  yrmsz=ysqsum/float(ngood)
18902  zrmsz=zsqsum/float(ngood)
18903  xrmsz=sqrt(xrmsz)
18904  yrmsz=sqrt(yrmsz)
18905  zrmsz=sqrt(zrmsz)
18906 ! normalize the coordinates x, y and z
18907  do j=1,ngood
18908  xc(j)=xc(j)/xrmsz
18909  yc(j)=yc(j)/yrmsz
18910  zc(j)=zc(j)/zrmsz
18911  enddo
18912 ! look for the limits of the cloud of particles in the plane (x/a, y/b, z/c)
18913 ! these limits are assumed included within at most +/- 5 RMS
18914  fract=5.
18915  xinf=0.
18916  yinf=0.
18917  zinf=0.
18918 ! lower limits
18919  do i=1,ngood
18920  if((abs(xc(i)).le.fract).and.(abs(yc(i)).le.fract).and.
18921  * (abs(zc(i)).le.fract)) then
18922  if(xinf.gt.xc(i)) xinf=xc(i)
18923  if(yinf.gt.yc(i)) yinf=yc(i)
18924  if(zinf.gt.zc(i)) zinf=zc(i)
18925  endif
18926  enddo
18927 ! upper limits
18928  xsup=xinf
18929  ysup=yinf
18930  zsup=zinf
18931  do i=1,ngood
18932  if((abs(xc(i)).le.fract).and.(abs(yc(i)).le.fract).and.
18933  * (abs(zc(i)).le.fract)) then
18934  if(xsup.lt.xc(i)) xsup=xc(i)
18935  if(ysup.lt.yc(i)) ysup=yc(i)
18936  if(zsup.lt.zc(i)) zsup=zc(i)
18937  endif
18938  enddo
18939 ! maximal sizes in x, y, and z-directions
18940  pax=(xsup-xinf)
18941  pay=(ysup-yinf)
18942  paz=(zsup-zinf)
18943 ! histogram in x-direction,the step (stepx) is: pax/50
18944  stepx=pax/fnstp
18945  do i=1,200
18946  xn(i)=0.
18947  enddo
18948  xtot=0.
18949  x0=xinf-stepx
18950  x1=x0+stepx
18951  j=1
18952 ! xpos(j): position of the elementary cylinder j
18953 ! xn(j) : number of particles in the elementary cylinder j
18954 ! xtot : total number of particles in x-direction
18955  do
18956  if(x1.le.xsup+stepx) then
18957  do i=1,ngood
18958  if(xc(i).gt.x0.and.xc(i).le.x1) xn(j)=xn(j)+1.
18959  enddo
18960  xtot=xtot+xn(j)
18961  xpos(j)=x0+stepx/2.
18962  j=j+1
18963  sta=x1
18964  x1=x1+stepx
18965  x0=sta
18966  else
18967  exit
18968  endif
18969  enddo
18970 ! normalize the number of particles in each step with regard to max.(xn(j))
18971  j=j-1
18972  ixt=j
18973  xnor=0.
18974  do i=1,j
18975  if(xnor.lt.xn(i)) xnor=xn(i)
18976  enddo
18977  do i=1,j
18978  xn(i)=xn(i)/xnor
18979  enddo
18980 ! histogram in y-direction,the step (stepy) is: pay/50
18981  stepy=pay/fnstp
18982  do i=1,200
18983  yn(i)=0.
18984  enddo
18985  ytot=0.
18986  y0=yinf-stepy
18987  y1=y0+stepy
18988  j=1
18989 ! ypos(j): position of the step j
18990 ! yn(j) : number of particles lying in the j
18991 ! ytot : total number of particles in y-direction
18992  do
18993  if(y1.le.ysup+stepy) then
18994  do i=1,ngood
18995  if(yc(i).gt.y0.and.yc(i).le.y1) yn(j)=yn(j)+1.
18996  enddo
18997  ytot=ytot+yn(j)
18998  ypos(j)=y0+stepy/2.
18999  j=j+1
19000  sta=y1
19001  y1=y1+stepy
19002  y0=sta
19003  else
19004  exit
19005  endif
19006  enddo
19007  j=j-1
19008  iyt=j
19009  y0=yinf
19010 ! normalize the number of particles in step with regard to max(yn(j))
19011  ynor=0.
19012  do i=1,j
19013  if(ynor.lt.yn(i)) ynor=yn(i)
19014  enddo
19015  do i=1,j
19016  yn(i)=yn(i)/ynor
19017  enddo
19018 ! histogram in z-direction,the step (stepz) is: paz/50
19019  do i=1,200
19020  zn(i)=0.
19021  enddo
19022  stepz=paz/fnstp
19023  ztot=0.
19024  z0=zinf-stepz
19025  z1=z0+stepz
19026  j=1
19027 ! of length :stepz and radius:ray
19028 ! zpos(j): position of the step j
19029 ! zn(j) : number of particles in the step j
19030 ! ztot : total number of particles in z-direction
19031  do
19032  if(z1.le.zsup+2.*stepz) then
19033  do i=1,ngood
19034  if(zc(i).gt.z0.and.zc(i).le.z1)zn(j)=zn(j)+1.
19035  enddo
19036  ztot=ztot+zn(j)
19037  zpos(j)=z0+stepz/2.
19038  j=j+1
19039  sta=z1
19040  z1=z1+stepz
19041  z0=sta
19042  else
19043  exit
19044  endif
19045  enddo
19046  j=j-1
19047  izt=j
19048 !*et*2011 added next line
19049  z0=zinf
19050 ! normalize the number of particles in each step with regard to max(zn(j))
19051  znor=0.
19052  do i=1,j
19053  if(znor.lt.zn(i)) znor=zn(i)
19054  enddo
19055  do i=1,j
19056  zn(i)=zn(i)/znor
19057  enddo
19058 ! look for the limits of xp, yp, zp
19059  xpinf=f(3,1)
19060  ypinf=f(5,1)
19061  zpinf=f(6,1)-trmoy
19062 ! lower limits
19063  do i=1,ngood
19064  f3=f(3,i)
19065  f5=f(5,i)
19066  f6=f(6,i)-trmoy
19067  if(xpinf.gt.f3) xpinf=f3
19068  if(ypinf.gt.f5) ypinf=f5
19069  if(zpinf.gt.f6) zpinf=f6
19070  enddo
19071 ! upper limits
19072  xpsup=xpinf
19073  ypsup=ypinf
19074  zpsup=zpinf
19075  do i=1,ngood
19076  f3=f(3,i)
19077  f5=f(5,i)
19078  f6=f(6,i)-trmoy
19079  if(xpsup.lt.f3) xpsup=f3
19080  if(ypsup.lt.f5) ypsup=f5
19081  if(zpsup.lt.f6) zpsup=f6
19082  enddo
19083 ! maximal sizes in xp, yp, and zp-directions
19084  paxp=(xpsup-xpinf)
19085  payp=(ypsup-ypinf)
19086  pazp=(zpsup-zpinf)
19087 ! evaluate the rms sizes in xp, yp, zp
19088  xpsum=0.
19089  ypsum=0.
19090  zpsum=0.
19091  do i=1,ngood
19092  f3=f(3,i)
19093  f5=f(5,i)
19094  f6=f(6,i)-trmoy
19095  xpsum=xpsum+f3*f3
19096  ypsum=ypsum+f5*f5
19097  zpsum=zpsum+f6*f6
19098  enddo
19099  xpsum=xpsum/float(ngood)
19100  ypsum=ypsum/float(ngood)
19101  zpsum=zpsum/float(ngood)
19102  xpsum=sqrt(xpsum)
19103  ypsum=sqrt(ypsum)
19104  zpsum=sqrt(zpsum)
19105 ! histogram in xp-direction,the step (stxp) is: paxp/50
19106  stpx=paxp/fnstp
19107  do i=1,200
19108  xpn(i)=0.
19109  enddo
19110  xp0=xpinf-stpx
19111  xp1=xp0+stpx
19112  j=1
19113 ! xps(j): position of the step j
19114 ! xpn(j): number of particles lying in the step j
19115  do
19116  if(xp1.le.xpsup+stpx) then
19117  do i=1,ngood
19118  if(f(3,i).gt.xp0.and.f(3,i).le.xp1) xpn(j)=xpn(j)+1.
19119  enddo
19120  xps(j)=xp0+stpx/2.
19121  j=j+1
19122  sta=xp1
19123  xp1=xp1+stpx
19124  xp0=sta
19125  else
19126  exit
19127  endif
19128  enddo
19129 ! normalize the number of particles in each step with regard to max.(xpn(j))
19130  j=j-1
19131  ixpt=j
19132  xnor=0.
19133  do i=1,j
19134  if(xnor.lt.xpn(i)) xnor=xpn(i)
19135  enddo
19136  do i=1,j
19137  xpn(i)=xpn(i)/xnor
19138  xps(i)=xps(i)/xpsum
19139  enddo
19140 ! histogram in yp-direction,the step (stpy) is: payp/50
19141  stpy=payp/fnstp
19142  do i=1,200
19143  ypn(i)=0.
19144  enddo
19145  yp0=ypinf-stpy
19146  yp1=yp0+stpy
19147  j=1
19148 ! yps(j): position of the step j in mrd
19149 ! ypn(j) : number of particles lying in the j
19150  do
19151  if(yp1.le.ypsup+stpy) then
19152  do i=1,ngood
19153  if(f(5,i).gt.yp0.and.f(5,i).le.yp1) ypn(j)=ypn(j)+1.
19154  enddo
19155  yps(j)=yp0+stpy/2.
19156  j=j+1
19157  sta=yp1
19158  yp1=yp1+stpy
19159  yp0=sta
19160  else
19161  exit
19162  endif
19163  enddo
19164  j=j-1
19165  iypt=j
19166  yp0=ypinf
19167 ! normalize the number of particles in step with regard to max(ypn(j))
19168  ynor=0.
19169  do i=1,j
19170  if(ynor.lt.ypn(i)) ynor=ypn(i)
19171  enddo
19172  do i=1,j
19173  ypn(i)=ypn(i)/ynor
19174  yps(i)=yps(i)/ypsum
19175  enddo
19176 ! histogram in zp-direction,the step (stpz) is: pazp/50
19177  do i=1,200
19178  zpn(i)=0.
19179  enddo
19180  stpz=pazp/fnstp
19181  zp0=zpinf-stpz
19182  zp1=zp0+stpz
19183  j=1
19184 ! of length :stepz and radius:ray
19185 ! zps(j): position of the step j (deg)
19186 ! zpn(j) : number of particles in the step j
19187  do
19188  if(zp1.le.zpsup+2.*stpz) then
19189  do i=1,ngood
19190  f6=f(6,i)-trmoy
19191  if(f6.gt.zp0.and.f6.le.zp1) zpn(j)=zpn(j)+1.
19192  enddo
19193  zps(j)=zp0+stpz/2.
19194  j=j+1
19195  sta=zp1
19196  zp1=zp1+stpz
19197  zp0=sta
19198  else
19199  exit
19200  endif
19201  enddo
19202 ! normalize the number of particles in each step with regard to max(zn(j))
19203  j=j-1
19204  izpt=j
19205  zpnor=0.
19206  do i=1,j
19207  if(zpnor.lt.zpn(i)) zpnor=zpn(i)
19208  enddo
19209  do i=1,j
19210  zpn(i)=zpn(i)/zpnor
19211  zps(i)=zps(i)/zpsum
19212  enddo
19213  return
19214  end
19215 
19241  SUBROUTINE daves(beame)
19242  implicit real(8) (a-h,o-z)
19243  parameter(iptsz=100002,maxcell1=3000)
19244  COMMON /consta/ vl, pi, xmat, rpel, qst
19245  common/faisc/f(10,iptsz),imax,ngood
19246  common/speda/dave,idave
19247  common/davcom/dav1(maxcell1,40),davtot,iitem(maxcell1),idav
19248  common/etcha1/ichas(iptsz),chexmin(10),chexmax(10),chasit
19249  common/etcom/cog(8),exten(17),fd(iptsz)
19250  common/sc3/beamc,scdist,sce10,cplm,ect,apl,ichaes,iscsp
19251  common/cptemit/xltot(maxcell1),nbemit
19252  common/poro/irot1,irot2
19253  LOGICAL IROT1,IROT2
19254  common/secdr/iseor
19255  common/itvole/itvol,imamin
19256  common/dyni/vrefi,trefi,fhinit,acpt
19257  common/qfkd/ityq
19258  common/shortl/davprt
19259  LOGICAL ISEOR,acpt
19260  LOGICAL DAVE,CHASIT,ICHAES,ITVOL,IMAMIN,ityq
19261  character davprt(maxcell1)*80
19262 ! dave end
19263  WRITE(12,3334)
19264 3334 FORMAT('*****************************************************')
19265 ! ********************************************************************
19266  write(12,*) ' Energies are in [MeV], phases in [deg]',
19267  * ' lengths in [mm] ,tof in [deg]'
19268  write(12,*) ' ** For lenses followed by :',
19269  * ' Cummulative length, element type, length '
19270 !
19271  write(12,*) ' ** For emit followed by'
19272  write(12,*) ' * Line 1:',
19273  * ' Particle reference: beta, energy, tof ',
19274  * ' COG: energy, tof, energy offset, tof offset'
19275  write(12,*) ' * Line 2:',
19276  * ' COG coordinates for x xp y yp (mm and mrad)'
19277  write(12,*) ' * Line 3:',
19278  * ' alpha-x beta-x(mm/mrad) alpha-y beta-y(mm/mrad)',
19279  * ' alpha-z beta-z(ns/keV)'
19280  write(12,*) ' * Line 4:',
19281  * ' alpha-z beta-z(deg/keV) emit-z(non norm.,keV.deg) f(MHz)'
19282  write(12,*) ' * Line 5:',
19283  * ' dPHI(deg) dW(keV) r12 long. emittance',
19284  * ' (keV.ns) particles left'
19285  write(12,*) ' * Line 6:',
19286  * ' x(mm) xp(mrad) r12 hor. emittance',
19287  * ' (norm & non norm, mm.mrad)'
19288  write(12,*) ' * Line 7:',
19289  * ' y(mm) yp(mrad) r12 vert. emittance',
19290  * ' (norm & non norm, mm.mrad)'
19291 ! ********************************************************************
19292  WRITE(12,3334)
19293  write(12,*) ' Simulation with ',imax,' particles'
19294  IF(iseor) THEN
19295  write(12,*) ' Second order transport matrix '
19296  ELSE
19297  write(12,*) ' First order transport matrix '
19298  ENDIF
19299  IF(ichaes) THEN
19300  write(12,*) ' Beam intensity ',beame,' mA'
19301  if(iscsp.eq.1) write(12,*)
19302  * ' Space charge calculations with HERSC '
19303  if(iscsp.eq.2) write(12,*)
19304  * ' Space charge calculations with SCHERM '
19305  if(iscsp.eq.3.or.iscsp.eq.4) write(12,*)
19306  * ' Space charge calculations with SCHEFF '
19307  if(sce10.eq.1) write(12,*)
19308  * 'Space charge calculated for all relevant elements,
19309  * but not at drifts'
19310  if(sce10.eq.2) write(12,*)
19311  * 'Space charge calculated for accelerating elements only'
19312  if(sce10.eq.3) write(12,*)
19313  * 'Space charge calculated for all relevant elements'
19314  ENDIF
19315  if(itvol) write(12,*)
19316  * ' TOF is operational in accelerating elements '
19317  if(imamin) write(12,*)
19318  * 'Phase adjustments for accelerating elements active'
19319  WRITE(12,3334)
19320  ifirst=1
19321  iit6=0
19322  nemit=0
19323 ! start (big loop)
19324  do i=1,idav
19325  if(davprt(i).ne."") write(12,'(A)') davprt(i)
19326  if(iitem(i) .eq. 1) then
19327 ! cavity
19328  n=int(dav1(i,25)+.5)
19329  if(itvol.and.imamin) then
19330  write(12,1000) dav1(i,24),n,dav1(i,1),dav1(i,38),dav1(i,39)
19331 1000 format(f9.2,' mm Cavity ',i3,' length ',f7.2,' mm',/,
19332  * ' phase offset: before adjustement ',e12.5,' deg',
19333  * ' after adjustement ',e14.7,' deg')
19334  else
19335  write(12,2789) dav1(i,24),n,dav1(i,1),dav1(i,38)
19336  endif
19337 2789 format(f9.2,' mm Cavity ',i3,' length ',f7.2,' mm',
19338  * ' phase offset: ',e12.5,' deg')
19339  endif
19340 !
19341  if(iitem(i) .eq. 2) then
19342 ! quadrupole (magnetic)
19343  write(12,1010) dav1(i,4),dav1(i,1),dav1(i,7),dav1(i,2),
19344  * dav1(i,3),dav1(i,5),dav1(i,6),dav1(i,36)
19345 1010 format(f9.2,' mm Quadrupole: length = ',e12.5,' mm',
19346  * ' aperture radius = ',e12.5,' mm',/,
19347  * ' field = ',e12.5,' kG K2 = ',e12.5,' cm-2 gradient = ',
19348  * e12.5,' kG/cm',/,
19349  * ' momentum = ',e12.5,' kG.cm particles left ',f7.0)
19350  write(12,*)
19351  endif
19352 !
19353  if(iitem(i) .eq. 3) then
19354 ! emiprt
19355  write(12,305)
19356 305 FORMAT('********** beam (emit card) ',
19357  * '**********')
19358  nemit=nemit+1
19359 !omment write(13,556) nemit,xltot(nemit)/100.,dav1(i,12)*1000.,
19360 !omment * dav1(i,6),dav1(i,30)
19361 !omment write(14,557) nemit,xltot(nemit)/100.,dav1(i,16),dav1(i,21)
19362 !omment556 format(2x,i3,3(3x,f8.3),3x,f6.0)
19363 !omment557 format(2x,i3,3(3x,f8.3))
19364 ! ****************************************
19365  write(12,1001) (dav1(i,j), j=3,9)
19366 1001 format(2x,f7.5,4(1x,e14.7),2(2x,e12.5),' MeV-deg')
19367  write(12,2003) (dav1(i,j), j=31,34)
19368 2003 format(4(2x,f7.3),' mm and mrad ')
19369 ! --- following lines describe Courant-Snyder parameters
19370  fh=dav1(i,40)
19371 ! 1) alpz betz
19372 !
19373 ! 1-a) emz: emittance (keV*deg) betz(deg/keV) gamz(keV/deg)
19374  emz=dav1(i,12)*1000.*(180./pi)
19375  betz=0.
19376  if(emz.gt.1.e-10) betz=dav1(i,10)*dav1(i,10)/emz
19377  dez=dav1(i,11)*1000.
19378  gamz=0.
19379  if(emz.gt.1.e-10) gamz=dez*dez/emz
19380  alpz=0.
19381  if(betz*gamz.ge.1.) alpz=sqrt(betz*gamz-1.)
19382  if(dav1(i,23).gt.0.)alpz=-alpz
19383 !
19384 ! 1-b) emzz: emittance dE-dphi (keV*ns) betzz(ns/keV) gamzz(keV/ns)
19385  emzz=1.e12*dav1(i,12)/fh
19386  dphizz=1.e09 * dav1(i,10)/fh *(pi/180.)
19387  betzz=0.
19388  if(emzz.gt.1.e-10) betzz=dphizz*dphizz/emzz
19389  gamzz=0.
19390  if(emzz.gt.1.e-10) gamzz=dez*dez/emzz
19391  alpzz=0.
19392  if(betzz*gamzz.ge.1.) alpzz=sqrt(betzz*gamzz-1.)
19393  if(dav1(i,23).gt.0.)alpzz=-alpzz
19394 !
19395 ! 2) alpx btx
19396 ! betx(mm/mrad) gamx (mrad/mm)
19397  betx=0.
19398  emx=dav1(i,17)
19399  if(emx.gt.1e-10) betx=dav1(i,13)*dav1(i,13)/emx
19400  gamx=0.
19401  if(emx.gt.1e-10) gamx=dav1(i,14)*dav1(i,14)/emx
19402  alpx=0.
19403  if(betx*gamx.ge.1.) alpx=sqrt(betx*gamx-1.)
19404  if(dav1(i,15).gt.0.)alpx=-alpx
19405 !
19406 ! 3) alpy bety
19407 ! bety(mm/mrad) gamy (mrad/mm)
19408  bety=0.
19409  emy=dav1(i,22)
19410  if(emy.gt.1e-10) bety=dav1(i,18)*dav1(i,18)/emy
19411  gamy=0.
19412  if(emy.gt.1e-10) gamy=dav1(i,19)*dav1(i,19)/emy
19413  alpy=0.
19414  if(bety*gamy.ge.1.) alpy=sqrt(bety*gamy-1.)
19415  if(dav1(i,20).gt.0.)alpy=-alpy
19416 !
19417 ! betzz: ns/keV
19418  write(12,3213) alpx,betx,alpy,bety,alpzz,betzz
19419 3213 format(3(2x,e12.5,2x,e12.5),2x,e12.5)
19420 ! emittance (keV*deg) betz(deg/keV)
19421  write(12,597)alpz,betz,emz,fh/(2.*pi*1.e6)
19422 597 format(2x,f8.4,2x,e13.6,2x,e13.6,' keV.deg',2x,f8.3,' MHz')
19423  if (emzz.gt.1000.) then
19424 ! ns.MeV
19425  write(12,6332) dav1(i,10),dez,dav1(i,23),
19426  * emzz/1000.,dav1(i,30)
19427 6332 format(2x,f7.3,1x,f10.2,2x,f8.4,3x,f8.3,' ns.MeV ',
19428  * f7.0,' particles left')
19429  else
19430 ! ns.keV
19431  write(12,1002) dav1(i,10),dez,dav1(i,23),
19432  * emzz,dav1(i,30)
19433 1002 format(2x,e12.5,2x,f7.2,2x,f8.4,2x,f7.3,' ns.keV ',
19434  * f7.0,' particles left')
19435  endif
19436  write(12,1003) (dav1(i,j), j=13,22)
19437 1003 format(2(2x,f7.3,3x,f8.3,2x,f8.4,2x,e12.5,' mm.mrad (norm)',
19438  * 2x,f7.3,' (non norm)',/))
19439  write(12,*)
19440  endif
19441  if(iitem(i) .eq. 4) then
19442 ! bending magnet
19443  write(12,1025) dav1(i,4),dav1(i,1),dav1(i,2),dav1(i,3)
19444 1025 format(f9.2,' mm bending magnet: central trajectory: '
19445  * ,f8.2,' mm',/,
19446  * ' bend angle: ',f7.3,' deg bending radius: ',e12.5,' mm')
19447  write(12,1029) dav1(i,16),dav1(i,14),dav1(i,15)
19448 1029 format(' field: ',f7.3,' T n: ',f8.3,
19449  * ' beta: ',f8.3)
19450  write(12,1026) dav1(i,6),dav1(i,9),dav1(i,7),dav1(i,8),
19451  * dav1(i,5)
19452 1026 format( ' *Entrance ',/,' pole-face rotation:',
19453  * f8.3,' deg curvature: ',f8.3,' mm',/,
19454  * ' fringe field corrections: K1 ',f8.3,' K2 ',f8.3,/,
19455  * ' vertical half-aperture: ',f8.3,' mm')
19456  write(12,1027) dav1(i,10),dav1(i,13),dav1(i,11),dav1(i,12),
19457  * dav1(i,17)
19458 1027 format( ' *Exit ',/,' pole-face rotation :',
19459  * f8.3,' deg curvature: ',f8.3,' mm',/,
19460  * ' fringe field correction: K1 ',f7.3,' K2 ',f7.3,/,
19461  * ' vertical half-aperture: ',f8.3,' mm')
19462  write(12,1028)dav1(i,37)
19463 1028 format(' particles left ',f7.0)
19464  write(12,*)
19465  endif
19466  if(iitem(i) .eq. 5) then
19467 ! solenoid
19468  write(12,5010) dav1(i,4),dav1(i,1),dav1(i,2),dav1(i,3),
19469  * dav1(i,5),dav1(i,36)
19470 5010 format(f9.2,' mm Solenoid: length = ',f8.3,' mm',
19471  * ' field = ',e12.5,' kG K = ',e12.5,' cm-1',/,
19472  *' momentum = ',e12.5,' kG.cm particles left ',f7.0)
19473  write(12,*)
19474  endif
19475  if(iitem(i) .eq. 6) then
19476 ! From adjust or from entre(not yet introduced) input beam reference
19477  write(12,303)
19478 303 FORMAT('********** INITIAL BEAM **********')
19479  write(12,2003) (dav1(i,j), j=31,34)
19480 ! 1) alpz betz
19481 !
19482 ! 1-a) emz: emittance (keV*deg) betz(deg/keV) gamz(keV/deg)
19483  emz=dav1(i,12)*1000.*(180./pi)
19484  betz=0.
19485  if(emz.gt.1.e-10) betz=dav1(i,10)*dav1(i,10)/emz
19486  dez=dav1(i,11)*1000.
19487  gamz=0.
19488  if(emz.gt.1.e-10) gamz=dez*dez/emz
19489  alpz=0.
19490  if(betz*gamz.ge.1.) alpz=sqrt(betz*gamz-1.)
19491 !
19492 ! 1-b) emzz: emittance dE-dphi (keV*ns) betzz(ns/keV) gamzz(keV/ns)
19493  emzz=1.e12*dav1(i,12)/fhinit
19494  dphizz=1.e09 * dav1(i,10)/fhinit *(pi/180.)
19495  betzz=0.
19496  if(emzz.gt.1.e-10) betzz=dphizz*dphizz/emzz
19497  gamzz=0.
19498  if(emzz.gt.1.e-10) gamzz=dez*dez/emzz
19499  alpzz=0.
19500  if(betzz*gamzz.ge.1.) alpzz=sqrt(betzz*gamzz-1.)
19501 !
19502 ! 2) alpx btx
19503 ! betx(mm/mrad) gamx (mrad/mm)
19504  betx=0.
19505  emx=dav1(i,17)
19506  if(emx.gt.1e-10) betx=dav1(i,13)*dav1(i,13)/emx
19507  gamx=0.
19508  if(emx.gt.1e-10) gamx=dav1(i,14)*dav1(i,14)/emx
19509  alpx=0.
19510  if(betx*gamx.ge.1.) alpx=sqrt(betx*gamx-1.)
19511 !
19512 ! 3) alpy bety
19513 ! bety(mm/mrad) gamy (mrad/mm)
19514  bety=0.
19515  emy=dav1(i,22)
19516  if(emy.gt.1e-10) bety=dav1(i,18)*dav1(i,18)/emy
19517  gamy=0.
19518  if(emy.gt.1e-10) gamy=dav1(i,19)*dav1(i,19)/emy
19519  alpy=0.
19520  if(bety*gamy.ge.1.) alpy=sqrt(bety*gamy-1.)
19521 !
19522 ! betzz: ns/keV
19523  write(12,3213) alpx,betx,alpy,bety,alpzz,betzz
19524  fh=dav1(i,40)
19525 ! emittance (keV*deg) betz(deg/keV)
19526  write(12,597)alpz,betz,emz,fh/(2.*pi*1.e6)
19527  if (emzz.gt.1000.) then
19528 ! ns.MeV
19529  write(12,6332) dav1(i,10),dez,dav1(i,23),
19530  * emzz/1000.,dav1(i,30)
19531  else
19532 ! ns.keV
19533  write(12,1002) dav1(i,10),dez,dav1(i,23),
19534  * emzz,dav1(i,30)
19535  endif
19536  write(12,1003) (dav1(i,j), j=13,22)
19537  iit6=1
19538  endif
19539  if(iitem(i) .eq. 7) then
19540 ! drift
19541  write(12,7010) dav1(i,4),dav1(i,1),dav1(i,36)
19542 7010 format(f9.2,' mm Drift: length ',f10.3,' mm ',/,
19543  * ' particles left ',f7.0)
19544  write(12,*)
19545  endif
19546  if(iitem(i) .eq. 8) then
19547 ! buncher
19548  if(.not.imamin)
19549  * write(12,8010) dav1(i,4),dav1(i,1),dav1(i,2),dav1(i,3),
19550  * dav1(i,36)
19551 8010 format(f9.2,' mm Buncher ',f9.3,' MV ',
19552  * ' RF Phase ',f9.3,' deg Aperture radius',f5.1,' cm',/,
19553  * ' particles left ',f7.0)
19554  if(imamin)
19555  * write(12,8110) dav1(i,4),dav1(i,1),dav1(i,2),dav1(i,5),
19556  * dav1(i,3),dav1(i,36)
19557 8110 format(f9.2,' mm Buncher ',f9.3,' MV ',
19558  * ' RF Phase ',f9.3,' deg correction ',f9.3,' deg',
19559  * ' Aperture radius',f5.1,' cm',/,
19560  * ' particles left ',f7.0)
19561  write(12,*)
19562  endif
19563  if(iitem(i) .eq. 9) then
19564 ! steerer
19565  if (dav1(i,2).eq.0.) then
19566  write(12,8020) dav1(i,3),dav1(i,1)
19567 8020 format(f9.2,' mm Hor. Mag. Steerer ',e12.5,' Tm ')
19568  else if (dav1(i,2).eq.1.) then
19569  write(12,8021) dav1(i,3),dav1(i,1)
19570 8021 format(f9.2,' mm Ver. Mag. Steerer ',f12.5,' Tm ')
19571  else if (dav1(i,2).eq.2.) then
19572  write(12,8022) dav1(i,3),dav1(i,1)
19573 8022 format(f9.2,' mm Hor. El. Steerer ',e12.5,' kVm/m ')
19574  else if (dav1(i,2).eq.3.) then
19575  write(12,8023) dav1(i,3),dav1(i,1)
19576 8023 format(f9.2,' mm Ver. El. Steerer ',e12.5,' kVm/m ')
19577  endif
19578  write(12,*)
19579  endif
19580  if(iitem(i) .eq. 10) then
19581 ! sextupole
19582  write(12,1011) dav1(i,4),dav1(i,1),dav1(i,6),dav1(i,3),
19583  * dav1(i,5),dav1(i,2),
19584  * dav1(i,7),dav1(i,36)
19585 1011 format(f9.2,' mm Sextupole: length = ',f7.3,' mm',
19586  * ' aperture radius = ',e12.5,' cm',/,
19587  * ' field = ',e12.5,' kG KS2 = ',e12.5,' cm-3',
19588  * ' gradient = ',e12.5,' kG/cm2',/,
19589  * ' momentum = ',e12.5,' kG.cm particles left ',f7.0)
19590  write(12,*)
19591  endif
19592  if(iitem(i) .eq. 11) then
19593 ! solenoid+quadrupole
19594  write(12,5011) dav1(i,4),dav1(i,1),dav1(i,7),dav1(i,2),
19595  * dav1(i,6),dav1(i,3),dav1(i,5),dav1(i,8),dav1(i,36)
19596 5011 format(f9.2,' mm Sol+Quad: length = ',f7.3,
19597  * ' mm aperture radius= ',e12.5,' mm',/,
19598  * ' Solenoid: field = ',e12.5,' kG K = ',e12.5,' cm-1',/,
19599  * ' Quadrupole: field ',e12.5,' kG K2 = ',e12.5,' cm-2',/,
19600  * ' momentum = ',e12.5,' kG.cm particles left ',f7.0)
19601  write(12,*)
19602  endif
19603  if(iitem(i) .eq. 12) then
19604 ! quadrupole + sextupole
19605  write(12,5021) dav1(i,4),dav1(i,1),dav1(i,6),dav1(i,2),
19606  * dav1(i,3),dav1(i,7),dav1(i,8),dav1(i,10),dav1(i,36)
19607 5021 format(f9.2,' mm Quad+Sext: length = ',e12.5,' mm ',
19608  * ' aperture radius = ',e12.5,' mm',/,
19609  * ' Quadrupole: B = ',e12.5,' kG K2 = ',e12.5,' cm-2',/,
19610  * ' Sextupole: B = ',e12.5,' kG K2 = ',e12.5, ' cm-3',/,
19611  * ' momentum = ',e12.5,' kG.cm particles left ',f7.0)
19612  write(12,*)
19613  endif
19614  if(iitem(i) .eq. 13) then
19615 ! electron gun
19616  write(12,5031) dav1(i,4),dav1(i,1),dav1(i,2),dav1(i,3),
19617  * dav1(i,6),dav1(i,36)
19618 5031 format(f9.2,' mm DC egun length:',f7.3,' mm',/,
19619  * ' Crest field:',f8.3,' MV/m',3x,
19620  * ' field stength:',f8.3,' kV',/,
19621  * ' beta ( output):',e12.5,' particles left ',f7.0)
19622 ! 14/01/2010 write(12,5032) dav1(i,5),dav1(i,7)
19623 ! 14/10/2010 5032 format(' beam (emit card) at ',e12.5,
19624 ! 14/10/2010 * ' mm from the cathode, field (MV/m) ',e12.5)
19625  write(12,*)
19626  endif
19627 ! rfqcl (RFQ cell)
19628  if(iitem(i) .eq. 14) then
19629  ncell=int(dav1(i,7))
19630  write(12,5041) dav1(i,4),ncell,dav1(i,1),dav1(i,2),
19631  * dav1(i,3),dav1(i,5),dav1(i,6),dav1(i,36)
19632 5041 format(f9.2,' mm rfq cell:',i5,' length: ',f7.3,' mm',/,
19633  * ' V/r02: ',e12.5,' kV/mm**2 AV:',e12.5,' kV ',
19634  * ' type: ',f3.0,/,
19635  * ' energy(output): ',e12.5,' MeV ',' particles left ',f7.0)
19636  write(12,*)
19637  endif
19638 ! rfqptq (RFQ)
19639  if(iitem(i) .eq. 15) then
19640  ncell=int(dav1(i,7))
19641  write(12,5042) dav1(i,4),ncell,dav1(i,5),dav1(i,9),
19642  * dav1(i,8),dav1(i,6),dav1(i,36)
19643 5042 format(f9.2,' mm rfq: number of cells:',i5,
19644  * ' total length: ',e12.5,' mm',/,
19645  * ' intervane voltage (reference): ',e12.5,' kV',/,
19646  * ' intervane voltage (bunch): ',e12.5,' kV',/,
19647  * ' energy (output): ',e12.5,' MeV',/,
19648  * ' particles left ',f7.0)
19649  write(12,*)
19650  endif
19651 ! stipper foils
19652  if(iitem(i) .eq. 16) then
19653  write(12,5043) dav1(i,4),dav1(i,1),dav1(i,2),dav1(i,3),
19654  * dav1(i,5),dav1(i,6),dav1(i,36)
19655 5043 format(f9.2,' mm stripper: atomic number: ',f4.0,
19656  * ' atomic mass : ',f4.0,' thickness :',e12.5,
19657  * ' g/cm**2',/,4x,'particles charge : ',
19658  * f4.0,2x,'energy loss: ',e12.5,' MeV',/,
19659  * ' particles left ',f7.0)
19660  write(12,*)
19661  endif
19662 ! accelerating gap
19663  if(iitem(i) .eq. 17) then
19664  n=int(dav1(i,25)+.5)
19665 ! 16/12/09 if(itvol.and.imamin) then
19666 ! 16/12/09 write(12,1009) dav1(i,24),n,dav1(i,1),dav1(i,2),
19667 ! 16/12/09 * dav1(i,38),dav1(i,39)
19668 ! 16/12/09 1009 format(f9.2,' mm Ac. gap ',i3,' length ',f7.2,
19669 ! 16/12/09 * 'mm field ',e12.5,' kV/mm',/,
19670 ! 16/12/09 * ' phase offset adjusted with TOF',/,
19671 ! 16/12/09 * ' before adjustement ',e12.5,' deg',
19672 ! 16/12/09 * ' after adjustement ',e14.7,' deg')
19673 ! 16/12/09 else
19674  write(12,1008) dav1(i,24),n,dav1(i,1),dav1(i,2),dav1(i,38)
19675 ! 16/12/09 endif
19676 1008 format(f9.2,' mm Ac. gap ',i3,' length ',f7.2,' mm field ',
19677  * e12.5,' kV/mm phase of RF (middle): ',e12.5,' deg')
19678  write(12,*)
19679  endif
19680 ! QUAELEC electric quadrupole
19681  if(iitem(i) .eq. 18) then
19682  write(12,2010) dav1(i,4),dav1(i,1),dav1(i,7), dav1(i,2),
19683  * dav1(i,6),dav1(i,5),dav1(i,3),dav1(i,36)
19684 2010 format(f9.2,' mm Quadrupole (electric): length = '
19685  * ,e12.5,' mm aperture radius = ',e12.5,' mm',/,
19686  * ' voltage = ',f8.3,' kV K2 = ',e12.5,' cm-2 gradient = ',
19687  * e12.5,' kV/(cm*cm) ',/,
19688  * ' rigidity = ',e12.5,' kV particles left ',f7.0)
19689  write(12,*)
19690  endif
19691 ! QUAFK quadrupole(magnetic or electric)
19692  if(iitem(i) .eq. 19) then
19693 ! electric quadrupole
19694  if(ityq) then
19695  write(12,2110) dav1(i,4),dav1(i,1),dav1(i,7),
19696  * dav1(i,2),dav1(i,6),dav1(i,5),dav1(i,3),dav1(i,36)
19697 2110 format(f9.2,' mm Quadrupole (electric): length = '
19698  * ,e12.5,' mm aperture radius = ',e12.5,' mm',/,' voltage = '
19699  * ,e12.5,' kV K2 = ',e12.5,' cm-2 gradient = ',e12.5,
19700  * ' kV/cm2',/,' rigidity = ',e12.5,' kV particles left ',f7.0)
19701  else
19702 ! magnetic quadrupole
19703  write(12,2111) dav1(i,4),dav1(i,1),dav1(i,7),dav1(i,2),
19704  * dav1(i,6),dav1(i,5),dav1(i,3),dav1(i,36)
19705 2111 format(f9.2,' mm Quadrupole (magnetic): length = '
19706  * ,e12.5,' mm aperture radius= ',e12.5,' mm',/,' field = ',e12.5,
19707  * ' kG K2 = ',e12.5,' cm-2 gradient = ',e12.5,' kG/cm',/,
19708  * ' momentum = ',e12.5,' kG.cm particles left ',f7.0)
19709  endif
19710  write(12,*)
19711  endif
19712  if(iitem(i) .eq. 20) then
19713 ! rotating the transverse coordinates about the z axis
19714  write(12,2112) dav1(i,1)
19715 2112 format(9x,'rotating the transverse coordinates',
19716  * ' about the z-axis by an angle: ',e12.5,' deg')
19717  write(12,*)
19718  endif
19719 ! EDFLEC electric deflector
19720  if(iitem(i) .eq. 21) then
19721  write(12,3010) dav1(i,4),dav1(i,1),dav1(i,2), dav1(i,3),
19722  * dav1(i,5),dav1(i,6),dav1(i,7),dav1(i,8),dav1(i,36)
19723 3010 format(f9.2,' mm Deflector (electric): length = '
19724  * ,e12.5,' mm bend angle = ',e12.5,' deg',/,
19725  * ' bend radius = ',e12.5,' mm radii = ',e12.5,
19726  * ' field index = ',e12.5,/,
19727  * ' rigidity = ',e12.5,' kV field = ',e12.5,' kV/mm',
19728  * ' particles left ',f7.0)
19729  write(12,*)
19730  endif
19731 ! end (big loop)
19732  enddo
19733  return
19734  end
19735 
19742  SUBROUTINE pofar1(GAP)
19743  implicit real(8)(a-z)
19744 ! -- POLE FACE ROTATION
19745  COMMON /bloc21/ be, apb(2), layl, layx, rabt
19746  COMMON /bloc23/ h, devi, nb, bdb,l
19747  COMMON /bloc11/ r(6,6), t(6,6,6)
19748  common/secdr/iseor
19749  LOGICAL ISEOR
19750 ! H : INVERSE OF THE MAGNET RADIUS (1./CM)
19751 ! NB : DIMENSIONLESS TRANSPORT n coefficient
19752 ! BDB : TRANSPORT beta coefficient
19753 ! APB( ) : HALF GAP (CM)
19754 ! L : LENGTH OF THE MAGNET (CM)
19755 ! BE : ANGLE OF INLINATION (RAD)
19756 ! LAYL : K1 TRANSPORT COEFFICIENT
19757 ! LAYX : K2 TRANSPORT COEFFICIENT
19758 ! RABT : INVERSE OF THE RADIUS OF CURVATURE (1/CM)
19759 !
19760 ! SAVE H, GAP AND RABT BEFORE CONVERSION IN M UNITS
19761  sah=h
19762  sarabt=rabt
19763  sagap=gap
19764  h=h*100.
19765  gap=gap*1.e-02
19766  rabt=rabt*100.
19767  tb = tan(be)
19768  cb = cos(be)
19769  sb = (1.0 + sin(be)**2)/cb
19770  tcor = 2.0*h*gap*layl
19771  be1 = be -tcor* sb* ( 1. -layx*tcor * tb )
19772  tb1 = tan(be1)
19773  tb2 = tb**2
19774  r(2,1) = h*tb
19775  r(4,3) = - h*tb1
19776  IF(iseor) THEN
19777  sb=1./cb
19778  sb2 = sb**2
19779  sb3 = sb2* sb
19780  t(1,1,1)=- 0.5*h*tb2
19781  t(1,3,3)=0.5*h*sb2
19782  t(2,1,1)=0.5*h*rabt*sb3- tb*nb*h**2
19783  t(2,1,2)=h*tb2
19784  t(2,1,6)=-h*tb
19785  t(2,3,3)=h**2*(nb+0.5+tb2)*tb-0.5*h*rabt*sb3
19786  t(2,3,4)=-h*tb2
19787  t(3,1,3)=h*tb2
19788  t(4,1,3)=-h*rabt*sb3+2.*h**2*nb*tb
19789  t(4,1,4)=-h*tb2
19790  t(4,2,3)=-h*sb2
19791  sec2=cos(be1)*cos(be1)
19792  sec2=1./sec2
19793  t(4,3,6)=h*tb-h*tcor*sec2
19794  ENDIF
19795 ! RESTORE H , RABT, APB(2)
19796  h=sah
19797  rabt=sarabt
19798  gap=sagap
19799  RETURN
19800  END
19801 
19808  SUBROUTINE pofar2(GAP)
19809  implicit real(8)(a-z)
19810 ! -- POLE FACE ROTATION
19811  COMMON /bloc21/ be, apb(2), layl, layx, rabt
19812  COMMON /bloc23/ h, devi, nb, bdb,l
19813  COMMON /bloc11/ r(6,6), t(6,6,6)
19814  common/secdr/iseor
19815  LOGICAL ISEOR
19816 ! H : INVERSE OF THE MAGNET RADIUS (1./CM)
19817 ! NB : DIMENSIONLESS TRANSPORT n coefficient
19818 ! BDB : TRANSPORT beta coefficient
19819 ! APB( ) : HALF GAP (CM)
19820 ! L : LENGTH OF THE MAGNET (CM)
19821 ! BE : ANGLE OF INLINATION (RAD)
19822 ! LAYL : K1 TRANSPORT COEFFICIENT
19823 ! LAYX : K2 TRANSPORT COEFFICIENT
19824 ! RABT : INVERSE OF THE RADIUS OF CURVATURE (1/CM)
19825 !
19826  sah=h
19827  sarabt=rabt
19828  sagap=gap
19829  h=h*100.
19830  gap=gap*1.e-02
19831  rabt=rabt*100.
19832  tb = tan(be)
19833  cb = cos(be)
19834  sb = (1.0 + sin(be)**2)/cb
19835  tcor = 2.0*h*gap*layl
19836  be1 = be -tcor* sb* ( 1. -layx*tcor * tb )
19837  tb1 = tan(be1)
19838  tb2 = tb**2
19839  r(2,1) = h*tb
19840  r(4,3) = - h*tb1
19841  IF(iseor) THEN
19842  sb=1./cb
19843  sb2 = sb**2
19844  sb3 = sb2* sb
19845  t(1,1,1)=0.5*h*tb2
19846  t(1,3,3)=-0.5*h*sb2
19847  t(2,1,1)=0.5*h*rabt*sb3- tb*(nb+0.5*tb2)*h**2
19848  t(2,1,2)=-h*tb2
19849  t(2,1,6)=-h*tb
19850  t(2,3,3)=h**2*(nb-0.5*tb2)*tb-0.5*h*rabt*sb3
19851  t(2,3,4)=h*tb2
19852  t(3,1,3)=-h*tb2
19853  t(4,1,3)=-h*rabt*sb3+h**2*(2.*nb+sb2)*tb
19854  t(4,1,4)=h*tb2
19855  t(4,2,3)=h*sb2
19856  sec2=cos(be1)*cos(be1)
19857  sec2=1./sec2
19858  t(4,3,6)=h*tb-h*tcor*sec2
19859  ENDIF
19860 ! RESTORE H , RABT, APB(2)
19861  h=sah
19862  rabt=sarabt
19863  gap=sagap
19864  RETURN
19865  END
19866 
19872  SUBROUTINE benmag(sbet,fdtot)
19873  implicit real(8)(a-z)
19874 ! -- POLE FACE ROTATION
19875  COMMON /bloc21/ be, apb(2), layl, layx, rabt
19876  COMMON /bloc23/ h, devi, nb, bdb,l
19877  COMMON /bloc11/ r(6,6), t(6,6,6)
19878  common/secdr/iseor
19879  LOGICAL ISEOR
19880 ! H : INVERSE OF THE MAGNET RADIUS (1./CM)
19881 ! NB : DIMENSIONLESS TRANSPORT n coefficient
19882 ! BDB : TRANSPORT beta coefficient
19883 ! APB( ) : HALF GAP (CM)
19884 ! L : LENGTH OF THE MAGNET (CM)
19885 ! BE : ANGLE OF INLINATION (RAD)
19886 ! LAYL : K1 TRANSPORT COEFFICIENT
19887 ! LAYX : K2 TRANSPORT COEFFICIENT
19888 ! RABT : INVERSE OF THE RADIUS OF CURVATURE (1/CM)
19889 !
19890 ! sbet is relativistic beta of the charge state of interest
19891  sgam2=1./(1.-sbet*sbet)
19892 ! SAVE H BEFORE CONVERSION IN m
19893  sah=h
19894  h=h*100.
19895  fieldn=nb
19896  beta=bdb
19897  al=l*1.e-02
19898  rad=1.0/h
19899  h2=h*h
19900  h3=h2*h
19901  h4=h3*h
19902  h5=h4*h
19903  h6=h5*h
19904  kx2=(1.0-fieldn)*h2
19905  ky2=fieldn*h2
19906  kx=sqrt(abs(kx2))
19907  ky=sqrt(abs(ky2))
19908  kx3=kx2*kx
19909  argx=kx*al
19910  argy=ky*al
19911  sinx=sin(argx)
19912  shx=sinh(argx)
19913  al2=al*al
19914  al3=al2*al
19915  cx=0.
19916  sx=0.
19917  dx=0.
19918  j1xl=0.
19919  IF (kx2.lt.6.*0) then
19920  cx=cosh(argx)
19921  sx=sinh(argx)/kx
19922  dx=h*(1.0-cx)/kx2
19923  j1xl=(argx-shx)/kx3
19924  ENDIF
19925  IF (kx2.EQ.6.*0) THEN
19926  cx=1
19927  sx=al
19928  dx=h*al2/2.0
19929  j1xl=al3/6.0
19930  ENDIF
19931  IF (kx2.GT.6.*0) THEN
19932  cx=cos(argx)
19933  sx=sin(argx)/kx
19934  dx=h*(1.0-cx)/kx2
19935  j1xl=(argx-sinx)/kx3
19936  ENDIF
19937  cpx=-kx2*sx
19938  spx=cx
19939  dpx=h*sx
19940  cy=0.
19941  sy=0.
19942  IF(ky2.LT.6.*0) THEN
19943  cy=cosh(argy)
19944  sy=sinh(argy)/ky
19945  ENDIF
19946  IF(ky2.EQ.6.*0) THEN
19947  cy=1.0
19948  sy=al
19949  ENDIF
19950  IF(ky2.GT.6.*0) THEN
19951  cy=cos(argy)
19952  sy=sin(argy)/ky
19953  ENDIF
19954  cpy=-ky2*sy
19955  spy=cy
19956 ! First order Matrix R
19957  r(1,1)=cx
19958  r(1,2)=sx
19959  r(1,6)=dx
19960  r(2,1)=cpx
19961  r(2,2)=spx
19962  r(2,6)=dpx
19963  r(3,3)=cy
19964  r(3,4)=sy
19965  r(4,3)=cpy
19966  r(4,4)=spy
19967  r(5,1)=h*sx
19968  r(5,2)=dx
19969  r(5,6)=h2*j1xl
19970 ! Carey eq.2.41 p 34
19971  r(5,6)=r(5,6)-al*fdtot/sgam2
19972 ! ************************
19973  IF(iseor) THEN
19974 ! Second order Matrix T
19975  cosx=cos(argx)
19976  chx=cosh(argx)
19977  kx4=kx2*kx2
19978  kx6=kx4*kx2
19979  argy=ky*al
19980  siny=sin(argy)
19981  cosy=cos(argy)
19982  shy=sinh(argy)
19983  chy=cosh(argy)
19984  ky3=ky2*ky
19985  ky4=ky2*ky2
19986  targx=argx+argx
19987  sin2x=sin(targx)
19988  cos2x=cos(targx)
19989  sh2x=sinh(targx)
19990  ch2x=cosh(targx)
19991  kx3=kx*kx2
19992  kx5=kx3*kx2
19993  kx7=kx5*kx2
19994  targy=argy+argy
19995  sin2y=sin(targy)
19996  cos2y=cos(targy)
19997  sh2y=sinh(targy)
19998  ch2y=cosh(targy)
19999  al4=al3*al
20000  al5=al4*al
20001  al6=al5*al
20002  al7=al6*al
20003  c=1.0/(kx2-4.0*ky2)
20004  j1l=0.
20005  j2l=0.
20006  j3l=0.
20007  j2xl=0.
20008  j3xl=0.
20009  j4xl=0.
20010  j5xl=0.
20011  j7xl=0.
20012  j9xl=0.
20013  j10xl=0.
20014  j11xl=0.
20015  j12xl=0.
20016  j13xl=0.
20017  j14xl=0.
20018  j15xl=0.
20019  j16xl=0.
20020  j17xl=0.
20021  IF(kx2.gt.6.*0) THEN
20022  cx=dcos(kx*al)
20023  sx=dsin(kx*al)/kx
20024  dx=h*(1.0d0-cx)/kx2
