20025  j1xl=(argx-sinx)/kx3
20026  j2xl=(1.0-cosx-.5*argx*sinx)/kx4
20027  j3xl=.5*(sinx-argx*cosx)/kx3
20028  j4xl=(.5*argx-2.0*sinx/3.0+sin2x/12.)/kx5
20029  j5xl=(.25d0-cosx/3.0+cos2x/12.0)/kx4
20030  j10xl=(argx-1.5*sinx+.5*argx*cosx)/kx5
20031  j11xl=(-2.0*argx+3.0*sinx-argx*cosx)/kx5
20032  j12xl=(4.0*argx-5.5*sinx+1.5*argx*cosx)/kx3
20033  j13xl=(.75-2.0*cosx/3.0-cos2x/12.0-.5*argx*sinx)
20034  < /kx6
20035  j14xl=(1.5-4.0*cosx/3.0-cos2x/6.0-argx*sinx)/kx6
20036  j15xl=(-1.75+4.0*cosx/3.0+5.0*cos2x/12.0+1.5*argx
20037  < *sinx)/kx4
20038  j16xl=(1.5*argx-7.0*sinx/3.0-sin2x/12.0+argx*cosx)/
20039  < kx7
20040  j17xl=(-1.75*argx+17.0*sinx/6.0+5.0*sin2x/24.0-1.5
20041  < *argx*cosx)/kx5
20042  j1l=(.5*argx-.25*sin2x)/kx3
20043  j2l=(.5*argx+.25*sin2x)/kx
20044  j3l=.25*(1.0-cos2x)/kx2
20045  if(ky2.lt.6.*0) then
20046  j7xl=.5*(argx-sinx+kx2*c*(sinx-.5*kx*sh2y/ky))/(kx3*ky2)
20047  j9xl=c*((cosx-1.0)/kx2+(1.0-ch2y)/(4.0*ky2))
20048  endif
20049  if(ky2.eq.6.*0) then
20050  j7xl=(2.0*(sinx-argx)/kx3+al3/3.0)/kx2
20051  j9xl=al2/(2.0*kx2)+(cosx-1.0)/kx4
20052  endif
20053  if(ky2.gt.6.*0) then
20054  j7xl=.5*(argx-sinx+kx2*c*(sinx-.5*kx*sin2y/ky))/(kx3*ky2)
20055  j9xl=c*((cosx-1.0)/kx2+(1.0-cos2y)/(4.0*ky2))
20056  endif
20057 ! endif kx2.gt.0.
20058  ENDIF
20059  IF (kx2.lt.6.*0) then
20060  cx=cosh(kx*al)
20061  sx=sinh(kx*al)/kx
20062  dx=h*(1.0-cx)/kx2
20063  j1xl=(argx-shx)/kx3
20064  j2xl=(1.0-chx+.5*argx*shx)/kx4
20065  j3xl=.5*(shx-argx*chx)/kx3
20066  j4xl=(.5*argx-2.0*shx/3.0+sh2x/12.0)/kx5
20067  j5xl=(.25-chx/3.0+ch2x/12.0)/kx4
20068  j10xl=(argx-1.5*shx+.5*argx*chx)/kx5
20069  j11xl=(-2.0*argx+3.0*shx-argx*chx)/kx5
20070  j12xl=(4.0*argx-5.5*shx+1.5*argx*chx)/kx3
20071  j13xl=(.75-2.0*chx/3.0-ch2x/12.0+.5*argx*shx)
20072  < /kx6
20073  j14xl=(1.5-4.0*chx/3.0-ch2x/6.0+argx*shx)/kx6
20074  j15xl=(-1.75+4.0*chx/3.0+5.0*ch2x/12.0-1.5*argx*shx)
20075  < /kx4
20076  j16xl=(1.5*argx-7.0*shx/3.0-sh2x/12.0+argx*chx)/
20077  < kx7
20078  j17xl=(-1.75*argx+17.0*shx/6.0+5.0*sh2x/24.0-1.5
20079  < *argx*chx)/kx5
20080  j1l=(.5*argx-.25*sh2x)/kx3
20081  j2l=(.5*argx+.25*sh2x)/kx
20082  j3l=.25*(1.0-ch2x)/kx2
20083  IF(ky2.LT.6.*0) THEN
20084  j7xl=.5*(argx-shx+kx2*c*(shx-.5*kx*sh2y/ky))/(kx3*ky2)
20085  j9xl=c*((chx-1)/kx2+(1.0d0-ch2y)/(4.0d0*ky2))
20086  ENDIF
20087  IF(ky2.EQ.6.*0) THEN
20088  j7xl=(2.0*(sinx-argx)/kx3+al3/3.0d0)/kx2
20089  j9xl=al2/(2.0d0*kx2)+(chx-1.0d0)/kx4
20090  ENDIF
20091  IF(ky2.GT.6.*0) THEN
20092  j7xl=.5*(argx-shx+kx2*c*(shx-.5d0*kx*sin2y/ky))/(kx3*ky2)
20093  j9xl=c*((chx-1.0)/kx2+(1.0-cos2y)/(4.0*ky2))
20094  ENDIF
20095 ! end kx2.lt.0.
20096  ENDIF
20097  IF (kx2.EQ.6.*0) THEN
20098  cx=1
20099  sx=al
20100  dx=h*al*al/2.0
20101  j1xl=al3/6.0
20102  j2xl=al4/24.0
20103  j3xl=al3/6.0
20104  j4xl=al5/60.0
20105  j5xl=al4/24.0
20106  j7xl=(al3/12.0-al/(8.0*ky2)-sin2y/(16.0*ky3))/ky2
20107  j10xl=-al5/24.0
20108  j11xl=-al5/60.0
20109  j12xl=al3/6.0
20110  j9xl=al2/(8.0*ky2)-(1.0-cos2y)/(16.0*ky4)
20111  j13xl=al6/240.0
20112  j14xl=al6/1080.0
20113  j15xl=al4/12.0
20114  j16xl=al7/840.0
20115  j17xl=al5/60.0
20116  j1l=al3/3.0
20117  j2l=al
20118  j3l=al2/2.0
20119 ! end kx2.eq.0.
20120  ENDIF
20121  cpx=-kx2*sx
20122  spx=cx
20123  dpx=h*sx
20124  j4l=0.
20125  j5l=0.
20126  j6l=0.
20127  IF (ky2.LT.6.*0) THEN
20128  cy=cosh(ky*al)
20129  sy=sinh(ky*al)/ky
20130  j4l=(.5*argy-.25*sh2y)/ky3
20131  j5l=(.5*argy+.25*sh2y)/ky
20132  j6l=.25*(1.0-ch2y)/ky2
20133  ENDIF
20134  IF (ky2.EQ.6.*0) THEN
20135  cy=1.0
20136  sy=al
20137  j4l=al3/3.0
20138  j5l=al
20139  j6l=al2/2.0
20140  ENDIF
20141  IF (ky2.GT.6.*0) THEN
20142  cy=cos(ky*al)
20143  sy=sin(ky*al)/ky
20144  j4l=(.5*argy-.25*sin2y)/ky3
20145  j5l=(.5*argy+.25*sin2y)/ky
20146  j6l=.25*(1.0-cos2y)/ky2
20147  ENDIF
20148  cpy=-ky2*sy
20149  spy=cy
20150  sy2=sy*sy
20151  a=2.0*fieldn-1.0-beta
20152  b=(2.0-fieldn)
20153  bn1=2.0*fieldn-1.0-beta
20154  bn2=2.5*fieldn-beta-1.5
20155  bn3=2.0*beta-fieldn
20156 ! tabulation of the integrals (notations TRANSPORT SLAC R-75 table VIb)
20157  i10=dx/h
20158  i11=0.5*al*sx
20159  i111=1.0*(sx**2+dx*rad)/3.0
20160  i112=sx*dx*rad/3.0
20161  i133=dx/h-(ky2/(kx2-4.0*ky2))*(sy2-2.0*dx*rad)
20162  i134=c*(sy*cy-sx)
20163  i144=(sy2-2.0*dx*rad)*c
20164  i20=sx
20165  i21=(sx+al*cx)/2.0
20166  i22=i11
20167  i211=sx*(1.0+2.0*cx)/3.0
20168  i212=(2.0*sx**2-dx/h)/3.0
20169  i222=2.0*sx*dx*rad/3.0
20170  i233=sx-2.0*ky2*(sy*cy-sx)*c
20171  i234=(kx2*dx*rad-2.0*ky2*sy2)*c
20172  i244=2.0*c*(sy*cy-sx)
20173  i33=0.5*al*sy
20174  IF(ky2.EQ.6.*0) i34=al3/6.0
20175  IF(ky2.NE.6.*0) i34=0.5*(sy-al*cy)/ky2
20176  i314=(2.0*sx*cy-sy*(1.0+cx))*c
20177  i324=c*(2.0*cy*dx*rad-sx*sy)
20178  i43=0.5*(sy+al*cy)
20179  i44=i33
20180  i413=c*((kx2-2.0*ky2)*sx*cy-ky2*sy*(1.0+cx))
20181  i414=c*((kx2-2.0*ky2)*sx*sy-cy*(1.0-cx))
20182  i424=c*(cy*sx-cx*sy-2.0*ky2*sy*dx*rad)
20183  i12=(sx-al*cx)*0.5/kx2
20184  i27=(dx*rad-.5*al*sx)/kx2
20185  i313=c*(kx2*cy*dx*rad-2.0*sx*sy*ky2)
20186  i314=(2.0*sx*cy-sy*(1.0+cx))*c
20187  i324=c*(2.0*cy*dx*rad-sx*sy)
20188  i43=0.5*(sy+al*cy)
20189  i44=i33
20190  i413=c*((kx2-2.0*ky2)*sx*cy-ky2*sy*(1.0+cx))
20191  i414=c*((kx2-2.0*ky2)*sx*sy-cy*(1.0-cx))
20192  i424=c*(cy*sx-cx*sy-2.0*ky2*sy*dx*rad)
20193  IF (kx.NE.6.*0) THEN
20194  i12=(sx-al*cx)*0.5/kx2
20195  i27=(dx*rad-.5*al*sx)/kx2
20196  i116=(0.5*al*sx-(sx**2+dx/h)/3.0)*h/kx2
20197  i122=(2.0*dx/h-sx**2)/3.0/kx2
20198  i126=h*(sx+2.0*sx*cx-3.0*al*cx)/6.0/kx2**2
20199  i166=h2*(4.0*dx*rad/3.0+sx**2/3.0-al*sx)/kx2**2
20200  i216=h*(al*cx/2.0+sx/6.0-2.0*sx*cx/3.0)/kx2
20201  i226=h*(0.5*al*sx-2.0*sx**2/3.0+dx*rad/3.0)/kx2
20202  i266=h2*(sx/3.0+2.0*sx*cx/3.0-al*cx)/kx2**2
20203  i323=c*(2.0*ky2*sy*(1.0+cx)/kx2-sx*cy)+sy/kx2
20204  i336=h*(0.5*al*sy-c*(cy*(1.0-cx)-2.0*ky2*sx*sy))/kx2
20205  i346=h*(i34-c*(2.0*sx*cy-sy*(1.0+cx)))/kx2
20206  i423=c*(2.0*ky2*cy*(1.0+cx)/kx2-cx*cy-ky2*sx*sy)+cy/kx2
20207  i436=h*(0.5*al*cy+0.5*sy+c*(ky2*sy*(1.0+cx)
20208  > -(kx2-2.0*ky2)*sx*cy))/kx2
20209  i446=h*(al*sy*0.5-c*((kx2-2.0*ky2)*sx*sy-cy*(1.0-cx)))/kx2
20210  i26=i12*h
20211  ELSE
20212  i12=al3/6.0
20213  i27=al4/12.0
20214  i116=h*al4/24.0
20215  i122=al4/12.0
20216  i126=h*al5/40.0
20217  i166=h2*al2/120.0
20218  i216=h*al3/6.0
20219  i226=h*al4/8.0
20220  i266=h2*al5/20.0
20221  i323=al2*sy/4.0
20222  i336=h*al*(al2*sy/12.0+(al*cy-sy)/(ky2*8.0))
20223  i346=h*al2*(sy/(ky2*8.0)-al*cy/(ky2*12.0))
20224  i423=(al2*cy+al*sy)/4.0
20225  i436=h*al2*(sy/8.0+cy*al/12.0)
20226  i446=h*al*(al2*sy/12.0+(sy-al*cy)/(ky2*8.0))
20227  i26=i12*h
20228  ENDIF
20229 ! MATRIX T(i,j,k), TRANSPORT SLAC R-75 table VIa
20230 !
20231  t(1,1,1)=a*h3*i111+0.5*kx2**2*i122*h
20232  t(1,1,2)=2.0*a*h3*i112-kx2*h*i112+h*sx
20233  t(1,1,6)=b*h2*i11+2.0*a*h3*i116-kx2*h2*i122
20234  t(1,2,2)=a*h3*i122+0.5*h*i111
20235  t(1,2,6)=b*h2*i12+2.0*a*h3*i126+h2*i112
20236  t(1,3,3)=beta*h3*i133-0.5*ky2*h*i10
20237  t(1,3,4)=2.0*beta*h3*i134
20238  t(1,4,4)=beta*h3*i144-0.5*h*i10
20239  t(1,6,6)=b*h2*h*i27+a*h3*i166+0.5d0*h3*i122-
20240  1 h*i10
20241 !
20242  t(2,1,1)=a*h3*i211+0.5*kx2**2*h*i222-h*cx*cpx
20243  t(2,1,2)=h*spx+2.0d0*a*h3*i212-kx2*h*i212
20244  > -h*(cx*spx+cpx*sx)
20245  t(2,1,6)=b*h2*i21+2.0*a*h3*i216-kx2*h2*i222-h*
20246  > (cx*dpx+cpx*dx)
20247  t(2,2,2)=a*h3*i222+0.5*h*i211-h*sx*spx
20248  t(2,2,6)=b*h2*i22+2.0*a*h3*i226+h2*i212
20249  > -h*(sx*dpx+spx*dx)
20250  t(2,3,3)=beta*h3*i233-0.5*ky2*h*i20
20251  t(2,3,4)=2.0*beta*h3*i234
20252  t(2,4,4)=beta*h3*i244-0.5*h*i20
20253  t(2,6,6)=b*h2*i26+a*h3*i266+0.5*h3*i222-h*dx*dpx-h*i20
20254 !
20255 ! VALUE OF "B" IS CHANGED.
20256 !
20257  b=beta-fieldn
20258 !
20259  t(3,1,3)=2.0*b*h3*i313+kx2*ky2*h*i324
20260  t(3,1,4)=h*sy+2.0d0*b*h3*i314-kx2*h*i323
20261  t(3,2,3)=2.0*b*h3*i323-ky2*h*i314
20262  t(3,2,4)=2.0*b*h3*i324+h*i313
20263  t(3,3,6)=ky2*i33+2.0*b*h3*i336-ky2*h2*i324
20264  t(3,4,6)=ky2*i34+2.0*b*h3*i346+h2*i323
20265 !
20266  t(4,1,3)=2.0*b*h3*i413+kx2*ky2*h*i424-h*cx*cpy
20267  t(4,1,4)=h*spy+2.0*h3*b*i414-kx2*h*i423-h*cx*spy
20268  t(4,2,3)=2.0*b*h3*i423-ky2*h*i414-h*sx*cpy
20269  t(4,2,4)=2.0*b*h3*i424+h*i413-h*sx*spy
20270  t(4,3,6)=ky2*i43+2.0*b*h3*i436-ky2*h2*i424-h*dx*cpy
20271  t(4,4,6)=ky2*i44+2.0*b*h3*i446+h2*i423-h*dx*spy
20272 !
20273  t(5,1,1)=h4*(bn1*j1xl-bn2*kx2*j4xl)+.5*kx4*j1l
20274  t(5,1,2)=h4*2.0*bn2*j5xl-kx2*j3l+h*dx
20275  t(5,1,6)=h5*j11xl+h3*j12xl+h*kx2*j3xl
20276  < +h5*2.0*bn2*j4xl+2.0*beta*h5*j10xl-h*kx2*j1l
20277 ! Carey eq. 7.45 p.143
20278  t(5,1,6)=t(5,1,6)-r(5,1)/sgam2
20279 !
20280  t(5,2,2)=.5*(h2*j1xl+h4*2.0*bn2*j4xl+j2l)
20281  t(5,2,6)=-2.0*beta*h5*j13xl+h5*j14xl+h3*j15xl+h*kx2*
20282  < j2xl+h*j3l
20283 ! Carey eq. 7.45 p.143
20284  t(5,2,6)=t(5,2,6)-r(5,2)/sgam2
20285 !
20286  t(5,3,3)=.5*(h4*(bn3*j1xl-2.0*beta*ky2*j7xl)+ky4*j4l)
20287  t(5,3,4)=2.0*beta*h4*j9xl-ky2*j6l
20288  t(5,4,4)=beta*h4*j7xl-.5*(h2*j1xl-j5l)
20289  t(5,6,6)=(1.0-beta)*h6*j16xl+h4*j17xl-h2*j3xl
20290  > +.5*h2*j1l
20291 ! Carey eq. 7.45 p.143
20292  t(5,6,6)=t(5,6,6)-r(5,6)/sgam2
20293  t(5,6,6)=t(5,6,6)+al*((1./sgam2)**2+1.5*sbet*sbet/sgam2)
20294 ! Carey eq.7.46 p.143
20295  t(5,5,6)=-1./sgam2
20296 ! ENDIF Second order Matrix T
20297  ENDIF
20298 ! RESTORE H
20299  h=sah
20300  RETURN
20301  END
20302 
20307  SUBROUTINE syrout(ii)
20308  implicit real(8) (a-h,o-z)
20309  parameter(iptsz=100002)
20310  COMMON /consta/ vl, pi, xmat, rpel, qst
20311  common/faisc/f(10,iptsz),imax,ngood
20312  COMMON /bloc11/ r(6,6), t(6,6,6)
20313  common/radia/trt,rmoy,xintf,crae
20314 !*************************************************************************************
20315 ! Synchrotron radiation
20316 ! COMMON/RADIA/TRT,RMOY,XINTF,CRAE
20317 ! TRT : t.o.f in sec for a particle crossing the bending magnet
20318 ! RMOY : average radius of the bending magnet in the magnetic plane
20319 ! XINTF : integral of (u/uc) * S(u/uc) where S(u/uc) is the spectral function
20320 ! ( see Synchrotron radiation in DYNAC)
20321 ! CRAE : classical electron radius (cm)
20322 !***************************************************************************************
20323 ! PGAM : Instantaneous radiation power (MeV/sec)
20324 ! ETA : eta=u/uc
20325 ! uc : critical quanta energy (eV)
20326 ! u : quanta energy (eV) considered
20327 ! the most significant quanta are assumed emitted between: 0.1<eta<3.
20328  e4ii=f(7,ii)**4
20329  gpaii=f(7,ii)/xmat
20330  cgam=(4.*pi/3.)*crae/(xmat**3)
20331  pgam=vl*cgam*e4ii/(2.*pi*rmoy*rmoy)
20332 ! ELOST : Total energy lost due to radiation (MeV)
20333  elost=xintf*pgam*trt
20334 ! variation of the momentum (only available for relativistic electrons)
20335  dmo=-elost/f(7,ii)
20336 ! change the total energy (MeV)
20337  f(7,ii)=f(7,ii)-elost
20338 ! change f(2,ii) and f(3,ii)
20339 ! dmo*r(1,6) is given in m and dmo*r(2,6) in rad, convert in cm and mrad
20340  f(2,ii)=f(2,ii)+dmo*r(1,6)*100.
20341  f(3,ii)=f(3,ii)+dmo*r(2,6)*1000.
20342  return
20343  end
20344 
20349  SUBROUTINE syref
20350  implicit real(8) (a-h,o-z)
20351  COMMON /consta/ vl, pi, xmat, rpel, qst
20352  common/radia/trt,rmoy,xintf,crae
20353  common/dyn/tref,vref
20354  COMMON /bloc23/ h, devi, nb, bdb,l
20355  common/itvole/itvol,imamin
20356  common/tofev/ttvols
20357  logical itvol,imamin
20358  real(8) L,NB
20359  beref=vref/vl
20360  gamref=1./sqrt(1.-beref*beref)
20361  ener=xmat*gamref*beref
20362  trt=l/vref
20363  e4=ener**4
20364  cgam=(4.*pi/3.)*crae/(xmat**3)
20365  pgam=vl*cgam*e4/(2.*pi*rmoy*rmoy)
20366 ! ELOST : Total energy lost due to radiation (MeV)
20367 ! change vref and tref of the reference
20368  elost=xintf*pgam*trt
20369  fener=ener-elost
20370  fgam=fener/xmat
20371  fberef=sqrt(1.-1./(fgam*fgam))
20372  vref=fberef*vl
20373  tref=tref+l/vref
20374  if(itvol) ttvols=tref
20375  write(16,250) elost,ener,fener
20376 250 format(//,' REFERENCE AFTER RADIATION EXITATION*****',/,
20377  * ' ENERGY LOST (MeV): ',e12.5,/,
20378  * ' OLD ENERGY (MeV): ',e12.5,/,
20379  * ' NEW ENERGY (MeV): ',e12.5)
20380  return
20381  end
20382 
20387  SUBROUTINE sextu(imk2,arg,xlsex,rg)
20388  implicit real(8) (a-h,o-z)
20389  parameter(iptsz=100002,maxcell1=3000)
20390  common/fene/wdisp,wphas,wx,wy,rlim,ifw
20391  common/ttfc/tk,t1k,t2k,sk,s1k,s2k,fh
20392  common/dyn/tref,vref
20393  COMMON /consta/ vl, pi, xmat, rpel, qst
20394  common/rigid/boro
20395  common/faisc/f(10,iptsz),imax,ngood
20396  common/etcom/cog(8),exten(17),fd(iptsz)
20397  common/qmoyen/qmoy
20398  common/dcspa/iesp
20399  LOGICAL IESP
20400  common/sc3/beamc,scdist,sce10,cplm,ect,apl,ichaes,iscsp
20401  LOGICAL ICHAES
20402  common/tapes/in,ifile,meta
20403  common/pltprf/sprfx(3000),sprfy(3000),sprfl(3000),sprfw(3000),
20404  x sprfp(3000),sprng(3000),prlab(3000),iprf
20405  CHARACTER*(8) PRLAB,PRTLAB
20406  common/davcom/dav1(maxcell1,40),davtot,iitem(maxcell1),idav
20407  common/shif/dtiph,shift
20408  LOGICAL SHIFT
20409  common/compt/nrres,nrtre,nrbunc,nrdbun
20410  common/rander/ialin
20411  LOGICAL IALIN
20412  common/qskew/qtwist,iqrand,itwist,iaqu
20413  LOGICAL ITWIST
20414  common/femt/iemgrw,iemqesg
20415  LOGICAL IEMGRW
20416  common/cgtof/charm(20),cgtdv(20),nbch(20),netac
20417  common/qsex/l,kq2,ks2
20418  REAL(8) L,KQ2,KS2
20419  character cr*1
20420  dimension trans(2)
20421  ilost=0
20422  write(16,*) ' ******SEXTUPOLE*********'
20423 ! statistics
20424  IF(iprf.EQ.1) then
20425  prlab(iprf)='START '
20426  CALL stapl(davtot*10.)
20427  endif
20428  nrtre=nrtre+1
20429  cr=char(13)
20430 ! print out on terminal of transport element # on one and the same line
20431  WRITE(6,8254,advance='no') nrtre,nrres,cr
20432 8254 format('Transport element:',i5,
20433  * ' Accelerating element:',i5,a1)
20434  len=1
20435 ! if itwist=.true. skews the sextupole before misalignments
20436  sqtwist=0.
20437  if(itwist.and.arg.ne.0.) then
20438  if(iqrand.eq.0) then
20439  qtwrad=qtwist
20440  sqtwist=qtwrad
20441  call zrotat(qtwrad)
20442  else
20443  rdcf=.5
20444  call rlux(trans,len)
20445  if(trans(1).le.rdcf) sign=-1.
20446  if(trans(1).gt.rdcf) sign=1.
20447  call rlux(trans,len)
20448  qtwrad=qtwist*sign*trans(1)
20449  sqtwist=qtwrad
20450  call zrotat(qtwrad)
20451  endif
20452  endif
20453  if(ialin) call randali
20454  fh0=fh/vl
20455  write(16,*)'TOF at input:',tref*fh*180./pi,' deg'
20456 !
20457  gpa=0.
20458  do ii=1,ngood
20459  gpa=gpa+f(7,ii)/xmat
20460  enddo
20461  gpa=gpa/float(ngood)
20462  l=xlsex
20463  bpa=sqrt(1.-1./(gpa*gpa))
20464  xmco=xmat*bpa*gpa
20465  ri=33.356*xmco*1.e-01/qst
20466  if(imk2.ne.0) then
20467 ! arg: field B (kG)
20468  fb=arg
20469  b=arg/(rg*rg)
20470  ks2=b/ri
20471  else
20472 ! arg: KS2 (cm-3)
20473  ks2=arg
20474  b=ks2*ri
20475  fb=b*(rg*rg)
20476  endif
20477  write(16,3300)xlsex,rg,fb,ks2,b,ri
20478 3300 format(' LENGTH = ',e12.3,' cm APERTURE RADIUS= ',e12.5,' cm',
20479  * /,' FIELD = ',e12.5,' kG KS2 = ',e12.5,' cm-3',
20480  * ' GRADIENT = ',e12.5,' kG/(cm*cm)',/,
20481  * ' MOMENTUM = ',e12.5,' kG.cm',/)
20482  call clear
20483  call elsex
20484 ! print transport matrix (c.o.g.)
20485  call matrix
20486 ! start daves
20487  idav=idav+1
20488  iitem(idav)=10
20489  dav1(idav,1)=xlsex*10.
20490  dav1(idav,2)=b
20491  dav1(idav,3)=fb
20492  davtot=davtot+xlsex
20493  dav1(idav,4)=davtot*10.
20494  dav1(idav,5)=ks2
20495  dav1(idav,6)=rg
20496  dav1(idav,7)=ri
20497 ! first half sextupole
20498  l=xlsex/2.
20499  do ii=1,ngood
20500  CALL clear
20501  gpai=f(7,ii)/xmat
20502  bpai=sqrt(1.-1./(gpai*gpai))
20503  xmco=xmat*bpai*gpai
20504  ri=33.356*xmco*1.e-01/f(9,ii)
20505  ks2 = b/ri
20506  CALL elsex
20507  CALL cobeam(ii,l)
20508 ! the evolution of the t.o.f is made in routine cobeam)
20509 !omment f(6,ii)=f(6,ii)+l/(bpai*vl)
20510  enddo
20511 ! Charge space effect (if dl >0)
20512  if(ichaes.and.l.gt.0.) then
20513  if(sce10.eq.1.or.sce10.eq.3.) then
20514  iesp=.true.
20515  write(16,*) 'Space charge at the middle '
20516  call cesp(xlsex)
20517  iesp=.false.
20518  endif
20519  endif
20520  bcour=0.
20521  do i=1,ngood
20522  gpai=f(7,i)/xmat
20523  bcour=sqrt(1.-1./(gpai*gpai))+bcour
20524  enddo
20525  bcour=bcour/float(ngood)
20526  gcour=1./sqrt(1.-bcour*bcour)
20527  wcg=(gcour-1.)*xmat
20528 ! ----- convert wdisp in dp/p (window control)
20529 ! ---- ifw = 0 ===> wdisp = dW/W
20530 ! ---- ifw = 1 ===> wdisp = dW (MeV)
20531  if(ifw.eq.0) dispr=gcour*gcour*wdisp/(gcour*(gcour+1.))
20532  if(ifw.eq.1) dispr=gcour*gcour*wdisp/(gcour*(gcour+1.)*wcg)
20533 ! ---- Change the dispersion with the new energy
20534  do i=1,ngood
20535  gpai=f(7,i)/xmat
20536  bpai=sqrt(1.-1./(gpai*gpai))
20537  fd(i)=bpai/bcour * gpai/gcour
20538  enddo
20539 ! Test window after the first half sextupole
20540  call cogetc
20541 ! Change the t.o.f of the reference
20542  tref=tref+xlsex/(2.*vref)
20543  prtlab='SEXTUPO '
20544  call reject(nlost,prtlab)
20545 ! Reshuffles f(i,j) array after window (now done in 'reject')
20546 ! call shuffle
20547  call shuffle
20548 ! second half sextupole
20549  do ii=1,ngood
20550  CALL clear
20551  gpai=f(7,ii)/xmat
20552  bpai=sqrt(1.-1./(gpai*gpai))
20553  xmco=xmat*bpai*gpai
20554  ri=33.356*xmco*1.e-01/f(9,ii)
20555  ks2 = b/ri
20556  CALL elsex
20557  CALL cobeam(ii,l)
20558  enddo
20559 ! Test window after the second half sextupole (only in transverse directions and phase)
20560  call cogetc
20561 ! Change the t.o.f of the reference
20562  tref=tref+xlsex/(2.*vref)
20563  call reject(ilost,prtlab)
20564  ilost=ilost+nlost
20565 ! Reshuffles f(i,j) array after window (now done in 'reject')
20566 ! call shuffle
20567  dav1(idav,36)=ngood
20568  write(16,*)'TOF at output:',tref*fh*180./pi,' deg'
20569  write(16,*)' particles lost in sextupole :',ilost
20570 ! returns coordinates to the initial orientation
20571  if(itwist.and.b.ne.0.) then
20572  qtwrad=-sqtwist
20573  call zrotat(qtwrad)
20574  endif
20575  if(iemgrw) call emiprt(0)
20576  prlab(iprf)='SEXTUPO '
20577  CALL stapl(davtot*10.)
20578  RETURN
20579  END
20580 
20589  SUBROUTINE qalva(bquad,xlqua,rg)
20590  implicit real(8) (a-h,o-z)
20591  parameter(iptsz=100002,maxcell1=3000)
20592  common/fene/wdisp,wphas,wx,wy,rlim,ifw
20593  common/ttfc/tk,t1k,t2k,sk,s1k,s2k,fh
20594  common/dyn/tref,vref
20595  COMMON /consta/ vl, pi, xmat, rpel, qst
20596  common/rigid/boro
20597  common/faisc/f(10,iptsz),imax,ngood
20598  common/etcom/cog(8),exten(17),fd(iptsz)
20599  common/qmoyen/qmoy
20600  common/dcspa/iesp
20601  LOGICAL IESP
20602  common/sc3/beamc,scdist,sce10,cplm,ect,apl,ichaes,iscsp
20603  LOGICAL ICHAES
20604  common/tapes/in,ifile,meta
20605  common/pltprf/sprfx(3000),sprfy(3000),sprfl(3000),sprfw(3000),
20606  x sprfp(3000),sprng(3000),prlab(3000),iprf
20607  CHARACTER*(8) PRLAB,PRTLAB
20608  common/davcom/dav1(maxcell1,40),davtot,iitem(maxcell1),idav
20609  common/shif/dtiph,shift
20610  LOGICAL SHIFT
20611  common/compt/nrres,nrtre,nrbunc,nrdbun
20612  common/rander/ialin
20613  LOGICAL IALIN
20614  common/qskew/qtwist,iqrand,itwist,iaqu
20615  LOGICAL ITWIST
20616  common/femt/iemgrw,iemqesg
20617  LOGICAL IEMGRW
20618  common/cgtof/charm(20),cgtdv(20),nbch(20),netac
20619  common/qsex/l,kq2,ks2
20620  common/tofev/ttvols
20621  common/itvole/itvol,imamin
20622  logical itvol,imamin
20623  REAL(8) L,KQ2,KS2
20624  dimension trans(1)
20625  character cr*1
20626 ! print out on terminal of transport element # on one and the same line
20627  nrtre=nrtre+1
20628  cr=char(13)
20629  WRITE(6,8254,advance='no') nrtre,nrres,cr
20630 8254 format('Transport element:',i5,
20631  * ' Accelerating element:',i5,a1)
20632  ilost=0
20633 ! B : GRADIENT IN kG/cm
20634  b=bquad/rg
20635 ! statistics
20636  IF(iprf.EQ.1) then
20637  prlab(iprf)='START '
20638  CALL stapl(davtot*10.)
20639  endif
20640  write(16,*) ' ***QUADRUPOLE (magnetic) ***'
20641  fcpi=fh*180./pi
20642  if(itvol) write(16,10) ttvols*fcpi,davtot
20643 10 FORMAT(' ** TOF (input of the lens): ',e12.5,
20644  * ' deg at: ',e12.5,' cm in the lattice')
20645 ! if itwist=.true: skews the quadrupole before misalignments (if b ne 0)
20646 ! len = 1 level in rlux routine
20647  len=1
20648  if(itwist.and.b.ne.0.) then
20649  if(iqrand.eq.0) then
20650  qtwrad=qtwist
20651  sqtwist=qtwrad
20652  call zrotat(qtwrad)
20653  else
20654  rdcf=.5
20655  call rlux(trans,len)
20656  if(trans(1).le.rdcf) sign=-1.
20657  if(trans(1).gt.rdcf) sign=1.
20658  call rlux(trans,len)
20659  qtwrad=qtwist*sign*trans(1)
20660  sqtwist=qtwrad
20661  call zrotat(qtwrad)
20662  endif
20663  else
20664  sqtwist=0.
20665  endif
20666  if(ialin) call randali
20667  fh0=fh/vl
20668 ! print transport matrix (cog)
20669  gpa=0.
20670  do ii=1,ngood
20671  gpa=gpa+f(7,ii)/xmat
20672  enddo
20673  gpa=gpa/float(ngood)
20674  l=xlqua
20675  bpa=sqrt(1.-1./(gpa*gpa))
20676  xmco=xmat*bpa*gpa
20677  ri=33.356*xmco*1.e-01/qst
20678  kq2=b/ri
20679  call clear
20680  call elqua
20681  write(16,3300) xlqua,rg,bquad,kq2,b,ri
20682 3300 format(' LENGTH = ',e12.5,' cm APERTURE RADIUS= ',e12.5,' cm',
20683  * /,' FIELD = ',e12.5,' kG K2 = ',e12.5,' cm-2 ',
20684  * ' GRADIENT = ',e12.5,' kG/cm',/,
20685  * ' MOMENTUM = ',e12.5,' kG.cm',/)
20686  call matrix
20687 ! Daves start
20688  idav=idav+1
20689  iitem(idav)=2
20690  dav1(idav,1)=xlqua*10.
20691  dav1(idav,2)=bquad
20692  davtot=davtot+xlqua
20693  dav1(idav,4)=davtot*10.
20694  dav1(idav,3)=kq2
20695  dav1(idav,5)=b
20696  dav1(idav,6)=ri
20697  dav1(idav,7)=rg*10.
20698 ! first half quadrupole
20699  l=xlqua/2.
20700  do ii=1,ngood
20701  call clear
20702  gpai=f(7,ii)/xmat
20703  bpai=sqrt(1.-1./(gpai*gpai))
20704  xmco=xmat*bpai*gpai
20705  ri=33.356*xmco*1.e-01/f(9,ii)
20706  kq2=b/ri
20707  call elqua
20708  call cobeam(ii,l)
20709  enddo
20710 ! Charge space computations (if dl >0)
20711  if(ichaes.and.l.gt.0.) then
20712  if(sce10.eq.1.or.sce10.eq.3.) then
20713  iesp=.true.
20714  write(16,*) 'Space charge at the middle '
20715  call cesp(xlqua)
20716  iesp=.false.
20717 ! Change the dispersion dE/E with respect to the C.O.G of the bunch
20718  call disp
20719  endif
20720  endif
20721 ! Test window after the first half quadrupole (after s.c. computations)
20722  call cogetc
20723  bcour=0.
20724  do i=1,ngood
20725  gpai=f(7,i)/xmat
20726  bcour=sqrt(1.-1./(gpai*gpai))+bcour
20727  enddo
20728  bcour=bcour/float(ngood)
20729  gcour=1./sqrt(1.-bcour*bcour)
20730  wcg=(gcour-1.)*xmat
20731 ! ----- window control
20732 ! Change the t.o.f of the reference
20733  tref=tref+xlqua/(2.*vref)
20734  prtlab='QUADRUPO'
20735  call reject(nlost,prtlab)
20736 ! Reshuffles f(i,j) array after window (now done in 'reject')
20737 ! call shuffle
20738 ! second half quadrupole
20739  do ii=1,ngood
20740  call clear
20741  gpai=f(7,ii)/xmat
20742  bpai=sqrt(1.-1./(gpai*gpai))
20743  xmco=xmat*bpai*gpai
20744  ri=33.356*xmco*1.e-01/f(9,ii)
20745  kq2=b/ri
20746  call elqua
20747 ! ********CONTROL :print matrix for particle number 1 (only for tests)
20748 !omment if(ii.eq.1) then
20749 !omment write(16,*) ' *****second half quadrupole'
20750 !omment xkq2=sqrt(abs(kq2))
20751 !omment xkql=xkq2*l*57.29578
20752 !omment write(16,3300) ri,xkq2,xkql
20753 !omment call matrix
20754 !omment endif
20755  call cobeam(ii,l)
20756  enddo
20757 ! Test window after the second half quadrupole
20758  call cogetc
20759 ! Change the t.o.f of the reference
20760  tref=tref+xlqua/(2.*vref)
20761  call reject(ilost,prtlab)
20762  ilost=ilost+nlost
20763 ! Reshuffles f(i,j) array after window (now done in 'reject')
20764 ! call shuffle
20765  if(itvol) ttvols=tref
20766  tcog=0.
20767  do i=1,ngood
20768  tcog=tcog+f(6,i)
20769  enddo
20770  tcog=tcog/float(ngood)
20771  if(itvol) then
20772  write(16,11) ttvols*fcpi,davtot,tref*fcpi,tcog*fcpi
20773 11 FORMAT(' ** tof: ',e12.5,
20774  * ' deg at: ',e12.5,' cm in the lattice',
20775  * /,3x,'tof of the reference: ',e12.5,' deg tof of the cog: ',
20776  * e12.5,' deg')
20777  else
20778  write(16,12) tref*fcpi,tcog*fcpi
20779 12 FORMAT(' ** tof of the reference: ',e12.5,
20780  * ' deg tof of the cog: ',e12.5,' deg')
20781  endif
20782  dav1(idav,36)=ngood
20783  write(16,*)' particles lost in quadrupole :',ilost
20784 ! returns coordinates to the initial orientation
20785  if(itwist.and.b.ne.0.) then
20786  qtwrad=-sqtwist
20787  call zrotat(qtwrad)
20788  endif
20789  if(iemgrw) call emiprt(0)
20790 ! envelope
20791  prlab(iprf)='QUADRUPO'
20792  call stapl(davtot*10.)
20793  return
20794  end
20795 
20807  SUBROUTINE qasex(iksq,args,argq,xlqua,rg)
20808  implicit real(8) (a-h,o-z)
20809  parameter(iptsz=100002,maxcell1=3000)
20810  common/fene/wdisp,wphas,wx,wy,rlim,ifw
20811  common/ttfc/tk,t1k,t2k,sk,s1k,s2k,fh
20812  common/dyn/tref,vref
20813  COMMON /consta/ vl, pi, xmat, rpel, qst
20814  common/rigid/boro
20815  common/faisc/f(10,iptsz),imax,ngood
20816  common/etcom/cog(8),exten(17),fd(iptsz)
20817  common/qmoyen/qmoy
20818  common/dcspa/iesp
20819  LOGICAL IESP
20820  common/sc3/beamc,scdist,sce10,cplm,ect,apl,ichaes,iscsp
20821  LOGICAL ICHAES
20822  common/tapes/in,ifile,meta
20823  common/pltprf/sprfx(3000),sprfy(3000),sprfl(3000),sprfw(3000),
20824  x sprfp(3000),sprng(3000),prlab(3000),iprf
20825  CHARACTER*(8) PRLAB,PRTLAB
20826  common/davcom/dav1(maxcell1,40),davtot,iitem(maxcell1),idav
20827  common/shif/dtiph,shift
20828  LOGICAL SHIFT
20829  common/compt/nrres,nrtre,nrbunc,nrdbun
20830  common/rander/ialin
20831  LOGICAL IALIN
20832  common/qskew/qtwist,iqrand,itwist,iaqu
20833  LOGICAL ITWIST
20834  common/femt/iemgrw,iemqesg
20835  LOGICAL IEMGRW
20836  common/cgtof/charm(20),cgtdv(20),nbch(20),netac
20837  common/qsex/l,kq2,ks2
20838  REAL(8) L,KQ2,KS2
20839  character cr*1
20840 ! print out on terminal of transport element # on one and the same line
20841  nrtre=nrtre+1
20842  cr=char(13)
20843  WRITE(6,8254,advance='no') nrtre,nrres,cr
20844 8254 format('Transport element:',i5,
20845  * ' Accelerating element:',i5,a1)
20846  rgorge=rg
20847  ilost=0
20848 ! statistics
20849  IF(iprf.EQ.1) then
20850  prlab(iprf)='START '
20851  CALL stapl(davtot*10.)
20852  endif
20853 ! if itwist=.true. skews the quasex before misalignments
20854 !omment len=1
20855 !omment if(itwist.and.b.ne.0.) then
20856 !omment if(iqrand.eq.0) then
20857 !omment qtwrad=qtwist
20858 !omment sqtwist=qtwrad
20859 !omment call zrotat(qtwrad)
20860 !omment else
20861 !omment rdcf=.5
20862 !omment call rlux(trans,len)
20863 !omment if(trans.le.rdcf) sign=-1.
20864 !omment if(trans.gt.rdcf) sign=1.
20865 !omment call rlux(trans,len)
20866 !omment qtwrad=qtwist*sign*trans
20867 !omment sqtwist=qtwrad
20868 !omment call zrotat(qtwrad)
20869 !omment endif
20870 !omment endif
20871 ! misalignments
20872  if(ialin) call randali
20873  gpa=0.
20874  do ii=1,ngood
20875  gpa=gpa+f(7,ii)/xmat
20876  enddo
20877  gpa=gpa/float(ngood)
20878  l=xlqua
20879  bpa=sqrt(1.-1./(gpa*gpa))
20880  xmco=xmat*bpa*gpa
20881  ri=33.356*xmco*1.e-01/qst
20882  if(iksq.ne.0) then
20883 ! --- quadrupole: argq = field fq (kG)
20884  fq=argq
20885  bq=fq/rg
20886 ! kq2: strength (cm-2)
20887  kq2=bq/ri
20888 ! --- sextupole: args = field fs (kG)
20889  fs=args
20890  bs=fs/(rg*rg)
20891 ! ks2 strength (cm-3)
20892  ks2=bs/ri
20893  else
20894 ! --- quadrupole: argq is kq2 (cm-2)
20895  kq2=argq
20896  fq=kq2*rg*ri
20897  bq=kq2*ri
20898 ! --- sextupole: args is ks2 (cm-3)
20899  ks2=args
20900  bs=ks2*ri
20901  fs=bs*(rg*rg)
20902  endif
20903  call clear
20904  call elqsex
20905  write(16,*) ' *****LENS QUADRUPOLE+SEXTUPOLE ********'
20906  write(16,3300)xlqua,rg,fq,kq2,bq,fs,ks2,bs,ri
20907 3300 format(' LENS: LENGTH = ',e12.5,' cm APERTURE RADIUS = ',e12.5,
20908  * ' cm',/,' QUADRUPOLE: FIELD = ',e12.5,' kG KQ2 = ',e12.5,
20909  * ' cm-2 GRADIENT = ',e12.5,' kG/cm',/,
20910  * ' SEXTUPOLE: FIELD = ',e12.5,' kG KS2 = ',e12.5,' cm-3',
20911  * ' GRADIENT = ',e12.5,' kG/(cm*cm)',/,
20912  * ' MOMENTUM = ',e12.5,' kG.cm',/)
20913  fh0=fh/vl
20914  write(16,*)'TOF at input:',tref*fh*180./pi,' deg'
20915 ! print transport matrix (c.o.g.)
20916  call matrix
20917 ! start Daves
20918  idav=idav+1
20919  iitem(idav)=12
20920  dav1(idav,1)=xlqua*10.
20921  dav1(idav,6)=rg*10.
20922  dav1(idav,2)=fq
20923  dav1(idav,3)=kq2
20924 ! gradient (quad) dav1(idav,5)=bq
20925  dav1(idav,7)=fs
20926  dav1(idav,8)=ks2
20927 ! gradient (sol) dav1(idav,9)=bs
20928  dav1(idav,10)=ri
20929  davtot=davtot+xlqua
20930  dav1(idav,4)=davtot*10.
20931 ! first half quasex
20932  l=xlqua/2.
20933  do ii=1,ngood
20934  CALL clear
20935  gpai=f(7,ii)/xmat
20936  bpai=sqrt(1.-1./(gpai*gpai))
20937  xmco=xmat*bpai*gpai
20938  ri=33.356*xmco*1.e-01/f(9,ii)
20939  kq2 = bq/ri
20940  ks2 = bs/ri
20941  CALL elqsex
20942 ! ********CONTROL :print matrix for particle number 1 (only for tests)
20943 !omment if(ii.eq.5) then
20944 !omment write(16,*) ' *****first half quasex'
20945 !omment xkq2=sqrt(abs(kq2))
20946 !omment xkql=xkq2*l*57.29578
20947 !omment xks=sqrt(abs(ks2))
20948 !omment xksl=xks*l**(1.5)*57.29578
20949 !omment write(16,3300) ri,xkq2,xkql,xks,xksl
20950 !omment call matrix
20951 !omment endif
20952 ! ********END CONTROL
20953  CALL cobeam(ii,l)
20954  enddo
20955 ! Charge space effect (if dl >0)
20956  if(ichaes.and.l.gt.0.) then
20957  if(sce10.eq.1.or.sce10.eq.3.) then
20958  iesp=.true.
20959  write(16,*) 'Space charge at the middle '
20960  call cesp(xlqua)
20961  iesp=.false.
20962 ! Change the dispersion dE/E with respect to the C.O.G of the bunch
20963  call disp
20964  endif
20965  endif
20966 ! Test window after the first half quasex (after s.c. computations)
20967  bcour=0.
20968  do i=1,ngood
20969  gpai=f(7,i)/xmat
20970  bcour=sqrt(1.-1./(gpai*gpai))+bcour
20971  enddo
20972  bcour=bcour/float(ngood)
20973  gcour=1./sqrt(1.-bcour*bcour)
20974  wcg=(gcour-1.)*xmat
20975 ! ----- window control
20976  call cogetc
20977 ! Change the t.o.f of the reference
20978  tref=tref+xlqua/(2.*vref)
20979  prtlab='QUADSXT '
20980  call reject(nlost,prtlab)
20981 ! Reshuffles f(i,j) array after window (now done in 'reject')
20982 ! call shuffle
20983 ! second half quasex
20984  do ii=1,ngood
20985  call clear
20986  gpai=f(7,ii)/xmat
20987  bpai=sqrt(1.-1./(gpai*gpai))
20988  xmco=xmat*bpai*gpai
20989  ri=33.356*xmco*1.e-01/f(9,ii)
20990  kq2 = bq/ri
20991  ks2 = bs/ri
20992  call elqsex
20993 ! ********CONTROL :print matrix for particle number 1 (only for tests)
20994 !omment if(ii.eq.5) then
20995 !omment write(16,*) ' *****second half quasex'
20996 !omment xkq2=sqrt(abs(kq2))
20997 !omment xkql=xkq2*l*57.29578
20998 !omment xks=sqrt(abs(ks2))
20999 !omment xksl=xks*l**(1.5)*57.29578
21000 !omment write(16,3300) ri,xkq2,xkql,xks,xksl
21001 !omment call matrix
21002 !omment endif
21003 ! ********END CONTROL
21004  call cobeam(ii,l)
21005  enddo
21006 ! Test window after the second half quasex (only in transverse directions and phase)
21007  call cogetc
21008 ! Change the t.o.f of the reference
21009  tref=tref+xlqua/(2.*vref)
21010  call reject(ilost,prtlab)
21011  ilost=ilost+nlost
21012 ! Reshuffles f(i,j) array after window (now done in 'reject')
21013 ! call shuffle
21014  dav1(idav,36)=ngood
21015  write(16,*)'TOF at output:',tref*fh*180./pi,' deg'
21016  write(16,*)' particles lost:',ilost
21017 ! returns coordinates to the initial orientation
21018 !omment if(itwist.and.b.ne.0.) then
21019 !omment qtwrad=-sqtwist
21020 !omment call zrotat(qtwrad)
21021 !omment endif
21022  if(iemgrw) call emiprt(0)
21023  prlab(iprf)='QUADSXT '
21024  CALL stapl(davtot*10.)
21025  RETURN
21026  END
21027 
21034  SUBROUTINE elqua
21035  implicit real(8)(a-z)
21036  common/qsex/l,kq2,ks2
21037  COMMON /bloc11/ r(6,6), t(6,6,6)
21038  common/secdr/iseor
21039  LOGICAL ISEOR
21040  akq2=kq2*1.e04
21041  al=l*1.e-02
21042  akq=sqrt(abs(akq2))
21043  IF(akq.LT.1.e-13) akq=1.e-13
21044  arg=akq*al
21045  csin=sin(arg)
21046  ccos=cos(arg)
21047  hsin=sinh(arg)
21048  hcos=cosh(arg)
21049  IF(akq2.GT.0.0) THEN
21050  ssok=csin/akq
21051  sc=ccos
21052  bsok=hsin/akq
21053  bc=hcos
21054  ELSE
21055  ssok=hsin/akq
21056  sc=hcos
21057  bsok=csin/akq
21058  bc=ccos
21059  ENDIF
21060  r(1,1)=sc
21061  r(1,2)=ssok
21062  r(2,1)=-akq2*ssok
21063  r(2,2)=sc
21064  r(3,3)=bc
21065  r(3,4)=bsok
21066  r(4,3)=akq2*bsok
21067  r(4,4)=bc
21068  IF(.NOT.iseor) RETURN
21069 ! T116=AMAT(12,1)
21070  t(1,1,6)=al*akq2*ssok/2.0
21071 ! T126=AMAT(17,1)
21072  t(1,2,6)=(ssok-al*sc)/2.0
21073 ! T216=AMAT(12,2)
21074  t(2,1,6)=akq2*(ssok+al*sc)/2.0
21075 ! T226=AMAT(17,2)
21076  t(2,2,6)=t(1,1,6)
21077 ! T336= AMAT(21,3) T346=AMAT(24,3)
21078  t(3,3,6)=-al*akq2*bsok/2.0
21079  t(3,4,6)=(bsok-al*bc)/2.0
21080 ! T436=AMAT(21,4) T446=AMAT(24,4)
21081  t(4,3,6)=-akq2*(bsok+al*bc)/2.0
21082  t(4,4,6)=t(3,3,6)
21083 ! T511=AMAT(7,5) T512=AMAT(8,5) T522=AMAT(13,5) T533=AMAT(18,5)
21084  t(5,1,1)=akq2*(al-sc*ssok)/4.0
21085  t(5,1,2)=-akq2*ssok*ssok/2.0
21086  t(5,2,2)=(al+sc*ssok)/4.0
21087  t(5,3,3)=-akq2*(al-bc*bsok)/4.0
21088 ! T534=AMAT(19,5) T544=AMAT(22,5)
21089  t(5,3,4)=akq2*(bsok*bsok)/2.0
21090  t(5,4,4)=(al+bc*bsok)/4.0
21091  RETURN
21092  END
21093 
21100  SUBROUTINE elsex
21101  implicit real(8)(a-z)
21102  common/qsex/l,kq2,ks2
21103  COMMON /bloc11/ r(6,6), t(6,6,6)
21104  common/secdr/iseor
21105  common/elq/inisk
21106  INTEGER inisk
21107  LOGICAL ISEOR
21108  if(inisk.eq.0) then
21109  aks2=ks2*1.e06
21110  al=l*1.e-02
21111  else
21112  inisk=0
21113  endif
21114  akl1=aks2*al
21115  akl2=akl1*al
21116  akl3=akl2*al
21117  akl4=akl3*al
21118  r(1,2)=al
21119  r(3,4)=al
21120  IF(.NOT.iseor) RETURN
21121 ! T522=AMAT(13,5) T544=AMAT(22,5)
21122  t(5,2,2)=al/2.0
21123  t(5,4,4)=al/2.0
21124  IF(aks2.EQ.0.0)RETURN
21125 ! T111=AMAT( 7,1) T112=AMAT( 8,1) T122=AMAT(13,1)
21126  t(1,1,1)=-akl2/2.0
21127  t(1,1,2)=-akl3/3.0
21128  t(1,2,2)=-akl4/12.0
21129 ! T133=AMAT(18,1) T134=AMAT(19,1) T144=AMAT(22,1)
21130  t(1,3,3)= akl2/2.0
21131  t(1,3,4)= akl3/3.0
21132  t(1,4,4)= akl4/12.0
21133 ! T211=AMAT( 7,2) T212=AMAT( 8,2) T222=AMAT(13,2)
21134  t(2,1,1)=-akl1
21135  t(2,1,2)=-akl2
21136  t(2,2,2)=-akl3/3.0
21137 ! T233=AMAT(18,2) T234=AMAT(19,2) T244=AMAT(22,2)
21138  t(2,3,3)= akl1
21139  t(2,3,4)= akl2
21140  t(2,4,4)= akl3/3.0
21141 ! T313=AMAT( 9,3) T314=AMAT( 10,3) T323=AMAT(14,3) T324=AMAT(15,3)
21142  t(3,1,3)= akl2
21143  t(3,1,4)= akl3/3.0
21144  t(3,2,3)= akl3/3.0
21145  t(3,2,4)= akl4/6.0
21146 ! T413=AMAT(9,4) T414=AMAT( 10,4) T423=AMAT(14,4) T424=AMAT(15,4)
21147  t(4,1,3)= akl1*2.0
21148  t(4,1,4)= akl2
21149  t(4,2,3)= akl2
21150  t(4,2,4)= akl3*2.0/3.0
21151  RETURN
21152  END
21153 
21161  SUBROUTINE elqsex
21162  implicit real(8)(a-z)
21163  common/qsex/l,kq2,ks2
21164  COMMON /bloc11/ r(6,6), t(6,6,6)
21165  common/secdr/iseor
21166  common/elq/inisk
21167  INTEGER inisk
21168  LOGICAL ISEOR
21169  aks2=ks2*1.e06
21170  al=l*1.e-02
21171  akq2=kq2*1.e04
21172  akq=sqrt(abs(akq2))
21173  arg=akq*al
21174  csin=sin(arg)
21175  ccos=cos(arg)
21176  hsin=sinh(arg)
21177  hcos=cosh(arg)
21178  IF(akq2.GT.6.*0) THEN
21179  ssok=csin/akq
21180  sc=ccos
21181  bsok=hsin/akq
21182  bc=hcos
21183  ELSE
21184  ssok=hsin/akq
21185  sc=hcos
21186  bsok=csin/akq
21187  bc=ccos
21188  ENDIF
21189  IF(akq2.EQ.6.*0) THEN
21190  r(1,2)=al
21191  r(3,4)=al
21192  ELSE
21193  r(1,1)=sc
21194  r(1,2)=ssok
21195  r(2,1)=-akq2*ssok
21196  r(2,2)=sc
21197  r(3,3)=bc
21198  r(3,4)=bsok
21199  r(4,3)=akq2*bsok
21200  r(4,4)=bc
21201  ENDIF
21202  IF(.NOT.iseor) RETURN
21203 !omment IF(KS2.EQ.0.0)RETURN
21204  IF(akq2.EQ.6.*0) THEN
21205  inisk=1
21206  call elsex
21207  ELSE
21208 ! T111=AMAT( 7,1) T112=AMAT( 8,1) T116=AMAT(12,1)
21209  t(1,1,1)=-aks2*(ssok*ssok+(1.0-sc)/akq2)/3.0
21210  t(1,1,2)=-2.0*aks2*(ssok*(1.0-sc)/akq2)/3.0
21211  t(1,1,6)=al*akq2*ssok/2.0
21212 ! T122=AMAT(13,1) T126=AMAT(17,1)
21213  t(1,2,2)=-aks2*(2.0*(1.0-sc)/akq2-ssok*ssok)/
21214  > (3.0*akq2)
21215  t(1,2,6)=(ssok-al*sc)/2.0
21216 ! T133=AMAT(18,1) T134=AMAT(19,1) T144=AMAT(22,1)
21217  t(1,3,3)=aks2*(bsok*bsok+3.0*(1.0-sc)/akq2)/5.0
21218  t(1,3,4)=2.0*aks2*(bsok*bc-ssok)/(5.0*akq2)
21219  t(1,4,4)=aks2*(bsok*bsok-2.0*(1.0-sc)/akq2)/
21220  > (5.0*akq2)
21221 ! T211=AMAT( 7,2) T212= AMAT( 8,2) T216=AMAT(12,2)
21222  t(2,1,1)=-aks2*(2.0*ssok*sc+ssok)/3.0
21223  t(2,1,2)=-2.0*aks2*(sc*(1.0-sc)/akq2+ssok*ssok)/3.0
21224  t(2,1,6)=akq2*(ssok+al*sc)/2.0
21225 ! T222=AMAT(13,2) T226=AMAT(17,2)
21226  t(2,2,2)=-aks2*(2.0*ssok-2.0*ssok*sc)/(3.0*akq2)
21227  t(2,2,6)=t(1,1,6)
21228 ! T233=AMAT(18,2) T234=AMAT(19,2) T244=AMAT(22,2)
21229  t(2,3,3)=aks2*(2.0*bsok*bc+3.0*ssok)/5.0
21230  t(2,3,4)=2.0*aks2*(bc*bc+bsok*bsok*akq2-sc)/
21231  > (5.0*akq2)
21232  t(2,4,4)=2.0*aks2*(bsok*bc-ssok)/(5.0*akq2)
21233 ! T313=AMAT(9,3) T314=AMAT(10,3) T323=AMAT(14,3)
21234  t(3,1,3)=2.0*aks2*(bc*(1.0-sc)/akq2+
21235  > 2.0*ssok*bsok)/5.0
21236  t(3,1,4)=2.0*aks2*(2.0*ssok*bc-bsok*(1.0+sc))
21237  > /(5.0*akq2)
21238  t(3,2,3)=2.0*aks2*(3.0*bsok-2.0*bsok*sc-
21239  > ssok*bc)/(5.0*akq2)
21240 ! T324=AMAT(15,3) T336= AMAT(21,3) T346=AMAT(24,3)
21241  t(3,2,4)=2.0*aks2*(2.0*bc*(1.0-sc)/akq2-
21242  > ssok*bsok)/(5.0*akq2)
21243  t(3,3,6)=-al*akq2*bsok/2.0
21244  t(3,4,6)=(bsok-al*bc)/2.0
21245 ! T413=AMAT( 9,4) T414=AMAT(10,4) T423=AMAT(14,4) T424=AMAT(15,4)
21246  t(4,1,3)=2.0*aks2*(bsok*(1.0-sc)+bc*ssok+
21247  > 2.0*sc*bsok+2.0*ssok*bc)/5.0
21248  t(4,1,4)=2.0*aks2*(2.0*sc*bc+2.0*ssok*bsok*akq2-
21249  > bc*(1.0+sc)+bsok*ssok*akq2)/(5.0*akq2)
21250  t(4,2,3)=2.0*aks2*(3.0*bc-2.0*bc*sc
21251  > +2.0*bsok*ssok*akq2-sc*bc-ssok*bsok*akq2)/(5.0*akq2)
21252  t(4,2,4)=2.0*aks2*(2.0*bsok*(1.0-sc)+
21253  > 2.0*bc*ssok-sc*bsok-ssok*bc)/(5.0*akq2)
21254 ! T436=AMAT(21,4) T446=AMAT(24,4)
21255  t(4,3,6)=-akq2*(bsok+al*bc)/2.0
21256  t(4,4,6)=t(3,3,6)
21257 ! T511=AMAT(7,5) T512=AMAT(8,5) T522=AMAT(13,5) T533=AMAT(18,5)
21258  t(5,1,1)=akq2*(al-sc*ssok)/4.0
21259  t(5,1,2)=-akq2*ssok*ssok/2.0
21260  t(5,2,2)=(al+sc*ssok)/4.0
21261  t(5,3,3)=-akq2*(al-bc*bsok)/4.0
21262 ! T534=AMAT(19,5) T544=AMAT(22,5)
21263  t(5,3,4)=akq2*(bsok*bsok)/2.0
21264  t(5,4,4)=(al+bc*bsok)/4.0
21265  ENDIF
21266  RETURN
21267  END
21268 
21272  SUBROUTINE solfield(bcret,intgr)
21273  implicit real(8) (a-h,o-z)
21274  parameter(iptsz=100002,maxcell1=3000)
21275  common/ttfc/tk,t1k,t2k,sk,s1k,s2k,fh
21276  common/fene/wdisp,wphas,wx,wy,rlim,ifw
21277  common/dyn/tref,vref
21278  common/rigid/boro
21279  common/dcspa/iesp
21280  common/faisc/f(10,iptsz),imax,ngood
21281  common/etcom/cog(8),exten(17),fd(iptsz)
21282  common/qmoyen/qmoy
21283  COMMON /consta/ vl, pi, xmat, rpel, qst
21284  common/tapes/in,ifile,meta
21285  common/pltprf/sprfx(3000),sprfy(3000),sprfl(3000),sprfw(3000),
21286  x sprfp(3000),sprng(3000),prlab(3000),iprf
21287  CHARACTER*(8) PRLAB
21288  common/davcom/dav1(maxcell1,40),davtot,iitem(maxcell1),idav
21289  common/shif/dtiph,shift
21290  common/rander/ialin
21291  common/femt/iemgrw,iemqesg
21292  common/cgtof/charm(20),cgtdv(20),nbch(20),netac
21293  common/compt/nrres,nrtre,nrbunc,nrdbun
21294  common/sc3/beamc,scdist,sce10,cplm,ect,apl,ichaes,iscsp
21295  common/spl/xspl(4000),yspl(4000),s(5000),p(5000),q(5000)
21296  COMMON /bloc11/ r(6,6), t(6,6,6)
21297  dimension rs(6,6),rcul(6,6)
21298  logical iesp,ichaes,shift,ialin,iemgrw
21299  character cr*1
21300 ! print out on terminal of transport element # on one and the same line
21301  nrtre=nrtre+1
21302  cr=char(13)
21303  WRITE(6,8254,advance='no') nrtre,nrres,cr
21304 8254 format('Transport element:',i5,
21305  * ' Accelerating element:',i5,a1)
21306 ! read the magnetic field on the disk
21307  read(25,*) ncord
21308  if(ncord.eq.0) then
21309  rewind(25)
21310  read(25,*)ncord
21311  endif
21312  crest=0.
21313  do i=1,ncord
21314  read(25,*) xspl(i),yspl(i)
21315  if(yspl(i).gt.crest) crest=yspl(i)
21316  enddo
21317  zinf=xspl(1)
21318  zsup=xspl(ncord)
21319  call deriv2(ncord)
21320  npas=intgr
21321  dsol=(zsup-zinf)/float(npas)
21322  xlsol=(zsup-zinf)*100.
21323  write(16,101) xlsol,crest,bcret
21324 101 FORMAT(5x,'Field length =',f7.3,' cm ',/,
21325  x 5x,'Crest of the field =',f10.4,' kG' ,/
21326  x 5x,'Attenuation factor =',f10.4,/)
21327  fh0=fh/vl
21328 ! random errors in alignment
21329  if(ialin) call randali
21330 ! test window
21331  ilost=0
21332 ! PLOT
21333  IF(iprf.EQ.1) then
21334  prlab(iprf)='START '
21335  CALL stapl(davtot*10.)
21336  endif
21337 ! start prints in file 'short.data'
21338  idav=idav+1
21339  iitem(idav)=5
21340  dav1(idav,1)=xlsol*10.
21341  dav1(idav,2)=crest
21342  davti=davtot
21343  davtot=davtot+xlsol
21344  dav1(idav,4)=davtot*10.
21345  zc=zinf
21346  iesp=.true.
21347  do ia=1,6
21348  do ib=1,6
21349  if(ia.eq.ib) rcul(ia,ib)=1.
21350  if(ia.ne.ib) rcul(ia,ib)=0.
21351  enddo
21352  enddo
21353  bisol=0.
21354  bisol2=0.
21355  fnpas=float(npas)
21356  do i=1,npas
21357  zcf=zc+dsol
21358  zcf2=zc+dsol/2.
21359  bsol=bcret*spline(ncord,zcf2)
21360 !omment write(70,110) i,zcf2,bsol
21361  dscm=dsol*100.
21362  tref=tref+xlsol/(vref*fnpas)
21363  call fldsol(bsol,dscm)
21364  write(16,520) i,zc,zcf,bsol
21365 520 format(2x,'**STEP: ',i2,' LIMITS: inf(m)= ',f7.5,
21366  * ' sup(m)= ',f7.5,' AVERAGE FIELD(kG): ',e12.5)
21367  bisol=bisol+bsol*dsol
21368  bisol2=bisol2+bsol*bsol*dsol
21369 ! save equivalent transport matrix
21370  do ia=1,6
21371  do ib=1,6
21372  rs(ia,ib)=rcul(ia,ib)
21373  enddo
21374  enddo
21375  call mfordre(rcul,r,rs)
21376 ! ************TEST******************
21377 ! print first order matrix
21378 !omment write(16,*) ' EQUIVALENT FIRST order MATRIX TRANSFORM (m-rad)'
21379 !omment skl=0.5*acos(2.*r(1,1)-1.)*57.29578
21380 !omment write(16,*) '**** K*LENGTH: ',skl,' degrees'
21381 !omment DO IA=1,6
21382 !omment write(16,100) (r(ia,ib),ib=1,6)
21383 !omment ENDDO
21384 !omment write(16,*) '*******cumul***************'
21385 !omment DO IA=1,6
21386 !omment write(16,100) (rcul(ia,ib),ib=1,6)
21387 !omment ENDDO
21388 ! **********END TEST********************
21389 ! SPACE CHARGE
21390  if(.not.iesp) then
21391  iesp=.true.
21392  else
21393  if(ichaes.and.xlsol.gt.0.) then
21394  if(sce10.eq.1.or.sce10.eq.3.) then
21395  dscm2=dscm*2.
21396  call cesp(dscm2)
21397  iesp=.false.
21398 ! dispersion dE/E with respect to the C.O.G of the bunch
21399  call disp
21400  endif
21401  endif
21402  endif
21403 ! envelope sol
21404  write(16,*) 'distance',davti,dsol
21405  davti=davti+dsol*100.
21406  prlab(iprf)='FSOLE '
21407  call stapl((davti)*10.)
21408  zc=zcf
21409  enddo
21410  write(16,922) zc,bisol,bisol2,bisol2/zc
21411 922 format(/,'Field length (m): ',e12.5,/,
21412  * 'Field integral (kG.m): ',e12.5,/,
21413  * 'Field squared integral (kG**2.m): ',e12.5,/,
21414  * 'Field squared integral/L (kG**2): ',e12.5,/)
21415 !110 format(2x,i5,2(2x,e12.5))
21416 ! print first order matrix
21417  write(16,*) ' EQUIVALENT FIRST order MATRIX TRANSFORM (m-rad)'
21418  skl=0.5*acos(2.*rcul(1,1)-1.)*57.29578
21419  write(16,*) ' ******* K*LENGTH: ',skl,' degrees'
21420  DO ia=1,6
21421  write(16,100) (rcul(ia,ib),ib=1,6)
21422  ENDDO
21423 100 format(6(3x,e12.5))
21424 ! **************************************************
21425 ! evolution of the t.o.f of the reference (moved inside loop - Alt)
21426 ! TREF=TREF+XLSOL/VREF
21427  dav1(idav,36)=ngood
21428 ! plots
21429  prlab(iprf)='FSOLE '
21430  CALL stapl(davtot*10.)
21431  if(iemgrw) call emiprt(0)
21432  WRITE(16,*) 'Particles lost in solenoid',ilost
21433  RETURN
21434  END
21435 
21439  SUBROUTINE fldsol(dbs,step)
21440  implicit real(8) (a-h,o-z)
21441  parameter(iptsz=100002)
21442  common/faisc/f(10,iptsz),imax,ngood
21443  common/fene/wdisp,wphas,wx,wy,rlim,ifw
21444  COMMON /consta/ vl, pi, xmat, rpel, qst
21445  common/etcom/cog(8),exten(17),fd(iptsz)
21446  common/femt/iemgrw,iemqesg
21447  common/cgtof/charm(20),cgtdv(20),nbch(20),netac
21448  common/sole/l,kl,ko
21449  REAL(8) L,KL,KO
21450  CHARACTER*(8) PRTLAB
21451  l=step
21452  b=dbs
21453  gpai=0.
21454  do ii=1,ngood
21455  gpai=gpai+f(7,ii)/xmat
21456  enddo
21457  gpai=gpai/float(ngood)
21458  bpai=sqrt(1.-1./(gpai*gpai))
21459  xmco=xmat*bpai*gpai
21460  ri=33.356*xmco*1.e-01/qst
21461  ko = b /ri
21462  IF(ko .EQ. 0.) ko=1.e-16
21463  kl = ko*l
21464 ! half step
21465 !omment kl=kl/2.
21466  call clear
21467  call elsol
21468  do ii=1,ngood
21469 ! **********
21470 !omment call clear
21471 !omment gpai=f(7,ii)/xmat
21472 !omment bpai=sqrt(1.-1./(gpai*gpai))
21473 !omment xmco=xmat*bpai*gpai
21474 !omment RI=33.356*XMCO*1.E-01/f(9,ii)
21475 !omment KO = B /RI
21476 !omment IF(KO .EQ. 0.) KO=1.E-16
21477 !omment kl=ko*l
21478 !omment call elsol
21479 ! ***************
21480  call cobeam(ii,l)
21481 ! evolution of the t.o.f has been made in the routine cobeam
21482 !omment f(6,ii)=f(6,ii)+step/(bpai*vl)
21483  enddo
21484 ! test window after the step (only in the transverse directions)
21485  call cogetc
21486  prtlab='FSOLE '
21487  call reject(ilost,prtlab)
21488 ! Reshuffles f(i,j) array after window (now done in 'reject')
21489 ! call shuffle
21490  return
21491  end
21492 
21501  SUBROUTINE solnoid(imks,arg,xlsol)
21502  implicit real(8) (a-h,o-z)
21503  parameter(iptsz=100002,maxcell1=3000)
21504  common/ttfc/tk,t1k,t2k,sk,s1k,s2k,fh
21505  common/fene/wdisp,wphas,wx,wy,rlim,ifw
21506  common/dyn/tref,vref
21507  common/rigid/boro
21508  common/dcspa/iesp
21509  common/faisc/f(10,iptsz),imax,ngood
21510  common/etcom/cog(8),exten(17),fd(iptsz)
21511  common/qmoyen/qmoy
21512  COMMON /consta/ vl, pi, xmat, rpel, qst
21513  common/tapes/in,ifile,meta
21514  common/pltprf/sprfx(3000),sprfy(3000),sprfl(3000),sprfw(3000),
21515  x sprfp(3000),sprng(3000),prlab(3000),iprf
21516  CHARACTER*(8) PRLAB,PRTLAB
21517  common/davcom/dav1(maxcell1,40),davtot,iitem(maxcell1),idav
21518  common/shif/dtiph,shift
21519  common/rander/ialin
21520  common/femt/iemgrw,iemqesg
21521  common/cgtof/charm(20),cgtdv(20),nbch(20),netac
21522  common/compt/nrres,nrtre,nrbunc,nrdbun
21523  common/sc3/beamc,scdist,sce10,cplm,ect,apl,ichaes,iscsp
21524  COMMON /bloc11/ r(6,6), t(6,6,6)
21525  common/itvole/itvol,imamin
21526  common/tofev/ttvols
21527  common/trace3d/trace3h(100),trace3t(maxcell1),tif,kt3h,kt3t,fid
21528  character trace3h*128,trace3t*128,tif*128
21529  logical itvol,imamin
21530 ! dimension rs(6,6),rcul(6,6)
21531  logical iesp,ichaes,shift,ialin,iemgrw
21532  character cr*1
21533  common/sole/l,kl,ko
21534  REAL(8) L,KL,KO
21535 ! print out on terminal of transport element # on one and the same line
21536  nrtre=nrtre+1
21537  cr=char(13)
21538 ! print out on terminal of transport element # on one and the same line
21539  WRITE(6,8254,advance='no') nrtre,nrres,cr
21540 8254 format('Transport element:',i5,
21541  * ' Accelerating element:',i5,a1)
21542  write(16,*) ' ****** SOLENOID *********'
21543 ! PLOT
21544  IF(iprf.EQ.1) then
21545  prlab(iprf)='START '
21546  CALL stapl(davtot*10.)
21547  endif
21548  ilost=0
21549  fh0=fh/vl
21550  fcpi=fh*180./pi
21551 ! random errors in alignment
21552  if(ialin) call randali
21553 ! print out transport matrix (cog)
21554  gpa=0.
21555  do ii=1,ngood
21556  gpa=gpa+f(7,ii)/xmat
21557  enddo
21558  gpa=gpa/float(ngood)
21559  l=xlsol
21560  bpa=sqrt(1.-1./(gpa*gpa))
21561  xmco=xmat*bpa*gpa
21562  ri=33.356*xmco*1.e-01/qst
21563  if(imks.ne.0) then
21564 ! ARG is the field B (kG)
21565  b=arg
21566 ! KO = 2 * K (see ELSOL)
21567  ko = b /ri
21568  IF(ko .EQ. 0.) ko=1.e-16
21569  else
21570 ! ARG is the strength K (cm-1)
21571 ! KO = 2 * K (see ELSOL)
21572  ko = 2.*arg
21573  IF(ko .EQ. 0.) ko=1.e-16
21574  b=ko*ri
21575  endif
21576  kl = ko*l
21577  call clear
21578  call elsol
21579  xkql=(kl/2.)*57.29578
21580 ! trace3d
21581  kt3t=kt3t+1
21582  write(tif,6002) kt3t,kt3t,b*1000.,10.*xlsol
21583 6002 format(' nt(',i4,')= 5, a(1,',i4,')= ',f12.5,' , ',f9.5)
21584  trace3t(kt3t)=tif
21585 !
21586  WRITE(16,101) xlsol,b,ko/2.,ri,xkql
21587 101 FORMAT(' LENGTH = ',f7.3,' CM ',/,
21588  x ' FIELD = ',f10.4,' KG' ,/,
21589  * ' K = ',e12.5,' cm-1',/,
21590  * ' MOMENTUM = ',e12.5,' kG.cm',/,
21591  * ' TRANSVERSE COORDINATES ROTATION = ',e12.5,' deg',/)
21592  call matrix
21593  write(16,10) ttvols*fcpi,davtot
21594 10 FORMAT(' ** time of flight (input): ',e12.5,
21595  * ' deg position: ',e12.5,' cm')
21596 ! start prints in file 'short.data'
21597  idav=idav+1
21598  iitem(idav)=5
21599  dav1(idav,1)=xlsol*10.
21600  dav1(idav,2)=b
21601  dav1(idav,3)=ko/2.
21602  davtot=davtot+xlsol
21603  dav1(idav,4)=davtot*10.
21604  dav1(idav,5)=ri
21605 ! first half solenoid
21606  dg=xlsol
21607  l=xlsol/2.
21608  do ii=1,ngood
21609  call clear
21610  gpai=f(7,ii)/xmat
21611  bpai=sqrt(1.-1./(gpai*gpai))
21612  xmco=xmat*bpai*gpai
21613  ri=33.356*xmco*1.e-01/f(9,ii)
21614  ko = b /ri
21615  IF(ko .EQ. 0.) ko=1.e-16
21616  kl = ko*l
21617  CALL elsol
21618  CALL cobeam(ii,l)
21619 ! evolution of the t.o.f is made in routine cbeam
21620 !omment f(6,ii)=f(6,ii)+l/(bpai*vl)
21621  enddo
21622 ! space charge computations (only if l >0)
21623  if(ichaes.and.l.gt.0.) then
21624  if(sce10.eq.1.or.sce10.eq.3.) then
21625  iesp=.true.
21626  write(16,*) 'Space charge at the middle '
21627  call cesp(xlsol)
21628  iesp=.false.
21629 ! Change the dispersion dE/E with respect to the C.O.G of the bunch
21630  call disp
21631  endif
21632  endif
21633 ! test window after the first half solenoid
21634  call cogetc
21635  bcour=0.
21636  do i=1,ngood
21637  gpai=f(7,i)/xmat
21638  bcour=sqrt(1.-1./(gpai*gpai))+bcour
21639  enddo
21640  bcour=bcour/float(ngood)
21641  gcour=1./sqrt(1.-bcour*bcour)
21642  wcg=(gcour-1.)*xmat
21643 ! ----- window control
21644  tref=tref+xlsol/(vref*2.)
21645  prtlab='SOLENO '
21646  call reject(ilost,prtlab)
21647 ! Reshuffles f(i,j) array after window (now done in 'reject')
21648 ! call shuffle
21649 ! second half solenoid
21650  do ii=1,ngood
21651  CALL clear
21652  gpai=f(7,ii)/xmat
21653  bpai=sqrt(1.-1./(gpai*gpai))
21654  xmco=xmat*bpai*gpai
21655  ri=33.356*xmco*1.e-01/f(9,ii)
21656  ko = b /ri
21657  IF(ko .EQ. 0.) ko=1.e-16
21658  kl = ko*l
21659  CALL elsol
21660  CALL cobeam(ii,l)
21661  enddo
21662 ! t.o.f
21663  tref=tref+xlsol/(vref*2.)
21664  call reject(ilost,prtlab)
21665  if(itvol) ttvols=tref
21666  tcog=0.
21667  do i=1,ngood
21668  tcog=tcog+f(6,i)
21669  enddo
21670  tcog=tcog/float(ngood)
21671  if(itvol) then
21672  write(16,11) ttvols*fcpi,davtot,tref*fcpi,tcog*fcpi
21673 11 FORMAT(' ** tof for adjustments: ',e12.5,
21674  * ' deg at position: ',e12.5,' cm in the lattice',
21675  * /,3x,'tof of the reference: ',e12.5,' deg tof of the cog: ',
21676  * e12.5,' deg')
21677  else
21678  write(16,12) tref*fcpi,tcog*fcpi
21679 12 FORMAT(' ** tof of the reference: ',e12.5,
21680  * ' deg tof of the cog: ',e12.5,' deg')
21681  endif
21682  dav1(idav,36)=ngood
21683 ! plots
21684  prlab(iprf)='SOLENO '
21685  CALL stapl(davtot*10.)
21686  if(iemgrw) call emiprt(0)
21687  WRITE(16,*) 'Particles lost in solenoid',ilost
21688  RETURN
21689  END
21690 
21694  SUBROUTINE elsol
21695  implicit real(8) (a-h,o-z)
21696  common/sole/l,kl,ko
21697  common/rigid/boro
21698  REAL(8) L,KL,KO
21699  COMMON /bloc11/ r(6,6), t(6,6,6)
21700  common/secdr/iseor
21701  LOGICAL ISEOR
21702 ! PURE SOLENOID FIELD, MATRIX R AND T ARE IN (M,RD)
21703 ! SAVE KO AND L
21704  sako=ko
21705  sal=l
21706 ! convert (cm,rd) ==> (m,rd)
21707  ko=ko*100.
21708  l=l*1.e-02
21709  sn = sin(kl)
21710  cs = cos(kl)
21711  r(4,4) = 0.5 + 0.5*cs
21712  r(3,3) = r(4,4)
21713  r(2,2) = r(4,4)
21714  r(1,1) = r(4,4)
21715  r(1,4) = (1.- cs)/ko
21716  r(3,2) = -r(1,4)
21717  r(4,1) = 0.25*ko*(1.- cs)
21718  r(2,3) = -r(4,1)
21719  r(4,2) = -0.5*sn
21720  r(3,1) = r(4,2)
21721  r(2,4) = -r(3,1)
21722  r(1,3) = r(2,4)
21723  r(3,4) = r(1,3)*2./ko
21724  r(1,2) = r(3,4)
21725  r(4,3) = -0.25*ko*sn
21726  r(2,1) = r(4,3)
21727 ! see element 16; 3. in TRANSPORT USER MANUAL for SM (here: SM=0)
21728 !omment R(5,6) = R(5,6) + L * SM**2/(RI**2 + SM**2)
21729  IF(iseor) THEN
21730  temp = 0.5*ko*l*sn
21731  t(1,1,6) = temp
21732  t(2,2,6) = temp
21733  t(3,3,6) = temp
21734  t(4,4,6) = temp
21735  t(1,2,6) = sn/ko - l*cs
21736  t(3,4,6) = t(1,2,6)
21737  temp = - 0.5*ko*l*cs
21738  t(1,3,6) = temp
21739  t(2,4,6) = temp
21740  t(4,2,6) = - temp
21741  t(3,1,6) = - temp
21742  t(1,4,6) = (1.0 - cs)/ko - l*sn
21743  t(3,2,6) = -t(1,4,6)
21744  t(2,1,6) = 0.25*ko*(ko*l*cs + sn)
21745  t(4,3,6) =t(2,1,6)
21746  t(2,3,6) = 0.25*ko*(1.0 - cs + ko*l*sn)
21747  t(4,1,6) = - t(2,3,6)
21748  t(5,2,2) = 0.5*l
21749  t(5,4,4) = 0.5*l
21750  ENDIF
21751 ! RESTORE KO AND L
21752  ko=sako
21753  l=sal
21754 !
21755 ! PATH LENGTH TERMS
21756 ! see element 16; 3. in TRANSPORT USER MANUAL for SM here one takes: SM=0
21757 !omment T(5,6,6) = T(5,6,6) - L*(SM**2 + 1.5*RI**2)*SM**2/
21758 !omment 1 (SM**2 + RI**2)**2
21759 !omment T(5,5,6) = SM**2/(SM**2 + RI**2)
21760  RETURN
21761  END
21762 
21766  SUBROUTINE mfordre(rc,ra,rb)
21767  implicit real(8) (a-h,o-z)
21768  dimension ra(6,6), rb(6,6), rc(6,6)
21769  DO i1 = 1, 6
21770  DO i2 = 1, 6
21771  ghost = 0.0
21772  DO i3 = 1, 6
21773  ghost = ghost + ra(i1,i3)*rb(i3,i2)
21774  ENDDO
21775  rc(i1,i2) = ghost
21776  ENDDO
21777  ENDDO
21778  RETURN
21779  END
21780 
21798  SUBROUTINE solquad(iksq,args,argq,xlsol,rg)
21799  implicit real(8) (a-h,o-z)
21800  parameter(iptsz=100002,maxcell1=3000)
21801  common/ttfc/tk,t1k,t2k,sk,s1k,s2k,fh
21802  common/fene/wdisp,wphas,wx,wy,rlim,ifw
21803  common/dyn/tref,vref
21804  common/rigid/boro
21805  common/dcspa/iesp
21806  common/faisc/f(10,iptsz),imax,ngood
21807  common/etcom/cog(8),exten(17),fd(iptsz)
21808  common/qmoyen/qmoy
21809  COMMON /consta/ vl, pi, xmat, rpel, qst
21810  common/tapes/in,ifile,meta
21811  common/pltprf/sprfx(3000),sprfy(3000),sprfl(3000),sprfw(3000),
21812  x sprfp(3000),sprng(3000),prlab(3000),iprf
21813  CHARACTER*(8) PRLAB,PRTLAB
21814  common/davcom/dav1(maxcell1,40),davtot,iitem(maxcell1),idav
21815  common/shif/dtiph,shift
21816  common/rander/ialin
21817  common/femt/iemgrw,iemqesg
21818  common/cgtof/charm(20),cgtdv(20),nbch(20),netac
21819  common/compt/nrres,nrtre,nrbunc,nrdbun
21820  common/sc3/beamc,scdist,sce10,cplm,ect,apl,ichaes,iscsp
21821  LOGICAL ICHAES
21822  logical iesp,shift,ialin,iemgrw
21823  character cr*1
21824  common/slq/l,kso,kqo
21825  REAL(8) L,KSO,KQO
21826 ! print out on terminal of transport element # on one and the same line
21827  nrtre=nrtre+1
21828  cr=char(13)
21829  WRITE(6,8254,advance='no') nrtre,nrres,cr
21830 8254 format('Transport element:',i5,
21831  * ' Accelerating element:',i5,a1)
21832  fh0=fh/vl
21833 ! PLOT
21834  IF(iprf.EQ.1) then
21835  prlab(iprf)='START '
21836  CALL stapl(davtot*10.)
21837  endif
21838 ! random errors in alignment
21839  if(ialin) call randali
21840  ilost=0
21841 ! magnetic rigidity (cog)
21842  gpa=0.
21843  do ii=1,ngood
21844  gpa=gpa+f(7,ii)/xmat
21845  enddo
21846  gpa=gpa/float(ngood)
21847  l=xlsol
21848  bpa=sqrt(1.-1./(gpa*gpa))
21849  xmco=xmat*bpa*gpa
21850  ri=33.356*xmco*1.e-01/qst
21851  if(iksq.ne.0) then
21852 ! argq: quadrupole field (kG), args:solenoid field:(kG)
21853 ! quadrupole
21854  fq=argq
21855  bq=fq/rg
21856  kqo=bq/ri
21857  strq=kqo
21858 ! solenoid (KSO = 2 * K, see ELSQ)
21859  bs=args
21860  kso=bs/ri
21861  strs=kso/2
21862  else
21863 ! argq: quadupole strength (cm-2), args: solenoid strength (cm-1)
21864 ! quadrupole
21865  kqo=argq
21866  strq=argq
21867  bq=argq*ri
21868  fq=bq*rg
21869 ! solenoid (KSO = 2 * K, see ELSQ)
21870  strs=args
21871  bs=2.*strs*ri
21872  kso=bs/ri
21873  endif
21874  xks=kso/2.
21875  xksl=xks*l*57.29578
21876  write(16,*) '****SOLENOID+QUADRUPOLE*******'
21877  write(16,101) xlsol,rg,bs,strs,xksl,fq,strq,ri
21878 101 FORMAT(' LENGTH =',f7.3,' cm APERTURE RADIUS=',e12.5,' cm',/,
21879  x ' SOLENOID: FIELD = ',f10.4,' kG K = ',e12.5,
21880  * ' cm-1 ROTATING ANGLE = ',e12.5,' deg',/,
21881  x ' QUADRUPOLE: FIELD =',f10.4,' kG K2 =',e12.5,
21882  * ' cm-2 ',/,
21883  * ' RIGIDITY = ',e12.5,' kG.cm',/)
21884 ! print transport matrix (c.o.g.)
21885 ! For convenience, the matrix R and T are computed for a positive KQO = (B/r)*(1/BRO)
21886 ! if KQO is negative one has seting up 90 degree rotation on the beam
21887  CALL elsq
21888  write (16,*)
21889  *' The matrix R and T are shown for a positive strength'
21890  write (16,*)
21891  *' For a negative strength set up 90 deg rotation on the beam'
21892  call matrix
21893 ! start prints in file 'short.data'
21894  idav=idav+1
21895  iitem(idav)=11
21896  dav1(idav,1)=xlsol*10.
21897  dav1(idav,2)=bs
21898  dav1(idav,3)=fq
21899  dav1(idav,5)=strq
21900  dav1(idav,6)=kso/2.
21901  dav1(idav,7)=rg*10.
21902  dav1(idav,8)=ri
21903  davtot=davtot+xlsol
21904  dav1(idav,4)=davtot*10.
21905 ! first half lens
21906  dg=xlsol
21907  l=xlsol/2.
21908  do ii=1,ngood
21909  CALL clear
21910  gpai=f(7,ii)/xmat
21911  bpai=sqrt(1.-1./(gpai*gpai))
21912  xmco=xmat*bpai*gpai
21913  ri=33.356*xmco*1.e-01/f(9,ii)
21914 ! KSO =K/2, see ELSQ
21915  kso = bs / ri
21916  IF(kso .EQ. 6.*0) kso=1.e-16
21917  kqo = bq / ri
21918  CALL elsq
21919 ! the matrix R and T are computed for a positive KQO = (B/rg)*(1/BRO)
21920 ! if KQO is negative set up 90 degree rotation on the beam
21921  IF(kqo.LT.6.*0) THEN
21922  irot=ii
21923  CALL rotat(irot)
21924  CALL cobeam(ii,l)
21925 ! return the coordinates to their initial orientation
21926  irot=-ii
21927  CALL rotat(irot)
21928  ELSE
21929  CALL cobeam(ii,l)
21930  ENDIF
21931  enddo
21932 ! Charge space effect (if l >0)
21933  if(ichaes.and.l.gt.0.) then
21934  if(sce10.eq.1.or.sce10.eq.3.) then
21935  iesp=.true.
21936  write(16,*) 'Space charge at the middle '
21937  call cesp(xlsol)
21938  iesp=.false.
21939 ! Change the dispersion dE/E with respect to the C.O.G of the bunch
21940  call disp
21941  endif
21942  endif
21943 ! test window after the first half solquad
21944  call cogetc
21945  bcour=0.
21946  do i=1,ngood
21947  gpai=f(7,i)/xmat
21948  bcour=sqrt(1.-1./(gpai*gpai))+bcour
21949  enddo
21950  bcour=bcour/float(ngood)
21951  gcour=1./sqrt(1.-bcour*bcour)
21952  wcg=(gcour-1.)*xmat
21953 ! ----- convert wdisp in dp/p (for window control)
21954  tref=tref+xlsol/(2.*vref)
21955  prtlab='SOQUAD '
21956  call reject(ilost,prtlab)
21957 ! Reshuffles f(i,j) array after window (now done in 'reject')
21958 ! call shuffle
21959 ! beam after the second half lens
21960  do ii=1,ngood
21961  CALL clear
21962  gpai=f(7,ii)/xmat
21963  bpai=sqrt(1.-1./(gpai*gpai))
21964  xmco=xmat*bpai*gpai
21965  ri=33.356*xmco*1.e-01/f(9,ii)
21966  kso = bs / ri
21967 ! KSO =K/2, see ELSQ
21968  IF(kso .EQ. 0.) kso=1.e-16
21969  kqo = bq / ri
21970  CALL elsq
21971 ! the matrix R and T are computed for a positive KQO = (B/r)*(1/BRO)
21972 ! if KQO is negative set up 90 degree rotation on the beam
21973  IF(kqo.LT.6.*0) THEN
21974  irot=ii
21975  CALL rotat(irot)
21976  CALL cobeam(ii,l)
21977  irot=-ii
21978  CALL rotat(irot)
21979  ELSE
21980  CALL cobeam(ii,l)
21981  ENDIF
21982  enddo
21983 ! t.o.f of reference
21984  tref=tref+xlsol/(vref*2.)
21985  call reject(ilost,prtlab)
21986  dav1(idav,36)=ngood
21987 ! plots
21988  prlab(iprf)='SOQUAD '
21989  CALL stapl(davtot*10.)
21990  if(iemgrw) call emiprt(0)
21991  WRITE(16,*) 'Particles lost in solenoid + quad',ilost
21992  RETURN
21993  END
21994 
21998  SUBROUTINE rotat(ii)
21999  implicit real(8) (a-h,o-z)
22000  parameter(iptsz=100002)
22001  common/faisc/f(10,iptsz),imax,ngood
22002  dimension ff(6)
22003  IF(ii.GE.0) THEN
22004 ! 90 degree rotation
22005  ff(1)=f(2,ii)
22006  ff(2)=f(3,ii)
22007  ff(3)=f(4,ii)
22008  ff(4)=f(5,ii)
22009  f(2,ii)=ff(3)
22010  f(3,ii)=ff(4)
22011  f(4,ii)=-ff(1)
22012  f(5,ii)=-ff(2)
22013  ELSE
22014 ! -90 degree rotation
22015  ii=-ii
22016  ff(1)=f(2,ii)
22017  ff(2)=f(3,ii)
22018  ff(3)=f(4,ii)
22019  ff(4)=f(5,ii)
22020  f(2,ii)=-ff(3)
22021  f(3,ii)=-ff(4)
22022  f(4,ii)=ff(1)
22023  f(5,ii)=ff(2)
22024  ENDIF
22025  RETURN
22026  END
22027 
22034  SUBROUTINE elsq
22035  implicit real(8)(a-z)
22036  common/rigid/boro
22037  common/slq/l,kso,kqo
22038  COMMON /bloc11/ r(6,6), t(6,6,6)
22039  common/secdr/iseor
22040  LOGICAL ISEOR
22041  al=l*1.e-02
22042  akq= kqo*1.e04
22043  aks= kso*1.e02
22044  aks=aks/2.
22045  akq4=akq*akq
22046  aks2=aks*aks
22047  aks3=aks2*aks
22048  aks4=aks2*aks2
22049  q2=dsqrt(akq4+4.0*aks4)
22050  q2i=1.0/q2
22051  sk1=sqrt(2.0*aks2+q2)
22052  sk3=sqrt(abs(q2-2.0*aks2))
22053  ss=sin(sk1*al)
22054  sc=cos(sk1*al)
22055  bs=sinh(sk3*al)
22056  bc=cosh(sk3*al)
22057  skp=0.5*(sk1+sk3)
22058  skm=0.5*(sk1-sk3)
22059  skp2=skp*skp
22060  skp3=skp2*skp
22061  skm2=skm*skm
22062  skm3=skm2*skm
22063  r(1,1)=q2i*(skp2*sc+skm2*bc)
22064  r(1,2)=q2i*(skp*ss-skm*bs)
22065  r(1,3)=q2i*aks*(skm*ss+skp*bs)
22066  r(1,4)=q2i*aks*(bc-sc)
22067  r(2,1)=q2i*(-skp3*ss-skm3*bs)
22068  r(2,2)=q2i*(skp2*sc+skm2*bc)
22069  r(2,3)=q2i*aks3*(sc-bc)
22070  r(2,4)=q2i*aks*(skp*ss-skm*bs)
22071  r(3,1)=q2i*aks*(skm*bs-skp*ss)
22072  r(3,2)=q2i*aks*(sc-bc)
22073  r(3,3)=q2i*(skm2*sc+skp2*bc)
22074  r(3,4)=q2i*(skm*ss+skp*bs)
22075  r(4,1)=q2i*aks3*(bc-sc)
22076  r(4,2)=q2i*aks*(-skm*ss-skp*bs)
22077  r(4,3)=q2i*(skp3*bs-skm3*ss)
22078  r(4,4)=q2i*(skm2*sc+skp2*bc)
22079  IF(.NOT.iseor) RETURN
22080  daks=-aks
22081  dakq=-akq
22082  dakq4=2.0*akq*dakq
22083  daks2=2.0*aks*daks
22084  daks3=3.0*aks2*daks
22085  daks4=4.0*aks3*daks
22086  dq2=0.5*q2i*(dakq4+4.0*daks4)
22087  q2i2=q2i*q2i
22088  dq2i=-q2i2*dq2
22089  dsk1=(2.0*daks2+dq2)/(2.0*sk1)
22090  dsk3=0.0
22091  IF(sk3.NE.6.*0)dsk3=(dq2-2.0*daks2)/(2.0*sk3)
22092  dss=sc*dsk1*al
22093  dsc=-ss*dsk1*al
22094  dbs=bc*dsk3*al
22095  dbc=bs*dsk3*al
22096  dskp=0.5*(dsk1+dsk3)
22097  dskm=0.5*(dsk1-dsk3)
22098  dskp2=2.0*skp*dskp
22099  dskp3=3.0*skp2*dskp
22100  dskm2=2.0*skm*dskm
22101  dskm3=3.0*skm2*dskm
22102  t(1,1,6)=dq2i*(skp2*sc+skm2*bc)+
22103  > q2i*(dskp2*sc+skp2*dsc+dskm2*bc+skm2*dbc)
22104  t(1,2,6)=dq2i*(skp*ss-skm*bs)+
22105  > q2i*(dskp*ss+skp*dss-dskm*bs-skm*dbs)
22106  t(1,3,6)=(dq2i*aks+q2i*daks)*(skm*ss+skp*bs)
22107  > +q2i*aks*(dskm*ss+skm*dss+dskp*bs+skp*dbs)
22108  t(1,4,6)=(dq2i*aks+q2i*daks)*(bc-sc)
22109  > +q2i*aks*(dbc-dsc)
22110  t(2,1,6)=dq2i*(-skp3*ss-skm3*bs)
22111  > +q2i*(-dskp3*ss-skp3*dss-dskm3*bs-skm3*dbs)
22112  t(2,2,6)=t(1,1,6)
22113  t(2,3,6)=(dq2i*aks3+q2i*daks3)*(sc-bc)
22114  > +q2i*aks3*(dsc-dbc)
22115  t(2,4,6)=(dq2i*aks+q2i*daks)*(skp*ss-skm*bs)
22116  > +q2i*aks*(dskp*ss+skp*dss-dskm*bs-skm*dbs)
22117  t(3,1,6)=-t(2,4,6)
22118  t(3,2,6)=-t(1,4,6)
22119  t(3,3,6)=dq2i*(skm2*sc+skp2*bc)
22120  > +q2i*(dskm2*sc+skm2*dsc+dskp2*bc+skp2*dbc)
22121  t(3,4,6)=dq2i*(skm*ss+skp*bs)
22122  > +q2i*(dskm*ss+skm*dss+dskp*bs+skp*dbs)
22123  t(4,1,6)=-t(2,3,6)
22124 !omment AMAT(17,4,MATADR)=-AMAT(21,1,MATADR)
22125  t(4,2,6)=-t(1,3,6)
22126  t(4,3,6)=dq2i*(skp3*bs-skm3*ss)
22127  > +q2i*(dskp3*bs+skp3*dbs-dskm3*ss-skm3*dss)
22128  t(4,4,6)=t(3,3,6)
22129  aisssc=0.0
22130  IF(sk1.NE.0.0)aisssc=ss*ss/(2.0*sk1)
22131  aibsbc=0.0
22132  IF(sk3.NE.0.0)aibsbc=bs*bs/(2.0*sk3)
22133  aissbc=q2i*(sk3*ss*bs-sk1*sc*bc+sk1)
22134  aiscbs=q2i*(sk3*sc*bc+sk1*ss*bs-sk3)
22135  aiss2=0.0
22136  aisc2=al
22137  aibs2=0.0
22138  aibc2=al
22139  IF(sk1.NE.0.0)aiss2=0.5*(al-ss*sc/sk1)
22140  IF(sk1.NE.0.0)aisc2=0.5*(al+ss*sc/sk1)
22141  IF(sk3.NE.0.0)aibs2=0.5*(bs*bc/sk3 - al)
22142  IF(sk3.NE.0.0)aibc2=0.5*(al+bs*bc/sk3)
22143  aissbs=q2i*(sk3*ss*bc-sk1*sc*bs)
22144  aiscbc=q2i*(sk1*ss*bc+sk3*sc*bs)
22145  aks5=aks4*aks
22146  aks6=aks5*aks
22147  skp4=skp3*skp
22148  skp5=skp4*skp
22149  skp6=skp5*skp
22150  skm4=skm3*skm
22151  skm5=skm4*skm
22152  skm6=skm5*skm
22153  q4i=q2i*q2i
22154  t(5,1,1)=q4i*0.5*(skp6*aiss2+skm6*aibs2-2.0*skp3*skm3
22155  > *aissbs+aks6*(aisc2+aibc2-2.0*aiscbc))
22156  t(5,1,2)=q4i*(-skp5*aisssc-skp3*skm2*aissbc
22157  > -skm3*skp2*aiscbs
22158  > -skm5*aibsbc-aks4*(-skm*aisssc-skp*aiscbs+
22159  > skm*aissbc+skp*aibsbc))
22160  t(5,1,3)=q4i*aks3*((skp3-skm3)*(aissbc-aisssc)
22161  > +(skp3+skm3)*(aibsbc-aiscbs))
22162  t(5,1,4)=q4i*(aks*(-skp4*aiss2-(skp3*skm+skm3*skp)*aissbs
22163  > +skm4*aibs2)+aks3*(-skm2*aisc2-(skp2-skm2)*aiscbc+skp2*aibc2))
22164  t(5,2,2)=q4i*0.5*(skp4*aisc2+2.0*skp2*skm2*aiscbc
22165  > +skm4*aibc2+aks2*(skm2*aiss2+2.0*skp*skm*aissbs+skp2*aibs2))
22166  t(5,2,3)=q4i*(aks3*(skp2*aisc2-(skp2-skm2)*aiscbc
22167  > -skm2*aibc2)-aks*(-skm4*aiss2+(skm*skp3-skp*skm3)*aissbs+
22168  > skp4*aibs2))
22169  t(5,2,4)=q4i*aks*((skp3-skm3)*aisssc-(skp2*skm+skp*skm2)
22170  > *aiscbs+(skm2*skp-skm*skp2)*aissbc-(skm3+skp3)*aibsbc)
22171  t(5,3,3)=q4i*0.5*(aks6*(aisc2-2.0*aiscbc+aibc2)
22172  > +skm6*aiss2-2.0*skm3*skp3*aissbs+skp6*aibs2)
22173  t(5,3,4)=q4i*(aks4*(skp*aisssc-skm*aiscbs-skp*aissbc
22174  > +skm*aibsbc)-skm5*aisssc-skm3*skp2*aissbc+skp3*skm2*aiscbs
22175  > +skp5*aibsbc)
22176  t(5,4,4)=q4i*0.5*(aks2*(skp2*aiss2-2.0*skp*skm*aissbs
22177  > +skm2*aibs2)+skm4*aisc2+2.0*skm2*skp2*aiscbc+skp4*aibc2)
22178  RETURN
22179  END
22180 
22185  SUBROUTINE fdrift(xl,npart,imit)
22186  implicit real(8) (a-h,o-z)
22187  dl=xl/float(npart)
22188  do i=1,npart
22189  call drift(dl)
22190  if(imit.ne.0.) call emiprt(0)
22191  enddo
22192  return
22193  end
22194 
22199  SUBROUTINE drift(dl)
22200  implicit real(8) (a-h,o-z)
22201  parameter(iptsz=100002,maxcell1=3000)
22202  common/rigid/boro
22203  COMMON /consta/ vl, pi, xmat, rpel, qst
22204  common/dyn/tref,vref
22205  common/ttfc/tk,t1k,t2k,sk,s1k,s2k,fh
22206  common/faisc/f(10,iptsz),imax,ngood
22207  common/tapes/in,ifile,meta
22208  common/davcom/dav1(maxcell1,40),davtot,iitem(maxcell1),idav
22209  common/etcom/cog(8),exten(17),fd(iptsz)
22210  common/sc3/beamc,scdist,sce10,cplm,ect,apl,ichaes,iscsp
22211  common/fene/wdisp,wphas,wx,wy,rlim,ifw
22212  common/dcspa/iesp
22213  common/pltprf/sprfx(3000),sprfy(3000),sprfl(3000),sprfw(3000),
22214  x sprfp(3000),sprng(3000),prlab(3000),iprf
22215  CHARACTER*(8) PRLAB,PRTLAB
22216  common/shif/dtiph,shift
22217  common/femt/iemgrw,iemqesg
22218  common/posc/xpsc
22219  common/cgtof/charm(20),cgtdv(20),nbch(20),netac
22220  common/tofev/ttvols
22221  common/itvole/itvol,imamin
22222  logical iesp,ichaes,shift,iemgrw,itvol,imamin
22223  ilost=0
22224  fh0=fh/vl
22225  fcpi=fh*180./pi
22226  write(16,*)'*** DRIFT of length ',dl,' cm'
22227  if(itvol)write(16,10) ttvols*fcpi,davtot
22228 10 FORMAT(' ** tof for adjustments at input: ',e12.5,
22229  * ' deg at position: ',e12.5,' cm in the lattice')
22230 ! STATISTICS
22231  IF(iprf.EQ.1) then
22232  prlab(iprf)='START '
22233  CALL stapl(davtot*10.)
22234  endif
22235 ! random error in position only if dl is positif
22236 ! Beam at the half drift
22237  dg2=dl/2.
22238  do i=1,ngood
22239 ! conversion mrad ===> rad
22240  f2=f(3,i)*.001
22241  f4=f(5,i)*.001
22242  f(2,i)=f(2,i)+dg2*tan(f2)
22243  f(4,i)=f(4,i)+dg2*tan(f4) / cos(f2)
22244  gpai=f(7,i)/xmat
22245  bpai=sqrt(1.-1./(gpai*gpai))
22246  vpai=vl*bpai
22247  f(6,i)=f(6,i)+dg2/(vpai*cos(f2)*cos(f4))
22248  enddo
22249 ! ENVEL
22250 ! start prints in file 'short.data'
22251  davtot=davtot+dl
22252  if(dl.gt.0.) then
22253 ! nlength=nlength+1
22254  idav=idav+1
22255  iitem(idav)=7
22256  dav1(idav,1)=dl*10.
22257  dav1(idav,4)=davtot*10.
22258  endif
22259 ! Charge space (if dl >1.e-04)
22260  if(ichaes.and.dl.ge.1.e-04) then
22261  if(sce10.eq.3.) then
22262  iesp=.true.
22263  write(16,*) ' Space charge at the middle'
22264  call cesp(dl)
22265  iesp=.false.
22266 ! Change the dispersion dE/E with respect to the C.O.G of the bunch
22267  call disp
22268  endif
22269  endif
22270 ! Test window after the first half drift
22271  tref=tref+dl/(vref*2.)
22272  prtlab='DRIFT '
22273  call reject(ilost,prtlab)
22274 ! Reshuffles f(i,j) array after window (now done in 'reject')
22275 ! call shuffle
22276  il=ilost
22277 ! Beam for the second half drift
22278  do i=1,ngood
22279  f2=f(3,i)*.001
22280  f4=f(5,i)*.001
22281  f(2,i)=f(2,i)+dg2*tan(f2)
22282  f(4,i)=f(4,i)+dg2*tan(f4) / cos(f2)
22283  gpai=f(7,i)/xmat
22284  bpai=sqrt(1.-1./(gpai*gpai))
22285  vpai=vl*bpai
22286  f(6,i)=f(6,i)+dg2/(vpai*cos(f2)*cos(f4))
22287  enddo
22288 ! Test window after the second half drift (only in transverse directions and phase)
22289  tref=tref+dl/(vref*2.)
22290  call reject(ilost,prtlab)
22291  il=il+ilost
22292 ! change the reference and the TOF
22293  if(itvol) ttvols=tref
22294  if(dl.gt.0.)then
22295  dav1(idav,36)=ngood
22296 ! envelope
22297  prlab(iprf)='DRIFT '
22298  call stapl(davtot*10.)
22299  endif
22300  tcog=0.
22301  do i=1,ngood
22302  tcog=tcog+f(6,i)
22303  enddo
22304  tcog=tcog/float(ngood)
22305  if(itvol) then
22306  write(16,11) ttvols*fcpi,davtot,tref*fcpi,tcog*fcpi
22307 11 FORMAT(' ** tof for adjustments : ',e12.5,
22308  * ' deg at position: ',e12.5,' cm in the lattice',
22309  * /,3x,'tof of the reference: ',e12.5,' deg tof of the cog: ',
22310  * e12.5,' deg')
22311  else
22312  write(16,12) tref*fcpi,tcog*fcpi
22313 12 FORMAT(' ** tof of the reference: ',e12.5,
22314  * ' deg tof of the cog: ',e12.5,' deg')
22315  endif
22316  write(16,*) 'particles lost in drift: ',il
22317  if(iemgrw.and.dl.gt.0.) then
22318  if(iemqesg.eq.2) call emiprt(0)
22319  endif
22320  RETURN
22321  END
22322  SUBROUTINE clear
22323 ! CLEAR MATRIX R AND T
22324  implicit real(8) (a-h,o-z)
22325  COMMON /bloc11/ r(6,6), t(6,6,6)
22326  common/secdr/iseor
22327  LOGICAL ISEOR
22328 ! CLEAR R
22329  DO ia=1,6
22330  DO ib=1,6
22331  r(ia,ib)=0.
22332  IF(ia.EQ.ib) r(ia,ib)=1.
22333  ENDDO
22334  ENDDO
22335 ! CLEAR T
22336  IF(iseor) THEN
22337  DO ia=1,6
22338  DO ib=1,6
22339  DO ic=1,6
22340  t(ia,ib,ic)=0.
22341  ENDDO
22342  ENDDO
22343  ENDDO
22344  ENDIF
22345  RETURN
22346  END
22347 
22351  SUBROUTINE cobeam(ii,xl)
22352  implicit real(8) (a-h,o-z)
22353  parameter(iptsz=100002)
22354  common/faisc/f(10,iptsz),imax,ngood
22355  COMMON /bloc11/ r(6,6), t(6,6,6)
22356  common/etcom/cog(8),exten(17),fd(iptsz)
22357  COMMON /consta/ vl, pi, xmat, rpel, qst
22358  common/radia/trt,rmoy,xintf,crae
22359  common/secdr/iseor
22360  LOGICAL ISEOR
22361  dimension sf(6),ssf(6)
22362 ! MATRIX R AND T ARE IN M-RD
22363 ! beam conversion: CM ===> M MRD ==> RD
22364  sf(1)=f(2,ii)*1.e-02
22365  sf(2)=f(3,ii)*1.e-03
22366  sf(3)=f(4,ii)*1.e-02
22367  sf(4)=f(5,ii)*1.e-03
22368  sf(5)=xl*1.e-02
22369  sf(5)=sf(5)/(cos(sf(2))*cos(sf(4)))
22370  sf(6)=(fd(ii)-1.)
22371 ! FIRST order COMPUTATION (M-RD)
22372  DO ia=1,6
22373  ssf(ia)=0.
22374  DO ib=1,6
22375  ssf(ia)=r(ia,ib)*sf(ib)+ssf(ia)
22376  ENDDO
22377  ENDDO
22378  IF(iseor) THEN
22379 ! SECOND order COMPUTATION (M-RD)
22380  DO ia=1,6
22381  DO ib=1,6
22382  DO ic=1,6
22383  ssf(ia)=ssf(ia)+t(ia,ib,ic)*sf(ib)*sf(ic)
22384  ENDDO
22385  ENDDO
22386  ENDDO
22387  ENDIF
22388  DO ia=1,4
22389  f(ia+1,ii)=ssf(ia)
22390  ENDDO
22391 ! CONVERT RD ==> MRD M ==> CM
22392  f(3,ii)=f(3,ii)*1000.
22393  f(5,ii)=f(5,ii)*1000.
22394  f(2,ii)=f(2,ii)*100.
22395  f(4,ii)=f(4,ii)*100.
22396  gpai=f(7,ii)/xmat
22397  bpai=sqrt(1.-1./(gpai*gpai))
22398  vpai=vl*bpai
22399  trt=100.*ssf(5)/vpai
22400  f(6,ii)=f(6,ii)+trt
22401  RETURN
22402  END
22403 
22408  SUBROUTINE disp
22409  implicit real(8) (a-h,o-z)
22410  parameter(iptsz=100002)
22411  common/faisc/f(10,iptsz),imax,ngood
22412  common/etcom/cog(8),exten(17),fd(iptsz)
22413  common/mcs/imcs,ncstat,cstat(20)
22414  common /consta/ vl,pi,xmat,rpel,qst
22415  gcog=0.
22416  do i=1,ngood
22417  gcog=f(7,i)/xmat+gcog
22418  enddo
22419  gcog=gcog/float(ngood)
22420  bcog=sqrt(1.-1./(gcog*gcog))
22421  do i=1,ngood
22422  gpai=f(7,i)/xmat
22423  if(gpai.ge.1.) then
22424  bpai=sqrt(1.-1./(gpai*gpai))
22425  else
22426  bpai=0.
22427  endif
22428  fd(i)=bpai/bcog * gpai/gcog
22429  enddo
22430  return
22431  end
22432 !old do ist=1,ncstat
22433 !old gcog=0.
22434 !old nii=0
22435 !old do ii=1,ngood
22436 !old if(f(9,ii).eq.cstat(ist)) then
22437 !old gcog=gcog+f(7,ii)/xmat
22438 !old nii=nii+1
22439 !old endif
22440 !old enddo
22441 !old gcog=gcog/float(nii)
22442 !old bcog=sqrt(1.-1./(gcog*gcog))
22443 !old DO II=1,NGOOD
22444 !old if(f(9,ii).eq.cstat(ist)) then
22445 !old gpai=f(7,ii)/xmat
22446 !old bpai=sqrt(1.-1./(gpai*gpai))
22447 !old fd(ii)=(gpai*bpai)/(gcog*bcog)
22448 !old endif
22449 !old enddo
22450 !old enddo
22451 !old return
22452 !old end
22460  SUBROUTINE zrotat(zrot)
22461  implicit real(8) (a-h,o-z)
22462  parameter(iptsz=100002,maxcell1=3000)
22463  common/faisc/f(10,iptsz),imax,ngood
22464  common/grot/rzot,izrot
22465  COMMON /consta/ vl, pi, xmat, rpel, qst
22466  common/davcom/dav1(maxcell1,40),davtot,iitem(maxcell1),idav
22467  logical izrot
22468  dimension rs(6,6),ff(6),fc(6)
22469  WRITE(16,100) zrot
22470  100 FORMAT(/,20x,'BEAM ROTATION ',f10.4
22471  1 ,' degrees ABOUT THE POSITIVE Z-AXIS',/)
22472  if(.not.izrot) then
22473  izrot=.true.
22474  rzot=zrot
22475  else
22476  izrot=.false.
22477  endif
22478 ! Daves start
22479  idav=idav+1
22480  iitem(idav)=20
22481  dav1(idav,1)=zrot
22482 ! initialize
22483  DO ia=1,4
22484  DO ib=1,4
22485  rs(ia,ib)=0.
22486  ENDDO
22487  ENDDO
22488 ! Conversion DEG ==> RAD
22489  zrot= zrot*pi/180.
22490  rs44 = cos(zrot)
22491  rs( 4,4 ) = rs44
22492  rs( 3,3 ) = rs44
22493  rs( 2,2 ) = rs44
22494  rs( 1,1 ) = rs44
22495  rs24 = sin(zrot)
22496  rs( 2,4 ) = rs24
22497  rs( 1,3 ) = rs24
22498  rs( 4,2 ) = - rs24
22499  rs( 3,1 ) = - rs24
22500  DO ii=1,ngood
22501  ff(1)=f(2,ii)
22502  ff(2)=f(3,ii)
22503  ff(3)=f(4,ii)
22504  ff(4)=f(5,ii)
22505  DO ia=1,4
22506  fc(ia)=0.
22507  DO ib=1,4
22508  fc(ia)=fc(ia)+ff(ib)*rs(ia,ib)
22509  ENDDO
22510  ENDDO
22511  f(2,ii)=fc(1)
22512  f(3,ii)=fc(2)
22513  f(4,ii)=fc(3)
22514  f(5,ii)=fc(4)
22515  ENDDO
22516  RETURN
22517  END
22518 
22525  SUBROUTINE zrotap(zrot)
22526  implicit real(8) (a-h,o-z)
22527  parameter(iptsz=100002)
22528  common/faisc/f(10,iptsz),imax,ngood
22529  common/grot/rzot,izrot
22530  COMMON /consta/ vl, pi, xmat, rpel, qst
22531  logical izrot
22532  dimension rs(6,6),ff(6),fc(6)
22533  WRITE(16,100) zrot
22534  100 FORMAT(/,20x,'BEAM ROTATION ',f10.4
22535  1 ,' degrees ABOUT THE POSITIVE Z-AXIS',/)
22536  rzot=zrot
22537 ! Conversion DEG ==> RAD
22538  zrot= zrot*pi/180.
22539  rs44 = cos(zrot)
22540  rs( 4,4 ) = rs44
22541  rs( 3,3 ) = rs44
22542  rs( 2,2 ) = rs44
22543  rs( 1,1 ) = rs44
22544  rs24 = sin(zrot)
22545  rs( 2,4 ) = rs24
22546  rs( 1,3 ) = rs24
22547  rs( 4,2 ) = - rs24
22548  rs( 3,1 ) = - rs24
22549  DO ii=1,ngood
22550  ff(1)=f(2,ii)
22551  ff(2)=f(3,ii)
22552  ff(3)=f(4,ii)
22553  ff(4)=f(5,ii)
22554  DO ia=1,4
22555  fc(ia)=0.
22556  DO ib=1,4
22557  fc(ia)=fc(ia)+ff(ib)*rs(ia,ib)
22558  ENDDO
22559  ENDDO
22560  f(2,ii)=fc(1)
22561  f(3,ii)=fc(2)
22562  f(4,ii)=fc(3)
22563  f(5,ii)=fc(4)
22564  ENDDO
22565  RETURN
22566  END
22567 
22573  SUBROUTINE aliner
22574  implicit real(8) (a-h,o-z)
22575  parameter(iptsz=100002)
22576  common/alin/xl,yl,xpl,ypl
22577  common/faisc/f(10,iptsz),imax,ngood
22578  WRITE(16,100) xl,yl,xpl,ypl
22579 100 FORMAT(/,5x,' DISPLACEMENT x(cm) y(cm) : ',2(e12.5,2x),/,
22580  * 5x,' KICK xp(mrad) yp(mrad): ',2(e12.5,2x),//)
22581 ! CALCUL DES COORDONNEES DES TRAJECTOIRES
22582 ! UNITES = CM-MRD
22583  DO ii=1,ngood
22584  f(2,ii)=f(2,ii) + xl
22585  f(4,ii)=f(4,ii) + yl
22586  f(3,ii)=f(3,ii) + xpl
22587  f(5,ii)=f(5,ii) + ypl
22588  ENDDO
22589  RETURN
22590  END
22591 
22597  SUBROUTINE randali
22598  implicit real(8) (a-h,o-z)
22599  parameter(iptsz=100002)
22600  common/alin/xl,yl,xpl,ypl
22601  common/faisc/f(10,iptsz),imax,ngood
22602  common/apel/iapel
22603  dimension trans(1)
22604  write(16,*) ' random error in alignment with:'
22605  WRITE(16,100) xl,yl,xpl,ypl
22606 100 FORMAT(/,5x,' KICK x(cm) y(cm) : ',2(e12.5,2x),/,
22607  * 5x,' KICK xp(mrad) yp(mrad): ',2(e12.5,2x),//)
22608  len=1
22609  rdcf=.5
22610  call rlux(trans,len)
22611  if(trans(1).le.rdcf) sign=-1.
22612  if(trans(1).gt.rdcf) sign=1.
22613  call rlux(trans,len)
22614  xla=xl*sign*trans(1)
22615  call rlux(trans,len)
22616  if(trans(1).le.rdcf) sign=-1.
22617  if(trans(1).gt.rdcf) sign=1.
22618  call rlux(trans,len)
22619  yla=yl*sign*trans(1)
22620  call rlux(trans,len)
22621  if(trans(1).le.rdcf) sign=-1.
22622  if(trans(1).gt.rdcf) sign=1.
22623  call rlux(trans,len)
22624  xpla=xpl*sign*trans(1)
22625  call rlux(trans,len)
22626  if(trans(1).le.rdcf) sign=-1.
22627  if(trans(1).gt.rdcf) sign=1.
22628  call rlux(trans,len)
22629  ypla=ypl*sign*trans(1)
22630  WRITE(16,100) xla,yla,xpla,ypla
22631  DO ii=1,ngood
22632  f(2,ii)=f(2,ii)+xla
22633  f(4,ii)=f(4,ii)+yla
22634  f(3,ii)=f(3,ii)+xpla
22635  f(5,ii)=f(5,ii)+ypla
22636  enddo
22637  return
22638  end
22639 
22643  SUBROUTINE matrix
22644  implicit real(8) (a-h,o-z)
22645  COMMON /bloc11/ r(6,6), t(6,6,6)
22646  common/secdr/iseor
22647  LOGICAL ISEOR
22648  write(16,*) ' TRANSPORT MATRIX (m-rd)'
22649  write(16,*) ' FIRST ORDER TRANSPORT********'
22650  DO ia=1,6
22651  write(16,100) (r(ia,ib),ib=1,6)
22652  ENDDO
22653 100 format(6(3x,e12.5))
22654  write(16,*) ' *************************************************'
22655  IF(iseor) THEN
22656  write(16,*) ' SECOND ORDER TRANSPORT (m-rd)********'
22657  DO ia=1,6
22658  DO ib=1,6
22659  DO ic=1,6
22660  IF(t(ia,ib,ic).NE.6.*0) WRITE(16,101)ia,ib,ic,t(ia,ib,ic)
22661  ENDDO
22662  ENDDO
22663  ENDDO
22664  write(16,*) ' *************************************************'
22665  ENDIF
22666 101 format(' T',3(i1),3x,e12.5)
22667  RETURN
22668  END
22669 
22675  SUBROUTINE egun(fmult,indp)
22676  implicit real(8) (a-h,o-z)
22677  parameter(iptsz=100002,maxcell1=3000)
22678  common/ttfc/tk,t1k,t2k,sk,s1k,s2k,fh
22679  common/faisc/f(10,iptsz),imax,ngood
22680  common/consta/ vl,pi, xmat,rpel,qst
22681  common/azlist/icont,iprin
22682  common/dyn/tref,vref
22683  common/rigid/boro
22684  common/etcom/cog(8),exten(17),fd(iptsz)
22685  common/qmoyen/qmoy
22686  common/tapes/in,ifile,meta
22687  common/pltprf/sprfx(3000),sprfy(3000),sprfl(3000),sprfw(3000),
22688  x sprfp(3000),sprng(3000),prlab(3000),iprf
22689  CHARACTER*(8) PRLAB,PRTLAB
22690  common/davcom/dav1(maxcell1,40),davtot,iitem(maxcell1),idav
22691  common/femt/iemgrw,iemqesg
22692  common/cgtof/charm(20),cgtdv(20),nbch(20),netac
22693  common/compt/nrres,nrtre,nrbunc,nrdbun
22694  common/sc3/beamc,scdist,sce10,cplm,ect,apl,ichaes,iscsp
22695  common/dcspa/iesp
22696  common/spl/xspl(4000),yspl(4000),s(5000),p(5000),q(5000)
22697  dimension gam(3000),xe(3000),xpe(3000),ye(3000),ype(3000)
22698  character cr*1
22699  logical flgsc,iesp,ichaes,iemgrw
22700 ! print out on terminal of transport element # on one and the same line
22701  nrres=nrres+1
22702  cr=char(13)
22703  WRITE(6,8254) nrtre,nrres
22704 8254 format('Transport element:',i5,
22705  * ' Accelerating element:',i5)
22706  write(6,*) 'EGUN calculation started'
22707 ! energy at the entrance
22708  we=0.
22709  do i=1,ngood
22710  we=we+f(7,i)
22711  enddo
22712  we=we/float(ngood)-xmat
22713 ! indp: define the number of space charge computations
22714 ! indp = 1 : 8 space charge computations. The EGUN field is divided in 16 elements
22715 ! indp = 2 : 16 space charge computation. in 32 elements
22716 ! indp = 3 : 32 space charge computation. in 64 elements
22717  if(indp.gt.3) indp=3
22718  if(indp.eq.1) ipart=16
22719  if(indp.ge.2) ipart=32
22720  if(indp.eq.3) ipart=64
22721 ! research the number of steps w.r.t. the input energy
22722 ! convert energy: MeV --> eV
22723  we=we*1.e06
22724  weinf=19.99
22725  if(we.le.weinf) then
22726  write(6,*) ' Energy at the cathode: ',we,
22727  * ' eV is below the lower limit of 20 eV '
22728  stop
22729  endif
22730 ! read egun field on the disk
22731  e0=xmat
22732  vlm=vl*1.e-02
22733  read(22,*)npt
22734  do i=1,npt
22735  read(22,*) xspl(i),yspl(i)
22736  enddo
22737  zinf=xspl(1)
22738  zsup=xspl(npt)
22739  egl=zsup-zinf
22740  call deriv2(npt)
22741  elgun=egl*100.
22742 ! PLOT
22743  IF(iprf.EQ.1) then
22744  prlab(iprf)='START '
22745  CALL stapl(davtot*10.)
22746  endif
22747 ! start prints in file 'short.data'
22748  idav=idav+1
