25393  prlab(iprf)='QUAELEC '
25394  call stapl(davtot*10.)
25395  tcog=0.
25396  do i=1,ngood
25397  tcog=tcog+f(6,i)
25398  enddo
25399  tcog=tcog/float(ngood)
25400  if(itvol) then
25401  write(16,11) ttvols*fcpi,davtot,tref*fcpi,tcog*fcpi
25402 11 FORMAT(' ** tof for adjustments: ',e12.5,
25403  * ' deg at position: ',e12.5,' cm in the lattice',
25404  * /,3x,'tof of the reference: ',e12.5,' deg tof of the cog: ',
25405  * e12.5,' deg')
25406  else
25407  write(16,12) tref*fcpi,tcog*fcpi
25408 12 FORMAT(' ** tof of the reference: ',e12.5,
25409  * ' deg tof of the cog: ',e12.5,' deg')
25410  endif
25411  dav1(idav,36)=ngood
25412  write(16,*)' particles lost :',ilost
25413 ! returns coordinates to the initial orientation
25414  if(itwist) then
25415  if(abs(volt).gt.1.e-13) then
25416  qtwrad=-sqtwist
25417  call zrotat(qtwrad)
25418  endif
25419  endif
25420  if(iemgrw) call emiprt(0)
25421 ! envelope
25422  prlab(iprf)='QUAELEC '
25423  call stapl(davtot*10.)
25424  return
25425  end
25426 
25436  SUBROUTINE qfk (ityqu,arg,xlqua,rs)
25437  implicit real(8) (a-h,o-z)
25438  parameter(iptsz=100002,maxcell1=3000)
25439  common/fene/wdisp,wphas,wx,wy,rlim,ifw
25440  common/ttfc/tk,t1k,t2k,sk,s1k,s2k,fh
25441  common/dyn/tref,vref
25442  COMMON /consta/ vl, pi, xmat, rpel, qst
25443  common/rigid/boro
25444  common/faisc/f(10,iptsz),imax,ngood
25445  common/etcom/cog(8),exten(17),fd(iptsz)
25446  common/qmoyen/qmoy
25447  common/dcspa/iesp
25448  LOGICAL IESP
25449  common/sc3/beamc,scdist,sce10,cplm,ect,apl,ichaes,iscsp
25450  LOGICAL ICHAES
25451  common/tapes/in,ifile,meta
25452  common/pltprf/sprfx(3000),sprfy(3000),sprfl(3000),sprfw(3000),
25453  x sprfp(3000),sprng(3000),prlab(3000),iprf
25454  CHARACTER*(8) PRLAB,PRTLAB
25455  common/davcom/dav1(maxcell1,40),davtot,iitem(maxcell1),idav
25456  common/shif/dtiph,shift
25457  LOGICAL SHIFT
25458  common/compt/nrres,nrtre,nrbunc,nrdbun
25459  common/rander/ialin
25460  LOGICAL IALIN
25461  common/qskew/qtwist,iqrand,itwist,iaqu
25462  LOGICAL ITWIST
25463  common/femt/iemgrw,iemqesg
25464  LOGICAL IEMGRW
25465  common/cgtof/charm(20),cgtdv(20),nbch(20),netac
25466  common/qsex/l,kq2,ks2
25467  common/tofev/ttvols
25468  common/itvole/itvol,imamin
25469  common/qfkd/ityq
25470  logical itvol,imamin,ityq
25471  REAL(8) L,KQ2,KS2
25472  dimension trans(1)
25473  character cr*1
25474  ilost=0
25475  if(ityqu.eq.0) ityq=.true.
25476  if(ityqu.ne.0) ityq=.false.
25477  if(ityq) then
25478  write(16,*) ' ***QUADRUPOLE (electrostatic)***'
25479  else
25480  write(16,*) ' ***QUADRUPOLE (magnetic)***'
25481  endif
25482 ! statistics
25483  IF(iprf.EQ.1) then
25484  prlab(iprf)='START '
25485  CALL stapl(davtot*10.)
25486  endif
25487  xfqu=arg
25488  fcpi=fh*180./pi
25489  if(itvol) write(16,10) ttvols*fcpi,davtot
25490 10 FORMAT(' ** tof at input: ',e12.5,
25491  * ' deg position in the lattice: ',e12.5,' cm ')
25492 ! print out on terminal of transport element # on one and the same line
25493  nrtre=nrtre+1
25494  cr=char(13)
25495  WRITE(6,8254,advance='no') nrtre,nrres,cr
25496 8254 format('Transport element:',i5,
25497  * ' Accelerating element:',i5,a1)
25498 ! if itwist=.true. skews the quadrupole before misalignments (only if abs(arg) gt 1.e-13)
25499 ! len = 1 level 1 in rlux routine
25500  len=1
25501  sqtwist=0.
25502  if(abs(xfqu).gt.1.e-13) then
25503  if(itwist) then
25504  if(iqrand.eq.0) then
25505  qtwrad=qtwist
25506  sqtwist=qtwrad
25507  call zrotat(qtwrad)
25508  else
25509  rdcf=.5
25510  call rlux(trans,len)
25511  if(trans(1).le.rdcf) sign=-1.
25512  if(trans(1).gt.rdcf) sign=1.
25513  call rlux(trans,len)
25514  qtwrad=qtwist*sign*trans(1)
25515  sqtwist=qtwrad
25516  call zrotat(qtwrad)
25517  endif
25518  endif
25519 ! misalignments
25520  if(ialin) call randali
25521  endif
25522  idav=idav+1
25523  iitem(idav)=19
25524  dav1(idav,1)=xlqua*10.
25525  davtot=davtot+xlqua
25526  dav1(idav,4)=davtot*10.
25527  fh0=fh/vl
25528  gpa=0.
25529  do ii=1,ngood
25530  gpa=gpa+f(7,ii)/xmat
25531  enddo
25532  gpa=gpa/float(ngood)
25533  bet=sqrt(gpa*gpa-1.)/gpa
25534  l=xlqua
25535  eni=gpa*xmat
25536  qi=qst
25537 ! electric quadrupole
25538  if(ityq) then
25539 ! rigid: electric momentum (kV)
25540  rigid=eni*bet*bet/qi * 1.e03
25541 ! compute the electric voltage VOLT (kV) from K(cm-2)
25542  volt=xfqu*rs*rs*rigid
25543  volt=volt/2.
25544 ! kq2 (cm-2)
25545  kq2=xfqu
25546 ! electric field gradient: xgrad (kV/cm2)
25547  xgrad=kq2*rigid
25548  dav1(idav,2)=volt
25549  dav1(idav,3)=rigid
25550  dav1(idav,5)=xgrad
25551  dav1(idav,6)=xfqu
25552  dav1(idav,7)=rs*10.
25553  call clear
25554  call elqua
25555  write(16,100) xlqua,rs,volt,xfqu,xgrad,rigid
25556 100 format(' LENGTH = ',e12.5,' cm APERTURE RADIUS= ',e12.5,' cm',
25557  * /,' VOLTAGE = ',e12.5,' kV K2 = ',e12.5,' cm-2 GRADIENT = ',
25558  * e12.5,' kV/cm2',/,' MOMENTUM = ',e12.5,' kV',/)
25559 ! print the transport matrix (of the cog)
25560  call matrix
25561  endif
25562 ! magnetic quadrupole
25563  if(.not.ityq) then
25564  xmco=xmat*bet*gpa
25565 ! rigid: magnetic rigidity (kG.cm)
25566  rigid=33.356*xmco*1.e-01/qst
25567  kq2=xfqu
25568 ! bgrad: gradient (kG/cm)
25569  bgrad=kq2*rigid
25570 ! bgaus: field (kG)
25571  bgaus=bgrad*rs
25572  dav1(idav,2)=bgaus
25573  dav1(idav,3)=rigid
25574  dav1(idav,5)=bgrad
25575  dav1(idav,6)=xfqu
25576  dav1(idav,7)=rs*10.
25577  call clear
25578  call elqua
25579  write(16,3300) xlqua,rs,bgaus,xfqu,bgrad,rigid
25580 3300 format(' LENGTH = ',e12.5,' cm APERTURE RADIUS= ',e12.5,' cm',
25581  * /,' FIELD = ',e12.5,' kG K2 = ',e12.5,' cm-2 GRADIENT = ',
25582  * e12.5,' kG/cm',/,' MOMENTUM = ',e12.5,' kG.cm',/)
25583  call matrix
25584  endif
25585 ! first half quadrupole
25586  l=xlqua/2.
25587  do ii=1,ngood
25588  call clear
25589  gpa=f(7,ii)/xmat
25590  bet=sqrt(gpa*gpa-1.)/gpa
25591  qi=f(9,ii)
25592 ! electric quadrupole
25593  if(ityq) then
25594 ! rigi: momentum (kV)
25595  rigi=f(7,ii)*bet*bet/qi * 1.e03
25596 ! qk2 (cm-2)
25597  kq2=xgrad/rigi
25598  call elqua
25599  call cobeam(ii,l)
25600  endif
25601 ! magnetic quadrupole
25602  if(.not.ityq) then
25603  xmco=xmat*bet*gpa
25604 ! rigi: momentum (kG.cm)
25605  rigi=3.3356*xmco/f(9,ii)
25606 ! kq2 (cm-2)
25607  kq2=bgrad/rigi
25608  call elqua
25609  call cobeam(ii,l)
25610  endif
25611  enddo
25612 ! space charge computations (if l >0)
25613  if(ichaes.and.l.gt.0.) then
25614  if(sce10.eq.1.or.sce10.eq.3.) then
25615  iesp=.true.
25616  write(16,*) 'Space charge at the middle '
25617  call cesp(xlqua)
25618  iesp=.false.
25619 ! Change the dispersion dE/E with respect to the C.O.G of the bunch
25620  call disp
25621  endif
25622  endif
25623 ! Test window after the first half quadrupole (after s.c. computations)
25624  call cogetc
25625  bcour=0.
25626  do i=1,ngood
25627  gpai=f(7,i)/xmat
25628  bcour=sqrt(1.-1./(gpai*gpai))+bcour
25629  enddo
25630  bcour=bcour/float(ngood)
25631  gcour=1./sqrt(1.-bcour*bcour)
25632  wcg=(gcour-1.)*xmat
25633 ! ----- convert window control
25634  tref=tref+xlqua/(2.*vref)
25635  prtlab='QUAFK '
25636  call reject(nlost,prtlab)
25637 ! Reshuffles f(i,j) array after window (now done in 'reject')
25638 ! call shuffle
25639 ! second half quadrupole
25640  do ii=1,ngood
25641  call clear
25642  gpa=f(7,ii)/xmat
25643  bet=sqrt(gpa*gpa-1.)/gpa
25644  qi=f(9,ii)
25645 ! electric quadrupole
25646  if(ityq) then
25647 ! rigi (kV)
25648  rigi=f(7,ii)*bet*bet/qi * 1.e03
25649 ! qk2 (cm-2)
25650  kq2=xgrad/rigi
25651  call elqua
25652  call cobeam(ii,l)
25653  endif
25654 ! magnetic quadrupole
25655  if(.not.ityq) then
25656  xmco=xmat*bet*gpa
25657 ! rigi: momentum (kG.cm)
25658  rigi=3.3356*xmco/f(9,ii)
25659 ! kq2 (cm-2)
25660  kq2=bgrad/rigi
25661  call elqua
25662  call cobeam(ii,l)
25663  endif
25664  enddo
25665 ! Test window after the second half quadrupole
25666  call cogetc
25667  tref=tref+xlqua/(2.*vref)
25668  call reject(ilost,prtlab)
25669  ilost=ilost+nlost
25670 ! Reshuffles f(i,j) array after window (now done in 'reject')
25671 ! call shuffle
25672 ! Change the t.o.f
25673  if(itvol) ttvols=tref
25674 ! envelope
25675  prlab(iprf)='QUAFK '
25676  call stapl(davtot*10.)
25677  tcog=0.
25678  do i=1,ngood
25679  tcog=tcog+f(6,i)
25680  enddo
25681  tcog=tcog/float(ngood)
25682  if(itvol) then
25683  write(16,11) ttvols*fcpi,davtot,tref*fcpi,tcog*fcpi
25684 11 FORMAT(' ** tof for adjustments: ',e12.5,
25685  * ' deg at position: ',e12.5,' cm in the lattice',
25686  * /,3x,'tof of the reference: ',e12.5,' deg tof of the cog: ',
25687  * e12.5,' deg')
25688  else
25689  write(16,12) tref*fcpi,tcog*fcpi
25690 12 FORMAT(' ** tof of the reference: ',e12.5,
25691  * ' deg tof of the cog: ',e12.5,' deg')
25692  endif
25693  dav1(idav,36)=ngood
25694  write(16,*)' particles lost :',ilost
25695 ! returns coordinates to the initial orientation
25696  if(itwist) then
25697  if(abs(xfqu).gt.1.e-13) then
25698  qtwrad=-sqtwist
25699  call zrotat(qtwrad)
25700  endif
25701  endif
25702  if(iemgrw) call emiprt(0)
25703 ! envelope
25704  prlab(iprf)='QUAFK '
25705  call stapl(davtot*10.)
25706  return
25707  end
25708 
25715  SUBROUTINE cavnum
25716  implicit real(8) (a-h,o-z)
25717  parameter(iptsz=100002,maxcell=3000,maxcell1=3000)
25718  common/ttfs/dynt(maxcell),dyntp(maxcell),dyntpp(maxcell),
25719  * dyne0(maxcell),dynph(maxcell),dynlg(maxcell),fhpar,nc
25720  common/posi/ist
25721  common/midgap/enmil,vapmi
25722  common/azmtch/dlg,xmcph,xmce
25723  common/azlist/icont,iprin
25724  common/itvole/itvol,imamin
25725  common/func/a(200),ylg,atte,ncel,nharm
25726  common/cgtof/charm(20),cgtdv(20),nbch(20),netac
25727 ! TRANSIT TIME COEFFICIENTS
25728  common/ttfc/tk,t1k,t2k,sk,s1k,s2k,fh
25729  common/faisc/f(10,iptsz),imax,ngood
25730  common/spl/xspl(4000),yspl(4000),s(5000),p(5000),q(5000)
25731  common/cavnum1/xnh,xpas,ffield,npt
25732  common/cavnum2/b0,b1,b2,b3,b4,b5
25733  common/cell/yf(10000),xf(10000),xlim(15),flength,fhc,att,
25734  * npoint(15),ncell
25735  common/rfield/ifield
25736  common/qmoyen/qmoy
25737  common/rigid/boro
25738  common/sc3/beamc,scdist,sce10,cplm,ect,apl,ichaes,iscsp
25739  COMMON /consta/ vl, pi, xmat, rpel, qst
25740  common/dyn/tref,vref
25741  common/compt/nrres,nrtre,nrbunc,nrdbun
25742  common/compt1/ndtl,ncavmc,ncavnm
25743  common/fene/wdisp,wphas,wx,wy,rlim,ifw
25744  common/tapes/in,ifile,meta
25745  common/etcom/cog(8),exten(17),fd(iptsz)
25746  common/speda/dave,idave
25747  common/shif/dtiph,shift
25748  common/davcom/dav1(maxcell1,40),davtot,iitem(maxcell1),idav
25749  common/etcha1/ichas(iptsz),chexmin(10),chexmax(10),chasit
25750  common/dcspa/iesp
25751  common/pltprf/sprfx(3000),sprfy(3000),sprfl(3000),sprfw(3000),
25752  x sprfp(3000),sprng(3000),prlab(3000),iprf
25753  CHARACTER*(8) PRLAB,PRTLAB
25754  common/appel/irstay,ilost,iavp,ispcel
25755  common/femt/iemgrw,iemqesg
25756 ! common/mode/eflvl,rflvl
25757  common/aerp/vphase,vfield,ierpf
25758  common/tofev/ttvols
25759  common/elec/jelec
25760  common/step/istep
25761 ! ****************************************************************
25762  common/xposi/xpost(10),xlce(2),xpax(2),iscx(2)
25763  common/kcell/avrg(15)
25764 !********************************************
25765 ! reservation for TRACE3D related stuff
25766  common/trace3d/trace3h(100),trace3t(maxcell1),tif,kt3h,kt3t,fid
25767  common/t3dfld/fldctr(15),zend(15),t3d
25768  logical T3D
25769  character trace3h*128,trace3t*128,tif*128,frmt*128
25770 !********************************************
25771  common/xitrd3/bcour1(15),bcour2(15),tr3dw(15),tr3ph(15),
25772  * t0tr3d(15)
25773  logical iesp,ichaes,irstay,iavp,ispcel,ifield,iemgrw
25774  LOGICAL SHIFT,CHASIT,ITVOL,IMAMIN,DAVE,JELEC
25775  CHARACTER cr*1
25776 !************************************************************
25777 ! XESLN : NEGATIVE LENGTH OF THE DRIFT FOLLOWING THE GAP
25778 ! IF XESLN N.E.0 THEN THE CHARGE SPACE EFFECT AFFECTS THE
25779 ! LENGTH (YLG-XESLN)
25780  nrres=nrres+1
25781  ncavnm=ncavnm+1
25782 ! allow for print out on terminal of gap# on one and the same line
25783  cr=char(13)
25784  frmt="('Transport element:',i5,
25785  * ' Accelerating element:',i5,a1)"
25786  WRITE(6,frmt,advance='no') nrtre,nrres,cr
25787 ! WRITE(6,8254,advance='no') NRTRE,NRRES,cr
25788 !8254 format('Transport element:',i5,
25789 ! * ' Accelerating element:',i5,a1)
25790  WRITE(16,*)' CAVITY N :',nrres
25791  ilost=0
25792  aqst=abs(qst)
25793  qmoy=aqst
25794 ! --- the frequency fh may be changed with delfh
25795  oldfh=fh
25796 ! IDUM : dummy variable (indicate in input file the number of the cavity)
25797  READ (in,*) idum
25798 !
25799 ! ielec = 0 acceleration for non relativistic particles with erest < 1 MeV (e.g. non-relativistic electrons)
25800 ! otherwise acceleration for hadrons
25801 ! dphase (deg): phase offset from the phase crest (giving the maximum of energy gain)
25802 ! FFIELD : in percent;
25803 ! (electric field)=(initial electric field)*(1.+FFIELD/100)
25804  jelec=.false.
25805  read (in,*) dielec,dphase,ffield,istep,ielec
25806 ! *********************************************************
25807 ! SV 28/10/2015
25808  if(ncavnm.eq.1) then
25809  write(13,990)
25810 990 format('#',2x,'ncav',2x,'ncell',2x,'pos I(cm)',4x,
25811  * 'pos S(cm)',6x,'L cell(cm)',5x,'W(MeV)',7x,'dw(MeV)',6x,
25812  * 'TOF(dg)',7x,'Ph RF(dg)',5x,'avrg pos(cm)')
25813  write(13,995)
25814 995 format('#',2x,'ncell',3x,'E0TL(MeV)',5x,'Tk(MeV/q)',5x,
25815  * 'Sk(MeV/q)',5x,'dW(MeV)',6x,'PHASE(dg)',4x,
25816  * 'Ph crest(dg)',5x,'To')
25817  endif
25818  write(13,*)
25819 ! ***************************************************************
25820  if(ielec.eq.0) jelec=.true.
25821  ffield=1.+ffield/100.
25822  if(ffield.eq.0.) ffield=1.e-12
25823  if(ifield) then
25824 ! --- The field is read from the disk in the form:
25825 ! z (cm) E(z) MV/cm
25826 ! fhc: frequency of the cavity (Hertz) (read in the file 'field.txt' )
25827  fh=fhc*2.*pi
25828  ncel=ncell
25829  atte=att
25830  ye0=atte
25831 ! flength : length of the field (cm)
25832  flength=xspl(npt)-xspl(1)
25833  ylg=flength
25834  else
25835 ! --- The field is read from the input list in the form of a Fourier series
25836  ncell=ncel
25837  oldfh=fh
25838 ! atte: factor acting on the amplitude of the field (read in the input list)
25839  ye0=atte
25840  endif
25841  dphete=dphase
25842  if(itvol.and.imamin) then
25843 ! --- adjustment of the phase offset w.r.t. the t.o.f. (deg)
25844  ottvol=fh*ttvols*180./pi
25845  attvol=ottvol
25846  xkpi=ottvol/360.
25847  ixkpi=int(xkpi)
25848  xkpi=(xkpi-float(ixkpi))*360.
25849  dphase=dphase-xkpi
25850  endif
25851  WRITE(16,150)fh/(2.*pi),ylg,atte,ffield,ncel,istep
25852 150 FORMAT(4x,'FREQUENCY :',e12.5,' Hertz',/,4x,
25853  x 'FIELD LENGTH :',e12.5,' cm',/,4x,
25854  x 'FIELD FACTOR (UNITS CONVERSION) :',e12.5,/,4x,
25855  x 'FIELD FACTOR (ATTENUATION) :',e12.5,/,4x,
25856  x 'FIELD DIVIDED IN: ',i4,' CELLS, STEPS PER CELL ',i5)
25857  if(.not.imamin) write(16,*) ' PHASE OFFSET: ',dphete,' DEG'
25858  if(imamin) write(16,1501)dphete,dphase,xkpi
25859 1501 format(4x,
25860  x 'PHASE OFFSET (before adjustment): ',e12.5,' deg',/,4x,
25861  x 'PHASE OFFSET (after adjustment): ',e12.5,' deg',/,4x,
25862  * 'ADJUSTMENT ON THE PHASE OFFSET: ',e12.5,' deg')
25863  fh0=fh/vl
25864  beref=vref/vl
25865 ! --- ttvol: time of flight at entrance (sec)
25866  ttvol=0.
25867  if(itvol)ttvol=ttvols*fh
25868 ! start file 'short.data'
25869 ! --- dav1(idav,3)=0: the particle reference and the cog coincide at the input
25870 ! --- dav1(idav,3)=1: the particle reference and the cog are independent
25871 ! debug 2016: next line needs to be commented out
25872 ! dav1(idav,3)=0.
25873  idav=idav+1
25874  iitem(idav)=1
25875  dav1(idav,1)=ylg*10.
25876  dav1(idav,2)=ye0*100.
25877  davtot=davtot+ylg
25878  dav1(idav,24)=davtot*10.
25879  dav1(idav,40)=fh
25880  IF(iprf.EQ.1) then
25881  prlab(iprf)='START '
25882  CALL stapl(dav1(idav,24))
25883  endif
25884  iarg=1
25885  call cdg(iarg)
25886  enold=cog(1)
25887  encog=enold
25888  gcog=enold/xmat
25889  bcog=sqrt(1.-1./(gcog*gcog))
25890  tcog=cog(3)
25891  IF(shift) THEN
25892 ! --- the reference particle and the cog are independent
25893  beref=vref/vl
25894  gamref=1./sqrt(1.-(beref*beref))
25895  enref=xmat*gamref
25896  trefdg=tref*fh*180./pi
25897  dav1(idav,3)=1.
25898  ELSE
25899 ! --- the reference particle and the cog are coinciding
25900  beref=bcog
25901  vref=bcog*vl
25902  tref=tcog
25903  gamref=gcog
25904  enref=cog(1)
25905  dav1(idav,3)=0.
25906  ENDIF
25907  if(dav1(idav,3).eq.1.) write(16,*)
25908  * ' ****reference and cog evolve independently'
25909  if(dav1(idav,3).eq.0.) write(16,*)
25910  * ' **** the reference is the cog '
25911  WRITE(16,178)
25912 178 FORMAT(/,' Dynamics at the input',/,
25913  2 5x,' BETA GAMMA ENERGY(MeV) ',
25914  3 ' TOF(deg) TOF(sec)')
25915  WRITE(16,1788) bcog,gcog,encog-xmat,tcog*fh*180./pi,tcog
25916 1788 FORMAT(' COG ',f7.5,3x,e12.5,1x,e12.5,3x,e12.5,3x,e12.5)
25917  enrprin=enref-xmat
25918  WRITE(16,165) beref,gamref,enrprin,tref*fh*180./pi,tref
25919 165 FORMAT(' REF ',f7.5,3x,e12.5,1x,e12.5,3x,e12.5,3x,e12.5)
25920  iprint=0
25921  call statis
25922  xk1=fh/vref
25923 ! --- transit time factors TK and SK based on the velocity at the entrance
25924  tk=tta0(beref)/2. * ffield
25925  sk=tsb0(beref)/2. * ffield
25926 ! --- prediction of PCREST (phase of RF giving the maximum of energy gain in the cavity)
25927  pcrest=atan(-sk/tk)
25928  ddwc=aqst*(tk*cos(pcrest)-sk*sin(pcrest))
25929  IF(ddwc.LT.0.) pcrest=pcrest+pi
25930 ! --- first correction of pcrest based on an average beta
25931  call phcrest(pcrest,ylg,ncell,zcrest)
25932 ! avbet: average value of beta
25933  avbet=fh/(zcrest*vl)
25934  tk=tta0(avbet)/2. * ffield
25935  sk=tsb0(avbet)/2. * ffield
25936  pcrest=atan(-sk/tk)
25937  ddwc=aqst*(tk*cos(pcrest)-sk*sin(pcrest))
25938  IF(ddwc.LT.0.) pcrest=pcrest+pi
25939 ! final correction of the phase crest PCREST
25940  call phcrest1(pcrest,ylg,ncell,dwmx)
25941 ! phase at the entrance of the cavity
25942  dphase=dphase*pi/180.
25943  phi0=pcrest+dphase+ttvol
25944 ! --- compute energy and TOF of reference
25945 ! ******************************************
25946  call dwref(phi0,gams,ts)
25947 ! ********************************************
25948  enrs=gams*xmat
25949  ddw=enrs-enref
25950  if(t3d) then
25951  do klm=1,ncel
25952 
25953  trphase=tr3ph(klm)
25954  tre0tl=t0tr3d(klm)/aqst
25955 !c split cell into drif-gap-drift
25956 !c debugging to be done: include q/m !! !! protons assumed for now
25957  kt3t=kt3t+1
25958 ! drift
25959  write(tif,6001) kt3t,kt3t,10.*fldctr(klm)
25960 6001 format(' nt(',i4,')= 1, a(1,',i4,')=',f12.6)
25961  trace3t(kt3t)=tif
25962 !
25963  kt3t=kt3t+1
25964 ! gap
25965  write(tif,6005) kt3t,kt3t,tre0tl,trphase,fid
25966 6005 format(' nt(',i4,')=10, a(1,',i4,')=',f9.5,' , ',f9.2,
25967  & ', 0., 1.,',f5.3,',')
25968  trace3t(kt3t)=tif
25969 !
25970  kt3t=kt3t+1
25971 ! drift
25972  write(tif,6001) kt3t,kt3t,10.*zend(klm)
25973  trace3t(kt3t)=tif
25974  enddo
25975  endif
25976 ! end trace3d drift-gap-drift
25977 !
25978  trefs=ts+tref
25979  bets=sqrt(gams*gams-1.)/gams
25980 !old bets=b5
25981  tredg=fh*trefs *180./pi
25982 ! dynamic of the bunch
25983  call bcnum(phi0,ylg,ncell)
25984 ! ----- window control
25985  gcg=0.
25986  do i=1,ngood
25987  gcg=gcg+f(7,i)/xmat
25988  enddo
25989  gcg=gcg/float(ngood)
25990  bcg=sqrt(1.-1./(gcg*gcg))
25991  wcg=(gcg-1.)*xmat
25992  call cogetc
25993 !omment twind=0.
25994  do i=1,ngood
25995  gpai=f(7,i)/xmat
25996  if(gpai.lt.1.) gpai=1.
25997  bpai=sqrt(1.-1./(gpai*gpai))
25998  fd(i)=bpai/bcg * gpai/gcg
25999 !omment twind=twind+f(6,i)
26000  enddo
26001 !omment twind=twind/float(ngood)
26002 ! ---- window control
26003  tref=trefs
26004  vref=bets*vl
26005  prtlab='CAVNUM '
26006  call reject(ilost,prtlab)
26007 ! Reshuffles f(i,j) array after window (now done in 'reject')
26008 ! call shuffle
26009  write(16,*) ' PARAMETERS RELATING TO THE REFERENCE PARTICLE '
26010  write(16,*) '***********************************************'
26011  write(16,*) ' ENERGY GAIN(MeV) ',ddw,' TOF ',tredg,' DEG'
26012  write(16,*) ' PHASE OF RF AT ENTRANCE(DG) ',phi0*180./pi
26013  write(16,*) ' CREST PHASE OF RF (DEG) ',pcrest*180./pi
26014  iarg=1
26015  call cdg(iarg)
26016  encog=cog(1)
26017  gcog=encog/xmat
26018  bcog=sqrt(1.-1./(gcog*gcog))
26019  tcog=cog(3)
26020  CALL ext2d(1)
26021  if(itvol) then
26022  dav1(idav,38)=dphete
26023  dav1(idav,39)=dphase*180./pi
26024  else
26025  dav1(idav,38)=dphete
26026  endif
26027  WRITE(16,3777)
26028 3777 FORMAT(/,' Dynamics at the output',/,
26029  1 5x,' BETA dW(MeV) ENERGY(MeV) ',
26030  2 ' TOF(deg) TOF(sec)')
26031  engain=encog-enold
26032  WRITE(16,3473) bets,ddw,enrs-xmat,fh*trefs *180./pi,trefs
26033 3473 FORMAT(' REF ',f7.5,3x,f10.6,3x,e12.5,3x,e12.5,3x,e12.5)
26034  WRITE(16,1789) bcog,engain,encog-xmat,tcog*fh*180./pi,tcog
26035 1789 FORMAT(' COG ',f7.5,3x,f10.6,3x,e12.5,3x,e12.5,3x,e12.5)
26036  testca=exten(1)*exten(2)*exten(3)
26037 ! epsil=1.E-20
26038  epsil=1.e-40
26039  IF(abs(testca).gt.epsil) THEN
26040  qdisp=2.*sqrt(exten(1))
26041  qmd=exten(1)*exten(3)-exten(2)**2
26042  sqmdv=4.*pi*sqrt(qmd)
26043  surm=4.*pi*sqrt(qmd)*180./pi
26044  qdp=2.*sqrt(exten(3))
26045  cor12=exten(2)/sqrt(exten(1)*exten(3))
26046  qdpde=qdp*180./pi
26047  ELSE
26048  qdisp=0.
26049  qmd=0.
26050  sqmdv=0.
26051  surm=0.
26052  qdp=0.
26053  cor12=0.
26054  pent12=0.
26055  pent21=0.
26056  qdpde=0.
26057  ENDIF
26058  trqtx=exten(4)*exten(5)-exten(8)**2
26059  trqpy=exten(6)*exten(7)-exten(9)**2
26060  qditax=2.*sqrt(exten(4))
26061  qdiant=2.*sqrt(exten(5))
26062  qditay=2.*sqrt(exten(6))
26063  qdianp=2.*sqrt(exten(7))
26064  surxth=4.*pi*sqrt(trqtx)
26065  suryph=4.*pi*sqrt(trqpy)
26066  IF(shift) THEN
26067  vref=bets*vl
26068  tref=trefs
26069  ELSE
26070  vref=bcog*vl
26071  tref=tcog
26072  ENDIF
26073  if(itvol) ttvols=tref
26074  call statis
26075 ! ENVEL
26076  prlab(iprf)='CAVNUM '
26077  CALL stapl(dav1(idav,24))
26078  dav1(idav,16)=bcog*surxth*10./(pi*sqrt(1.-bcog*bcog))
26079  dav1(idav,21)=bcog*suryph*10./(pi*sqrt(1.-bcog*bcog))
26080  dav1(idav,25)=nrres
26081  dav1(idav,30)=ngood
26082 !
26083 ! print to the file: 'dynac.dmp':
26084 ! gap number, phase offset(deg), relativistic beta, energy(MeV), horz. emit.(mm*mrd,norm), vert. emit.(mm*mrd,norm),long. emit(keV*sec)
26085 !
26086 ! --- dav1(idav,16): Emittance(norm) x-xp (mm*mrad)
26087 ! --- dav1(idav,21): Emittance(norm) y-yp (mm*mrad)
26088  emns=1.e12*sqmdv/(pi*fh)
26089  trfprt=fh*tref*180./pi
26090  tcgprt=fh*tcog*180./pi
26091 ! cavity number, z (m), transmission (%), synchronous phase (deg), time of flight (deg) (within 180 deg and 180 deg),
26092 ! COG relativistic beta (@ output), COG output energy (MeV), REF relativistic beta (@ output), REF output energy (MeV),
26093 ! horizontal emittance (mm.mrad, RMS normalized), vertical emittance (mm.mrad, RMS normalized),
26094 ! longitudinal emittance (RMS, ns.keV)
26095  trnsms=100.*float(ngood)/float(imax)
26096  if(ncavnm.eq.1) write(50,*) '# cavnum.dmp'
26097  if(ncavnm.eq.1) write(50,*) '# cav Z trans ',
26098  * 'PHIs TOF(COG) COG Wcog TOF(REF) ',
26099  * ' REF Wref Ex,RMS,n Ey,RMS,n ',
26100  * 'El,RMS dWref EffVolt'
26101  if(ncavnm.eq.1) write(50,*) '# # (m) (%) ',
26102  * '(deg) (deg) beta (MeV) (deg) ',
26103  * ' beta (MeV) (mm.mrad) (mm.mrad) ',
26104  * '(ns.keV) (MeV) (MV)'
26105  write(50,7023) nrres,0.001*dav1(idav,24),trnsms,dphete,
26106  * tcgprt,bcog,encog-xmat,trfprt,bets,enrs-xmat,
26107  * 0.25*dav1(idav,16),0.25*dav1(idav,21),0.25*emns,ddw,dwmx
26108 7023 format(1x,i4,1x,e12.5,1x,f6.2,1x,f7.2,1x,
26109  * 2(e14.7,1x,f7.5,1x,e14.7,1x),5(e12.5,1x))
26110  fh=oldfh
26111 ! new magnetic rigidity of the reference
26112  gref=1./sqrt(1.-bets*bets)
26113  xmor=xmat*bets*gref
26114  boro=33.356*xmor*1.e-01/aqst
26115  WRITE(16,*) ilost,' particles lost in cavity ',nrres
26116  call emiprt(0)
26117  return
26118  end
26119 
26124  SUBROUTINE phcrest(phi0,ylg,ncell,zcrest)
26125  implicit real(8) (a-h,o-z)
26126  common/cavnum1/xnh,xpas,fmult,npt
26127  common/cavnum2/b0,b1,b2,b3,b4,b5
26128  common/cavnum3/bgt0,bgt1,bgt2,bgt3,bgt4,bgt5
26129  common/cavnum5/tspl0,tspl1,tspl2,tspl3,tspl4,tspl5
26130  common/consta/vl,pi,xmat,rpel,qst
26131  common/spl/xspl(4000),yspl(4000),s(5000),p(5000),q(5000)
26132  common/ttfc/tk,t1k,t2k,sk,s1k,s2k,fh
26133  common/dyn/tref,vref
26134 ! ylg(cm) length of cavity, xpas(cm): step length
26135 ! 8 steps over a cell
26136  npas=ncell*10
26137  xpas=ylg/float(npas)
26138  e0=xmat
26139  b0=vref/vl
26140  b1=b0
26141  b2=b0
26142  b3=b0
26143  b4=b0
26144  b5=b0
26145  t0=0.
26146  gam0=1./sqrt(1.-b0*b0)
26147  xnh=0.
26148  estop=xpas/10.
26149  DO
26150  xpat=xnh*xpas
26151  if(xpat.lt.(ylg-estop)) then
26152  call fposb
26153 ! --- enegy gain over the step
26154 ! predictor of energy gain
26155  b1=b0
26156  b2=b0
26157  b3=b0
26158  b4=b0
26159  b5=b0
26160  dgam=xi1(phi0,t0,t5)*qst/e0
26161  gam5=gam0+dgam
26162 ! corrector of energy gain
26163  xpas2=xpas*xpas
26164  dgdz=qst/e0 * tspl0
26165  d2gdz2=dgam/xpas2-dgdz/xpas
26166  d2gdz2=2.*d2gdz2
26167  gam1=gam0+dgdz*xpas/5.+d2gdz2*xpas2/50.
26168  gam2=gam0+dgdz*xpas*2./5.+d2gdz2*xpas2*4./50.
26169  gam3=gam0+dgdz*xpas*3./5.+d2gdz2*xpas2*9./50.
26170  gam4=gam0+dgdz*xpas*4./5.+d2gdz2*xpas2*16./50.
26171  b1=sqrt(gam1*gam1-1.)/gam1
26172  b2=sqrt(gam2*gam2-1.)/gam2
26173  b3=sqrt(gam3*gam3-1.)/gam3
26174  b4=sqrt(gam4*gam4-1.)/gam4
26175  b5=sqrt(gam5*gam5-1.)/gam5
26176  dgam=xi1(phi0,t0,t5)*qst/e0
26177  gam5=gam0+dgam
26178  b5=sqrt(gam5*gam5-1.)/gam5
26179  b0=b5
26180  t0=t5
26181  gam0=gam5
26182  xnh=xnh+1.
26183  else
26184  exit
26185  endif
26186  ENDDO
26187 ! compute an average k: zcrest
26188  zcrest=fh*t5/ylg
26189  return
26190  end
26191 
26196  SUBROUTINE phcrest1(phi0,ylg,ncell,dwmx)
26197  implicit real(8) (a-h,o-z)
26198  common/cavnum1/xnh,xpas,fmult,npt
26199  common/cavnum2/b0,b1,b2,b3,b4,b5
26200  common/cavnum3/bgt0,bgt1,bgt2,bgt3,bgt4,bgt5
26201  common/cavnum5/tspl0,tspl1,tspl2,tspl3,tspl4,tspl5
26202  common/consta/vl,pi,xmat,rpel,qst
26203  common/spl/xspl(4000),yspl(4000),s(5000),p(5000),q(5000)
26204  common/ttfc/tk,t1k,t2k,sk,s1k,s2k,fh
26205  common/dyn/tref,vref
26206  dimension stx(400),sty(400),sts(400),stp(400),stq(400)
26207  dimension phc(100),wph(100)
26208 ! ylg(cm) length of cavity, xpas(cm): step length
26209  npas=ncell*10
26210  xpas=ylg/float(npas)
26211  e0=xmat
26212  rad=pi/180.
26213  dph=rad
26214  dph1=rad
26215  dplim=rad*0.01
26216  pmax=phi0+10.*rad
26217  pmin=phi0-10.*rad
26218  ibcl=1
26219  phi=pmin
26220 !30 continue
26221  DO
26222  if(phi.ge.pmax) EXIT
26223  phc(ibcl)=phi
26224  b0=vref/vl
26225  b1=b0
26226  b2=b0
26227  b3=b0
26228  b4=b0
26229  b5=b0
26230  t0=0.
26231  gam0=1./sqrt(1.-b0*b0)
26232  wwref=(gam0-1.)*e0
26233  xnh=0.
26234  DO
26235  if(xnh*xpas.ge.ylg) EXIT
26236  call fposb
26237 ! --- energy gain over the step
26238 ! predictor of energy gain
26239  b1=b0
26240  b2=b0
26241  b3=b0
26242  b4=b0
26243  b5=b0
26244  dgam=xi1(phi,t0,t5)*qst/e0
26245  gam5=gam0+dgam
26246 ! corrector
26247  xpas2=xpas*xpas
26248  dgdz=qst/e0 * tspl0
26249  d2gdz2=dgam/(xpas2)-dgdz/xpas
26250  d2gdz2=2.*d2gdz2
26251  gam1=gam0+dgdz*xpas/5.+d2gdz2*xpas2/50.
26252  gam2=gam0+dgdz*xpas*2./5.+d2gdz2*xpas2*4./50.
26253  gam3=gam0+dgdz*xpas*3./5.+d2gdz2*xpas2*9./50.
26254  gam4=gam0+dgdz*xpas*4./5.+d2gdz2*xpas2*16./50.
26255  b1=sqrt(gam1*gam1-1.)/gam1
26256  b2=sqrt(gam2*gam2-1.)/gam2
26257  b3=sqrt(gam3*gam3-1.)/gam3
26258  b4=sqrt(gam4*gam4-1.)/gam4
26259  b5=sqrt(gam5*gam5-1.)/gam5
26260  dgam=xi1(phi,t0,t5)*qst/e0
26261  gam5=gam0+dgam
26262  b5=sqrt(gam5*gam5-1.)/gam5
26263  b0=b5
26264  t0=t5
26265  gam0=gam5
26266  xnh=xnh+1.
26267  ENDDO
26268  wwpcr=(gam0-1.)*e0
26269  dwcpr=wwpcr-wwref
26270  wph(ibcl)=dwcpr
26271  phi=phi+dph
26272  ibcl=ibcl+1
26273  ENDDO
26274  ibcl=ibcl-1
26275 ! save spline areas (partial save)
26276  do i=1,400
26277  stx(i)=xspl(i)
26278  sty(i)=yspl(i)
26279  sts(i)=s(i)
26280  stp(i)=p(i)
26281  stq(i)=q(i)
26282  enddo
26283 ! padding spline areas
26284  dwmx=wph(1)
26285  do i=1,ibcl
26286  xspl(i)=phc(i)
26287  yspl(i)=wph(i)
26288  if(wph(i).gt.dwmx)dwmx=wph(i)
26289  enddo
26290  call deriv2(ibcl)
26291  i=1
26292  phi=xspl(1)
26293  yfb=slope(ibcl,phi)/100.
26294  DO
26295  if(phi.ge.xspl(ibcl)) EXIT
26296  if(dph1.le.dplim) EXIT
26297  yf=slope(ibcl,phi)
26298  if(yf.gt.0.) then
26299  phi=phi+dph1
26300  else
26301  phi=phi-dph1
26302  dph1=dph1/2.
26303  phi=phi+dph1
26304  endif
26305  ENDDO
26306  phi0=phi
26307 ! restore spline areas (partial save)
26308  do i=1,400
26309  xspl(i)=stx(i)
26310  yspl(i)=sty(i)
26311  s(i)=sts(i)
26312  p(i)=stp(i)
26313  q(i)=stq(i)
26314  enddo
26315  return
26316  end
26317 
26323  SUBROUTINE dwref(phi0,gam5,t5)
26324  implicit real(8) (a-h,o-z)
26325  common/cavnum1/xnh,xpas,fmult,npt
26326  common/cavnum2/b0,b1,b2,b3,b4,b5
26327  common/cavnum5/tspl0,tspl1,tspl2,tspl3,tspl4,tspl5
26328  common/cavnum7/sspl0,sspl1,sspl2,sspl3,sspl4,sspl5
26329  common/consta/vl,pi,xmat,rpel,qst
26330  common/spl/xspl(4000),yspl(4000),s(5000),p(5000),q(5000)
26331  common/ttfc/tk,t1k,t2k,sk,s1k,s2k,fh
26332  common/dyn/tref,vref
26333  common/cell/yf(10000),xf(10000),xlim(15),flength,fhc,att,
26334  * npoint(15),ncell
26335  common/step/istep
26336  common/compt/nrres,nrtre,nrbunc,nrdbun
26337  common/kcell/avrg(15)
26338  common/xitrd3/bcour1(15),bcour2(15),tr3dw(15),tr3ph(15),
26339  * t0tr3d(15)
26340  common/sphi/tcour1(15),tcour2(15)
26341  common/t3dfld/fldctr(15),zend(15),t3d
26342  logical T3D
26343 ! save previous xpas
26344  xpcel=xpas
26345  xlpos=0.
26346  isce=20
26347  xlcum=0.
26348  b0=vref/vl
26349  b1=b0
26350  b2=b0
26351  b3=b0
26352  b4=b0
26353  b5=b0
26354  t0=0.
26355 ! xlcel (cm): length of current cell
26356 ! xlim(inc) cm: limits of current cell
26357 ! isce: step number in cell (forced isce = 20)
26358 ! wdgam: energy gain over the cell
26359 ! **************************************
26360  do inc=1,ncell
26361  bcour1(inc)=b0
26362  tcour1(inc)=t0
26363  wdgams=0.
26364  xnh=0.
26365  xlcel=xlim(inc+1)-xlim(inc)
26366  xlpos=xlpos+xlcel
26367  xpas=xlcel/float(isce)
26368  e0=xmat
26369  xnhc=0
26370  gam0=1./sqrt(1.-b0*b0)
26371  estop=xpas/10.
26372  istop=0
26373  DO
26374  xpat=xnhc*xpas
26375  if(xpat.ge.(xlcel-estop)) EXIT
26376  call fposbb(xlcum)
26377 ! --- energy gain over the step
26378  b1=b0
26379  b2=b0
26380  b3=b0
26381  b4=b0
26382  b5=b0
26383 ! predictor
26384  dgam=xi1(phi0,t0,t5)*qst/e0
26385  gam5=gam0+dgam
26386 ! corrector
26387  xpas2=xpas*xpas
26388  dgdz=qst/e0 * tspl0
26389  d2gdz2=dgam/xpas2-dgdz/xpas
26390  d2gdz2=2.*d2gdz2
26391  gam1=gam0+dgdz*xpas/5.+d2gdz2*xpas2/50.
26392  gam2=gam0+dgdz*xpas*2./5.+d2gdz2*xpas2*4./50.
26393  gam3=gam0+dgdz*xpas*3./5.+d2gdz2*xpas2*9./50.
26394  gam4=gam0+dgdz*xpas*4./5.+d2gdz2*xpas2*16./50.
26395  b1=sqrt(gam1*gam1-1.)/gam1
26396  b2=sqrt(gam2*gam2-1.)/gam2
26397  b3=sqrt(gam3*gam3-1.)/gam3
26398  b4=sqrt(gam4*gam4-1.)/gam4
26399  b5=sqrt(gam5*gam5-1.)/gam5
26400  dgam=xi1(phi0,t0,t5)*qst/e0
26401  gam5=gam0+dgam
26402  eww=xmat*(gam5-1.)
26403  wdgam=xmat*dgam
26404  wdgams=wdgams+wdgam
26405  b5=sqrt(gam5*gam5-1.)/gam5
26406  b0=b5
26407  t0=t5
26408  gam0=gam5
26409  xnh=xnh+1.
26410  xnhc=xnhc+1.
26411  ENDDO
26412  tcour2(inc)=t5
26413  xlcum=xlcum+xlcel
26414  ttvol=t5*fh*180./pi
26415  ttphi=ttvol+tref*fh*180/pi
26416  bcour2(inc)=b5
26417  tr3dw(inc)=wdgams
26418 ! ************************************************
26419  write(13,101) nrres,inc,xlim(inc),xlim(inc+1),
26420  * xlcel,eww,wdgams,ttvol,ttphi,avrg(inc)
26421 101 format(2(2x,i4),8(2x,e12.5))
26422  fldctr(inc)=avrg(inc)-xlim(inc)
26423  zend(inc)=xlcel-fldctr(inc)
26424  enddo
26425  call itrd3
26426 ! restore xpas
26427  xpas=xpcel
26428  return
26429  end
26430 
26433  SUBROUTINE itrd3
26434  implicit real(8) (a-h,o-z)
26435  common/cell/yf(10000),xf(10000),xlim(15),flength,fhc,att,
26436  * npoint(15),ncell
26437  common/consta/vl,pi,xmat,rpel,qst
26438  common/xitrd3/bcour1(15),bcour2(15),tr3dw(15),tr3ph(15),
26439  * t0tr3d(15)
26440  common/cavnum1/xnh,xpas,ffield,npt
26441  common/sphi/tcour1(15),tcour2(15)
26442  common/kcell/avrg(15)
26443  common/ttfc/tk,t1k,t2k,sk,s1k,s2k,fh
26444  dimension ttr3d(15),str3d(15)
26445  do nrc=1,ncell
26446  bcour=(bcour1(nrc)+bcour2(nrc))/2.
26447  ttr3d(nrc)=ta0(bcour,nrc)
26448  enddo
26449  do nrc=1,ncell
26450  bcour=(bcour1(nrc)+bcour2(nrc))/2.
26451  str3d(nrc)=sb0(bcour,nrc)
26452  enddo
26453  do nrc=1,ncell
26454  t0tr3d(nrc)=qst*sqrt(ttr3d(nrc)**2+str3d(nrc)**2)*ffield/2.
26455  atr3d=0.
26456  tt=tr3dw(nrc)/t0tr3d(nrc)
26457  tph=atan(-str3d(nrc)/ttr3d(nrc))
26458  if(tt.lt.1.) atr3d=acos(tt)
26459  ddw=ttr3d(nrc)*cos(tph)-str3d(nrc)*sin(tph)
26460  if(ddw.lt.0.) then
26461  tph=tph+pi
26462  endif
26463 ! if(tph.ge.pcrest) atr3d=-atr3d
26464  drift1=avrg(nrc)-xlim(nrc)
26465  drift2=xlim(nrc+1)-avrg(nrc)
26466  xsign1=tcour2(nrc)-tcour1(nrc)
26467  xsing=xsign1-(drift1/bcour1(nrc)+drift2/bcour2(nrc))/vl
26468  if(xsing.gt.0.) atr3d=-atr3d
26469  tr3ph(nrc)=atr3d*180./pi
26470  write(13,100)nrc,t0tr3d(nrc),ttr3d(nrc),str3d(nrc),tr3dw(nrc)
26471  * ,atr3d*180./pi,tph*180./pi
26472 100 format(2x,i4,6(2x,e12.5))
26473  enddo
26474  return
26475  end
26476 
26481  SUBROUTINE fposbbb(xlcum,fposs,jx)
26482  implicit real(8) (a-h,o-z)
26483  common/cavnum1/xnh,xpas,fmult,npt
26484  common/cavnum5/tspl0,tspl1,tspl2,tspl3,tspl4,tspl5
26485  common/cavnum6/fpos0,fpos1,fpos2,fpos3,fpos4,fpos5
26486  common/spl/xspl(4000),yspl(4000),s(5000),p(5000),q(5000)
26487  common/rfield/ifield
26488  common/xposi/xpost(10),xlce(2),xpax(2),iscx(2)
26489  logical ifield
26490  if(fposs.eq.0.) then
26491  fpos0=xnh*xpas+xlcum+fposs
26492  fpos1=(xnh+0.20)*xpas+xlcum+fposs
26493  fpos2=(xnh+0.40)*xpas+xlcum+fposs
26494  fpos3=(xnh+0.60)*xpas+xlcum+fposs
26495  fpos4=(xnh+0.80)*xpas+xlcum+fposs
26496  fpos5=(xnh+1.0)*xpas+xlcum+fposs
26497  else
26498  fpos0=xnh*xpas+fposs
26499  fpos1=(xnh+0.20)*xpas+fposs
26500  fpos2=(xnh+0.40)*xpas+fposs
26501  fpos3=(xnh+0.60)*xpas+fposs
26502  fpos4=(xnh+0.80)*xpas+fposs
26503  fpos5=(xnh+1.0)*xpas+fposs
26504  endif
26505  if(jx.eq.1)then
26506  xnh1=xnh+1
26507  if(xnh1.eq.float(iscx(jx))) fposs=fpos5
26508  endif
26509  if(ifield) then
26510 ! --- the field is read from disk in MV/cm
26511  tspl0=spline(npt,fpos0)*fmult
26512  tspl1=spline(npt,fpos1)*fmult
26513  tspl2=spline(npt,fpos2)*fmult
26514  tspl3=spline(npt,fpos3)*fmult
26515  tspl4=spline(npt,fpos4)*fmult
26516  tspl5=spline(npt,fpos5)*fmult
26517 ! ****TEST
26518 !cc write(13,*) 'xnh fpos tspl '
26519 ! write(13,700) xnh,fpos0,tspl0,xpas,fposs
26520 ! write(13,700) xnh,fpos1,tspl1
26521 ! write(13,700) xnh,fpos2,tspl2
26522 ! write(13,700) xnh,fpos3,tspl3
26523 ! write(13,700) xnh,fpos4,tspl4
26524 ! write(13,700) xnh,fpos5,tspl5,xpas,fposs
26525 !700 format(5(2x,e12.5))
26526 ! ***********************************
26527  else
26528 ! ++++ THIS OPTION IS NOT AVAILABLE IN THE CODE +++++++++++++
26529 ! the field (MV/cm) is given in the form of a Fourier series
26530  tspl0=fone(fpos0)*fmult
26531  tspl1=fone(fpos1)*fmult
26532  tspl2=fone(fpos2)*fmult
26533  tspl3=fone(fpos3)*fmult
26534  tspl4=fone(fpos4)*fmult
26535  tspl5=fone(fpos5)*fmult
26536 ! ****TEST
26537 !old write(6,*) 'xnh fmult ',xnh,fmult
26538 !c write(70,700) fpos0,tspl0
26539 !c write(70,700) fpos1,tspl1
26540 !c write(70,700) fpos2,tspl2
26541 !c write(70,700) fpos3,tspl3
26542 !c write(70,700) fpos4,tspl4
26543 !old write(70,700) fpos5,tspl5
26544 ! ***********************************
26545  endif
26546  return
26547  end
26548 
26553  SUBROUTINE fposbb(xlcum)
26554  implicit real(8) (a-h,o-z)
26555  common/cavnum1/xnh,xpas,fmult,npt
26556  common/cavnum5/tspl0,tspl1,tspl2,tspl3,tspl4,tspl5
26557  common/cavnum6/fpos0,fpos1,fpos2,fpos3,fpos4,fpos5
26558  common/spl/xspl(4000),yspl(4000),s(5000),p(5000),q(5000)
26559  common/rfield/ifield
26560  logical ifield
26561 ! *******************************************
26562  fpos0=xnh*xpas+xlcum
26563  fpos1=(xnh+0.20)*xpas+xlcum
26564  fpos2=(xnh+0.40)*xpas+xlcum
26565  fpos3=(xnh+0.60)*xpas+xlcum
26566  fpos4=(xnh+0.80)*xpas+xlcum
26567  fpos5=(xnh+1.0)*xpas+xlcum
26568  if(ifield) then
26569 ! --- the field is read from disk in MV/cm
26570  tspl0=spline(npt,fpos0)*fmult
26571  tspl1=spline(npt,fpos1)*fmult
26572  tspl2=spline(npt,fpos2)*fmult
26573  tspl3=spline(npt,fpos3)*fmult
26574  tspl4=spline(npt,fpos4)*fmult
26575  tspl5=spline(npt,fpos5)*fmult
26576 ! ****TEST
26577 !cc write(13,*) 'xnh fpos tspl '
26578 !c write(13,700) xnh,fpos0,tspl0,xpas
26579 ! write(13,700) xnh,fpos1,tspl1
26580 ! write(13,700) xnh,fpos2,tspl2
26581 ! write(13,700) xnh,fpos3,tspl3
26582 ! write(13,700) xnh,fpos4,tspl4
26583 ! write(13,700) xnh,fpos5,tspl5,xpas
26584 !700 format(4(2x,e12.5))
26585 ! ***********************************
26586  else
26587 ! the field (MV/cm) is given in the form of a Fourier series
26588  tspl0=fone(fpos0)*fmult
26589  tspl1=fone(fpos1)*fmult
26590  tspl2=fone(fpos2)*fmult
26591  tspl3=fone(fpos3)*fmult
26592  tspl4=fone(fpos4)*fmult
26593  tspl5=fone(fpos5)*fmult
26594 ! ****TEST
26595 !old write(6,*) 'xnh fmult ',xnh,fmult
26596 !c write(70,700) fpos0,tspl0
26597 !c write(70,700) fpos1,tspl1
26598 !c write(70,700) fpos2,tspl2
26599 !c write(70,700) fpos3,tspl3
26600 !c write(70,700) fpos4,tspl4
26601 !old write(70,700) fpos5,tspl5
26602 ! ***********************************
26603  endif
26604  return
26605  end
26606 
26610  SUBROUTINE fposb
26611  implicit real(8) (a-h,o-z)
26612  common/cavnum1/xnh,xpas,fmult,npt
26613  common/cavnum5/tspl0,tspl1,tspl2,tspl3,tspl4,tspl5
26614  common/cavnum6/fpos0,fpos1,fpos2,fpos3,fpos4,fpos5
26615  common/spl/xspl(4000),yspl(4000),s(5000),p(5000),q(5000)
26616  common/rfield/ifield
26617  logical ifield
26618  fpos0=xnh*xpas
26619  fpos1=(xnh+0.20)*xpas
26620  fpos2=(xnh+0.40)*xpas
26621  fpos3=(xnh+0.60)*xpas
26622  fpos4=(xnh+0.80)*xpas
26623  fpos5=(xnh+1.0)*xpas
26624  if(ifield) then
26625 ! --- the field is read from disk in MV/cm
26626  tspl0=spline(npt,fpos0)*fmult
26627  tspl1=spline(npt,fpos1)*fmult
26628  tspl2=spline(npt,fpos2)*fmult
26629  tspl3=spline(npt,fpos3)*fmult
26630  tspl4=spline(npt,fpos4)*fmult
26631  tspl5=spline(npt,fpos5)*fmult
26632 ! ****TEST
26633 !old write(6,*) 'xnh fmult ',xnh,fmult
26634 !c write(13,700) xnh,fpos0,tspl0
26635 !c write(13,700) xnh,fpos1,tspl1
26636 !c write(13,700) xnh,fpos2,tspl2
26637 !c write(13,700) xnh,fpos3,tspl3
26638 !c write(13,700) xnh,fpos4,tspl4
26639 !c write(13,700) xnh,fpos5,tspl5
26640 !c700 format(3(2x,e12.5))
26641 ! ***********************************
26642  else
26643 ! the field (MV/cm) is given in the form of a Fourier series
26644  tspl0=fone(fpos0)*fmult
26645  tspl1=fone(fpos1)*fmult
26646  tspl2=fone(fpos2)*fmult
26647  tspl3=fone(fpos3)*fmult
26648  tspl4=fone(fpos4)*fmult
26649  tspl5=fone(fpos5)*fmult
26650 ! ****TEST
26651 !old write(6,*) 'xnh fmult ',xnh,fmult
26652 !c write(70,700) fpos0,tspl0
26653 !c write(70,700) fpos1,tspl1
26654 !c write(70,700) fpos2,tspl2
26655 !c write(70,700) fpos3,tspl3
26656 !c write(70,700) fpos4,tspl4
26657 !old write(70,700) fpos5,tspl5
26658 ! ***********************************
26659  endif
26660  return
26661  end
26662 
26667  SUBROUTINE sposb
26668  implicit real(8) (a-h,o-z)
26669  common/cavnum1/xnh,xpas,fmult,npt
26670  common/cavnum5/tspl0,tspl1,tspl2,tspl3,tspl4,tspl5
26671  common/cavnum6/fpos0,fpos1,fpos2,fpos3,fpos4,fpos5
26672  common/cavnum7/sspl0,sspl1,sspl2,sspl3,sspl4,sspl5
26673  common/spl/xspl(4000),yspl(4000),s(5000),p(5000),q(5000)
26674  common/rfield/ifield
26675  logical ifield
26676  fpos0=xnh*xpas
26677  fpos1=(xnh+0.20)*xpas
26678  fpos2=(xnh+0.40)*xpas
26679  fpos3=(xnh+0.60)*xpas
26680  fpos4=(xnh+0.80)*xpas
26681  fpos5=(xnh+1.0)*xpas
26682  if(ifield) then
26683 ! --- the field is read from disk in MV/cm
26684  sspl0=slope(npt,fpos0)*fmult
26685  sspl1=slope(npt,fpos1)*fmult
26686  sspl2=slope(npt,fpos2)*fmult
26687  sspl3=slope(npt,fpos3)*fmult
26688  sspl4=slope(npt,fpos4)*fmult
26689  sspl5=slope(npt,fpos5)*fmult
26690 ! ****TEST
26691 !old write(6,*) 'xnh fmult ',xnh,fmult
26692 !cc write(13,700) xnh,fpos0,sspl0
26693 !cc write(13,700) xnh,fpos1,sspl1
26694 !cc write(13,700) xnh,fpos2,sspl2
26695 !cc write(13,700) xnh,fpos3,sspl3
26696 !cc write(13,700) xnh,fpos4,sspl4
26697 !cc write(13,700) xnh,fpos5,sspl5
26698 !cc700 format(3(2x,e12.5))
26699 ! ***********************************
26700  else
26701 ! the field (MV/cm) is given in the form of a Fourier series
26702  tspl0=fone(fpos0)*fmult
26703  tspl1=fone(fpos1)*fmult
26704  tspl2=fone(fpos2)*fmult
26705  tspl3=fone(fpos3)*fmult
26706  tspl4=fone(fpos4)*fmult
26707  tspl5=fone(fpos5)*fmult
26708 ! ****TEST
26709 !old write(6,*) 'xnh fmult ',xnh,fmult
26710 !c write(70,700) fpos0,tspl0
26711 !c write(70,700) fpos1,tspl1
26712 !c write(70,700) fpos2,tspl2
26713 !c write(70,700) fpos3,tspl3
26714 !c write(70,700) fpos4,tspl4
26715 !old write(70,700) fpos5,tspl5
26716 ! ***********************************
26717  endif
26718  return
26719  end
26720 
26724  FUNCTION xi1(phi0,t0,t5)
26725  implicit real(8) (a-h,o-z)
26726  common/cavnum1/xnh,xpas,fmult,npt
26727  common/cavnum2/b0,b1,b2,b3,b4,b5
26728  common/cavnum5/tspl0,tspl1,tspl2,tspl3,tspl4,tspl5
26729  common/consta/vl,pi,xmat,rpel,qst
26730  common/ttfc/tk,t1k,t2k,sk,s1k,s2k,fh
26731  xi1=0.
26732  b01=(b0+b1)/2.
26733  b12=(b1+b2)/2.
26734  b23=(b2+b3)/2.
26735  b34=(b3+b4)/2.
26736  b45=(b4+b5)/2.
26737  t1=t0+xpas/(5.*b01*vl)
26738  t2=t1+xpas/(5.*b12*vl)
26739  t3=t2+xpas/(5.*b23*vl)
26740  t4=t3+xpas/(5.*b34*vl)
26741  t5=t4+xpas/(5.*b45*vl)
26742  xspl0=cos(fh*t0+phi0)*tspl0
26743  xspl1=cos(fh*t1+phi0)*tspl1
26744  xspl2=cos(fh*t2+phi0)*tspl2
26745  xspl3=cos(fh*t3+phi0)*tspl3
26746  xspl4=cos(fh*t4+phi0)*tspl4
26747  xspl5=cos(fh*t5+phi0)*tspl5
26748  tspl=19.*xspl0+75.*xspl1+50.*xspl2+50.*xspl3+75.*xspl4
26749  * +19.*xspl5
26750  xi1=xpas/288. * tspl
26751  return
26752  end
26753 
26757  FUNCTION xi2(phi0,t0)
26758  implicit real(8) (a-h,o-z)
26759  common/cavnum1/xnh,xpas,fmult,npt
26760  common/cavnum2/b0,b1,b2,b3,b4,b5
26761  common/cavnum5/tspl0,tspl1,tspl2,tspl3,tspl4,tspl5
26762  common/consta/vl,pi,xmat,rpel,qst
26763  common/ttfc/tk,t1k,t2k,sk,s1k,s2k,fh
26764  b01=(b0+b1)/2.
26765  b12=(b1+b2)/2.
26766  b23=(b2+b3)/2.
26767  b34=(b3+b4)/2.
26768  b45=(b4+b5)/2.
26769  t1=t0+xpas/(5.*b01*vl)
26770  t2=t1+xpas/(5.*b12*vl)
26771  t3=t2+xpas/(5.*b23*vl)
26772  t4=t3+xpas/(5.*b34*vl)
26773  t5=t4+xpas/(5.*b45*vl)
26774 !old xspl0=cos(fh*t0+phi0)*tspl0
26775  xspl1=cos(fh*t1+phi0)*tspl1
26776  xspl2=cos(fh*t2+phi0)*tspl2
26777  xspl3=cos(fh*t3+phi0)*tspl3
26778  xspl4=cos(fh*t4+phi0)*tspl4
26779  xspl5=cos(fh*t5+phi0)*tspl5
26780  tspl=15.*xspl1+20.*xspl2+30.*xspl3+60*xspl4+19.*xspl5
26781  xi2=xpas*xpas/288. * tspl
26782  return
26783  end
26784 
26788  FUNCTION xj1(phi0,t0)
26789  implicit real(8) (a-h,o-z)
26790  common/cavnum1/xnh,xpas,fmult,npt
26791  common/cavnum2/b0,b1,b2,b3,b4,b5
26792  common/cavnum3/bgt0,bgt1,bgt2,bgt3,bgt4,bgt5
26793  common/cavnum5/tspl0,tspl1,tspl2,tspl3,tspl4,tspl5
26794  common/consta/vl,pi,xmat,rpel,qst
26795  common/ttfc/tk,t1k,t2k,sk,s1k,s2k,fh
26796 ! --- the field is read from the disk
26797  xj1=0.
26798  b01=(b0+b1)/2.
26799  b12=(b1+b2)/2.
26800  b23=(b2+b3)/2.
26801  b34=(b3+b4)/2.
26802  b45=(b4+b5)/2.
26803  t1=t0+xpas/(5.*b01*vl)
26804  t2=t1+xpas/(5.*b12*vl)
26805  t3=t2+xpas/(5.*b23*vl)
26806  t4=t3+xpas/(5.*b34*vl)
26807  t5=t4+xpas/(5.*b45*vl)
26808  xspl0=-fh*sin(fh*t0+phi0)*tspl0/bgt0
26809  xspl1=-fh*sin(fh*t1+phi0)*tspl1/bgt1
26810  xspl2=-fh*sin(fh*t2+phi0)*tspl2/bgt2
26811  xspl3=-fh*sin(fh*t3+phi0)*tspl3/bgt3
26812  xspl4=-fh*sin(fh*t4+phi0)*tspl4/bgt4
26813  xspl5=-fh*sin(fh*t5+phi0)*tspl5/bgt5
26814  tspl=19.*xspl0+75.*xspl1+50.*xspl2+50.*xspl3+75.*xspl4
26815  * +19.*xspl5
26816  xj1=xpas/288. * tspl
26817  return
26818  end
26819 
26823  FUNCTION xj2(phi0,t0)
26824  implicit real(8) (a-h,o-z)
26825  common/cavnum1/xnh,xpas,fmult,npt
26826  common/cavnum2/b0,b1,b2,b3,b4,b5
26827  common/cavnum3/bgt0,bgt1,bgt2,bgt3,bgt4,bgt5
26828  common/cavnum5/tspl0,tspl1,tspl2,tspl3,tspl4,tspl5
26829  common/consta/vl,pi,xmat,rpel,qst
26830  common/ttfc/tk,t1k,t2k,sk,s1k,s2k,fh
26831  xj2=0.
26832  b01=(b0+b1)/2.
26833  b12=(b1+b2)/2.
26834  b23=(b2+b3)/2.
26835  b34=(b3+b4)/2.
26836  b45=(b4+b5)/2.
26837  t1=t0+xpas/(5.*b01*vl)
26838  t2=t1+xpas/(5.*b12*vl)
26839  t3=t2+xpas/(5.*b23*vl)
26840  t4=t3+xpas/(5.*b34*vl)
26841  t5=t4+xpas/(5.*b45*vl)
26842  xspl1=-fh*sin(fh*t1+phi0)*tspl1/bgt1
26843  xspl2=-fh*sin(fh*t2+phi0)*tspl2/bgt2
26844  xspl3=-fh*sin(fh*t3+phi0)*tspl3/bgt3
26845  xspl4=-fh*sin(fh*t4+phi0)*tspl4/bgt4
26846  xspl5=-fh*sin(fh*t5+phi0)*tspl5/bgt5
26847  tspl=15.*xspl1+20.*xspl2+30.*xspl3
26848  * +60.*xspl4+19.*xspl5
26849  xj2=xpas*xpas/288. * tspl
26850  return
26851  end
26852 
26856  FUNCTION xe21(phi0,t0)
26857  implicit real(8) (a-h,o-z)
26858  common/cavnum1/xnh,xpas,fmult,npt
26859  common/cavnum2/b0,b1,b2,b3,b4,b5
26860  common/cavnum4/bge0,bge1,bge2,bge3,bge4,bge5
26861  common/cavnum5/tspl0,tspl1,tspl2,tspl3,tspl4,tspl5
26862  common/consta/vl,pi,xmat,rpel,qst
26863  common/ttfc/tk,t1k,t2k,sk,s1k,s2k,fh
26864  xe21=0.
26865  b01=(b0+b1)/2.
26866  b12=(b1+b2)/2.
26867  b23=(b2+b3)/2.
26868  b34=(b3+b4)/2.
26869  b45=(b4+b5)/2.
26870  t1=t0+xpas/(5.*b01*vl)
26871  t2=t1+xpas/(5.*b12*vl)
26872  t3=t2+xpas/(5.*b23*vl)
26873  t4=t3+xpas/(5.*b34*vl)
26874  t5=t4+xpas/(5.*b45*vl)
26875  xspl0=cos(fh*t0+phi0)*tspl0
26876  xspl1=cos(fh*t1+phi0)*tspl1
26877  xspl2=cos(fh*t2+phi0)*tspl2
26878  xspl3=cos(fh*t3+phi0)*tspl3
26879  xspl4=cos(fh*t4+phi0)*tspl4
26880  xspl5=cos(fh*t5+phi0)*tspl5
26881  xspl0=xspl0*xspl0*bge0
26882  xspl1=xspl1*xspl1*bge1
26883  xspl2=xspl2*xspl2*bge2
26884  xspl3=xspl3*xspl3*bge3
26885  xspl4=xspl4*xspl4*bge4
26886  xspl5=xspl5*xspl5*bge5
26887  tspl=19.*xspl0+75.*xspl1+50.*xspl2+50.*xspl3+75.*xspl4
26888  * +19.*xspl5
26889  xe21=xpas/288. * tspl
26890  return
26891  end
26892 
26896  FUNCTION xe22(phi0,t0)
26897  implicit real(8) (a-h,o-z)
26898  common/cavnum1/xnh,xpas,fmult,npt
26899  common/cavnum2/b0,b1,b2,b3,b4,b5
26900  common/cavnum4/bge0,bge1,bge2,bge3,bge4,bge5
26901  common/cavnum5/tspl0,tspl1,tspl2,tspl3,tspl4,tspl5
26902  common/consta/vl,pi,xmat,rpel,qst
26903  common/spl/xspl(4000),yspl(4000),s(5000),p(5000),q(5000)
26904  common/dyn/tref,vref
26905  common/ttfc/tk,t1k,t2k,sk,s1k,s2k,fh
26906  common/rfield/ifield
26907  logical ifield
26908  xe22=0.
26909  b01=(b0+b1)/2.
26910  b12=(b1+b2)/2.
26911  b23=(b2+b3)/2.
26912  b34=(b3+b4)/2.
26913  b45=(b4+b5)/2.
26914  t1=t0+xpas/(5.*b01*vl)
26915  t2=t1+xpas/(5.*b12*vl)
26916  t3=t2+xpas/(5.*b23*vl)
26917  t4=t3+xpas/(5.*b34*vl)
26918  t5=t4+xpas/(5.*b45*vl)
26919  xspl1=cos(fh*t1+phi0)*tspl1
26920  xspl2=cos(fh*t2+phi0)*tspl2
26921  xspl3=cos(fh*t3+phi0)*tspl3
26922  xspl4=cos(fh*t4+phi0)*tspl4
26923  xspl5=cos(fh*t4+phi0)*tspl5
26924  xspl1=xspl1*xspl1*bge1
26925  xspl2=xspl2*xspl2*bge2
26926  xspl3=xspl3*xspl3*bge3
26927  xspl4=xspl4*xspl4*bge4
26928  xspl5=xspl5*xspl5*bge5
26929  tspl=15.*xspl1+20.*xspl2+30.*xspl3
26930  * +60.*xspl4+19.*xspl5
26931  xe22=xpas*xpas/288. * tspl
26932  return
26933  end
26934 
26938  SUBROUTINE bcnum(phref,ylg,ncell)
26939  implicit real(8) (a-h,o-z)
26940  parameter(iptsz=100002)
26941  common/dyn/tref,vref
26942  common/sc3/beamc,scdist,sce10,cplm,ect,apl,ichaes,iscsp
26943  common/compt/nrres,nrtre,nrbunc,nrdbun
26944  common/dcspa/iesp
26945  common/ttfc/tk,t1k,t2k,sk,s1k,s2k,fh
26946  common/faisc/f(10,iptsz),imax,ngood
26947  common/consta/ vl,pi, xmat,rpel,qst
26948  common/cavnum1/xnh,xpas,fmult,npt
26949  common/cavnum2/b0,b1,b2,b3,b4,b5
26950  common/cavnum3/bgt0,bgt1,bgt2,bgt3,bgt4,bgt5
26951  common/cavnum4/bge0,bge1,bge2,bge3,bge4,bge5
26952  common/cavnum5/tspl0,tspl1,tspl2,tspl3,tspl4,tspl5
26953  common/rfield/ifield
26954  common/testref/trefs,ddw
26955  common/elec/jelec
26956  common/step/istep
26957  dimension gam(500),xe(500),xpe(500),ye(500),ype(500)
26958  dimension tcour(iptsz),phi(iptsz)
26959  logical ifield,flgsc,ichaes,iesp,jelec
26960  character*(8) PRTLAB
26961  dimension lossreason(iptsz)
26962 ! ylg(cm) length of cavity, xpas(cm): step length
26963 ! 8 steps over a cell (a voir!! !)
26964  prtlab='CAVNUM'
26965  beref=vref/vl
26966  gamref=1./sqrt(1.-(beref*beref))
26967  enref=xmat*gamref
26968  e0=xmat
26969  npas=ncell*istep
26970  xpas=ylg/float(npas)
26971  npas1=npas+1
26972  xnh=0.
26973 ! flgsc = true ---> s.c. computation
26974 ! eglsc = 2*xpas : acting length of s.c. computation
26975  eglsc=2.*xpas
26976  flgsc=.false.
26977  do i=2,npas1
26978  i1=i-1
26979 ! --- seek the field E(z) values in the 6 positions in the step length xh
26980  call fposb
26981  do j=1,ngood
26982  qc=f(9,j)
26983  gam0=f(7,j)/e0
26984  gam(i1)=gam0
26985  if(i1.eq.1) then
26986  tcour(j)=0.
26987  tof=f(6,j)
26988 ! --- rphas: phase delay between the actual particle and the reference (entrance of the cavity)
26989  rphas=fh*(tof-tref)
26990  phi(j)=phref+rphas
26991  endif
26992  t0=tcour(j)
26993  ddt=t0
26994 ! predictor (energy gain)
26995  if(gam0.le.1.) then
26996  f(8,j)=0.
26997  cycle
26998  endif
26999  b0=sqrt(gam0*gam0-1.)/gam0
27000  b1=b0
27001  b2=b0
27002  b3=b0
27003  b4=b0
27004  b5=b0
27005  dgam=xi1(phi(j),t0,t5)*qc/e0
27006  gam5=gam(i1)+dgam
27007 ! corrector (energy gain)
27008 ! tspl0 = dE/dz (MV/(cm*cm)
27009  xpas2=xpas*xpas
27010  dgdz=qst/e0 * tspl0
27011  d2gdz2=dgam/xpas2-dgdz/xpas
27012  d2gdz2=2.*d2gdz2
27013  gam1=gam0+dgdz*xpas/5.+d2gdz2*xpas2/50.
27014  gam2=gam0+dgdz*xpas*2./5.+d2gdz2*xpas2*4./50.
27015  gam3=gam0+dgdz*xpas*3./5.+d2gdz2*xpas2*9./50.
27016  gam4=gam0+dgdz*xpas*4./5.+d2gdz2*xpas2*16./50.
27017  b1=sqrt(gam1*gam1-1.)/gam1
27018  b2=sqrt(gam2*gam2-1.)/gam2
27019  b3=sqrt(gam3*gam3-1.)/gam3
27020  b4=sqrt(gam4*gam4-1.)/gam4
27021  b5=sqrt(gam5*gam5-1.)/gam5
27022  dgam=xi1(phi(j),t0,t5)*qc/e0
27023  gam5=gam(i1)+dgam
27024  b5=sqrt(gam5*gam5-1.)/gam5
27025 ! tranverse coordinates in (cm,rad)
27026  x0=f(2,j)
27027  y0=f(4,j)
27028  xt0=f(3,j)*1.e-03
27029  yp0=f(5,j)*1.e-03
27030 ! Picht transformation: xe0 and ye0 (cm) xpe0 and ype0 (rad)
27031  gamm0=(gam0*gam0-1.)**0.25
27032  xe0=x0*gamm0
27033  xpe0=xt0*gamm0
27034  ye0=y0*gamm0
27035  ype0=yp0*gamm0
27036  xpe0=xpe0+.5*xe0*gam0*dgdz/(gam0*gam0-1.)
27037  ype0=ype0+.5*ye0*gam0*dgdz/(gam0*gam0-1.)
27038  xe(i1)=xe0
27039  xpe(i1)=xpe0
27040  ye(i1)=ye0
27041  ype(i1)=ype0
27042 ! transverse coupling terms
27043  gam00=gam0*gam0
27044  gam11=gam1*gam1
27045  gam22=gam2*gam2
27046  gam33=gam3*gam3
27047  gam44=gam4*gam4
27048  bgt0=(gam00-1.)**1.5
27049  xk1=fh*fh/(4.*vl*vl*bgt0)
27050  red=sqrt(xe(i1)*xe(i1)+ye(i1)*ye(i1))
27051  red2=red*red
27052  dred=0.
27053  if(red.gt.1.e-08) then
27054  dred=xe(i1)*xpe(i1)+ye(i1)*ype(i1)
27055  dred=dred/red
27056  endif
27057  rk1=xk1*red2*xi1(phi(j),t0,t5)*qc/e0
27058  rk2=red*dred*xk1*xi2(phi(j),t0)*qc/e0
27059  gam(i)=gam5+rk1+rk2
27060  if(gam(i).le.1.) then
27061  f(8,i)=0.
27062  ilost=ilost+1
27063 ! needs to be on energy
27064  lossreason(i)=-2
27065  write(49,3928) prtlab,nrres,davtot/100.,i,int(f(1,i)),
27066  * f(2,i),f(3,i),f(4,i),f(5,i),f6i*fh*180./pi,f(7,i)-xmat,
27067  * f(9,i),lossreason(i)
27068 3928 FORMAT(1x,a8,1x,i4,1x,e12.5,i5,1x,i5,1x,6(f12.3,1x),1x,
27069  * f5.2,3x,i2)
27070  cycle
27071  endif
27072  gam55=gam(i)*gam(i)
27073  bgt1=(gam11-1.)**1.5
27074  bgt2=(gam22-1.)**1.5
27075  bgt3=(gam33-1.)**1.5
27076  bgt4=(gam44-1.)**1.5
27077  bgt5=(gam55-1.)**1.5
27078  bge0=(gam00+2.)/((gam00-1.)*(gam00-1.))
27079  bge1=(gam11+2.)/((gam11-1.)*(gam11-1.))
27080  bge2=(gam22+2.)/((gam22-1.)*(gam22-1.))
27081  bge3=(gam33+2.)/((gam33-1.)*(gam33-1.))
27082  bge4=(gam44+2.)/((gam44-1.)*(gam44-1.))
27083  bge5=(gam55+2.)/((gam55-1.)*(gam55-1.))
27084 ! ******************************************************
27085 ! compute the jump of phase over the step
27086 !old dlt=(1.+red2*xk1)*xi3(phi(j),t0)
27087 !old dlt=dlt+red*dred*xk1*xi4(phi(j),t0)
27088 !old dlt=dlt*qc/(e0*vl)
27089 !old tof=tof+xpas/(vl*b0)+dlt
27090 ! *******************************************************
27091  f(7,j)=gam(i)*e0
27092  tcour(j)=t5
27093  ddt1=t5-ddt
27094  f(6,j)=ddt1+f(6,j)
27095 ! -- angular deviation
27096 ! 1) terms in dE/dt
27097  a1=qc/(2.*e0*vl)
27098  ttt1=xj1(phi(j),t0)
27099  ttt2=xj2(phi(j),t0)
27100 !old dxpe=xe(i1)*xj1(phi(j),t0)+xpe(i1)*xj2(phi(j),t0)
27101 !old dype=ye(i1)*xj1(phi(j),t0)+ype(i1)*xj2(phi(j),t0)
27102  dxpe1=xe(i1)*ttt1+xpe(i1)*ttt2
27103  dype1=ye(i1)*ttt1+ype(i1)*ttt2
27104  xpe(i)=xpe(i1)+a1*dxpe1
27105  ype(i)=ype(i1)+a1*dype1
27106 ! --- 2) terms in E*E (only for no-relativistic electrons)
27107  if(jelec) then
27108  ae2=qc/(2.*e0)
27109  ae2=ae2*ae2
27110  stt1=xe21(phi(j),t0)
27111  stt2=xe22(phi(j),t0)
27112  dxpe2=xe(i1)*stt1+xpe(i1)*stt2
27113  dype2=ye(i1)*stt1+ype(i1)*stt2
27114  xpe(i)=xpe(i1)+a1*dxpe1-ae2*dxpe2
27115  ype(i)=ype(i1)+a1*dype1-ae2*dype2
27116  endif
27117 ! extension
27118 !old dxe=xe(i1)*xj2(phi,t0)+xpe(i1)*xj3(phi,t0)
27119 !old dye=ye(i1)*xj2(phi,t0)+ype(i1)*xj3(phi,t0)
27120 !old xe(i)=xe(i1)+a1*dxe+xpas*xpe(i1)
27121 !old ye(i)=ye(i1)+a1*dye+xpas*ype(i1)
27122  xe(i)=xe(i1)+xpas*(xpe(i1)+xpe(i))/2.
27123  ye(i)=ye(i1)+xpas*(ype(i1)+ype(i))/2.
27124 ! back to the real variables and convert to (cm,mrad)
27125  dgdzr=qc/e0 * tspl5
27126  gamm1=(gam(i)*gam(i)-1.)**0.25
27127  gamm2=(gam(i)*gam(i)-1.)**1.25
27128  xi=xe(i)/gamm1
27129  xpi=xpe(i)/gamm1-xe(i)*gam(i)*dgdzr/(gamm2*2.)
27130  yi=ye(i)/gamm1
27131  ypi=ype(i)/gamm1-ye(i)*gam(i)*dgdzr/(gamm2*2.)
27132 ! convert in cm and mrd
27133  f(2,j)=xi
27134  f(4,j)=yi
27135  f(3,j)=xpi*1.e03
27136  f(5,j)=ypi*1.e03
27137  enddo
27138 ! space charge computation (only odd step numbers)
27139  if(.not.flgsc) then
27140  flgsc=.true.
27141  call disp
27142  else
27143  if(ichaes) then
27144 ! Charge space (only SCHEFF is available)
27145  iesp=.true.
27146  call cesp(eglsc)
27147  iesp=.false.
27148  flgsc=.false.
27149 ! Change the dispersion dE/E with respect to the C.O.G of the bunch
27150  endif
27151  call disp
27152  endif
27153  xnh=xnh+1.
27154  enddo
27155  return
27156  end
27157 
27165  SUBROUTINE reject(ilost,PRTLAB)
27166  implicit real(8) (a-h,o-z)
27167  parameter(ncards=64,iptsz=100002,maxcell1=3000)
27168  common/davcom/dav1(maxcell1,40),davtot,iitem(maxcell1),idav
27169  COMMON /consta/ vl, pi, xmat, rpel, qst
27170  common/ttfc/tk,t1k,t2k,sk,s1k,s2k,fh
27171  common/faisc/f(10,iptsz),imax,ngood
27172  common/cgtof/charm(20),cgtdv(20),nbch(20),netac
27173  common/mcs/imcs,ncstat,cstat(20)
27174  common/etcom/cog(8),exten(17),fd(iptsz)
27175  common/fene/wdisp,wphas,wx,wy,rlim,ifw
27176  common/dyn/tref,vref
27177  common/compt/nrres,nrtre,nrbunc,nrdbun
27178  CHARACTER*(8) PRTLAB
27179  dimension lossreason(iptsz)
27180 ! lossreason= -2 --> energy
27181 ! lossreason= -1 --> phase
27182 ! lossreason= 0 --> not lost
27183 ! lossreason= 1 --> radius
27184 ! lossreason= 2 --> x position
27185 ! lossreason= 3 --> y position
27186  ilost=0
27187  fh0=fh/vl
27188  fcpi=fh*180./pi
27189 ! Test window
27190  write(16,*)'Check if the ',ngood,' particles are within window'
27191  write(16,*) 'Number of charge states: ',ncstat
27192  if(ifw.le.1) then
27193 ! Relative to COG
27194  write(16,3900)
27195 ! ---- ifw = 0 ===> wdisp = dW/W
27196 ! ---- ifw = 1 ===> wdisp = dW (MeV)
27197  if (ncstat.gt.1) call cogetc
27198  bcour=0.
27199  cgtv=0.
27200  do i=1,ngood
27201  gpai=f(7,i)/xmat
27202  bcour=sqrt(1.-1./(gpai*gpai))+bcour
27203  cgtv=cgtv+f(6,i)
27204  lossreason(i)=0
27205  enddo
27206  cgtv=cgtv/float(ngood)
27207  bcour=bcour/float(ngood)
27208  bcg=bcour
27209  gcour=1./sqrt(1.-bcour*bcour)
27210  gcg=gcour
27211  wcg=(gcour-1.)*xmat
27212  do i=1,ngood
27213  gpai=f(7,i)/xmat
27214  if(gpai.lt.1.) gpai=1.
27215  bcour=sqrt(1.-1./(gpai*gpai))
27216  fd(i)=bcour/bcg * gpai/gcg
27217  enddo
27218  if(ifw.eq.0) then
27219  dispr=gcour*gcour*wdisp/(gcour*(gcour+1.))
27220  else
27221  dispr=gcour*gcour*wdisp/(gcour*(gcour+1.)*wcg)
27222  endif
27223  else
27224 ! Relative to REF
27225  write(16,3901)
27226  bref=vref/vl
27227  gref=1./sqrt(1.-bref*bref)
27228  wref=(gref-1.)*xmat
27229  do i=1,ngood
27230  gpai=f(7,i)/xmat
27231  bcour=sqrt(1.-1./(gpai*gpai))
27232  fd(i)=bcour/bref * gpai/gref
27233  enddo
27234  if(ifw.eq.10) then
27235  dispr=gref*gref*wdisp/(gref*(gref+1.))
27236  else
27237  dispr=gref*gref*wdisp/(gref*(gref+1.)*wref)
27238  endif
27239  endif
27240  write(16,3927) rlim,wx,wy,wphas,wdisp
27241 ! * ,dispr,f6i*fh*180./pi,f(7,i)-xmat,int(f(9,i))
27242  f6i=0.
27243  do i=1,ngood
27244  ray=f(2,i)*f(2,i)+f(4,i)*f(4,i)
27245  ray=sqrt(ray)
27246  if(ray.gt.rlim) then
27247  f(8,i)=0.
27248  lossreason(i)=1
27249  endif
27250  if(abs(f(2,i)).gt.wx) then
27251  f(8,i)=0.
27252  lossreason(i)=2
27253  endif
27254  if(abs(f(4,i)).gt.wy) then
27255  f(8,i)=0.
27256  lossreason(i)=3
27257  endif
27258  if(ifw.le.1) then
27259 ! Relative to cog
27260  if (ncstat.gt.1) then
27261 !---- each charge state has its own COG in phase
27262  do istc=1,ncstat
27263  if(f(9,i).eq.charm(istc))then
27264  f6i=f(6,i)-cgtdv(istc)
27265 ! tmp=cgtdv(istc)
27266  endif
27267  enddo
27268  else
27269  f6i=f(6,i)-cgtv
27270  endif
27271  else
27272 ! Relative to REF
27273  f6i=f(6,i)-tref
27274  endif
27275  if(fh*abs(f6i).ge.wphas) then
27276  f(8,i)=0.
27277  lossreason(i)=-1
27278 ! write(16,*) "Test1:",fh*abs(f6i),wphas,tmp,f(6,i)
27279  endif
27280  if(abs(fd(i)-1.).ge.dispr) then
27281  f(8,i)=0.
27282  lossreason(i)=-2
27283 ! write(16,*) "Test2:",abs(fd(i)-1.)
27284  endif
27285  if(f(8,i).eq.0.) then
27286  write(49,3928) prtlab,nrres,davtot/100.,i,int(f(1,i)),
27287  * f(2,i),f(3,i),f(4,i),f(5,i),f6i*fh*180./pi,f(7,i)-xmat,
27288  * f(9,i),lossreason(i)
27289  ilost=ilost+1
27290  endif
27291  enddo
27292 ! Reshuffles f(i,j) array after window
27293  call shuffle
27294 !cccc cstat=1
27295  ncstat=1
27296  cstat(1)=f(9,1)
27297  do j=2,ngood
27298  mcstat=0
27299  do k=1,ncstat
27300  if(f(9,j).eq.cstat(k)) then
27301  mcstat=1
27302  endif
27303  enddo
27304  if(mcstat.eq.0) then
27305  ncstat=ncstat+1
27306  cstat(ncstat)=f(9,j)
27307  endif
27308  enddo
27309  netac=ncstat
27310  write(16,*) 'Number of good particles left: ',ngood
27311  write(16,*) 'Number of charge states left : ',ncstat
27312  write(16,4030) (cstat(j),j=1,ncstat)
27313  imcs=0
27314  if(ncstat.gt.1) imcs=1
27315 3900 FORMAT(' Window w.r.t. COG')
27316 3901 FORMAT(' Window w.r.t. reference particle')
27317 3927 FORMAT(' LIM R,X,Y ',3(f10.2,9x),'P,W ',e12.5,9x,e12.5)
27318 3928 FORMAT(1x,a8,1x,i4,1x,e12.5,i5,1x,i5,1x,6(f12.3,1x),1x,
27319  * f5.2,3x,i2)
27320 4030 FORMAT('Charge state(s): ',20(f5.1,1x))
27321  RETURN
27322  END
27323 
27354  SUBROUTINE aimalv (ANGL,RMO,BAIM,XN,XB,EK1,EK2,PENT1,RAB1,
27355  * SK1,SK2,PENT2,RAB2)
27356  implicit real(8) (a-h,o-z)
27357  parameter(iptsz=100002,maxcell1=3000)
27358  common/ttfc/tk,t1k,t2k,sk,s1k,s2k,fh
27359  common/sc3/beamc,scdist,sce10,cplm,ect,apl,ichaes,iscsp
27360  common/fene/wdisp,wphas,wx,wy,rlim,ifw
27361  common/davcom/dav1(maxcell1,40),davtot,iitem(maxcell1),idav
27362  common/tapes/in,ifile,meta
27363  common/dyn/tref,vref
27364  common/rigid/boro
27365  common/faisc/f(10,iptsz),imax,ngood
27366  common/femt/iemgrw,iemqesg
27367  LOGICAL IEMGRW
27368  common/etcom/cog(8),exten(17),fd(iptsz)
27369  common/qmoyen/qmoy
27370  COMMON /consta/ vl, pi, xmat, rpel, qst
27371  COMMON /bloc23/ h, devi, nb, bdb,l
27372  real(8) L,NB
27373  common/poro/irot1,irot2
27374  LOGICAL IROT1,IROT2
27375  COMMON /bloc11/ r(6,6), t(6,6,6)
27376  COMMON /bloc21/ be, apb(2), layl, layx, rabt
27377  real(8) LAYL, LAYX
27378  common/pltprf/sprfx(3000),sprfy(3000),sprfl(3000),sprfw(3000),
27379  x sprfp(3000),sprng(3000),prlab(3000),iprf
27380  CHARACTER*(8) PRLAB,PRTLAB
27381  common/rander/ialin
27382  common/cgtof/charm(20),cgtdv(20),nbch(20),netac
27383  common/compt/nrres,nrtre,nrbunc,nrdbun
27384  common/radia/trt,rsync,xintf,crae
27385  common/rayshy/iraysh
27386  LOGICAL IRAYSH
27387  common/itvole/itvol,imamin
27388  common/tofev/ttvols
27389  common/mcs/imcs,ncstat,cstat(20)
27390 ! nsprint: control
27391  common/isector/nsector,nsprint
27392 ! --------------------------------------
27393  logical itvol,imamin,ichaes
27394  character cr*1
27395  logical ialin
27396  dimension xmoy(20),ymoy(20),rmoy(20),rig(20),ncs(20)
27397  dimension xpmoy(20),ypmoy(20)
27398  dimension xcl1(20),xcl2(20),alp(20),sxeb1(20),charge(20)
27399  dimension xsa1b1(20),baims(20)
27400  dimension sbeta(20)
27401  WRITE(16,100)
27402 100 FORMAT(' ****** BENDING MAGNET: input list ****** ')
27403  if(baim.eq.0.0) then
27404 ! BORO: momentum of reference (kG.cm)
27405  ri=boro
27406 ! --- BAIM: bend field (KG)
27407  baim=abs(ri/rmo)
27408  write(16,'(A,F4.1,A,F12.5,A)')' Based on reference charge ',
27409  * qst,' momentum ',boro,' (kG.cm)'
27410  else
27411 ! --- RI momentum kG.cm
27412  ri=baim*rmo
27413  endif
27414  devi=angl
27415  nb=xn
27416  bdb=xb
27417  rsync=rmo
27418  gap=wy
27419 ! print out on terminal of transport element # on one and the same line
27420  nrtre=nrtre+1
27421  cr=char(13)
27422  WRITE(6,8254,advance='no') nrtre,nrres,cr
27423 8254 format('Transport element:',i5,
27424  * ' Accelerating element:',i5,a1)
27425 !old IF(IROT1) WRITE(16,1010) PENT1,RAB1,EK1,EK2,APB(1)
27426  if(ichaes) then
27427  write(16,*)'***** beam current: ',beamc,' mA'
27428  endif
27429  WRITE(16,1010) pent1,rab1,ek1,ek2,apb(1)
27430 1010 FORMAT(' ENTRANCE FACE ******',/,
27431  1 ' ANGLE OF POLE FACE ROTATION ',e12.5,' DEG',/,
27432  1 ' RADIUS OF CURVATURE ',e12.5,' CM',/,
27433  1 ' FRINGE FIELD CORECTIONS K1 K2',2(2x,e12.5),/,
27434  1 ' VERTICAL HALF-APERTURE ',e12.5,' CM')
27435  WRITE(16,1020)rmo,devi,baim,nb,bdb
27436 1020 FORMAT(' WEDGE MAGNET************',/,
27437  2 ' BENDING RADIUS: ',e12.5,' CM ',/,
27438  2 ' BEND ANGLE: ',e12.5,' DEG',/,
27439  2 ' FIELD: ',e12.5,' KG',/,
27440  2 ' FIELD GRADIENTS: N ',e12.5,' BETA:',e12.5)
27441 !old IF(IROT2) WRITE(16,1030) PENT2,RAB2,SK1,SK2,APB(2)
27442  WRITE(16,1030) pent2,rab2,sk1,sk2,apb(2)
27443 1030 FORMAT(' EXIT FACE******',/,
27444  3 ' ANGLE OF POLE FACE ROTATION ',e12.5,' DEG',/,
27445  3 ' RADIUS OF CURVATURE ',e12.5,'CM',/,
27446  3 ' FRINGE FIELD CORRECTIONS K1 K2',2(2x,e12.5),/,
27447  3 ' VERTICAL HALF-APERTURE ',e12.5,' CM')
27448 ! start prints in file 'short.data'
27449  idav=idav+1
27450  iitem(idav)=4
27451  dav1(idav,2)=devi
27452  dav1(idav,3)=rmo*10.
27453  dav1(idav,5)=apb(1)*10.
27454  dav1(idav,6)=pent1
27455  dav1(idav,7)=ek1
27456  dav1(idav,8)=ek2
27457  dav1(idav,9)=rab1*10.
27458  dav1(idav,10)=pent2
27459  dav1(idav,11)=sk1
27460  dav1(idav,12)=sk2
27461  dav1(idav,13)=rab2*10.
27462  dav1(idav,14)=nb
27463  dav1(idav,15)=bdb
27464  dav1(idav,16)=baim*.1
27465  dav1(idav,17)=apb(2)*10.
27466  fh0=fh/vl
27467 ! Conversion deg--->rad
27468  radia=pi/180.
27469  pent1=pent1*radia
27470  devi=devi*radia
27471  devr=devi
27472  l=devr*rmo
27473  dav1(idav,1)=l*10.
27474  sdavtot=davtot
27475  davtot=davtot+l
27476  dav1(idav,4)=davtot*10.
27477  pent2=pent2*radia
27478  devtot=devi
27479 ! ----------------------------
27480 ! define the bending angle of the synchronous particle over each sector
27481  devit=devi/float(nsector)
27482 ! --- devit must be different from pent2
27483  if(devit.eq.pent2) nsector=nsector+1
27484 ! --- space charge computation: nsector must be g.t. 1
27485  if(ichaes.and.(nsector.eq.1) ) nsector = 2
27486  devi=devi/float(nsector)
27487  devr=devr/float(nsector)
27488 ! ----------------------------------------------------------
27489 ! -- scl effective length for space charge computation
27490 ! scl is the path length of the C.T. over two following sectors
27491  scl=2.*devi*rmo
27492 ! save pent1 , pent2 , devi, ek1, ek2 ,sk1 , sk2 ,
27493  pent1s=pent1
27494  pent2s=pent2
27495  devis=devi
27496  devrs=devr
27497  ek1s=ek1
27498  ek2s=ek2
27499  sk1s=sk1
27500  sk2s=sk2
27501 ! --------------------
27502  do ist=1,ncstat
27503  xcl2(ist)=0.
27504  rmoy(ist)=0.
27505  rig(ist)=0.
27506  baims(ist)=baim
27507  enddo
27508 ! -------------------
27509 ! ---- nsector: number of sectors in the bending magnet
27510  do nsec=1,nsector
27511 ! write(6,*) '********'
27512 ! write(6,*) ' BENDING MAGNET sector ',nsec
27513  devi=devis
27514  devr=devrs
27515  xlsy=devi*rmo
27516  sdavtot=sdavtot+xlsy
27517  if(nsector.gt.1) then
27518  if(nsec.eq.1) then
27519  pent1=pent1s
27520  pent2=0.
27521  ek1=ek1s
27522  ek2=ek2s
27523  sk1=0.
27524  sk2=0.
27525  endif
27526  if(nsec.eq.nsector) then
27527  pent1=0.
27528  pent2=pent2s
27529  ek1=0.
27530  ek2=0.
27531  sk1=sk1s
27532  sk2=sk2s
27533  endif
27534  if((nsec.gt.1).and.(nsec.lt.nsector)) then
27535  pent1=0.
27536  pent2=0.
27537  ek1=0.0001
27538  ek2=0.
27539  sk1=0.0001
27540  sk2=0.
27541  endif
27542  endif
27543 ! ------------------------------------------------------------
27544 ! --- nsctat: number of charges in the beam
27545  do ist=1,ncstat
27546  charge(ist)=cstat(ist)
27547  devi=devis
27548  devr=devrs
27549  xcl1(ist)=pent1-xcl2(ist)
27550  xmoy(ist)=0.
27551  xpmoy(ist)=0.
27552  ymoy(ist)=0.
27553  ypmoy(ist)=0.
27554  ncs(ist)=0
27555  rig(ist)=0.
27556  sbeta(ist)=0.
27557  do i=1,ngood
27558  if(f(9,i).eq.charge(ist)) then
27559  xmoy(ist)=xmoy(ist)+f(2,i)
27560  ymoy(ist)=ymoy(ist)+f(4,i)
27561  xpmoy(ist)=xpmoy(ist)+f(3,i)
27562  ypmoy(ist)=ypmoy(ist)+f(5,i)
27563  gpai=f(7,i)/xmat
27564  bpai=sqrt(1.-1./(gpai*gpai))
27565  sbeta(ist)=sbeta(ist)+bpai
27566  xmco=xmat*bpai*gpai
27567  rip=33.356*xmco*1.e-01/f(9,i)
27568  rig(ist)=rip+rig(ist)
27569 !old rmoy(ist)=rmoy(ist)+rip
27570  ncs(ist)=ncs(ist)+1
27571  endif
27572  enddo
27573  sbeta(ist)=sbeta(ist)/float(ncs(ist))
27574  xmoy(ist)=xmoy(ist)/float(ncs(ist))
27575  ymoy(ist)=ymoy(ist)/float(ncs(ist))
27576  xpmoy(ist)=xpmoy(ist)/float(ncs(ist))
27577  ypmoy(ist)=ypmoy(ist)/float(ncs(ist))
27578  rig(ist)=rig(ist)/float(ncs(ist))
27579 !old rmoy(ist)=rig(ist)/baim
27580  rmoy(ist)=rig(ist)/baims(ist)
27581 ! eq.14
27582  ctan=cos(devi-pent2)/sin(devi-pent2)
27583  xep=rmo*(sin(devi)*ctan-cos(devi))
27584  xepc=xep+rmo-rmoy(ist)+xmoy(ist)
27585 ! eq.15 and eq.16
27586  argu=-xmoy(ist)*tan(pent1)/xepc
27587 ! eq.16
27588  omga=atan(argu)
27589 ! eq.15
27590  thet=omga+devi-pent2
27591 ! eq.18
27592  eo1=xepc/cos(omga)
27593 ! eq.17
27594  arg1=eo1*sin(thet)/rmoy(ist)
27595  eta=asin(arg1)
27596 ! eq.13
27597  xeb1=xepc*cos(thet)/cos(omga)+rmoy(ist)*cos(eta)
27598  sxeb1(ist)=xeb1
27599 ! eq.12
27600  xk2b1=-xmoy(ist)*tan(xcl1(ist))+xeb1*sin(devi-pent2)
27601 ! eq.11 (bend angle)
27602  alp(ist)=asin(xk2b1/rmoy(ist))
27603 ! eq.18
27604  xeo1=xepc/cos(omga)
27605 ! eq.19 (angle of inclination exit)
27606  argu=eo1/rmoy(ist) * sin(thet)
27607  xcl2(ist)=asin(argu)
27608  sa1b1=-rmo*sin(devr)
27609  sa1b1=sa1b1/sin(devr-pent2)
27610  xsa1b1(ist)=sa1b1+sxeb1(ist)
27611 ! --- field
27612 ! first order
27613  baims(ist)=baim*(1.-nb*xsa1b1(ist)/rmo)
27614 ! second order
27615  rih=1./(rmo*rmo)
27616  baims(ist)=baims(ist)+xb*rih*xsa1b1(ist)*xsa1b1(ist)
27617 ! -----------------------------------------------------
27618 ! ---- Transport matrix
27619  sbet=sbeta(ist)
27620  devi=alp(ist)
27621  ailong=devi*rmoy(ist)
27622  WRITE(16,101) charge(ist),nsec,nsector,baims(ist),
27623  * xsa1b1(ist),rmoy(ist),devi*180./pi,ailong,rig(ist)
27624 101 FORMAT(/,' **************************************',/,
27625  * ' *CENTRAL TRAJECTORY for charge: ',f4.1,' *',/,
27626  * ' **************************************',/,
27627  * ' SECTOR: ',i4,' SECTORS NUMBER: ',i5, /,
27628  * ' BENDING FIELD: ',e12.5,' kG at: ',e12.5,' cm',/,
27629  * ' BENDING RADIUS: ',e12.5,' CM ',/,
27630  * ' BENDING ANGLE: ',e12.5,' DEG',/,
27631  * ' length: ',e12.5,' cm rigidity: ',e12.5,' kG.cm')
27632  l=ailong
27633  h=1./rmoy(ist)
27634 ! ENTRANCE FACE OF THE BENDING MAGNET
27635 ! CLEAR R AND T
27636  CALL clear
27637  gap=apb(1)
27638  be= xcl1(ist)
27639  layl =ek1
27640  layx =ek2
27641  rabt=0.
27642  IF(abs(rab1).GT.6.*0)rabt=1./rab1
27643 ! -----------------------------------------
27644  gcog=0.
27645  nii=0
27646  do ii=1,ngood
27647  if(f(9,ii).eq.charge(ist)) then
27648  gcog=gcog+f(7,ii)/xmat
27649  nii=nii+1
27650  endif
27651  enddo
27652  gcog=gcog/float(nii)
27653  bcog=sqrt(1.-1./(gcog*gcog))
27654  fdtot=0.
27655  DO ii=1,ngood
27656  if(f(9,ii).eq.charge(ist)) then
27657  tbe=tan(be)
27658  f(2,ii)=f(2,ii)-xmoy(ist)
27659  gpai=f(7,ii)/xmat
27660  bpai=sqrt(1.-1./(gpai*gpai))
27661  f(6,ii)=f(6,ii)+xmoy(ist)*tbe/(bpai*vl)
27662  fd(ii)=(gpai*bpai)/(gcog*bcog)
27663  fdtot=fdtot+fd(ii)
27664  endif
27665  enddo
27666 ! TEST
27667  fdtot=fdtot/float(nii)-1.
27668 ! --------------------------------------------------
27669  CALL pofar1(gap)
27670  write(16,4502) be*180./pi,charge(ist)
27671 4502 format(' ****INPUT FACE*** SLOPE: ',e12.5,' deg ',
27672  * 'CHARGE: ',f4.1)
27673  call matrix
27674  xll=0.
27675  DO ii=1,ngood
27676  if(f(9,ii).eq.charge(ist)) then
27677  CALL cobeam(ii,xll)
27678  endif
27679  enddo
27680 ! *******************************************************
27681 ! WEDGE BENDING MAGNET
27682 ! CLEAR R AND T
27683  CALL clear
27684  CALL benmag(sbet,fdtot)
27685 ! --- :print the transport matrix
27686  write(16,4101) charge(ist)
27687 4101 format(' ****BENDING MAGNET for charge ',f4.1)
27688  call matrix
27689  r51=r(5,1)
27690 ! ---- transport of particles
27691  DO ii=1,ngood
27692  if(f(9,ii).eq.charge(ist)) then
27693  CALL cobeam(ii,l)
27694  endif
27695 ! synchrotron radiation (only for electrons, i.e. erest = 0.511 Mev)
27696  IF(iraysh.and.xmat.eq.0.511) CALL syrout(ii)
27697  ENDDO
27698 ! *******************************************************
27699 ! --- EXIT FACE OF THE BENDING MAGNET
27700 ! CLEAR R AND T
27701  CALL clear
27702  xll=0.
27703  gap=apb(2)
27704  be= xcl2(ist)
27705  layl =sk1
27706  layx =sk2
27707  rabt=0.
27708  IF(abs(rab2).GT.1.e-10)rabt=1./rab2
27709  CALL pofar2(gap)
27710 ! ---- :print the transport matrix
27711  write(16,4501) be*180./pi,charge(ist)
27712 4501 format(' ****EXIT FACE*** SLOPE: ',e12.5,' deg CHARGE: ',
27713  * f4.1)
27714  call matrix
27715 ! transport of particles
27716  xll=0.
27717  DO ii=1,ngood
27718  if(f(9,ii).eq.charge(ist)) then
27719  CALL cobeam(ii,xll)
27720  endif
27721  ENDDO
27722 ! -------------------------------------------------------------------------
27723 ! --- get back the particles coordinates in the coordinates system of the synchronous particle
27724  sa1b1=-rmo*sin(devr)
27725  sa1b1=sa1b1/sin(devr-pent2)
27726  ttt=xcl2(ist)-pent2
27727  ttt=ttt*1.e03
27728  do ii=1,ngood
27729  if(f(9,ii).eq.charge(ist)) then
27730 ! EQ.29
27731  a1b1=sa1b1+sxeb1(ist)
27732 ! EQ.28
27733  f(2,ii)=(a1b1+f(2,ii)/cos(xcl2(ist))) * cos(pent2)
27734 ! EQ.30
27735  f(3,ii)=f(3,ii)-ttt
27736 ! EQ.31
27737  gpai=f(7,ii)/xmat
27738  bpai=sqrt(1.-1./(gpai*gpai))
27739  f(6,ii)=f(6,ii)+r51*xmoy(ist)/(bpai*vl)
27740 !cc f(6,ii)=f(6,ii)-r51*xmoy(ist)/(bpai*vl)
27741 ! **** allow plotting the beam after the sector number nsprint in file 13 (see the MAIN)
27742 !cc if(nsec.eq.nsprint) then
27743 !cc write(13,2587) nsec,ist,charge(ist),f(2,ii),f(3,ii),f(4,ii),
27744 !cc * f(5,ii),xmoy(ist),ymoy(ist),rmoy(ist)
27745 !cc2587 format(2x,i3,2x,i3,8(2x,e12.5))
27746 !cc endif
27747 ! ***************************************************************************
27748  endif
27749  enddo
27750 ! enddo for ist (number of charges in the beam)
27751  enddo
27752 ! --------------------------------------------------------------
27753 ! Space charge computation
27754  if(ichaes) then
27755 ! --- check the parity of nsec
27756  pnsec=float(nsec)/2.-nsec/2
27757 ! nsec is odd:---> space charge computation
27758  if((pnsec.ne.0.).and.(nsec.lt.nsector)) then
27759  call cesp(scl)
27760  write(16,*) ' space charge after sector: ',nsec
27761  endif
27762  endif
27763 ! ------------------------------------------------------------
27764 ! synchronous radiation (only for electrons i.e. erest = 0.511 Mev)
27765  IF(iraysh.and.xmat.eq.0.511) CALL syref
27766 ! The routine SYREF changes vref and tref (reference)
27767 ! envelope
27768  prlab(iprf)='BMAGNET '
27769  CALL stapl(sdavtot*10.)
27770 ! enddo for nsec (sectors numbers)
27771  enddo
27772 ! ------------------------------------------------------
27773 ! random error in alignment
27774  if(ialin) call randali
27775 ! Change the dispersion dE/E with respect to the C.O.G of the bunch
27776  call disp
27777  call cogetc
27778 ! --- Test window after the bending magnet
27779  tcog=0.
27780  gcog=0.
27781  do i=1,ngood
27782  gcog=gcog+f(7,i)/xmat
27783  tcog=tcog+f(6,i)
27784  enddo
27785  tcog=tcog/float(ngood)
27786  gcog=gcog/float(ngood)
27787  bcog=sqrt(1.-1./(gcog*gcog))
27788  wcg=(gcog-1.)*xmat
27789 ! devtot: total angle of the bending magnet(computation of tref)
27790  devi=devtot
27791  ailong=devi*rmo
27792  IF(iraysh.and.xmat.eq.0.511) then
27793 ! electrons with synchrotron radiation
27794  ELSE
27795 ! ions
27796  tref=tref+ailong/vref
27797 ! ----- window control
27798  prtlab=prlab(iprf)
27799  call reject(ilost,prtlab)
27800 ! ---------------------------------------------------
27801  dav1(idav,37)=ngood
27802  if(itvol) ttvols=tref
27803  ENDIF
27804  beref=vref/vl
27805  gamref=1./sqrt(1.-beref*beref)
27806  xmco=xmat*beref*gamref
27807  boro=33.356*xmco*1.e-01/qst
27808  tlong = tref*vref
27809  WRITE(16,256) beref,gamref,tref,tlong,boro,ngood
27810 256 FORMAT(//,3x,' *** REFERENCE AT THE EXIT :',/,
27811  x ' BETA :',e12.5,' GAMMA :',e12.5,/,' T.O.F (SEC): ',e12.5,
27812  x ' T.O.F (CM): ',e12.5,/,
27813  x ' RIGIDITY(KGAUSS.CM) :',e12.5,/,
27814  x ' NUMBER OF PARTICLES :',i6,/)
27815  if(itvol) write(16,*) ' tof for adjustments: ',ttvols,' sec'
27816  if(iemgrw) call emiprt(0)
27817 !old CALL STAPL(davtot*10.)
27818  RETURN
27819  END
27820 
27831  SUBROUTINE deflect(fdtot)
27832  implicit real(8)(a-z)
27833  COMMON /bloc11/ r(6,6), t(6,6,6)
27834  common /edef/avb,drad,kx2,ky2,l
27835 ! --- convert drad, kx2 , ky2 in m
27836  h=100./drad
27837  h2=h*h
27838  al=l*1.e-02
27839  kx2=kx2*1.e04
27840  ky2=ky2*1.e04
27841  kx=sqrt(abs(kx2))
27842  ky=sqrt(abs(ky2))
27843  argx=kx*al
27844  argy=ky*al
27845  avb2=avb*avb
27846  avg=sqrt(1.-avb2)
27847  avg=1./avg
27848  avg2=avg*avg
27849  dx=(2.-avb2)*h/kx
27850  dxp=(2.-avb2)*h/kx2
27851 ! ***** variante:(???)
27852 ! dx=h/kx
27853 ! dxp=h/kx2
27854 ! ************************
27855 ! kx2 < 0
27856  IF (kx2.lt.6.*0) then
27857  cx=cosh(argx)
27858  sx=sinh(argx)/kx
27859  sxp=sinh(argx)*kx
27860 ! ---------------------------------
27861 ! First order Matrix R (plane (X,XP)
27862  r(1,1)=cx
27863  r(1,2)=sx
27864  r(1,6)=dxp*(1.-cx)
27865  r(2,1)=sxp
27866  r(2,2)=cx
27867  r(2,6)=dx*sx*kx
27868  r(5,1)=-dx*sx*kx
27869  r(5,2)=-dxp*(1.-cx)
27870  r(5,5)=1.
27871  r(5,6)=fdtot*al/avg2-(2.-avb2)*dxp*h*(al-sx)
27872  r(6,6)=1.
27873  ENDIF
27874 ! kx2 > 0
27875  IF (kx2.gt.6.*0) then
27876  cx=cos(argx)
27877  sx=sin(argx)/kx
27878  sxp=sin(argx)*kx
27879 ! First order Matrix R (plane (X,XP)
27880  r(1,1)=cx
27881  r(1,2)=sx
27882  r(1,6)=dxp*(1.-cx)
27883  r(2,1)=-sxp
27884  r(2,2)=cx
27885  r(2,6)=dx*sx*kx
27886  r(5,1)=dx*sx*kx
27887  r(5,2)=dxp*(1.-cx)
27888  r(5,5)=1.
27889  r(5,6)=fdtot*al/avg2-(2.-avb2)*dxp*h*(al-sx)
27890  r(6,6)=1.
27891  ENDIF
27892 ! kx2 = 0
27893  IF (kx2.eq.6.*0) then
27894  r(1,1)=1.
27895  r(1,2)=al
27896  r(1,6)=0.
27897  r(2,1)=0.
27898  r(2,2)=1.
27899  r(2,6)=l*h*(2.-avb2)
27900  r(5,1)=-l*h*(2.-avb2)
27901  r(5,2)=0.
27902  r(5,5)=1.
27903  r(5,6)=al/avg2
27904  ENDIF
27905 ! ky2 < 0
27906  IF (ky2.lt.6.*0) then
27907  cy=cosh(argy)
27908  sy=sinh(argy)/ky
27909  syp=sinh(argy)*ky
27910  r(3,3)=cy
27911  r(3,4)=sy
27912  r(4,3)=syp
27913  r(4,4)=cy
27914  ENDIF
27915 ! ky2 > 0
27916  IF (ky2.gt.6.*0) then
27917  cy=cos(argy)
27918  sy=sin(argy)/ky
27919  syp=sin(argy)*ky
27920  r(3,3)=cy
27921  r(3,4)=sy
27922  r(4,3)=-syp
27923  r(4,4)=cy
27924  ENDIF
27925 ! ky2 = 0
27926  IF (ky2.eq.6.*0) then
27927  cy=1.
27928  sy=al
27929  syp=0.
27930  r(3,3)=cy
27931  r(3,4)=sy
27932  r(4,3)=syp
27933  r(4,4)=cy
27934  ENDIF
27935  return
27936  end
27937 
27950  SUBROUTINE e_deflec
27951  implicit real(8) (a-h,o-z)
27952  parameter(iptsz=100002,maxcell1=3000)
27953  common/ttfc/tk,t1k,t2k,sk,s1k,s2k,fh
27954  common/sc3/beamc,scdist,sce10,cplm,ect,apl,ichaes,iscsp
27955  common/fene/wdisp,wphas,wx,wy,rlim,ifw
27956  common/davcom/dav1(maxcell1,40),davtot,iitem(maxcell1),idav
27957  common/tapes/in,ifile,meta
27958  common/dyn/tref,vref
27959  common/erigid/edr0
27960  common/faisc/f(10,iptsz),imax,ngood
27961  common/femt/iemgrw,iemqesg
27962  LOGICAL IEMGRW
27963  common/etcom/cog(8),exten(17),fd(iptsz)
27964  common/qmoyen/qmoy
27965  COMMON /consta/ vl, pi, xmat, rpel, qst
27966  common /edef/avb,drad,kx2,ky2,l
27967  real(8) L,kx2,ky2
27968  COMMON /bloc11/ r(6,6), t(6,6,6)
27969  common/pltprf/sprfx(3000),sprfy(3000),sprfl(3000),sprfw(3000),
27970  x sprfp(3000),sprng(3000),prlab(3000),iprf
27971  CHARACTER*(8) PRLAB,PRTLAB
27972  common/rander/ialin
27973  common/cgtof/charm(20),cgtdv(20),nbch(20),netac
27974  common/compt/nrres,nrtre,nrbunc,nrdbun
27975  common/itvole/itvol,imamin
27976  common/tofev/ttvols
27977  common/secdr/iseor
27978  LOGICAL ISEOR,sseor
27979  common/mcs/imcs,ncstat,cstat(20)
27980  logical itvol,imamin,ichaes
27981  character cr*1
27982  logical ialin
27983  dimension xmoy(20),ymoy(20),rmoy(20),rig(20),ncs(20)
27984  dimension xpmoy(20),ypmoy(20),avbt(20),charge(20),alp(20)
27985 ! -----------------------------------------------------------------
27986 ! print out on terminal of transport element # on one and the same line
27987  nrtre=nrtre+1
27988  cr=char(13)
27989  WRITE(6,8254,advance='no') nrtre,nrres,cr
27990 8254 format('Transport element:',i5,
27991  * ' Accelerating element:',i5,a1)
27992 ! ---- save iseor in sseor
27993  sseor=iseor
27994 ! iseor = false ---> second ordre transport matrix not available for the deflector
27995  iseor=.false.
27996 !
27997  read(in,*) nsector
27998  read(in,*) rm0,devtot,radii,elecf
27999  bd0=vref/vl
28000  gd0=sqrt(1.-bd0*bd0)
28001  gd0=1./gd0
28002  wt0=gd0*xmat
28003  wt0c=(wt0-xmat)
28004 ! edr0: electric rigidity (kV)
28005  edr0=wt0*bd0*bd0*1.e03/qst
28006 ! efd0: radial electric field (in kV/cm)
28007  efd0=edr0/rm0
28008  edfnom=efd0
28009  if(elecf.ge.0.) efd0=elecf
28010  WRITE(16,1020)rm0,devtot,radii,edr0,edfnom,efd0,wt0c
28011 1020 FORMAT(' ELECTROSTATIC DEFLECTOR************',/,
28012  2 ' BENDING RADIUS: ',e12.5,' cm ',/,
28013  2 ' BEND ANGLE: ',e12.5,' deg',/,
28014  2 ' VERTICAL RADII OF CURVATURE: ',e12.5,' cm',/,
28015  2 ' RIGIDITY: ',e12.5,' kV ',/,
28016  2 ' RADIAL ELECTRIC FIELD (nominal): ',e12.5,' kV/cm',/,
28017  2 ' RADIAL ELECTRIC FIELD (applied): ',e12.5,' kV/cm',/,
28018  2 ' INPUT ENERGY: ',e12.5,' MeV',/)
28019  if(ichaes) then
28020  write(16,*)'***** beam current: ',beamc,' mA'
28021  if((iscsp.lt.3).and.(ncstat.gt.1)) then
28022  write(6,*) '****************************'
28023  write(6,2748)
28024 2748 format(' CAUTION: In the case of multiple charge states',/,
28025  * ' HERSC and SCHERM can not be used for electrostatic bends')
28026  endif
28027  endif
28028 ! start prints in file 'short.data'
28029  findex=1.+rm0/radii
28030  idav=idav+1
28031  iitem(idav)=21
