28032  dav1(idav,2)=devtot
28033  dav1(idav,3)=rm0*10.
28034  dav1(idav,5)=radii*10.
28035  dav1(idav,6)=findex
28036  dav1(idav,7)=edr0
28037  dav1(idav,8)=efd0*0.1
28038 ! convert bend angle in rad
28039  devtot=devtot*pi/180.
28040  l=devtot*rm0
28041  dav1(idav,1)=l*10.
28042  sdavtot=davtot
28043  davtot=davtot+l
28044  dav1(idav,4)=davtot*10.
28045 ! --- space charge computation: nsector must be g.t. 1
28046  if(ichaes.and.(nsector.eq.1) ) nsector = 2
28047  devi=devtot/float(nsector)
28048  devr=devtot/float(nsector)
28049 ! ----------------------------------------------------------
28050 ! -- scl effective length for space charge computation
28051 ! scl is the path length of the C.T. over two following sectors
28052  scl=2.*devi*rm0
28053  do ist=1,ncstat
28054  rmoy(ist)=0.
28055  rig(ist)=0.
28056  alp(ist)=devi
28057  enddo
28058 ! -------------------
28059 ! ---- nsector: number of sectors in the deflector
28060  do nsec=1,nsector
28061  write(6,*) '********'
28062  write(6,*) ' deflector sector ',nsec
28063  xlsy=devi*rm0
28064  sdavtot=sdavtot+xlsy
28065 ! ------------------------------------------------------------
28066 ! --- nsctat: number of charge states in the beam
28067  do ist=1,ncstat
28068  charge(ist)=cstat(ist)
28069  xmoy(ist)=0.
28070  xpmoy(ist)=0.
28071  ymoy(ist)=0.
28072  ypmoy(ist)=0.
28073  ncs(ist)=0
28074  rig(ist)=0.
28075  avbt(ist)=0.
28076  do i=1,ngood
28077  if(f(9,i).eq.charge(ist)) then
28078  xmoy(ist)=xmoy(ist)+f(2,i)
28079  ymoy(ist)=ymoy(ist)+f(4,i)
28080  xpmoy(ist)=xpmoy(ist)+f(3,i)
28081  ypmoy(ist)=ypmoy(ist)+f(5,i)
28082  gpai=f(7,i)/xmat
28083  bpai=sqrt(1.-1./(gpai*gpai))
28084  avbt(ist)=avbt(ist)+bpai
28085 ! electric rigidity (kV)
28086  rip=f(7,i)*bpai*bpai/f(9,i) *1.e03
28087  rig(ist)=rip+rig(ist)
28088  ncs(ist)=ncs(ist)+1
28089  endif
28090  enddo
28091  xmoy(ist)=xmoy(ist)/float(ncs(ist))
28092  ymoy(ist)=ymoy(ist)/float(ncs(ist))
28093  xpmoy(ist)=xpmoy(ist)/float(ncs(ist))
28094  ypmoy(ist)=ypmoy(ist)/float(ncs(ist))
28095  rig(ist)=rig(ist)/float(ncs(ist))
28096  rmoy(ist)=rig(ist)/efd0
28097  avbt(ist)=avbt(ist)/float(ncs(ist))
28098 ! dispersion in dp/p relative to the cog of the bunch
28099  gcog=sqrt(1.-avbt(ist)*avbt(ist))
28100  fdtot=0.
28101  nii=0
28102  do i=1,ngood
28103  if(f(9,i).eq.charge(ist)) then
28104  gpai=f(7,i)/xmat
28105  bpai=sqrt(1.-1./(gpai*gpai))
28106  fd(i)=(gpai*bpai)/(gcog*avbt(ist))
28107  fdtot=fdtot+fd(i)
28108  nii=nii+1
28109  endif
28110  enddo
28111  fdtot=fdtot/float(nii)
28112 ! --- local deflector
28113 ! alp(ist): angle of the local deflector
28114 ! parametres kx2 and ky2
28115 ! eq.11
28116  oo1=rm0-rmoy(ist)+xmoy(ist)
28117 ! eq.10
28118  abet=oo1*sin(alp(ist))/rmoy(ist)
28119  abet=asin(abet)
28120 ! eq.12 (angle of the local central trajectory)
28121  alp(ist)=alp(ist)+abet
28122 ! eq.14 (field index)
28123  findex=1.+rmoy(ist)/radii
28124 ! eq.15 (parameters kx, ky)
28125  kx2=3.-findex-avbt(ist)*avbt(ist)
28126  rmoy2=rmoy(ist)*rmoy(ist)
28127  kx2=kx2/rmoy2
28128  ky2=(findex-1.)/rmoy2
28129 ! ---- Transport matrix
28130  devi=alp(ist)
28131  ailong=devi*rmoy(ist)
28132  l=ailong
28133 ! drad: horizontal deflector radius (cm)
28134 ! l: length of the central trajectory (cm)
28135 ! kx2, ky2: DIMENSIONLESS coefficients depending on the field indice
28136 ! avb: average relativistic beta
28137  avb=avbt(ist)
28138  drad=rmoy(ist)
28139 ! --- deflector matrix
28140  WRITE(16,4101) charge(ist),nsec,nsector,efd0,rig(ist),
28141  * findex,kx2,ky2,rmoy(ist),devi*180./pi,ailong
28142 4101 FORMAT(/,' **************************************',/,
28143  * ' *CENTRAL TRAJECTORY for charge: ',f4.1,' *',/,
28144  * ' **************************************',/,
28145  * ' SECTOR: ',i4,' SECTORS NUMBER: ',i5, /,
28146  * ' RADIAL FIELD: ',e12.5,' kV*cm-1: ',/,
28147  * ' RIGIDITY: ',e12.5,' kV ',/,
28148  * ' FIELD INDEX: ',e12.5,' PARAMETER Kx: ',e12.5,
28149  * ' cm-2 PARAMETER Ky: ',e12.5,' cm-2',/,
28150  * ' BENDING RADIUS: ',e12.5,' cm ',
28151  * ' BENDING ANGLE: ',e12.5,' deg',/,
28152  * ' LENGTH: ',e12.5,' cm',/)
28153 ! CLEAR R AND T
28154  CALL clear
28155  CALL deflect(fdtot)
28156 ! --- :print the transport matrix
28157  call matrix
28158  r51=r(5,1)
28159 ! ---- transport of particles
28160  DO ii=1,ngood
28161  if(f(9,ii).eq.charge(ist)) then
28162  CALL cobeam(ii,l)
28163  endif
28164  enddo
28165 ! -------------------------------------------------------------------------
28166 ! --- get back the particles coordinates in the coordinates system of the synchronous particle
28167 ! eq.33
28168  ec=-rmoy(ist)*cos(abet)-oo1*sin(devi)+rm0
28169  do ii=1,ngood
28170  if(f(9,ii).eq.charge(ist)) then
28171 ! eq.36
28172  f(2,ii)=f(2,ii)*cos(abet)-ec
28173 ! eq.41
28174  f(3,ii)=f(3,ii)-abet*1.e03
28175 ! eq.45
28176  gpai=f(7,ii)/xmat
28177  bpai=sqrt(1.-1./(gpai*gpai))
28178  f(6,ii)=f(6,ii)+r51*xmoy(ist)/(bpai*vl)
28179  endif
28180  enddo
28181 ! enddo for ist (number of charges in the beam)
28182  enddo
28183 ! --------------------------------------------------------------
28184 ! Space charge computation
28185  if(ichaes) then
28186 ! --- check the parity of nsec
28187  pnsec=float(nsec)/2.-nsec/2
28188 ! nsec is odd:---> space charge computation
28189  if((pnsec.ne.0.).and.(nsec.lt.nsector)) then
28190  call cesp(scl)
28191  write(6,*) ' space charge after sector: ',nsec
28192  endif
28193  endif
28194 ! ------------------------------------------------------------
28195 ! enveloppe
28196  prlab(iprf)='EDFLEC '
28197  CALL stapl(sdavtot*10.)
28198 ! enddo for nsec (sectors numbers)
28199  enddo
28200 ! ------------------------------------------------------
28201 ! random error in alignment
28202  if(ialin) call randali
28203 ! Change the dispersion dE/E with respect to the C.O.G of the bunch
28204  call disp
28205  call cogetc
28206 ! --- Test window after the bending magnet
28207  tcog=0.
28208  gcog=0.
28209  do i=1,ngood
28210  gcog=gcog+f(7,i)/xmat
28211  tcog=tcog+f(6,i)
28212  enddo
28213  tcog=tcog/float(ngood)
28214  gcog=gcog/float(ngood)
28215  bcog=sqrt(1.-1./(gcog*gcog))
28216  wcg=(gcog-1.)*xmat
28217 ! devtot: total angle of the deflector (computation of tref)
28218  devi=devtot
28219  ailong=devi*rm0
28220  tref=tref+ailong/vref
28221 ! ----- window control
28222  prtlab=prlab(iprf)
28223  call reject(ilost,prtlab)
28224 ! ---------------------------------------------------
28225  dav1(idav,36)=ngood
28226  if(itvol) ttvols=tref
28227  if(itvol) write(16,*) ' tof for adjustments: ',ttvols,' sec'
28228  if(iemgrw) call emiprt(0)
28229 !old CALL STAPL(davtot*10.)
28230 ! ---- restore iseor (from sseor)
28231  iseor=sseor
28232  RETURN
28233  END
28234 
28238  SUBROUTINE cesp(xlqua)
28239  implicit real(8) (a-h,o-z)
28240 ! parameter (iptsz=100002,maxcell=3000,maxcell1=3000)
28241  parameter(iptsz=100002)
28242  common/sc3/beamc,scdist,sce10,cplm,ect,apl,ichaes,iscsp
28243  common/cdek/dwp(iptsz)
28244  common/dcspa/iesp
28245  common/faisc/f(10,iptsz),imax,ngood
28246  common/mcs/imcs,ncstat,cstat(20)
28247  logical ichaes,iesp,isepa
28248  DO i=1,ngood
28249  dwp(i)=0.
28250  enddo
28251 ! Space charge
28252  scdist=0.
28253  IF(.NOT.ichaes) RETURN
28254 ! XLQUA: length of space charge effect
28255  if((iscsp.ne.3).and.(ncstat.gt.1)) then
28256  write(6,*) '****************************'
28257  write(6,2748)
28258 2748 format(' ERROR: Wrong space charge model chosen',/,
28259  * ' With multiple charge states in the beam',/,
28260  * ' only the SCHEFF routine should be used')
28261  write(16,2748)
28262  stop
28263  endif
28264  scdist=xlqua
28265  write(16,*) 'space charge length(cm): ',scdist
28266  iesp=.true.
28267  if(iscsp.le.1) then
28268  ini=1
28269  call hersc(ini)
28270  ini=2
28271  call hersc(ini)
28272  endif
28273  if(iscsp.eq.2) call schermi
28274  if(iscsp.eq.3) then
28275  if(ncstat.eq.1) call scheff1(1)
28276 ! --- otherwise: ncstat > 1 check if the bunches are separated or not
28277  if(ncstat.gt.1) then
28278  isepa=.false.
28279  call b_sep(isepa)
28280 ! isepa = true call special scheff --->scheff_sep
28281 ! isepa = false call usual scheff ----> scheff1(1)
28282  if(isepa) call scheff_sep
28283  if(.not.isepa) call scheff1(1)
28284  endif
28285  endif
28286  RETURN
28287  END
28288 
28292  SUBROUTINE sizer(ist,xrms,yrms,zrms)
28293  implicit real(8) (a-h,o-z)
28294  parameter(iptsz=100002)
28295  common/part/xc(iptsz),yc(iptsz),zc(iptsz)
28296  common/cgrms/xsum,ysum,zsum
28297  common/faisc/f(10,iptsz),imax,ngood
28298  common/mcs/imcs,ncstat,cstat(20)
28299  xsum=0.
28300  ysum=0.
28301  zsum=0.
28302  xsqsum=0.
28303  ysqsum=0.
28304  zsqsum=0.
28305  ngist=0
28306  do i=1,ngood
28307  if(f(9,i).eq.cstat(ist)) then
28308  ngist=ngist+1
28309  xsum=xsum+xc(i)
28310  ysum=ysum+yc(i)
28311  zsum=zsum+zc(i)
28312  xsqsum=xsqsum+xc(i)*xc(i)
28313  ysqsum=ysqsum+yc(i)*yc(i)
28314  zsqsum=zsqsum+zc(i)*zc(i)
28315  endif
28316  enddo
28317  xsum=xsum/float(ngist)
28318  ysum=ysum/float(ngist)
28319  zsum=zsum/float(ngist)
28320  xsqsum=xsqsum/float(ngist)
28321  ysqsum=ysqsum/float(ngist)
28322  zsqsum=zsqsum/float(ngist)
28323  xrms=sqrt(xsqsum-xsum*xsum)
28324  yrms=sqrt(ysqsum-ysum*ysum)
28325  zrms=sqrt(zsqsum-zsum*zsum)
28326  RETURN
28327  END
28328 
28335  SUBROUTINE pintim1(ist)
28336  implicit real(8) (a-h,o-z)
28337  parameter(iptsz=100002)
28338  common/faisc/f(10,iptsz),imax,ngood
28339  common/qmoyen/qmoy
28340  common/part/xc(iptsz),yc(iptsz),zc(iptsz)
28341  COMMON /consta/ vl, pi, xmat, rpel, qst
28342  common/sc3/beamc,scdist,sce10,cplm,ect,apl,ichaes,iscsp
28343  common/azlist/icont,iprin
28344  common/mcs/imcs,ncstat,cstat(20)
28345  grmoy=0.
28346  trmoy=0.
28347  xbax=0.
28348  ngist=0
28349  do i=1,ngood
28350  if(f(9,i).eq.cstat(ist)) then
28351  ngist=ngist+1
28352  grmoy=grmoy+f(7,i)/xmat
28353  trmoy=trmoy+f(6,i)
28354  xbax=xbax+f(2,i)
28355  endif
28356  enddo
28357  trmoy=trmoy/float(ngist)
28358  grmoy=grmoy/float(ngist)
28359  brmoy=sqrt(1.-1./(grmoy*grmoy))
28360  xbax=xbax/float(ngist)
28361 !ccc apl=0.
28362 ! Isochronism correction (bending magnet) only with SCHERM
28363 ! does not work with with SCHEFF (iscsp=3)
28364 !ccc if(iscsp.eq.2) then
28365 !ccc xb2x=0.
28366 !ccc xb2z=0.
28367 !ccc xbxz=0.
28368 !ccc do np=1,ngood
28369 !ccc gpai=f(7,np)/xmat
28370 !ccc bpai=sqrt(1.-1./(gpai*gpai))
28371 !ccc zc(np)=(trmoy-f(6,np))*bpai*vl/100.
28372 !ccc xc(np)=(f(2,np)-xbax)/100.
28373 !ccc xb2z=xb2z+zc(np)*zc(np)
28374 !ccc xb2x=xb2x+xc(np)*xc(np)
28375 !ccc xbxz=xbxz+zc(np)*xc(np)
28376 !ccc enddo
28377 !ccc xb2z=xb2z/float(ngood)
28378 !ccc xb2x=xb2x/float(ngood)
28379 !ccc xbxz=xbxz/float(ngood)
28380 !ccc apl=atan(-2.*xbxz/(xb2x-xb2z))/2.
28381 !ccc write(16,*) 'slope of the bunch in plane(Oz,Ox):',apl,' radian'
28382 !ccc endif
28383  do np=1,ngood
28384  if(f(9,np).eq.cstat(ist)) then
28385  gpai=f(7,np)/xmat
28386  bpai=sqrt(1.-1./(gpai*gpai))
28387 ! iscsp = 3 Lorentz transformation (only with scheff)
28388 !omment if(iscsp.eq.3) znp=(trmoy-f(6,np))*bpai*vl*grmoy
28389 !omment if(iscsp.eq.2) znp=(trmoy-f(6,np))*bpai*vl
28390  znp=(trmoy-f(6,np))*bpai*vl
28391  xnp=f(2,np)
28392  zc(np)=znp*cos(apl)+xnp*sin(apl)
28393  xnp=xnp*cos(apl)-znp*sin(apl)
28394 ! convert from mrad to rad
28395  f3=f(3,np)*1.e-03
28396  f5=f(5,np)*1.e-03
28397 ! convert from cm to m
28398  xc(np)=(xnp+zc(np)*f3)/100.
28399  yc(np)=(f(4,np)+zc(np)*f5)/100.
28400  zc(np)=zc(np)/100.
28401  endif
28402  enddo
28403  xbar=0.
28404  ybar=0.
28405  zbar=0.
28406  do np=1,ngood
28407 ! evaluate xbar , ybar , zbar
28408  if(f(9,np).eq.cstat(ist)) then
28409  xbar=xbar+xc(np)
28410  ybar=ybar+yc(np)
28411  zbar=zbar+zc(np)
28412  endif
28413  enddo
28414  xbar=xbar/float(ngist)
28415  ybar=ybar/float(ngist)
28416  zbar=zbar/float(ngist)
28417 ! Translate distribution by center of mass coordinates to shift
28418 ! coordinate origin to (0,0,0)
28419  do np=1,ngood
28420  if(f(9,np).eq.cstat(ist)) then
28421  xc(np)=xc(np)-xbar
28422  yc(np)=yc(np)-ybar
28423  zc(np)=zc(np)-zbar
28424  endif
28425  enddo
28426  return
28427  end
28428 
28432  SUBROUTINE b_sep(isepa)
28433  implicit real(8) (a-h,o-z)
28434  parameter(iptsz=100002)
28435  common/part/xc(iptsz),yc(iptsz),zc(iptsz)
28436  common/cgrms/xsum,ysum,zsum
28437  common/faisc/f(10,iptsz),imax,ngood
28438  common/mcs/imcs,ncstat,cstat(20)
28439  COMMON /consta/ vl, pi, xmat, rpel, qst
28440  dimension d11(2),d22(2),d12(2),rp12(2),xpint(2),xint(2)
28441  logical isepa
28442  csmax1=0.
28443  icms1=0
28444  do i=1,ncstat
28445  if(cstat(i).gt.csmax1) then
28446  icsm1=i
28447  csmax1=cstat(i)
28448  endif
28449  enddo
28450  csmax2=0.
28451  do i=1,ncstat
28452  if(i.ne.icsm1) then
28453  if(cstat(i).gt.csmax2) then
28454  csmax2=cstat(i)
28455  endif
28456  endif
28457  enddo
28458  xg1=0.
28459  xpg1=0.
28460  xg2=0.
28461  xpg2=0.
28462  imax1=0
28463  imax2=0
28464 ! COG over state charges csmax1 and csmax2
28465  do i=1,ngood
28466  if(f(9,i).eq.csmax1) then
28467  xg1=xg1+f(2,i)
28468  xpg1=xpg1+f(3,i)
28469  imax1=imax1+1
28470  endif
28471  if(f(9,i).eq.csmax2) then
28472  xg2=xg2+f(2,i)
28473  xpg2=xpg2+f(3,i)
28474  imax2=imax2+1
28475  endif
28476  enddo
28477  xg1=xg1/float(imax1)
28478  xpg1=xpg1/float(imax1)
28479  xg2=xg2/float(imax2)
28480  xpg2=xpg2/float(imax2)
28481 ! ------------------------------------
28482  d11(1)=0.
28483  d22(1)=0.
28484  d12(1)=0.
28485  d11(2)=0.
28486  d22(2)=0.
28487  d12(2)=0.
28488  do i=1,ngood
28489  if(f(9,i).eq.csmax1) then
28490  d11(1)=d11(1)+(f(3,i)-xpg1)**2
28491  d22(1)=d22(1)+(f(2,i)-xg1)**2
28492  d12(1)=d12(1)+(f(3,i)-xpg1)*(f(2,i)-xg1)
28493  endif
28494  if(f(9,i).eq.csmax2) then
28495  d11(2)=d11(2)+(f(3,i)-xpg2)**2
28496  d22(2)=d22(2)+(f(2,i)-xg2)**2
28497  d12(2)=d12(2)+(f(3,i)-xpg2)*(f(2,i)-xg2)
28498  endif
28499  enddo
28500  d11(1)=d11(1)/float(imax1)
28501  d22(1)=d22(1)/float(imax1)
28502  d12(1)=d12(1)/float(imax1)
28503  d11(2)=d11(2)/float(imax2)
28504  d22(2)=d22(2)/float(imax2)
28505  d12(2)=d12(2)/float(imax2)
28506  rp12(1)=d12(1)/sqrt(d11(1)*d22(1))
28507  rp12(2)=d12(2)/sqrt(d11(2)*d22(2))
28508  xpint(1)=sqrt(d11(1)*(1.-rp12(1)))
28509  xint(1)=sqrt(d22(1)*(1.-rp12(1)))
28510  xpint(2)=sqrt(d11(2)*(1.-rp12(2)))
28511  xint(2)=sqrt(d22(2)*(1.-rp12(2)))
28512 ! ------------------------------------------------------------
28513  elip1=xpg1+xpint(1)
28514  elip2=xpg2-xpint(2)
28515  if(elip1.lt.elip2)isepa=.true.
28516 ! TEST*********
28517 !old write(6,*)'xpg1 xpint(1) elip1 ',xpg1,xpint(1),elip1
28518 !old write(6,*)'xpg2 xpint(2) elip2 ',xpg2,xpint(2),elip2
28519 !old write(6,*)'isepa ',isepa
28520 !old write(6,*) ' ************************************'
28521 ! ***************************************************************
28522  RETURN
28523  END
28524 
28553  SUBROUTINE schefini
28554  implicit real(8) (a-h,o-z)
28555  parameter(iptsz=100002)
28556  common/dyn/tref,vref
28557  common/ttfc/tk,t1k,t2k,sk,s1k,s2k,fh
28558  COMMON /consta/ vl, pi, xmat, rpel, qst
28559  common/sc3/beamc,scdist,sce10,cplm,ect,apl,ichaes,iscsp
28560  common/faisc/f(10,iptsz),imax,ngood
28561  LOGICAL ichaes
28562 ! common modifis *********************
28563  common/stsc/beami,wavel,freq,btazero,frrms,fzrms,nr,nz
28564  common/stsc1/beams,im1,im2,im3,nr1,nz1,nq
28565  common/fldcom/ rp, zp,pl,opt,nip
28566 ! ***********************************
28567  common/rcshef/sce(20)
28568  common/conti/irfqp
28569  logical irfqp
28570  gmoy=0.
28571  do np=1,ngood
28572  gmoy=f(7,np)/xmat+gmoy
28573  enddo
28574  gmoy=gmoy/float(ngood)
28575  bgmoy=sqrt(gmoy*gmoy-1.)
28576  beams=beamc/1000.0
28577  wavel=2.*pi*vl/fh
28578  freq=fh/(2.*pi)
28579  frrms=sce(2)
28580  fzrms=sce(3)
28581  nr=idint(sce(4))
28582  nz=idint(sce(5))
28583  nip=idint(sce(6))
28584  opt=sce(9)
28585  pl=bgmoy*wavel
28586  if(irfqp) pl=pl/2.
28587 ! sce(7)=pulse length, if not beta lambda.(transport studies), units are cm
28588  if(sce(7).gt. 0.) pl=sce(7)*gmoy
28589  nr1=nr+1
28590  nz1=nz+1
28591  im1=nr*nz
28592  im2=nr1*nz1
28593  im3=nr1*nz
28594  na=1
28595  nb=ngood
28596  nq=nb-na+1
28597  return
28598  end
28599 
28635  SUBROUTINE scheff1(idum)
28636  implicit real(8) (a-h,o-z)
28637  parameter(iptsz=100002)
28638  common/dyn/tref,vref
28639  common/cmpte/iell
28640  common/part/xc(iptsz),yc(iptsz),zc(iptsz)
28641  common/dimens/zcp(iptsz),xcp(iptsz),ycp(iptsz)
28642  common/hermt/afxt(22),afyt(22),afzt(22)
28643  common/ttfc/tk,t1k,t2k,sk,s1k,s2k,fh
28644  COMMON /consta/ vl, pi, xmat, rpel, qst
28645  common/sc3/beamc,scdist,sce10,cplm,ect,apl,ichaes,iscsp
28646  common/faisc/f(10,iptsz),imax,ngood
28647  common/cdek/dwp(iptsz)
28648  common/beamsa/fs(7,iptsz)
28649  common/dcspa/iesp
28650  common/compt/nrres,nrtre,nrbunc,nrdbun
28651  common/posc/xpsc
28652  LOGICAL ichaes,iesp
28653  common/dyni/vrefi,trefi,fhinit,acpt
28654  common/bg/bsc,gsc,phis,wsync
28655  common/stsc/beami,wavel,freq,btazero,frrms,fzrms,nr,nz
28656  common/stsc1/beams,im1,im2,im3,nr1,nz1,nq
28657  common/fldcom/ rp, zp,pl,opt,nip
28658  common/spacech1/ rm(21), zm(41), rs(20), ers(16800), ezs(16800),
28659  1 ez(861), aa(800), rssq(20), zzs(41)
28660  2 ,er(861),rss(20), ismax(40), iemax(41)
28661  common/rcshef/sce(20)
28662  common/conti/irfqp
28663  dimension lossreason(iptsz)
28664  character*(8) PRTLAB
28665 !********************************************
28666 ! v28/04/2015
28667  common/fcont/ifcont
28668  logical ifcont
28669 !********************************************
28670  logical irfqp
28671  idm=idum
28672 ! set up field tables with int=0
28673 !omment beami=beamc/1000.0
28674 !********************************************
28675 ! v28/04/2015
28676  if(ifcont) then
28677  pib=180.
28678  call compress(pib)
28679  endif
28680 !********************************************
28681  prtlab='SCHEFF '
28682  fhbu=fh
28683  fh=fhinit
28684  beamc=beamc*fh/fhbu
28685  idm=0
28686  gmoy=0.
28687  do np=1,ngood
28688  gmoy=f(7,np)/xmat+gmoy
28689  enddo
28690  gmoy=gmoy/float(ngood)
28691  beami=beams
28692  IF (beami.eq.0. .OR. scdist.eq.0.) return
28693  iell=iell+1
28694 ! write(16,*) ' *call SCHEFF ',iell
28695  call pintim
28696 ! write(16,*) ' *after pintim '
28697  CALL sizrms(0,xrms,yrms,zrms,zz)
28698 ! write(16,*) ' *after sizrms ',zz
28699  write(16,6875) iell,xrms,yrms,zrms
28700 ! write the rms size to the output file 17
28701 !omment write(17,25) iell,xrms,yrms,zrms
28702 !omment25 format(2x,i5,3(2x,e12.5))
28703 6875 format(' Cell ',i4,' RMS size(m)',e12.5,2x,e12.5,2x,e12.5)
28704  rrms=sqrt(xrms*xrms+yrms*yrms)
28705 ! change unit: m==>cm
28706  zrms1=zrms*100.
28707  rrms=rrms*100.
28708  dr=rrms*frrms/float(nr)
28709  dz=zrms1*fzrms/float(nz)
28710  rmax=float(nr)*dr
28711 ! load rm, zm, rs, zs
28712  rm(1)=0.0
28713  do i=2,nr1
28714  rm(i)=float(i-1)*dr
28715  rssq(i-1)=.5*(rm(i-1)**2+rm(i)**2)
28716  rss(i-1)=0.5*(rm(i-1)+rm(i))
28717  rs(i-1)=sqrt(rssq(i-1))
28718  enddo
28719  zs=.5*dz
28720  do i=1,nz1
28721  zm(i)=float(i-1)*dz
28722  zzs(i)=zm(i)+zs
28723  enddo
28724  hl=float(nz)*zs
28725 ! load ers and ezs
28726 ! mesh dimensions are in cm. ers and ezs are in 1/cm.
28727 ! c1, c2 and c3 are in cm., and c4 is in mev-cm.
28728 ! q=coulombs/point. (2/pi)*e/(4*pi*epsilon)=572167 cm mev/coul.
28729  q=beami/(freq*float(nq))
28730  c1=572167.*q/xmat
28731  l=0
28732  do k=1,nr
28733  rfac=(rm(k+1)**2-rm(k)**2)*dz/2.
28734  if(opt.eq.0.) rfac=1.
28735  do j=1,nz
28736  zp=zm(j+1)
28737  do i=1,nr1
28738  rp=rm(i)
28739  if(opt.eq.0.) then
28740  call flds(rs(k),zs,er1,ez1)
28741  else
28742  call gaus (rm(k),rm(k+1),zm(1),zm(2),opt,er1,ez1)
28743  endif
28744  l=l+1
28745  ers(l)=c1*er1/rfac
28746 !cc write(16,*) ' ersl ',ers(l),' er1 ',er1,' l ',l
28747 !cc write(16,*) ' rsk ',rs(k),' k ',k,' zs ',zs
28748 !cc pause
28749  ezs(l)=c1*ez1/rfac
28750  ENDDO
28751  ENDDO
28752  ENDDO
28753  IF (beamc.eq.0. .OR. scdist.eq.0.) return
28754  dz1=scdist/100.
28755  dist=scdist
28756 ! sup WRITE(16, *) ' fields acting length(cm): ',DIST
28757 ! evaluate and apply space charge effects.
28758 ! phimc=phi of mesh center.
28759 ! Shifts particle coordinates to a single point in time. Uses
28760 ! a linear shift
28761 ! Beam c.g.
28762  xbar=0.
28763  ybar=0.
28764  zbar=0.
28765  brmoy=0.
28766  trmoy=0.
28767  do np=1,ngood
28768  gpai=f(7,np)/xmat
28769  brmoy=brmoy+sqrt(1.-1./(gpai*gpai))
28770  trmoy=trmoy+f(6,np)
28771  enddo
28772  trmoy=trmoy/float(ngood)
28773  phimc=trmoy*fh
28774  pbar=phimc
28775  beta=brmoy/float(ngood)
28776  gsc=1./sqrt(1.-beta*beta)
28777  bg=beta*gsc
28778  c3=dist/bg
28779 ! next one c4 not used ?
28780  c4=dist*xmat
28781 ! evaluate ng, xbar, ybar, and pbar.
28782  c2=bg*wavel/(2.*pi)
28783  gmsq=1.+bg**2
28784  gam=sqrt(gmsq)
28785 ! evaluate ng, xbar, ybar
28786  ng=0
28787  xbar=0.
28788  ybar=0.
28789  xsq=0.
28790  ysq=0.
28791  do np=1,ngood
28792  ng=ng+1
28793  x=f(2,np)
28794  y=f(4,np)
28795  xf=f(3,np)
28796  yf=f(5,np)
28797  xbar=xbar+x
28798  ybar=ybar+y
28799  xsq=xsq+x**2
28800  ysq=ysq+y**2
28801  enddo
28802  eng=float(ngood)
28803  xbar=xbar/eng
28804  ybar=ybar/eng
28805 ! the mesh center is phi*syn
28806  xsq=xsq/eng
28807  ysq=ysq/eng
28808  epsq=sqrt((xsq-xbar*xbar)/(ysq-ybar*ybar))
28809  epsqi=1./epsq
28810  xfac=2./(epsq + 1.)
28811  yfac=epsq*xfac
28812 ! clear and load bins
28813  ng=0
28814  do i=1,im1
28815  aa(i)=0.0
28816  enddo
28817  do np=1,ngood
28818  rsq=(f(2,np)-xbar)**2*epsqi+(f(4,np)-ybar)**2*epsq
28819 ! i=sqrt(rsq)/dr+1.
28820  r=sqrt(rsq)
28821  halfdr=dr*0.5
28822  i=idint(r/dr+1.0)
28823  if (i.gt.nr) cycle
28824  zph=f(6,np)*fh
28825  z=-c2*(zph-phimc)
28826  if (abs(z).ge.hl) cycle
28827 !------distribute charge among adjacent bins.
28828  ng=ng+1
28829  zz=z+hl
28830  jm1=idint(zz/dz+1.)
28831  i1=i+1
28832  if (rsq.lt.rssq(i)) i1=i-1
28833 ! if (rsq.lt.rss (i)) i1=i-1
28834  if (i1.lt.1) i1=1
28835  if (i1.gt.nr) i1=nr
28836  j1=jm1+1
28837  if (zz.lt.zzs(jm1)) j1=jm1-1
28838  if (j1.lt.1) j1=1
28839  if (j1.gt.nz) j1=nz
28840  a=1.
28841 ! if (i1.ne.i) a=(rsq-rssq(i1))/(rssq(i)-rssq(i1))
28842  if (i1.eq.i) then
28843  a=1.
28844  else
28845  rdr2=rsq/dr**2
28846  if(rdr2.gt.0.25) then
28847  sqr=sqrt(4.*rdr2-1.)
28848  else
28849  f(8,np)=0.
28850  ilost=ilost+1
28851 ! needs to be on energy
28852  lossreason(np)=1
28853  f6i=f(6,np)-trmoy
28854  write(49,3928) prtlab,idm,davtot/100.,i,int(f(1,np)),
28855  * f(2,np),f(3,np),f(4,np),f(5,np),f6i*fh*180./pi,
28856  * f(7,np)-xmat,f(9,np),lossreason(np)
28857 3928 FORMAT(1x,a8,1x,i4,1x,e12.5,i5,1x,i5,1x,6(f12.3,1x),1x,
28858  * f5.2,3x,i2)
28859  cycle
28860  endif
28861  rminsq=(halfdr*(sqr-1.))**2
28862  rmaxsq=(halfdr*(sqr+1.))**2
28863  if (i1.lt.i) then
28864  a=(rmaxsq-rm(i)**2)/(rmaxsq-rminsq)
28865  else
28866  a=(rm(i1)**2-rminsq)/(rmaxsq-rminsq)
28867  endif
28868  endif
28869 !omment if (r.gt.halfdr)then
28870 !omment rminsq=(r-halfdr)**2
28871 !omment rmaxsq=(r+halfdr)**2
28872 !omment if (i1.lt.i) then
28873 !omment a=(rmaxsq-rm(i)**2)/(rmaxsq-rminsq)
28874 !omment else
28875 !omment a=(rm(i1)**2-rminsq)/(rmaxsq-rminsq)
28876 !omment endif
28877 !omment endif
28878  b=1.-a
28879  cc=1.
28880  if (j1.ne.jm1) cc=(zz-zzs(j1))/(zzs(jm1)-zzs(j1))
28881  d=1.-cc
28882  k=(jm1-1)*nr+i
28883  aa(k)=aa(k)+a*cc
28884  k=k+i1-i
28885  aa(k)=aa(k)+b*cc
28886  k=(j1-1)*nr+i
28887  aa(k)=aa(k)+a*d
28888  k=k+i1-i
28889  aa(k)=aa(k)+b*d
28890  enddo
28891  eng=float(ng)
28892  do j=1,nz
28893  l=(j-1)*nr
28894  k=nr
28895  do i=1,nr
28896  m=l+k
28897  if(aa(m).le.0.0) then
28898  k=k-1
28899  else
28900  exit
28901  endif
28902  enddo
28903  ismax(j)=k
28904  enddo
28905 ! find iemax for each j
28906  iemax(1)=1+ismax(1)
28907  do j=2,nz
28908  iemax(j)=1+max0(ismax(j-1),ismax(j))
28909  enddo
28910  iemax(nz1)=1+ismax(nz)
28911 ! set er and ez to zero
28912  do i=1,im2
28913  er(i)=0.0
28914  ez(i)=0.0
28915  enddo
28916 ! sum up fields
28917  do js=1,nz
28918  js1=js+1
28919  ism=ismax(js)
28920  if (ism.eq.0) cycle
28921  do is=1,ism
28922  l=(js-1)*nr+is
28923  a1=aa(l)
28924  if (a1.eq.0.) cycle
28925  l=(is-1)*im3
28926  do je=1,js
28927  k1=l+(js-je)*nr1
28928  n1=(je-1)*nr1
28929  iem=iemax(je)
28930  if (iem.le.1) cycle
28931  do ie=1,iem
28932  n=n1+ie
28933  k=k1+ie
28934  er(n)=er(n)+a1*ers(k)
28935  ez(n)=ez(n)-a1*ezs(k)
28936  enddo
28937  enddo
28938  do je=js1,nz1
28939  k1=l+(je-js1)*nr1
28940  n1=(je-1)*nr1
28941  iem=iemax(je)
28942  if (iem.le.1) cycle
28943  do ie=1,iem
28944  n=n1+ie
28945  k=k1+ie
28946  er(n)=er(n)+a1*ers(k)
28947  ez(n)=ez(n)+a1*ezs(k)
28948  enddo
28949  enddo
28950  enddo
28951  enddo
28952 ! evaluate and apply impulse
28953  rrmax=0.
28954  zzmax=0.
28955  zzmin=1000.
28956  npz=0
28957  npr=0
28958  do np=1,ngood
28959 !
28960 ! Transforming to the bunch reference frame
28961 !
28962  dwc=f(7,np)-xmat
28963  gm1=dwc/xmat
28964 ! convert xp an yp from mrad to rad
28965  f3np=f(3,np)*1.e-03
28966  f5np=f(5,np)*1.e-03
28967 !omment gm1*(2.+gm1)=(gam-1)*(gam+1)=gam*gam-1=beta*beta*gam*gam
28968  bgz=sqrt(gm1*(2.+gm1))
28969  bgx=bgz*f3np
28970  bgy=bgz*f5np
28971  gamma=1.+gm1
28972 ! Particle momentum in the bunch frame
28973 !
28974  bgzstar=gam*(bgz-beta*gamma)
28975 !
28976 ! Particle energy in bunch frame
28977 !
28978  gstar=gam*(gamma-beta*bgz)
28979 !
28980  r=sqrt((f(2,np)-xbar)**2*epsqi+(f(4,np)-ybar)**2*epsq)
28981  if(r.ge.rrmax) rrmax=r
28982  if(r.eq.0.) r=.000001
28983  xor=(f(2,np)-xbar)*xfac/r
28984  yor=(f(4,np)-ybar)*yfac/r
28985  if(r.gt.rmax) then
28986  npr=npr+1
28987  else
28988  zph=f(6,np)*fh
28989  z=-c2*(zph-phimc)
28990  if(z.ge.zzmax) zzmax=z
28991  if(z.lt.zzmin) zzmin=z
28992  if(abs(z).gt.hl) then
28993  npz=npz+1
28994  else
28995 ! interpolate impulse within mesh.
28996  rb=r/dr
28997  i=idint(1.+rb)
28998  a=rb-float(i-1)
28999  b=1.-a
29000  zb=(z+hl)/dz
29001  j=idint(1.+zb)
29002  c=zb-float(j-1)
29003  d=1.-c
29004  l=i+(j-1)*nr1
29005  m=l+nr1
29006  cbgr=c3*(d*(a*er(l+1)+b*er(l))+c*(a*er(m+1)+b*er(m)))
29007  cbgzs=c3*(d*(a*ez(l+1)+b*ez(l))+c*(a*ez(m+1)+b*ez(m)))
29008 ! *******************
29009 !cc write(14,5755)np,cbgr,cbgzs,c3,a,b,c,d
29010 !cc write(14,5755)np,l,m,er(l+1),er(l),er(m+1),er(m)
29011 !cc5755 format(2x,i5,7(2x,e12.5))
29012 !cc5755 format(3(2x,i5),4(2x,e12.5))
29013 ! *******************
29014 ! different charge states in the bunch (valero)
29015  cbgr=cbgr*abs(f(9,np))
29016  cbgzs=cbgzs*abs(f(9,np))
29017  endif
29018 ! estimate impulse based on point charge at xbar,ybar,pbar.
29019  endif
29020  if(r.gt.rmax .or. abs(z).gt.hl) then
29021  z=-c2*(f(6,np)*fh-pbar)
29022  d=sqrt(z**2+r**2)
29023  rod3=r/d**3
29024  zod3=z/d**3
29025  if (nip.ne.0) then
29026 ! include neighboring bunches.
29027  do i=1,nip
29028  xi=i
29029  do j=1,2
29030  s=z+xi*pl
29031  d=sqrt(s**2+r**2)
29032  rod3=rod3+r/d**3
29033  zod3=zod3+s/d**3
29034  xi=-xi
29035  enddo
29036  enddo
29037  endif
29038 ! Evaluate impulse.
29039 !
29040  cbgr=eng*c1*c3*rod3*pi/2.
29041  cbgzs=eng*c1*c3*zod3*pi/2.
29042 ! different charges in the bunch (valero)
29043  cbgr=cbgr*abs(f(9,np))
29044  cbgzs=cbgzs*abs(f(9,np))
29045  endif
29046 !
29047 ! Apply impulse and transform back to lab frame.
29048 !
29049  bgx=bgx+cbgr*xor
29050  bgy=bgy+cbgr*yor
29051  pbgzstar=bgzstar
29052  bgzstar=bgzstar+cbgzs
29053  gstar=1.+0.5*bgzstar**2
29054  bgzf=gam*(bgzstar+beta*gstar)
29055  f3=bgx/bgzf
29056  f5=bgy/bgzf
29057  dww=f(7,np)-xmat
29058  dws=dww*((gamma+1.)/gamma)*(bgzf-bgz)/bgz
29059 !cc write(14,5755)np,pbgzstar,cbgzs,bgzstar
29060 !cc5755 format(2x,i5,3(2x,e12.5))
29061 ! ********************
29062  if(.not.iesp) then
29063 ! load the entrance beam parameters for cavities or gaps
29064  do js=1,7
29065  f(js,np)=fs(js,np)
29066  enddo
29067 ! dxp and dyp are the jumps of xp and yp (in rad) at the position dz1*xpsc (in m)
29068  dxp=f3-f3np
29069  dyp=f5-f5np
29070 ! correction of xp and yp ( in rad)
29071  f(3,np)=f(3,np)+dxp*1000.
29072  f(5,np)=f(5,np)+dyp*1000.
29073  f(2,np)=f(2,np)-dz1*100.*dxp*xpsc
29074  f(4,np)=f(4,np)-dz1*100.*dyp*xpsc
29075  dwp(np)=dws
29076  else
29077  f(3,np)=f3*1000.
29078  f(5,np)=f5*1000.
29079  f(7,np)=f(7,np)+dws
29080  endif
29081  enddo
29082  beamc=beamc*fhbu/fh
29083  fh=fhbu
29084  return
29085  end
29086 
29121  SUBROUTINE scheff_sep
29122  implicit real(8) (a-h,o-z)
29123  parameter(iptsz=100002)
29124  common/dyn/tref,vref
29125  common/cmpte/iell
29126  common/part/xc(iptsz),yc(iptsz),zc(iptsz)
29127  common/dimens/zcp(iptsz),xcp(iptsz),ycp(iptsz)
29128  common/hermt/afxt(22),afyt(22),afzt(22)
29129  common/ttfc/tk,t1k,t2k,sk,s1k,s2k,fh
29130  COMMON /consta/ vl, pi, xmat, rpel, qst
29131  common/sc3/beamc,scdist,sce10,cplm,ect,apl,ichaes,iscsp
29132  common/faisc/f(10,iptsz),imax,ngood
29133  common/cdek/dwp(iptsz)
29134  common/beamsa/fs(7,iptsz)
29135  common/dcspa/iesp
29136  common/compt/nrres,nrtre,nrbunc,nrdbun
29137  common/posc/xpsc
29138  LOGICAL ichaes,iesp
29139  common/dyni/vrefi,trefi,fhinit,acpt
29140  common/bg/bsc,gsc,phis,wsync
29141  common/stsc/beami,wavel,freq,btazero,frrms,fzrms,nr,nz
29142  common/stsc1/beams,im1,im2,im3,nr1,nz1,nq
29143  common/fldcom/ rp, zp,pl,opt,nip
29144  common/spacech1/ rm(21), zm(41), rs(20), ers(16800), ezs(16800),
29145  1 ez(861), aa(800), rssq(20), zzs(41)
29146  2 ,er(861),rss(20), ismax(40), iemax(41)
29147  common/rcshef/sce(20)
29148  common/mcs/imcs,ncstat,cstat(20)
29149  common/conti/irfqp
29150  logical irfqp
29151  character*(8) PRTLAB
29152 ! set up field tables with int=0
29153  IF (beams.eq.0. .OR. scdist.eq.0.) return
29154  prtlab='SCHEFF '
29155  fhbu=fh
29156  fh=fhinit
29157  beamc=beamc*fh/fhbu
29158 ! isepa true ---> the ncstat bunches are separated
29159  iell=iell+1
29160  write(16,*) ' ****SCHEFF ',iell
29161  write(16,*) ' Number of charge states: ',ncstat
29162  do isp=1,ncstat
29163  ngisp=0
29164  gmoy=0.
29165  do np=1,ngood
29166  if (f(9,np).eq.cstat(isp)) then
29167  ngisp=ngisp+1
29168  gmoy=f(7,np)/xmat+gmoy
29169  endif
29170  enddo
29171  gmoy=gmoy/float(ngisp)
29172 !old beamc=beams/ncstat
29173  beamc=beams*ngisp/ngood
29174  beami=beamc
29175  call pintim1(isp)
29176  CALL sizer(isp,xrms,yrms,zrms)
29177  write(16,6875) cstat(isp),beamc,xrms,yrms,zrms
29178 ! write the size rms in the output file 17
29179 !old write(17,25) iell,xrms,yrms,zrms
29180 !old25 format(2x,i5,3(2x,e12.5))
29181 6875 format(' charge: ',f8.0,' bunch intensity: ',e12.5,' amp',/,
29182  * ' with RMS size(m)',e12.5,2x,e12.5,2x,e12.5)
29183  rrms=sqrt(xrms*xrms+yrms*yrms)
29184 ! change unit: m==>cm
29185  zrms1=zrms*100.
29186  rrms=rrms*100.
29187  dr=rrms*frrms/float(nr)
29188  dz=zrms1*fzrms/float(nz)
29189  rmax=float(nr)*dr
29190 ! load rm, zm, rs, zs
29191  rm(1)=0.0
29192  do i=2,nr1
29193  rm(i)=float(i-1)*dr
29194  rssq(i-1)=.5*(rm(i-1)**2+rm(i)**2)
29195  rss(i-1)=0.5*(rm(i-1)+rm(i))
29196  rs(i-1)=sqrt(rssq(i-1))
29197  enddo
29198  zs=.5*dz
29199  do i=1,nz1
29200  zm(i)=float(i-1)*dz
29201  zzs(i)=zm(i)+zs
29202  enddo
29203  hl=float(nz)*zs
29204 ! load ers and ezs
29205 ! mesh dimensions are in cm. ers and ezs are in 1/cm.
29206 ! c1, c2 and c3 are in cm., and c4 is in mev-cm.
29207 ! q=coulombs/point. (2/pi)*e/(4*pi*epsilon)=572167 cm mev/coul.
29208  q=beami/(freq*float(nq))
29209  c1=572167.*q/xmat
29210  l=0
29211  do k=1,nr
29212  rfac=(rm(k+1)**2-rm(k)**2)*dz/2.
29213  if(opt.eq.0.) rfac=1.
29214  do j=1,nz
29215  zp=zm(j+1)
29216  do i=1,nr1
29217  rp=rm(i)
29218  if(opt.eq.0.) then
29219  call flds(rs(k),zs,er1,ez1)
29220  else
29221  call gaus (rm(k),rm(k+1),zm(1),zm(2),opt,er1,ez1)
29222  endif
29223  l=l+1
29224  ers(l)=c1*er1/rfac
29225 !cc write(16,*) ' ersl ',ers(l),' er1 ',er1,' l ',l
29226 !cc write(16,*) ' rsk ',rs(k),' k ',k,' zs ',zs
29227 !cc pause
29228  ezs(l)=c1*ez1/rfac
29229  ENDDO
29230  ENDDO
29231  ENDDO
29232  IF (beamc.eq.0. .OR. scdist.eq.0.) return
29233  dz1=scdist/100.
29234  dist=scdist
29235 ! sup WRITE(16, *) ' fields acting length(cm): ',DIST
29236 ! evaluate and apply space charge effects.
29237 ! phimc=phi of mesh center.
29238 ! Shifts particle coordinates to a single point in time. Uses
29239 ! a linear shift
29240 ! Beam c.g.
29241  xbar=0.
29242  ybar=0.
29243  zbar=0.
29244  brmoy=0.
29245  trmoy=0.
29246  do np=1,ngood
29247  if(f(9,np).eq.cstat(isp)) then
29248  gpai=f(7,np)/xmat
29249  brmoy=brmoy+sqrt(1.-1./(gpai*gpai))
29250  trmoy=trmoy+f(6,np)
29251  endif
29252  enddo
29253  trmoy=trmoy/float(ngisp)
29254  phimc=trmoy*fh
29255  pbar=phimc
29256  beta=brmoy/float(ngisp)
29257  gsc=1./sqrt(1.-beta*beta)
29258  bg=beta*gsc
29259  c3=dist/bg
29260  c4=dist*xmat
29261 ! evaluate ng, xbar, ybar, and pbar.
29262  c2=bg*wavel/(2.*pi)
29263  gmsq=1.+bg**2
29264  gam=sqrt(gmsq)
29265 ! evaluate ng, xbar, ybar
29266  ng=0
29267  xbar=0.
29268  ybar=0.
29269  xsq=0.
29270  ysq=0.
29271  do np=1,ngood
29272  if(f(9,np).eq.cstat(isp)) then
29273  ng=ng+1
29274  x=f(2,np)
29275  y=f(4,np)
29276  xf=f(3,np)
29277  yf=f(5,np)
29278  xbar=xbar+x
29279  ybar=ybar+y
29280  xsq=xsq+x**2
29281  ysq=ysq+y**2
29282  endif
29283  enddo
29284  eng=float(ngisp)
29285  xbar=xbar/eng
29286  ybar=ybar/eng
29287 ! the mesh center is phi*syn
29288  xsq=xsq/eng
29289  ysq=ysq/eng
29290  epsq=sqrt((xsq-xbar*xbar)/(ysq-ybar*ybar))
29291  epsqi=1./epsq
29292  xfac=2./(epsq + 1.)
29293  yfac=epsq*xfac
29294 ! clear and load bins
29295  ng=0
29296  do i=1,im1
29297  aa(i)=0.0
29298  enddo
29299  do 120 np=1,ngood
29300  if(f(9,np).eq.cstat(isp)) then
29301  rsq=(f(2,np)-xbar)**2*epsqi+(f(4,np)-ybar)**2*epsq
29302 ! i=sqrt(rsq)/dr+1.
29303  r=sqrt(rsq)
29304  halfdr=dr*0.5
29305  i=idint(r/dr+1.0)
29306  if (i.gt.nr) go to 120
29307  zph=f(6,np)*fh
29308  z=-c2*(zph-phimc)
29309  if (abs(z).ge.hl) go to 120
29310 !------distribute charge among adjacent bins.
29311  ng=ng+1
29312  zz=z+hl
29313  jm1=idint(zz/dz+1.)
29314  i1=i+1
29315 ! if (rsq.lt.rssq(i)) i1=i-1
29316  if (rsq.lt.rss(i)) i1=i-1
29317  if (i1.lt.1) i1=1
29318  if (i1.gt.nr) i1=nr
29319  j1=jm1+1
29320  if (zz.lt.zzs(jm1)) j1=jm1-1
29321  if (j1.lt.1) j1=1
29322  if (j1.gt.nz) j1=nz
29323  a=1.
29324 ! if (i1.ne.i) a=(rsq-rssq(i1))/(rssq(i)-rssq(i1))
29325  if (i1.eq.i) then
29326  a=1.
29327  else
29328  rdr2=rsq/dr**2
29329  sqr=sqrt(4.*rdr2-1.)
29330  rminsq=(halfdr*(sqr-1.))**2
29331  rmaxsq=(halfdr*(sqr+1.))**2
29332  if (i1.lt.i) then
29333  a=(rmaxsq-rm(i)**2)/(rmaxsq-rminsq)
29334  else
29335  a=(rm(i1)**2-rminsq)/(rmaxsq-rminsq)
29336  endif
29337  endif
29338  b=1.-a
29339  cc=1.
29340  if(j1.ne.jm1) cc=(zz-zzs(j1))/(zzs(jm1)-zzs(j1))
29341  d=1.-cc
29342  k=(jm1-1)*nr+i
29343  aa(k)=aa(k)+a*cc
29344  k=k+i1-i
29345  aa(k)=aa(k)+b*cc
29346  k=(j1-1)*nr+i
29347  aa(k)=aa(k)+a*d
29348  k=k+i1-i
29349  aa(k)=aa(k)+b*d
29350  endif
29351  120 continue
29352  eng=float(ng)
29353 ! find ismax for each j
29354  do j=1,nz
29355  l=(j-1)*nr
29356  k=nr
29357  do i=1,nr
29358  m=l+k
29359  if(aa(m).le.0.00) then
29360  k=k-1
29361  go to 130
29362  else
29363  go to 140
29364  endif
29365 130 continue
29366  enddo
29367 140 ismax(j)=k
29368  enddo
29369 ! find iemax for each j
29370  iemax(1)=1+ismax(1)
29371  do j=2,nz
29372  iemax(j)=1+max0(ismax(j-1),ismax(j))
29373  enddo
29374  iemax(nz1)=1+ismax(nz)
29375 ! set er and ez to zero
29376  do i=1,im2
29377  er(i)=0.0
29378  ez(i)=0.0
29379  enddo
29380 c sum up fields
29381  do 220 js=1,nz
29382  js1=js+1
29383  ism=ismax(js)
29384  if (ism.eq.0) go to 220
29385  do 210 is=1,ism
29386  l=(js-1)*nr+is
29387  a1=aa(l)
29388  if (a1.eq.0.) go to 210
29389  l=(is-1)*im3
29390  do 180 je=1,js
29391  k1=l+(js-je)*nr1
29392  n1=(je-1)*nr1
29393  iem=iemax(je)
29394  if (iem.le.1) go to 180
29395  do ie=1,iem
29396  n=n1+ie
29397  k=k1+ie
29398  er(n)=er(n)+a1*ers(k)
29399  ez(n)=ez(n)-a1*ezs(k)
29400  enddo
29401  180 continue
29402  do 200 je=js1,nz1
29403  k1=l+(je-js1)*nr1
29404  n1=(je-1)*nr1
29405  iem=iemax(je)
29406  if (iem.le.1) go to 200
29407  do ie=1,iem
29408  n=n1+ie
29409  k=k1+ie
29410  er(n)=er(n)+a1*ers(k)
29411  ez(n)=ez(n)+a1*ezs(k)
29412  enddo
29413  200 continue
29414  210 continue
29415  220 continue
29416 c evaluate and apply impulse
29417  rrmax=0.
29418  zzmax=0.
29419  zzmin=1000.
29420  npz=0
29421  npr=0
29422  do np=1,ngood
29423 ! Transforming to the bunch reference frame
29424 !
29425  if(f(9,np).eq.cstat(isp)) then
29426  dwc=f(7,np)-xmat
29427  gm1=dwc/xmat
29428 ! convert xp an yp from mrad to rad
29429  f3np=f(3,np)*1.e-03
29430  f5np=f(5,np)*1.e-03
29431 !omment gm1*(2.+gm1)=(gam-1)*(gam+1)=gam*gam-1=beta*beta*gam*gam
29432  bgz=sqrt(gm1*(2.+gm1))
29433  bgx=bgz*f3np
29434  bgy=bgz*f5np
29435  gamma=1.+gm1
29436 ! Particle momentum in the bunch frame
29437 !
29438  bgzstar=gam*(bgz-beta*gamma)
29439 !
29440 ! Particle energy in bunch frame
29441 !
29442  gstar=gam*(gamma-beta*bgz)
29443 !
29444  r=sqrt((f(2,np)-xbar)**2*epsqi+(f(4,np)-ybar)**2*epsq)
29445  if(r.ge.rrmax) rrmax=r
29446  if (r.eq.0.) r=.000001
29447  xor=(f(2,np)-xbar)*xfac/r
29448  yor=(f(4,np)-ybar)*yfac/r
29449  if (r.gt.rmax) then
29450  npr=npr+1
29451  go to 230
29452  endif
29453  zph=f(6,np)*fh
29454  z=-c2*(zph-phimc)
29455  if(z.ge.zzmax) zzmax=z
29456  if(z.lt.zzmin) zzmin=z
29457  if (abs(z).gt.hl) then
29458  npz=npz+1
29459  go to 230
29460  endif
29461 ! interpolate impulse within mesh.
29462  rb=r/dr
29463  i=idint(1.+rb)
29464  a=rb-float(i-1)
29465  b=1.-a
29466  zb=(z+hl)/dz
29467  j=idint(1.+zb)
29468  c=zb-float(j-1)
29469  d=1.-c
29470  l=i+(j-1)*nr1
29471  m=l+nr1
29472  cbgr=c3*(d*(a*er(l+1)+b*er(l))+c*(a*er(m+1)+b*er(m)))
29473  cbgzs=c3*(d*(a*ez(l+1)+b*ez(l))+c*(a*ez(m+1)+b*ez(m)))
29474  cbgr=cbgr*abs(f(9,np))
29475  cbgzs=cbgzs*abs(f(9,np))
29476  go to 260
29477 ! estimate impulse based on point charge at xbar,ybar,pbar.
29478 230 continue
29479  z=-c2*(f(6,np)*fh-pbar)
29480  d=sqrt(z**2+r**2)
29481  rod3=r/d**3
29482  zod3=z/d**3
29483  if (nip.eq.0) go to 250
29484 ! include neighboring bunches.
29485  do i=1,nip
29486  xi=i
29487  do j=1,2
29488  s=z+xi*pl
29489  d=sqrt(s**2+r**2)
29490  rod3=rod3+r/d**3
29491  zod3=zod3+s/d**3
29492  xi=-xi
29493  enddo
29494  enddo
29495 ! Evaluate impulse.
29496 !
29497 250 cbgr=eng*c1*c3*rod3*pi/2.
29498  cbgzs=eng*c1*c3*zod3*pi/2.
29499  cbgr=cbgr*abs(f(9,np))
29500  cbgzs=cbgzs*abs(f(9,np))
29501 !
29502 ! Apply impulse and transform back to lab frame.
29503 !
29504 260 bgx=bgx+cbgr*xor
29505  bgy=bgy+cbgr*yor
29506  bgzstar=bgzstar+cbgzs
29507  gstar=1.+0.5*bgzstar**2
29508  bgzf=gam*(bgzstar+beta*gstar)
29509  f3=bgx/bgzf
29510  f5=bgy/bgzf
29511  dww=f(7,np)-xmat
29512  dws=dww*((gamma+1.)/gamma)*(bgzf-bgz)/bgz
29513 ! ********************
29514  if(.not.iesp) then
29515 ! load the entrance beam parameters for cavities or gaps
29516  do js=1,7
29517  f(js,np)=fs(js,np)
29518  enddo
29519 ! dxp and dyp are the jumps of xp and yp (in rad) at the position dz1*xpsc (in m)
29520  dxp=f3-f3np
29521  dyp=f5-f5np
29522 ! correction of xp and yp ( in rad)
29523  f(3,np)=f(3,np)+dxp*1000.
29524  f(5,np)=f(5,np)+dyp*1000.
29525  f(2,np)=f(2,np)-dz1*100.*dxp*xpsc
29526  f(4,np)=f(4,np)-dz1*100.*dyp*xpsc
29527  dwp(np)=dws
29528  else
29529  f(3,np)=f3*1000.
29530  f(5,np)=f5*1000.
29531  f(7,np)=f(7,np)+dws
29532  endif
29533  endif
29534  enddo
29535 ! big enddo of isp
29536  enddo
29537  beamc=beamc*fhbu/fh
29538  fh=fhbu
29539  return
29540  end
29541 
29560  SUBROUTINE rfkick(v,dp,harm,nvf)
29561  implicit real(8) (a-h,o-z)
29562  parameter(iptsz=100002,maxcell1=3000)
29563  common/rigid/boro
29564  COMMON /consta/ vl, pi, xmat, rpel, qst
29565  common/dyn/tref,vref
29566  common/davcom/dav1(maxcell1,40),davtot,iitem(maxcell1),idav
29567  common/etcha1/ichas(iptsz),chexmin(10),chexmax(10),chasit
29568  common/ttfc/tk,t1k,t2k,sk,s1k,s2k,fh
29569  common/faisc/f(10,iptsz),imax,ngood
29570  common/etcom/cog(8),exten(17),fd(iptsz)
29571  common/fene/wdisp,wphas,wx,wy,rlim,ifw
29572  common/corec/tref1
29573  common/qmoyen/qmoy
29574  common/aerp/vphase,vfield,ierpf
29575  common/itvole/itvol,imamin
29576  common/compt/nrres,nrtre,nrbunc,nrdbun
29577  common/shif/dtiph,shift
29578  common/tofev/ttvols
29579  character cr*1
29580  CHARACTER*(8) PRTLAB
29581 ! dimension vecx(1)
29582  LOGICAL chasit,itvol,imamin,shift
29583 ! ENVELOPE
29584 ! PRLAB(IPRF)='RFKICK '
29585  call stapl(davtot*10.)
29586 !xx ilost=0
29587  twopi=2.*pi
29588  freq=fh/twopi
29589  wavel=vl/freq
29590  fcpi=fh*180./pi
29591 ! print out on terminal of transport element # on one and the same line
29592  cr=char(13)
29593  WRITE(6,8254,advance='no') nrtre,cr
29594 8254 format('Transport element:',i5,a1)
29595  if (harm.le.0.) harm=1.
29596 ! test window - unneccesary at START of element - Alt
29597 ! call reject(ilost,PRTLAB)
29598 ! Calculate tof, beta, gamma, k.e. for c.o.g.
29599  tcog=0.
29600  bcog=0.
29601  do np=1,ngood
29602  tcog=tcog+f(6,np)
29603  gpa=f(7,np)/xmat
29604  bcog=sqrt(1.-1./(gpa*gpa))+bcog
29605  enddo
29606  tcog=tcog/float(ngood)
29607  bcog=bcog/float(ngood)
29608  gcog=1./sqrt(1.-bcog*bcog)
29609  encog=xmat*gcog-xmat
29610 ! adjustement of the phase of RF w.r.t. the T.O.F.
29611  xkpi=0.
29612  if(imamin) then
29613  ttvpi=harm*ttvols*fcpi
29614  xkpi=ttvpi/360.
29615  ixkpi=int(xkpi)
29616  xkpi=(xkpi-float(ixkpi))*360.
29617  write(16,*) ' *** TOF correction:',-xkpi,' deg'
29618  dp=dp-xkpi*pi/180.
29619  write(16,*)' ***phase of RF adjusted : ',dp*180./pi,' deg'
29620  endif
29621 ! start of write to file '.short' for kicker
29622  idav=idav+1
29623  iitem(idav)=22
29624  dav1(idav,1)=v
29625  dav1(idav,2)=dp*180./pi
29626  dav1(idav,3)=nvf
29627  dav1(idav,4)=davtot*10.
29628 ! if(itvol) dav1(idav,5)=-xkpi
29629  dav1(idav,5)=harm
29630 ! end
29631  WRITE(16,178)
29632 178 FORMAT(/,' Longitudinal parameters',/,
29633  2 5x,' BETA GAMMA ENERGY(MeV) ',
29634  3 ' TOF(deg) TOF(sec)')
29635  WRITE(16,1788) bcog,gcog,encog,tcog*fcpi,tcog
29636 1788 FORMAT(' COG ',f7.5,3x,e12.5,1x,e12.5,3x,e12.5,3x,e12.5)
29637  e0t=harm*v/(bcog*wavel)
29638  cay=harm*twopi/(bcog*gcog*wavel)
29639  caysq=cay**2
29640  con=twopi*e0t*qmoy/xmat
29641  rad=pi/180.
29642 ! shift=true => reference and COG seperated, otherwise reference=COG
29643 ! --- save the reference
29644  ovref=vref
29645  otref=tref
29646 ! --- shift = false: the reference particle is the cog
29647  if(shift) then
29648  ovref=vref
29649  beref=vref/vl
29650  gamref=1./sqrt(1.-beref*beref)
29651  older=xmat*gamref
29652  else
29653  tref=tcog
29654  vref=bcog*vl
29655  ovref=vref
29656  beref=bcog
29657  gamref=1./sqrt(1.-beref*beref)
29658  older=xmat*gamref
29659  endif
29660 ! --- if imamin = false: phase setting has been forced equal to dp, otherwise phase setting has been adjusted
29661  enrprin=older-xmat
29662  WRITE(16,165) beref,gamref,enrprin,tref*fh*180./pi,tref
29663 165 FORMAT(' REF ',f7.5,3x,e12.5,1x,e12.5,3x,e12.5,3x,e12.5)
29664  wsync=0.
29665  bcour=0.
29666  tcog=0.
29667  do np=1,ngood
29668  a=harm*(f(6,np)-tref+ttvols)*fh+dp
29669  s=sin(a)
29670  w=f(7,np)-xmat
29671  gpai=f(7,np)/xmat
29672  bg=sqrt(w/xmat*(2.+w/xmat))
29673  bpai=bg/gpai
29674  const=(gpai/(gpai*gpai-1.))*f(9,np)
29675  disp=const*v/xmat*s
29676  bcour=bcour+bpai
29677  tcog=tcog+f(6,np)
29678  if (nvf.eq.0) then
29679  f(3,np)=f(3,np)+disp
29680  else if (nvf.eq.1) then
29681  f(5,np)=f(5,np)+disp
29682  else
29683  write(6,*) 'Invalid parameter NVF in RFKICK'
29684  endif
29685  wsync=wsync+w
29686  enddo
29687  wsync=wsync/float(ngood)
29688  bcour=bcour/float(ngood)
29689  tcog=tcog/float(ngood)
29690 ! Test window
29691  prtlab='RFKICK '
29692  call reject(ilost,prtlab)
29693 ! dave start for kicker
29694  dav1(idav,36)=ngood
29695  call emiprt(0)
29696  return
29697  end
29698 
29715  FUNCTION dkebethe(xkeval)
29716  implicit real(8) (a-h,o-z)
29717  common/strip/atm,qs,atms,ths,qop,sqst(6),anp,nqst
29718  COMMON /consta/ vl, pi, xmat, rpel, qst
29719 !--- Parameters to calculate dE/dx for graphite(Z=6,A=12.01115) with density of 2.265 g/cm^3
29720 !--- xNA: Avogadro's number
29721  xna = 6.02214129e23
29722 !--- re: classical electron radius in m
29723  re = 2.8179403267e-15
29724 !--- xme: mass of electron in eV
29725  xme = 0.510998928e6
29726 !--- znt = A of graphite target
29727  znt=12.011
29728 !--- parameters from appendix.2 in energy loss by D. Groom in PDG-93-06
29729  xiadj=78
29730  cbar=2.8680
29731  x0=-0.0178
29732  x1=2.3415
29733  aval=0.2614
29734  xkval=2.8697
29735  d0val=0.12
29736 !----------------------- End of parameters
29737 !--- calculation start the energy loss in carbon stripper
29738 !---------- in unit of eV, m/sec
29739  xmas=xmat*1.e6
29740  vlm = vl/100.
29741 !--- velBohr: Bohr velocity in m/sec
29742  velbohr = vlm/137.035999
29743  gaval = 1. + xkeval/xmat
29744  beval = sqrt(1.-1./(gaval*gaval))
29745  etaval = beval*gaval
29746 !--- statistical net charge on the partially neutralized ion
29747 !--- Ref: "The Stopping of Energetic light ions in elemental matter"
29748 !--- by J.F. Ziegler in J. Appl. Phys / Rev. Appl. Phys., 85, 1249-1279 (1999)
29749  znm = anp*(1.-exp(-beval*vlm/(anp**(2./3.)*velbohr)))
29750 !--- xKEmaxval: maximum possible electron recoil kinetic energy
29751 !--- (Energy loss in matter by heavy particles by D. Groom in Particle Data Group Notes, PDG-93-06)
29752  xkemaxval=2.*xme*etaval**2./
29753  * (1.+2.*gaval*xme/xmas+(xme/xmas)**2.)
29754  xkfactor = 4.*pi*xna*re**2.*xme
29755 !--- Cadjval: Analytic approximation of shell correction
29756 !--- This formula is valid for beta*gamma > 0.13
29757 !--- (Energy loss in matter by heavy particles by D. Groom in Particle Data Group Notes, PDG-93-06)
29758  cadjval=(0.422377*etaval**(-2.)+0.0304043*etaval**(-4.)-
29759  * 0.00038106*etaval**(-6.))*1.e-6*xiadj**2.+
29760  * (3.858019*etaval**(-2.)-0.1667989*etaval**(-4.)+
29761  * 0.00157955*etaval**(-6.))*1.e-9*xiadj**3.
29762 !--- delden : Density effect correction
29763 !--- (Energy loss in matter by heavy particles by D. Groom in Particle Data Group Notes, PDG-93-06)
29764  xin = log10(etaval)
29765  if(xin >= x1) then
29766  delden = 2.*log(10.)*xin-cbar
29767  elseif(xin >= x0 .and. xin < x1) then
29768  delden = 2*log(10.)*xin-cbar+aval*(x1-xin)**xkval
29769  elseif(xin < x0) then
29770  delden = d0val*10.**(2*(xin-x0))
29771  endif
29772 !-----------------------------------------------
29773  coeff=xkfactor*(znm/beval)**2*(qs/atms)
29774  factor1=1/2.*log(2*xme*etaval**2.*
29775  * xkemaxval/xiadj**2.)
29776  factor2=beval**2.
29777  factor3=cadjval/znt
29778  factor4=1/2.*delden
29779  factor=factor1-factor2-factor3-factor4
29780 !--- dkeval: kinetic energy decrease in eV/(g/cm**2)
29781  dkecal=coeff*factor
29782 !--- ths: thickness in g/cm**2 = 1E4*g/m**2
29783 !--- dkeBethe: kinetic energy decrease in MeV
29784  dkebethe=dkecal*ths*1.e4/1.e6
29785  return
29786  END
29787 
vppi
function vppi(k)
Definition: dynac.F90:8583
denrs
function denrs(xyz)
Definition: dynac.F90:3354

subroutine chasel
Definition: dynac.F90:9908

function tsb0(betr)

subroutine schermi
Definition: dynac.F90:10782

subroutine zrotat(zrot)

subroutine hersc(ini)

varxy
function varxy(xi, xf, ik)

function variz(bb, cc, dd, ee, ee1)

function varzr(ee, cc, nmazr)

function scgx(xi, xf)

subroutine rluxat(lout, inout, k1, k2)

subroutine rharm

function codsy(bb, cc, dd, ee, kap)

function spline(n, xv)

function sgiii(it1, it2, it3)

subroutine dwref(phi0, gam5, t5)

function prinz(cc, dd, kap, zrmss1)

program dynac

sizcor
subroutine sizcor(ect, xrms, yrms, zrms, imaxd)

function tsb4(betr)

subroutine adjrfq

function xj1(phi0, t0)

copdr
function copdr(xi, xf, kap)

fieldcav
subroutine fieldcav(atte)

uppp
function uppp(it1, it2, it3)
Definition: dynac.F90:8298
chasey
subroutine chasey
Definition: dynac.F90:10211
